heir beginnis hystory croniklis scotland pthe excusation prentar ingyne man inclinatioun sindry wyse geuin se sum men ar geuin detractioun inuy displeseir malancolie thair nychbouris he cherite sum ar nobill full gentilnes thay luf thing bot ioy merynes psum ar vndir sum maid vp nocht sum men luffis peace sum desitis weir sum blyth mery thocht curis nocht may perseueir grace fauour lady deir sum boldin othir maist cruell feid lance dagar rynnis deid ane he mycht ane hundreth weil sustene leiffis wo pennance table gud fallois comptis nocht ane bene wrechit mynd insaciable heuin hell wer thing bot ane fable bir ay sycht gud euil rynnis baggis deuil pand prentar doi considir weil thir sindry myndis men thair leuing desiris nocht bot laubour leil mycht leif iust wynnyng mycht first pleis god syne noble kyng ye reders bousum attent wer laubour besynes content wark haue heir assailyeit bring lycht maist humely exhort yow nobill reders quhare haue failyeit letter sillabe poyntis lang schort ye gentrice support tak sentence best wyse ye may sall better god ane othir day pfinis contentis buke first proheme apon cosmographie schawand ye fyne vicius virtewis leiffing causis quhy translatoure tuke werk hand pthe discriptioun scotlad deuidit rubrikis cheptouris pane compendious narratioun auld institutionis maneris leuing scottis ane morall doctryne deploring sindry recent euill conswetudis brocht realme gret difformite pepill present samyn pane schort recapitulation kyngis britane fra first beginning thairof empire kyng hary viii regnand gret felicite aboue inglismen pthe table ye historie contenand euery buke cheptour craftely seuerit thaym self pthe name kyngis gouernouris scotland sen realme began schawing quhat bukis cheptouris historie followyng thair lyuis marciall dedis salbe esalie foundin pthe proheme apon historie schawand breiffelie contentis maist notable thingis buke pthe beginnyng scottis quhy thay wer callit name thair happy cumyng egipt spanye ireland ilis albion regioun wes callit thaym scotland pthe vailyeant weirlie dedis kyngis princis gouernouris chiftanis scotland maist dangerus terribil battallis fochtin sindry chancis fortoun aganis ye britonis pichtis saxonis inglismen dauis pthe beginning pychtis thair confideratioun scottis amite blud freindschip thair weris lang continewing aganis ye romani support scottis thair exterminioun finall expulsioun albion weris scottis pthe beginning britonis thair lang weris perseueryng aganis ye romani yai wer subdewit thair realme maid tributar forme prouince finalie doung britane walis weris saxonis pthe cumyng saxonis britane thair weris slychtis marciall dedis wrocht sindry chancis aganis britonis scottis pichtis pthe weris inglismen eftir cumyng saxonis pmony vncouth meruellis wounderfull thingis schawin ay samyn season thay fell name maist notable clerkis sanctis leuand tyme warld pmony graue concionis orisonis consultationis epistillis contenand rycht fructuus morall doctrinis sa resolute degest response na othir buke salbe foundin mair proffitable plesand reders pane epistill direckit translatoure ye kyngis grace ye letter end buke inducyng hienes frequent reding ye historie precedent pfinis followis proheme apon cosmographie quhen siluir diane ful bemis brycht fra dirk eclips wes past yi othir nycht ye crab hir pir mansion gane artophilax contending mycht gret eist set visage rycht mene ledar charle wane aboue heid wes vrsis twane quhen sterris small obscuris sycht lucifer left twinkland hym allane frosty nycht hir prolixit houri hir mantill quhit spred tender flouris quhen ardent lauboure he addressit translait story progenitouris thair gret manheid hie wisdome honouris quhen may cleir ane mirroure se furius end sum tyme tirannye sum tyme glore prudent gouernouris ilk stait apprisit thair faculte pmy wery spreit desyring repres emptiue pen frutles besynes awalkit furth tak recent ayre quhen priapus stormy weid oppres raqu istit maist tendernes rest ane quhile amyd gardingis bare bot maner couth mynd prepare set asyde vnplesand heuynes comtemplyng solitare pand fyrst occurrit remembring wes seruice kyng put grace yeris tenderest clerk comptis youcht wes inding hart hand euery othir thing mycht hym pleis ony maner best quhill hie inuy seruice kest thaym court gouerning bird plume heryit nest pour lyfe giding auenturis dependis thir heuinlie creaturis apperandlie sum necessite youcht ane man wald set besy cutis far laboure wisdome furis fle hard chance infortunite youcht eschew difficulte cursit weird yit ithandlie enduris geuin hym first natiuite erdlie stait beualing thus chance fortoun gud na esperance lang swomit hir seis deip sad auising hir thochtfull lance couth fynd na port ankir hir firmance quhill morpheus dery god sleip reuth curis weip set sleuth deidly contenance snorand vanis throw body creip pme thocht wes ane plesand meid quhare flora maid tender blewmys spreid throw kyndlie dew humouris nutratiue quhen goldin titan flamis reid aboue seis rasit vp heid diffounding doun heit restoratiue euery frute nature maid liue quhilk wes afore wynter deid stormys cald frostis penitriue pane siluer fontane sprang watter cleir place quhare approchit neir quhare sone espy ane fellown reird courtly gallandis thair best maneir reiosyng thaym season yeir bene mayis day feird thair gudlie hauing maid nocht affeird thaym saw ane crownit kyng appeir tendir downis rising beird pthir courtlie gallandis settand thair intentis sing play diuers instrumentis according princis appetit two plesand ladyis come pransand ouir bentis thair costlie clethin schew thair mychty rentis quhat hart mycht wi thay wantit noch ane myt rubeis schone apon thair fingaris quhit finalie knew thair consentis ane virtew othir hecht delite pthir goddess arrayit wyse reuerence honoure list deuise afore prince fell doun apon thair kneis syne dressit thaym thair best auyse far wisdome thair power lyis thyng mycht hym best appleis quhare reiosit heuinly gleis hym desyrit hie empryis ane thaym two vnto lady cheis first delite vnto prince said thus maist vailyeant knycht dedis amorus lustiest euir nature wrocht quhilk floure youth mellifluus notis sweit sang melodius awalkis heir amang flouris soft thow he game bot thy mery thocht heuinlye blis delicius welth erd aualis nocht pyoucht thow france italie also spaine ingland pole othir realmes mo youcht thow mycht regne stait maist glorius thy pissant kyngdome nocht worth ane stro gyf vnto thy pleseir ane fo truble thy mynd curis dolorus thair na thing may odius man leif miserie wo defraudand god nature genius pdres thairfore thy besy cure thow ioy pleseir may indure sycht thir four bodyis elementar two heuy grosse two ar lycht pure thir elementis wirkyng nature douth change othir youcht rycht far fra othir seuerit qualiteis contrar thaym ar maid leuand creature finalie thaym resoluit ar pthe fyre aire aire watter cleir erd watter turnis without weir erd watter turnis ouir agane furth ordour na thing consumis heir ane man new borne beginnis appeir othir figure afore wes tane quhen deid mateir doi remane youcht resolue sum new maneir thing new nocht bot forme gane pthus thing erd bot fugitiue passand cumand spreiding successiue ane beist ane man consaue seid infuse membris genitiue furth tyme pleseir doi ouir driue chance hym ledis quhill laid graue thairfore thy heuyn pleseir ressaue quhill thow art heir present liue eftir deith thow sall na plesier haue pthe rose lyllyis violet unpullit sone ar wynd ouiese fallis doun ony frut wi thairfore say sen thing may let bot thy brycht hew mon yeris fret euery thing bot ane season thow may nocht haue ane excellent blis ly nycht myn army plet hals brais mony lusty ky pand haue tender body thy side propir fet quhilk nature he prouide euery pleseir thow may deuyne ay quhill tender yeris ouir slide gif pleis thy brydill gyde thow mon way fra agit men declyne syne dres thy hart thy curage ingyne suffir nane thy hous abide bot gyf thay vnto thy lust inclyne pgyf thow desyris seis fleit heuinlie blys thy lady treit said clerkis renoun thair na pleseir eird gret quhen ane luffar doi lady meit quikin lyfe mony deidly swon hiest pleseir comparison sall gyf thy yeris swete ane lusty halk mony plumys broun pquhilk salbe found ioyus plesant gyf thow vnto hir mery flychtis hant euery blys may erd appeir hart wyll think thow sall plente want quhill yeris swift quhelis properant consume thy strenth thy bewte cleir quhen delyte said maneir rage youtheid thocht maist releuant uirtew said ye sall eftir heir pmy landis braid mony plentuus schyre sall gif thy hienes gyf thow list desyre triumphant glore hie honoure fame deuyne sic pissance thaym na furius ire werand age flame birnand fyre bitter deith may bring vnto rewyne bot thow mon first insuf er mekill pyne aboue thy self thow may haue empyre sall thy fame honoure haue na fyne pmy realme set amang fois quhilkis he ane weir continewall euir still doi bordour ly youcht thay may wayis ouir thrall thay ly wait gif ony chance may fall sum tyme get victory thus lyfe ane ithand cheualry laubour haldis strang ony wall thing brekis bot slogardy pna fortoun may aganis auaill youcht scho cludy stormis assaill brek streme scharp aduersite weddir louin maist tempestius haill ony dreid beir ane equall saill schip strang may neuir de wit reason manheid gouernis hie influence sterris may preuaill regne infortunite pthe rage youtheid may nocht dantit gret distres scharp aduersite reason experience finest gold siluer se may nocht wrocht vtilite flamis kene bitter violence distres intelligence quhay salis lang hie prosperite ar sone ouitset stormy violence pthis fragill lyfe moment induring dout sall euery peple bring sickir blis eternall wo gyf thow honest lauboure doi ane thing thy panefull laubour sall vane tarying howbeit thy honest werkis nocht gyf thow lust doi ony thing also schamefull deid without disseuering remanis ay quhen pleseir ago pa caruell tycht fast tending throw see leuys na prent amang wallis hie birdis swift mony besy plume peirsis aire wait nocht quhare thay fle siclik lyfe without actiuite gyffis na frut howbeit ane schado blume quhay doi thair lyfe e consume without virtew thair fame memorie sall vanis sone eky inne watter purgis makis bodyis fair fire nature ascendis aire purifyis heitis vehement floure doi smell frute nurisare precius balme reuertis thingis sare makis thaym rot impacient spice maist swete ro maist redolent stern day mouing circulare chasis nycht bemis resplendent psiclik werk perfitis euery wycht feruent luf maist excellent lycht makis man erd peir doi saule fra corruptioun dycht odoure dulce makis brycht diane full yit appollo cleir syne rasis vnto hiest speir immortaly schyne goddis sycht chosin spous creature deir pthis othir wenche clepit delite inuoluis man sensuall appetite euery kynd vice miserie becaus na wit reason perfite quhare seho gyde bot skaithis infinite doloure schame vrgent powerte scho wes get frothis see quhilk signifies hir pleseir vennomit mydlit ay scharp aduersite pduke hanniball mony authouris wrait throw spanye come mony passage strait italy furour bellicall brak doun wallis montanis slait army maid ane oppin gait victoryis romani capua pleseir sensuall duk wes maid soft deligait fois wes sone ouir thrall pof feirs achill weirlie dedis sprang troy grece quhill virtew rang lust hym slew bot reuth heir siclik troianis thair knychtis strang vailyeant grekis fra thair roumes dang uictoriuslie exercit mony yeir nycht thay went thair lust pleseir fatall hors throw thair wallis fang quhais prignant sidis wer full men weir psatdanapall prince effeminat fra knychtlie dedis wes degenerat twinand thredis purpur lynt fingaris soft amang ladyis sat lust couth nocht saciat quhill fois come bitter dynt quhat nobill men ladyis he bene tynt quhen thay lustis wer intoxicat schaw lenth toung suld neuir stynt pthairfore camil vailyeant cheualeir quhen gallis dantit weir heritable landis wald haue na recompence gyf barnis freindis deir wer virtewis thay couth nocht fall ilk yeir haue yneuch romane prouidence gif thay wer geuin vice insolence wes nocht neidfull conques geir occasioun thair incontinence psum nobill men poetis list declare werdeifeitsum goddis aire sum heuin eolus uulcan saturn mercury appollo iupitare mar hercules othir men preclare glore immortall thair lyuis wan quhy wer thir peple callit goddis becaus thay ane virtew singulare excel nt hie aboue ingyne man pand otheris ar reik sulphurius ixion wery sisiphus eumenides furyis rycht odibill proud giandis thristy tantalus huglie drink fude vennomus quhare flamis bald mirknes ar sensibill quhy ar thir folk panis terribill becaus thay wer bot schrewis vicius thair lyfe dedis horribill pand youcht na frute wer eftir consequent mortall lyfe bot warld present ilk man haue allanerlie respect yit virtew suld fra vice different quik fra deid riche fr indigent ane glore honour ay direct othir saule body neclect ane reason intelligent othir beistis following affect nold aganis lustis striue bot leiffis beist knawlege sensitiue eildis richt fast deith hym sone ouir halis thairfore mule ane langar liue stomt hors also barant wiue apperis young quhen brudie falis se also quhen nature nocht preualis pane dolour ar sa pungitiue medicine pacient aualis psen thow he hard baith intentis thus cheis w two maist delitius first sustene ane scharp aduersite danting rage youtheid furius fyne posseid triumphe innumerus lang empire hie felicite haif ane moment sensualite fuliche youth lyfe voluptuous thy dayis full miserie pbe phebus firy cart dyd wry fra south west declinand besaly dip steidis occeane quhen began oui sile visage dry vapou thik cloudis full sky notus brym wynd metidiane wyngis donk penni full rane awalkenit mycht nocht aspy quhilk thaym two lady tane pbot sone knew thay war goddess come sleip vailyeant hercules quhen young fre euery lore lust honour pouerte rich quhen contempnit lust ydilnes virtew micht life decore werkis maist excellent glore incressit panefull besines hie triumphe louyng pthan throw morall eruditioun quhilk come said visioun tuke purpos forthir went wryte story regioun dedis mony illuster campioun youcht pane apperis vehement make story redaris patent wyll begyn discriptioun albion maner subsequent pfinis heir begynnis cosmographe discription albion phovv thyngis sub devvit alteratioun deith na thyng permanent erd ca primo traist nane he sa dirk intelligence bot knawis cosmographye maist necessar knawlege hystoryis yit dis riue samyn office na smal ingyne attoure auctouris yt he wryttyn apon discription warld ar patent knawin ilk regioun pepyll amang quhome he bene mony crafty resolut men schawing mony gret thyngis aboue ingine men found sentence samyn na thing different fra verite discription mony vncouth diuers thingis succeding contynewally gret comodite pleseir reders yit sen mater thay treit solide permanent samyn forme ymage first found apperis baith vnletterit pepil vtheris quhilk he na sicht continewal alteration materis ye verite schawin thaym al partis sen thyngis quhilkis ar comprehendit within speir mone ar sa thirlit deith alteration ye othir consumit afore w elli afore yame apperis na thing mair corruptible yit mair alteratioun erd situatioun thairof u changis sa mony figuris lang age proces yeris nocht may se presently ene bot fyndis mony crafty profound quhare sum tyme bene maist notable cietes maist plen u lesuris medois throw erd quaik trymblyng elli continewall inundation watteris nocht remanis bot othir huge seys elli nproffitable ground sandis attoure see alluu oun pres rage er cumys sum landis gangis furth vtheris dayly occurris experience baith seys watteris geuis iniust merchis al mekle sum landis thay reif fra vtheris heirfore beleif syndry chance lang proces tyme yt euery thyng sall respondent samyn perfection knawlege discriuit e auld cosmographouris figure situation erd thairfore na man suld haue admiration howbeit recent houri discriue ye warld sum vthir figure sort he bene discriuit afore pompoui mela ptholome othir auld cosmographouris erd mair frequent pepyl tha thay dayis passage al cuntreis mair knawin throw quhilk situation regionis exact scharp deligence authouris mair patent artoure gif thir auld cosmographouris war bot men ar followis na admiration howbeit thay na sicker cognosance ful erudition al thingis yat caus thay mycht wryt forthir thay saw thair win inquisition elli experience vtheris authour past afore yame thir reasonis think lytyl wrang sum tymes nocht follow al thair opinionis thay knawlege experience materis thairfore dar mair baldly wryt su thing ye comon proffet specially cocernyng ye fygure situation scotland maneris pepyll thairof su vthir sort he bene schawin afore vthir authouris haue onely sene samyn bot he knawlege thairof lang experience vse throw quhilk yi quhat sumeuir werk sal vnprofitabyl yit vnplesand ye reders sawe schawin maneris conditioun pepill scotland situation thairof attoure mak ye reders bowsum attent pro mit faithfullie writ na thing werk bot allanerlie sik thing bene maist patent knawin w othir awin exact deligence industrye elli rehers otheris rycht trew faithful auctouris thairfore gyf werk found plesand reders sall writ sum othir tym mair largelie othir materis batth thair eruditioun pleseir discriptioun albion quhy vves callit vvith name beginning britonis scottis ca ii hail ile albion quhilk contenis baith realmes ingland scotland discriuit ye latyne greik cosmographouris enueronyd euery syde gret occeane hauand eist syde almane seis south syde franche britane seis west syde ireland seis north syde norroway seis yi ile extendit lang passage fra southsoutheist northnorwest mair extendit lenth breid nocht far differet fra figure ane triangle ile auld cosmographouris wes callit albion remanis yit vndir samyn name sum auctouris sayis ile wes callit albion ab albis montibus say fra quhit montanis thairof full calk utheris allegis wes callit albion fra ane lady namit al yne quhilk history nocht vnlik fabulis ar writin l vouchteris danau kyng argiues yi albyne allegit wt hir l sisteris eftir thay slane al thair husbandis pullit vp salis come grece throw seis hercules spanye fra spanye come throw ye franche almane seis ony impediment ye said ile eftir hir arriuing samyn namyt albion fra hir name yi albyne hir l systeris eftir thair cumyng said ile conuersit deuillis forme men consauit childrin naturall comixtion thir childrin increscit sa huge stature pissance thay wer callit ye peple giandis inhabit said regioun continewallie tyme brutus first beginner britonis brutus wes nepot elli pronepot gret troiane eneas becaus wes exilit banist slauchter othir gret offencis done hym italie wes constranit depart ye residew troianis fallois erche sum new dwellyng eftir lang trauell tempesti storme seis arriuit albion fra beginnyng warld iiiimxxvii yeris brutus fallowis eftir thair cumyng albioun inuadit giandis afore rehersit sindry chancis battall finalie brocht thaym sa hie rewyne baith yair landis guddis fell pray brutus fallowis sa ye cuntre wes callit britane ye pepill britonis bot beginnyng scottis wes ane vthir maner writtin anciant historiographouris gathelus ane rycht illuster vailyeant knycht discending lang progressioun lynage ye blud riall grece marijt scota douchter kyng pharo egipt youcht mony riche landis fell hym gret honouris singulare manheid ye realme egipt yit wes astonist mony terrible greuus plagis appering prophecy moyses plane euersioun realme peple egipt thoucht na thing sa gud proffitable maist remote distat thairfra gathelus mouit thir causis come furth ye mouth nyle wyfe freindis seruandis grekis egiptianis throw seis mediterrane finalie brokin lang incredible danger vncouth chancis arriuit north part spanye conques beneuolence wyfe namit pepill scottis eftir hir name yair vulgar laugage wes callit gathelik gathelus eftir h cumyng spanye send ane band weirmen ireland quhilkis singulare manheid prudence dantit pepill thairof thay gat hail empire said ile ang mony yeris eftir gret honoure glore army phovv scottis pich come albioun thair syndry lynnage maneris hovv said ile vvas inhabit thre syndry pepyll ca iii nothesay ane kyngis sonnis ireland come schort yeris eftir ane cumpany young hardy pepill ilis albion becaus fand samyn waist nocht inhabit yan ony empire britonis sat doun remanent fallowis wiffis barnis ye said ilis namit thaym hebredes fra name hibernia elli fra name hiber first son gathelus yi rothesay come sone eft freindis said ilis albion sa mekil gat possessioun callit scotland day scottis come first albion wes fra beginning warld iiiimvicxvii yeris mony yeris eft thair cummyng albion thay wer callit realbi say kyngis albioun mak thaym sum thing different fra remanent kyngis inhabit ye said land eftir afore thair cumyng forthir youcht scottis thair singulare manheid prudence rang continewallie ony interruption baith spanye ireland yit thair name perist yai partis othir yair co mixtion vncouth blud elli roust lang proces yeris throw quhilk remanis na scottis memory bot thay inhabitis last boundis albion attoure spanyeartis dwellis yit ye montanis vthir desertis spanye knawis na thyng romane weris ar lityll different fra ireland men baith thair maneris habit langage ye britonis becaus thay wer mony yeris afore w albioun occupyis ye south maist plentuus boundis thairof inhabit north partis full montanis quhilk ar nocht sa fertill comodius said landis occupiit britonis eftir cumyng scottis britonis maner albioun ane vncouth peple namit pychtis vthirwayis namit agathirsanis quhilkis wer banist sarmathia come denmark quhair thay sone eftir gat schippis prouisioun efferyng thairto eftir thair finall arriuyng albioun thay sat doun waist myddil boundis betuix britonis scottis maid wyd marchis betuix baith thair realmes cumyng pychtis albioun wes eftir cumyng scottis samyn iicl yeris yit amang sum authouris rysis ane fuliche dout quhidd scottis pychtis come first regioun sum thir authouris al legis rewther wes first beginnar scottis albioun bot opinioun far different fra treuth historie fyue scottis kingis rang continewallie ilk ane succeding vthis afore rewther apperis leirke historie following sa ile albioun wes inhabit fra beginning thairof thre sindry pepill say britonis scottis pichtis first part ile becaus wes inhabit brutus posterite wes namit britane secound myd part becaus wes inhabit pichtis wes namit penthland remanent boudis thairof wer inhabit scottis namyt scotland yit romane historicianis ptolome quhe yai treit ony thing cocernyng ile albioun callit ye hail ile britane peple thairof britonis thir thre peple namit vnder ane name albianis inhabit ye said ile yit romani partis quhare thay come within ile namit peple thairof sindry name thay namit men walis tegenianis fra tegenia ye men angus horrestianis fra horrestia ye men cauder callender wod calidonianis fra calidonia ye men galloway brigandis fra brigantia apperis cornelius tacitus quhilk writis beyound ye britonis dwellis allbion ye gret north two peple richt different fra vther maneris nature yat ane yair yallo hair callit pichtis discendyng albianis vthir thair blak curland hair callit scottis na thyng different fra spanycartis nature conditionis yi ile dayis inhabit allanerlie two peple inglismen scottis ye south partis ar inhabit inglismen north part scottis haue schawin causis quhy britonis wer callit name maner thair cummyng albioun sall schaw end cosmographie quhat peple realme britane he bene inhabit continewallie vnto tyme kyng hary ye viii regnand gret felicite aboue inglismen pthe boundis albioun vvith sindry comoditeis thairof generall gret infirmiteis fallis peple thairof thair intemperance ye religion vsit thaym auld tymes ca iiii ile albioun contenis hail circumference compas circular two thowsand mylis hauand lenth viic mylis breid iiicl mylis apperis weill fu thairof fornence franche seis fra fute thairof procedis ay small quhill come ye vter marchis last boundis baith ingland scotland betuix mule galloway fornence ireland seis sanct ebbis heid fornence almane seis ar skars ane hundreth lx mylis breid frathens gaderis ay mair small quhill cumyn last boundis thairof quhare he skarslie xxx mylis breid ane rycht profitable ile full peple nocht onlie rycht plentuus store bestiall ot kynd cornys euery boundis thairof saiffing allanerlie thay boundis quhair god singulare gudnes he ordanit maist ryche mynis gold siluer tynne bra copper quik siluir sic fouth aboundance metallis samyn ar nocht onlie sufficient maner necessaris peple said ile bot ar sufficient vthir oure nychtbouris dwellis w gyf peple perfite craft industrye wyn samyn bot superflew aboundance vthir thyngis necessar vse man quhilk nature he producit oure regioun makis peple le industrius crafty delyi ng ay mair sleuth ony exercitioun besyde gret fouth gers cornis bestiall landis besyde gret aboundance fowlis air sa gret plente fische partis feis specially towart north ye samyn sufficiet yneuch nuris peple howbeit thair wer na frutis growand oure land apperis experience landis yat lyis w france flanderis zeland holland mekill almany cumys sindry flotis sekand fische yeirlie seis nocht allanerlie thair prudent industry wynnis fische sufficient sustene thaym self bot generall marchandyce yir fische thay sustene peple vthir cuntreis passand tyme lentroun throw ye seis mediterrane ay selland thair fische yair gret proffet winning mony vthir riche precius thingis ar gottin ye said ile haldin gret delit ye eist peple warld quhat may said wol quhilk sa quhit small samyn desyrit peple cof gret price speciallie marchandis quhair best knawn woll maid fyne skarlettis mony vthir granit deligat clathis heirfore dar baldlie affirme gif albianis sic grace yai mycht leif concord amang thaym self gif thair realmes ony honest way mycht cum vnder empire senyorie ane kyng thay mycht nocht allanerlie haif necessaris within thaym self vncoft bot small difficultie mycht dant nychtbouris cuntreis lyand thaym quhen ony externe h outh weris hapnit inuaid thaym thay haue sa elegant stature sa fair lusty bodyis na vthir peple may preferrit thaym thay ar rycht ingenius abill al weil letteris vthir virtewis corporall exercitioun handis rycht hardy reddy ieoperdyis baith weir peace sic maner na thyng may difficill thaym thay leiffit temperatlie thairfore prouident beginnar ye warld he nocht gret resoun maid thair region nakit bair wynis knawing eterne wisdome wynis howbeit samyn ar rycht necessar vthir peple ar rycht skaithfull nature albianis thay ar geuin sic vnnaturall voracite desire vncouth metis drinkis thay nocht refrene thaym self fra immoderat excesse apperis weill experience throw thair crapulus schamfull glutone thay ar strikin oftymes sa dangerus irremediable infirmiteis howbeit thow wer accumpanyt thaym thair tender age thow sall fynd thaym throw thair intemperance surfet di sa fowsumlie growin thair myd latter age thay sall appeir al vncouth thy sycht thow neuir knawin thaym yair tender age quhairthrow thay sal appeir erar misfassonyt monstouris ony naturall peple sindry thaym throw surfet diet growis furius thair latter age mony sorowfull maledeis following thaym ye prouerbe sayis sendyll ar men gret glutonie sene haue lang dayis agit proces yeris becaus thair excessiue intemperat diet consumys al substanciall humouris thair bodyis bot wil return purpos albianis writis cesar comentaris cornelius tacitus wer rycht religious eftir ryte wes thay dayis thay dayis wer ye preistis britane namyt driades rycht expert baith naturall morall philosophie thair doctrine come first sculis thair sect opinion france principall ct thir preisti wes ile man quhilk w tyme spectacle fontane honest uditioun letteris fra thir preistis ani profest catholik faith thay presen gret constance ony spot discriptioun est vvest myddyll bordouris scotland vvith maist notable tovvnis fludi thairof ca v pichtis sum tyme principall maist plenteus boundis al landis ar vnder empire scottis eftir thay rougin samyn imicli yeris vnder ane blude amyte freindschip scottis concurrand thaym equalie euery danger ieoperde battall aganis romani britonis su tymes fechtand aganis scottis thair awin confiderat freindis vnprudence young suspect personis quhil last outragius exorb tant haytrent rais sic slauchter murdir sidis thay werbrocht vter rewyne doung albion wer scottis yocht scottis he bene oftymes brokin maist terrible dangerus wer mony scharp ennymes yit diuyne beneuolence thay fluris hail vnto thir dayis he dantit al yair ennymes thir comodites quhilkis ar schawin generalie albion ar patent mony vthir singulare prerogatiuis speciallie amang scottis hieland peple thairof he na repair marchandis vncouth realmes becaus thay ar nocht corruppit myngit vncouth blude thay ar ye strang rude may suffir mair hungir walking distres ony vthir peple albion maist hardy ieoperdyis rycht agill deliuer bodyis rycht ingenius euery new inuentioun maist sychty rea cheualrie kepi thair faith promes maist seuerite constance scotland he mers quhilk wes sum tyme maist plenteus regioun pichtis thair march fornence almane seis regioun sa lang wes inhabit picht wes nami deere eftir expulsioun pychtis wes namit mers say marchis scottis eftir expulsioun pichtis eki thair marchis tweid quhilk deuides northumbirland fra ye mers tothir syde sindry small burnis discendis fra hillis cheuiot vthir moutanis lyand thair deuiding cumbir fra annar ail fallis watter sulway yi watter sulway rynnis ye ireland seis marche scotland fornence west hillis cheuiot quhilk springis mony small burnis ilk side marche scotland mers he sindry marchis sindry partis qu h extendir sum tyme he alm u seis sum tyme eist sum tyme tweid sum tyme fo th ye marchis amang mony strang castellis mers town ber sumtyme nami dolutium inhabitantis thairof namit ordolm first spryng fra ane small fontane agmentation vthir fallis discendis wich braid str ne seis tweid ye marche vnder cheui lyis say val yound lyis esdail ail e fo e opunis throw forn n e ail yet thir side fallis watter fallis tweid ye tothir side fornence ye ireland annandail fra ye watter annand marchis sum tymes ou undis idisda quhair yir thre riuers forsaid eu annand sulway discendis togidder vnder ane streme ireland seis annandail ane loch namit lochmaben fyue mylis lenth foure breid full vncouth fische besyde loch ane castell vnder name maid dan eu sion theuis nocht lanerlie annandail bot day afore thersit ar mony strang wekit theuis inuading cunt perpetuall thife eif sto chte quhen thay se ony trublus tyme thir becaus thay haue inglismen thair perpetuall ennymes ly dry marche apon tha bordour ingland continewal weris elli ith quiet th pure miserabill lyfe tyme pe e thay ar accustomi thay nocht desist bot inuadis howbeit thay ar ay miserabilye put doun ithand heirschippis mony riche plentuus boundis scotland lyis waist feir thair inuasion nocht far fra sulway ar mony nkand sandis sa perilus na peple may transport thaym self throw samyn gret difficulte danger thair lyuis yi annand wes sum tyme namit ordouitia ye pepill namit ordouices quhais ou lceis wes sa gret thay abhorrit nocht eit flesche lden prisoneris wyuis v slay thair husbandis quhen yai wer found cowart discomfist thair ennymes gif occasioun otheris bald hard quhen danger occurrit quhill last thay wer alie distroyit weris romani west borduris gret north lyis nidisdail namit fra water nith begynnis ane narow ane strait al incressis mair braid quhair lyis middil marchis scotland n disdail toun dunfreis quhair mony small deligat quh maid haldin gret daynte marchandis vndouth realmes discription gallovvay kyle christ cunyng vvith notabyll tovvnis l chie samyn ca vi aboue nidisdaill galloway namit sum tyme brigantis peple thairof namit brigandis region watter two partis part nidisdaill nethir galloway tothir yi aboue allit ui e galloway n thir galloway kirk ane riche k n full marchandi e aer galloway abbay quhittern haly bischop gret veneratioun peple abo e quhi ern migto nocht far fra loch half l h fres congelariou lochis tothir half galloway two vthir l chi sal e lothmyrtoun galloway ynni passage ireland th allit sett makis two gret lochis namit ye pepil loch reane lowis su thir lochis ar xxx sum sextene mylis lenth thay ar baith ful ostreis ing congirellis mussillis coklis mony vthir fische sum men haldis brigance wes samyn regioun ingland callit walis quhai britonis leiffi mony eris eftir thay wer doug britane bot opinion bane ye romane auctouris sayis yle man lyis fornence brigance myd passage betuix ireland yit apperis experience howbeit brayis alluuioun flux seis ar worne mair distan fra vthir thay wer afore yit samyn latitude eleuatioun pole ptolome assignis brigance correspondis weil eleuatioun pole aboue galloway quhilk distant seuerit lang iurnay fra walis ye ile man lyis thre hundreth mylis fra walis ye sycht galloway oure estimoniall sindry auctouris say brigance ye toun spanye quhilk namit compostella come ane new cumpany peple ireland wer namit spanyeartis ireland come ane gret cumpany pepill king fergus albioun remembrance ciete brigance quhilk wes sum tyme thaym inhabit spanye ya war callit brigandis opinioun applaudis cornelius tacitus saying brigandis wer discendi spanyeartis dwellis remot last boundi britane callis britane hail ile albioun thir regionis afore rehersit say annandail nidisdail galloway nocht allanerlie aboundis fyne woll store bestiall bot ar rycht proffitable maner cornis except quhie aboue galloway carrik e part silu ie silurie deuidit thre partis say carrik kyle cunnynghame carrik wes su tyme ane riche ete vnder name quhais ruynus wallis schawis gret magnificence thairof cuntre mony strang castellis rycht strenthy baith nature craft men region ar mony fair ky oxin quhilk ye flesche rycht delicius render talloun thair wambis sa sappy fresis neuir bot flowis ay nature self maner onlie beyound carrik kyle namit fra coyll kyng britonis quhilk wes slane said regioun kyle ane ane nocht xi mylis fra toun c xx fu hycht th e llis breid callit ye peple deif ane quhen ne man fut may nothir heir quhat said done tothir syde howbeit ane nochtheles ay ye dreich fra h ter kyle cunnynghame pa silurie quhais peple wer st noysum rom kyle ane loch n mit doune fra quhilk dif endis watter vnder ireland seis cunnynghame loch vnlike loch doun full fis quhare sum tyme aucht kyng alexander ye thrid gre victorie aganis ani discription watter clide deuidis len x north side fra barony renfrew risis ye samyn montane within ye wod cal one fra quhilk risis annad discendis wt lag passage ye irelad seis far fra ye fotanis clide spring fotan forth quhilk dis e wt aple braid almane seis ye tothir syde ye watter clyd eftir ya he roun lang wart north crukis ay inw rt quhill come montanis granyebane syne discendis lang passage south quhill fall ireland set ye cuntre quhair rynnis callit clidisdail betuix clid lennox lyis baronie renfrew quhilk ar twa lochis namye quhyn south leboth sum xx sum xii mylis lenth rycht plentuus full fische aboue renfrew occeane seis lyis lennox nami ptolome lelgonia quhilk ane gret loch namit lochmond xxiiii mylis lenth viii mylis breid within loch ar xxx ilis weil biggi kirkis templis housis yi loch ar thre notable thingis fisch swomand ony fyn ane rycht dagerus storme wal ony wynd ane ile fletis heir thair wynd seruis pthis loch standis fute montanis granyebene quhilkis wes sum tyme gr marchis betuix scottis pychtis gangis fra lochlowmond mouth dee ye pichtis n landis beyound montanis granyebene yit lyand ireland seis thir boudis wer ay inhabit scottis viii mylis fra lochlowmond ye castell dunbri ane namit sum tyme quhair watter leuin fallis clyde beyound lochlowmod argyle ane cutre ful rochis craggis montanis ar twa lochis lochtyne lochquho ye land deuidi thre patres ye land yat lyis myddis thairof callie knapdail lochfyne mair plente heryng yan ony seis albion lochquho ar mony fische sik leiffis esch watter argyle ar twa castellis glennunquhart en one l ar xii ilis bot thay ar mair proffitable store b stial yan ony cor argyle ar mony riche mynis full metall bot ye pepill thairof he craft industry wyn samyn sa cuntre ane stane sic nature yat kendlis cauld stra hardis fyre quhen inuoluit thairwith argyle ar vii vthir lochis sum xxx ylis nth ane breid le wes said schir duncane campbell w arlo loch argyle ye yeir god imvcx yetus come ane terrible beist al ane grew hound furit lik ane ganar straik doun gret theis dyn hir tail slew thre men quil wer thair houn hir tail wer ye remanent thay ha bene slane samyn maner eftir slanch thir eidlie loch sindry prudent beleuit gret land appering yi eist scho wes sene foll wing thairefter marche argyle ly lorn quhilk part thairof lyis maner ane oung lang hals ix mylis lenth breid yi toung within ye seis wes sum tyme namit nouantia bot callit kyntyre say heid lorn ye outm st part yi toung su auctouris sayis baith argyle mak n mention argyle cosmograp ie growis heir wt gret plente beyound lorne lochquhabir quhilk wes sum tyme ane part murrayland full mynis sic irne leid rycht proffitabill store bestiall ar mony woddis lochis riuers full salmond vthir fische swomand sa plenteuslie samin tane ony craft principall riuers lochquhabir ar lochtie spanye howbeit cause thairof vncertane lochtie risis nocht viii mylis fra lochnes fallis vnder ye name almane seis besyde ane roche crag dippand ane lang hals ye seis namit hardnomorth ye mouth lochtie wes ane riche toun namyt inuerlochtie quhair su tyme wes gret change repair vncouth marchandis quhill last wes sa vterlie distroyit weris danis come neuir ye honour magnificence afore quhiddir samyn procedis sleuth pepill inuy lymmers quhilkis may suffir na wallit tounis cuntre vncertane beyound lochtie castell dunstafage sum tyme namit euonium beyound dunstafage mouth watter spanye quhair fallis almane seis pthe discription ro stranauern murray land vvith louchis fludis notable tovvnis thairof ca viii beyound ye watter spanye lyis ro sum tyme namit lugia rising ane strait narow hals yair eftir cassin furth mair braid lesuris vali montanis circulit baith ta syde tothir occeane yi cuntre quhair lyis maist approchand ireland seis he rycht difficill passage ganis mair store bestiall yan ony habitatioun man best manurit fornence almane seis rycht plentuus baith gers corn thir hailsum vali quhare riuers discendis makis herbis rycht delicius nurisand ro ar sindry lochis bot lochbroun maist mony riuers ar ro full fische ro cromarte ane firth sicker port shippis saif yame fra danger tempest namyt peple heil schipmen ro ye toun thane quhair blissit banis sanct dutho restis gret veneratioun peple ane vale ro twa housis round forme ane bell ar saiffit dayis memory sum antiquiteis eldaris merchand ro lyis stranauern outmaist boundis scotland quhilk se cost lyis northnorthwest crukis agane sum tyme fornens almane seis hauand fornens gret north cathnes ye gret eist sutherland gret south ro gret west northnorwest seis thre gret craggis lyis outmaist syde stranauern namit hoy howbroun downis ie becaus thir thre rochis schutis far ye see thay mak twa gret firthis lochis seuerit fra vthir merchand cathnes lyis sutherland ane proffitable cuntre baith store cornis yond syde lyis murray sum tyme namyt uararis bot he nocht samyn marchis boundis betuix spay ne ireland seis wer namyt murray bot lyis sum tyme beyound watter spay kissok quhil cum ireland seis betuix ro murray land crukis ane gret discens vale quhilk fallis fyue riuers ne nardyn findorn los spay spay rynnis sa feirs violent strem see tyde quhen cumys maist swiftlie may nocht resist violent discens streme watter bot preis streme thairof born doun per force chefeis nesrysis fra ane loch vnder name nocht viii mylis fra samyn loch lochtie cumys fra rynnis ireland seis nothir fresis water lochtie yit loch cumys fra ony storme wynter greter admiratioun ony frosyn thyng cassyn meltis resoluis hastelie yairfore rycht proffitable al frosin beistis ye mouth ne standis toun innernes quhare sum tyme wes gret plente tak heriyng howbeit thay euanist offence maid aganis sum sanct treuth quhen ony auaricius vnhappy men fechtis fische god sendis infinit gudnes sustentatioun peple diffoulis see thair blude mony yeris eftir na fische swomis place besyde lochnes quhilk xxiiii mylis lenth xii breid ar mony wyld hors amang yame ar mony martrikis beuers quhitredis toddis furringis skynnis thaym ar coft gret priee amang vncouth marchandis murray nocht allanerlie gret aboundance fouth quheit beir aytis siclik cornis gret plente nutis appillis bot ie ar gret fouth fische speciallye salmond cuntre ane vncouth maner fisching peple makis ane lang mand narow halsit wyid mouthit mony stobis inouth maid sik craft fische thrawis yame self nocht get furth agane al sone e see ebbis fische ar ane dry crelis murray ane loch namit spy ee quhair gret plente swannis cause quhy swannis multiplyis sa fast loch throw ane herbe namyt olour quhilk burionis gret fertilite said loch seid rycht nurisand delicius swannis herbe sa brudy quhair ani sawin plantit neuir distroyit may prouin experience youcht loch v mylis lang wes sum tyme ye memorie man yit beris full salmond vthir gret fische yit fra herbe began burgeon watter growin sa schauld ane man may waid throw maist partis thairof thairfore maner gret fische quit euanist murray land kick pette quhare ba lytill iohne remanis gret admiratioun pepill he bene fourtene fut hycht square membris effering thairto vi yeris afore cumyng werk lycht saw hanche bane al mekill haill bane ane man schot arme mouth thairof quhilk apperis strang square pepill grew regioun afore thay wer effeminat lust intemperance mouth murray ye toun elgyn nocht far fra ye mouth spay quhilk nobill cathedrall kirk murray decorit richelie college channonis sindry riche abbayis ar murray killos ordoure cestuus pluscardie ordoure clunacensis pthe discriptioun boene anye buchquhane mar mernis fifte angus vvith lochis fiudis abbayis tounis vthir notable thingis thairof ca ix marcheand murray lyis boene anye twa plentu regionis store bestiall liand ample roume bou dis seis thir regionis ar full scheip nolt sindry lesuris woddis samyn throw myddis thairof rynnis watter douern ye mouth watter standis toun bamf thir two regionis afore namit lyis buchquhane ane proffitable land scheip passis cuntreis lyand rich quhit deligat woll mony watteris ar buchquhane full salmond except rattra quhilkis ar nane buchquhane castell slanis constablis hous scotland beside quhilk ane meruellus coue watter droppis growis within schort tyme maner ane hard quhit stane wer nocht coue oft temyt wald fillit sone stanis na rattonis ar sene cuntre al sone thay ar brocht thair thay de buchquhane growis aytis ony tylth seid quhen peple passis set purpos scheir yir aytis thay fynd nocht tume hullis yit quhen ya pa ony premiditatioun thay fynd thir aytis ful weil ripit thir thing cumys nocht nature erar illusioun deuillis dissait blind supersticius pepill buchquhane lyis mar ane plentuus region store bestiall lx mylis lenth breid fra almane seis badyenoch ciete abirdene bischoppis seit generall vniuersite flurising science wes foundit nobill bischop william elphinstoun ane riche magnificent college ciete lyis betuix tworiche riuers done dee quhilkis ar mair fouth salmond yan ony part albioun marchand mar lyis mernis see ane riche cuntre store bestiall dunnothir ye marschel scotlandis hous mernis toun fordoun quhare blissit banis sact paladie restis gret veneratioun peple marchis mernis rynnis ye watter esk vthirwayis namit northesk ane dangerus watter quhare mony passingeris perisis falt ane brig bordorand ye mernis lyis angus quhilk wes sum tyme ane part horrestia deuidit thre riuers northesk southesk tay angus ane hie montane dippand ye almane seis callit reid brayis tay risis far beyond montanis granyebene fra loch tay quhilk xxiiii mylis lenth x mylis breid discendis gret plente fische quhill cum almane seis besyde dunde ye toun quhair wer born quhair mony virtew lauborius pepill ar makyng claith angus ar mony vthir gud townis montroys brechin forfair sa gret noumer castellis wer ouir tedius laubour writ thaym angus ar mony lochis full fische ar mony abbayis resteneth channons regulare eftir ordour augustyne aberbrothak coupar first ordour turonen nixt ordour cistuus vale esk sa quhit small wol he na compair albioun besyde tay fiffe sum tyme ane part octolyne growis maner cornis al gret plente doi ony part albioun quhare na cornis ar rycht proffitable store bestial fiffe ar blak stanis quhilk he sa tollerable heit quhen yai ar kendillit yai resolue melt irne ar yairfore rycht proffitable operation smythis yi kynd blak stanis ar na part albion bot allanerlie betuix tay tyne fiffe maid gret plente quhit salt fiffe ar mony noble townis sanct androis archebischopis seit scotland kirkcawde disart kyngorne cowpar dunfermeling quhare ane riche abbay decorit generall sepulturis kingis mony vthir abbayis ar fiffe edicat ye blissit virgyne cul o bawmerinoch petmoyg pettinwenie fyffe ar sindry lochis loch torre lochleuin lochleuin ane castell mony ilis ane thaym kirk sanct phillane fiffe deuidit fra louthiane reueir forth quhilk rynnis ane braid firth almane seis firth rycht plentuus coclis osteris muschellis selch pellok merswyne quhalis gret plente quhit fische amang mony vthir ilis firth ile may decorit ye blude martirdome sanct adriane fallowis myddis ile springis ane fontane fresche purifyit watter outhrow ane roche crag gret admiratioun peple considerin lyis ye myddis seis beside ile ane wounderful crag risand within see sa narro strait hals na schip bait may arriue bot allanerlie ane part crag callit ba vnwynnabill ingyne man ar coue al proffitable defence men yai wer biggit crafty industri euery thig yt ye crag ful admiration w ar incredible noumer soland geis nocht vnlik thir fow hat plineus callis see ernis ar sene na part albion bot crag ailsay thair first cumin quhilk ye spring yeir yai gadder sa gret noumer treis stikkis big thair nestis ye samyn mycht sufficient fewell ye keparis ye castell howbeit yai na vthir prouision yocht ye keparis tak fra yir fowlis yir stikkis treis yit yai tak litil indingnation thairof bot bringis haistelie agane al mony fra vthir placis quhair thay fle thay nuris thair birdis maist deligat fische yocht yai haue ane fische yair mouth aboue ye seis quhair yai fle yit gif yai se ane vthir bett thay lat ye first fal doukis ane fellon stoure ye see bringis haistelie vp fische yat thay last saw youcht fische reft f hir ye keparis ye castell scho takkis lytill indingnation bot fleis incontinent ane vthir thir keparis ye castell forsaid takis ye young geis fra thaym lytill impediment thus cumys gret proffet yeirlie ye lord ye said castell within bowellis yir geis ane fatnes singulare medicyne helis mony infirmyteis speciallie sik cumys gut cater discedyng hanches lethe men wemen crag growis ane rycht delicius herbe quhen transportit plantit ony othir part lytill sapor gust crag wes sum tyme ane stane full ene holis like ane watter spounge holkit myddis sik nature salt watter waschin thairwith becumis incontinent fresche delicius mouth heir st ne fast castell ane ile forth ye abbay sact colme chanons regulare eftir ordour sanct augustyne mony othir ilis ar firth full cunnyngis oftymes ar sene firth vncouth wounderfull fische coulis hingyng ouir thair hedis like monkis signifyis ay mortalite men beistis quhare yai ar sene discriptioun louthian striuel ng menteith calidon vvod bovvgevvall gareoth vvith notable teis castellis fludis thair ca x south side forth lyis louthiane callit tha name fra lothane principall kingis pichtis louthiane maist plentuus ground scotland ar mony abbayis castellis tounis hadingtoun dunbar northberwik leith bot edinburgh passis thaym baith polese reparation wisdome rich aboue ye castell vnder ye name su tyme callit ye madin castell yit remanis vnder ye sam name nocht two mylis fra edinburgh ane fontane dedicat sanct katrine quhair sternis oulie springis handlie sic aboundance howbeit samyn gaderit away springis incontinent gret aboundance fountane rais throw ane drop sanct katrynis onlie quhilk wes brocht mont synay fra hir sepulture sanct margaret blissit quene scotland al sone sanct margaret saw onlie spring ithandlie diuine miracle said place scho gart big ane chapell thair honour sanct katherine onlie he ane singulare vittew aganis maner cankir skawis nocht far fra mouth forth castel dunbar quhilk nature crafty industre man strenthiest hous day albion dunbar wes su tyme ye cheif chemis ye erlis marche nocht far fra ane toun vnder name ane magnificent riche college channons foundit honorabily dotat said erlis eist syde louthiane lyis mers cuntre quhilk w first diser uit ye mers lyis teuidail aboue lyis twedail twedail lyis dryisdaill waulco dail douglasdail clidisdaill thir dali beris name reuer discendis throw thaym principall toun clidisdail glasqw archebischoppis seit quhare ane nobill kirk dotat richelie honour sanct mungow biggit gret magnificence glasqw ane generall vniuersite study liberall science clidisdail ane riche myne gold asure ony laubour su tymes ar sindry precious stanis variant hewis goldin myn wes found ye yme kyng iames fei quhilk sa mony singulare virtewis decorit realme infinite rich myne gy god fortunit hym haue dayis sleuth necligence vncrafty peple myne doi small proffet fra glasqw north lyis menteith striuelingschire marcheand argyle lennox striuelingschire ye toun striueling aboue standis ye castel vnder ye samyn name sum tyme namit dolorus montane toun began ye gret wod calidon wod calidon ran fra striueling throw menteith stratherne atholl lochquhabir ptolome writtis first table wod wes sum tyme quhit bullis crisp cursand mane like feirs lionis youcht thay semit meik tame remanen figure thair bodyis yai wer mair wyld ony vthir beistis sic hatrent aganis societe cupany men yt yai come neuir ye woddis lesuris quhair thay fand ony feit haynd thairof mony dayis eftir thay eit nocht herbis yt wer twichit handillit thir bullis wer sa wyld yt yai wer neuir tane slycht crafty laubour sa impacient yat eftir thair taking thay deit importable doloure al sone ony man inuadit thir bullis thay ruschit terrible preis hym thay dang hym eird akand feir houndis scharp laneis vthir maist penitriue wappinnis said king robert bruce eftir coronatioun went ane hunting wod hauand bot ane quiet cupanye hym eschapit narowlie lyef ane bullis eftir wes sair woundit huntaris ruschit feirslie kyng howbeit na wapinnis hand debait hym self fra dynt thairof incontinent ane man gret spreit quhilk wes standing neir lap afore kyng nocht allanerlie kest bull manifest force erd bot held hym quhill remanent huntaris slew hym thair wappinnis man rescoursit kyng wes callit turnbull wes rewardit riche landis kyng youcht thir bullis wer bred sindry boundis callidon wod continewal hunting lust insolent men thay ar distroyit partis scotland nane thaym left bot allanerlie cumarnald eist syde menteith lyis strathern marchis samyn syde fiffe throw vali regioun rynnis watter ern fallis tay nocht four mylis fra ye place quhare ern fallis tay ane stane small quantite howbeit meruellus nature thair nothir preis ingyne man nay transport place quhair lyis attoure ane man ane hundreth mouis elik tothir syde tay beyound angus gowrie lyis stermond ane plentuus regioun baith gers cornis nocht far fra stermond lyis athole quhilkis ar mony lusty vali fludis ful fische ground sa riche beris cornis ony lauboure ane toun namit lud quhilk land sa plentuus gif weil manurit beris gud beir ony seid athole ar vthir landis mair contrarius nature quheit sawin degeneris turnis ry buchquhane boene west lyis bostgewell gareoth rycht plentuus regionis baith gres cornis gareoth ane hyll namit doundore say goldin montane scheip gangis yi montane ar yallo thair teith ar hewit like gold thair flesche reid wer littit safron thair woll maner regioun ane carnell stanis liand togiddir maner ane croun ryngis quhen thay ar doung ane bell ane temple wes biggit sum men beleuis said place quhare mony auld itis superstitionis wer maid euill spretis mony vthir regionis ar scotlad bradalbane strabraun badyenoth sindry vthir small landis fludis howebeit thay ar nocht sa notable thir landis haue schawin pof gret plente haris hartis vthir vvild bestiall scotland meruellus nature syndr scotti doggis nature salmond ca xi becaus haue discriuit regionis scotland speciall schaw sum thing concernyng thaym general first say boundis scotland except yai partis quhair continewall habitatioun peple makis impediment yairto gret plente haris hartis hind dayis rais wolffis wyld hors roddis yir wild hors ar tane crafty slycht tyme wynter landwart peple puttis certane tame cursouris merl amang thir wild hors thair comixtioun frequent cumpanye makis thaym tame thay may handilli uolffis ar rycht noysum tame bestiall partis scotland except ane part thairof namit glenmores quhilk ye tame bestiall gettis litill damage wyld bestiall specialie toddis tik hous cuntre nurisis ane young tod certane dayis mengis flesche yairof eftir yt slane sic meit thay gif yair fowlis vthir smal beistis sa mony etis meit ar preseruit twa monethis eftir fra ony damage toddis toddis wyll eit na flesche gustis thair awin kynd thair bot ane beist fowll he nocht gustit meit tod wyll heis amang ane thousand scotland ar doggis meruellus nature aboue comoun nature conditioun doggis quhilkis ar sene partis ar thre maner doggis scotland quhilk ar sene na vthir partis warld first ane hound baith wycht hardy swift thir houndis ar nocht allan lie feirs cruell wyld beistis bot theuis ennymes thair maister maner secound kynd ane rache sekis thair pray baith fowlis beistis fische sent smell thair neis thrid kynd mair ony rache reid hewit elli blak small spraingis spottis ar callit peple sleuthoundis thir doggis he sa meruellus wit yai serche theuis followis thaym allanerlie sent guddis ar tane away nocht allanerlie fyndis theif bot inuadis hym gret cruelte youcht theuis oftymes cors watter quhair thay pa caus ye hound tyne sent thaym guddis yit serchis heir thair sic deligence fut fyndis baith trace theif guddis meruellus nature yir houndis wil haue na faith vncouth peple howbeit samyn ar rycht frequent ryfe bordouris ingland scotland attour statute lawis bordouris denyis entres sleuthound tyme chace serching guddis salbe haldin participant cryme thift comittit fowlis sic leiffis reif ar sindry kyndis scotland ernis falconis goyshalkis spa halkis marlyonis sik like fowlis watter fowlis sa gret noumer yat wonder heir mony vthir fowlis ar scotland quhilkis ar sene na vthir partis warld capercailye ane foul mair ane rauin quhilk leiffis allanerlie barkis treis scotland ar mony mure rokis hennis quhilk etis nocht bot seid r ppis hadder sic like ar gret noumer blak cokis hennis nocht vnlike ane fa ane baith quantite sapoure yair flesche bot thay haue blak fedderis reid e breis beside thir thre vncouth kynd fowlis ane vthir kynd fowlis mers mair vncouth namit gustardis al le ane swan bot colour thair fedderis gust thair flesche thay ar litil different fra ane pertrik thir last fowlis ar frequent bot noumer sa far hayti cumpany man gif thay fynd thair eggis ayndit twichit men thay leif thaym layis egg ane othir place thay lay yair eggis bair erd othir kynd fowlis ar scotland maner yai ar ony othir realmes fische mair plente scotland speciallie salmond tha ony vthir partis ye warld becaus procreation nature salmond vncouth strange haue inserit maner thairof buke thir salmond tyme heruist eumis vp throw smal watteris speciallie quhare ye watter maist schauld loun spawnis thair wamis plet vthir ye hie fische spawnis meltis ye scho fische ir rounis incontinent coueris thaym ouir sand reueir ftir thair spawning thay grow sa lene small na thing apperis thaym bot skyn bane he sa warsche gust thay ar vnproffitable eit sum men sayis othir salmond metis thaym eftir thair spawning growis lene maner thay ar sindry thaym ar foud lene ta syde fat tothir forthir thir rownis meltis quhilkis hid said vnder sandis growis spring nixt yei render fische na gretar ane mannis thoume gyf thay handillit thay melt away like ane blob watter alwayis first streme watter risis yai discend see within xx dayis eftir yai grow meruellus quantite maist feruent desyre appetite returnis samyn placis quhair thay wer generit forthir becaus mony ye watteris scotland ar full lynnis al sone thir salmond cumis ye lyn thay lei mony ar wycht lepis weil thay get vp throw lyn returnis place quhair thay wer bred abidis thair quhil season um thair generatioun utheris quhilkis lepis nocht cleirlie ouir lyn brekie thaym self thair fall growis mesall vtheris ar kepp caw rounis la wart peple settis oftymes cawdronis playand hair watter cheik lyn thus quhen salmondis faillis thair loup thay fall callour said caldrounis maist delitius mouth defendit lawis sla ony salmond fra ye viii day september xv day nouembre na man knawis quhair thir fische leiffis na thing found thair wambe quhen thay ar oppinnit bot ane thi grosse humour pof syndry kyndis muffillis cocles scotland perlis ar gottin yame sindry vncouth strange fische nature hadder ca xii schaw nature mussillis coclis quhilkis mony kyndis ar amang w sum ar small thairof rycht delicius mouth utheris ar mair nocht vnlike forme quantite samyn mussillis ya he purpure howbeit yai haue na thing thairof ya ar yit rycht delicius mouth utheris ar lang greter callit hors mussillis ar gottin sindry reueris specialie de done thir mussillis ar generit perlis thir mussillis mornyng quhen lift cleir temperat opnis thair mouthis litill aboue watter maist gredelie swellis dew heuin eftir mesure quantite dew thay swellie thay consaue bredis perle thir mussillis ar sa doyn gleg twiche heryng howbeit voce neuir small maid bra besyde thaym stane neuir sa small cassin watter thay douk haistelie atanis gang ground knawing weill quhat estimatioun price frute yair wambe al peple al sone fischaris fyndis yir mussillis thay thrist thaym fast togidder maner thair takyng followis pfirst four fyue personis passis reuer togidder standis maner ane round cirkill within watter thair schulderis ilk ane thaym he ane staffe thair hand thay sall nocht slide syne thay luke viseis throwe cleir purifyit watter quhill thay se mussillis becaus yai may nocht tak thaym vp thair handis thay cleik thaym vp thair tayis slingis thaym nixt brayis perlis ar gottin scotland ar nocht littill valoure thay haue ane cleir schynand quhitnes round lycht sum tymes ar al mekleas naill ane mannis fyngar quhilk haue part wes schawin thaym yat come fra sanct iames thair siclike mussillis spanye bot thay haue na perle thay leif salt watter see costis scotland ar coclis mussillis maner youcht tha mair proffitable mouth ony procreatioun perlis mony vncouth forme figuris fische ar scotland sum thaym armyt schellis sum hard skalis sum thaym ar round ane ball bakkit like ane hurcheon hauad bot ane conduc baith purge thair wambe ressaue thair mei schaw euery kynd fische scotland wer bot ane faschious vane lauboure samyn ar knawin al cuntreis pof al othir kyndis fische sa gret plente throw partis seis howbeit infinit noumer thaym wer tane away ta day na thing thairof salbe myst morow attoure ane thing cumys singulare prouidence god ay ye mair derth penurite vittallis scotland fische swoumis abundance plente attoure desertis muris realme growis ane herbe namit hadder ony seid richt nutritiue baith beistis fowlis specialie beis herbe moneth iulii he ane floure purpure hew al sweit huny pychtis maid yi herbe sum tyme ane rycht delicius hailsum drynk nochtheles maner making perist exterminioun said pichtis scotland thay schew neuir craft making drink bot yayr attoure thair na part scotland sa vnproffitable bot producis othir yrne elli sum vthir proffitable kynd metal may notabilly prou n throw ilis scotland discriptioun ilis scotland maist notabyll thingis thairof capitulo xiii sen ar fallyng comonyng ilis discriue ye maner forme followis fornens scotland ye ireland seis lyis xliii ilis quhilkis sum ar xxx mylis lang vtheris xii mylis vtheris mair vtheris le thir ilis wer callit sum auctouris ebonie vtheris ar callit hebredes principall ile ile man quhilk lyis fornens galloway wes sum tyme principall seit preistis namit driades cornelius tacitus cesar comentaris mony othir romane auctouris testifyis north fra ile man lyis arane vthirwayis namit botha secound name wes geuin sanct brandane biggit sum tyme ane hous namit fra arrane lyis law othesay namit fra first scot yat brocht scottis ireland albioun nocht far fra thir ilis ailsay quhair siclik plente g schew afore ba fra ailsay lyis mony vthir ilis de idi seuerit thair awin name full mynis sik irne tyn leid metallis yit maist notable ile scotland ila quhilk lyis beyou toung lorne sycht lochquhabir ane riche cuntre xxx mylis lenth rycht plentuus corne full metallis gif thair wer ony crafty industrius peple wyn samyn nocht far fra ila lyis cumbra mula al mekill ila baith lenth breid ile mula ane cleir fontane two mylis fra ye see fra fontane discendis ane litil burne strip rynnand ful rounis ye seis thir rounis ar round quhit schynand like perle full thik humour within two houri eftir thay come see thay grow gret cocles schort gait fra thir ilis iona othirwayis namyt colmekill quhilk ane abbay full deuot religius men abbay wes comoun sepulture scottis kyngis fra tyme kyng fergus secound ye tyme kyng malcolme ca quhilk biggit abbay dunfermling quhair maist part kyngis lyis sen fundatioun thairof passand forthwart northnorwest seis fornens ro ane ile namit lews lx mylis lenth yi ile bot ane reueir said gif ony woman waid throw watter spring yeir thair sall na salmond sene yeir said watter otherwayis sall abound gret plente beyound lewis lyis two ilis namit sky rona last ile incredible noumer selch pellok meirswyne na thing astonist sycht men last maist ile namit hirtha quhare eleuatioun pole lxiii greis sen eleuatioun pole aboue ile man lvii greis ilkgre extending lxii mylis ane half distance ptolome vthir astronimeris nowmeris conclude fra ile man first ile albion hirtha last ile thairof ar thre hundred lxxvii mylis last ile namit hirtha quhilk irsche callit ane scheip th ile gret nowmer scheip ylk ane gretar ony gait buk hornis lang thykkar ony horne ane bewgyll he lang talis hyng erd ile circulit euery syde roche craggis na baitis may land bot allanerly ane place quhilk ane strait narow entres sumtyme thair mycht na pepyll pa ile extreme dangeir yair lyuis yit thair na passage bot quhen seis ar cawnie ony tempest moneth iuny ane preist cumis ye lewis ane bait ile ministeris sacrament baptisme ye barnis he bene borne yeir afore al sone preist he done office certane messis ressauis tyndis thair comoditeis returnis hame gait come ile lewis ar ii kirkis ane dedicat sanct peter tother dedicat sanct clement fame al sone fyre gangis furth ile man haldyn maist clene innocent lyfe layis ane wosp stra alter quhen pepyll ar geuyn maist deuotly thair praers wosp kyndellis ane bleis beyound thir ilis yit ane vthir ile bot inhabit ony pepyll ar certane beistis nocht far different fra figure scheip sa wyld thay nocht tane girnis hair thaym lang tattie nothir like woll scheip gait betuix thir ilis oftymes richt dangerus passage see contrarius stremes makis collision sum tymes yettand tyd sum tymes swelleand soukand agane sa forcy violence quhe schippis ar saland throw thir dangerus veylis oftymes thay ar othir drownit elli brokin craggis gretest vele heirof namit corbrek wyll othir synk elli draw ane schip howbeit distant thair fra ane myle pof nature claik geis syndry maner thair procreation ile thule capitulo xiiii hestis speik geis generit see namit clakis sum men beleuis thir clakis growis treis nebbis bot thair opinioun vane becaus nature procreatioun thir clakis strange haue maid na lytyll lauboure deligence serche ye treuth verite yairof haue salit throw ye seis quhare thir clakis ar bred fynd gret experience yt nature seis mair releuant au thair procreatioun ony vthir thyng howbeit thir geis ar bred mony syndry wayis thay ar bred ay allanerly nature seis treis ar cassin seis proces tyme apperis first worme etin small boris hollis thairof growis small wormis first thay schaw thair heid feit last thay schaw thair plumis wyngis finaly quhen thay ar cumyn iust mesure quantite geis thay fle aire othir fowlis doi notably prouyn yeir god ane thousand iiii hundred lxxxx sicht mony pepyll besyde castell petslego ane gret tre brocht alluuion flux see land wonderfull tre brocht lard ground quhilk sone efter gart deuyde ane saw apperit ane multitude wormis thrawing thaym self syndry hollis boris tre sum thaym war rude thay war bot new schapin sum batth heid feit wyngis bot thay na fedderis sum thaym war perfit schapin fowlis last pepyll hauand ylk day tre mair admiration brocht kirk sanct androis be de town tyre quhare remanis yit dayis within two yeris efter hapnit sic ane lyk tre cum ye firth tay besyde dunde worme tin hollit full young geis samyn maner siclike port leith beside edinburgh within yeris efter hapnit sic ane lyke cais ane sch amit cristofir efter scho lyin iii yeris ane ankir ane th r ilis wes brocht leith becaus hir tymmer apperit failyeit scho brokin incontinent appe afore al inwart partis hir worme etin hollis thairof full geis samyn maner haue schawin attoure gif ony man wald allege vane ar ument cristofer maid sic treis grew allanerly ilis ru treis growis said ilis ar nature fynaly nature seis resoluit geis preif cuntre thairof notable example schawin afore ene maister alexander galloway person kynkell w thir ilis geuand mynd maist ernist besynes serche verite thir obscure mysty dowtis aduenture liftit vp ane see tangle hyng full mussill schellis fra rute branchis sone efter opnit ane thir mussyll schellis bot mair astonist afore saw na fische bot ane perfit schapin foule smal gret ay efferyng quantite schell clerk knawin w richt desirus sic vncouth thingis come haistely said tangle opnit w circumstance afore rehersit thir mony othir reasonis examplis beleif yt thir clakis ar producit ony nature treis rutis thairof bot allanerly ye nature oiceane see quhilk ye caus production mony wonderful thingis becaus ye rude ignorant pepyl saw oftymes ye frutis yt fel ye treis quhilkis stude neir ye see couertit within schort tyme geis yai beleuit yt yir geis grew apon ye treis hingad yair nebbis siclik appillis vthir frutis hingis yair stalkis bot thair opinioun nocht sustenit al sone thir appillis frutis fallis see lude thay grow first worme schort proces tyme ar al eta geis haue schawin sufficientlie yneuch ilis scotland gyf schawin ane thing say nocht allanerlie wes ye ile thule remanent ilis scotland sene w bot al er sen mony romane auctouris cornelius tac tus sayis romane nauy quhilk wes send ilis e comand iulius agricola saw yi ile thule remanent ilis ande yair h ptolom writtis ile thule ly amane ilis scotland yit wr ting prouin experienc may haue na faith thule mony mylis distant fra schetland schetland beyound orknay approe hand noroway sum auctoutis sayis ule samyn ile w call island thir auctouris sayts thul ast ile ye occeane see sa island quhilk lyis cauld frosty seis beyound rkill artik north pole peple island becaus na cornis grow leif allanerlie fische thay bray dry fische al small meil b ikis thaym watter fyre vsis maner breid discriptioun orknay schetland vvith sindry vthir small ilis maneris conditionis peple thairof ca xv beyound ilis scotland lyis orknay sum part northnorwest seis sum part ye almane seis principall ile orknay pomonia ye bischoppis se quhilk ar two strong castellis orknay growis na quheit nakit wod othir comis growis gret plente orknay he na vennomus beistis ireland na beist ennyme nature man may le orknay sen ar fallyn speking irelad howbeit pertenis na thing purpos tuke hand schaw ane wonder thairof quhilk passis wonderis eui red afore ony othir bukis ireland ane loch famyn mony mylis growis nothit e tre gyf ony affixit et doun loch within space ne yeir eftir alteris sa mekle hyd within erd tu ane hard stane hyd watter turnis irne sa mekle abo e watter kepi nature tre tre stane r e ar unyt togidder vnder ane st k bot returne orknay schaw l ill le wonderis first howbeit pepill g uin excessiue drinkin plente b ir makis stark st ail albioun nane thaym sene wod daft dru kin al thay feir thair bod extreme ge vse strang fai bodyis cuntre he two thre ata wyld foull tame mai fou h orknay part albioun thair hors ar li ill mair asynis bot thay may indure mair labour ony othir hors speik fische thair mair thairof th n ony vncouth p ple may beleif orknay ane gret fische mair ony hors meruellus incredible sleip fische quhen scho beginnis sleip e hi eith fast ane crag aboue al sone marineris fyndis hi n sleip thay cui ne stark cabill ne boit eftir tha haue borit ane gret hole throw hir tale thay fe e hir samyn al sone fi cheis awalknit scho makis hir ip gret force ye see fra scho fynd hir self fast scho wrythis hir hir awin skin deis fatnes scho he maid dulie gret quantite hir skyn becaus du lang maid strong cabellis ane hundreth skylis beyound orknay scherland q hilk rich standis onlie fische dryit son ny hydis skynnis oxin scheip ait trikis dryit sonne mys cuntre scotland maner marchandis holland yeland almanie umys yei lie schetland interchange othir marchandyis p ple hairo quhilkis ar nature conditionis peple orknay b ound schetland ar mony ilis quhilkis le ffis maner doi youcht ye peple yi ilis pure yit thay leif langer ar better content thair lyuis tha thay he mair welth rich warld n contentioun amang thaym singulare proffet ilk man prouidis sa mekle fische ye symer may sustene hous agane wynter thir peple ar nakit ambitioun vice neuir trublit vncouth wer amang pleseiris ar iosit mankynd thay think na thyng sa gud leif concor peace hauand ane quiet lyfe ony vthir displeseir yi perfection lyfe cumys thaym onlie throw thair symplicite followis samyn fu steppis crist ilk yeir ani cumys thaym ane preis orknay ministris thaym sacrament baptisme eftir hai e deuore ressauis teyndis iustlie returnis samyn gait come orknay forthir gif ony giftis nature may noumerit aman wardly guddis say thir ilis he may feliciteis guddis ony vthi cuntreis peple thairof ar fair lusty strong body dotat mony giftis nature he gud h ill body quhilk may preferrit rich l knawis thir men experience lang infirmiteis thir gy peple ist riche standis sa content thair awin gudd thay couet na vtheris say yi peple ar al happy ony vthir peple warld fo hir gyf wa say thir thingis writ ar vane considrin wes neuir yir ilis say wes weil informit yame ane noble man edward sum tyme shop orknay bischop come ane man thir ilis cht alt nerlie schew thir thingis al circumstance afore rehersit bot thaym hym self passit commoun stature men sa wycht na man durst cotend wers hym wes visage hyde wes ony lady warld thir reasonis appe auctorite thay auctouris na worth sayis peple sonne barbour miserable thair na happiar creaturis warld thir peple thir landis forsaid amang ochis craggis thir ilis growis ane maner electuar goum wit like gold sa attractiue nature drawis stra flox hemmis claithis samyn maner doi ane adamont stane goume generat see froith quhilk cassin vp continewal repercussion craggis aganis see wallis throw ithand motioun see growis al teuch glew ay mair mair quhill last fa doun crag see said thaym he experience thairof goum quhen lyis crag like ane froith blob watter becaus nocht sufficientlie wrocht motioun see oftymes see tangle foud inuoluit yi goume becaus doung heir thair sa mony wayis alluuion watter sa lang fletis sone inuoluit ony thing metis twa yeir afore cumin buke lycht arriuit ane gret lomp gou buchquhane al mekle ane hors wes brocht hame hirdis quhilkis wer kepand thair beistis thair housis cassin fyre becaus thay fand ane smelland adour thairwith thay schew thair maister wes ganand sen aid kirkis thair maister wes ane rud man thay wer tuke bot ane litill part thairof left remanent behynd hym mater litill effect partis goum quhen wes brokin wes hew gold schane ke lycht ane candyli maist part goum electuare wes royit rud peple afore come ony wyse mannis eris quhome verifyit proueth sow cutis na balme al sone wes aduertist thairof maid sic deligence ane part wes brocht abirdene thir ar maist notable thingis culd fynd concernyng albioun orknay schetland pthus wer neidf put ane end cosmographie wer nocht ane vncouth wounderfull historie taris lityll pen maister iames ogilby vthir noble men wes send ambassatouris fra maist noble prince kyng iames feird kyng france tempest see thay wer constranit land norroway quhare thay saw nocht far fra thaim mony wild men nakit roth maner thay ar payntit last thay gat aduertising landwart peple thay wer doum beistis vnder figure men tyme nycht yai vsit cum gret cumpanyis landwar villagis quhair thay fynd na doggis thay brek vp durris slayis al peple thay fynd thair intyll al sone thay heir ye noys doggis thay euanis dar nocht abide thay ar sa huge strenth sum tymes thay pull vp treis r ti fechtis thairwith amang thaym self ambassatouris wer astonist thir monstouris maid stark waches gret fyris birnand nycht morow thay pullit vp salis departit forthir thir norroway men schew said ambassatouris yat yair wes nocht far fra thaym ane peple swomit symer like fische see leiffand ay fische wynter becaus watter cald thay leif wyld beistis discendis fra montanis sum tyme bringis yir bestis hame thayr couis pand sa endis heir ye cosmographie discriptioun scotland ane prudent doctryne maid auctoure concernyng baith nevv maneris auld scottis capitulo xvi becaus sindry nobill men he desyrit schaw ye auld maneris scottis quhilkis ar skatterit sindry partis yi buke vnder ane copendius treit may knawin far thir present dayis ar different fra maneris leiffing auld fad ri youcht knaw na thyng bettar bot schawing thairof wyll draw hattent sindry gret personagis ar may suffir thair vice taxit thaym self repreuit yit becaus stand sum part vnder reuerence thir nobill men forsaid haue condiscendit may thair desiris thay allege proffitable rederis speciallie sik men ar nocht geuyn ouir immoderatlie thair awin affectioun yit ouir mekill sopit sensuall pleseir sik men may reducit fra thair errouris thairfore intend first schaw quhat maneris he bene amang eldaris baith tyme weir peace quhat ingyne wisdome cheuelrie thay haue debatit aganis sa mony strong ennymes howbeit thair ennymes come oftymes realme maist dangerus cursionis finalie schaw notable strenth vigour souerane virtew failyeit ay mair amang thaym thay declinit fra ye temperance yair quhill last cumin thir dayis quhilkis leif gret tranqui lite howbeit samyn mair beneuolence sleuth nychtbou ony manlie prowis self schaw schortest way may thir present dayis ar drounit maner auarice lust yit beleif sic men seuere lyfe following ye temperance yair eldaris sall reiose heir honourable maneris thair eldaris utheris ar mair brutall vicius lyfe seyng thair vice taxit sik dish nour sall dres thaym plesandlie reuert fra thair euil schamefull dedis better lyfe pfirst suppone thing say repreuing corruppit maneris warld present nocht takin repreif euery man bot allanerlie sik men leiffis intemperance sik men deseruis mair repreif may gif thaym tyme gif ony man fyndis byle opnit purgatioun hyde nocht infirmite bot erar seik ye best rameid may amend lyfe pour eldaris howbeit thay wer rycht virtewis baith weir peace wer maist exercit temperance fontane virtew thay wer temperat sleip meit drink sic refectionis wer preparit litill laubour cost yai breid wes maid sic stuf grew maist salie ground thair vitallis wer nocht iftit mak thaym delicius mouth bot wer ground togidder vnder ane forme e flesche maist frequent amang yame wes othir wild flesche fellis thair hunting quhilk maid thaym incredible strenth elli wes thair awin tame bestial specially b yit dayis howbeit ar rycht far different fra vse custome vthir nationis steirkis quhen thay ar bot young velis ar othir slane elli libbit oxin manure land bot ye quiokis war quhill thay wer calfe thay ar fattest maist delicius mouth common meit eldaris fische nocht ye plente bot erar becaus thair landis lay oftymes waist throw continewal exercition cheuelry yat caus thay leiffit maist fische thay disiunit rly morning smal refectioun sustenit thair lyffis thairwith quhil tyme sowper throw quhilk thair stomok neuir surfetly chargit empesche thaym vthir besines sowper thay war mair large howbeit thay bot ane cours quhen thay kest thaym self mery thay vsit maist aqua vite nocht maid costly spicis bot sic naturall herbis grew thair awin yardis common drink thay vsit ayll tyme weir quhen thay lay thair tentis thay vsit nocht bot watter ilk man al mekyll mele mycht suffice hym day maid breid yairof fyre samyn maner romani specialy antonius caratallus empriour thay sendyll flesche yair campis bot gif war pray ennymes thay eit comon flesche half raw saup maist nurisand maner pattoure thay ay thaym ane gret vessell wrocht full butter cheis mele milk vinac e temperit togidder quhilk thay saiffit thair liffis mony dayis fra exstreme hungar soukand ius humouris thairof quhen na vittallis throw incursionis ennymes mycht found howbeit thay peace yair ennymes thay sufferit nocht thair bodyis corruppit sleuth bot wer exercit othir continewall hunting game gret honour amang eldaris elli thay exercition rynnyng sum tymes fra plane montanis fra montanis planis elli thay war exercit wirslyng vthir corporall exercition thay thair hedis ay cowit spanyeartis vsis ony bonet couer le tha thay war trublit infirmite nane yame throw ythand cowing thair hedis grew beld thay yeid commonly bairfu gif thay ony schone thay dippit thaym first watter thay put thaym specialy wynter quhen maist schill persand stormes apperit thair sollis quhilkis war hardyn hetis semer snawis wynter suld mair abyl sustene laubour thair abulyemet maid motion insolence bot erar efter general gise cu tre thair hois war maid smal lynt wol yeid neuir aboue thair kne make thaym mair waldyn sowpyll mantyllis thay vsit wynter wes maid gros woll semer wes maid small fynest woll thay mycht get thay slepit benkis bonchis stra ony couer lernit thair sonnis fra thair first yeris eschew eis sleip samyn maner ilk moder wes nurice hir awin barne ane suspition adultre aganis ony woman quhare hir milk failyeit wemen thocht yair barnis wa tender kyndly thaym bot gif thay war nurist al weill mylk thair breist thay war nurist afore blude thair wambe pa toure thay held thair barnis war degenerat fra thair nature kynd gif thay war nurist vncouth mylk thay war sa accustomit ythand pyne laubouris thay curit nothir feruent heytes semer yit schyl frostis ye wynter thay trauelit maist yair fute tyme weir thay thair carlagis vittallis turst thaym thair hors quhen dangeir occurrit thay refusit na maner besines laubour micht pertene forsy campionis gif hapnit yam mischance vincust thay fled sic spede montanis na hors men micht ouirtak thaym iniure done ony ane thaym repute sa common thaym al yt thay wald neuir euoid ye displeseir yairof thair hertis quhill samyn war recompansit blude thair ennymes wes maist noble desyrit erest fecht wangard quhare vassalage manheid mycht maist knawin nobyllis commonis contendit quhay suld maist faithful othir quhen capitane throw fers spreit hardynes apperit ony extreme dangeir ennymes band opinion ruschit sa fersly defence othir thay delyuerit hym ye present dangeir elli atanis lois thair lyues hym sepulturis nobyllis war decorit al mony hie stanis rising slane afore ennymes lyfe found army flint furisine swerd beltit fast sidis schamefully scurgit sald swerd laid wed degradit auctorite banist vnworthy creature thair cumpany fled tyme battall departit fra army without comand capitane slane ony dowme quhare euir mycht
