apprehendit bot gudis war geuyn sonne wemen war lytyl le vassalage strenth men al rank madynnis gif thay war nocht child yei al weill battall men al sone army passand forthwart thay slew first leuand beist thay fand nocht allanerly baithit thair swerdis blude thairof bot taistit samyn thair mouth na le religion faith thay bene sicker sum felicite following gif thay saw thair awin blude battall thay grew nocht astonist bot boldin maist bryme fury set thaym reuenge samyn battallis assailyeit thaym thay socht neuir victory treason falset slicht thocht ay degrading thair nobilite vincus thair ennymes ony othir thing bot force fechtyng thay held gret febylnes reuenge ony displeseir hatrent slauchter treason attour sencerite sympilnes equaly honorit amang thaym quhen thay war pa thair ennymes ylk yeid apon awin cost except sa mony war wagit trublit ye falling euyl fallyn daft wod hauand sic infirmite succedis heritage fra fader son geldit infeckit blude suld spreid na forthir wemen fallyn lipper ony othir infection blude banist fra cumpany men gif scho cosauit barne vnder sic infirmite baith scho hir barne war buryit qu k dronkattis glutonis consumer vitttallis mair necessar sustentation men wer tane first commandit swelly thair fouth quhat drink thay plesit incontinent thairefter drownit ane fresche reuer pforthir howbeit thay na administratioun iustice tyme weir yit sic iustice mynyste tyme peace oftymes thay war ouir seuere yair puuition thay knew weil fra hair pepyl wer drawin fra battal peace thay ul geuyn sa mony enormyteis samyn mycht nocht dantit gret punition pepyll war sic nature al sone thay knew thaym self gylty ony offence committit aganis kingis maieste commoun weill thay set thaym rais diuisioun amang gret princis realme nochtheles quhe thay ar tretit soft moderat empire thay ar found richt humane meke pepyl richt obeysand reason nocht allanerly kepi thair faith efter reason thair contract bot geuys ane gowpin elli sum thingis mair aboue iust mesure thay sell consuetude sa straitly kepit gif samyn nocht done biar wyll nocht stand contract merchandice thay vsit rytis maneris egiptianis fra quhome thay tuk thair first begynnyng thair secret besines thay vsit writ comon letteris vsit amang othir pepil bot era sifars figuris beistis maid maner letteris sic thair epithafis superscriptioun aboue thair sepulturis schawis nochtheles crafty maner writing quhat sleuth say perist yit thay haue certane letteris propir amang thaym self quhilkis war sum tyme vulgar commoun forthir thay spekis auld toung cuntre he thair asperatioun thair diptongis thair pronunciation better tha ony othir pepyl commonis ar nocht exercit thairwith bot allane ly thay dwellis hie partis land becaus thir men he thair langage mair eloquent propir commonis he thay ar callit poetis makis poetis effering thair eruditioun science mony gret cerimonyis beside mony traftis science quhilkis thay haue translatit yair awin toung thay profes maist science medcinary ar richt excellent thay knaw nature euery growis thay cuntreis curis maner edyis thairwith heirfore say thair na region warld sa barrant vnfrutfull distance fra sunne bot prouidece god maner necessaryis ye sustentatioun man may gottin plesandly gif thair war si pepyll cu laubour effering nature thairof nochtheles e datis quhilkis dwelt continewally merchand realme ingland lernit saxonis oung frequent ieoperd chance battall sustenit mony yeris aganis thaym sa pepyll present scotland he tynt ba th langage maneris wrytyng v sum tyme ou eldaris he ane new maner writingis langage howbeit hieland he ba th writingis langage thay afore ingenius ony othi pepyll may thair ane greter make ane bait ane hyd bound na thing bot wandis bait callit ane quhilk thay fysche salmond passis gret riuers thair quhen thay haue done thai ony place thair b k quhare thay pleis bot wyl chace sindry seasonis specialy malcolme c al thingis began change pfor brytonis wa maid effeminat lang douing ou britane saxonis wall began romani inglysmen specially efter pichtis dayly cumpany thaym began rute thair langage superflew maneris oure breistis throw quhilk virtew temperance eldaris began lytyl estimation amang w tha war geuyn efter arrogance pride inglismen vane glore ambution honouris began ye tyme seke new name nobilite howbeit afore thay dayis maist nobyl decorit mair virtew rich confiding mair awin dedis ony dedis eldaris began scotland maneris dukis erlis lordis baronis afore thay dayis principall men scotland vnder king war callit thanis say gaddera kyngis mali war ay rewardit kyng thair faith virtew deseruit bot beleif nane he sic eloquence fouth langage sufficiently declare far thir present dayis ar different fra virtew temperance eldaris quhare eldaris sobriete haue ebri te dronkynnes quhare thay plente sufficence haue immoderat cursis superfluite war maist noble honest culd deuore swelly maist extreme deligence serchis sa mony deligat cour thay prouoke stomok ressaue mair may sufficiently degest throw quhilk ingorge fyllis self day nycht sa full meris drinkis nocht abstene quhyll wambe sa swon vnabyl ony virtewis occupation nocht allanerly may surfet dennar sowper suffice w abo e temperance oure eldaris bot al continew schamefull immoderyt voracite duble dennaris sow aris throw quhilk mony w ganis na othir besines bot fil teme wembe attour continew schamefull intemperance aboue necessar sustentation nature geif w sic vnhappy laubour yt na fische see foule aire best wod may haue rest bot socht heir thair satify hungry appetit glutonis nocht allanerly ar wynis socht france bot spainye italy grece sum tyme baith aphrik asya socht new delicius metis wynis samyn effect thus warld sa vterly socht mane droggis electuaris may nuris lust insolence pepyl ar brocht scotland maist mptuus price na le dammage perdition pepyll thairof immoderat glutony wit reason ar sa bli dit within body may haue knawlage heuy ly thyngis body inuoluit sic clowdis fatnes howbeit gud complexiou nature sa opprest superfl w metis drinkis may weild yit ouir self bot confessand self vin ust geuis place infirmiteis quhill miserably distroyit apperis e syndry experience f r mony pepyll remot maist cauld region ar strikyn oftymes maist vehement feuer yair inwart bo elli blesand yai war fyre quhilkis cumis sic spicery vncouth ggis brocht remot cuntreis regioun utheris thaym ar sa sw llyn growin full humouris thay ar strikin haistely deid poples recouer ane schort tyme efter thay ar bot ane deid p pyl sepulture hauand bot ane schadow life ye young pepyll ni followyng yir vnhappy customis thair self lust insolence hauand virtuus occupation craftis contemptioun becaus ya ar lang customit hantit thairwith quhen tyme occurris weir defend cuntre thay ar sa effeminar soft thay pa hors heuy marti ar sa fat growin thay may na thing compare souerane heid thair eldaris al sone thay ar returnit hame becaus thair guddis ar sufficient nuris yame voluptuus life pleseir thair wambe thay ar geuyn maner auarice othir castis yame strang maistrifull theuis elli sawaris dissention amang ye nobyllis thir mony othir enormiteis following thaym procedis originaly fra ye fontane voluptuus leuyng intemperance nochtheles wald refrene w thairfra wait thair na region vnder ye sonne mair halsum le subdew pestilence yit mair commodius nurisand lyfe man yit nocht sa disparit bot traistis within schort tyme corruppit mane pepyl salbe reparit ane better fassoun nocht allanerly syndry partis realme remanis yit ye futsteppis mony auld virtewis vsit sum tyme amang eldaris bot al risis euery day new feruent deuotioun ornament cristin fai h ane thyng wyl say vnder reuerence vthir realmes yair neuir pepyl mair sicker ye cristin faith yit mair constant thair faithful promis scottis he bene ay sen thair first beginning thairfore say ane thing finaly nocht allanerly yair louing bot al exhortation yair perseuerace sa fat pepil psently leuad region passis thair eldaris suptuus riatus abulyement sa far yai ar mair eligant honest yair housis letter mair magnificent tha afore ornament yair kirkis templis yus want yai na maner virtew yt yair eldaris except temperance thair bodyis quhilk mot bring yame haistely blissit lord amen pfollovvis ane compendius recapitulation kingis britane sen first begynnyng thairof tyme king henry viii history scotland sa implicat history ingland difficyll knaw becaus crown ingland he bene iosit syndry pepyll syndry chance variance oftymes thocht expedient comodite pleseir rederis mer thair genelogy first fra brutus quhom britonis war brocht grece ile albion fra begynnyng warld iiiimxxvii yeris iosit ye crown britane space imicxvi yeris quhilk tyme thay war inuadit cruelly iulius cesar vincust bot thair realm maid tributar forme uince howbeit thir britonis kingis lang tyme namit britonis blud yit thair realme gouernit ay romani yeir god iiii hundreth xxxvi yeris season thay war subdewit scottis pichtis nocht allanerly maid tributaris thaym xxx yeris bot gaif ouir mekyll thair landis empire scottis pychtis paulus diaconus beda sabellicus mony othir recent authouris schawis lenth yair historyis nochtheles thir britonis impacient sustene ye empire ba har pepyll becaus thay war accustomit afore romane pleseiris chesit constantine son androenus duke bertanye king hatrent scottis pichtis costantyne come sic pissance army britane yt delyuerit ye britonis al seruitude recouerit thair realme fra redeption iiiiclxv yeris efter constantine rang constantius son efter constantinus rang uortigern ye space xxii yeris mene tyme ye scottis pichtis rais sic army yt thay almaist subdewit ye britonis agane seruitude throw quhilk uortigern wes constranit seke support saxonis yair weris resistit certane yeris al inuasion scottis pichtis quhill last tane slicht hengist brocht extreme seruitude banist al ye britonis walis th come ye remanent boundis britane vnder ye empire hengist callit hengist land ye pepyl yairof hengistis men bot corruption langage realme callit ingland pepyl inglismen ye britonis war onely disparit ttubyl bot mony yeris efter faucht aganis inglismen kig arthure sindry chancis fortoun bot efter deith yai war subdewit agane content callit inglismen vnder ane name saxonis fra ye deith king arthure quhilk ye yeir god vcxlii yeris ye yeir god imxvi yeris ye realme ingland gidit inglismen ay vnd ye empire ane king bot sone efter deuidit vii syndry kingdomes brocht agane ye empire ane king vnder ye samyn marchis yt he lang efter subdewit conquest danis v kingis thair continewally efter othir succeding quhom last namit hardy canute quhilk maid mony proude lawis aboue inglismen rang sic tyranny yt ye inglismen fynaly rebellit slew al ye danis within ye space ane nicht hardy canute inuadit al sidis slew hym self disperation inglismen efter slauchter creat edward ye son king eldrede yair kig eldrede rang aboue yame afore ye cumyng danis nochtheles ye inglismen efter ye slauchter king edward quhilk haly lif ye nowmer sanctis dred yt ye danis suld cu yame new battall thairfore creat herald yair king discendit baith ye lynnage inglismen danis thus edward neuo sanct edward bruthir sanct margaret ye haly quene scotland disherist crown ingland herald geuyn rage insolence lust maryit ye douchter willya bastard normandy within dayis efter brocht hir ingland last tuk sic hatrent aganis hir hir blud yt causit hir schamfully defow lit rebaldis lymmaris cuntre wyllya ye bastard duk normandy impatient sustene odius offence come ingland gret army depriuit king herald baith lyfe realme atanis ye yeir god imlxvi yeris efter ye first conques maid yame danis l yeris willia ye bastard cocreour ingland tuk ye crown efter slauchter king herald causit ye normanis inglismen ncres togidd vnd ane blud ony memory ye name danis ye posterite w iam perseueris yit gret honour victory thir dayis tegnand abo inglismen tyme kyng hary viii quhilk hi illuster dedis salbe put gret renoun memory posterite pfollowis table history contenand mater euery buke craftely seuerit thaym self table first buke gathelus first progenitour left land grece come egipt maryit scota douchter king pharo cumyng spanye ca primo fo phow gathelus beildit ciete brigance namit al pepyl scottis send ii sonnis irelad deceis ca ii fo ii phow hemecus gouernit irelad symon brek maid king efter deith ca iii fo ii pof ye gret posterite scottis regnand ireland efter symon brek first cumyng scottis pichtis albion ye pichtis war alliat scott ca iiii fo iiii phow britonis thair quent ichtis dissoluit ye band alliance betuix scottis pichtis trubyl fel thairthrow ca v fo iiii phow pichtis scottis maid thair ordinace inuaid othir battal ferquhard king irelad send son fergus ane army support scottis aganis ye pichtis said ferg maid kyng ca vi fo v phow king ferg come gret ordinance aganis pichtis dissait britonis discouerit baith scottis pychtis orisoun maid fergus kyng pichtis ca vii fo vi pof syndry cosultationis maid pichtis thay war recounsalit scottis ca viii fo vii phow coyl king britonis slane army discomfist scottis pichtis ca ix fo viii pof king ferg ison noblis crown scotland tatlyeit hym successouris ca x fo viii phow king fergus partit landis scotland amang noblis realme maneris brigandis ca xi fo ix phow king fergus maid concord betuix princis ireland perist return ireland seys ca xii fo x table secund buke phow scottis efter king ferg deith contendit crown inhibit young chyldryn salbe kingis ca primo fo x pof kyng ferithais deith ca ii fo xi phow ferlegus banist ye slauchter king ferithais king maynus ca iii fo xii pof king doruidilla stitutiois maner deith ca iiii fo xiii pof tyrane king nathak slauchter ca v fo xiii phow rewthar ane young child maid king contrar lawis ferquhard capitane lorne chasit dowall ilis orison maid pepyll thairof ca vi fo xiiii phow ferquhard dowal recou terig othir plane battal war baith slane al nobilite scottis pichtis ye king pichtis slane ye king scottis tane ca vii fo xv ye scottis picht war doug albio ye briton ca viii fo xv phow scottis pichtis recouerit thair landis discomfist sysyll king britonis residew kig rewtheris life ca ix fo xvi pof king rewtha lawis gouernance ptolome king egipt send oratouris se ye situation scotland ca x fo xvi pof king thereus exilit tyranny conane cheiftane brigadis maid gouernour duryng proscriptioun ca xi fo xvii pof king iosyne experience preching two philosophouris ca xii fo xvii pof king finnane lawis college clerkis ile man ca xiii fo xviii kig durst slane cruel tyrany ca xiiii fo xviii pof gret contention amang ye capitanis orison maid chacon capitane argile ewin first name maid kyng ca xv fo xix phow gillus bastard son kyng ewin slew two sonnis two nepotis durstus make hym self king ye thrid nepot edeir eschapit ca xvi fo xxi phow kyng gyllus banist cadall cheiftane brigandis w maid gouernour slew gyllus ireland ewin ye secound maid kig ca xvii fo xxi phow cadal returnad ireland lost ye maist part army rage seys ye cosolation maid hym kig ewin ca xviii fo xxii phow kingis scottis pichtis war alliat togidder mariage balus king orknay slew hym self disperation wyse counsall geuyn kyng ewin edeir ca xix fo xxiii table thrid buke pof king edeir reue git ye heirschippis maid ye tratour bred ye ilis ca primo fo xxiiii phow britonis send ambassatouris king edeir support aganis iulius cesar yair orison king ederis answer ye said iuli doug albion support scottis ca ii fo xxiiii phow iuli returnit britane maid tributar romane empire ca iii fo xxv pof syndry messagis send iulius scottis pichtis thair answer iulius hoif syndry opinionis concernyng first foundaris thairof ca iiii fo xxvi phow tratour murket h complicis war punist deith king edeir vicious kyng ewin ye thrid lawis deith ca v fo xxvii pof kyng metellane natiuite crist saluioure gret fouth poetis oratouris philosophouris flurisit tyme ca vi fo xxviii pof kyng caratak dantit syndry conspiratouris realme britonis rebelland aganis romani war discomfist thair message send scottis ca viii fo xxix pof caratakis answer britonis solis normanis picardis rebellion ye said britonis war discomfist romani thair king slane ca viii fo xxx phow claudius emprioure come britane subdewit orkenay empire sanct peteris first cumyng italy assumptioun glorius virgine mary ca ix fo xxxi phow sindry princis britane co spirand aganis aruiragus war discomfist confiderat kingis come support thir princis britane aganis ye romani ca x fo xxxi pof message send caratak plancius answer ye deith genissa uespasian send britane dant ye britonis ca xi fo xxxiii phow thre kingis albioun mouad weir aganis uespasian war discomfist uespasian ressauit aruiragus mercy maid landis tributar romane empire ca xii fo xxxiii phow uespasian wan town camelon discofist caratak ofh message send caratak caratak answer ca xiii fo xxxiiii phow caratak cumand new aganis romani vincust deith planci ostorius send place dantit britonis ca xiiii fo xxxv phow caratak fechtad new army aganis romani discomfist maid presoner ostorius treason cartumandia stepmoder ca xv fo xxxvi phow caratak brocht rome returnit scotland vncouth meruellis sene albioun sindry nobyl clerkis ye deith caratak ca xvi fo xxxvi table feird buke phow corbrede maid kig scottis pichtis rebellit aganis ye romani slew ostorius yair ca itane ca primo fo xxxvii phow manli valens capitane britane discofist ye picht didi send place message send picht corbrede answer ca ii fo xxxviii phow cartumandia quene scottis buryit quick ye scottis pichtis faucht aganis romani vncertane victory war co stranit tak peace deith didius ca iii fo xxxviii phow ueranius maid capitane britane deith swetonius successoure put ile man sak britonis maid new rebellion ye romani syndry prodigy meruellis sene abion ca iiii fo xxxix pof plaint maid uoada quene britonis corbrede message send cattus cattus answer ca vi fo xli pof sindry nobyl clerkis petir paule war martirit dardannus maid king scottis slane tyranny ca vii fo xlii phow mony romane capitanis thair febyll administration war intchangit britane galdus pecifyit al sedition amang pichtis faucht aganis romani discomfist ca xiii fo xlvii phow sindry almanis danis come support scottis pichtis ye romane nauy peryst petland firth ca xiiii fo xlviii phow agricola brocht army ouir tay galdus come defence pichtis xlm scottis orison maid exhort army battal ca xv fo xlviii pof orisoun maid agricola army huge victory falling romani discomfitour diuisioun amang thaym self ye huge victory gottyn thaym galdus ca xviii fo li phow ye romani war doung partis scotland syndry vincust vailyeant galdus ca xix fo li pof ye message send romani support britonis war discofist ca xiiii fo lxii pof gret cruelteis done seuerius empriour aganis noblis britane weris aganis scottis picht anthonius reparit wall adriane empriouris deith ca xv fo crist romak fethelmak angusiane contendit ye crown romak maid kig slane eft h tyrany ca xii fo lxxiii phow angusiane maid king scottis maximus subdewit ye britonis syndry victoryis scottis pichtis tyranny done cristin pepyll kyng oswald co uertit saxonis faith crist ca xx fo cxxv po vnhappy prophete machome e fals lawis syndry haly men kyng ferquhart extorsionis done aganis pepyll miserable end send princis ireland thair answer mony ireland men perist yes scottis ireland men war aggreit capi primo fo cxxxi phow king charlis send ambassatouris cofiderat scottis pichtis thair orisoun maid kyng achaius orison maid aganis thaym culmane ca ii fo cxxxii pof answer maid last orison albiane france scotland wer perpetuallie confiderat pichtis refusit confiderat france articlis contenand ye band betuix scotland france ca iii fo cxxxiii phow paip leo thrid florentinis wer restorit thair honour liberte kyng charlis sindry abbayis foundit scottis guilliam vniuersite paris began scottis louyng samyn ca iiii fo cxxxv phow scottis pychtis wer cofiderat mariage slew athelstane kyng ingland put army flycht king hu gu lawis liberte kirkmen deith kyng charlis king achaius sindry noble clerk capi v fo cxxxv pof kyng conuallus deith ca vi fo cxxxvi pof kyng dongallus punist certane conspiratouris alpyne prince scotlad clamit croun pichtis nerest heritoure thairto ye pichtis answer scottis concludit moue weir ye pichtis denying croun ca vii fo cxxxvii pof kyng alpyne slew feredech kyng pichtis brudus kenneth kyngis pychtis wer baith slane brudus ye feirs maid king kyng alpyne wes slane ye scottis discomfist capi viii fo cxxxviii phow kenneth secound wes maid kyng scottis deith brudus kyng pichtis donskene wes maid kig heid kyng alpyne wes brocht scotland pichtis wer discomfist ca ix fo cxxxix message send donskene keneth answer orison maid donskene kenneth answer ye pichtis wer discomfist king donskene slane ca x fo cxl phow swerd cote armour kyng donskene wer send colm kill orisoun maid kyng kenneth nobillis pychtis wer slane banist scotland dunbaris tuke thair beginning ca xi fo cxlii pof vncouth meruellis sene albioun chiar merbill wes brocht argyle scone lawis maid kenneth comoun weil scottis deith ca xii fo cxliii pof vicious kyng donald osbret ella gret noumer inglismen wes discomfist xxm scottis wer slane kyng donald tane inglismen britonis ye message send scottis osbret answer capi xiii fo cxliiii pof orison maid calenus scottis tuke peace inglismen britonis king donald wes put preson vicis slew hym self sindry meruellis sene albioun ca xiiii fo cxlv pof kyng constantyne secund lawis heuy regrait maid euanus ilis folkis said euanus wes punist rebellioun capi xv fo cxlvi phow gadanus kyng danis send two brethir hungar hubba gret armyis inuade scottis said hubba vincust army put flicht ca xvi fo cxlvii phow kyng constantine slane army discomfist danis ca xvii fo cxlviii pof king ethus actis osbret kyng ingland mony othir pepyll slane cruelte danis syndry meruellis sene albioun deith ethus ca xviii fo cxlviii pof king gregoure lawis recouerit syndry landis realme discomfist herd ut army danis rasyne gret capitane danis slane inglismen ca fo cxlix phow gregoure recouerit syndry la dis realme slew constantyne kyng brytonis scottis britonis inglismen war confiderat aganis danis ca xx fo cl phow kyng gregoure come ireland reuenge certane iniuris done galloway dantit samyn syndry victoryis gouernoure thairof mony yeris louyng deith ca xxi fo cli pof kyng donald sext realme normanis duchery flanderis tuke begynnyng gret cheuelrye danis syndry partis warld deith ca xxii fo clii pthe table leuynt buke pof kyng constantine thrid danys inglismen war confiderat mariage peace dissoluit scottis war discomfist ye danis deith kyng constantyne ca primo fo cliiii pof kyng malcolme first cumbir westmureland annexit prince scotland slauchter kyng malcolme punitioun tane samyn ye deith king athelstane ca ii fo clv pof kyng indulphe alassus kyng danis discomfist kyng edmond support scottis syndry danis war discomfist buchquhan king indulphe slane ca iii fo clv pof kynge duffus trublit gret infirmite wychecraft punist certane conspiratouris slane ca iiii fo clvi phow culyne prince scotland punist ye slauchter king duffus syndry meruellis sene albion ca v fo clvii pof kyng culyne vicius lyfe trubyll fell realme euyll ministratioun ca vi fo clviii pof kyng kenneth thrid gouernance orison maid nobyllis constranit thaym bryng syndry theuis iustice ca vii fo clix phow danis inuadyng scottis gret cruelteis war discomfist kyng kenneth hayis tuk thair first beginning armis ca viii fo clx phow kyng kenneth slew prince scotland sonne mycht succede crown message send sanct edward kyng kenneth kennethis orisoun maid nobyllis ca ix fo clxi phow auld lawis war abrogat kenneth concernyng el tioun kyngis new lawis co trar thaym institute visioun come hym bed deith ca x fo clxii pof kyng constantyne feird syndry meruellis sene albioun constantyne malcolme contendit crown inglismen danis war aggreit malcolme lord cumbir constantyne kenneth recounteryng othir set battall wer baith slane ca xi fo clxiii pof kyng gryme gret trubyll fell betuix hym malcolme prince cumbir contentioun crown thay war finaly aggreit ca xii fo clxiiii phow gret nowmer danis war slane slicht inglismen orisoun maid kyng gryme nobyllis slane malcolme prince cumbir ca xiii fo clxv pof kyng malcolme secound sueno kyng norroway double victory chasit king eldreid ingland opprest inglismen gret cruelteis ca xiiii fo clxvi phow olauus onetus come scotland gret army danis kyng malcolme discomfist ca xv fo clxvii phow castell narne tane soudiouris thairof treasonabylly slane danis danis war discomfist murthlak ca xvi fo clxviii phow camus prince noroway cumand ane flote danis angus slane army discomfist kyng malcolme barre surname keithis tuke thair begynnyng ca xvii fo clxviii phow v hundreth danis war slane thane buchquhane canute come new army danis scotland discomfist scottis danis war finaly aggreit debaitis ca xviii fo clxix phow kyng malcolme deuidit realme baronyis nobyllis gaif hym wardis releiffis mariage thair airis quhen thay vaikit sait abirdene first began deith kyng malcolme syndry meruellis sene albioun ca xix fo clxx table xii buke pof kyng duncane surname stewartis tuke thair first begynnyng makbeth punist syndry enormyteis done kyng duncanis tyme capi primo fo clxxi phow edmond irnesyde canute deuidit betuix thaym ye realme ingland sueno kyng norroway come scotland ane army vincust kyng duncane foresayd sueno eftir vincust ane vncouth slicht ca ii fo clxxi pof weirdis geuyn makbeth banquho makbeth maid thane cawder slew kyng duncane mak hym self kyng ca iii fo clxxii phow makbeth vsurpit ye croun chasit sonnis kyng duncane cumbir punist syndry lymmaris maid lawis commoun weill ca iiii fo clxxiii phow banquho slane makbeth sonne fleance slane walis walter sonne fleance come scotland genelogy stewartis ca v fo clxxiiii phow makbeth slew lordis proffet thair landis guddis byggit castell du ane slew makduffis wife barnis orison maid malcolme camore makduf ca vi fo clxxv phow malcolme camore schew hym self vnabyll kyng syndry vicis come scotland maid kyng thairof makbethis deith ca vii fo clxxvi pof deith edmond canute herald hardy canute kyngis ingland crown ingland trubyll certane yeris begynnyng regne conspiratioun principall baronis aganis hym bot last dantit thaym efter rong xxiiii yeris brocht subdittis gret traquillite peace slane roxburgh sklice ane gun brak ouirchargeing xvii day august yeir god imiiiiclx certane reasonable causis mouing w haue left history vnwrittin baith iames secund thrid feird quhill tyme mair ganand occur piames thrid son iames secound wes ciii king richt different fra chance fortoun fader gouernance realme began gret tranquillite peace iustice bot last conspiration maist part baronis aganis hym slane ye xi day iuny yeir god imiiiiclxxxviii piames ye fourt son iames ye thrid ye ciiii king realme mony yeris gret tranquillite equall ministration iustice throw al partis realme theift reif slauchter dantit seuerane iustice quhil last fortoun began inuy gret felicite causit hym moue weir aganis ingland ye action allanerly france yt micht battal draw king ingland france quhilk inuadyng tyme maist awfull dagerous weris come bordouris ane hundreth thousand armit men efter yt castell norame mony othir strenthis ye bordour ingland abaid xx dayis ony battall quhill two part army war skalit fra hym last ruscheand ouir feirsly ennymes ordour slane floddon mony nobyllis ix day september xxv yeir regne yeir god ane mvcxiii piames fift cv king scottis regnand gret felicite honour aboue w ye maist noble vailyeand prince yat euir rang afore tyme quhom god conserue grant grace perseuere iustice lang empire gud successioun body amen pheir endis namis kyngis pthe translatoure sayis buke thow marcyall buke pa nobyll prynce kyng iames fyft souerane maist preclare gif sum tyme thow gettis audience humyll wyse vnto grace declare walkrife nychtis lauboure sare quhilk ithandly he pleseir tak quhyll goldin tytan birnand chare he past signis yodiak pquhill besy cere hir pleuch harrois he fild hir graingis full euery corne stormy chiron bow arrois he cloudis heuynnis schorne schyll triton wyndy horne ouir quhemlit flowand occean phebus turnit vnder capricorne samyn greis quhare first began psen thow art drawin sa compendius fra flowand latyne vulgar prose schaw quhat princis bene maist vicius quhay he bene cheuelry rose quhay thair kingrik maist honour iois thair blud liberteis he coft regardyng nocht de amang thair fois sa thay mycht memory brocht pschaw quhat dangeir difficill wayis antecessouris thair vter mychtis he brocht realme honour dayis ay fechtand thair liberteis richtis romani danis inglismen pichtis curtas reders may throw thy proces ken thairfore thow ganis na catyue wichtis allanerly bot vnto nobyll men pand si personis couettis heir vailyeand dedis progenitouris cuntre baith peace weir bene gouernit vnto thir present houri forcy cheiftanis mony bl dy stouris blawin vulgar en maist vailyeandly wan landis honouris thair virtew call nobyll men pfor nobylnes sum tyme louyng cumis meritis eldaris gone aristotyll writis rethorikis amang nobillis quhay castin thaym repone mon dres thair life dedis one one mak thaym worthy haue memore honour thair prince nation glore thair posterite pane othir kynd thair nobylnes cumis infusion naturall makis ane man sa full gentylnes sa curtes plesand sa lyberall euery man doi hym ane nobyll call lyon sa nobyll men tellis rage aganis bestis small bot thaym quhilkis maieste rebellis pthe awfull chu le ane othir strynd houcht borne vilest seruitude thair may na gentrice sink mynd help freind nichtbour gud bludy wolf samyn stude fetis gret stis ragi small leiffis slauchter tyranny end blud ony mercy quhare may ouirthrall pthis man born ane nobyl thow wyll say geuyn sleuth lust immoderat eldaris wan puttis away fra thair virtew degenerat eldaris fame eleuat thair lyfe honour approche thair fame louyng ay interminat ay vnto vice reproche pamang oist grekis hard two knichtis war achylles tersete ane maist vailyeand othir maist coward better sayis iuuinall poete tersetis son hauand achylles sprete manly force purpos f lfyll lord euery land strete syne maist cowart cumyn achill pman callit ay maist nobyll creat becaus lyfe maist reason doi assay ay sekand honour esy cure na noble quhen honour away thairfore maist nobyll man thou say estatis vnder reuerence vailyeantly doith close latter day natyue cuntre deand defence pthe glore armis forcy dedis quhen thay ar worthy memoryall na le wyt manheid ay procedis plinius wrait story naturall ane herd hertis strong hauand ane lyon aganis houndis soure herd lyonis arrayit battall hauand ane hert thair gouernoure pquhen fers achilles paris slane amang grekis began ane subtell plede quhay maist nobyll prudent capitane place armour succede quhay couth thaym best euery dangeir lede saif thair honour afore vailyeant aiax wan manhede quhen wise ulisses bure away glore pmanhede prudence ane fury blynd bringis ane man schame indegence prudence manhede cumis oft behynd howbeit haue na le intelligence thingis cum gone sapience thairfore quhen wit manhede doith concurre hie honour risis magnificence glore noblis ane groundin spurre psen thow contenis mo vailyeand men wyse euir red ony buke dout gif ony churle velane dispyse byd hence hym harlot rout heir ar kingis mony nobillis stout nane thaym pertenand clan thou art full nobylnes per tout wald nane red bot ane nobyll man pthus nobyllis sen thow art dedicat schaw breifly gret deligence ilk story self seperat mak thaym bowsome thyne audience schrink nocht thairfore bot byde thy sentence sen thow art armit inuincible trewth gentyll reders take beniuolence cure otheris na inuy rewth ppas lycht thy sentence hie groundit feid assentatioun naturall morall philosophie mony graue prignant orisoun reders crud tioun renowmit hector boetius supportit oft scoticronicon make thy mater sententius pbring nobyll dedis mony yeris gone al fresche recent memorie thay war bot dayis done nobyll men may haue baith laud glorie thair excellent brut victorie yit becaus tyme he bene schort thynk quhen haue oportunite ring thair bell ane othir sort pleir kingis hait peple vitius na sic personis thair hous ressaue suffir na seruandis auaritius ouir scharp exactionis thair subditis craif done without thair honour saif sekand na conques vnlefull wanis schaw mony reasonis na king mycht haif baronis hartis thair geir atanis pschaw kingis life gouernance murrour leuyng peple bene luffis ordinance maneris ar peple sene thairfore kingis he na oppin rene vse pleseiris thaym lykis best hiear honour office thay sustene thair vice ay hiear manifest pschaw quhat kynd soundis musicall maist semand vailyeand cheueleris thondrand blast trumpat bellicall spretis men hardy curage steris syngyng fydlyng piping efferis men honour hye estate becaus spoutis swete venome thair eris makis thair myndis al effeminate pbe mony reasonis gret experience schaw na thing erd may gud precius ane virtuus prince quhilk nedefull realme hym he nocht bot deith pouerte schaw na gard armour may defend unhappy lyfe cursit tyranne gyf thay continew mischeuus end ppersuade kingis gif thay haue ony sycht lang empire honour singulare conques fauour luf euery wicht euery wrangis thair realme repare quhen thair subditis ar oppressit sare fyndis na iustice thair actionis risis nois rumour populare drawis noblis sindry factionis pschaw quhat punition reason iustice efferis thay vnhappy creaturis nurisis kingis corruppit vice schaw quhat truble quhat vengeance iniuris contynewaly realme enduris quhen men obscure auaritius he king gydyng thair curis makis nobyllis hym odius pschaw gret baronis thair euyll obeysance aganis thair prince makand rebellyon deieckit bene fra thair hie gouernance brocht finall extermynion schaw na hous gret dominion na men rich excellent mycht may lang continew region becaus pepyll may suffer hycht pschaw kirkis superflew rent ennyme gud religion makis preistis sleuthfull feruent pietuus werkis deuotion allanerly perdition commoun weill bullis sumptuus bot euyll prelatis gret occasion rage lust life maist vicius pschaw young knychtis suld men weir hardy sprete euery ieoperdie like thair eldaris bene sa mony yeir ay defend thair realme liberte thay thair sleuth cowartre fame honour thair eldaris tyne apprise ylk stait thair awin degre ay thay leif morall discipline pschaw furth ylk king quhill thow come prince regnis gret felicite quhais anciant blud hie preeminence decorit maist excellent gre without compare hie nobilite giftis mo nature hym geuyn gi nane abusit youtheid euir geuyn noble vnder heuyn pthocht thow pa furth bird implume lycht gratius eris werke implore quhare may se ane murrour bricht notable storyis baith vice glore quhilk neuir sene toung afore quhair throw may prudent gouernyng al weill honour realme decore ane virtuus ane noble king pfinis heir efter followis history croniklis scotland compilit newly correckit reuerend noble clerke maister hector boece channon aberdene translatit laitly maister iohne bellenden archedene murray channon ro command richt hie riche excellent noble prince iames v name king scottis imprentit edinburgh thomas dauidson dwellyng fornens f ere wynd pheir beginnis first buke croniklis scotland phovv gathelus first genitour left land grece come egipt mary scota dochter king pharo cumyng spanye capitulo primo efter maner othir pepyl ye scottis desyrand schaw thair beginning richt anciant schawis thame present historie discendi grekis egiptianis auld croniclis beris thair wes ane greik namyt gathelus sonne cec kyng athene otherwayis sonne argus kyng argiues gathelus insolence maid mony heirschippis macedone achaia quhilkis war certane landis grece becaus couth suffer ye correctioun freindis left natiue cuntre grece come egipt ane cumpany siclik young men fugitiuis wes fra thair cuntre tyme rang egipt pharo scurge pepyl israel quhais son follow faderis iniquite wes drownit eftir wt army ye reid seis punitioun god gathelus wes plesandly resauit egipt appecit cumpany support kyng pharo aganis ye moris pepyll nd quhilkis vnprouisit haisty incursionis wastit landis townis egipt memphis principall ciete realme thus pharo sene ane miserabyll rewyne realme war nocht changit gouernance empyre epipt industry moyses quhome command god army pharo wes comittit pharo supple gathelus wan ane maist dangerus battall agane moris brocht thame sa hie rewyne tuk thair principall ciete callit meroy gathelus ftir happy victory returnit egipt becaus wes ane lusty persone strang body greit spreit conquest baith fauour ye kyng familiaris plesand victory generit mair inuy tha glore moyses egiptianis hatit blud israell thairfore moyses knawing hatrent egyptiants persewyng hym ylk day deith fled egipt ynde saif lyfe gathelus victorius vailyeand dedis wes maid generall lieutenand kyng pharois army becaus wes ane lusty son semely blud riall grece prudent ingyne gat kyng pharois dochter namyt scota mariage part thay landis heritage quhilk laitlie war tane force battall fra pepyll israel thir causis ye grekis began reios seand thair capitane sic familiarite prince traistyng thairthrow sumtyme haue ane sicker dwellyng place egipt schort yeris eftir pharo deceissit eftir quhome succedit croun egipt sonne bochoris pharo quhilk opprest pepyll israell mair seruitude tyra ny dyd fader apperit thus na esperance liberte said pepill quhill moyses returnit furth ynd egipt schaw comand god bochoris pharo delyuering said pepyll seruitude eftir egipt wes punist vncouth plagis becaus thay held prophecy moyses de isioun thus war egiptianis sa astonist thay inquirit thair goddis remeid quhome wes ansuerit present plagis quhilkis rang amang thame ye yme war na thyng respect terrible greuous plagis quhilkis war appeirand cum haistely thame gathelus astonist respon seand pepyll presently tormentit sorrowful plagis tuk ferme purpos leif egipt rar assailye chance fortoun sum vthir dwellyng tha abide ye manifest vengeance goddis thairfore maid prouisioun thingis necessar saling come mouth nyle wyfe frendis seruandis grekis egiptianis feir said plagis yeir fra begynnyng warld iiimvicxliii eftir mekyll wylsum trauell seeis mediterane arriuit land numide quhare w stoppit inhabitantis land eftir pullit vp salis lang paneful trauell arriuit ane part spanye callit tha lusican quhylk wes eftir arryuyng thair callit portyngall say port gathele quhay may surely affirme ane mater sa greit antiquite gathelus sowpit lang trauell hauand na thyng refresche cumpany landit folkis seik vittallis vthir necessaris cumfort thayme eftir thair wery labour meyne tyme ye inhabitantis regioun gaderit aganis hym arrayit battal nochttheles thay war discumfist put flycht throw vyctory gathelus folkis grew esperance gud fortoun traisting eftir sa lang wylsum trauel put end thair labouris haue ane stabyll permanent abydyng said regioun eftir victory inhabitantis maid ane band peace gathelus assygnit hym certane ladis quhair suld haue dwelling tymes cuming chort time eftir bigg ane toun pon reuair munde quhylk wes callit tyme brathare bot callit bersale nochttheles inhabitantis dredand thir new pepyll oncouth blud suld incres haistely rich strenth beside thame wes penitent contract thame maid thairfor assistace thair nychbouris arrayit thame battall aganis gathelus first send certane armit men interrup thair biggynnis syne maid thame elf reddy cum staill gathelus weill aduertist battel mouit aganis hym micht suffer na delay arrayit folkis meit ennymes exhortyng thame vailyeantly thair liuis honour haue sicker esperance victory sen battell wes led thame quhylkis war victorius aganis thair vincust ennymes quh lkis na exercition knawlaige cheualry inhabitantis seand thir strangearis cum batell mychty curage spreit ane oncouth cuntray dred gyf thay war vincust said battell thay suld brocht perpetuall seruytude thairfor desirit gathelus ane comonyng quhilk thay gaif hym new appointment certane landis north part spanye callit galicia thay phecy ane strange pepyll suld cum sumtyme dwell thay boundis comandit hym pa pepyll sayd partis quhylkis suld brukit hym ony impedimentis tymes cumyng myttit gif ony pepyll hapnit inuade hym assist support phovv gathelus beildit ciete brygance namit pepyll scottis hovv send tvvo sonnis ireland decels ca ii band roborat maner forsayd gathelus maid sacrifice vse wes thay dayis goddis syne past north partis spanye thair amite confiderit inhabitantis thairof beildit ane toun callit compostella quhair resident princely dignite maid lawis caus subdittis lif togidder iustice efter callit pepyll sco ti affectioun wife callit scota quhome gat two sonnis hiber hemecus spanyeartis na thyng reiosyng brudy spreding scottis dred samyn sumtyme ryse thair displesour thus tuke thay ferme purpos bring scottis vter distructio gathelus knawyng weil thair ordinance brocht furth pepyl arrayit battel followit ane richt dangerus doutsum battell bot last vyctory succedi scottis nane thir parteis war glaid chance fell battell maist forcy vailyeat capitanis war slane athir side thus war thay costranit ilk side seik peace quhilk wes fynalie tre tit vnder thir coditionis baith thir pepyll tymes cumyng sal ceis thair weris euery ane thame sall lyfe thair awin lawis reios ye samyn landis impedimentis quhylk thay possedit afore last battel ony persecutioun throw quhilk hapnit ane certane thair pepyll proces tyme send efter ireland sicker peace thus standyng amang two pepyll gathelus sittand chiar merbyll within ciete brygance gouernit pepyll iustice chiar merbyl sic weird yt maid euery land quhair wes found natiue scottis thir versis schawis pthe scottis sall bruke realme natyue ground geif vveirdis fayll nocht quhair euir chiar found throw quhilk hapnit said chiar merbyll wes eftir brocht spanye ireland ireland thay partis albion quhilkis wer callit efter scotland chiar kingis scotland war ay crownit quhil ye tyme kyng robert bruse pin quhais tyme besyde mony othir cruelteis done kyng edward lang schankis sayd chiar merbyll wes taikin inglismen brocht scone london put westmonistar quhare remanis dayis gathel pepyl incres brygace mair multitude mycht sufficiently nurist thocht mair expedient bryng pepil sum othir part quhair thay mycht esely sustenit violat bad faith thairfore counsal prudent men send exploratouris spy gif ony landis war within occeane see quhilkis mycht bryng ane part pepill fame fornens spanye ye north wes ane ile inhabit wt rude pepill hauand na lawis maneris sic thingis knawing gathelus brocht schippis mycht get nixt port quhylkis put baith sonnis hiber hemecus marinaris w rmen othir thingis ne essare thairto comandit hiber admyrall pa said ile quhylk callit irland thir two sonnis gathelus pullit vp salis fortunat wyndis arriuit fift day efter said ile efter thay landit thair folkis thay affixit thair tentis ye nixt strethis rude pepyl ile astonist cumyng thir weirmen fled thair bestial guddis thair cau ni hiber efter cumyng send certane armyt men se quhat pepyll inhabit ile weirmen quhilkis war send effect hapnit cum apon sayd pepyll fleand said thair guddis auenture ane part thaym slew otheris brocht prisoneris thair admyrall hiber knawing syndry signis land plentuous commandit gif pepil wald plesandly subdewit na forthir inuasion maid thaym pepyl seand hym mercyfull ca drit thair self thair guddis ressauit thaym sic beniuolence sufferit thame incres pepyl vnder ane name lawis left broder gouerne thaym autorite iustice sic thyngis done maid sacrifice honour goddis send felicite pepyll syne returnit spanye leuand behind hym ane strang garison wiffis barnis inhabit land keip vnder obeysance brother hemecus hyber returnyng spanye fand fader gathelus deccissit efter quhais deith wes maid kyng began eik boundis empire wan sindry townis fra spanyeartis hauand hym tymis ane strang gard men quhais pissance cheualry dantit pepyll sic maner wes haldyn gret estimatioun reuerence amang sayd pepyll thus war thay constranit seik peace efter last band peace ye scottis grew spanye quhylk wes namit hiberia fra hiber sic amyte baith pepyll grew vnder ane name blude sic tender freindly beneuolence ony memoree auld iniuris ilk man set hym defend nichbour brothir fader baith weir peace hiber discendit lang progressioun ane gret posterite efter hym lynealy succedig amag quhom wer mony nobyll famous princis metellius hermoneus ptolomeus hibertus symon brek hovv hemecus gouernit irland hovv symon brekvves maid king efter deith ca iii quhill sic thyng war done spanye hemecus quhilk wes left said brothir hiber irelad gouernit ye gret felicite namit samin hibernia fra hiber quhilk callit langage ireland ile wes inhabit thay dayis two pepill scottis auld inhabitantis quhilkis war gottin sum auctouris sayis gyandis hemecus gouernyt baith thir pepill gret iustice hauand na le respect seissoun tyme occurrit maneris pepill vnder obeysance knawyng weil nathyng mycht bryng pepill sonar vnder ane freindschip band yan sic doyngis yit mycht neuir bryng thaym effect schort tyme eftir hemecus deceissit eftir quhais deth rais ane odious debait quha suld gouernour euery natioun contendyng haue lord thair awin blude quhill last thay creat two gouernouris betuix quhom rais continuall battall slauchtir athir syde throw ambitioun byrnand desyre gouernour sayd ile efter lang battallis thir two pepyl brokyn wt syndry displesour war costranyt tak peace howbeit schort tyme indurit ilk ane thaym persewyng othir battal yit thay dwelt mony yeris togiddir interchange weir peace quhill last scottis brokyn ylk day mair iniuris send thair abassatouris metelli quhilk wes ye tyme regnand aboue scottis spanye desiryng thair lametabill regrait haue support aganis ye auld inhabitantis ireland schawand thaym ane wyld pepill impacient suffir oncouth empire aboue thame throw quhilk ye scottis mycht haue na tranquilite without said pepill wer mair haistelie dantit message scotis ye mair acceptabili metellius yt concernit ye comoun weil baith scottis spanye ireland discending lang progression lynage blud king metellius nocht refusit thayr desyris traistyng samyn succeid na le honour glore hym self ye proffet freindis thairfore send thre sonnis hermone ptolomeus hibert ane army vailyeant men ireland quhair thay richt dangerus battal vincust auld inhabitantis said ile sic thyngis done ireland hermoneus eldest brodir returnit spanye leuand behynd hym two brethir ptolome hibert quhilkis gouernit pepill lad mony yeris eftir gret tranquillite iustice maid lawis efferyng ryte thay dayis instrukkit preistis mak sen sacrifice goddis ye maner egiptianis vsit thus incressit pepill mony yeris eftir gret felicite rich bot nature men ouir greit prosperite engeneris euil maneris causis men wirk frequent displesour thaym self quhe thay fynd na ennimes inuaid thaym hame thir pepil eftir lang peace war deuidit two opinionis cotendyng gouernance administratioun realme thir two partis vterlie distroit othir war thay war reconseld togiddir ane nobill man namyt thanaus principal man vnder kyng quhilk wes send afore ambassatour said ile reiosyng felicite succedyng frendis caus thaym prudet consultation incres togidder vnder mynd thanaus honest behauyngis hal yn amang thaym gret prudence hauand bot newtrall affection baith partyis persuadit thaym thair conuentioun remoue co tentionis risyng amang thaym cheis ane quho thay thocht maist expedient thair kyng obeysant hym thair gouernance na thing micht erd sa gud ane gud kyng throw persuasioun ye pepyll tuk sic feruent desyre haue ane kyng iniuris beand reparit thay comandit thana heis hym kyng quhom thocht maist expedient tha said thanaus knaw myndis sa deuidit syndry factionis na man participant thairwith may esaly kyng senyour myndis haue ane newtral person regne aboue yow thair spanye ane nobyll man gret seuerite iustice namit symon brek weill accustomit wt lawis lynealy cumyng metellius ancient progenitour quhais sonnis sumtyme nocht supportit yow quhan maist danger occurrit bot gouernit yow mony yeris efter gret tranquillite iustice quhais posterite yit remanis amang yow maist honouris think symon maist abyll kyng partyis herand name symon brek war glad haue hym kyng becaus ye name wes haldyn richt fortunat thay dayis pand ony lang tary thay send thair ambassatouris spanye caus symo cum ireland ressaue crown thairo symo knawing degest auysement entent thir ambassatouris prouydit ane flote schippis finaly sper windis arriuit ireland quhair wes solemply ressauit crownit ye chiar merbyll quhilk wes brocht spanye maist riche iowell thay dayis symon wes first kyng rang abou scottis ireland fra begynnyng warld iiiimvc iiii yeris fra flude noy iimcc viii fra begynnyng rome lx yeris fra empire brutus albion cccclxxii yeris incarnatioun god viclxxxxv yeris symon gouernit ireland gret sperite counsel namely thanaus quhome gaif syndry landis lyand south partis ireland beside ryuere birsus quhilkis landis ar callit dowdale quhair said thanaus dwelt efter pepyll brocht hym brigance famous ciete spanye thir pepyll war callit brigandis quhome efter proces tyme discendit mony nobyll vailyeant men quhilkis come efter fergus ye first kyng scottis albioun quhome thay landis scotland quhilkis ar callit galloway wes callit brygance quhais inhabitantis war fundin ay full manheid strangest ennymes romani brytonis fall efter heir symon gouernit ireland gud felicite deceissit fourty yeir regne pof gret posterite scottis regnand ireland efter symon brek first cumyng scottis pichtis albion hovv pichtis vvar alliat vvith scottis ca iiii symon deceissit said sonne fanduf wes maid kyng efter hym succedit ethione efter ethione succedit glauc efter glaucus succedit nathasyll efter nathasyll succedit rothesay rothesay wes first kyng send ony scottis ilis albion first ile inhabit callit rothesay fra name remanent ilis wer callit hebredes fra hiber eldest sonne gathelus rothesay herand deth fader nathasyll returnit ireland quhair generall vocis pepyll wes maid kyng yeir scottis wer brocht ireland albion fra ye empire symon brek ireland ccxvi yeris fra begynnyng warld iiiimvicxvii yeris scottis cumyng ireland maner spred syndry ilis albio lyand ye gret north thairof deuidit thaym syndry tribis first ile thay tuk possessyoun croniklis schawis wes nami ardgaell fra gathelus quhylk corruptioun langaige callit ardgile scottis deuidit maner syndry tribis chesit certane capitanis euery tribe gouerne thaym baith tyme weir peace hauand name thair capitane sic reuerence quhasa euir tuke samyn vane war na le punist thay manesworne thair goddis attour thay maid inuocation thairto quhe maist trubyll occurrit sum diuinite war samyn preserue thaym fra danger consuetude perseuerit mony yeris efter ilis nocht lang efter banist pepyll namit pichtis come furth denmark serche ane dwellyng place efter yt thay war ihibit land baith france brytane ireland thay landit albion sum authouris sayis thay come first orknay sone efter cathnes ro murray mernis angus fiffe louthiane expellit ye pepyll inhabit region afore thair cumyng thir pepyll war callit pichtis outhir thayr semely personis elli variant colour thair clethyng elli thay war namit pychtis fra pychtis namit agathirsanis thair anciant faderis probation heirof orknay wes callit auld realme pichtis siclike seeis betuix cathnes orknay war namit pentland fi h landis quhilkis ar callit louthiane war callit tha petland sum authouris sayis thir pichtis wer ye residew hunn banist flemyngis come first britane seik ane dwelling quhair thay sorrowfull battall lost humber thair king lot yne camber sonnis brutus quhilk began ye empire britane opinion plesant war nocht ye dait yeris descordant ye history brutus sonnis war mony yeris afore thair cumyng albion thir pichtis wrytis mony auld recent authouris quhom applaudis cornelius tacitus lyfe romane agricola quhare namis ye scottis cumyng spanyeartis pichtis almanis quhat sum euer natioun thay ben discendit treuth efter thair cumyng albion thay war ane ciuill pepyl richt ingenious crafty baith weir peace sone efter thair cumyng albion quhilk wes fra begynnyng warld iiiimviiiclxvii yeris creat ane kig gouerne thaym iustice began maik policy byggyng munitionis townis castellis becaus thay knew al pepyl successioun abyll perische thay send thair ambassatouris ye scottis desyring haue thair dochteris mariage schew thocht thay war oncouth blude thay suld nocht vilependit sen thay na le prudence tha manheid he ouirset incredibill dangeris baith see land laitly conquest throw beneuolence goddis richt plentuous landis sic peace tranquillite nane othir pepyll may clame thaym reason confiding surely gif ye goddis support thaym thair awin industry equall ony thair nychtbouris baith peace weir forthir gif scottis codiscendit thair honorabyll desyris mycht fall two pepyl incres togidder sa strang vnder ane blude thay mycht ye better resyst fury ennymes quhen euir hapnit thaym inuadit legatioun wes vnplesand first tyme scottis think vnworthy haue ony societe mariage ane vncouth banist pepyll yit degest auisement thay fand thair comoun weil wes nocht risyng sic pyssance yt thay mycht resist ye britonis quhilkis hatit thaym sen thair first begynnyng heirfor augment thair co moun weill maik thaym strag aganis ye britonis thay wer profoundly resoluit haue aliance ye pichtis gif thair dochteris mariage vndir thir condicionis ylk ane thaym sall reiose tyme cumyng al thay landis quhilkis thay reiosit afore mariage concurre togidder thair hale pyssance al oft thay war inuadit ennymes maid offence ony ane thaym sall reput ennymy thaym baith al oft croun pichtis come pley king chosyn nerrest womanis blude thir conditionis plesand sydis scottis gaif thair douchteris mariage pychtis phovv britonis thair quent slichtis dissoluit band allyance betuix scottis pichtis trubyll fell thairthrovv ca v britonis tuk na lytyl suspitioun mariage dredand gif thir two pepyll incressit togiddir vnder ane blude sa strang schort tyme nothir micht said britonis tyme present thair posterite sufficient resyst pyssance thir two pepyll thairfor tuke purpos distroy thaym baith inuade thaym erar fraudefull slychtis tha ony force battal bring thair purpos effect thay deuysyt ai sic seditioun betuix thir two pepyll ylkane thaym sall inuade othir battall fra ane war cleirly distroyit othir brokyn ye wetris micht facyl pray thaym pyit couir thair slychtis secretly thay supersedit thair intention thre yeris auyse gif ce tyme mycht gif ony better occasioun moue battall tyme affinite afore contrackit pichtis multiplyit ane brudy successioun quhairthrow two pepyl grew equal beneuolence pichtis geuand thair industry polecy labour thair handis settand thair ingyne beilde municiounis townis defence agmentation thair comoun weil scottis exerceyng thaym craft hunting halkyng nurising thair bestiall hauad na othir rich bot grew thair store war dayly clothit haberione mailye bow arrowis ythand exercition al reddy tymes defend thair lyuis landis liberteis thair ennymes war inuaid thaym set battal menetyme brytonis send thair ambassatouris ye pichtis hauand gret wounder quhy thay preferrit ye scottis thaym sen thay war ane pepyl full rich glore quhais famous cheualry wes knawin france almany othir syndry regionis seeis landis hauand ane riche realme repleit mynis mettall sa plentuous euery frutis necessar vse man yt thay mycht hie pleseir thair nychtbouris al weill weir peace contrar scottis war ane ondantit pepyll hauand rude wyld maneris ony humanite co fydyng mair thair fuliche audacite ony proues vertew dwelling amang strait barrant montanis reiosyng na thyng sa mekyll murdir men beistis attour thay prophecy pichtis suld extermynat vterly distroyit scottis without thay socht haisty remeid thir causis desirit thaim mak ane new band confideracioun britonis fyne ye scottis may outhir expellit albion elli brocht vter distruction quhilkis doingis thay mycht haue incredibill commodite reiosyng baith thair realmes ony feir tymes cumyng gif thaym prouocatioun attempt besynes thay myttit support thaym men money vitallis thair pleseir message credit pichtis afore ane vehemet suspitioun brudy spredyng scottis suld sumtyme fall hie da mage thair posterite al nathing mycht haue causyt thaym mair moue battall aganis scottis responsis thair goddis concurrand thair awin suspition last pichtis lang consultatioun answerit thay contrackit affinite scottis mair necessyte ony hartly frendschyp quhais corruppit maneris war richt vnplesand thaym nochttheles sic oportunite may cum proces tyme thay mycht haue sufficiet occasyon moue weir aganis scottis thay desyrit na thig mycht sa acceptabyll thaym amyte fallowschip brytonis prouydyng alwayis said britonis maid thaym sufficient help quhen tyme requirit aganis scottis sic besynes done occurrit tyme ambassatouris war dispeschit schort tyme eftir pichtis seikand oc asyoun moue battall aganis scottis comandit general edict na scottis found within ony townis ladis pichtis efter ane prefixit day vnder pane deth pichtis efter yt day wes ouir past slew scottis war found within thair townis munitionis roumes brekaris thair lawis scottis richt vnpacient sustene sa hie iniuris ceissit quhill thay slane al mony pichtis wer afore slane scottis incontinent haisty trubil risyng maner wes sa lametable murdir athir syde yt ylkane thame slew othir thair recountering regarding nothir affinite blude tyme place phovv pichtis scottis maid thair ordinance inuade othir battell hovv ferquhard kyng irland send sonne fergus vvith ane army support scottis aganis pichtis hovv said fergus vves maid kyng ca vi maner ye peace dissoluit pichtis denuncit battall scottis efter quhilk followit con inual icursionis athir syde attour euery thyng suld done erar consultatioun inmoderat hatrent pichtis prouidit al thingis necessar battell quhat wise quhat capitanis suld led quhidder thay suld abide ye cumyng thair enymes inuade thame within thair awin rowmis tyme scottis couenit argyle quhair capitanes war deuidit sindry opinionis concerning battell sum accusyng tresonable slichtis pichtis desyrit pa thame haistely wrangus manesworne pepyll brekaris thair fayth quhais iniure wes sa importabyll micht suffer na delay otheris thocht expedient sen ye mater wes wechty inuade thair ennymes hyd slychtis gud ordour mene tyme rais vp ane agit man sayd maner knaw weill hartly frendis iniure pichtis sa intollerabyll odius suld rusche haistely harnes reuenge ye nochttheles besynes bene weill done yt procedis gud auisement sen ireaualis nocht strenth knaw weill battell ye intende moue sall na le aganis brytonis pichtis howbeit ye haue nocht craft cheuelry pissance resist thame baith thir causis thinke na besines sa profitable send ambassatouris aunciant progenitouris ireland haue thair support maist dagerus cais forther sen pluralite capitanis oft occurris rasis seditioun best chese ane amag w haue empire aboue laif quhais cousel sall fecht lyuis liberteis aganis ane fals manesworne pepyl quhilk he inuadit w ony occasyoun iniuris last opinioun wes maist apprisit scottis sone efter send thair ambassatouris ireland complenand ye wickit offence done pichtis desiring support ferquhard quhilk wes tyme kyng scottis ireland sore mouit displesure done frendis scottis albion send sonne fergus ane wyse vailyeant prince thair support gyue thame esperance permanent sonse weird send thame fatale chiar marbyll fergus wes plesandly ressauit scottis yt thair comoun weil wes approchand hie dagear ane maist perellus battall efter cumyng ane counsell wes set argyle quhylk fergus said wyse maist vailyeant pepyll ye se ane cumpany nobyll men ye desyrit cumyng regioun resyst fury ennymes faderis ar sa reuthfull thair chyldrin nane offece may done thair said childrin bot returnis thair dishonour schame ar dettit faderis thair chyldrin schaw thairfor oure chyldrin sall schaw w faderis lat ane iniure commoun w baith sen ar coniunit togydder blud amyte glore honour may redound w proffyte vnto yow yit ane thyng bene necessar auyse quhidder ye empire ane mony mair proffitabill comoun weill quhilk thame ye think maist proffitabill sall plesand w sen fauoure beneuolence goddis ar happely arriuit regioun cumyng syngulare weill support counsel efter orison fergus thocht pluralyte capitanis vnproffitabill thairfor degest consultatioun condiscendit gouernit empire ane kyng kyng haue empire thame al weill peace euery trubyl appering aganis thair ennymes attour remoue suspitioun hatrent becaus ylk tribe desyryt ane kyng thair awin lynnage thay chesit fergus baith nobyll blude othir excellent virtuous thair kyng attour wes sa prouyn manheid iustice na capitane tribis mycht comparit hym fergus chosyn kyng maner wes crownit fatale chiar merbyl quhilk brocht hym respons goddis stabyll realme albion wes ye first kyng rang aboue scottis ye regioun fra begynnyng ye warld iiiimviiiclxix yeris afore incarnatioun god cccxxx yeris fra begynnyng rome ccccxx fra impire brutis brytane viiicxxxvii yeris phovv kyng fergus come vvith gret ordinance aganis pichtis hovv dessait britonis vves discouerit baith scottis pichtis ori maid fergus kyng pichtis ca vii scottis rysyng maner haue schawin albioun kyng fergus gaue hole mynd attendance resyst iniure battall mouit pichtis efter callit al capitanis afore hym comandit euery ane thame reddy pa hym wt careage hors fourty dayis vitallis becaus knew na thyng mair odius seditioun amang weirme maid afald concord amang pepyll comandit thame obeysant thair capitanis sic ordour none thame wauer fra thair fallois aue ture thay fall pray thair ennymes sic thyngis done maid sacrifice honoure goddis according ye vse wes thay dayis praying goddis take vengeance ye party gaif first occasyoun battall aganis othir grant hym sic felicite iust defence ye victory may succede hym heuy dammage pepyll quhill scottis war thair besynes pichtis assemblit ane army na litill gareson brytonis concurrant thair support apperit athir syde ane wickit vnnaturall bergane betuix two pepyl freindis cietezouris faderis sonnis pichtis come first ye scottis ladis aganis quhome wt na le curage tha manheid went fergus wt anciant armis displayit forme baner quhilk wes ane reid lyoun rampand ane feild gold thunderand steir awfully dyngand bak gise gentyll lyoun quhen enforsis hym wrayth fergus wes first bure thir armis albion efter hym thay war ay armes kyngis discendyng lynnaige dayis quhyll scottis pichtis wer ar ayit otheris sycht army brytonis stude arrayit dreich nocht far fra thame deuisand quhat slychtis thay micht distroy thame baith ferme purpos quhen scottis pichtis wer ionit togidder ta e thame discomfist tha party vyctorius suld finaly distroit thair f esche army quhen thir two pepyll war distroyit slicht ye britonis mycht reiose baith thair realmes albion ony feir tymes cumyng subtel slicht wes discouerit fergus ane banist briton throw quhilk hapnit baith ye armyis mouit na le feir ennymes thair awin propir dammage supersedi battall certane dayis meyne tyme kyng fergus desyrit ane comonyng kyng pychtis apon hi materis concernyng na le weill pychtis scottis kyng pichtis refusit nocht co monyng met kyng fergus ane cumpany nobillis oistis standing ylk syde arrayit sayd fergus maner poftymes riche townis nd pepyll contendyng su eriorite he brocht thaym self rewyne thair ennymes hie co moditeis quhilk thingis nocht faill cum w gif happin fecht day occasion battell quhylk ye mouit first aganis w desyris nocht tyme discussit lauchfull iniust howbeit scottis he sustenit pepyll importabyll iniuris ony redres yit gif leful erar schaw verite ony flurisand wourdis desyre kyngdowme slicht britonis he mouit yow battall ye wald neuir haue inuadit w faderis war nocht britonis oure commoun ennymes he deuisyt quent slichtis baith mischeiffis quhidder thir thyngis trew fals ye may best discus howbeit na reasone may perswaid beleif ony othir bot battall sal cum gif cotinew irrecouerable dammage w baith gif fecht quha doutis b victory sall vncertane ar equal pissace suppone vicust quhilk may nocht succeid vndemus murdir yow sall ye ane facyll pray enymes bryngand thaym tryumphe honour self misire seruitude quhat thyng may odius detestabyll sonnis inuade thair faderis faderis ye sonnis sonnis nepotis quhidder vincus victorious ye sall defoull self maist terribyll offence aganis goddis heirfor lat w commoun peace nychtbouris freindis alliat togidder co sider quhat infinite dammage battall sall w quhat commodite commoun ennymes gyf ony iniure done scottis pepyll sall redressit fyne quhilkis ar ane proximite blude may euade quent slychtis deuisit brytonis baith dammage inuade ennymes ye samyn tressoun thay deuysit w reason iustice may seme mair pyssant amang w tha hatrent inuy beleif na othir way sa souir stabyll pepyll ile albion pof syndry consultationis maid pichtis hovv thay vvar recounseld vvith scottis ca viii king pichtis aswerit thir wordis fergus mycht nocht priuate autorite dissolue thigis done publyk counsell nobyllis battall mouit wes decernit publyk nocht priuate counsell nochttheles wald glaidly auyse nobillis quhidder thay wald haif weir peace sal conuene place thair mynd al sone baith ye kyngis returnit thair tentis kyng pychtis rehersit wourdis fergus afore counsell schew day behuuit thaym nocht haue fochtin aganis ye scottis bot aganis tressoun britonis verify entent brocht certane britonis testimoniall thairof attour inoportune sollicitation brytonis desyryng battal aganis scottis maid slycht credibill pichtis pichtis auysyng vnprudently mater war deuidit two opinionis sum allegit amyte scottis wes refusit thay haue persewit pichtis sa mony slauchteris reiffis may nocht dewly redressit heirfor thair alliance al thair condicionis peace aucht co temnit sic thyngis may nocht indure quhare reif iniure hatrent ar estemit faith reason iustice otheris said amyte scottis wes baith honest necessare becaus thay mony pleseiris afor pichtis mouit na battall quhil thay war first iniurit sen britonis war comon enymes baith scottis pichtis force thaym reconseld elli schafully doug albio attour affinite blude rysyng betuix thaym suld put end thair weris sen na thyng detestabyll goddis abhominabyl mortal creaturis tha thay pepil moue battall aganis othir quhilkis ar alliat vnder ane comixtioun blude thairfor apperit na thing sa gud pychtis haue freindschyp scottis le thay purposit rendir falset hatrent euyl dedis faith luf gud thankis efter mony pichtis war geuin peace ane pichtis ennemy scottis becaus broder wes slane last battall said wise blind contentioun rysyng amang yow maist vailyeant men haue ye nocht sufficient experience falset cruelte scotti delite ye ony forther assailye gif ony band may kepit vnfaithfull pepyll full fers ingyne cruelte borne vter mischeif beleif ye respons goddis vane suld nuris pestile cius vennome fynall perdicioun baith w realme bludy tressonabyll pepyll gif goddis schawis verite sall nocht fail rais amang w ane flame sall neuir sloknit wickit man answerit ane othir picht said ye suld nocht mouit respons goddis gif thay determit verite thay may nocht eschewit gyf thay fals thay suld nocht dred heirfor iniuris done ony slicht tressoun athir partus suld remouit saif oure honestee lat neuir oure aith band brokin oure defalt becaus haue sufficient experience dayis quhat notabyll vengeance bene takyn apon mony nobyl vailyeant campionis quhen thay nocht thair faith goddis reuerence lat w returne band scottis sen ye may nothir dissoluit offence goddis yit incredibill scham sa may perseuere kyndnes offence othir ye inmortall goddis tender freindis al nature moder euery thyng constranis w luffe faderis thay luffe barnis thair nepotis nocht necessar thairfor haue ony battal bot erar luffe freindis nocht derisioun ennymes al sone thir wordis war said wyffis pychtis quhilkis followit army luffe thair husbadis fell kneis ruthfull teris praying thair husbandis violat nocht thaym self schamful slauchter thair faderis better w barnis said thay de ony maner deith se faderis husbandis slaand othir cruell wondis pychtis mouit sum part luffe thair wiffis barnis sum part reuerence thair godis condiscendit haue peace scottis vnder thir coditionis redres maid ylk syde brytonis quhilkis wer mouaris battall sall haldyn ennymes baith pepyl chargis pleseir two kyngis quhidder thay list strength peace vnder auld conditionis new gyf thir conditionis war nocht sufficient roborat peace quhat conditionis two princis thocht maist ganand sone eftir ane day set renewe peace brytonis quhilkis come support pichtis heirand concord returnit hame dredand ye samyn succede thair lytyll proffet day affixit scottis pichtis war agreit al debatis efter tenour ye auld band thir new conditionis ilk ane thir two pepyl sal leif content thair awin rowmes supportyng othir al weill honour profit quhen hie difficil chargis occurris aganis thair ennymes iniuris done ony ane thaym sal reput commoun thaym baith quhen wes necessar thaym fecht aganis thair ennymes baith pepyll sall conuene togidder vnder ane mynd ordinace peace beand roborat maner bait kyngis returnit hame phovv coyll kyng britoni vvas slane army discomfist scottis pichtis ca ix coyll kyng brytonis herand york scottis pichtis confyderat maner foresaid richt sorrowfull dred thir two pepyl incres sum tyme hie displeseir astonist heirof nocht knawing quhat ingine micht distroy thaym baith slychtis afore come lytyll effect tuke ferme purpos haue experience gyf scottis quhome held ane vagabound banist pepyll vncouth blude strang murdir bestis durst fecht aganis pepyll full glore cheualry yit supersedit mater two yeris se gif ony prowd insolence mycht gener new deuisyoun amang thaym quhairthrow mycht fynd sum better occasioun inuaid thaym battall vnder stude na sickir tranquillite peace mycht amang pepyll duryng fallowschip scottis pychtis vnder ane concord blude heirfor rais sum occasioun battal betuix thir two pepyl send ane cumpany brytonis nowmer inuade bordouris pichtis frequent heirschippis quhen reason trewis desyrit pichtis reparit britonis schew thaym neuir accustumate sic corruppit de thyft said wes done scottis allanerly last ye ground slycht serchit brocht lycht ye prouyn cleirly ye brytonis throw quhilk two confiderat pepyll tuke syk hatrent aganis said brytonis yt efter incredibyll slauchter thair pepyl thay inuadit thair realme brocht ane multitude bestyall samyn pkyng coyll impacient suffer outraige maid hym wirk thyng force armes quhilk micht afore slycht ingyne assemblit sone efter ane huge nowmer pepil gret ordinance battall entrit west bordouris scotland affixit tentis ryuer dune inuadyng countre continuall heirschyppis fyre slauchter fergus weill aduertist thair doingis comandit bestiall guddis dreuyn ye motanis thaym comandit ye wiffis barnis febyll creatouris pa ye strenthis ye said montanis eschew ye fury ennymes sic thyngis done comandit general proclamationis al fensabyl reddy thayr best auyse resist thair enymes howbeit desyrit na thing mair prolong battal yt lang tary penurite vittallis ennymes mycht wery irkit mene tyme ane scot tresonabilly fled kyng coyll discouerit hym euery thyng deuysit kyng fergus incontinent kyng coyll send v britonis take said pray bestyall fra montanis mycht vntraist suddante cruelte exerce maid army reddy inuade scottis ye nixt morrow sic thyngis schawin scottis pychtis thair scurriouris apperit na lytyll affray thair army fergus tuke consultatioun nobillis quhat best done mony thaym astonist multitude curage brytonis dissentit battall utheris exhortit hym thairto saying thay war ane sufficient army determit fecht defence thair wiffis barnis lyberteis deith sa wald assist thaym attour wes na le necessar honorabyll assail e chance battall victory gottyn erar manheid prudence ony multitude pepyll efter dyuers opinionis concludit ye fergus folkis first vigill sall set wache brytonis ye kyng pichtis folk sal pa ouir ye watter dune quhare army britonis lay cu haistely thair bakkis al sone thay heir nois ryis scottis sic thyngis done manheid prudence submit resydew chance fortoun samyn aycht fergus deuisit slew gret ieoperdy wache britonis nocht braik thair trinschis bot enterit fersly within thair tentis afore king coyll aduert st cumyng incotinent rais ane terribyll clamour amang britonis fast raschand harnes resist haisty effray quhen suddanly pichtis come thair backis suspekand na thyng le sic irruptioun ennymes britonis nocht weill walkinit thair sleip war inuadit al sydis discomfist thay mycht cum array amang quhome kyng coyll vnwarly kepit nobillis slane memory heirof ye place quhare slane namit efter coyll quhilk regioun remanis yit vnder ye name lytyll different thairfra callit kyle pof king fergus oriso nobillis hovv croun scotland vvas tailyet hym successouris ca x efter victory scottis pichtis displayit baner conuenit ane lytyll mote resydew brytonis quhilkis war eschapit fra battall thair eyng vnder nycht herand thair kyng slane thair army discomfist send ane herald desyre peace scottis pichtis insolent efter vyctory afore rebutit britonis denyit peace nochttheles two kyngis quhilkis knew weill gret pissance britonis codiscendit thair peticionis quhen pray spulye battall equaly deuydit amang ye two pepil efferyng thair manheid prowes two kyng returnit hame sone efter fergus couenit nobillis argyle said wyse ye se maist vailyeant ca pionis ye speciall fauour goddis he vincust ennymes brocht landis wysdome manheid sickir peace thocht ye war vnequale baith nowmer pissance yit goddis he bene sa propiciant ye ye haue vincust ennymes quhome ye maist dred erd ye haue put noysum ennyme al army ar richit thair spulye thay contemnit yow afore febyll banyst vnarmit pepyll he reuthfully desyrit peace mair necessar honest thaym ane notabyl exampyll tymis cumyng vnsycker confyde ony vane pissance man knaw weill riche pissant ar brytonis baith see land riche thay ar schame redou dis thaym glore w sen thay vincust w quhome thay held maist vyle febyll haue vsit victory ony cruelteis haue vincust ire fyne goddis quhilkis he geuyn w sa prowd victory sall nocht fynd peruerst insolence ony occasyon bring w sum othir tyme derisioun ennymes sen nocht exercit hattent thir dyscomfist brytonis fleyng oure fury dirknes nycht bot sufferit thaym depart mercy peace thus may euydently se wiffis barnis liberteis landis quhilkis ennymes intendit haue bereft w ar saiffit allanerly fauour goddis restis auyse prudent cosultation may eschew dangier apperyng tymes cumyng quhylkis thyngis sall succede better gyf haue goddis reuerence kepand band pychtis britonis promyttit continewyng realme samyn gouernance ye deuysit first cumyng prouydyng wayis remoue seditioun scurrilite auaricius leuyng sic thyngis may induce hatrent amang yow forthir maik ylk persone leif awin war best part landis regioun generall consent swa euery ane w content awin may haue na occasioun iniure nychtbour sic thyngis sall caus w incres glore honour oure freindis dredour fayis wald god mycht se yow deir pepyll rysyng sic vertew afore deid mycht syckir esperance schaw eldaris weil apperyng thair posterite pquhen fergus endit orisoun pepyll schew thaym reddy fulfyll desyre neuir gouernit tymes cumyng bot empyre ane kyng nane regne aboue thaym bot kyng fergus blude failyeing thairof prayit ye goddis send na le vengeance thaym thair posterite fel sumtyme thaim egipt spanye transgressioun comand goddis kyng fergus gat charter euydence crown scotland hym successouris sort quhilkis charteris war grauyn merbyll ymagis beistis forme letteris vsit thay dayis syne gaif samin maist religious preistis obseruit thair tempillis phovv kyng fergus partit landis scotland amang nobyllis realme maneris brigandis ca xi schort tyme eft quhe scottis refreschit thaym huntyng othir exercitionis kyng fergus couenit nobyllis said maner tyme maist prudent faderis sen oure realme stablit gud peace part landis realme quhylk ye reiose ordour amang yow otheris come ireland regyoun pto plesandly ar chosyn vii newtrall men amang w quhilkis sall deuyde realme sic reasone prudence quhare ladis ar maist pletuous salbe geuyn ye le quhare ye samyn ar barrant geuin pepyl well applesit counsell chesit seuyn prudent men quhilkis cosiderit boundis scotland deuydit samyn marchis equally refering thairto thir prudent men returnit fourt moneth efter argyle quhare kyng fergus resydent ye tyme quhais presence ye landis scotland war cassin cauyll amang nobyllis thairof first cauyll fell cornath capitane tribe landis cathnes lyand fornens orknay betuix dummysbe watter thane secundly capitane lutork fel landis betuix watter thane ne callit ro lutork come ane band vailyeant men ireland kyng fergus albion land ro lyis breid fra cromarte mouth watter lochte countre famous castel urquhart quhilk rewinous wallis remanis yit gret admiratioun pepyll thridly capitane warroch fell landis lyand betuix spay ne fra ye almane ireland seis pepil land war callit ware name thair capitane bot sone efter thay war sa sedicious thay war doung countre murrayis brocht thair rowmis quhom ye landis war callit murray land nixt cauyl fell capitane thalis landis boyne aynye bogewall gariot formartyne bowquhan thir landis war callit vndir ane name thalia name thair capitane nixt cauyl fell capitane martach landis marre badeyenoch lochquhaber vi cauel fell capitane nouace landis lor e kyntter hillis montanis thairof lyand fra marre ireland seis ye vii cauell fell atholus landis athole discendit scottis spanye come spanye ireland ireland come fergus scotland ane vailyeant man weill prouyn fatis armis ye viii cauill fel creones epidithis two capitanis tribis landis strabrawn braidawane lyand west fra dunkeld nynt cauyll fell capitane argathelus landis argile folkis war namit argathelis fra gathel thair first progenitour bot thay ar callit men argyle x cauyl fel capitane lolgonas landis linnox clidisdail xi cauyll fell capitane silurch landis siluria quhilk regioun deuydit kyle carrik cunynghame quhais pepyl war rycht engenius fers xii cauyll fell brigandis landis brigance callit galloway thir brygandis war ane vailyeant pepyll war deuysit thairfor dwell neir ye britonis resist thair incursionis gif ony occurrit ane certane thir brigandis wes banist efter thair seditiois fechting quhilkis confiderat thaym ane cumpany pichtis outrageous wickit lymmeris thay war inhabit thay landis quhilkis ar callit annandale put brytonis quhais posterite grew sa full fury thay inuadit thair nychtbouris maner cruelteis pthe wemen past thair husbandis battall fauche mair cruelly dyd men hauand na mercy quhare thay war vyctorius thay eschamit takyn battall reiosit de fechtand quhen thay saw thair freindis vexit lang irrecouerabyll malideis yt thay sall nocht de thair bed thay slew thaym swerd land annandale he ane strait entres circulit euery syde outhir seis mossis synkand sandis throw quhais difficill enteres hapnit yt inhabitantis thairof dwelt cauernis leuand thair incursionis thyft regardyng nouthir empyre scottis pychtis britonis cotinual wachis al weil nicht day al sone thai war aduertist ony iuasouris thay drew thaym pertly thair wappinnis sic maner quha abstenit cowartly absentit thaym quhen sic chargis occurrit efter slane thair wiffis thair returnyng thay sufferit thaym self taikin prisoneris war haldyn ay sklauis thair wyffis quhill thay sum honest wassalege recouerit thair honour thair wiffis war commoun barne wes haldyn son quhome maist like vissage al othir boundis scotland war pychtis handis meirnis angus steremond gowry stratherne perth fiffe striueling callender calderwod louthiane mers teuedale othir remanent dailis scherefdome berwik phovv king fergus maid concord betuix princis ireland hovv perist returnand ireland seis ca xii quhen fergus deuidit landis scotland maner brocht sicker peace tuke ferme purpos nuris pepyll gud maneris thyngis better began iustice quhylk na pepyll may leif togidder maid sic lawis punis theft slauchter bestiall gudis scotland war saiffit feildis ony trubyll efter
