beildit castel berigone lochquhaber castell standis west part scotland fornent ilis quhare exercit lawis fyne pepyl micht drawin thair esaly exercitioun iustice past remanent dayis tranquillite peace nichtbouris britonis pichtis geuand ingyne caus pepyll incres togidder vnder ane beneuolence concord quhyll last chosyn ane iuge arbitrall discus certane hie debatis fallyng amang freindis ireland psone efter said fergus accumpanyit ane certane nobillis past ireland pacyfyit thaym deba ti wes last act dyd pfor efter agreance nobyll prince returnyng hame throw ireland seis ane wickit tempest dreuyn apon ane crag quhare perist nobyllis xxv yere regne pin quhais memory crag quhare perist namit yit crag fergus pin tyme rang esdaill kyng britonis cruthneus cameloun kyng pychtis quhylk byggyt efter apon watter carron ciete camelon ye princypall chymmes pichtis quhare sumtyme wes ane gud hauyn ressaue schippis contrar ye wynter stormes thocht alterit necligence pepyll turnit ane medo ciete camelon resistit mony yeris efter britonis romani quhyll last kynneth kyng scottis quhilk put pichtis albion brocht vter subuersioun cruthneus biggit town castell edinburgh namit sumtyme madyn castell al ye nobyl weme pichtis war nurist within castell crafty labouris thair handis quhil thay war reddy mary pand sa endis heir first buke thir croniklis quhilk haue sene scottis first began ferg first kyng ye brocht iustice lawis amang thaym pnow wyll schaw residew ye kyngis succedyng efter hym ordour thay rang heir begynnis secund buke thir croniklis scotland hovv scottis efter kyng fergus deith contendit crovvn hovv vvas inhibit young childrin sall kyngis ca fergus maner perist ane day set counsel cheis king quhen day cumyn nobillis war deuidit syndry opinionis fergus two sonnis young tender age sum men thocht wes ane odius thing baith god man defraude ayris kyng ferg thay beand pupillis thair faderis heritage puttyng hous sic vter dishonour skaith tyme sa mony nobyll actis thair commoun weill otheris said young barnis war vnabyll ony publik administratio ane king suid ane prudent man hauand wisdome maheid baith resist ye fury enymes punis trespassouris auctorite iustice othir wayis na pepyll mycht leif togidder fame ane nobyll prince ane grete firmance realme answerit sembathis capitane argyle maner following pnane amang yow gud freindis nocht mouit mony reasonis defend barnis fergus sen incredibyll luffe brocht w extreme neid ane strang army quhilk nocht allanerly delyuerit w maist dangerus battal bot maid ennymes freindis land ane realme decorit w wt honest lawis he nocht dantit pissant britonis ane pepyll full rich cheualry put thaym baith boudis scottis pichtis geuand w sic institutionis may leif otheris nichtbouris feir ennymes gif haue na discentioun amang self quha sall thynk w worthy haue kyndnes gyf defraude thir barnis iust heritage quhat displeseir sal ennymes gif sic importabyl schame prince lat ferg goyst knaw w gud luffaris vertew vnmyndful gud dedis ye mynd left w posterite ressaue eldyst sonne crown gif ye haue ony respect faith gyf ye ony fauour hym duryng lyf wayis ye sall odius immortall goddis men pepyll war sum part mouit thir wourdis frauchtaus chiftane brygandis said maner se yow belouit freindis contendyng heir quhithir expedient haue ferg youg sonne vnabyl regne minorite ane othir prudent man kyng thynk sembathis mynd suld louit gyf na thyng bot kyndnes suld considerit electioun ane prince nane misknawis amang odius detestabyll defraude kyng fergus sonnis thair kyndly heritage na sic cruelteis beleif myndis occurris nocht tyme decerne gyf fergus sonnis suld immediatly succeid bot se crown may kepit hale thair perfyte aige quhat vengeance skaith dammage sall fall w commoun weill gif accordyng sebathis mynd suffer ane barne kig first sall ryse amang w ane byrnand occasion hatrent thair mony amang w equall othir power rentis attoure empyre gouernance realme duryng young kyngis mynorite sall geuyn ane w gouernis realme duryng ye kyngis mynorite sall kyng tyme honorit amang w auctorite reuerence euery honoris efferis princely estait quhay wyll nocht besely contend honour suppone ane w obtene office sall kyng ye tyme sal riche awin hous al oft ony thyng occurris done co mon weill ambassatouris gret realmis rewardit armyis send apon fayis man regnis duryng kyngis mynorite sall conuert hym gudis sall constranit gyf hym substance man nuris ane auaritius cumpany lymmers hym nothir weil king realme ane thing haue na admiratioun ane man plesant sa lang priuat howbeit alter maneris quhen clothit publik auctorite gud fortoun gud maneris ar seildin grantit ani leuand creatouris fynally quhen young kyng cumyn age xiiii yeris takis hym gouernance realme wyl accumpanyit suspitious pepyll maik hym repair al wrangis done liegis within tender aige al sic besynes requirit commoun weill howbeit nathyng ye tyme laik wysdome quhen he maist neid wise counsalouris sal suffir nane hym bot thay wyll assist vice sal thay corruppit rutouris mynyons salut kyngis haldyn reuerence amang w nochtwithstandyng thair insaciabyll auarice schame quhay sall haue ye curage spreit punis thaym feit insolent price forthir behald ane youg prince regnand aboue ony realme siclike quhay wald se commoun weill sweyand sall haue theiffis oppressouris takand oure gudis baith burgh land without punytioun laik iustice sall ythand slauchteris realme deuidit pepyll bridyl gouernance may nocht leif fayth iustice thairfore said ye wyse salomon uengeance sorrow sall pepyll haue he ane younge kyng thir reasonis thynk barnis fergus suld geuyn wyse preceptouris lerne lawis gud hauyngis maneris thay may abyll efter gouerne realme gouernance realme geuyn rithais thair eme ony othir yll man quhome ye thynk expedi nt quhais auctorite crown sall remane reddy geuyn thaym thair parfite age al sone kyng deys thir barnis succede immediatly crown gyf thay abyll thairfore duryng kyngis lyf thay sall honorit immediat successouris ye crown efter kingis deth way ye may saif barnis ferg vndefraudit thair kyndly heritage gyf desyre eschew ye sprout sedicioun innomerabyll inconuenientis efter followyng gyf desyre baith defend self bryng commoun weil proffet electioun princis suld obseruit conforme ye mynd fergus quhilk duryng lyffe wald neuir haue socht ony syngulare proffet dammage commoun weill quhen ferithais endit orisoun ye counsall assentit haill opinionis plane consent parliament maid actis quhen hapnit thair kyng deceis leuand behynd hym young child gottin body nerrest kyngis blude ablest iustice sall reiose crown tyme efter deith kyngis son sal succeid crown pley gyf war abyll thairto defendit samyn act na barnis kyngis consuetude kepit mony yeris efter throw quhylk rais mekyll troubyll realme oft tymis fader brother regnand ye minorite neuo kest extreme desynes distroy hym siclik neuo fader brother ambitioun crown throw quhilk occurrit cotinual slauchteris kyngis nobyllis gret trubyll realme dammage commoun weill pof kyng ferithais deith ca ii thir actis afore rehersit ferithais brother kyng ferg chosyn kyng prince efter electioun maid ane orisoun nobyllis effect thairof yt wald nocht ressaue crown rich ambition dignite bot support neuois quhill ane thaym war abyll succeid becaus left tutour testamenter thair fader wald leif na thyng vndone mycht auance commoun weill othir weir peace na le affectioun neuois thay war awin sonnis psyne exhortit nobyllis make sic support fauour said neuois nocht bot thay suld appere gouerne publyk weill hauand perpetuall remembrance honorabyll actis done thair nobyl fader kyng fergus desyrit al graue wyse preceptouris chosyn said neuois yt thay mycht incres al weill vertew science yeris ony dammage ennymes fynaly declarit wald accept na publyk gouernance hym quhil thir thyngis war first prouidit sic thingis done ferithais crownit fatall chiar merbyll ressauit kyngis armis quhylkis ane scherand sword septoure crown tressour maner ane weirly trinsche defence realme lyberte punition trasgressouris iustice fra then thir war ay ye nobyll armis scotland ony varyance quhyll tyme kyng achaus quhylk maid first band confideratioun betuix w france charllis magne kyng france romane emperour quhylk confyderatioun eikit tressour foure goldyn lyllyis four goldyn crocis set equale ordour tressour sygnify scottis he ay inuiolatly kepit crystyn faith ony spot heresy sen thai first tuke sone efter ane conuention maid betuix ye two kyngis scottis pychtis quhylk war syndry vtilites deuysit weill ye two realmis new peace ratifyit punitioun maid lymmaris mouaris sedition trubyll betuix two realmes redres maid sydis obseruatioun peace tymes cumyng sic thyngis done two kyngis returnit hame sone efter ferlegus eldest sonne kyng fergus motioun familiaris otheris corruppit men mycht nocht suffer iustice bega hate eme ferithais purpos distroy hym last seand wyckit purpos cum lytyll effect gaderit ane cumpany euyll disposit men desyrit crown geuyn hym iust heritour thairof ferithais dredand gyf war repugnant thir desyris cruelly inuadit ansuerit suld exoner hym glaidly ye crown ye nixt conuentioun ye maner geuyn hym neuir purpos beir auctorite langar ony brother sonnis war abyll succede desyrit na thyng sa mekyll se ane thaym reiose empire mycht schaw efter deid ferg ye sycker weill apperyng poste rite forther desyrit said neuo pa hym conuentioun quhilk suld baith exoner hym al auctorite euery thyng sa far pertenit ye weil king fergus hous plesand ansuer mesit mynd ferlegus hatrent tyme beand amouit thay conuenit baith togidder afore nobillis counsall quhair kyng ferithais said maner pi traist nocht vnknawin yow wyse faderis quhe disput amang yow quhat wyse realme mycht gouernit ye minorite fergus sonnis ye gaif crown thocht vnworthy nocht gouerne iustice bot suld remane hale quhyll sonnis ferg war abyll regne quhat trauell quhat incredybyll danger haue sustenit baith commoun weill felicite realme rysyng honouris sen na thyng mair patent yow tha sic besynes wyll omyt ye resydew thairof ye may haue na occasyoun deme arrogant desyrus fenyet glore war rycht inhumane sen haue na airis body gyf wald defraude brother sonnis thair kyndly herytage transfer samyn ony vncouth blude ferlegus cousyng iust heritour crown clames samyn fra gud reason young lusty hie engyne strang lusty body sustene gret chargis sall euery day abyll gouerne realme contrar feblit lang ge desiris releuit heuy beseik thairfore ye publyk administratioun quhylk ressauit auctoryte geuyn cousyn sen abyll vnganand thairfore na thing may sa plesand haue ane priuat lyffe tymes cummyng ony publict chargis ressaue ye auctorite mair gladnes euer geuyn counsall knawyng weill quhat irremidiabyl displesouris war apperyng thair realme gyf young insolent prince ferlegus war maid kyng co tinewit ferithais empyre requirit hym sustene gouernance realme afore ony feir aige sen realmes ar gouernit mair wysdome aigit personis ony corporall strenthe nobyllis wald nocht abrogat lawis maid afore aganis empire young chyldryn tuke gret indignation ferlegus desyrit sic thyngis war repugnant thair commoun weill thoucht thay ressauit hym thair counsal reuerence honouris yit thay seuerit hym fra pepyll repreuyng hym quhy yeid fra counsall wyse nobyllis keparis desyring crown without thair aduise make knawin suld obey counsal wyse lordis ferlegus brokin wyse fra purpos maid hym heuy cheir depart fra ye counsall nobyllis dredand syndry displeseris follow departyng brocht hym agane force kest corruppit counsullouris preisoun pamang quhom ane schew ye kyng quhat maner deith deuisit traistig reuelatioun thairof get lyf saiffit pepyll heirand tressoun war sa comouit thay slane ferlegus war nocht kyng pecifyit thair ire tyme thocht kyng aduertist tressoun deuysit slauchter yit schaw hym mair reuthfull rigorus prince kest mynd mei fury pepyll keip neuo fra displeseir ferlegus geuyn new keipyng nobyllis bot seruitouris war punist deith ferithaes al sone conuentioun skalit raid throw realme equall administratioun iustyce quhyll last slane within nycht neuo ferlegus thre monethis efter ye first conspiration xv yeir regne phovv ferlegus vvas banist slauchter kyng ferithais kyng maynus ca iii ferithais slane haue schawin ferlegus murderar war gylty said cryme fled amang pychtis fyndyng thair na securite lyffe fled brytane quhare consumed residew dayis gret misery nobillis efter slauchter ferithais conuenit castell dounstafage argyle election king quhilk day counsall mouit kyndnes kyng fergus chesit maynus yougest sonne xxiiii yeir aige kyng pmaynus ane nobyl prince richt different fra bruthir hauand vicious men gret hatrent exercit iustice equaly realme gaif commission liegis conuene dres debatis amag thaym self difficyll materis quhen thay occurrit discussit self ani ye yeir quhen past throw realme halding iustice ayris redressyng wrangis punitioun trespassouris tyme crynus kyng pychtis send ambassatouris kyng mayn reiosyng felicite desyryng band peace maid afore betuix scottis pychtis renewit kyng maynus weill istruckit nobillis quhat done ressauit thir ambassatouris condiscendit thair petition peace ratefyit maner scottis began burgeoun sycker peace pkyng maynus knawyng weill na pepyll may incres iustice peace religioun seand realmes euery thyng erd sa subdewit ye power goddis na deuise ingyne man may auale bot gyf goddis stand propiciant thairto quhais beniuolence bene sicker gard protectioun pepyll pthairfore moue liegis religioun eikit certane new cerimonis maid honour goddis within thair tempyllis first ordanit ane huge stane rasit south syde said tempyllis quhilk thair sacrifice maid pin memory heirof remanis yit dayis mony huge stanis drawin togidder forme circulis namit pepyll anciant tempyllis goddis na lytyll admiratioun quhat ingine strenth sa huge stanes bene brocht togidder pthe sacrifice vsit thay dayis ane portioun cornis cattellis ony othir frutis yt grew apon groud quhilk geuyn kyrkmen thair sustentatioun offerit ye goddis quhen samyn super flew mair tha sufficient sustentatioun preistis pkyng maynus foundat al ane sacrifice maid monethly honoure diane goddis woddis hu taris thairfore pepyll maid thair adoratioun new mone quhilk superstitioun lang vsit amang oure anciant faderis mony othir va e cerymonyis efter ryte egiptianis pquhen maynus gouernit pepyl gud iustice institute thaym thir othir superstitionis plesand religioun thay dayis resygnit crown sonne doruidilla deceissit xxix yeir regne kyng elgane regnand aboue brytonis kyng thaar aboue pychtis pof kyng doruidilla constitutionis maneris deith ca iiii mayn deceissit haue writtig son doruidilla wes maid kyng efter coronatioun renewit peace nichtbouris pychtis brytonis schew hym nurisar tranquillite detesting na thing mair sic besynes gaif occasioun battal delytit euery thyng mycht draw pepyl peace tuke gret delyte huntyng rachis houndis maid lawis grew quhelpis suld nocht lyne thair moderis fand experience hou dis gottin maner vnproffitabyl huntyng ordanit al yik nobyll suld nuris twa rachis ane hound huntyng quhen houndis war manyeit aduenture chais sustenit co moun gud ordanit slayar ane wolf haue ane ox reward oure eldaris persewit beist gret hatrent gret murdir beistis done samyn scottis hauand na occasioun cyuyll vncouth weris set thair ingyne pre ell othir pepyll ye craft huntyng maid dyuers lawis concernyng pin first commandit yt quhais dog first bait deir suld haue hyde thairof quhais dog bait nixt suld haue heid hornis ye body curit pleseir maister huntis resydew houndis gif ony contention rais amang hutaris cheis ane iuge thair consentis tempyll diane aggre thaym thir lawis war maid generall consent pepyl nuris thaym commoun pleseir drawyng fra thaym occasioun iniuris hatrent quhylkis lawis war kepit mony yeris efter thir costitutionis vtheris deuysit afore kynge fergus war colleckit togidder tabillis geuyn kepyng wysest maist profound clark tyme shaw baith iuge persone quhilkis war accusit punition conforme thair demeritis pepyll mycht vnderstand iuge past nocht fra boundis iustice punytioun crymes attour counsal wald condapne na faltouris thay dayis quhyll lawis war first schawin accordyng falt throw quhylk come vse criminabyll personis seand thaym iust sentence codampnit deid tuke samyn pacience gyf ony punytyon maid thaym aboue lawis thay murmurit opprest iugis pthis maner iustice remanis yit amang ilis scotland may na way abrogat thair bene certane interpretouris lawis quhom thay gyf na richtwys iugement pquhen doruidilla roung xxviii yeris deceissit berigone left behynd hym ane young chyld namit rewthar quhilk micht nocht succede ye lawis maid afore aganis young chyldren pof tyrane kyng nathak slauchter ca v efter ye deith doruidilla brothir nathak ane fair lusty persone abyll apperit publik administration maid kig prince rang skarsly two yeris quhen opprest pepyll sic seruitude haldin ane myscheuous tyrane sufferit na lawis exercit spulyeit co mounis thair ryches gudis persewit nobillis slauchteris banissing thir doyngis maid hym odius liegis maid empire rycht vnsycker thocht oft tymes counsallit freind abstene fra sic enormyteis desislit nocht bot grew ay vyce incressit yeris lyke ane bludy monstoure schame mercy pyit cruell vnhappy dedis war nocht lang vnpunist dowall capitane brygandis quhome thocht afore haue slane ouir greit pissance assistance mony vthir nobyllis conspirit aganis hym bryng purpos sonar effect maid rewthar sonne kyng doruidilla thair gouernoure intentioun gyf thir hie attemptatis succedit nocht syk felycyte desyrit charge thairof suld allanerly redound rewthar pdowal fynd occasion micht bring purpos effect broucht young rewthar ane cumpany armyt men samyn place quhare kyng nathak remanit quhen sawe mater dressit deuysit haue occasyoun debait gaif displesand wourdis kyng nathak saying ane fals tyrane schame nocht spoylyeit rewthar ye crown bot rang maist cruell odius tyranny aboue pepyll hyd slychtis tressoun he slane ane gret part nobyllis pnathak ansuerit agane wod fury kyng ordour iustice suld thairfore regne tymes cumyng contrar mynd dowall otheres opynyoun sic maner said dowall sall neuer fynd hym mair fauorabyll gratius tha afore declarit wtin dayis sall punys hym al vtheris opynyoun scharpest sort mycht deuysit thair attemptatis pdowall mouit thir dispitfull wordis ruschit forthwart complicis slew kyng nathak nobyllis war mynd secund yeir regne phovv revvthar ane young chyld vvas maid kyng contrar lavvis hovv ferquhard capitane lorne vvas chasit dovval ilis orison maid pepyll thairof ca vi nathak ye tyrane slane sayd dowall maid ane conuentioun assistence syndry nobyllis opinion crownit rewthar chair merbyl mony nobyllis war nocht co tent thir doyngis hauand gret indignatioun baith thayr kyng slane ye lawis concernyng electioun thair prince abrogat priuat auctoryte ane younge chylde maid kynge aganis thair honourabyll actis laitly maid thair commoun weill pthir nobyllis war mynd maid ane priuat conuentioun togydder amang thaym ferquhard capytane kyntyre lorne maich kyng nathak ane man subtyll ngyne hauand gret ambition crown pthis ferquhard beleuyng tyme ganand conques crown dissimilit mynd wald debait actione commoun weill complanit baith slauchter nathak cruell dowall ane barne maid kyng da mage pepyll commoun weill exhortit thairfore cou sall prouyde ane haisty remeid resist tyranny dowall quhilk intendit vsurp crown name rewther gyf samyn war nocht done sic sedicioun ciuill weiris ryse hais ely amang chiftanis thair realme samyn suld fynd ane haisty subuersioun pskarsly war thir wordis sai quhen dowal enterit ane ban men slew syndry nobillis counsall bot ferquhard euyll woundit eschapit ane certane frendis fled ilis quhare conuenit cla ni pepyll thairof ane counsall sayd maner obseruit lawis concernyng election kyngis maist vailyeant pepyll nocht bene necessar day make orisoun mycht haue leiffit gud tranquillite peace vnder ye empire nathak wyse vailyeant prince laitly slane dowall cruell tyrane attour aggrege importabyl cruelte mair dammaige commoun weill he nocht slane kyng bot intrusit ane young chyld place plane derogatioun oure lawis intedyng thairthrow bring baith w oure commoun weill vter myscheif fynd na thyng maist forcy campionis yt may seme w le lurk heir schamfully effiminat pepyll eschewyng wraith oure ennymes regardyng nouthir honour proffet sen thair na way sa plesand strenth ennymes febyll oure self maist cruel tyrane he nocht slane nobill realme bot slane ye preist religious men na esperance suld remane w withstad cruelte he tressonably put vailyeant men fauorit w albion haldis igit men mycht haue proffit w thair wyse counsall sic captiuite yt thay ar na better deid may oppres w pissance he maryit r wther ane young chyld quhome namis kyng douchter geth kyng pychtis pthis vnmercyfull tyrane he deuysit ar surely aduertist al sone he vincust w cut oure eyris put oure eyne may remane lyue oure schame perpetuall derisioun pyit wyl ye concur heid wysdome opinioun traist fermely ye sall nocht eschew sic cruelteis fauour goddis bot punis hym conforme demerites beleyf fermely thyngis sall succede w hie felicite gyf na le curage wysdome defend oure rycht oure liberte oure fayth se oft tymes vailyeant gret pryncis deieckit fra thair honoure imperyall dygnyteis quhen thay applaudit tressoun falset pheirfore gyf men worthy callit posterite oure nobyll progenitouris quhilkis neuir refusit assailye maist dangerus battallis thair iust defence lat w defend richt lawis wiffis chyldryn aganis maist odyus tyrane erar assailye extreme chance battall tha leif perpetuall schame dout goddis sall propiciant w oure iust persut contrar thay salbe repugnant ennymes thair tyranny lat w othir de honoure elli haue victory triumphant glore reuenge murdir kyng nobyllis recently maid tyrane phovv ferquhard dovvall recountering vthir plane battall vvar baith slane vvith nobyllyte scottis pichtis kyng pichtis slane king scottis tane ca vii capitanis tribis pepyll thairof mouit gret hatrent thir wordis turnit feir deith maist ragead fury baithit thair hadis wt mannis blude ye ryte thay dayis maid thair aithis reuenge slauchter nathak nobyllis scharpest maner mycht deuisit moretary thay gaderit ane army ireland argyle lorne canter othir partis adiacent syne landit mony galyouns lang faddis albioun ferquhard returnyng wyse drew mony pepyll quhare come opinioun tuke thair aithis outhir reuenge slauchter king nathak elli de ani dowall knawyng cummyng met hym army berigone quhare cruelly fouchtyn sydis bot last dowall discomfist seuyn thousand men army slane yit slauchter bene maid war nocht nycht seuerit thaym morrow dowall furius hatrent colleckit resydew army new array hauand hym geth kyng pichtis rewthar king scottis mony nobyllis baith thair realmes pon army aduersar ferquhard ye inhabitantis cathnes argyle murray mony otheris ilis thir two armyis met fynally togydder mair fury afore faucht neir vter exterminioun thaym baith pin vnhappy battall slane gethus kyng pichtis incredibyll nowmer baith nobyllis commounis baith chiftanis dowall ferquhard slane nobilite scottis pthis lamentabyll vnhappy battall fochtyn sic perseuerant hatrent allanerly remanit viii hundred men vnslane baith sydis pthe resydew ferquhardis army quhome vnplesand vyctory succedit seyng feild left efter sa huge murdir followit ye chais ythand slauchter quhyll thay come castell callender thair king rewther tane pthrow vnhappy battall maid sa terribyll slauchter mony yeiris efter nouthir scottis pychtis left lyffe sufficient inhabit realme yit withstand thair ennymes phovv scottis pychtis vvar doung albion brytonis ca viii britonis quhilkis war ay ennymes heirand th lametabyl distructioun scottis pychtis cumyng thaym vnprudence ciuill weris traistit tyme sufficient make thaym reiose ye hale empire albion thairfore rasit thair army maist weirly ordinance inuadit syndry landis pychtis baith swerd fyre pychtis brokin weiris afore reheirsit disparit support gaderit thair gudis thair wiffis chyldren freindis come mony wylsome difficil gaitis orknay efter thair cumyng chesit g hus brother kyng gethus afore deceissit thair kyng dwelt syndry yeris efter ye said regioun gud peace freindschip pepyll thairof thairfore orknay ay namyt aulde realme pichtis brytonis herand ye pichtis departit wise come penthland mers teuydaill plenist strenthis thairof thair gudis pepyl nocht lang efter thay come ye scottis landis scottis rich affrayit thair cumyng seyng na remeid drew thaim thair harnes wappynnis met thaym arrayit battall calder wod nochttheles scottis war discomfist two thowsand thaym slane ye resydew fled heir thair syndry partis fame vnhappy battall maid pepyl na le disparit nobyll blude fergus bene endit day albion brytonis proud insolent thir feliciteis herand thair exploratouris ane certane scottis quhilkis eschapit fra last battal war fled berigone defence king rewther said castel ane nowmer nobyllis resydew scottis thair wiffis barnis fled ilis gaderit ane army ordinance oenus thair kyng lade ane sege said castell nochttheles scottis defedit lang tyme quhil last thay war dreuyn sic penurite becaus thair vittallis failyeit thay kest cauillis quha suld first deuorit sustene liffis thaym war within hous becaus thay saw maist vailyeant campionis fall deuorit miserabyll wyse thay deuysit samyn nycht ische thair ennymes erar reuege sum displesour thaym tha miserably de sort kyng micht ische esely noblis thay deuysit colane chiftane lorne sal ysche ane hundreth ye nixt montane deuysit followit colane yschyng furth wyse fechtand vter exterminioun fayis finaly slane folkis pand mene tyme quhen maist ernestly fechtand kyng rewther ischit ane quiet posthern nobyllis come hastely see quhair schyppis war reddy abidynge cumyng rewther eschapyng maner arriuit ilis fyndyng th ir na securite lyffe past ireland wiffis ye tribe lorne seing thair hus adis slane afore thair ene slew thaym self thay suld nocht remane seruitude thair ennymes britonis knawyng fynaly rewther nobyllis war eschapit war sa comouit yt thay slew resydew scottis partis quhair thay war apprehendit syne garnist al strenthis scottis thair garisonis resydew scottis sauit thair fleyng seyng thaym self nocht pissance resist britonis fled montanis debaitit thair miserabyll lyffis straytnes ground scar hard fude leuand somer mylknes rutis herbis beryis wynter wyld flesche montanis sumtyme thay draif gret prayis bestial dirknes nycht fra ye britonis sustene thair liffis thus stude scottis pychtis abaid albion nere twelf yeris vnder seruitude britonis phovv scottis pichtis recouerit thair landis discomfist sysyll kyng britonis resydevv kyng revvtheris liffe ca ix quhill sic thing war done albion king rewther wyf ireland ane sonne namyt thereus lang efter request gethus kyng pichtis returnit albion landit lochbroun ro al sone scottis war returnit wyse albion thay slew auld rite first man thay met bathit thair mouth swordis blud syne prayit goddis grant thaym sic felicite thay may condingly reuenge slauchter thair progenitouris belyue thay maid thaym pa forthwart towart south mene tyme thay war aduertist gethus kyng pichtis cumyn wtin xxx milis thaim ane gret army send thaym thair freindis albion help thaym recouer thair landis thrid day efter baith armyis met togydder gret triumphe passyng forthwart ye south thay met scottis pichtis quhilkis war haldyn ye yeir afore vnder seruytude sysyl kyng brytonis herand thir tythyngis gatherit haistely ane army reconter ennymes incontinent co fiderat pepyll ony sicht conques ony strenthis gudis entrit auful army britane inuadit samyn gret iniure cruelteis kyng sysyll reuenge thir cruelteis inuadit scottis pichtis haiste battall nochttheles army fynaly disconfyst hie souerane manheid kyng rewther principal occasyon glorius victory memory thairof ye cuntre quhare battall fochtin callit yit oure dayis rethirdayll say ye vale rewthir battal sa cruelly fochtin baith armyis war constranit talk peace vnder thir conditionis britonis sall render al strenthis landis townis pertenyng scottis pichtis sal nocht inuaid thaym tymes cumyng scottis pychtis brytonis leuit mony yeris efter gud tra quillite peace pthe yeir kyng rewther recouerit realme fra begynnyng ye warld iiiimixclxxxxv yeris afore ye incarnatioun cciiii yeris fra ye beginnyng rome vcxlvi yeris kyng rewther leuit resydew dayis ony vncouth weris seditioun liegis deceissit xxvi yeir regne pof kyng revvtha lavvis gouernance hovv ptolome kyng egipt send oratouris se situatioun scotland ca x rewther deceissit haue schawin sonne thereus wes tender age yt mycht nocht succeid crown eason lawis afore rehersit thairfore cusyng rewtha maid kyng thay war brethir barnis rewtha first kyng amang scottis aud ingyne put nobyll men thair vailyeant dedis memory maid riche sepultur ye bodi thaym yt war slane brytonis defence realme commandit al mony hie stanis set sepulture euery nobil slane hym brytonis memory heirof syndry thaym remanis yit hie landis pepyll may knaw sic men war vailyeant thair dayis throw quhylk come vse sepulturis nobyll haldyn gret reuerence amang pepyll thir sepulturis ingrauyn ymageris dragonis wolfis othir beistis na inuentioun letteris thay dayis put deidis nobyl men memore commoun pepyll geuyn tyme store beistis telyng thair landis ony othir industry thus yet al ingenious craftis cuntre thairfore kyng rewtha brocht maner craftismen othir contres sparpellit thaym syndry schiris realme feis dewteis sum part takyn commoun purs sum part thay mycht wyn thayr laubouris heid euery ox slane geuyn smyth schyre rag forester wod toung man law half ane cost sercheouris theuis al mekyll wricht two rybbis cost medcinat al mekyll surrurgiane besyde war geuyn thaym certane mesouris aitis beir becaus na change money thay dayis throw partyng ox wyis rais vp annuell rentis land efter king rewtha plenist realme maner craftismen informit gret damage fell oftymis pepyl ignorace euil medcinaris thairfore inhibit vnder payne deid yt ony man exerce ye art medicinary without thay war found richt expert lang experience thairof afore tyme na medcinaris vsit cuntre al personis war trublit infirmiteis war brocht marcat ony commoun place quhare pepyll mycht se thaym gyf thaym counsall vse sic remedyis thay vsit quhen thay conualescit thayr maledis ane thyng richt odius thay dayis visee nocht pacient comfort consolation tyme come certane oratouris fra kyng ptolome egipt explore ye maneris situacioun euery pepyll regioun thi oratouris war plesandlie ressauit ye kyng thay war discendit ye egiptianis forbearis king gart conuoy thaym bath throw realme scottis pychtis accordyng thair desyris thir oratour wrait thair bukis situatioun hillis firthis ilis townis lochis castellis within region wt lenth dayis nychtis baith wynter symer thay war commadit king ptolome quhilk gaif ingyne discriue ye situatioun erd euery regioun ilis quhare ony vsit haue passage discriptioun montanis firthis cieteis samyn diuers instrument astronomy quhais deligence laubour remanis ane rycht crafty proffitable werk namit cosmographe ptolome richt expert methamatik ingenius werk completit tyme adriane empriour quhen thir oratouris sene degeistlie considerit regioun thay persauit samyn ritis maner writtyngis toung habit cerymonyis vsit amang egiptianis caus thir oratouris war plesandly depischit realme kyng rewther gouernit realme xiiii yeris efti gret iustice ony vncouth ciuill weris quhill last began suspek lang felicite thairfore preuene calamite gif ony war approcheand mischance fortoun resignit crown thereus son kyng rewther xvii yeir regne pof kyng thereus hovv vvas exilit tyranny hovv conane chiftane brigandis vvas maid gouernour proscription ca xi thereus res uing ye crown man apperit first sex monethis regne ane virtewis prince bot sone eftir becam ane vicio tyrane inuoluit wt lust yt na regard ressone honesty iustice namit amang pepill ye scornar religioun ye pepill imitation insolent prince increscit euery day corruppit maneris throw quhilk followit ithand slauchter nobill men reif heirschippis partis strongest theuis gretest oppressouris war haldin maist veneratioun honouris comonis war sa disparit ye irrecouerable skaithis done thaym thay traistit nocht possibil ony tyrane vicious mycht regne aboue thaim capitanis ye tribis mouit thir insufferable offecis thocht vnworthy ony noble men suld misgidit sic ane corruppit monstour thairfore maid ane quiet conuentioun amang thaym self quhilk thay cocludit baith degraid hym crown kyngdome thereus heirand conspiratioun nobillis aganis hym sa astonist fled brytane last quhen socht lag tyme support britonis restore realme frustrat yair cosumit ye residew dayis misere york xii yeir regne quhen thereus exilit maner nobillis scotland thair common weill sal incurre na damage lakyng ane king chesit conane capitane brigandis gouernour conane efter maid gouernour tuke gret laubouris mei al dissentionis war rissyn afore amang ye nobyllis sleuth thereus punist theiffis reuers othir criminabyll personis sic seuerite iustice bestiall gudis lay thairfurth ony trubyl quhill last kyng therus deceissit brytane quhais deith auctorite expirit pof kyng iosyne experience prechyng tvvo philosophouris ca xii al sone nobillis war aduertist deith thay maid ane conuentioun berigon ye quhilk iosyne bruther thereus maid kyng iosyne renewit ye peace nychtbouris pichtis britonis held surrurgianis medcinaris gret reuerence wes nurist tyme youtheid sic personis ireland ane gud medicinar gud experience herbis forbearis vsit na othir medcin curyng thair woundis infirmiteis bot herbis thay dayis thair nocht sa mony dyuers kindis maladyis ar sene infirmiteis war sene tyme bot grauellis caterris siclike maladyis cumyng throw distemperance cauld donk humouris pepyll leiffit sa skars naturall fude thay nocht lang dayis bot war preseruit fra maner maledyis nochtheles fra abstinence forebearis set asyde tha vncouth delicious coursis bega multiply sa mang w yt vncuth strange metis come vncouth strange infirmiteis becaus vnyeme ti drogareis yt forbearis vsit mycht nocht cure new maledyis pepyl war costranit throw importabyl dolour incressing samyn seke remeid new ingyne craft sen tyme sa venomit vncouth superflew metis drikis thocht sum thing necessar rehers temperance forebearis thair leuyng sic maledyis remedyis war vsit thair dayis quhilkis sall schawin largely efter quhen tyme occurris expedient ye tyme kyng iosyne war brocht presence berigone two venerabyll clerkis plesant visage bot thay war al maist nakit wryttin yt thay war preis spanye passyng portingale athene vnmercifull tempest see war schip brokin ro thair schip remanent pepyl thaym perist thay sauit becaus thay war philosophouris gret experience thay war weill tretit last quhen thay war xiiii dayis refreschit efter thair walkyng trubyll see thay war brocht agane ye kyngis presence king demadit thaim schaw quhat thay vnderstude nature ground scotland maneris religioun pepyll thairof thir philosophouris answerit thay mycht nocht say perfitely thir questionis becaus thay nocht lang tyme haue experience thairof al war sum part febillit thair fa tasyis calamite laitly falling thaym storme see nochtheles sa far thay micht coniecture thair rich proffet gottin within vanis erd scotland tha aboue geuyn winnyng mynis metallis tha ony production cornis thay knew said thir philosophouris influence heuyn maneris religion ye pepyll thay declarit thair religion nocht commendit thay adorit ymagis brutall beistis forme leuand goddis ye egiptianis vsit quhilk suld nocht god thyng contenit landis see euery creature quhais perfyte verray ymage ca payntit deuysit igyne man necessar thairfore yt pepyll suld leif thair ydolatryis adore allanerly leuand god mouer heuynnis sacryfyce prayer thair tempillis allanerly ony ymageryis finaly leif hope reward gif thay leiffit clene lif iustice vthir way deuisit thaym bot dolour tormet thir philosophouris preching maner inducit ye pepyll leif thair ydolatryis makand thair sacrifice prayer allanerly mouer heuyn eternall god thus war pepyll brocht way yt sacrifice yt wont geuyn isi apis goddis egypt abrogat throw quhilk scottis war mony yeris efter sa religious thay made ado ation god mouar heuyn yit vtheris war sa indurat thair awn errouris thay couth nocht omyt thair auld sustitionis beleuit firmely son mone otheris sternis lanternis ye heuyn war verray goddis thay war sa obstinat blyndit auld arrour gentilis ye quhe thay saw na thing erd bricht meruellus tha son mone vther lychtis heuyn thay beleuit sum diuinite thairin adorit thaym goddis history sa far drawin colleckit ueremond iohne campbell cornelius ireland quhom haue determit follow maist autetik auctouris ye end quhatsu euer werke kyng iosyne ane virtuous prince deceissit berigone xxiiii yeir regne pof kyng fynnane lavvis college clerkis ile man ca xiii efter deith iosyne son finnane ane wise virtuous prince maid kyng sa gret luffar iustice rychely rewardit capitanis tribis quhare fand thaym luffaris comoun weill gaif hale attendance wyn hertis pepyll maid na exercition ministration iustice aduise nobillis ekit nowmer counsal senatouris tha afore mak thaym ye renoumit maid ane law kyng sall na thyng concernyng ye publik administration realm aduyse nobillis maid al ane vther law kyng sall nothir denonce weir treit peace aduise ye capitanis tribis thir siclike constitutionis king fynnane conquest gret fauour beniuolence pepyll maner gouernance maid hym sa strang amang liegis neuir assailyeit efter ony vncouth weris grew gret abou dance ryches fynaly set mynd repare ye religio goddis wes decait faders tyme first commandit ymagis thair goddis restorit thayr tempillis pepil mycht haue samyn adoration afore yit wald nocht inhibit pepil adore leuand god mouer heuyn wes institute afore philosophouris sufferit pepill adore quhat god thay plesit wes first kyng institute prelatis clerkis yi realme thir clerkis suld remane togidder gaif thaym ye ile man lyand betuix ireland britane fornens brigance quhare thair principall seit wes ordanit thir clerkis conuenit ilk yeir ani comand gret maist bischop thairof specialie quhen ony hie wechty materis occur concernyng defence thayr common weil pthir preis war namyt druydes wes stitute ile aduy e kyng nobillis mak sacrifice ye honour thair goddis instruk sonnis nobill men virtew science siclik thay war lernit athene wes commandit ane thaym bischop maister sall haue iurisdictioun aboue laif quhom wes borne ane gleib fyre signe h honour diuinite eft quhais deith ane othir maist approcheand virtew cunnyng wes chosyn succeid place thir clerkis throw thair ithand exercitioun increscit sone eftir rycht expart morall naturall philosophie wes haldin pepill maist iust haly creaturis thay maid lawis discus doutis baith publik singular actionis deuisit nocht onlie punitioun maner cryines bot ordanit condigne rewardis geuyn al gud ded thay cursit thaym contempnit thair auctorite punition wes euir odious amang oure forbearis ye cursit pepil war thay dayis resecat fra al gud cumpany participant reward honouris digniteis bot numerit amang cumpany infamyt wickit misdoaris pthir preistis war exemit fra chargis weir othir exactionis pof thir preistis writtis mony auctouris affirmyng thair ordour religioun first found britane thay cal hail ile albion vnder ane name britane fynnane wes ane virtuous prince na le honorit ciuil religious maneris quhilkis decorit realme phe maryit son durstus agasia douchter kyng britonis conquest samyn na litill glore beneuolence amang britonis last past gyf consolation ye kyng pychtis quhilk wes lyand ye tyme vehemet feuer camelon quhare deceissit xxx yeir regne body wes brocht berigone beriit amang remanent sepulturis progenitouris pof kyng durstus hovv vvas slane cruell tyranny ca xiiii fynnane deceissit wyse sonne durstus wes mayd kyng yi durstus insolet youth wes geuyn drounknes vnbridelit lust different fra faderis gouernance yt hat tit thaym fader luffit brak ordour law wes institute afore genitouris ministratioun iustice vsit na counsal gret materis bot onlie thaym fauorit vicious maneris culd fynd new maner lustis sa mischeuous ane tyrane al ye nobil men fader vsit secret counsall war othir slane banist elli feynyeit causis forfaltit thair landis guddis finalie wes brocht sic cruelte onlie slew yame quhilk war odius hym bot al slew al thaym quhare beleuit get ony rich guddis thair deith repudiat nobil quene agasia kyng britonis dochter gart vicious harlotis deforce hir quhill vnhappy tyrane wes inuoluit thir siclik abhominable dedis capitanis ilis lorne argyle ro frequet conuentionis amang thaym self maid ane conspiratioun aganis hym far haitit thir capitanis rage tyrany thay wald na langar abid opinion yat fyne thay sall nocht appere brekaris faith suld kepit thair natural prince thay schew thaym opin proclamatio cht assemblit inuaid onlie punys vicious vnhappy counsalouris quhome realme brocht sic enormiteis without remeid war haistely prouydit ye samyn suld pa vter rewyne pquhyll capitanis foresayd war preparand thair armis maner comonis rycht desy u dystroy tyrane rais haist athir hand assist thir capitanis yit part commonis wald nocht concurre thir capitanis beleuyng thaym nocht assemblit ony comon weill bot vsurpe crown durstus na litil affrayit thair assemblance knew hym self gilty maid hym flee seand na place sufficient keip send britonis desyring quene agasia send ane power armyt men resyst ane certane nobyllis aganis hym conspirit last seand na support apperand began turne treasonabyll mynd falset slychtis tuke purpos sla thir cospiratouris sum hyd waching beleuyng way eschew danger apperyng pincontinent send ambassatouris thir capitanis fenyeit hym sa penitent wald reforme offe ci iniuris done hym perditioun commoun weill promittit nocht gouerne realme tymes cumyng thair aduyse bot punys wickit cou salouris quhilkis war occasioun displesouris hym done pit al ane odious thyng ane kyng fecht aganis subdittis specyally quhen thay ar nocht set degraid hym crown bot reduce hym better estait obseruation thairof wald bynd hym tempyll dyane vnder quhat astrictionis thay plesit gyf mycht nocht sufficient suld cum thaym ony assurance submit hym vnderly quhat correctioun thay pleasit pand wordis mycht haue credyt kest ane certane seruitouris prysone war punys thaym deith thair assistence vyces potheris small estimatioun arrayit precious cl thyng send thayme sayd capitanis punyst thayr plesour capitanis geuand haistelye credence wordis send doron capytane trybe lorne take aithis eftir promys thus durstus brocht temple diane sworne ye preist thairof aithis couth deuisit ressaue thir capitanis maist tender freindschip remitting rankour mind al maner cryme micht imput thaym onlie hald thaym faithfull tendir freindis bot gouerne realme tymes cummyng thair auise al sone thir capitanis vane cofidence wer cumyn hym ressauit yame sa plesandlye baith wordis visage contenance apperit ony dissimilance thus generall concord blythnes maid athir syde kyng durstus reiosyng concord callit thir capitanis ane banket within castell berigone al sone thay war entrit vnmercyfull tyrane past ane towr castell incontinent certane armyt ruschit furth chalmeris quhare thay war hyd slew thir capitanis vtheris enterit castell thair opinioun wiffis matronis followit thair husband terrible banket euil hurt woundit debait thair said husbandis past berigone dolorus spraichis cry vengeans cursit tyrane violatioun faith promys treson falset durstus nocht lang vnpunist al remanent freindis thir capitanis assemblit ane army baith men wemen sufficient beir wappynnis sa haistely thay laid ane sege ye castel berigone durstus aduertist yairof ane certane yam past incontinent wallis said thay suld haue sone experience quhidder crafty treason fechtyng durstus disparit help come ye castel wod fury ane cumpany euill arrayit peple sone spulyeit baith liffe crown nynt yeir regne pand howbeit ane vicious tyrane buryit ane kingly sepulture amang forbearis pof gret contention amang capitanis orisoun maid charon capitane argyle hovv evvin first name vvas maid kyng ca xv durstus slane yi maner sonny fled irelad sone eftir ane couention maid cheis kyng nobillis beand ane mynd concludit suffir nane durstus blude regne aboue thaym aduenture ye sum yame suld reuege slauchter thair fore thay tuke lang consultation quhat lynage blud ye kyng suld chosin su desyrit ragaon chiftane ilis cospyrit first aganis durstus pyit becaus fauourit euill dedy men repellit utheris desyrit cormanus capitane lorne pthus war ye tribis deuidit syndry vocis eft lag te ion charon capitane argyle said maner ye may haue perfite experience wyse faderis ciuill weris dowall ferquhard recentlie ye empire wickit durstus dangerus vnthankfull pepill haue ane cruell tyrane regnand aboue thaym thay samyn weris yi nobil realme quhilk bene debatit sa mony yeris gret manheid wisedome curage wes neir brocht finall euerstone samyn weris nobill war slane comonis brocht sa vile seruitude gyf samyn continewit oure name lynage suld haue perist albione quhat miserie sustenit faderis berigone quhen thay war costranit vrget necessite saif thair miserable lyuis fude thair bowell quhat danger sustenit kyng rewther euadyng ennymes maist perellus ischeyng quhen realme neir lost colane vailyeant capitane slane onelie defence hym realme quhat fury thay nobill wemen slew thaym self berigone thay suld nocht leif seruitude ennimes quhat he brocht nobillis sic mesiry thay war banist socht suple vncouth realmes nocht bot sedition intestyne amag thaym self britonis al thair rich cheualrie mycht neuir haue maid sic incursionis heirschippis landis peple war nocht maid first ane reddy gait thaym awin dissentioun thairfore eschewit rycht vailyeat men dissentioun risyng amang yow cum nocht damage common weil pye haue deliuerit laithe realme tiranny durstus ye haue sufficientlye reuengit slauchter nobillis deith tyme maist ganand help oure materis tyne nocht gud freindis victory ciuill dissentioun ye haue conquest gret labour pye se pepil glaid durstus deith desirus haue ane kyng election quhil thay ar opinioun mak ane kyng yat tak part potherwayis na thyng salbe amang yow bot ciuill weris heirschippis slauchter baith nobillis commonis meyntyme sum durstus freindis sall nocht onlye vsurp crown bot sall punys yow slauchter nobillis commonis seand charon sic exellent wisdome gaif hym power cheis quhom thocht best kyng charon crown sal remane ay ye blud chesit ewin first name kyng durstus ewin war brethir sonnis pthus ewin crownit chair marbill berigone castell haldin certane dayis aganis freind durstus nochtheles finalie randerit pthis ewin first kyng scottis socht aith fidelite fra subditis say nobillis subditis suld leil trew hym throw quhilk come vse mony yeris eftir capitanis tribis thair electioun constranit thair subditis gyf thair aithis fidelite quhilk ryte yit obseruit pfor pepill dwellyng hie land ilis thairof electioun thair capitane haldis vp thair handis leil trew hym al sone capitane chosyn thay past nyxt mote defendis vnder pane deid ye nane thaym name thair capitane ony vthir sloggorne bot auld name tribe quhen thay heir name bek discouer thair heid na le reuerence war god beleif thairfore ye pepyll dwellis hie land ilis quhen thair hieest besynes occurris sweris fute hand name thair capitane sum hyd diuinite war ewin stabyl realme virtew commandit young child realme nurist skars hard fude sleip erar hard burdis plumis coddis ythandly exercit swift rynnyng werslyng make thaym abyll debait realme quhen tyme requirit ordanit thaym abstene fra thyng micht make thaym soft effeminat virtuus prince past throw boundis realme ministration iustice punist criminabyll personis syndry punitioun sum skurgit sum punist ye deith samyn tyme come ambassatouris pichtis desyryng tenoure confideratioun haue support aganis britonis quhilkis war laitly cummyng gret incursionis mers purposit sege thair ciete camelon kyng ewin support confiderate freindis come ane haisty army aganis brytonis scottis pichtis asse blit maner went forthwart na le curage tha victory ben present thair handis far war thair myndis inflammit reuenge iniuris done thaym ye yeris afore britonis na thing affrayit thair cumyng met thaym na le ferocite tothir followit ane dangerus cruell battall fochtin lang tyme vncertane victory bot last nicht seuerit thaym rycht sorowfull doutsum chance battal confiderat kyngis seand thair army brokyn fled vnder nycht pentland hyllis ye britonis brokyn siclike calamite disparit ony new support fled ye maner disconfist pepyll left thair carage behynde thaym al sone ye confiderat pepyl war aduertist heirof thay returnit partis quhare ye brytonis war capit afore partit spulye thairof custum army sic thyngis done kyng ewin returnit berigon rewardit richely ye freindis thaym war slane battall sum capitanis thair prouyn vassalage war promouit publik officis othirs rewardit ryches gudis fra then concludit gouerne realme traquillite peace maid certane iugis abide syndry regionis realme minister iustice pepil ordanit certane exploratouris remane ilk schire thay micht serche sornaris theiffis reiffaris bring thaym lawis thir exploratouris mycht continew thair offyce dotat thaym syndry landis memory heirof remanis yit day syndry infeftmentis auld baronis quhais landis war geuyn virtuous princis samyn caus howbeit thay exerce nocht effect thairof kyng ewin biggit ane castel nocht far fra berigon callit ewin efter name callit dounstatage gidit realme mony yeris efter gret commodite common weil deceissit xix yeir regne phovv gillus bastard sonne kyng evvin slevv tvvo sonnis tvvo nepotis du stus make hym self kyng hovv thrid nepot edeir eschapit ca xvi eftir deith ewin bastard son gillus conuenit nobillis bury fader tyme h obsequies com dothane dorgall two sonnis durstus fast contendyng crown thay war reconseld kyng ewin afore deth yit becaus thay war two twynnis borne atanis law couth nocht decerne thay dayis quhilk thaym maist richt crown thus rais ane schamful debait betuix thir two brethir ilk ane thaym set othir slauchtir gillus ane subtell ingyne seik occasioun conquis crown ekit hatrent thir two brethir mony slichtis armit yame athir slauchter last appoyntment gillus thir two brethir war brocht togidder agreit auise freindis debatis ane thaym maid kyng nochtheles thay war sa extreme conuentioun athir side yt thay partit war freindis thay met nocht lang eftir thay war brocht agane gillus ane secreit chalmer eftir lang consultatioun concludit su tyme deuide crown betuix thaym sum tyme mak ane yame king alwayis gillus inflamit yair hatrent tha mesit ye mene tyme certane armyt men ruschit priuat chalmeris thay war co mandit gillus slew thaym baith eftir thair slaucht gillus ran heir thair wt piteus cryis schawin eschapit ane richt dangerus aduenture quhare kyngis sonis war layd slauchter baith slane incontinent commandit freindis yt stude hym haue hym sum sycker place gyf fled nocht tyme suld tynt freindis beleuyng al thyngis trew schew followit hym castell dounstafage gyll enteryng wyse within castel fynding mony opinion arrayit men syndry abuschementis comandit sla thaym war repugnant desyris incontinent callit capitanis tribis ane counsall began lang orisone detest ye insolence auarice vnnatural hatrent ye kyngis sonnis quhilkis cotendyng crown he slane thaym self maner detes ye bludy tyrany durst thair fader schawand mony reasonis sonnis vnabyll ye crown gaif tha ki thairfore ye goddis yt cuntre deliuerit thair tyrany ye tresson falling thaym self quhilk thay deuysit hi finally schew gret laubour cure diligence yt tuke baith commoun wele haue brocht kyngis sonnis cocord quhilkis tha war baith slane nocht knaw quhat maner bot narrowly eschaping wt lif forthir schew fader kyng ewin left hym gouernour testament power part tresoure gudis amang ye nobyllis luffit hym duryng lif commoun weil mycht suffer na dammage desyrit administration realme geuyn hym quhyll war cleirly discussit quhay war iust herytouris thairto capitanis quhilkis war tyme within ye castell knawand weil treason saif thair liffis maid hym kyng al sone gillus maid kyng wyse stabil realme sickir firmance tuk ye pepil faithful liegis sic thingis done partit tresure guddis kyng ewin promittit way co quest thair beneuolence fauour nochtheles ambition auarice mouit hym seik crown remanit hym eftir kyng set mynd mony slychtis distroy lynnage blude durstus mycht reiose ye crown ony clame otheris becaus wes aduertist dothane sonne durstus afore slane thre sonnis nurist ile man vnder ye wise clerkis thairof quhilkis ye eldest lismorus xii yeris age secund cormacus x yeris thrid ed ir nocht thre yeir age wet ye nerrest way ye said yle wt dissimilat mid wald haue brocht thir child castell dunsta age fosterit thair otheris nobillis sonnis ye realme eldest two arrayit thair best auyse met kyng gillus quhome maist tenderlie ressauit spendit residew ye nycht cherisyng thir barnis ye gret maister bischop said ile suld haue na suspition hyd treason pon morow began comon bischop clerkis concerning thair religioun constitutionis lawis pon thrid day maid sacrifice goddis solempnit cerimonis eftir left certane men behynd hym thrid sonne edeir pullit vp salis arriuit doustafage hauand hym two eldest sonnis ye said dothane thair fostar fader brether thay dayis ye pepyll na le affection thair foster brether fader tha thair awi naturall fader brether youngest son edeir sic infirmite yt na man beleuit lif al sone began conuales brocht nuris argyle quhare nurist lang tyme amang desert craggis montanis ye land scho suspeckit na gud cum two remanent brether yt come gyllus handis scho coniecturit followit first nycht yt gyllus returnit dounstafage slew baith thir sonis dothane armis thair foster fader brether herand yt thrid son edeir eschapit become sa wod furius slew men yt left behynd hym slauchter thair returnyng fra thes set h vter besynes sew edeir deith ceissit nocht quhyll suerly aduertist fleyng ireland phovv kyng gyllus vvas banist hovv cadal chiftane brigandis vvas maid gouernour slevv gillus ireland hovv evvin secund vvas maid kyng ca xvii lag efter ane cou sall set dou stafage ye quhilk gyllus schew lag oriso deseruit na litil fauour nobyllis commonis prudent administratioun realme geuand vter besines baith take away al mouaris sedicion saif fra dissention weris intestine fra insolence ane young prince thairfore desyrit na suspition imput hym howbeit sonis dothane war deceissit apperit mynd goddis thay ordanit kyngdomes empire haue thay comandit na wemen barnis bot men prouyn virtew haue samyn gouernance forthir thair syndry seditius men mouaris discord quilkis necessar drawin fra ye laif al sone gyll said thir wordis enterit ane certane nobyllis castel dounstafage incontinent gart sla freindis durstus ony miseration quhidder thay war men wiffis barnis mony noblis ye stude hym rycht astunist cruelte dreidand slane maner gyll seand thaym affrayit maid thaym consolatioun gif thay continewit opinioun thay sall leif gret felicite tymes cumyng efter kest wickit mynd ylk day cruelte mycht vterly distroy thaym fauorit durstus quhen bludy tyrane roung certane tyme thir siclike inhumane cruelteis vnsemand ane prince capitanis nobyllis scotland assemblit ane army chosyn men fra partis realme conspirit aganis hym sic prudece yt tyrane wist nocht thairof quhyl yay war arrayit afore hym dounstafage gyllus destitute support hauand nane hym bot sa mony war outhir haldyn aganis thair wyll coft money gat ane fischar bait fled ireland efter fleyng men war al yoldin cadal chiftane brigandis baith castellis berigone dounstafage taikin nobyllis gud aduisement tyrane gillus suld perpetually exilit maid cadall gouernour quhilk kest extreme labour persew gyllus ye deith come fynaly ilis quhare fand edeir thrid son dothane quhilk sauit afore fra treasone gyllus nurice said becaus sayd edeir destitute freindis thay war al slane gyllus send epiak principall ciete brigance kepit thair quhil war perfectioun aige gyllus banist wyse complanit princis ireland heuy iniuris done hym ye scottis quhome exilit spulyeit empire kyngdome throw quhylk na place left sicker hym albion promittit gif said princis wald restore hym realme gif ye ilis scotland fra empire scottis haldyn perpetually dominion ireland ireland princis glaid promis assemblit ane army cum scotland ye effect cadal weill aduertist thair ordinance returnit doustafage tuke consultatioun nobillis said gillus mycht esely resistit concludit ewin secund name sal kyng nepot kyng fynnane gottin bruther dowal gyllus seand see campis stuffi partis albion resyst cumyng arryuit ilis quhare exercit cruelte ony miseratioun piete syne tuke hym guddis mycht caryit remanent put fyre kyng ewin impacient suffer thir uris prouidit ane flote galyeonis schippis marineris weirmen thingis necessar send thaym cadall admyrall ireland sone efter cadall pullit vp salis fortunat wyndis arriuit ireland quhais cumyng went sic confluence pepil hym semit nocht vincus gyllus bot pepyll ireland gyllus sone efter arrayit folkis sound trumpet baith armyis iunit faucht gret cruelte ylk syde quhyll last mony gyllus folkis wery mate specially thay thocht odius fecht aganis thair natiue pepyll fled fra gillus randerit haym cadall gyllus dispa victory raif coit armour fled thik wod sone efter certane armit men war send seik gyllus fand hym fynaly ane dirk coif wod neir famyst hunger incontinent thay slew hym brocht heid cadall pthis miserabyll end maid gyllus secund yeir regne confydyng ouir mekyll tyranny falset phovv cadal returnad ireland lost maist part army rage see consolatioun maid hym kyng evvin ca xviii efter ye deith gyllus cadall returnand albioun ireland see vyctorius army quhen suddandly rais ane vnmercyful storme turnit glore victory desolatioun irrecouerabyll skaithis fallyng said tempest passit proffet victory miserabyll moderis wiffis knawing thair husbandis sonnis perist see conuenit schippis hydduous spraichis schowtis amang othir lamentabyll sichtis cadall come land dolorus array beirand handis heuyn warying fortoun goddis distroyit sa mony nobyll vailyeant men conuertyng thair glore victory supreme misery quhais dolorus hauyngis war sa petuous euery man compassioun thairof pkyng ewin rycht sorrowfull thir nouellis come gret diligence cadall said maner thou he brocht realme maist vailyeant cadall na lytyll consolatioun returnyng thy victorius army albioun vnbrokyn uris ennymes thou he vincust ennymes ane vncouth regioun fechtand manly displayit baneris eis realme common weill tyrane gyllus pump euery vice vincust howbeit schamefull fleyng mycht support hym quhais heid schorne fra body brocht albion fyne sal nocht want quhen deid schame dishonour deseruit tyranny lyf aduersaryis ar penitent thair rebellyoun brocht opinion army thy industry ar saiffit reproche amang thair vncouth strongest fais thou he left na thing vndone pertenit ane forcy campioun na caus occurris reclame aganis fortoun heuynnis yocht ane part thy army perist tempest rage seis yit thow beneuolence fauour goddis ar saffit hie honour realme thow arriuit ireland nocht bot propiciant fauour ye goddis returnyng sa riche spulyeis ony iniuris ennymes thocht thy ennymes reiose ye mischance fallyng thy army yit na glore may succeid thairof thaym stait eirdly creatouris he condicioun eftir prosperite cumys aduersite eftir aduersite cumis prosperite proceding reward fatal destineis quhais affect may nocht mouit yit esche wit prudence mortall creatouris thow he thairfore na caus lament bot erar haue thy aduersite pacience saiffyng ane better forton sen na creatouris may remeid thir displesouris bot goddis quhilkis gouernis empire men thair pleseir schaw ane plesand vul w thy freindis ennymes may knaw ferme constance na mair brokin aduersite prowd prosperite thy spreit curage may appere al inuincible thy body battall cadal heir consolatioun price fenye al cheir mycht howbeit repentit sair vnmercyfull tempest consumit sa mony vailyeant men left hym liue se thair mischeif sorow calamite fallyng cadall sumpart rehersit ye poete claudiane othir auctouris phovv kingis scottis picht vvar alliat togidder mariage hovv balus king orknay slevv hym self b disperation vvyse counsall geuyn kyng evvin edeir ca xix kyng ewin eftir slauchter gyllus desiryng gouerne realme iustice visit boundis thairof punist faltour gaue cadal ye faithfull seruice hym done town epiak sindry othir landis townis brigance fre regalite nocht lang eftir kyng ewin accumpanit nobillis met gethus kyng pychtis borduris brigance renewit band peace pycht peace wes roborat mariage king ewin maryit stora dochter gethus thrid king pychtis mariage wes solempnisit ye bischop preistis ile man nocht lang eftir wes aduertist balus kyng orknay wes cumming ane flote schippis throw pentland firth maid na litill heirschippis slauchter ro cathnes kyng ewin meit thir attemptatis assemblit ane flote schippis sic deligence balus wes aduertist thairof quhill wes arriuit sycht pthe orknay men abasit suddand cummyng war constranit gyf battall bot thay war sone discomfist continewall chais dreuin seis quhare ane part yame eschapit fischear batis residew vincust slane kyng balus seyng na way eschape sall nocht cum ennymes handis slew hym self kyng ewin throw yi victory conquest gret fauour pepill quhen wes returnyng hame ireland seis arri mouth lochtie quhare biggit ane town callit inuetlochtie maid thair ane sicker refuge honour goddis defedyng vnder pane deid ony criminabill personis abstrakit ye samyn nochtwithstading quhat sumeuir crymis thaym comittyt town wes eftir ane commoun port till marchandis france spanye incredibill plente fische swomand thay seis town remanis nocht day aif onlie ruinus wallis thairof wes euertit danis sall eftir schaw kyng ewin biggit ane othir town ye riuer ne quhilk yit namyt innernes qu air su tyme wes gret repair mar handis quhilkis come almany seik riche furringis martrikis bewatis siclik skinnis quhilkis aboundis regioun town remanis yit vnd auld name full marchandise guddis howbeit oftymes heryit euil ychtbouris liand thair kyng ewin ane noble illuster prince baith peace weir passit remanent dayis ony domistik vncouth weris peacefyit seditionis rais ye ilis maruellus wisdome detestit ay ciuill weris al weill quhen wes priuat publik schort tyme afore deith past epiak agre sonnis cadall quhilkis fell gret contention efter thair fader deith rich guddis nochtheles nobyll prince aggreit thaym sone efter cumyng efter done obsequies cadall efferyng gyse thay dayis gart rais ane huge stane grauyn quik ymage cadall apon ane hie mo comandit pepyll offer hym wyne sen oure forebearis war dissauit al weil othir pepyl thair arrouris kyng ewin sorrowfull deith cadall fell heuy infirmite sa dispari heill resignit ye crown edeir thrid nepote kyng durstus iust h rytoure crown haue schawin fyne edeir suld ane gud kyng counsalit hym defende liegis subdittis fra iniuris na man iniure geif na man office auctoryte ennyme iustice dres gret materis hym self small materis commit nobillis gouerne hym ay sic maner may worthy regne aboue subdittis neuir moue battall le mycht na othir waris quhen necessar haue battal yrk na chargis pertenyng weirly ordinace deuoid neuir picte virtew maist semand ane prince fynaly commandit hym aboue othir besynes haue goddis reuerence quhais fauoure wes ane souer protectioun realmis quhen geuyn cousal edeir dece ssit ye xvii yeir regne eft quhais deceis raisit ane crafty ymaig maid symylitude quhylk haldin mony yeris efter gret veneratioun amang pepyll pand sa endis heir secund buke heir begynnis thrid buke croniklis scotland pof kyng edeir hovv reuengit heirschippis maid tratoure bredus ilis ca primo ewin deceissit maner edeir crownit chiar merbyl sone efter vesyt boundis realme quhais passaige mair plesand nobyllis geuyn huntyng delytit thyng chais wild beistis houndis rachis specially wolffis thay ar noy sum tame bestiall regioun throw cauld humouris thairof ingeneris wolffis feirs cruell nature kyng edeir brocht pepil sic tranquillite thay leuit mony yeris ony oppression iniure nychtbouris bot last bredus ilis cosyng gyllus afore rehersit arriuit mony schyppis galyeonis argyle reuenge slauchter said gyllus othir freindis slane ireland pepyll impacient suffer heirschippis slauchter hym maid complaynit kyng edeir quhylk huntand nixt montanis tyme kyng edeir aduertist heirof past nycht ane cumpany chosyn ye see quhair said bred arriuit first brint thair schyppis gailyeonis thay mycht haue na refuge fle ireland pon nixt morrow kyng edeir persewit bredus complicis sic manheid thay war finaly tane put detth psic thyngis done kyng edeir past ilis quhare punyst syndry conspiratouris followit opinioun gyllus bredus phovv brytonis send ambassatouris kyng edeir support aganis iulius cesar thair orison kyng edeiris ansvver hovv ye said iulius vvas doung albio support scottis ca ii al sone edeir dantit inuasouris realme returnit dounstafage mene tyme come hym ambassatouris cassibilane kyng brytonis desyryng support aganis iuli cesar romane emperour quhais army reddy maist awfull ordinance cum albion edeir plesandly ressauit thir ambassatouris commandit thaym propone thair eirandis psone efter ane nobyll man namit androgeus sayd maner pi wyll say na thyng famous auditoure name cassibilane king brytonis maist nobyl price saif sal pertene baith ye weil thy realme liegis nature wyse moder creatouris he put ile albioun thre vailyeant pepyll nocht ye behuffe thay suld leif seditioun inuaid othir beistis reasoun bot incres togydder vnder ane beniuolence freindschip yt thay may strang resist vncouth ennymes quhen euir sall happin thaym inuadit quha may beleif traist ye realme stand sicker quhen ye britonis ar distroyit romani bot gyf sum man vane esperance wald traist romani quhylkis reiffis sceptouris fra kyngis plesand mercyfull yow youre nychtbouris ar distroyit thou may haue cognossance damage othir pepyll opinioun vane romani calland thaym self proude insolence lordis ye warld quhilkis ar hatit pepyll thair tyrannye ar determyt cum haistely albioun subdew sa myn thair empire quhat othir thyng may beleif romani sall quhen thay haue subdewit w britonis bot siclik auarice tyranny reif fra yow scottis pichtis landis lawis liberteis quhat othir thyng desyre thay bot sit landis castellis townis outhir thryll w maist schamefull seruitude elli banis maist nobyll vailyeant men amang w thair deidis schawis weill thair tyranny may weil prouyn w rewyne cartage sumtyme ryche ciete brocht finaly nocht fra randerit romani nochtwithstadyng abaid thair opinion faith forther gif sa remot vncouth hystory may nocht moue yow beh ld gallis nychtbouris quhilkis al sone thay war vincust romani war thirlit perpetuall seruytude thair munitionis euery maner wappynnis tane fra thaym nocht traistit romani sall propiciant w albianis gif w vincust thay haue bene otheris afore ay ye incressis thair dominioun thair tyranny mair insufferabyll lat w heirfore resist thir commoun iniuris pissance equale co curryng best resist violence romani begynnyng adueture thay grow efter sa strag quhe thair power iunit togidder thay may nocht resistit belt ye thairfore maist inuincibyl prince thy prouyn virtew support w thir thy vailyeat pepyl come lusty gallandis arrayit battal aganis common ennymes defend anciant liberte haue ferme esperance victory sen comon ennymes nocht content remanent boundis warld insaciabyl auarice ut ony occasion iniuris intendis subdew ile quhilk seuerit fra pepyll thair empire forthir quhen ye fauour goddis h conquest ictory aboue mony vn ellabil comod teis ye sall reiose youre liberte conquest glore immortall baith yow realme quhen idr geus endit th orison remouit asyde quhill noblis aduisit quhat done efter ripe deliberation concludit send support britonis resist commoun anger app ryng kyng edeir maid answer thir ambassatouris wyse ye desyre thyng weil belo britonis baith honest proffitabyll tyll comon weill mouand w defend realme quhilk he bene sa vailyeantly defendit oure progenitouris fra extreme dangeir thairto apperyng auarice rich cheualry pridfull empire romani ar schawin weill w thaym he bene subdewit thairto forthir knaw weill gyf romani subdew yow brytonis thair dominioun thay inuaid w nixt outhir thryll w vile seruitude elli expell w albyoun dammage gallis spanyartis fra quhome anciant faderis discedit schewis dayly w quhat afflictioun misery thay sustene ar subdewit romani bene mair honest thaym opinion haue fouchtyn maist strangly ye deid defence thair liberte haue reseruit thair miserabyll lyuis sic schameful seruitude knaw britonis wyl nocht ine thair realme thair liberte lawis strang bergane sen common weill may suffer na danger sa lang ye britonis standis sicker firmance ar degest counsall profoundly resoluit ieoperde lyuis guddis defence yow thynkand better de vailyeantly sort gyf sic thyngis plesand goddis remane hame suffering yow tender freindis reft fra landis liberteis fynaly rander oure natiue goddis wiffis barnis ennymes handis thir reasonis wyll caus army maist weirly ordinance send haistely london support cassibilane kyng brytonis pwe wyll al require gethus confiderat brother kyng pychtis concur w band alliance affect beleif thay ye dwellis albioun respect thay haue common weill wyll heir w gladly behalf luf beir vnto natyue cuntre enforcis w inuincibyl bodyis assist thairto ambassatouris britonis rasit esperance gret felicite answere returnit cassibilane al sone thir ambassatouris war dispaschit kyng edeir send two vailyeant men cadallane dowall capitanis brygandis lorne xm chosyn london pthe cumyng thir scottis thankfull cassibilane yt fecht aganis maist pissant ennyme iulius dantour warld mene tyme cassibilane aduertist iulius arriuit within see brocht army land ye pepyll fled war left resist cumyng see camp nobyl men vailyeantly resistit slane egyll quhilk ansenye romani prowdly dysplayit hycht thir nouellis na lytyll affray amang brytonis nochtheles cassibilane maid yame plesand cosolation exhortit yame vehemently battall defence thair realme liberte thair wiffis barnis natyue goddis quhilkis ar sa deir mortall pepyll thaym lyf man nothir plesand sicker beleif na othir thig said bot sicker victory sen ennymes persewis yow na occasioun iniuris bot thair insaciabyl auarice britonis war rasit gret esperance victory cummyng scottis pychtis thay na lytyll confydence thair manheid cheualry pincontinent cassibilane went forthwart hale power aganis romani first send hors men syndry wageouris weir cartis breke array ordinace romani first contering two smal incursionis vncertane victory bot last baith armyis iunit thair hale power followit ane doutsum batt lang continewing vncertane chance quhyll last cumyng welchemen cornwal sa huge nois rais reird sowne bellis yt hang thair bardyngis yt ennymes war affrayt finaly put flycht brytonis scottis pichtis come thair support followit chace sic fury skatterit array yt thay gat mair skaith thay dyd thair ennymes romani kepit si ordour thair fleing abaid sa fast togidder thair ansenye thay maid thaym oftymes renew battall howbeit thay war nocht power resist brytonis wyde skatterit syndry buschement eschapit nocht thair chace gret slaucht quhyll ye last nicht seuerit thaym al sone iulius persauit chace endit gaderit ye residew folkis togidder send ye woundit men schippis purpos reuege outrage ye morrow nochtheles herand morrow mony schyppis war sa brokin violent tempest yt thay war abyll hym proffet dreidand calamyte fallyn schippis suld na le curage ennymes discomfitour awin folkis supersedit intent quhyl saw ane tyme mair ganand al sone reparit nauy brocht folkis new strength quhare britonis mycht nocht inuaid hym syne pullit vp salis within nycht returnit france leuand behynd hym ane huge pray gudd quhilk mycht nocht turst laik schippis yeir iulius come first albion fra begynnyng warld vmcxxxix yeris afore ye incarnation lx yeris ye iiii yeir empire king edeir phovv iulius returnit britane maid tributar romane empire ca iii quhen cesar doung albio wyse albianis yt say scottis pichtis brytonis partit spulye found tentis custum armis reiosyng glorious victory maid sacrifice thair goddis beleuyng perpetually delyuerit baith weris romani othir vncouth pepyll tymis cumyng cadallane dowall richely rewardit cassibilane returnit ye army scottis schew kyng edeir al thingis done maner afore rehersit edeir reiosyng thir nouellis commandit generall processionis sacrifice maid honoure goddis followit sa incredibil luf kyndnes betuix scottis brytonis pychtis thay apperit le f tymes cumyng perpetuall peace yeir followyng kig edeir past innernes quhare sindry marchandis aduertist iulyus pecifiit france empire makand prouisyon ane new army returne brytane reuenge ye iniuris done hym yeir afore edeir sone efter send ambassatouris cassybilane schaw hie dangeris appering realme promittit send gyf plesit xm chosin men support thir ambassatouris thair cumyng london schew thir offeris cassybylane brytonis mouit vane arrogace yt ye glore victory suld tane fra thaym refusyt haue ony supple scottis pichtis answerit thay war nocht brocht sic febylnes yt necessar thaym haue support al tyme quhen ennymes inuadit thaym thay pyssance instantly quhylk thay dantit romani yeir afore king edeir nobillis na lytyll admiration sic vane arrogance refuse support aganis sa pissant ennymes dantaris warld iugit thairfore nobyl realme britonis proude insolence ane smal victory sustene gret dammage quhylk thyng weill sene end thir weris iulius returnit sone efter brytane quhais cumyng pepyll left resyst hym affrayit infynyte multitude schippis fled thair best refuge nochtheles iulius stoutly assailyet cassibilane thre syndry tymis put abak bot last cassibilane discomfist vailyeant capitanis tane slane cassibilane brokin ylk day irrecouerabyll skaithis disparit support randerit hym iulius gaif plegis realme sall remane tributar romane uince cassibilane yoldin maner comandit pay yeirly iiim poundis syluer romane pepyl maner tribute pof syndry message send iulius scottis pichtis thair ansvver iulius hoif syndry opiniois cocernyng first foudaris thairof ca iiii al sone iuli da tit brytonis wyse come london quhare ressauit gret reuerence honoure quhen tarryit thair certane dayis refresche army maid prouision pa scottis pichtis motiue weris becaus scottis pichtis maid support afore brytonis first tyme come britane yit afore maid ony battall aganis thaim thocht best assailye thair myndis ambassatour quhidder thay lyst haue weir peace peace gif thay wald subdewit romane empire weir gif thay uersly wald cotempne belyue send ambassatouris ye two kyngis scottis pichtis schaw thaym yt realmis fauoure apperit goddis war subdewit romani ye goddis sindry reuolutionis tyme geuyn monarchy empire warld syndry pepil say affricanis medis persanis grekis instantly romani placis ar foundin erd quhare romane cheualry vnknawin thay fauour goddis he brocht realmis landis vnder thair empire thay haue vincust aphrik egipt araby ioury perthia troy thebe asia macedone grece france spanye laitly brytane al regionis circulit ye occeane see ar obeysant romane lawis na pepyl ar erd yt knawis nocht name romani thair na sicker leuyng honeste bot quhare ye romani lawis he dominioun senat pepyl rome ar port sycker refuge pepyl quhais glore defend thair subdittis freindis iustice faith thir causis war na lytyll honour scottis pichtis haue societe romani callit confiderat freindis quhilk he sa mony cietes realmis brocht thair prouinces mony kyngis vnder thair seruitude comand cesar romane pepyll quhilk suld feruently desyrit syngular co modite baith scottis pychtis le thay wyll rebelland goddis quhilkis he determit bryng hale warld vnder romane empire kyng edeir noblis herand th message vnderstude colorit dissait romani thairfore maid answer sayng thay wald defend thair wiffis childre la dis liberteis al ye power thay mycht vter end thair lif rar ieoperde thaym maist dangerus battall leif seruitude fame romani nocht knawin thaym bot sa far thay war repute aboue ingyne man maist auaricious theiffis reiffaris realmes depriuing kyngis fenyeit causis slichtis subdewyng fre pepyll iniust dattall seruitude forthir gif romani mouit occasyon iniuris bot corruppit malyce hapnit inuade thaym iniust battal thay tuke goddis quhilkis ar punyssaris iniuris done innocent pepyll wytnes fecht ye deith defece thair ladis quhill ane thaym war left lyf ambassatouris hauand siclike answer pichtis returnit britane quhen iulius herd answer scottis pychtis send thaym secund message wt mair dispiteful charg tha afore efter followis gret cesar romane counsull persuadis kyng edere yow scottis submit yow romani ye maist pissant pepyll ye warld adu ture ye bring youre self imprudent fechtyng vter exterminioun take exempyll irrecouerabyll scaithis fallyng vthir pepyl thair vane rebellion behald ye maieste romane pepil cosyder ye magnitude thair name wyl ye assailye thaym chace battall britonis nychtbouris he laitly done quhilk fuliche b rgane ar outhir slane tane brocht perpetuall seruitude quhat pissance haue ye respect romani concreouris warld haue ye vane cofidence romani dantouris pepyll may vincust yow ye hynmaist pepyl thairof beleif ye yt warld may deliuerit fra seruitude romani yow may power quhilkis nocht respect romani restore empire sa mony kyngis dystroyit knaw ye nocht yt thair mony romane campionis na le actiue tha cesar baith wisdome maheid cheualry quhais illuster deidis he decorit regionis quhare sonne schynis yit difficil vincus cesar hym allone vincus warld presumptuous foly cumyn yow contempne goddis quhilkis thair propiciat fauour romani he ordanit regionis thaym subdewit beleif ye romani wyl sa irkit straitnes craggis mo tanis marressis p nurite vittallis thay may nocht abide regionis beleif ye sicker said montanis guddis ye ar dissauit gyf sic bane confidence yow sic impedimentis sal moue na mair romani fra thar purpos rowmys war plentuous full euery frutis necessar sustene thair weris ye romani he experience aboue ingyne man cheualry sa agill thair bodyis thay may dant thortour difficill gatis swift rynk reddy euery kynd ieoparde skars meit sleip accustumat euery danger yt may occurre battall sa prouident thay sall caus vittallis gyf neid beis brocht thaym regionis adiacet cesar he ane ripe wit euery cais may occurre heirfore gif ye haue ony regarde weill gyf ye prudent eschew warly ye fuliche vnprudent bergane bryng nocht youre self wiffis frendis barnis irrecouerable damage ye may haue honest coditionis peace afore victory quhilk ye sal nocht obtene quhen ye force battal ar randerit sall ye rebellioun reft baith landis honouris finaly brocht sic disperatioun ye sall neuir haue esperance recouer liberte al sone thir wourd war said sic fury noys rais amang ye scottis thay war impacient seruitude yt thir ambassatouris bene maist cruellie slane war nocht law pepill quhilk forbearis ay maist reuerence saffit yame nochtheles answer wes mayd thaym cadallane kyngis name followis psuppois scottis sum opinionis ar repute nocht circumspect bot fuliche dull ingyne yit thay ar nocht mouit mair cesaris plesand disfaitfull wourdis awfull minassyng lose thair landis liberteis extreme ieopardie battall thay ar nocht vse obey tyranis reuaris realmes kyngdomes bot onlie obey thayr natiue prince yairfore degest auisement counsall thay ar profoudly resoluit haue na amite alliance romani becaus yair fair wourdis ar nocht hyd treason falset thair wrangus iniust weris thay haue plane diffiance committing thaym thair iust actioun protection goddis iulius rycht commouit answer maid ordinance tary dant thayr rebellion mene tyme gatte lettris fra labienus admirall normadis piccardis quhilkis war pecifyit departyng war rebellit attoure carnutes he rasit gret truble france slane ane man namyt transegeri quhilk wes chosin romani kyng france hald vnder ye empire romani iulius feir nouellis left comyng
