scotland becaus vittallis war skant army na apperance new vittallis cum britane ye wynter season quhen tempestuus seis sufferis na passage marchandis gaderit residew army togidder returnit france leuand behynd hym britane tributar empire scottis litill abasit weris historie cummyng cesar britan subdewing empire nocht far discordat fra ye wourdis commentaris ar drawin w uerimond campbell othir authouris bot said vulgare croniclis iuli come calledare wod kest camelon principall ciete pichtis efter samyn randerit hym syne left behynd hym nocht far fra carron ane roud hous square stanis xxiiii cubitis hecht xii cubitis breid ane memory cumyng place sayis vsit hous tent al viage ay tursit hym ye caus callit iulius hoif yit becaus na famous authouris makkis mention ony weris led iulius aganis scottis pychtis lat thaym pa wyll infer na thyng werke bot yt may repreuit hous iulius round may yit se hauand na wyndois bot aboue maner ye anciant tempillis quhilkis ar yit sene rome benkis ane roud within pauement he bene aselar stanis egyll quhyik ye romane ansenye craftely ingrauyn bot roust yeris worne away ane huge stane standand south quhylk gentilis maid thair sacrifice utheris authouris wryttis tempyll biggit uespasiane honour claudius emperour goddes uictory tytyll thairof schew bot cassin edward ye first king ingland yt name wyl schaw mair largely heir efter phovv tratour murket co plicis vvar punist deith kyng edeir vicious kyng evvin thrid lavvis deith ca v sone efter dyffiance send iuli king edeir assemblyt ane army frome boundis realme resist ye romani knew nocht impediment iulius weris ye mene tyme quhen gaderit wise come murket quhylk nepote gyllus afore rehersit arriuit mony galyeonis ilis slew thair baith wiffis barnis agit personis ony resistence fensabyll said war drawin thay boundis kyng edeir al sone edeir aduertist thairof send cadallane capitane brigance ane band army men ilis quhylk sone efter cumyng brynt galyeonis ba ti within nycht pertenit murket morrow tuke murket hinggit hym complicis ye gallous kyng edeir leuit ye residew dayis ony vncouth domistik weris deceissit doustafage xlviii yeir regne xxvi yeir empire august emperour fra beginnyng ye warld vmclxxxiii yeris body burnt dounstafage sepulture war rasit mony hie pillaris memory nobyl deidis edeir syngulare virtew ht haue bene callit ane happy prince baith leuand deid war nocht left sonne ewin thrid name maist vicius man erd heritoure crown ewin eftir deith fader maid kyng beleuit ylk man haue followit futesteppis fader nochtheles fra declarit kyng began burgeon euery kynd vi e effeminat soupit iust past aboue common insolence youth ane hudreth concuvinis chosyn nobillest matronis virginis cuntre thocht wes irkit surfet noumer yit couth neuir saciat persuasioun lymmers harlottis quhilkis maid vp nocht assistance vice banyst ane certane nobillis otheris slew hyd wachyng ye fyne mycht esaly waik lust set mynd sla banis fenyeit causis thaym haitit vice abhominable tyrane geuyn wyse maist terribill cruelteis enuennomit cuntre vi yeris wt na le infelicite pan schame counsall certane diffamit creaturis quhilkis hop proffet extollit louit gouernance schortlie tyrane become sa auaritius vnthankfull ony reuerence lawis goddis men spulyeit seruitouris al thair landis rich gudis thay conquest vnder hym finalie grew sic blynd fury yat nurist opinle within hous theiffis mak reiffis heirschippis ye cuntre ony punitioun tuk ane large part thairof assistence beside thir mony othir thyngis vnworthy reheirsit maid lawis liegis sal haue al mony wyffis thay pleis efferyng thair guddis ane othir law maid wyffis commonis sal fre nobillis lord ground sall haue madinheid virginis dwellyng thocht ye first two lawis wes reuokit eftir counsall yit last law wes sa plesand ye young nobillis couth neuir abrogat quhill tyme kyng malcolme cammore blist quene sanct margaret quhilkis thocht samyn sa iniurius baith god man thay solistit ye nobillis reuoik said law takand thairfore ane goldin penny callit marchetis quhilk yit payit lord ground quhen virginis ar maryit redemption thair honour chaistite bot wil returne ewin quhais horribill vice wes sa dreuin euery mannis eir nobillis thoch effeminat monstoure wes geuyn sic cruelte vice vnworthy thair prince maid yair fore ane haiste cospiratioun aganys hym ewin nochtwithstandyng yi conspiratioun come displayit baner feild ane certane euill arrayit nochtheles wes sone vincust tane eftir lang co sultation wes comadit ye nobillis yat salbe degradit kyngdome remane perpetual prison wes ordanit al cadallane duryng lyfe salbe gouernour bot first nycht wes put preson wes slane ane young child quhilk traistit becaus wes odious pepill get reward slauchter bot morow child wes iustifyit presence mony pepil end maid vnhappy tyrane kyng ewin deceissit vii yeir h regne ony airis body xxxii yeir empire august pof kyng metellane natiuite crist saluiour gret fouth poetis oratouris philosophouris flurisit tyme ca vi eftir ye deith kig ewin nobillis chesit metellane quhilk wes nepote kyng edeir gottin h brodir carro king yi metellane wes ye maist humyll prince yt rang aboue ye scottis day hauand na vncouth domistik weris duryng tyme gouernyt materis baith hame fe gret felicite wes ane mercyfull prince subditis rycht religious eftir ye rite thay dayis tuk gret labouris abrogat cursyt lawis kyng ewin nochttheles wes faschit inopertune solicitation nobillis specially thay war geuyn thair lust wes constranit desist tyme come ambassatouris romani kymbalyne king britonis thankand hym perseuerance peace amyte senat pepill rome schew hym ye hail warld w tyme peace tranquillite euir wes sene ony tyme afore exhortyt brito thairfore example othir pepill keip peace concord amag thaym occasioun ony ciuill vncouth weris sic doyngis pertenit baith felicite august empriour othir pepill thir ambassatouris come sone eftir kyng metellane siclike exhortatioun kyng metellane heirad narratioun thir ambassatouris farrest pepill oriet secht amyte romani send syndry goldin crownis august emprioure thocht wald nocht vnplesand cotempne maieste magnitude romane pepill send thairfore thir ambassatouris sindry riche iowellis offerit august empr oure othir romane goddis ye capitol way kyng metellane conquest sicker amyte romani quhilk mony yeris eftir indurit yi message send august britonis writtis strabo buk geography callit discriptioun erd quhilk schawin situation britane ye maneris inhabitantis thairof pthe warld beand thus peace christ saluioure wes borne virgyne mary douchter anna ioachym bathelem cite iowry tyme quhen scheip hirdis herd ye angellis syng quhen thre kyngis gydit sterne come place quhare saluiour wes borne mony vncouth strange miraclis apperit tyme natiuite haly writ schawis natiuite fell x yeir regne metellane fra begynnyng realme scottis iiic xxx yeris xlii yeir empire august fra begynnyng ye warld vmiclxxxxix yeris kyng metellane rang mony yeris gud peace doyng na man iniure sa happy plesand subditis fame wes patent throw boundis albioun deceissit xxxix yeir regne xiiii yeir tiberius empriour fra natiuite crist xxix yeris tyme wes rome prince latyne poetis uirgill horace ouide tullius marcus uarro strabo titus liuius salustius mony othir naturall morall philosophouris sic fouth virtew letteris multiplyit thay dayis felicite birth crist ye geua science grace apperandlie wes neuir sene sa mony eloquent poetis profound clerkis leuand ani wes tyme quhen god clothit nature man wes sene erd bot returne historie pof king caratak hovv dantit sindry spiratouris realme hovv britonis rebelland aganis ye romani va discomfist thair massaige send scottis ca vii metellane micht haue ben callit maist happy prince euir rang aboue scottis war nocht decessit airis bobody throw quhilk ye crown come caratak son vailyeant cadallane afore rehersit wes nepot metellane gottin sister ewropea caratak eftir coronatioun ressauit huge treasour rich gaderit kyng metellane excedit pepill albion rich nocht lang eftir past throw al boundis realme syne past ane army ye ilis capitane thairof wes rebellit aganis hym nochtheles peacefyit truble rais seditioun punist principall mouaris thairof deith thing peacefyit maner returnyt albioun syne past carryk quhilk wes principal ciete yat schyre quhil sic materis wa ressit scotland deceissit kymbalyne kyng britonis quhilk youth wes sa familiar august yt held ay britonis opinion romani eftir quhais deith guiderius wes maid kyng guiderius seing realme stabillit hym thocht heuy britonis suld leif vnder seruitude romani mouit heirfore vane esperance recouer liberte conuenit nobillis ane counsall quhare lang orison complenit realme liegis war haldin vnder seruitude romani nocht onlie ye said romani held strenthis cuntre garnist sodiouris bot resset rebellis wald nocht restore ye pledg war geuyn thaym bot causit thaym waist thair dayis captiuite preson best thairfore rebell aganis romani suffre na lager thair yoke seruitude ye britonis inflammit thir wordis concludit generall consent suffer na langer seruitude romani incontinent thay ruschet harnes slew romani yt war found takin vtouth thair munitionis strenthis mene tyme guiderius gaderit ane army distroy garisoun romani afore ony noys rebellion war knawin rome nochtheles claudius empriour wes sone aduertist thairof send two capitanis namit aulus plancius gneus sentius britane mony romane legionis dant said rebellioun thir capitanis yair cu myng britane reparit al strenthis munitionis quhilkis war vnder romane obeysance new vittallis sodiour vtheris siclik ordinace resist ye britonis thay suld segit wtin yair strenthis thay brocht yair army ye planis reddy battall quhen thair ennimes list inuaid yame lang eftir guiderius assailyeit ye romani wt arra battal notheles ye victory succedit ye romani ye britonis eschapit wt smal damage cumyng ye nicht folowit mony incursionis gret slaucht baith romani britonis cotinewing symer cumyng wynter ye romani held thaym thair munitionis tentis tyme come certane ambassatouris fra guyderius caratak kyng scottis said maner thynk reasonabyl maist illuster prince thay seikis support strange vncouth realmis gyf na amite kyndnes deseruit thaym gud dedis schaw thyng yt thay desyre honest proffitabyll thir reasonis britonis ambassatouris kyng guiderius opprest heuy weiris destitute supple help saif yow scottis pichtis ar cumyn h illy yow treuth romane pepyll quhilk dayly inuadis w insufferabyl iniuris ar sare ymes rycht pissant baith ry he cheualry aboue estimatioun men nochtheles thay may vincust cesar vailyeant emperoure support virtew doung baith realme youris howbeit frace spaye almane grece asia egipt aphrik obeyit hym thir romani inuadis w ar bot refuse cesaris army dout thay may vin u gretter honour gif ye goddis fauourabyl thay call thaym self proude insolence lordis warld yow hynmest pepyll thairof dyng thir oure commoun ennymes albyoun desyre youre support sen samy may nocht done oure pissance quhilk thyng gif ye remembrance anciant kyndnes amite supportyng w oure maist aduersite dangere ye sall conques aboue youre hon st victor interminabyll glor honoure yow posterite first becaus ye help w quhilkis ar nocht pe sewaris bot defedaris na thig may sa honest plesand amag leuand creatouris defend actioun common liberte natiue goddis secundly ye sall delyuer youre realme pepyll fra hie dangeir thairto appering romani deidly ennymes intendis subdew w way may patent yow sen thir thi gi ar manifest yow maist vailyecampionis gif ye haue respect weil self landis garnis youre realme maner munitionis aganis romani quhilk thyng may esaly done gif ye pychtis equaly concur w aganis common ennymes samyn dare bauldly afferme sall pertene na le youre common weill ouris quhen romani he vincust w battal spulyeit w guddis subdewit oure realme forme prouince thay wyl ye abyl subdew thair empire tyme assailye ennymes battall quhill haue strenth quhil may help othir sufficient wi hstand thaym suthly gif lbianis wyll equaly concur togi r ane mynd thay sall draw al mekyll fra romani thay haue ony othir pepyll heirfore lat pissance scottis britonis pichtis equaly concur togider defend common liberte lat w tak wappinnis ani resyst iniure appering thocht war vincust quhilk god forbeid war na reproche w ar vincust ane pepyl bot pissance ye warld gif victorius iust actioun fermely beleuis victory sall na le glore proffet yow w ye salbe perpetually estemit pepyll pof caratakis ansvver hovv britonis solistit normanis picardis rebellion hovv said britonis vvar discomfist romani thair kyng slane ca viii caratak maid ansuer message maner followyng ye britonis nocht refusit oure supporte frely offerit yow quhen iulius romane counsull inuadit yow iniust battall suld nocht haue bene necessar yow day seik support w yit suld haue ben necessar w rais army aganis sa pissant ennymes iunyng al pissance togidder mycht esaly haue vincust thaym bene delyuerit dredoure reiosing oure rowmis albion perpetuall rest yit better thay say lait neuir thryf nocht deuysit mycht haue dantit romani tyme bigane bot may eschew hie dangeir appering ye complane ye ar iniustly inuadit ane ryche pepyl richt desirus haue dominion reif othir mennis guddis ye haue bene subdewit thaym mony yeris lyffand vnder thair seruytude awin defalt ye ar deuidit amang self seditionis intestyne sa lang ye stand common weill sall neuer fre forthir munitionis strenthis ar stuffit romane sodiouris planis ar garnist thair te ti heir al claudius cesar uaspasiane ar aduertist instant rebellioun reddy cum mony legionis pepyl realme think thairfore sen ye ar brokyn sa many calamiteis battallis howbeit ye haill power albion war concurrant yow ye resist sa pissant ennymes tyme le ye goddis war contrarius thaym best thir causis mei seditionis amang youre self superseding youre weris ane seasone set laubour maist crafty ingyne trasport dangerus battall france wirk prudently ye man solist normandis picardis bartaneris almanis vthir pepyll lyand bordour france rebell aganis romani esperance recouer thair liberte promit gif thay wyll assyst thairto support thaym schippis weirmen gold vthir necessaris pertenand thair weris ye man eik confiderat pepyll hatis romani gif ye weill ye sall eschew battall romani intendis moue yow conuert frace thus sall baith ye delyuerit fere ennymes leif remanent yeir quiete mair abyll ye nixt yeir battall gif thair na way eschew maist dangerus battall think best assemble pepyll albion togidder fecht honest battal deith ony respect lif bot allanerly glore honour na pepil may de mair honestly fechtand thair liberte natiue godd aganis ye lord ye warld ambassatouris britonis rasit esperace gud fortoun answer returnit guiderius britane quhen guiderius hard wyse counsall caratak send ambassatouris persuaid normandis pycardis bartaneris othir pepyll see costis rebell aganis romani saying na thyng abhominabyll fre pepyll contrar thair natiue lawis subdewit romani quhilkis war ane proude cruel pepyll dayly exercyng thair tyra ny sa many new intollerabyll conditionis seruytude plegis subdewit realmis na maner deith uld refusit recouer thair liberte quhilk lif nocht thir reasonis na thyng sa gud pepyll throw undis france rebell aganis romani sla thair sodiouris partis quhare thay mycht apprehendit gyf hortatioun thairto thay schaw kyngis albion sal assist thaym support thaym money vittallis schippis weirmen othir necessaris referyng thairto schew romani quhilkis war laitly cumyng britane hais tynt thair horsmen remenant brokyn sic calamite thay ar outhir chasit ye see elli thair strenthis cietezouris teruana flanderis quhom thir ambassatouris first come rycht desyrus recouer thair lyberte refusit nocht thir offeris bot charge hie thay couth nocht answer quhyll thay war aduysit thair nichtbouris prayit thaym keip thair peticionis secrete gif samyn war diuulgat al thair plegis war geuyn afore romani sall cruelly tormentit remoue suspitioun prayit thaym remane calice quhyll thay war resoluit mater pthus abaid thir ambassatouris britane certane dayis calice abiding thair answer mene tyme guiderius aduertist aulus placius rasit camp distroyit al landis fyre swerd stud opinion guiderius seand na way eschew ennymes gaderit pepyll togidder arrayit battall closit thaym wanis car euery syde except part fornens thair ennymes fyne nane thaym sal haue esperance fle syne put wiffis said wanis cartis exhort thair husbandis fecht vailyeantly thair lyffis landis tother syde placius deuidit army thre battallis blast trumpet come sa fe sly britonis thay na space schute thair arrowis britonis slag thair bowis fra thaym faucht thair swerdis wiffis exhortit thaym wt loude cryis delyuer thaym romane seruitude battall cruelly fochtin bot last brytonis war discomfist guiderius thair kyng slane mony ye weme war smorit cartis preis thaym yt fled chais ceissit nocht quhyll britonis war dreuyn ye reuer garieme vi mylis fra place quhare feild discomfist victory nocht rycht plesand romani gneus sencius mony othir romane nobillis war slane al sone vnhappy battall schawin frace maid pepyll thairof disparit recouer thair liberte ye ambassatou quhylkis war send said france returnit ony expedition thair message hystory haue wryttyn colleckit godofryde wrytar inglis historyis ueramond iohne campbell cornelius tacitus eutropius phovv claudius emprioure come britane subdevvit orknay empire sanct peteris first cumyng italy assumptioun glorius virgine mary ca ix schort tyme eft claudius empriour uespasiane ane singulare virtew arriuit mony legionis pepyll britane britonis herand cumyng war gretumly affrayit nochtheles publik aduysement thay send oratour excuse thaym sayng offence committit aganis romani done euyl counsall thay wald thairfore repare iniuris thaym done bot obeysant empire romani thair lawis tymes cumyng claudius comandit thaym geif plegis obseruatio thairof syne commandit prince lordis britane cum afore hym aganis ane certane day intimatioun gyf thay dyd nocht suld persew thaym deith britonis knawyng na refuge gaif plegis come london desyrit last quhen claudius demandit thaym quhy thay brak thair faith thay fell kneis confessand thair offence prayit hym sen thay war sufficiently punyst goddis ressaue thaym agayne mercy saif thair liffis vnder quhat condition seruitude plesit maid solempne aithis neuer rebell tymes cumyng gif thay failyeit al vengeance erd fal thaym thair posteryte sum romani gaue counsall claudius punys thair rebellioun sla principal mouaris thairof othir wayis britonis mycht nocht haldyn opinion nochtheles uespasiane persuadit hym mony reasonis mercy ane prince mercy may well dred bot neuir luffit al na thyng pertenit sa mekyll maieste romane pepyl haue mercy thair subdittis defend thaym fra al iniure ennymes way ye empire romani ekit suld indure samyn way end warld thir wordis uespasian mesit empriour sic maner chesyt erar namyt ane mercyful prince ane vengeabyl tyrane mene tyme began treit materis concernyng ye administratioun britonis first maid arniragus kyng britonis crown sall remane natiue blude prince walis bruthir guiderius afore slane ordanit plautius gouernour afore trebelli thesaurar commandit thaym stuf strenthis townis brytane strang gareson weirmen minister iustice lawis hald brytonis peace defend thaym fra iniure pepyll liand thaym specially fra scottis pichtis quhilkis wer ane pepyll full cheualry impacient seruitude seik na occasion weir aganis thaym gif war necessar haif battal haif stout wachis baith hame feild hauand na le respect keip britonis opinion romani e k thair empire finaly exhortit nobyllis britane remember ye affliction fallyng thaym thair rebellion keip thair faith tyme cuming weill thaym self thair barnis gudis sic thyngis done ye britonis returnit hame gaif thankis uespasiane humanite schawin thaym efter claudius cesar desyryng sum triumphe honouris afore returnyng rome thocht expedient vesy orknay last ilis within occiane see motiue weris aganis thaym becaus thay supportit ye albianis battall afore rehersit aganis romani schort tyme claudius prouidit necessaris come brytane prosper windis passit throw pentland firth orknay quhare nei perist nane orknay sene first cumyng quhe thay saw sa huge flote schippis arriuit wtin thair see thay hyd thaym cauernis claudi find ile desert went kirkwall send scurriouris spy nature cuntre pepyl thairof fra aduertist yt full euery bestyall foulis necessar sustene lyf man thocht ye sufficient eneuch decore triumphe morrow herand gan kyng orknay ane castell nocht xii mylis fra army send ane cumpany weirmen sege said castell quhe thir war passand forth wart ye effect thay persaui syndry rude pepyl cuntre cu mand fra ye couis quhare thay war hyd nycht passyng ye montanis thir rude pepyll war astonist sycht romani nochtheles se na refuge thay facht cruelly ane quhyle bot last thay war slane tane romani reiosyng victory laid ane sege ye castel last quhen kyng ganus debaitit lang tyme saw na rescours randrit castell brocht presoner wiffe child claudius tha claudius pullit vp salis arriuit calice quhare abaid certane tyme quhill army wer refreschit syne returnit rome led ganus wyf barnis plegis brytonis triumphe pthis hystory claudius cummyng brytane drawin suetoni eutropi beda campbel cornelius ireland tyme sanct peter ye appostyll come antiochia italy efter ereckit mony kirkis asia quhare prechand ye euangell crist began found crysten fayth tyme glorius blissit vergyne mary moder god tane body saule heuyn v yeir ye empire claudius efter incarnatioun xlvii yeris phovv syndry princis britane conspirand aganis aruiragus vver discomfist hovv confiderat kyngis come support thir princis britane aganis romani ca x al sone aruiragus maid kyng maner repudiat lauchfull quene uoada sister caratak put hir preison efter scho borne hym two douchteris ane sonne mene tyme mariit ane romane lady amit genissa suasio pla etis gif hap ye rebell aganis affinite ceissing betuix hym cara ak sall get na supp rt scottis syndry princis britane war rich como aruiragus quen maner persuadit hym mony reasonis hym ye romane lady adheir lauch ull wy e quhy bene borne hym plesand chyldr n quhome na thyng rd mirht omparit attour thay hew quhat proffet mycht frottis gif ennymes hapnit su tyme inuaid h r alme prait hym eschew yt rage lust dissaitful wordis romani drew nocht hym self britonis fra thair uld confderat freindis nochtheles quhen thay assai eit hym vane thir siclik wordis thay fand nocht bot reason blyndit new lust ony sich wisdome honour ye nycht followyng thay brak preison quhare uoada incarcerat brocht hir hir barnis thaym walis aruiragus wrait gre prin realme schewyng yt freindis lordis walis quhom maist confidi tuke indignatioun preferrit ane romane lady first wiffe bene vnleiffull hym haue syndry wiffis pleseir howbeit nouthi lawis suetude britane maid diroga ha rto affermyng eik said mariage na rage lust bot ye britonis romani micht togidder vnder ane blude amyte forthir desyrit thaym gyf lordis walis hapnit conspire aganis hym thay defend th fayth promittit romani answer thaym yt vnleiffull hym ony maner way prefer ane new wif h first wif caus thay war nocht co tent iniuris done hir aruirag knawing quhat mynd thir nobyl bure hym thocht best inuaid thaym tary aduise plancius assemblit ane army romani brytonis went walis princis walis na thyng affrayit cumyng met hym ane gret power nochtheles thay war vincust put flycht morrow aruiragus plancius aduertist yt darby longcastell york syndry othir schiris war rebellit dredand thairfore thair ennymes suld inuaid ye ist partis britane thay returnit london fra then plancius lytyl confidence britonis send france two new legi ni support army syne garnist strenthis new wageouris vittallis sic thyngis done plancius princis walis conuenit schrewisbery take consultatioun maist dangerus mater last concludit pepyl vnder thair obeysance sal conuene ane certane day place expell ye romani britane elli al ani e counsal decernit oratouris sall pa lordis carlyll kendell durame solist thaym samyn effect heruest followyng thir princis foresaid conuenit schrewisbery quhare thay lang regrait romane iniuris lamentit heuely fekylnes aruiragus quhilk desyre seruand romani kyng britonis nochtwithstandyng haill mynd pissance thay concludit recouer thair anciant honouris liberte bot began na lytyl contention quha suld capitane army thaym wald geif place othir tha comus prince walis said maner may sone gadder maist vailyeant ane greter army pepyl freindis thay may esaly resystit sa yt euery thig war gouernit craft cheualry stadis al victory glore battall nochtheles sedition discord ambitioun honouris ar cotratius thairto quhare thay sprout nouthir ordoure craft cheualry may haue place yit victory may ennymes thairfo e ambition drawin aw dissentionis expirit fynaly ane man chosyn quhome remanent pepyll sall obeysant quhais auctorite battall sall led gif intend haue victory obeysant thairto ar nere equale othir power thairfore best send oratouris caratak kyng scottis quhilk maist cruell ennyme romani desyre hym cocur w reuenge oppressioun done sister uoada defend neuo quhome ye romani intendis defraude crown britonis exhort hym take ye gouernance thairof quhill neuo war perfite aige thay obey hym chargis occurrit affection haue sister neuo esaly may mater solistit sone efter oratouris wer send caratak schew hym mater lenth afore rehersit caratak answerit yt greuit ye aruiragus maryst ane romane lady distruction hym self realme ony iniuris done sister neuo knawing weil omani vane fallowschip gyle subdewis vnprudent kingis thair dominion nochtheles promittit eu agane ye spring ye yeir support yame wt army thocht maist expedient pthe oratouris depeschit maner returnit schrewisbery spryng yeir said thir foresaid prince britane generall edict assemblit men yt mycht beir wappynnis ane certane day york defende thair comon liberte ye nowmer lxxxm men ye said day come caratak congestus ye confidera kyngis scottis pichtis quhais cumyng maid brytonis sa reiosit yt thay beleuit na thing bot sicker victory incontinent afore deuysit caratak maid general capitane army maid vnder hym syndry othir capitanis quhare thay war found maist wisdome manheid exhortit pepyl obeydient thairto sic respect thair singulare commoun weill thay suffer nocht thaym self randerit ennymes sumtyme prayit thaim remeber manheid thair elderis quhilk dang ye vailyeant iuliu albion albianis inflamit battal hortation come forthwar weill arrayit thair ennymes al sone planti aruirag war aduertist thairof thay arrayit thair folkis nochtheles thay thocht vng nand geif hasty battall knawing weil thair ennymes ful yre hatret thairfore cocludit yrk thaym lag tary walkyng labour penurite vittallis tha ieode aganis sa huge multitude peple enragit aganis thaym ani quhilk culd nocht vincust vntellabil murdir albianis delayng battall come sic poynt yt thay mycht nocht multitude peple haldin togidd sic derth hunger rais thair army sindry yame detit fra yair camp seik vittallis quhom ane certane wer takin brocht planci schew britonis hunger walking truble neir discofist pla cius morow maid armye reddy battall caratak weil aduertist yairof arrayit folk sound trupat iunit followit ane scharp battal fochtin cotinewalie vncertane victory quhill ye nycht seuerit thaim ilk side pla cius ye morow seyng yt mycht nocht renew h army returnit lo eftir yt ye maist part hors men wer tynt caratak brokin yt samyn maner come ye remanet army york comandit al folk pa hame quhil thay wer new warnit pof message send caratak planci ansvver ye deith geniss hovv vespasian vvas send britane dant britonis ca xi plancius eftir yi vnhappy batal send oratour caratak schew yt gret admiration yat caratak ony occasioun iniuris inuadit ye landis romani supportit thair ennymes hauand na remebrance ye gret humaniteis done hi claudius empriour quhen ye said claudius wt smal difficulte micht haue subdewit h realme pepil howbeit abstenit exertit wraith orknay thairfore desyrit repair al iniur hym done obstene thairfra tymes cumyng elli suld reput ennyme roman wes answerd caratak wes haue admiratioun yocht defendit nepote guideri vndefraudit iust heritage kyngdome ye remanet point answerit wes na fauour yt claudius inuadit nocht ye relame scott bot onlie becaus knew ye samyn nocht possible conquest extreme ieoperde chance battal ye caus past ye rude vnarmyt pepill orknay quhilkis mycht sone vincust ye fyne glorius vailyeant empriour amag febil creatur mycht haue ane fenyeit glore triuphe thir causis ye romani suld redres baith new auld iniuris done scott pychtis depart hastely albion thair folkis utherwayis nocht wes traistit bot scottis pycht britonis quhom thay held maist contemption suld thair perpetuall ennymes defence thair liberte natiue goddis plancius yi answer tuk hie indignatio thocht rycht vnworthy ane pepill nothir pissant rich cheualry pertlie sal contempne power romani maid thairfore aith reuenge proud contemption done caratak mony othir romani maid thair aithis samyn maner quhen aruiragus considerit ye gret constance caratak yi maner tuke ferme beleif gif pissance wer concurrant remanent albianis ye romani mycht esalie doug albion desiryng thairfore recouer anciant honouris liberte left plancius past al war opinion ye remanent princis britonis quhilkis war conuenit tyme schrewisbery quhare plesandly ressauit genissa romane lady quhome aruirag tuke place lauchfull wyf herand rebellion aruiragus tuke sic displeseir yt scho partit child sone efter deceissit aulus plancius ilk day hauand le cofidence britonis becaus thair faith sa oft brokin began garnis muni ionis strethis townis romani new wageouris vittallis send letteris diligence claudius coplenyng ye falset britonis quhilkis mycht na way haldyn vnder romane lawis bot maid new rebellion he brocht wt thaym cottis pichtis ye maist cruell b dy pepyll erd thairfore ye battal sal led tymes cuming aganis ye britonis bot erar aganis ye albianis thir reasonis gud war send hasty support romani yt thay nocht schamefully doung britane al sone claudius rede thir letteris send uespasian mony romane legionis britane uespasian efter cu myng seyng yt dagerus cais yt romani war intyl maid hym bring materis beter estait first callit afore hym ye said plancius se gyf damage fallyng romani battal succedit imprudence sleuth plancius hie purgation maid wordis bot sufferit dedis schaw thaym self euery thyng yt pertenit craft cheualry war sa wysly hym uydit yt sic admyraration uespasian yt fermly beleuit said plancius sufficient howbeit na othir power cumyn hym haue subdewit albianis romane empire phovv thre kingis albion mouand vveir aganis vespasian vver disco fist hovv vespasian ressauit aruiragus mercy maid landis tributar romane empire ca xii uespasian sone efter maid ordinance pa aruiragus britonis thayr rebellyon aruiragus aduertist thairof couenit noblis york quhare scottis pichtis war deuisit cum counsall deuysit afore yt euery sufficient beir armoure suld conuene expel ye romani albion bot ane certane euery schyre allanerly yt thair vittallis mycht ye mair esaly prouydit thus war ye britonis ye day affixit gaderit nowmer lxvm chosin conuenit york two monethis vittallis abidyng ye cumyng ye confiderat kingis quhilk come sone efter lxm men albianis assemblit togidder maner deuidit thaym syndry battallis capitanis hald thaym gud array tothir syde uespasian rasit tentis couoyit certane treasonabyll brytonis quhare ye albianis war followit sone ane da ger terribil battal ye albianis stude ane strenth besyde ane mo nocht xii mylis fra york alway ye romani yt faucht rycht wyng war neir discomfist nochtheles uespasia supportit thaym ane new legion quhais cumyng thair curage sa rasit yt notwithstadyng thair heuy woudis thay renewit battal quhe thay war persit throw ye bodyis thay ceissit quhyll thay slew thair ennymes fornens thaym otheris faucht sa cruelly yt quhen thair hand swerd doug away thay fell aboue thair ennymes raue thaym thair teith nochttheles ye fatal necessite victory geuyn deuyne weirdis romani micht vincust ye day multitude maheid lang seuerance battal repugnance goddis quhilkis determit subdew realmis romani ye albianis howbeit thay left na thyng vndone yat mycht pertene vailyeant campionis war finaly discomfist aruiragus opprest heuy dolour slauchter sa mony nobyl campionis wald haue slane hym self bothe stoppit freindis esperance better fortoune caratak saiffit ane nowmer pepil went brygance illithara kyng pichtis desiring leif efter ye slauchter dere freindis raif coit armour slane sone efter vnknawin quhat britonis efter vnhappy battall send ane herald vespasian desyrig peace schew sa huge calamite fallyng thaym yre godd yat lxvm britonis war left vic lyue war sa punist yat thay mycht sufficient exemple schaw quhat vengeance sorow cumis pepyl violation thair faith mys uespasia answerit wald heir na codicion peace quhyll aruiragus wer brocht presence aruiragus seand na refuge comperit humly maner quhilk thig mouit uespasia gret reuth seyng chance fortoune yat quhylk sa uit yat day morow tha sa destitute freindis yat desyrit mercy ennymes incontinent aruiragus fel kneis saying ye goddis tane sa rigorus punition hym pepyl yat couet leif aboue hie calamite thairfore desyrit nocht bot grace son wif quhilk afore wrangusly exilit ony falt uespasian seing dolor estait sic co passio yt micht tene fra teris nochtheles tuke counsall suld behaif hym mater su gaif counsal yat aruiragus suld send wt wif childre guddis rome lauchful pray abide iugement romane senatouris exempyl pepyll quhat frute procedis rebellion aganis romani otheris hauand sicht chance fortoune cousulit hi haue reuth trauel ye said aruiragus rome sen thair lauchful pray bot cumyng vnder assurace romani quhais empire eikit inuiolat faith slichtis thair subditt uespasian cou sal tuke aruirag mercy co tine wit hym auctorite syne comandit ye strenthis ye townis britane quhilkis afore war stuffit aganis ye romani randerit capitanis plegis geuyn obseruation yairof pricipal yt geuin tyme plege wes guiderius prince britane sonne aruiragus quhilk passand uespasian rome fell gret infirmite deceissit quhen uespasian dantit britonis wyse distroyit al thair awin law brocht thaym ye lawis romani comandit yt na man sal haif co mission blude within britane bot plancius deputis quhom certane war lymit minister iustice ye romane maner fame thir lawis causit al ye remanet brytonis yoldin uespasian gaue hym mony riche iewellis satisfaction thair offence phovv vespasiane vvan tovvne camelon discomfist caratak message send caratak caratakis ansvvere ca xiii winter cummyn causit uespasiane returne york quhare abaid sayd wynter aruiragus nixt somer rasit army come within bou dis mers berwyk pertenyng dominion pichtis quhais inhabitatis war ay maist vailyeant strangest ennymes britonis nochtheles thay war sa brokin tyme battall afore rehersit yat thay mycht make lytyl resistance bot war haistely yoldin ro ni utheris quhilkis war mair nobyl fled camelon beleuand ye romani suld nocht cum thair difficill strait passage uespasiane weill aduertist thair departing come diligence ony presumit wan ye said town camelon amang mony riche precius iewellis spulyeing town war found armis ye kyngis pichtis ane crown gold set precius stanis variat colouris ane swerd heft gold maist curiously wrocht ane purpour scheith swerd worne mony yeris efter uespasiane weris nobyllis pichtis war takyn camelo war licent returne hame thair pledgis uespasiane abaid lang tyme efter camelon brocht dyuers auld capitanis dwell leif vnder romane lawis instrukand rude pepyll thairof ciuill maneris biggit ane tempil nocht far fra said town apon watter carron honour claudius uictory comandit ye samyn adorit ye pepyl quhill uespasian geuyn maner polesy vane religion getilis aduertist exploratouris yt caratak kyng scottis renewit h army cumand furthwart reuenge ye iniuris done hym romani uespasian lytyll affrayit thir nouellis abaid camelon comandit planci ane part ye romani army meit hym lang efter soud trumpat baith armyis iunit faucht incredable slauchter athir syde last quhe thay fochtin fra ye dawyng ye mydday victory succedit romani residew scottis yt eschapit fra sorowful battall fled montanis kyng caratak euyl woundit brocht ye felde gret difficulte dou stafage throw fame vnhappy battall mony pepyl war yoldin romani thay dwelt brigace hauand lytyl cofidence thair strenthis fled thair wiffis child guddis ye nixt montanis fourt day efter plancius tuk ye town carrik tit al ye spulye guddis found amang weirmen send ane herald uespasian aduertis hym victory schew yt brigance principal prouince scotland randerit ony forthir rebellyon uespasian reiosyng thir nouellis come carrik quhare ressauit mony pepyll brigance opinion efter hauand compassion ye lametabyl chance fallyng caratak fechtand vter exterminion pepyll defence lyberte send messingeris hym saying nocht ganand hym ony forthir repugnant goddis quhome victory empire auctorite procedis erd quhais deliuerit sentence he ordanit regionis subdewit romani wes necessar thairfore hym pepill obey goddis quhilkis he tane ane manifest punitioun hym pepill thair rebellioun attoure promytti gyf wald obedient romane empyre suld remane honouris afore reput freind senat pepill rome uthirwayis gyf wald repugnant perseueir vnprudent hatrent aganys thaym suld degradit auctorite peple vterlie distroyit thir wourdis answerit caratak wes na le fury inprudence mortall pepill presume thay war familiar goddis haue ony cognoscance thyngis cum forthir gyf romani ony occasion iust battall wald inuaid hym culd na thyng le resist sa farre mycht traistit ye goddis sa iniust gif victory iniurius wrangus pepil forthir culd nocht vnderstand romani suld defend hym realme sen thay haue socht sa mony wayis reif hym thay haue done othir kyngis ye amite freindschip romani thocht ye desyrit gyf mycht hym ony comodite bot refusit gret damage suld follow thairthrow realme subditis ye realme scottis wes al fre hym kyngdome romani wes cesar empriour sen pepill nocht defend thair awin ar repute na le detestabil thay reiffis othir mennis realmes suld perseueir battall aganis romani fynall end liue defence realme liberte phovv caratak cuand vvith nevv army aganis romani vves vincust deith plati hovv ostori vvas sed place datit ye britonis ca xiiii answer uespasian tuk gret admiratio seing caratak sa inuinsabyl sperit quhe al ye remanent princis albion wer subdewit preteding fecht aganis romani proud cotemptio tuk purpos put hi pepill vter rewyne yit becaus passage wes difficil vittallis mycht trasportit boundis huge dammage romani changit mynd maid hym reddy pa ye ile man liand betuix ireland albion expedition thairof brocht mony schippis galyonis nixt port reddy ye samyn effect ye mene tyme gat lettris schewand yt baith walis ye ile wicht wes rebellit vncertane gyf ye procedit persuation france uespasiane traisting na thyng sa gud meit preset truble afore ony forther spred supersedit passage ile man past britane leiffand behynd ye strent brigance garnist strang sodiouris residew army plancius cumyng britane pepill facill lauboure wer sone dantit ye principal cospiratour punist yair rebellion uespasiane eftir thir feliciteis returnit commad claudi empriour rome quhare wes ressauit gret triumphe pal sone caratak wes aduertyst uespasyane wes detit albion thocht tyme ganand recouer landis scottis pychtis quhilk war reft afore tyrany romani assemblit thairfore ane army fra syndry boundis albion al pepil hatit ye romani desyrit reuenge thair iniuris ye romani weil certifyit h cuing met wt arrayit ostis followit ane terribill bergane fochtyn birnad hatret sydis scottis desiryng recouer thair liberte romani tyne ye landis thay wan afore gret difficulte pyne battall wes lang fochtin vncertane victory nochtheles wisdome cheualrie romani wa victory put scottis flycht caratak seyng army brokin colleckit residew folk come donstafage quhare consultatioun afore nobillis tuke auisement mycht defend realme aganis romani desyrit ane new army gaderit al boundis vndir dominioun al support yt micht gottin fra princis ireland thair anciant faderis expel ye romani scotland ani de counsal ripely sit thir psent calamyteis fallyng thaym frequent victorye romani thocht nocht profitable ieoperd ye realme ye last chance battall bot erar suffer yair pepill vaik sumtyme fra battal recouer sum strenth quhilkis he bene sa oft diffait afore ye samyn counsall wes deuisit certane chosyn men suld lye bordour brigance stop romani fra inuasioun ye remanent boundis scotland frequet incursionis erar yan plane battall thus wes battall prolongit twa yeris ef ony gret slauchter samyn tyme plancius gouernour romane army fel irremediable infirmite flux quhen vnderstude cleirly mycht nouthir conuales support nature medcine wes sa disparit life yt desyrit claudius empriour sen mycht nocht labour forthir common weill rome send ane prudent capitane place hald albianis vndir romane lawis ye landis conquest afore gret difficulte wer nocht tyn claudius desyre send britane ane vailyeant knycht namyt ostorius scapula sone eftir cumyng plancius deceissit camelon body wes brynt eftir custome rite romani consecrarit ye tempill claudius victory thus rais ane cosuetude mony yeris eftir obseruat amang scottis pychtis byrne bodyis thaym yat deis apperis yit mony signys dayis yeir god imvcxxi yeris fyndou e ane town ye mernis v mylis fra aberdene wes found ane anciant sepulture quhilk wer ii lame piggis craftely maid letteris ingrauit full brynt powder quhilk sone eftir thay wer handillit el dros siclike kenbothen ane town mar x mylis fra aberdene wer found two sepulturis samyn maner full brynt powder mony othir sepultutis he bene oft tymes found maner ful brynt powder bot wil return historye quhare left britonis eftir cummyng ostorius scapula beleuyng recouer yair liberte becaus knew thair maneris countre rebellit ostorius desyryng haue occasion rebellioun yt mycht schaw proues manheid rasit camp inuaid welche men otheris britonis west partis brytane finalie put thaym discomfiture eftir yi victory went ye est britonis fornence ye france seis quhilkis war ye principal monaris rebellio thir britonis seyng na refuge fledde ane strait ground quhare thay mycht nocht esalie inuadit nochtheles thay wer finalie vincust throw fame vnhappy battall remanent britonis wer subdewit ostorius phovv caratak fechtad vvith nevv army aganis ye romani vvas discomfist maid presoner ostori treason cartumandia stepmoder ca xv ostorius schort time eftir tuk ane castell cuber namit carlill eftir tane gret praye guddis partis lyand thair come al army baith penthland carrik kyle cunyngham wrocht insufferabil iniuris fyre swerd pepyll thairof caratak impacient sustene thir offecis determit outher de elli reuenge samyn mony othir albianis come hym ye samyn mynd army caratak tyme wes noumerit xlm men wes arrayit sic maner yt al yair bakk wer set contrar ane deip riuere ony furde ye fyne ye nane yame may haue esperace flee yan wes al ye agit wemen quhilk come gret noumer visie chance feild set ilk syde battall rais ye spreitis men thair clamour cast stanis thair ennymes sla thaym quhen thay fell al othir wemen yat war young wicht war arrayit armour wappinnis amang ye men sic thyngis done capitanis went heir thair ye army exhortyng yame general battal said yat daye behuffit thay othir recouer thair liberte elli thirlit perpetual seruitude sutyme thay maid inuocatioun ye deuine spreit thair eldaris quhilk yair man heid glorius cheualrie dang iulius albion maid thaym thair posterite exonerat fra al tribut seruitude romani yan followit sa huge clamour noyis ye army yt ilk man promittit ony feir fecht thair realme liberte deith ostorius wes na litil astonist seyng ye scottis sa huge multitude brym desire battall knawyng weil danger wes fecht aganis ony men extreme disperation refuge caratak yit gyf ye army curage spreit fecht schew yt thair petual liberte wes present thaym yat feild wynnyng othir syde ostorius wes na le prudet hortation h folk desiryng yame lang orison remeber thay wer romani dantaris pepill thair ennymes bot rude barbar humanite cassin nature crafty moder al creature ye remote last nuyk ye warld incotinent baith ye armyis thunderand preis trumpat iunit faucht wt mair cruelte yan euir wes herd ony warld afore nochtheles romani wer finalie victouris battall wes tane caratakis wif h docht bred oft sene men ca haif sickir freid aduersite caratak fled gud moder cartumadia quene scottis quhilk eftir deceis fader cadallane wes maryit apon ane va yeant knycht namit uenisius curtumandia seyng caratak distitute consolatioun deliuerit hym ostorius ix yeir eftir ye b ttall wes begun romani albion ostorius seyng caratak brocht afore hym fra kynglie dignite sic compassioun tuke hym hand said caratak yi mischance suld sufferit pacience thocht thow distitute gud fortoun yit thou art nocht cumyn hadis nakit virtew eschame nocht pray romani quhilkis he subdewit sa mony riche vailyeant kyngis led thaym triumphe answerit caratak heuy heir mon said suffer aduersite howbeit contrar yit na thyng sa greuous fortoun quhilk sa cotrarius gouernance yat scho he de eckit thy feit example hir mutabilite maid presoner treason tha force quhil pyssance indurit maid impediment bot treason stepmoder cartumandia quhom maist confidence eftir discomfitour cumyn thy handis part obey victour vnderlie ye wil pleseir ennyme thy part salbe vse ye chance ane victorius capitane mercifull vincust miserable peple may haue sum esperance grace al sone caratak said thir wourdis wes brocht tentis romani tretit reuerence fferit ane kyng phovv caratak vvas brocht ome hovv e returnit scotland vncouth meruellis sene alhion syndry nobyll clerkis deith caratak ca xvi caratak within dayis eft wes brocht throw italy h wiffe douchter bredir rome ye pepil heirand cu myng assemblit ti rycht desyrus se vailyeant kyng quhilk fouchtyn sa mony yeris aganys ye romani cumyng stude arrayit stretis rome ye band weirmen gret ordour first wer schawin hors harnes bardyng riche spulyeis quhilk war gottin feild aganis hym followit wif douchter last hym self caratak brocht afore empreour maner seyng freindis come hym sumpart astonyst schaw curage na thyng de eckit calamyte said maner bene al fortunat prosperite rich hie nobilite blud micht haif erar cumin freind presonere town wes nocht vnworthy throw progenitouris gret dominioun haue bene cofiderat romani present calamyte na le honorable cesar empriour vnplesad sutyme hors harnes men rich quhat wonder thocht haue lost thaym aganis wyll gyf ye romani haue empire aboue ye warld force al peple man th llit seruitude bene canderit romani sone eftir thair cuming albioun nothir thy glore yi calamite bene sa notable knawin yocht thow punys yt thy presonere ye deith memory sall sone euanys yit thow suffer returne realme salbe ane perpetuall example thy mercy emprioure incontinent gaue pardoun grace baith hym wiffe brether delyuerit thaym bondaige sone efter faderis conuenit fell syndry communicationis concernyng ye capitane caratak mony thaym thocht takyng hym na le honorabyl romani takyng kyng syphax scipio persis l paulus ye taking ony othir vincust kyngis ye romani decernit thairfore ane triumphe geuyn ostorius caratak commandit returne scotland leiffand eldest brothir douchter pledge mony prodigeis vncouth meruellis war sene albion yeir yat caratak faucht romani ane gret battall horsmen war sene arrayit ye feild sone eft huge noyis murdir athir syde iunit togidder bot thay euanist sa suddanly na maner signe apperit ye feild quhare thay war first sene nycht afore battal apperit wache ane multitude wolffis tuke ane thaym war wache away brocht hym thaym nixt wod bot morrow al sone lycht apperit thay brocht hi agane ony harme body carryk ane child borne ane rauyn heid thir vncouth signis apperit nales terrour admiration ye pepyl deuinouris interpret thaim signify gret trubyll dangeir appering caratak heid realme nochtheles seing hym returne fra rome ony displeseir thay bega interpret thaym ane othir face pepyll reiosyng caratakis returnyng ressauit hym excellent honouris conuoyit hym town carryk town comand empriour restorit hym brygance kyle cunyngham caratak past remanent liffe tender amite romani ony vncouth domistik weiris baith brethir douchteris war send hame hym fauoure empriour caratak leiffit two yeris efter gud peace deceissit xxi yere regne ane prince mair vailyeant fortunat dayis geuand ingyne curage defend realme subdittis fra seruitude romani institute thaim gud maner tyme mony nobyll clerkis persi iunenale senica pepyll began al partis warld ryis sicker faith crist vane ydolatreis superstitionis put downe sa endis heir thrid buke heir begynnis feird buke croniklis scotland phovv corbrede vvas maid kyng scottis hovv pichtis rebellit aganis romani slevv ostorius thair capitane ca primo caratak bead yi maner deceissit beryit wt funerall triumphe carryk ane riche precius sepulture wes maid hym hiear pillaris rysyng ye samyn euir wes sene afore h eternal glory price na ayris bot ane douchter succeid realme wes trublit sic infirmite yat scho deceissit ane virgyne eftir hir deith corbreid youngest brothir caratak wes maid kyng eldest brothir deceissit schew afore passand uespasiane rome yi corbreid wes fers ingyne nocht far differet fra brothir caratak maneris ye beginnyng empire went ilis ro quhare punist mony kir schrewis thair attemptatis rewardit thaym yat fand defendouris ye comon weill large comoditeis quhill corbreid wes geuen maner iustice romani began decay britane pychtis eftir creation hair new kyng conkist hope recouer thair liberte slew mony ye romani heir yair skatterit throw cuntre thay traistit eft deith caratak na recounteryng foundin thus nane romani eschapit war nocht thay hapnit haistelie reskewit support thair strenthis nochtheles mony principall capitanis wer slane ostori inpacient suffer yir iniuris come ane haisty weil arrayit army aganis pychtis followit sone ane sore battal fochtin sic cruelte slauchter romani wer neir discomfist ostorius ruschit sa fersly forwart haue maid thaym support wes euill woundit narrowly eschapit vntakin nochtheles nycht seuerit thaym lamentable slaucht ilk side followit cotinewal incursiois reif slauchter chance succedit throw fame victory come sindry cumpanys pepill pychtis gaue occasioun fecht aganys romani bot skarsly wes ye battall iunyt quhen pychtis left ye feild fled thay bene discomfist yat fyne thay mycht draw romani said place quhair thair ambuschement wes laid thay deuisit sa succedit eftir ye romani following maner wer slane al sone ostorius wes aduertist heirof fled gret dredour tentis wrait claudi emprioure pichtis wer rebellit mycht na way haldin vnder romane lawis claudi maid vow punys pichtis sic maner thair name memorie sall peri albioun bryng purpos effect send britane two romane legionis nochtwithstanding ye cumyng thir legionis pychtis grew ilk day insolent aganis romani finalie suddan irruptionis slew two capitanis romane sodiouris quhilkis wer assemblit afore mak incursionis cuntre partit thair spulyeis amang thair fallowis concurrit thaym said bergane postorius trublit heuy curis doloure risyng woundis gat last battall deceissit gret consolatioun ennymes phovv manlius vale capitane britane vvas discomfist pichtis hovv didius vvas send place messaige send pichtis corbreid ansvver ca ii ostori bead decessit wise manli uales wes maid capitane romani britane com mony auful legionis aganis pichtis followit ne scharppe bergane fochtin lang tyme doutsum victory pand quhen ye pychtis stude maist danger come haistelye iiiic men kendill quhen na man beleuit thair support quhais cummyng romani war put flycht battal wes slane iiim romani twa thousand picht claudius aduertist th vnhappy chace falling romani britane send aulus didius two romane legionis succeid place yi aulus cummyng albioun romani small felicite maid hym thairfore reuenge iniuris done thaym persewit pychtis quhare euir thay mycht apprehendit deith pand first callit romani afore reprochit thaym thay failyeit thaym self war nocht sa walkrif prouident al materis thay suld haif ben eftir takyng caratak meru llit eik thay wer sa far degenerit fra romane glore schamfullie ouirthrawin thair febyll ennymes finalie prayit yam beleif nocht thair discomfitoure cummin ony manheid virtew thair ennymes bot onlie de thair awin necligence euth prayt thaym obedient thair capitane haue na occasioun thaym lei curage romani maid incontinent thair solempne vowis reuenge al iniuris done thair ennymes pychtis first brut thir nouellis wer effrayit nochtheles memorie yi recent victorie thay began tak gud curage send incontinent thair ambassatouris corbreid kyng scottis schawing yocht thay haue laitlie coquest two victoreis romani yit said romani hatrent afore intendis cum awfull incursionis pentland purposyt eftir distructioun pychtis inuaid scottis ye maner thairfore desyrit said corbreid send support tyme occurre present dangeir erar afore pyssance wer brokin quhen landis wer wais mycht mak na support wes answerit corbreid yat knew weill didius wes cummyng albion na gud mynd hym realme intendyng nocht onlie keip landis conquest afore romani bot al augment samyn new regionis landis yit becaus wes conf derat romani wald na wayis inuaid thaym battal bot gyf thay first inuadit hym wes oblist yairto cotract maid afore caratak nochtheles defence realme pepil suld cum within ane certane day al power erar mak impediment romani inuaid thaym ony battall phovv cartumandia quene scoti vvas beriit quik hovv scottis pichtis faucht aganis romani vvith vncertane victory vvar costranit take peace deith didius ca iii al sone thir oratouris war depeschit corbreid went ane army brigace didius heiryng cummyng chargit hym ane herald depart haistelie thairfra allegit wes prouince land romani gra onlie caratak duryng lyfe certifying hym gyf wer rebelland charge suld ennyme romani ing force boundis realme scarslye wer thir wor said quhen tithingis come cesius nasica lieutenant didi wes entrit ane army brigance corbreid incontinent gaderit pepyll ane gret strenth traisting na le honour keip subdittis perell wirk da mage ennymes syne wen epiak consulit maist dangerus mater uenisius husband cartumandia gud moder pthis uenisius wes ane man hie ingyne wes lang tyme defendit fra iniuris nychtbour auctorite romani yit becaus saw thair tyrany proud dominioun sa importabyll rebellit come opinioun natiue prince cartumandia quene scottis spous said uenisius rycht sorowfull thir feliciteis dayly succedyng corbreid dredand hir punyst scho treasonabilly randrit caratak afore romani tuke hir husband freindis crafty slychtis held thaym preson pcorbreid mouit th offence come epiak eftir put ye said uenisius freindis liberte commandit woman c tumandia buryit quik p cumpany scottis tyme followit vnwarly chase romani thay wer beltrit euery syde ennymes afore thay wist slane discomfitoure maid remanent scottis within thair municionis strenthis effrayit thay mycht scarsly haldin fra fleyng fyft day eftir romani went forwart assailye munitioun scottis thair horsmen bot wes sa circulit ilk side within ane mo na horsmen mycht inuaid thaym na passage bot ane part quhilk maid thaym flaikis scherettis treis pnochtheles quhen thir romani knew scottis pychtis wer within thre mylis thair army thay left thair purpos incontinent cesius nasica capitane romani broch army weil arrayit feild abaid styll quhill cummyng thair ennymes pon tothir syde confyderatte pepill mene scottis pychtis went fast forthwart quhen thay saw thayr ennymes sycht thay wer aynd uir thay come ony straikis yit thay iunyt ye occasion ye sonne faucht continewally quhill thay wer senerit cummyng nycht romani fl thair n confiderat kyngis montanis mene tyme didius romane legate send ane herald cesius leutenand schew gret trubyll amang brytonis walis thairfore commandit hym make sum honest way peace scottis pychtis landis conquest afore sa huge dyffyculte war nocht schamefully tynt thir nouellis maid cesius defaik sum part curage confiderat kyngis brokyn recent bergane send thair ambassatouris nixt morow cesius haue peace lamentyng huge murdir calamite fallyng baith thair armyis last battall schew thairfore sufficient yneuch romani haue confiderat kyngis thair freindis tymes cumyng thay war sa obstinat na thyng mycht vyncus thaym duryng thair lyffe pcesius hauand honest occasioun treit peace confiderat pepyll set ane day common materis said day peace fynaly tretit betuix romani scottis pichtis vnder thir conditionis pthe romani sall keip landis thaym conquest afore peace ony ferder conques sall nouthir inuade scottis pychtis battall le scottis pychtis inuade thaym fyrst pthe pychtis sall leif thair awin lawis conkist thayr kyng regne aboue thaym afore payand auld tribute wageouris camelon iurisdictioun blude sall onely romani pna franchemen brytonis ar fugitiue fra romane lawis sall resset amang scottis pychtis pthe scottis sall reiose frelye thayr landis vse thair awin lawis pprouydyng wayis thay support nocht inhabytantis ile man vyttallis wappynnis iniuris laitly thaym done romani pand fynally sayd scottis sall nouthir support pichtis britane gyf ony thaym happynnis rebell aganis romani yit inuade thaym battall sa lang thay abaid fayth romani pthe peace beand confirmit sort partyis returnit hame peace indurit ony violatioun sa lang didius capitane brytane saxt yeir efter deceissit london phovv anius vvas maid capitane britane deith hovv svvetonius successour put ile man sak hovv brytonis maid nevv rebellyoun romani syndr prodigy meruellis sene albioun ca iiii didius beand deceissit said comand nero emprioure send brytane ane new capitane namit ueranneus quhen ueranneus vysyt sindry prouincis britane come camelon maid sacrifice honoure goddes uictory claudius emprioure quhilk laitly deceissit de ficat romani ueranneus rycht desyrus equale antecessouris glore cheualry socht mony occasionis moue battall nychtbouris pso hapnit certane hieland theuis scotland tuke ane pray guddis pychtis landis ueranneus traistyng yi sufficient occasioun moue battall ocht na redres reasoun ye peace afo e contrakkit bot send ane multi de pepyll ony mair tary landis scottis frequent incursionis brocht away ane gret pray men guddis thaym pentland scottis mouit outrage ruschit haistely harnes followit ythand heirschippis chter thir side myddis trubyll ueranneus deceissit last wourdis war sa full vane arrogance glore wrytis tacitus beleuit hym self sufficient gyf leiffit two yeris mair tha haue subdewit boundis albion romane empire pefter deceis swetonius ane humyll man send place quhylk efter cuming renewit peace albianis quhen reparit iniuris quhare thay complanit maid hym pa ye ile man full vailyeant pepyll generall resse thaym ha ebellit aganis romani cumyng said ile fand ane strange gyse battall arrayit aganis hym pfyrst stude ane cumpany wod wemen arrayit furius habyte sandis hair hyngand ouir thair ene armyt fyre brandis thair handis efter thaym stude preistis namyt druydes heuand thair handis heuyn makand maist terribyl cursyng romani myddis thaym stude ane band armyt men reddy fecht romani wa mair astonist vncouth sycht furius wemen preistis ony terrour armyt men nochtheles hortatioun thair capitane thay went forthwart displayit baner fynaly baith thir wemen preistis war discomfist yoldin swe onius efter victory garnyst strenthis ile garnison romani maid plane euersioun woddis quhare preistis vsi thair sacrifice honour thair goddis pquhen swetonius dantit ile man maner aduertyst france rebellit thairfore peacyfy trubyll pullyt vp salis ar yuit bartanye brytonis herand departyng thocht tyme ganand recouer thair lyberte rebellit motiue thair rebellyoun uiragus thair last king left two dochteris emprioure herytouris kyngdome ryches traistyng saif thaym fra trubyll way howbeit thyngis succedit contrar beleif realme gouernit romane capitanis hou put seruitude bene pres battal wyf uoada bet straikis baith two dochter deflorst britonis opprest thir iniuris dreidand ylk day mair displeseris follow maid plane rebellion socht support partis quhare thay mycht mony vncouth meruellis war sene tyme albion occiane see apperit bludy mony deid bodyis cassyn brayis thairof wemen yeid wod declarit terribyll thyngis cum ymagis claudi beside camelon fel dros ymage uictory fell fra alter hir bak scho bene vincust spayme said thir prodigy signifyit gret dammage apperyng romani pychtis quhylkis war camelon othir munitiois thair beside herand answer wer ereckit esperance better fortoun nocht maid priuat cospiration aganis ye romani bot slew mony thair wageouris afore thair rebel lyon patent agit romani quhome pichtis maist hatrent war slane gret nowmer resydew chasit al boundis geuyn thaym lang seruyce fynaly thir agit romani fled ane auld tempyll within boundis berwik quhare thay war al slane inhabitantis region petus cerealis lieutenant swetonius desyryng support thir agit capitanis come ane legioun romani ane cumpany horsme nochtheles legion discomfist hym self chasit ye romane tentis nixt nicht fled cattus procuratour brytane quhilk tyme kent al sone cattus aduertist trubyll ylk day rysyng brytane fled feir lyf france pof complaint maid voada quene britonis corbreid message send cattus catt ansvver syndry incursionis maid scottis romani first cumyng murrayis scotland ca v voada quene britonis opprest dayly iniure romani send hir secretar hir brothir corbred kig scottis complenyng hir mesirie trouble hir dochteris deflorit hir self sa schamefully doug romani pacience mycht nocht auaill bot onely ane place new iniuris sutyme wes bot ane king britane bot tha rang two kyngis legat romane curatour ane hauand power distroy thair blude othir deuore thair substance man reput maist nobyll amang romani mycht defoule monyast wemen make maist herschyppis pepyll becaus na thyng mycht suffyce satefy insaciabil lust auarice romani scho requirit hir brothir suffer nocht hir onely syster schamefully doug hir dochteris defould punition finaly schew britonis ye infinite harmes done thaym romani war rebellit throw quhylk mycht haif better occasion inuaid ye romani battall tyme ony othir tyme afore corbreid mouit pieteous complaint send ane herald catt romane curatour quhilk laitly returnit britane coma ding redres al offecis done sist failyeing yairof declarit hi ennyme romani tymes cumyng answerit catt na thyng pertenit corbred quhydder rycht wrang war done uoada al ane vane foly corbred sen bot ane rud barbar seme rius romane materis pertenyng na thyng chargis forthir gyf ony displeseir war done uaoda quene britonis samyn sall ikit doubyll iniuris romani wald nocht dedenye thair maieste satefy desyre barbar pepyll ony othir sort tuke na regard quhidder war freind fo quhat mycht corbreid mouit outra eous answer maid new band confideration pichtis within schort tyme efter confiderat kyngis rasi ane army men yt mycht foudin within thair realmis syndry ireland men come thair support slew ye romani al partis quhare thay mycht apprehendit ony r nsom piete iurnay thay tuke berwik quhilk maist populus town region quhe thay slane romane sodiouris foundyn thair intyll thay kest downe wallis thairof onto ground inhabitantis ile man heirand thir nouellis thocht tyme ganand recouer thair strenthis sone efter pepyl brigance carryk kyle cunyngham come thaym past arrayit battall throw syndry prouincis romani ceissyng fra na maner cruelteis mycht deuisit thaym town carlell nocht saffit fra cruelte efter tane ciet ani thairof war slane strang wallis thairof equat ground wemen duryng fury war sa desyrus reuenge cruelteis done romani thay bure armour wappynnis tyme ane pepyl namit murrayis discendyng almane blude doung thair natiue regio romane weris come skatterit syndry cumpanyis ye mouth ryne quhare thay pullit vp salis thair capitane rodorik seik ane new habitation last efter thay bene lang trauellit wylsum see inhibit land france brytane thay arriuit forthe quhilk ane arme ye see deuydyng pentland fra fiffe pichtis ressauit thaym ye mair plesandly thay apperit strang bodyis support thaym aganis thair pissant ennymes war nocht discendit thair linage blude bot al war sworne sa far thair power mycht reuenge iniuris done thaym romani rodorik brocht pentland murrayis maner went ye confiderat kyngis thaym lamentit sore tyranny romani quhilkis onely desyre dominioun he subdewit ane large part almany nocht thirllit pepyll thairof importabyl seruitude bot subieckit thaym romane lawis siclike ye murrayis quhom capitane w r doung thair natiue landis constranit becaus thay mycht suffer na seruitud seik new habitation alwayis wes ane gret consolatioun hym murrayis yat thay fauour goddis wer brocht thay landis quhare thay mycht reuenge ye iniuris done thaim thair ennymes thir mo iuis desyrit confiderat kyngis suffer murrayis pa formast support thair peple desyrit gif hapnit thaym thair manheid cheualry ding romani scotland grant yame wiffis yat thay mycht incres vnder ane blude scottis pychtis contrar gif hapnit thaym slane thay tuke na cure thair deith swa thay sufficientlie reuengit iniuris done thair proude ennymes thir desyris ye murrayis wer acceptabill confiderat kyngis yat thay vnderstude thaym enragit maist cruell hatrent aganis romani yair fore condiscendit thair peticionis traisting yair incredible man heid strenth wirk sum hie displeseir thair ennymes pof ye orison maid voada quene britonis confiderat kyngis hovv scho vincust romani finaly slevv hir self deith kyng corbreid ca vi cofiderat kyng reiosyng ye cummyng murrayis yi maner went forthwart deligence meit uoada vailyeat quene britonis quhilk wes tha gaderit ane huge noumer britonis abidyng thair cumyng al sone uoada vnderstude hir bruthir corbreid kyng pychtis wer cumin wt thair armyis scho went forthwart meit thaym eftir maist tender hertlie embrasyng ilk syde uoada said yame yi maner bene borne maist vailyeant campionis ane man mycht nocht ha e sufferit sa mony cruell intollerable iniuris ar done romani nochtheles quhat sume ir ymage nature he formit gyf ye concurre reuenge comon offence done w thir romani yat ar sa vailyeant aganis wemen sa cruel thair subditis sall sone se quhat vassalage may done ladyis quhen extreme danger occurris yocht may wayis deuoid wiflie ymage yit sall want mannis hardyment bot sall fecht formest bront vm armyt ladyis quhilkis ar sworne reuenge cruelteis done romani sall pa formast battall feir deith bludy woundis sal nocht othir wemen vsis affrayit ony woundis tane geuyn ennymes haue na mercy thaym yat he inuadit freindis sic odius slauchter cruelteis thir odius tyranni nakit vode piete he slane sa infinit noumer pepill deflorit sa mony honest virginis matronis thay knaw nocht thaym self beleif men borne wemen arme yow motiuis maist vailyeat kyngis aganis comon ennymes sic curage ye sall se ladyis haue afore yow beleif nocht bot sicker victory ye romani ar sa effrayit thay co fide na thyng sa mekle yair fleyng haist army al deligence aueture su new power come nocht cattus ye romane procuratoure throw quhilk salbe ye difficyll resyst fynaly beseik yow rander nocht youre self wiffis barnis scharp bargane romani quhe uoada endit orison confiderat king apprisit hir wisdom curage cattus aduertyst thir nouellis wes effrayit nochtheles come forthwart arrayit oist meit albianis thay na thyng eschewit cummyng incontinent baith armyis iunyt first cummyng horsmen romani wer discomfist sone eftir ye futemen samyn maner follow ane miserable slauchter flearis cattus euill woundit yi battal eschapi fled france albianis proud victory partit spulye rich f ild amang thaym slew ye romani al ti quhare thay mycht apprehendit battall wer slane writtis cornelius tacit ixxm romani xxxm albianis cruel slauchter romani wer brocht sic calamyte ye nocht suetonius romane legatte come haistelie fra france thair support albianis bene perpetuallie deliueryt romane iniuris suetonius come britane twa legionis xm wagiouris sindry nationis tuke purpos sew albianis new battall uoada heiryng returnyng suetonius britane send britonis cum hir ony tary day pfixit come hir ane huge army britonis scottis pycht murrayis deuidit sindy buschementis atanys reiosyng thair recent victorie thay occasioun ganand season distroy romani wiffis quhlkis come thair husbandis custome wes thay dayis wer set cartis bordouris campe beir witnes quhay didde maist vassalage quhen britonis scottis pychtis murrayis wer ord rit gud array quene uoada nocht vnworthy noumerit amang maist douchty campionis ruschit army hir two armyt dochteris schew hir cu myn amang sa mony vailyeant capitanis onlie defend hir realme rich bot reuenge ye mony scham full vnworthy offencis done hir romani na lytill indignatioun hir mynd romani enragit vnbridlit lust estait virginis matronis wer left yame vndeflorit forthir scho schew goddis quhilkis ar iust punysaris wrangis wer presentlye cumyn beir witnes ye iniquiteis done romani he recentlye punist thaym last battall wt schame slauchter becaus thay mouyt iniust battal aganis fre peple restis nocht said scho bot onelie fecht aganis thay miserabil catiuis wer saiffit thair schamefull flycht fra last battal yocht suetonius yair new capitane may exhort thaym battall yit may restore sen thay ar vincust yair curage spreit ye considir said scho vincust discomfist aduersaris aganis quho ye suld fecht wil ye considir awin pissance ye occasioun battal ye sall thynk honorable othir victorius battal elli al atanis de nobil men suld cheiserar de honestly schamefulto leif othir side suetoni ceissit exhort army battal yocht gret confidence thair manheid requirit thaym regard nocht vane mynassyng barbour pepill amang quhom wes noumer wemen men thay wer al bot young febill vnarmy pepil ony cognossance cheualry mycht thairfore esalie discomfist fra thay haue prouin manheid scharp swerdis romani hocht said army wes bot noumer glore uld follow gyf thay sa sufficien pepill vincust sa huge multitude arbour ennymes finalie prayit thaim weild thair sweirdis artis maist ferslie murdir thair fayis haue na sycht spulyeis quhil victory wer cleirlie conquest eftir quhilk thyng mycht succeid thair plesour thir wourdis capitanis mouit armyes brym ardent desyre battall agit knycht lang experience vse na le confidence thair maheid virtew tha victory bene psent thair handis tothir syde albianis confidyng huge multitude armyt men sound trupet gaif signe iune followit ane bludy terrible battall bot last albiants wer vincust chasit put flycht gret slauchter ye slauchter followit thayr army wes circulit euery syde wt sic multitude cartis discomfist pepill na place fle yt romani slew wemen yi battal ony piete ransoun yi battall wes honest bot rycht vnplesand romani ye maist part thai army wer tynt battall wes slane tacitus writtis lxxxm albianis murrayis maist part wer slane thair capitane rodorik quene uoada scho suld nocht cum quyk hir ennymes handis slew hir self baith hir dochteris wer tane brocht armyt thay facht su tonius eldest hir dochteris wes maryit apon ane nobill knycht romane blude namyt marius bereft hir virginite afore wes maid kyng britonys auctorite cesar marius eftir coronatioun went kendale ane part britane liand fornens annandale brigance namyt land eftir name west maria say westmurland kyng corbreid brokin sorowfull battall returnit residew army scotlad gaif murrayis quhilkis eschapit feild land liand betuix spay innernes quhilkis ladis wer callit eftir yame murray land auld inhabitantis thir ladis namyt uararis wer expellit becaus thay wer ane seditious pepill geuyn ciuill weris dissentioun thaym self thair nichtbouris ony defence realme mur ayis wer maryit scottis virginis grew vnder ane blude amyte scottis corbreid past remanent dayis ony weris ye romani wer irkit ciuill battallis wes gret difficulte hald south partis britane thair opinioun cause thay persewit scottis pycht mony yeris eftir nobil prince brokin dammage yeris deceissit donstafage xviii yeir regne wes beryit amang remanet sepulturis progenitouris first yere empire uespasiane emprioure fra incarnation lxxi yeris pof syndry nobyll clerkis hovv peti paule vvar martirit hovv dardanus vvas maid kyng scottis slane tyranny ca vii mony nobill clerkis flurist tyme itale statius persius plutercus faith christ began spreid fast al ti throw preching haly apostolis peter paule quhilk gaue thair hale attendans gud hyrdis instruct yair flok sicker faith ony respect rich feir thair liffis quhill last thay wer baith slane rome wickit nero peter wes hyngit feit place rome callit mont auri paule hedit werd ane place rome callit porta hostiensis king corbreid left behynd hym thre sonnis yong nane thaym mycht succeid crown thair namys wer corbreid tulcane brekus first thaym wes nurist britane ant u ada vailyeant quene britonis sic courtlye maneris hauyngis wes callit corbredus galdus yit amang w al pepill componit honest callit galdis nobillis eftir ye deith corbreid croun mycht remane hail galdus perfite age maid darda nu kyng wes nepot king metellane dardanus wes sa large stature wes callit gros kyng wes rycht plesad nobillis afore wes kyng rycht tender kyng corbreid baith weir peace pepil beleuit yat suld haue followit ye maneris otheris wyse kyngis progenitouris becaus wes ane lusty person fair vissage body wes gre umlie luffit amang pepill nochtheles mynd wes geuin maist effeminat vice apperit end lyfe ye begynnyng empire vsit counsal nobillis wes noch far discordant fra ye maneris ane gud prince bot within thre yeris eftir left thyngis pertenand iustice slaid euery kynd vice counsall certane wikkit schrewis familiaris tuke officis concernyng publik ministratioun iustice fra wyse nobil gaue yame vicio rebaldis yat assistit insolence lust wyse virtews personis na le hatrent yan suspitioun pat last quhen waistit substance tresour assistance thir vnhappy lymmaris quhilkis na sycht honour bot allanerlie yair singular auantage become sa auaritious desyryng vthir mennis guddis ony conscience reason yat slew vane causis ane nobill namit cardorus quhilk wes gret iustice last kyng corbreid na occasion sla innocent bot allan rlie becaus repruuit h vice mony otheris nobillis innocent men wer slane hym samyn maner thir doyngis maid hym odius nobillis commonis pat last st extreme b synes distroy galdus two b ethir traistyng becaus crown pertenit thaym eftir deceis stabill ame sicker firmance ym ayr effect send ane seruand namyt carmonak quhilk wes corruppit money sla galdus two brethir ile man pcarmonak instruckit maner come sayd ile fynaly quhen socht lang tyme ane ganand oportunite sla galdus tane waytand ane secrete place drawin swerd quhare beleiffit galdus cum brocht gret iustice ile accusit sa scharplye reuelit quhat sort instruckit sla galdus brethir al sone schawin treasoun put deith nobyllis herand treasoun conspirit aganis dardannus thay haittit hym afore inhumane cruelteis maist seand hym geuyn slauchter kyngis sonnis first thay slew al thaym fauourit hym pin mene tyme rais ane man vyle obscure lynage namyt conan quhilk promouit gret rich honouris assistance dardannus maid hym gaddir pepyl grete nowmer support tyrane aganis nobyllis bot last tane thaym hyngit ane iebait incontinent thir nobyilis come ane army aganis odius tyrane maid galdus thair capitane pdardannus aduertist heirof seand na refuge wald haue slane hym self bot stoppit familiaris esperance better fortoun last brocht afore gald slane heid efter schorne fra body borne ane staik throw army gret schame body cassyn ane maist vile closet pthis ende maid odius tyrane dardannus fourt yeir regne sext yeir uespasi ne empriour fra incarnatioun lxxv yeris phovv mony romane capitanis thair febyl administratio vvar interchangeit britane hovv galdus vvas maid kyng scotti hovv vvas discomfyst petulius ca viii romani tyme began decay albion necligence febyl capitanis dammage cyuyll weris swetonius legat brytane arrogance cruelte vsit britonis deponit petranius turpilianus mair mercyful capitane send place turpilianus cumyng britane mesit seditioun trubyll amang romani rand rit thair prouynces ane new capitane namyt trebellius maxim ane man slaw curage hauand lytyll experience cheualry pthis trebellius seand gret sedition trubyll apperand ryse throw lang peace army randerit samyn ane othir capitane namyt uectius uelanus quhylkis samyn maner dantit brytonis mair amite kyndnes ony auctorite pand tyme galdus quhylk sall oure hystory nixt followyng pefter deith dardannus ye nobyllis set ane counsal said galdus baith rychtuous ayre ye crown ane maist excellent person dotat sindry virtewis hie prerogatiuis thairfore crownyt hym fatall chiar marbill galdus eftir coronatioun maid sacrifice goddis felicite fallin hym syne gaif thankis nobillis remanent pepill promittit gouern realme consultatioun maist prudent nobil men thairof throw quhilk wan gret fauour luf pepil wes young flurisat age nocht vnlyk corbreid vailyea fader pforthir wes nobill anciant blude baith parentis modir wes kyng pychtis douchter discendyng lan lynage kigis quhair throw na hyng failyeit hym mycht conques fauour pepil begynnyng empire set hym punys ye wickit consalouris dardannus quhome realme wes misgouernit brocht gret tr le psic thyngis done past throw sindry boundis realme maid sic punitioun trespassouris stabillit realme gret tranquillite ye mene tyme come hym murrayis schew thaym reiosit dardannus ye inuasour common weill wes distroyit cummyng murrayis acceptabyll kyng thay brocht syndry oppressouris theuis iustyce quhylkis war sone efter punyst deith nocht lang efter ane counsall set douns afage quhare mony nobyll actis war deuysyt commoun weil ye wyckit law ewin quhar wyffis commonis fre nobyllis abrogat annullit yit could nocht purches remanent cursit lawis kyng ewin reuocat ye young nobyllis war repugnant thairto pquhyll galdus geuyn sic besynes come nouellis hym ane new capitane namyt petulius cerealis send uespasiane ane army brytane recouer landis tynt afore neclygence febyll capytanis purposit cum haistely annandale brigance pgaldus richt astonist thir nouellis howbeit walde proclame na weiris quhyll war mair surely aduertist send spyis explore counsall romani thir spyis returnit diligence schew romawar cummyng baith mers berwyk mair awfull ordinance euer sene afore albioun bestya l dreuyn away cornis insycht rynt ane gret nowmer pychtis quhilkis inuadit romani defence thair awin guddis slane pthe scottis richt affrayit thir nouellis said brytonis war vnkynd quhylkis wald aduertis thaym cummyng romannis consyderyng thay laitly faucht neir vter exterminioun thaym self defence onelye sayd brytonis nochtheles galdus set hym romani afore thair cu myng realme assemblit ane strang cumpany nowmer fyfty thousand men scottis micht eir armour war absent day quhen galdus passand forthwart maner app ru syndry vncouth meruellis sycht ane egyll flew day gret laubour aboue army nales terrour admiratioun pepyll interprete scottis suld distroyit egyll quhylk ansenye romani nochtheles galdus requi thaym haue gud esperance interpret ye said day suld put romani gret lauboure ane armyt knycht sene fleyng ye air quhen floyn round army suddanly euanist sicht lift apperit dirk full clouddis dyuers fowlis fell air full blude place quhare battallis efter iuni galdus nochtwithstandyng thir sorowfull vncouth prodigy apperyng sa suddanly ye face army allegit thay sygnifyit gret felicite pepil perswadit thaim pa forthwart gud esperance victory ye mene tyme come nouellis romani war enterit brygance mair pissance euir thay come afore thay boundis purpos nocht onely fecht bot plane co ques sit downe thay landis thay sic confidence thair cheualry maheid na power erdly creatouris mycht impesche thaym fra thair purpos galdus na thing affrayit thairof thocht meit romani sic hard cheualry lernit eldaris trastyng efter sa mony happy chancis fallyng romani yat fortoun ye instabyll gydar mortall creatouris sall sumtyme bryng romani hyd wachyng ruyne goddis oft tymes ar sene fauorabyll pepyll iustly defendis
