thaymself fra iniure ennymes sum men perswadit kyng inuade nocht haistely ennymes bot tary ane pepyll suffer resydew folkis returne hame fyne ye romani micht constranit throw laik vittallis outhir depart brigance elli trubylli hunger othir incommoditeis counsall weil apprisit ye nobyllis yit mony thaym dred thair vailyeant pepyl defaik curage lang tary ye scottis thair first assemblance he maist curage spreit ar brokin na thyng mair lang tary thir reasonis na thyng sa gud inuaide thair ennymes quhyll thair fury indurit galdus nobyllis followyng last opinioun rasit army brocht samyn thryd day efter sicht romani grete multitude syngulare manheid romani sa oft assailyeit frequent victoryis maid scottis sa astonist thair esperance victory turnit maist drery sollicitude yit hortation thair prudent capitanis thay enforsit thaym self new curage maid inuocatioun thair goddis send thaym victory incontinent baith armyis iunit vncredibyl fury silurianis mene men carrik kyle cunynghame battall quhare galdus faucht sa vailyeantly richt wing romani nere discomfyst pquhen petulius aduertist thairof send ane new legioun romani thair support pthus war sylurianis ouir set pthair followit yit ane cruell terrybyll bargane vntellabyll murdir capitanis faucht sic yre thay pretermittit na thyng mycht pertene forcy campionis petulius yit ythandly went romani quhare thay faucht supportit thaym new power quhare thay failyeit quhyll petulius fast f army wyse beheld galdus fechtand gret manheid spreit amyd fois incontinent enkendelit mychty curage desyrus conques sum hye honoure notabyll souerayne vassalage tuke purpos outhir slay galdus magre pissance put hym flycht bot rais ane battall mair vehement afore mony maist vailyeant forcy amang ye scottis perseuerand manheid deith war slane defence thayr prynce galdus euyll woundit face montit hors departit fra eild resydew scottis disp rit fleyng king fled heir thair thair best refuge chais followit romani ic yre scottis war slane partis quhare thay war tane battall war slane xij thousand scottis vi thousand romani galdus euyll woundit wyse colleckit residew army returnit ane castell leuynok romani abaid remanent yeir epiak subdewit bundis brygance ony trubyl battall thair empire phovv nobyll lady vodicia inuadit romani vvith ba tall hovv scho vvas fynaly slane hir army discomfist ca ix petulyus legate brytane rycht insolent efter vyctory desyrand na le ik empire romani succeid equale glore antecessouris rasit campe subdew remanent boundis brigance brygandis ythand incursionis lycht battallis refusit lang tyme weris defendit decreit parliament efter flauchter sa mony vailyeant scottis feild ye romani plane battall ieoperde realme vndir chance ane battall quhyll romani inuadit brygance maner uodicia youngest douchter uoada quhylk deflorit schew romani exilit wraith marnis hir gud brothir reuenge pollution hir body othir intollerabyl offencis done hir modir uoada assemblyt ane army brygandis brytonis inhabitantis ile man come awfull battall romani quhen thay beleuit na thyng le hir inuasion first cummyng army hard ane huge dyn noyis sound pepyll ylk ane exhorting othir battall incontynent come sa thik schoure arrowis dartis romani lyft micht sene aboue thair heid thus war ye romani sa astonist yt thay knew quhat suddand dager done nouthi knew thay quhat ennimes thay war dyd thaym awfully assa lye yit thay sufficient manheid fecht aganis sa gret multitude vncouth strange pepyll cummand thaym vntymuslye within nycht quhyl romani war affray thair ennymes ruschit ylk syde sic hardiment curage thay brak trinschis romani enterit perforce apon thayr tentis quhare maist vailyeant forcy campionis amang romani war slane thus romani bene vterly distroyit brygandis perpetually delyuerit seruytude uodicia war nocht petulius come mair haistely thair support petulius met extreme dangeir sa prudently byrnand flammys pyk roset brintstane quhylkis preparit aganis sic occurryng ieoperdijs withstude fayis quhare gretest noyis herd dang thaym force rage flamb fra tentis bot uodicia sa craftely exhortit hir army aganis petulyus scho oft tymes renewit battall tha bergane sa cruell al ye nycht followyng nocht sufficient schaw ende thair laubouris spryng day uodicia discomfist hir cumpany put flycht petulyus efter victory dredand sum hyd dangere occurryng inhibit folkis follow ony forthir chace puodicia prouoket ylk day mair iniuris past epiak brynt said town mony agit knychtis wageouris romani fy e scho mycht reuenge iniuris romane garnysoun quhilk scho mycht nocht reuenge petulyus petulyus punys thir offencis send ane legioun romani put uodicia hir army flycht nochtheles scho fynaly tane accusit quhy scho durst pretend sic thyngis aboue spreit wemen scho answerit scho thair ennyme wald haue slane hir ennyme laikit na gud wyll howbeit hir power failyeit na thyng mair hatrent prosperite romani gret cruelteis done thaym hir hir freindis romani tary slew hir pin mene tyme petulius aduertist ye ile wycht kent schyre rebellit maryus chasit apperit thus plane rebellyoun britonis le trubyll war mair haistelye dantit pthir nouellis mouit petulyus returne brytane quhare small deficulte dantit brytonis romani abaid brygance behynd petulius war geuyn mair keip landis afore conquest persew pepyll new conques yeir followyng petuli deceissit phovv iulyus frontin vvas maid capitane brytane message pychtis thair ansvver hovv said iulius inuadit scottis vvith gret iniuris ca x efter deith petulius ane vailyeant knycht namyt iulius frontynus send albion two legiois plesandly ressauit maryus piulius efter cummyng brytane went throw romane prouincis persuadit britonis mony reasonis perseuere opinion romani pal sone pecifyit thaym al trubyll began desyru fame glore antecessouris war afore tuke purpois subdew last ilis albion romane empire howbeit thay war oft afore assailyeit bot neuir vincust bring purpos effect left marius behynd hym kent hald brytonis vnder romane lawis syne came brygance ane gret army yit passage dyd na iniure trubyll pichtis beleuit thaym fra scottis war vincust sone ouirthrawin iulius maner na lytyll effray amang scottis ye name gret renown estimatioun amang scottis iulius cumyng brigance vesyit ye munitionis quhare romane sodiouris lay exhortit thaym perseueir gud curage thair manheid virtew mycht happyn haill ile albio cum vndir empire romani sic thyngis done send letteris pich desyryng yat thay romani mycht incres togydder vndir ane freinschip amyte sumtymes remembrit thaym ye mysery trubyll fallyng thaym weris led afore aganis romani haue na cumpany scottis commandit ye empriour outhir distroy thaym l vterly elli thyrll thaym perpetuall seruitude pychtis thair desyris gret suspitioun answerit thay gret admiration e quhat motiue romani mycht haue ony iust occasyoun battall aganis scottis quhat suld moue thaym nocht content empire warld seik last ilis occiane see reif fra ye albianis thair natiue lyberte le thay insaciabyll auaric war set reif fre realmes ony reason hauand na feir dredour goddis punist thair insufferabyll iniquiteis thir causis thay wald cum battal aganis ye romani al thair power support thair confiderat freindis defence thair realme lyberte ye nocht proffitabyll thair commoun weil bot thay war al bound thairto ic contract mycht na wayis dissoluit iulius contemption answer mair fers properant aganis scottis come kyle carrik cunynghame quhais pepyll war mair strag ony pepyll faucht afore aganis romani galdus astunist new ordinance romani nochtwithstandyng heuy woundis gottin last battall gaderit folkis boundis vndir dominioun defend realme pthan followit continewall scarmussyng lycht hors ony greit slauchter galdus noy woundis set hym erac yrk romani lang tary inuaide thaym battall followit thir incursionis mony syndry chancis fortoun sumtyme romani vincust su tyme victorius quhyll last scottis frequent slauchter thayr vailyeant capitanis war attenuat brokyn galdus noy woundis gottyn last battall sa wery mycht nocht office ane forcy campion bot brocht hors lytter argyle within dayis efter romani come carrik kyle cunynghame slew iii thousand scottis remanent vincust chasit efter victory romani returnit thair tentis phovv iulius agricola vvas send britane frequent victoriis maid scottis pichtis hovv subdevvit sindry thair landis romane empire ca xi nixt wynter iuli frontyn fell gret infirmite imoderat flux catter generit wak humouris becaus ye air nubilus donk throw cotinual schouris rane sleit procedyng hycht montanis gret multitude fludis lochis aboundyng regioun infirmite incressit ylk day vncouth intemperat cauld mycht curit na ingyne art medcine domiciane empriour aduertist vehement dolour causit hym returne italy recouir heil new air fude send iuli agricola ane maist vailyeant capitanis come afore dayis britane succeid place tyme men annandale slew ane gret nowmer romani bordouris brigance throw samyn victory persuadit pychtis brigandis ye silurianis rebell aganis romani agricola aduertist thir attemptatis rasit army come pentland mair diligece tha ony man presumit efter tane garnist ye strenthis thair cuntre wageouris come camelo caranach kyng pychtis aduertist cumyng gaif hym battall nochtheles fynaly discomfist army efter discomfitoure caranach fled fyffe quhilk ane plenteous regioun lyand betuix two firthis tay forth full woddis lesuris ualis gret proffet baith corne bestyal ar mony louchis full syndry fysche regioun bair woddis ye theuis war sutyme sa frequent samyn yt thay micht na way dantit quhyll woddis war bet agricola efter past victorius army annandale inhabitantis thairof knawyng cumyng met hym thair scharpest maner nochtheles thay war fynaly chasit slane ye remanent thaym yt eschapit war slane thair wyffis ye first nycht thay come hame agricola proude victory past ye ile quhilk rebellit mony yeris afore aganis romani tuke lytyll laubour quhen stuffit munitionis thairof roman sodiouris returnit brygance leuand army wynter schelis pthe nixt symer come throw brygance carrik kyle cunyngham quhais passage maid pepyll sa astonist thay left thair townis desert fled montanis pin symer followynge brocht syndry nobyll men albioun afore hym exhortit thaym polecy cyuyll maneris thay mycht haue templis biggyngis romane fassion put thair sonnis wyse preceptouris efter end romane weris thay micht ryse virtew eloquence gud hauyngis thus past agricola wynter seasoun instruckand prince albion sic thyngis apperit thair commoun weill thrid yeir efter come striuelyng quhilk callit thay dayis dolorus montane inhabita ti thairof hard syndry tymes ane dolorus lamentabil cry quhilk come illusioun wickit spreitis essauyng pepyll vane superstitioun quhen agricola saw ye castell striuelyng set sa strag reparit biggit crafty sumptuus lauboure yt apperit vnwynnabyll nocht lang efter byggit ane bryg ouir forth transportit army morrow laid sege ye castell montbennart traisting haue found kyng pychtis bot pychtis war astonist cumyng romani thay left castell come gret diligece vnder nycht cast ye bryg stryuelyng lairly biggit romani ye said romani mycht inclusit betuix tay forth ony refuge agricola weill aduertist thairof returnit fra sege montbennart followit sic diligence ye pichtis thay war constranit geif battall nochtheles thay war fynaly vincust thair kyng karanach chasit watter tay quhare gat ane bait eschapit remanent pychtis feir victory war ra derit thair munitionis strenthis agricola past throw boundis fyffe fothrik erne sumtymes biggand sumtymes castand strenthis cuntre quhare plesit phovv kyng pychtis send ambassatouris scottis desyryng support aganis romani hovv agricola inuadit scottis baith see land hovv kyng pychtis vvas slane sedition army ca xii karanach kyng pichtis brokyn last discofiture fled dunde quhare sumtyme ane strang castell bot wes cassyn ye tyme kyng robert brus becaus micht keipit fra inglismen sal efter schaw pychtis conuenit said castell exhortit karanach thair kyng haue na disperation howbeit pepyll war brocht gret afflictioun trubyll gret nowmer thaym yit lyue baith vnbrokyn weris sufficient gyf goddis war propiciant dyng ye romani albion mycht happyn romani prowd insolent efter sa mony hie victoryis may fal quhen thay beleif leist sic inuy fortoun vincust pepyl quhom thay held vilest reputatioun instabyll goddes turnis suddand quhirle ye gouernance mortall creaturis scho he rasi mony othir realmes gret feliciteis afore romani dominioun brocht thaym quhen thay war thair hie souerane honouris fynall rewyne nocht thairfore supponit empire romani sen began mortal pissance sall perpetually indure bot necessar sumtyme haue rewyne yocht thir sic persuasionis pichtis war apprisit thair kyng yit nane thaym mycht rais spreit curage ony gude esperance aganis romani bot traisting thair mai ste pissance sa montit aboue hycht naturale chance na pepill may resist thair eftir lang co sultatioun wes concludit send ambassatouris galdus haue support aganis extreme dangeir apperand baith thair realmes accordyng band sa mony yeris continewit betuix scottis pychtis galdus glaidlie condiscendit thair peti ionis na le indignatioun aganis romani thair wrangus conques maid thaym pychtis scottis thairfore determit erar haisart realme extreme ieoperde army leif ilk day ithand displesour finalye subdewit seruitude quhil co fiderat kyngis wer geuin yi sort resist thair ennymes silurianis plane rebellioun slew romani quhare thay mycht apprehendit onlie recouerit thair munitionis bot brynt thair cornis vittallis except sa mekill mycht caryit thaym yat fyne na thyng thairof suld remane ye proffet thair ennymes agricola weill aduertist thir motionis come haistelie silurianis dantit punyst yame maist rigorus wyse nocht lang eftir wes aduertist ennymes wer gaderit gret buschementis vncertane quhat effect aganis romani incontinent followit thaym gret violence chasit thaym ouir clyde riueir diuidit ane lytill space fra ye riueir leuin quhair yay fal baith nocht far fra othir ye ireland seis nocht far fra said riueir leuyn ane castell strang strenth ane crag ony artificiall laubour namyt pepil auld cleuch bot callit dunbrito say castel britonis alwayes wes stuffet men vittallis mycht na waye tane agricola occupyit thir siclik besynes ouir past ye fourt wynter spryng ye nixt yeir causit romane nauy quhilk abaid ordinance ile wycht cum lochfyne beside argyle ennymes mycht vnderstad na landis seis fre fra romane dominioun pand quhen brocht army ouir clyde fand thair men lenax ane pepill vnknawin afore romani tuke purpos subdew thaym romane empire mene tyme gat writyngis yat pycht wer rebellit becaus dred gret truble ryse bot gyf ye samyn wer ye haist lie dantit left first purpos come pentland ane legion romani dantit pychtis nixt symer began serche hauynis portis argyle othir ilis thair wt schippis come land gait ouir riueir leuyn tak ye munitionis strenthis cuntre romani wer first irkit scharpe difficill passage full bre thornis thair gret impediment bot quhen thay cosyderit ye virtew manheid thair anciant faderis nathyng apperit difficill thaym sa curage ay incressyng thay dantit na le difficyll passage cuntre pepill thairof finalie returnyt huge pray men guddis thair tentis sic thyng done gald maid ane conuentioun athole pepil vnder empire abiding ye cummyng kyng pychtis yat fyne baith yair armyis beand iunyt togiddir thay mycht ye esalie resist romani war pychtis cumand ouir montanis granyebane quhilkis rynnis fra fut de castell dunbritone wer nocht fiue mylis fra army scottis quhen thay vnhappy chace wer deuidit two factionis faucht amang thaym self ye gret murdir baith ane vane cause kyng pychtis seyng lamen abil cais ran feirslie co armour amang preis quhair thay wer maist keinly fechtand haue put thaym sindry wes slane thair vnknawyng quhat wes re dew pychtis quhilkis war left lyue fra vnhappy bargane k awing ye slauchter thair kyng skalit returnit hame phovv galdus pecifyit seditioun amang pichtis hovv faucht aganis romani vvas discomf ca xiii galdus heirand deith tender freind kyng pichtis become rycht sorowfull co st anit hym superseid army aganis romani nochtheles callit nobillis ane counseal quhare schortlie detestand ye inopertune seditioun rysyng amang ye pychtis prayit thaym ripely auyse realme mycht defendit sa hie dangeir thairto approchyng eftir diuers opinionis wes decretit resist romani erar frequent incursionis yan set battall fra ony forthir conques tour prudent men sal pa ye pychtis peacifi thaim al seditionis ambassatouris sall pa irelad norway denmark seik support aganis romani counsall ambassatoris wer send pychtis schew ye sic dammage cruelteis cedi ciuil weris yat na realmes may stand sicker firmance quhare induris finalie pichtis wer aggreit amang yame self al debatis garnardus maid kyng place karanach afore deceissit pychtis wes deuisit send thair ambassatouris norway denmark ye effect afore said quhil sic thing wer done pychtis galdus assemblit ane army fra boundis realme diuidit diuers buschementis quhais wisdome ithand ieoperdis romani wer stoppit symer followyng fra ony forthir conques scottis wynter following wes sa tempestuous na weris mycht sustenit ye nixt symmer quhilk wes vii yere weris maid agricola come ane gret cupany ireland men galdus garnardus athole quhair thay wer present ye tyme al nobillis baith thair realmes ye tothir side agricola knawing weill ordinance scottis pycht diuidit army thre battallis abidyng thair cummyng galdus weill aduertist quhat sort agricola purposit inuade cha git haistely purpos come within ye nycht ne strang legio romani quhilkis wes far fra army scottis slane wache legioun fechtand ferslie within thair tentis quhen suddanlie agricola weill conuoyit exploratour come strang buschemet baith futme hors men thair bakkis nochtheles battal wes fochtin gret crueltie slauchter sydis quhyll romane baneris schynyng ye cleir morrow schew agricola wt al army arrayit fornens thaym battall incontinent confiderat pepill gaif bakkis fled throw desertis mossis thair best refuge phovv sindry almanis danis come support scottis pichtis hovv ye romane nauy perist pentland firth ca xiiii yi vnhappy battall confiderat kyngis wer brokin thay defendit thaym self yair bestiall guddis al symer following mair frequet incursion yan ony set battall abidyng cumyng danys norowanis thair support bot romani ilk day feirs insolent frequet victoryis traistig na thyng possibil resist thair souerane virtew come throw wod calidon purpos serche last boundis albioun becaus thay wer stoppit strait groud yairof thay come ouir watter awmond set thair tentis nocht far fra du keld quhair tay rynnis deip furdis almane seis reueir beside dunde two mylis braid deuidyng fiffe fra angus ye pichtis effrayit cummyng romani sa far within thair landis brynt ane riche town namyt inchecuthill quhilk stude apon riueir tay samyn suld na refuge yair ennymes fled thair wiffis child guddis ye motanis grandyeben ye samyn tyme arriuit forth ane cumpany alman namit usipianis banist thair natiue landis slauchter ane romane capitane othir pepill vnder band becaus thay bure extreme hatrent aganis romani thay wer plesandlye ressauit ordanit haue certan landis thair habitatioun beside murrayis thay wer baith blude nocht lang eftir arriuit firth tay ane vailyeant capitane namyt gildo xm danis support scottis pichtis thir danis wer plesandlie ressauit garnardus kyng pychtis comon weil wes approcheand hie dangeir gald rycht glaid reiosyng cummyng gildo come dunde gyf thankis hym remanent folkis yt come support thair freindis eft maist lie embrasing galdus said wyse haue na litil caus ioy maist vailyeant gildo seing sa mony fair lusty personis cumyn ruble albioun defence pychtis thy anciant lynage w thair confyderat brethir standyng sic extreme dangeir ell abaid mony dayis cuming ar mair reiosit thairof may schawin tyme randeris thy pepil infinite thankis thairfore thy cuyng sic esperance rasit curage beleif support vincus ennymes banis yame furth page missing brigandis perpetually seruytude gif fortoun bene propiciant nocht traistit bot quhilkis ar mair vailyeant sal recouer liberte first metyng traist nocht bot romani may vincust quhat nowmer yame bene laitly slane wod calidon beleue ye virtew romani al gret tyme battal thair lust tyme peace thay conques honour ciuil weiris dissension thay turne vice thair ennymes ye glore thair army quhilkis gaderit dyuers pepyll vnder dyuers myndis sall thairfore skaill al fast syndry quhe aduersite occurris thay assemblit togidder thair maist prosperite traist ye franche men britonis quhilk ar ane g et part thair army sal haue ony othir affection faith thair ennymes bot inuade thaym quhen thay se occasioun traist na thing bot dreid terrour ar sa vnsicker ba dis luf yt quhen ar remouit put asyde extreme hatrent sproutis thair place mony persuasionis apperis w haue victory ye romani he nocht thair wiffis present exhort thaym curage yit thair agit faderis reproche yame fleyng yame he ony certane cuntre habitation le reft thairfore ye goddes punitioun thair iniquiteis he laitly randerit ane certane yame vagabound vincust oure handis astonist pray yow vane visage schynyng gold syluer quhilk may nocht defend wound yow lat w fynd handis ye bront ennymes ye britonis sal knaw thair caus battall gallis sall remember thair anciant lyberte al pepyl vncouth nation sal leif yame thair first iunyng na occasioun remanis dredour castellis ar left thayme wast townis quhare thair agit capitanis dwelt betwix euyll obeysance iniust empire ar brocht seruitud heir ar capitane army wyn glore rich yondir ar ennymes put yow surfet tribute elli condampne yow wynnyng mettellis su othir kind punition quhilk salbe petuall yow posterite le tha ye samyn recouerit battal quhen ye thairfore ar pa fortwart remember baith eldaris past afore posterite successouris cum pof oriso maid agricola army huge victory fallyng romani discofitour scott ca xvi efter orison gald followit army gret noyis clamoure desyre battal tothir syde yocht agricola beheld army richt impatient lang tary yit said yame follow ye viii yeir gud copanyeonis sen ye felicite romane maieste trew faithfull laubouris he conquest annadale ye ile man carrik kyle cunynghame wt mony othir regionis quhilkis war neuir subdewit knawin afore romane empire ye haue sustenit na le fortitude aganis fais pacience laubour almaist aganis nature ye haue na caus penitent capitane penitent yow gud men armis ye haue subdewit may boundis albion ony armyis afore haue wo mair honor tha ony othir capitane afore haue socht ye last boud albio rehers fame theris bot persit samyn strang army camp quhen ye gud copanyeonis war oftimes wery ouirpassing difficyll montanis mossis fluddis regioun gret compassion knew euery ane voce criand quhen sal ennymes haif curage quhe sall thay meit w thay ar cumand furth thair dennis quhare thay war hid may manheid virtew sene euery thyng salbe plesand thaym yat ar victorius vnplesand thaym yt ar vincust na litil honour apperis w quhylkis he ouirset sa mony strait montanis woddis fludis dangerus firthis region sa sall ane vassalage souerayne honour howbeit dangerus withstand fersly oure ennymes put thaym flycht yocht mony placis cuntre vnknawin w he na gret plenty vittalis yit laik na manheid curage quhylk lyis haill frute glore armes forthir sa far pertenis thynk nothir capitane army syker geuis thair backis ennymes thairfore honest deith better schamefull lyf hele honour ar situat baith ane place forthir war na gret schame honoure howbeit war defait heir ye last outmaist partis warld gif ye war assailyet vncouth strange ennymes suld exhort yow fecht vassalage othir vailyeant pepyll haue e honoure knaw thir pepyl standis face arrayit aganis yow ar nocht bot refuse thay febyl catyuis quhilkis war discomfist laitly within nicht onely noyis clamoure thay ar maist febyll bodyis amang ye brytonis remanis caus sa lang lif maist forsy strang bestis thair awin ieoperdyis ar oft slane maist cowart febyll bestis saiffis thaym self da geir fleis quhen thay heir sound ony cumpanyes sa vailyeant britonis ar slane nane thaym ar lyf saif thay onely yt cowart flicht he debaitit thair miserabil lyuis wald ptend na resistence war thay ar tane refuge quharthrow ye may haif honest victory pa gud companyconis throw youre ennymes fynis li yeris weir solempne day may put kalender end weris sa nothir lang tary rebellioun ennymes may impute youre necligece skarsly orison endit quhe baith ye armiis byrnad desyre battall iunit agricola arrayit folkis sic crafty ordour howbeit thay wer le nowmer thair ennymes thay sall nocht assailyeit nothir ane syde othir galdus na le prouidence arrayit formest part army ane hye mote discomfis wingis ye romane army exhortit thaym schyll voce perseueir ythand bergane outhir conques immortall glore perpetual seruitude yat thair last day quhilk thay mich wyn outhir honour schame first battall fochtin dreich albanis danis norowanis schot ane huge nowmer arrowis ganyeis thair first contering nochtheles romani eschewit samyn thair targis bowman efterflicht arrowis faucht wt swerd lytyl buklar yit day mair semad nychtboure weir ony defence realmis throw quhilk oure pepyll he gret dammage quhen thay meit ennymes vncouth realmes battal speris quhilkis stude nixt bowman brount galdus tuschit furthwart atanis bure mony thair ennymes mony bludy woundis thair backis followit byllis axis lang swerdis ledyn mellis sic slauchter ye romani bene vtterly discomfist wer nocht ane band almanis quhilkis war send la tly britane come haistely thair support attour agricola sa circumspect stuffit army thir almanis al partis quhare saw ony danger oc ring albianis seyng thaym heir thair sa cruelly ouirset war astonist nochtheles seyng na r fuge bot thair handis thay ruschit al togidder ane knot ony feir deith woundis delyueri mynd fecht thair realme lyberte ye deith followit ane sorowfull battall confiderat pepyll facht mair force craft cheualry mony thaym sloppit throw body fel downe aboue thair slaatis otheris offerit thaym self wylfully slane otheris efter thay eschapit thair ennymes slew thaym self place quhare thay faucht bludy ouercouerit leggis armis wappynnis skatterit throw al boudis thairof baith ye armyis faucht perseuerand hatrent quhyll nycht constranit thaym seuer confiderat pepyl thair freindis quhilkis war left lyue efter vnhappy battall fled nixt montanis quhare thay biggit fyr oui pa nycht come thaym gret confluence men wemen seik thair freindis mony sorowfull sychis murnyng teris incontynent galdus thir dolorus spr ichis cryis sall nocht patent ennymes commandit army schout schyl noys sang quhyll wemen war expellit fra camp confiderat kyngis seyng morow thair power sa brokyn yt thay mycht nocht renew battall comandit thair folkis returne hame left behynd thaym ane huge fyre birnand bald vehement flame said montanis heuyn thair ennymes mycht haue na presumptioun thair departyng vnhappy battall war slane xii thousand romani xx thousand scottis pichtis mony othir pepyll come thair support gyldo ye vailyeant capitane danis ruscha ouir feirsly ennymes slane ye samyn maner ye maist part cumpany phovv agricola reparit nauy pa ilis albioun brint syndry schippis danis vncouth meruelli sene albioun deith agricola ca xvii day followyng vnhappy nycht maid ye discomfiture scottis patent thair ennymes thair camp void plenist nocht bot deid bodyis ony quhisperyng montanis quhare maist gild hard afore romani traisting thir tything procedyng sl cht inhibit ony hir chace proud efter efter thir feliciteis commandit vailyeant chosyn men serche ye woddis strenthis espy gyf ony hyd wachyng enimes war within samyn ane certane romani followig last cousal followit sa vnwarly thay war slane morrow agricola seand army sa brokin micht nothir renew samyn yit pa ouir ye motanis granyebene extreme dangeir past victorius army angus quhare abaid al ye nixt wynter mene tyme aduertist maist part nauy lost ye resydew thairof brokyn gret calamyte arriuit argyle agricola mouit nocht contenance thir nouellis fermely beleuit army smale calamyte delyuerit othir trubyll apperyng thairto inuy fortoun efter sa lang prosperite victoryis incontinent reparit schippis wt new marineris otheris quhilk sicker experience al dangeris firthis occiane see comandit thaym war fecht aganis chance fortoun pa samyn way thay yeid afore ilis albion nauy prosper wyndis arriuit finaly mouth tay brynt flo danis quhylk lay ye said firth wynter afore syndry meruellis war sene albion afore last battal galdus faucht romani mony byrnad speris war sene fleand air ane gret part wod calidon apperit birnand nycht howbeit na thyng apperit thairof day ane flot schyppis sene ayre ane schoure stanis athole siclike angus ranit paddokis ane monstoure borne inchecuthyll doubyll membris men wemen sa abhomynabyll fygure distroyit ye pepyll thir vncouth wonderfull meruellis maid pepyll astonist thay war interpret syndry facis sumtymes ye gud sumtymes euyll empriour domiciane heirand thir hie vailyeant dedis agricola rycht sorowfull mynd hauand na lytyl dignatioun fame ane priuate man suld obscure imperiall estait thairfore send haisty writtingis hym returne al excusatioun ceissing rome ressaue ye gouernance ane new uince namyt syria vacand deceis actilius ruffus last legat thairof agricola sone efter cumyng rome poisonit inuy said domiciane empriour phovv tribellyus vvas send britane hovv romani fell gret diuisioun amang thaym self huge victory gottyn thaym galdus ca xviii efter ye deith agricola gneus tribellius maid capitane brytane fan romani gret felicite howbeit samyn schort tyme indurit ane gret contention rais betuix new capitane tribellius ane othir capitane namyt tribellianus quhilk yame suld haue maist auctorite aboue army first autorist ye army cosing agricola secund autorist empriour efter lang contentioun tribellianus departit ane nowmer chosin men france galdus knawyng weil yi seditioun amang ye romani come ane army scottis pychtis angus quhair new capitane trebellius wes residew romani tyme trebellius astonist suddane cummyng tocht al thig wes done erar manheid gud werkis ony consultation nochtwithstandyng army bure hatrent aganys hym went orthward displayit baner last army seand hym nocht ye chargis ane vailyeant capitane dischargit auctorite sysynnius quhilk wes brod r trebellianus afore rehersyt uerne thaym maist auenture sysynnius refu charge said gyf ssauit auctorite sic extrem dan eir suld occasioun gret diuisioun truble within army quhill romani wer sic deba gald come arrayit hoist en sycht romani suddane cumyng galdus mycht nocht array thaym thair best auyse nottheles baith armyis iunit birnand desyre ilk syde confiderat pepill faucht perseuerand manheid quhill last sysynnius woundit ye deith fled feild mony othir romani hym incontinent army romani gaif bakkis fled ye nixt wod quhom followit scottis thair confiderat freindis ithand slauchter quhill last galdus dredand sum dangeir fall thair continewal feirsnes callit yame sound trumpat standart nocht le thay wer sa far enragit hatrent aganys romani thay couth nocht brocht yairfra quhil nycht bereft thaym lycht ye confiderat pepill passit nycht followyng gret ioy blythnes dansyng singyng playing siclike wes vsit thay dayis morrow preistis come processioun thair maist reuerend habitis gaif thankis goddis quhilk eftir mony calamyteis sustenit thaym mair yeris continewall battall grantit ani ane honest victorye thair ennymes phovv romani vvar doung partis scotland syndry tymes vincust vailyeant galdus ca xix romani brokin maner seyng na sickirnes abide angus aganis sa feirs cruel ennymes rasit thair tentis come within nycht inchecuthill quhen thay transportit residew thair army ouir tay thay brak brig thairof thayr ennymes suld nocht follow gald aduertist thair fleyng partit riche spulye wes gottin yi last feild amang army efferyng thair manheid vassalage morrow tuke consultatioun quhat wes best done consultatioun wes concludit scottis sall persew romani dyng thaym furth partis albioun scottis incontinent ruschit harnes army pychtis co curryng thair opinioun followit romani ye iniuris oftymes done thaym suld ani sufficientlie punist last quhen thay wer cumyn inchecuthill thay fand brig bet returnyt thairfore dunkeld quhair thay transportit thair army ane brig romani heirand thair euyng ordourit thaim self gud array chesit ane new capitane namit chelius gouerne thaym maist dangerus battall sone eftir baith ye armyis iunyt faucht lang tyme vncertane victorie quhill last romani wer vincust chasit ithand slauchter quhill thay wer dreuin wod calidone battall wer slane vm romani iim scottis thair confideratis syndry cumpanyis britonis eftir victorie come galdus al sone wes schawin walis romani wer twyis vincust scottis pychtis incontinent princis britane maid rebellioun eftir thay slane romani al ti quhair thay mycht apprehendit thay send ambassatouris galdus mony riche iowellis schawyng thaym reiosit eftir sa lang rage fortoun aganis hym began victorius fortunat mene tyme romani send thair ambassatouris marius king britonis lamentand heuy iniuris done thaym scottis pichtis schew gif thay gat nocht support tyme thay suld schamefully doung boundis conquest sa gret difficulte afore romani mari answerit throw rebellioun britonis sindry partis aganis hym stude daylie feir lyfe attour young wenchis gestouris co moun pepil sang daylie allattis derisioun skorne romani yat way knew quhay wer freindis fayis hym britane attoure domiciane empriour wes haitit cruell slauchter senat cietezanis rome nocht apperit bot ciuill battallis thus mycht na support come britane thir causis mynd wes set erar keip ane part hym albion sicker firmance yan schamefully tyne hail empyre thairof answere maid na lytyll affray amang romani mene tyme wes schawin ye galdus wes within ten mylis fra tentis romani ane army baith men wemen yat mycht beir wapinnis dyng ye romani boundis empire ye romani feir cuming left wod calidon fled brigance galdus weil aduertist quhat passage ennymes wer departi set maist diligece follow yair bakkis yat mycht distroy thaym ony recouer afore thay gat ony support fra rome voyage galdus left segyng castellis strenthis stuffi romani come gret deligence brigance thair hym ane huge nowmer pepyll si haitit romani reiosyng atanis said galdus brokin sa mony calamiteis truble wes neuir disparit bo euir reseruyng hym pepill better fortoun galdus ressauit thir pepill plesand visage persuadit thaym haue gud esperance wes nocht passand battall bot erar sic er victorie hard fortoun sa lang rageand aganis hym pepill wes brokin thairfore traistit behynd sa mony cruell extorsionis done ennymes haue sumtyme ane glorius victory thaym romani seyng confiderat pepil cum brigance sa hie curage spreit wer affrayit nochtheles confidyng na thyng mair surele tha yair handis thay went forwart thayr best array sayng day wes othir gait thair triumphant glore perpetuall schame ilk ane exhortit othir haue hope victory sen thay wer fecht aganis ane vane barbar peple haif memory gret manheid virtew yair eldaris respect thair comon singular weill erat de ye battal tha incurre schame dishonour ya mycht neuir eftir away quhil romani wer exhortyng thaym ith thir siclike wou dis come haistely ane heuy schoure arowis ganyeis schot thaym thair ennymes ye mene tyme ane cumpany britonis quhilkis wer laitlie send marius support romani come scottis pychtis mony romani fleyng thir britonis de fakit curage otheris seyng na remeid tuke spreit gret force ouirset wyngis quhair wemen faucht galdus rycht circumspect werkis send ane cumpany fresche men thair support quhom romani wer dreuin sum part abak wemen wer cruel tha ony men quhen thay saw thayr ennymes vincust thus romani bene inuadit ilk syde wer nocht thay thair tentis yair bakkis mony thaym perseuerit battall wer slane otheris fled thair tentis quhom scottis followit sa fast thay slew thaym heir thair kes thaym fowseis intendyng filling fowseis deid bodyis make ane reddy gai thair tentis nottheles romani defendit thair tentis incredibyll laubour manheid wald suffer thair ennymes entre thaym quhill nycht seuerit thaym ylk syde message send romani confiderat kyngis thair ansvver hovv cofiderat kingis gaif peace romani ca xx scottis nochtwithstandyng cumyng nicht went nixt wod bring treis fyl fowseis quhare tentis romani lay maid syndry instrumentis breke thair trinschis otheris wacheit nicht stop yame fra fleing abaid cumyng ye day byrnand desyre pthe romani seyng morrow sa gret ordinance reddy atanis inuade thaym desyrit assuuerance wache send oratouris confiderat kyngis treit peace part scottis said na conduct suld geuyn romani na alliance maid thaym bot victory vsit maist rigoure romani fled yair tentis slane thair slauchter al othir pepyl may take exampil odious baith goddis men inuade realmes pepyll occasioun iniure otheris said best vse thair victory mesure ouir insolent proud yi felicite sen euery pepyll ar thirlit sic vncertane lawis fortoun eftir aduersite cumys sperite fti sperite cumys aduersite reason romani suld herd yair ambassatouris saiffit law pepill last counsal wes apprisit incontinent come four honorabil men fair vissage cloithit thair maner na le precious semand abulyeme ti fell kneys afore confiderat kyngis al sone thay wer sit ane thaym quhilk charge wes committit said wyse romane army capitanis dantouris warld desyring amyte freindschip inuincibill kyngis requiris humilie grace quhom thay haue thi mony yeris persewit auful kene battall traist fermelie na thyng mycht haue cumyn glore marciall dedis sa hie honour mair worthy haue memory haue ambassatouris romani quhom kyngis realmes bene subdewit de eckit feit humilie desyryng grace ye haue vincust w grant lyfe deith dependyng handis hatrent goddis quhilkis ar commouit aganis w iniust battall haue led aganis yow use sic victorye ye thynk respondent honoure vinc ir sen ye haue vin ust w dantouris warld gyf ye nocht refrane youre ire sla w haue deseruit pnochtheles sen ye quhilkis ar heir farrest nuyk warld precellis pepill manheid virtew vnderstand ye na thyng may schaw humanite mair mercyfull eftir sa huge victory knaw hatrent goddis knaw cheualry desyris peace vnder quha conditionis ye pleis galdus maid answere yame said ye sottis pychtis last pepyll warld sen thair first begynnyng desirit na landis bot thaym onlie wer geuin thaym beniuolence goddis faucht neuir bot yair pure defence romani wer knawin thaym first cursit reuaris realmes insaciabill auarice eftir yt thay maid weir britonis ane hundreth fifty yeris sindry chancis fortoun quhen thay subdewit warld maist part albion gret damage pepyl thairof thay ar vineust ye pepyll quhome thay held maist rude febill finalie dreuyn esperance better fortoun thair last refuge within thair tentis ane notabill exempill tymes cummyng vnsicker bene ye stait man chance fortoun yocht sindry nobyll men army counsallit victory vsit thaym maist rigour traistyng thair iniuris na othirwayis eschewit yit wald propiciant thynkand sufficient baith tyme present cu ye ambassatouris romani dantouris warld wer deieckit feit humylie desyryng mercy nochtheles plesit hym weill co sent confiderat bruthir ye king pychtis gyf peace vnder thir conditionis romani sal pa boundis pertenand scottis pychtis rander munitionis pledgis guddis reft fra thaym duryng ye weris sall gyf thair gret ayth neuir inuaid scottis pychtis bot euir stand thair gud freindis tymes cummyng romani ressauit peace maner departit ony forthir iniure phovv strenthi scotland vvar recouerit fra romani conditioun peace deith galdus ca xxi gneus tribellius ye romane army nowmerit quhen agricola left lx thousand men bot tyme throw frequet victorijs maid thaym thay war skarsly xx thousand left lyue efter thair departyng boundis scotland quhilkis war garnist afore romani war randerit scottis pychtis efter galdus skaillit army went epiak quhilk principal ciete scotland began institute pepyll ciuill maneris ye fyne na realme occasio sleuth sall vse reiffis cuntre send superflew pepyl wageouris brytonis syne rewardit nobyllis ylk ane efter thair vassalage prouyn weiris galdus went throw boundis realme entres ylk town ye pepyll met hym wt sound trumpat clarioun honour louyng quhyll pepyll war geuyn laude magnyfye thair prince maner rais gret cotentioun betuix scottis pichtis certane debaitabyll landis lay betwix thair realmes contentioun rais euyll dedy men mycht suffer na peace bot cht occasioun breke cunire nochtheles two confiderat kyngis met fynaly togidder wod calidon pecifyit debaitis amang thaym self galdus ragne mony yeris efter gret felicite occupyit pepyll virtewis laubouris exercition deceissit epiak xxxv yeir regne maist vailyeant prince yat euir rang aboue scottis fra incarnatio god iciii yeris fra ye begynnyng ye warld vmiiicii yeris body buryit besyde epiak funerall pompe gret lament pepyll quhome ane maist precius sepulture rasit quhilk ingrauyn recouerit realme souerane man heid fra romani mony huge pillaris war rasit sepulcure testify precellent virtew glore cheualry yat memory sall neuir peri decreit parliament comandit landis namit afore brigance salbe callit tyme cumyng galdia becaus nobyl prince maid ane end weris thay partis dayes region callit galiudia corruption langage say galloway history sa far haue schawin carratak corbreid galdus kyngis scottis drawin sum part fra vulgar croniklis sum part fra corneli tacitus haue nocht onely writtyn sentence bot al wordis ye redaris baith romane story scottis may vnderstand ylk history concordant othir knaw testimoniall oure ennyme vailyeantly nobyl elderis he fochtis realme aganis romani mair pruffe heirof haue inserit eloquent orisonis galdus agricol word word cornelius tacitus rehersis thaym quhat sumeuir werkis sa endis heir fourt duke thir croniklis heir begynnis fyft buke croniklis scotland pof vicius kyng lugtak hovv vvas slane vnhappy lyfe tyranny ca primo vailyeat prince gald endit maner afore rehersit succedit sonne lugtak ane odius mischeuus tyrane al far haitit pepyll vice fader luffit virtew far different fra fader baith maneris ingyne geuin eys lust slew mony ye riche men cuntre na othir caus bot allanetly confiske thair guddis gaif ministration iustice maist wrangus auaricius men specially sic men yat war geuyn coques guddis hym ony reason sycht iustice followit continewall reiffis al partis realme put punitioun gretest schrewis maist autorist virtuous personis maist ouirthrawin odius tyrane persewit nobyllis vane causis sum thaym banist othiris slew micht conques thair landis guddis sic affectioun reiffairis oppressouris namit thaym brethir counsalouris wrytyngis luffit nane sa weill hym culd fynd ingyne reif subdittis remanent dedis vnhappy lyfe ar sa dedestabyll thay ar mair worthy hyd dreuyn ony mannis eiris vnbridillit lust fulyeit antt h douchteris syster sister douchteris penitent na thing bot mycht nocht suffice copleit lust thaim horribyll dedis war sufferit twa yeris nobyllis bot na thyng mouit thaym sa mekyl scornefull detractioun quhilk callit thaym auld dotand fulis nane sa familiar hym fidlaris bordellaris makerellis gestouris siclike men vile estimatioun cled thaym publik auctorite beleuyng thyngis succede weil thair gouernance bot cruelteis foly mycht nocht lang vnpunist sone eftir ane counsal set hym dou stafage punis syndry men repreuit vice mene tyme rais sic debait betuix hym nobillis slane cursit cumpany quhome gaif baith gouernance body realme thrid yeir regne buryit ryche pompe dounstafage bot bodyis vnhappy counsalouris war left feildis deuorit houndis pof king mogall hovv come vvith ane army aganis romani orisone maid sepulture galdus ca ii lugtak tyrane endit maner mogall maid king nepote gald gottin douchter mogallus efter coronation set hym follow wisdome maneris galdus gudschir kepe faith promis romani britonis peace afore contrackit pepyl mycht leif quiete ony seditioun reparit euery thing afore mysgidit tyrane lugtak restorit relygyoun goddis samyn cerymonis thay war fyrst institute traistyng fra gottyn beniuolence goddis quhilkis war ennymes pepil abhomynabil life lugtak al thingis suld succede ye better scottis began rise ylk day esperance better fortoun seyng thair kyng follow ye behauyngis gudschir galdus reddy reforme al enormyteis realm nocht lang efter come ambassatouris fra pichtis mogallus desyryng support aganis romani brytonis quhilkis war laitly cumyn fyre swerd pentland slane ane gret nowmer pepyll defence thair awin guddis siclike men galloway annandale complanit ane huge pray guddis war tan romani thair landis mogallus hauand ingyne na le geuyn cheualry werkis peace reiosit haue occasioun battall mycht sum notabyll vassalage comparit vailyeant antecessouris nochtheles send ambassatouris desyryng edres dammage thaym done thir ambassatouris gat nocht bot ane answer full hie contemptioun skorne mogallus tuke goddis wytnes baith ye faith prompttit hym romani wa brokyn message cotempnit sone efter rasit army come galloway quhare visy e sepulture galdus gudschir quhen maid certane cerimonis efter custome thay dayis fel kneis said vailyeant inuincibyll prince quhilk efter sa gret aduersite fortoun recouir realmes scottis pichtis huge difficulte dang thy pyssant riche ennimes fauoure goddis thir boundis na le honoure manheid thy natyue pepyll quhylkis wirschyppit lyue mair reuerence lufe tha may tauld fallis kneis lamentabyll voce thy eternall sepulture last refuge w extreme neid besekyng hu ly thy funerall goist helper aganis ennymes quhom thou sumtyme maist vailyeantly vincust thir boudis prayis gif thow he ony auctoryte afore goddis thy syngulare virtew schawin w erd suffer nocht w thy posterite ouirthrawin dyspytefull ennymes quhylkis inuadis w tytyll battall psuffer nocht thy fame vailyeant campyoun decay amang w vyctory thy iniust ennymes sen thay ben sa oft vincust thir boundis dreuin thy syngulare manheid implore thy mercy thair last refuge quhairthrow thy name emparyng sall na wayis bot euir indure terroure thy fais pal sone mogallus maid prayer galdus maner army began enbras ymage maid thair prayer thairto happy passage returnyng thair iurnay wod wemen sic war inflammit diuine spreit skurgit yame self make thaym seme mair religious aduise druydes solempne preistis afore rehersit thay maid solempne cursynis romani violation thair faith band afore contrackit phovv confiderat kyngis come vvith thair armyis aganis romani orison maid mogallus lucius anthonius thair armyis hovv romani vvar discomfist capi iii mogallus come lang eftir annandale meit unipane king pichtis abaid cu ming ane weil arrayit ost picht al sone baith thair armyis assemblit togidder thay went baith westmurland cumbir quhilk war prouinces romani first thay brocht ane huge pray men guddis fra samyn resydew mycht nocht tursit put fyre inhabitantis feir thir iniuris fled york complanit lucius anthonius roman capitane cruelteis done scottis pichtis lucius tha assemblit ane strang army went forthwart greit ordinance ant ennymes mogallus seing ennymes sicht callit men standart said maner fynd na thing vailyeant campionis bringis nobyll soner louyng glore resist ye iniure ennymes fechtand yair realme liberte deith thay nocht subdewit schamfull seruytude may weill prouyn baith example vncouth pepyll syngulare virtew vailyeant antecessouris remember quhat manheid wysdome kyng edere supportit cassibilane king britonis quhen iulius romane consull doungin albion quhilk coquest na le honour self tha posterite siclike nobyll caratak na le decorit virtew merit louyng quhen fechtand sa oft tymes syndry chacis fortoun mycht neuir vincust yocht ane hard fortoune brocht presoneir rome treasoun cartumandia yit inuincibyll spreit defendyng ay realme last dayis haldy yairfore sic reuerence dredour amang ennymes finaly restorit baith realme honouris exampyll othir efter hym haue excellent fortitude aganis trubyl siklike corbreid bruthir defence liberte faucht sa cruelly aganis proude romani brocht thaym sic irrecouerabyll afflictioun slauchter thay mycht neuir inuade realme duryng lyffe premember alsua gudschir galdus maist vailyeant prince euir afore dayis howbeit inuadit perpetuall trubyll fechtand nocht aganis romani bot aganis fortoun sa oft vincust chasit army brokin ilk calamite icressing aboue othir yit mychty curage perseuerit ay hope better fortoun quhill last lang battall virtew aganis vnhappy infortuniteis ouirthrew fortoun conquest mercyall prowes manheid sa interminabyl victory glore vincust ennymes iii syndry battallis brocht thaym fleing thair tentis sic subiectioun mesiry quhare thay culd nocht content afore aill boundis warld mycht nocht defende thaym self within thair sorowfull tentis throw quhilk gat excellent glore neuir afore succedit leuand crea hauand ambassatouris romani quhome al kingis realmis subdewit deieckit feit desiring grace mair witnes heirof place quhare thir romani war defait callit galloway fame illuster werkis sall neuir euanis bot ay remane recent memorye forthir mair strang mair pissant fais war mair glore succedit hym pepyll heirfore ye gud cumpanyeonis quhilkis ar ye posterite thay forcy capionis sumtyme faucht aganis romani ye said galdus remember ya battall day aganis yame quhilkis he afore sa oftymes bene vincust cheuelry remanis lyue mercy consider weill quhat ye ar ye ar victouris vnbrokin curage defendouris realme liberteis wyffis barnis natyue guddis ar fecht na ambutioun auarice bot allanerly costant virtew consider al quhat schame thinke romani may noch vincust sen thay haue bene oft defait traist fermely virtew fortoun youre handis youre eldaris pa forthwart vailyeant campionis victory present handis put vincust fais flicht thingis sal follow ye pleis gyf ye haue curage pmogallus thir wordis inflammit ye myndis army battall pon tothir syde lucius anthonius na le diligent perswadyng romani vehement orison vailyeantly exemple imitation thair forebearis remember thaym quhat difficill laubouris thay led battallis vincust thair forcy strang ennymes remebring thaym al thay war fecht aganis ane barbar pepyll virtew mouit battall wodnes fury quhilk baith thair manheid reason confundit mouand thaym battall fuliche hardiment thairfore quhen maist dangeir occurritt hay war sone discomfist brokin desirit yame al haue confidence ye romane virtew take na feir thair bludy cruell vnarmit ennymes deuidit amang thaym self perpetual sedition nocht assemblit luf weill thair self bot onely hatrent thair fais ptake youre wappinnis said sicker esperance victory ye sall conques infinite glore straik recouir landis tynt afore sleuth gneus tribellius pskarsly war thir wordis said quhen baith armyis iunit mair ardet ire tha may tauld romani schot yair dartis ye cofiderat pepyl yair arowis ganyeis stanis quhen ye wemen quhilkis gret nowner army cassin incredybill multitude stanis thay tuke thair awful wappinnis faucht aboue cruelte men ruscheand thair fais ony feir woudis deith strenth ground na le support oure folkis impediment oure fais thay knew nocht ground fell sumtymes swardis mossis sutyme well eys throw quhylk thay war oft tymis deuydit thair fechting yit battal cruelly fochtin partis specially myddis quhare capitanis inflamit curage thair army romani contending saif thaym fra thirlage barbar pepyll scottis keip victory gotin manheid thair eldaris efter lang lauborius battall thay left thair swerdis faucht schort dager becaus sa innowmerabyll slauchter sidis nane armyis appering geif place othir capitanis athir syde war penitent thair army iunit day last scottis pichtis innatiue ferocite began put thair ennymes abak nocht thay war discomfist bot eschewing sum thing fury battall becaus thay mycht na forthir resist ye multitude thair ennymes quhill lucius beheld sa hie dageir appering folkis exhortyng thaym renew battall gat sic ane straik ane arow yt mycht na mair tary bot fled feild incontinent army fled ye nixt woddis ane cumpany thaym war stoppit cum thair fallowis nocht knawyng quhare fle war slane scottis becaus thay wald nocht takin presoneris phovv adriane empi ioure come britane biggit ane strang vvall saif britonis romani fra scottis pichtis hovv returnit frace left victorine capitane britane ca iiii sonne fast tendyng occasion quhen confiderat pepyll sound trupat colleckit residew thair folkis fra chace passit remanent ye nycht incredibyll blithnes syngyng dansyng karolyng spring day thay gaderit ryche spulyeis slane men mene tyme quhen two kyngis war takand consultatioun weill thair army schawin ane cumpany romani quhylkis war eschapit fra last battal war within twa mylis thair army gagand wyll nocht knawand quhat cuntre partis thay mycht maist esaly fle incontinent ane band scottis went thaym left none thaym lyffe thay refusit takyn pon morrow confiderat kyngis maid sacrifice gyse thay dayis thair godd ye victory fallyng yame syne tuke diligent examynatioun quhat personis dyd maist vassalage last battall rewardit thaym thairefter plucius anthonius vincust maner send emprioure adryane schawyng quhat trubyll laitly fallyn brytane weris scottis pichtis desyring hym send haistely support britane otherwayes ye romani salbe schamefully doung boudis thairof elli subdewit seruitude barbar peple adriane empriour dant rebellioun come ane huge army albioun eftir cumyng wes aduertist ye scottis cruelte afore wer cumyng ye romane landis ceissyng fra na maner cruelte mycht deuisit ye inhabitantis thairof adriane astonyst rycht desyrus reuenge thir offencis come york quhare remanit remanent army britonis quhill wes prouidit twa monethis vittallis pa scottis pychtis sone eftir rasit campe gret difficulte brocht ye samyn tyne four day eftir come landis quhilkis wer waistit scottis becaus fand euery thing yat mycht nurys army distroyit began inquire quhat lyfe condition thir pepill bene maid sic extorsionis ronane landis wes schawin thay wer ane rude vndantit pepill lay thair furth wynter nocht withstanding ye cauld frostis storm lay sic strenthis mossis thay mycht persewit extreme dangeir thair inuasouris thir causis left purpos pa ony forthir keip thaym fra incursionis ennymes tymes cumyng beildit ane huge wall fail deuait rycht braid hie maner ane hill fra mouth tyne fornens almane seis flude esk fornens ireland seis wal lxxx mylis lenth said croniklis dike wes begun adriane endit seuerus romane emprioure callit wal seueir bot followyng ueremond callis wal adriane fra first foundoure sone eftir adriane past westmureland walis quhare wes aduertist new rebellioun maid aganys hym inhabitantis ye said lad nochtheles behauit hym sa prudently mater principall mouaris yairof wer punyst cuntre restorit opinioun eftir come london kent rewardit nobillis britane thair faith obedience kepit romani sic thyngis done returnit france lucius anthoni quhilk wes yan trublit gret infirmite left uictoryne place uictoryne eftir ye departyng adriane stuffit castellis strenthis britane new munition vageouris resist violence scottis pychtis followit mony yeris eftir gret tranquillite amag britonis phovv scottis pichtis partit ye landis ond vvall adriane hovv kyng mogallus vvas degenerit corruppit lyf slane tyranny ca v scott pychtis partit amang thaym al ye landis brytane lyand beyound wal adriane maner landis fornens ireland seis wer geuin scottis landis fornens almane seis pychtis strenthis liand nixt ye wal adrian war gar yst gret munitionis keip countre fra iniure ronis bot returne historie resydew mogallus lyffe quiete ony vncouth domestyk weiris nochtheles huge victory romani maid hym degenerit fra virtew maist detestabyll vicis sa geuyn auarice lust eild eschamyt na maner vice oppressioun done aganis liegis defloring wyffis nobyllis comonis ony schame respect thair estait nocht onely deforsit virginis matronis bot annullit constitutionis lawis maid punitioun sic horribyll dedis attour aggrege tyranny gaue lycence theiffis reuaris take gudis thair nychtbouris gif thay wantit punitioun slew riche men cuntre vane causis co fiscat thair gudis first kyng statute ye gudis banist condampnit personis confiscat kyngis vse ony respect thair wiffis child dettouris afore tyme gudis landis possessionis condampnit sonis come ony pley fre dispositioun thair wyffis childre law quhilkis schawis weill ye cursit auarice mogallus yit obseruat ony reuocatioun regioun yit horribyl dedis tyrane mycht nocht lang vnpunist nobillis commonis impacient suffer sic tyrannyis conspyrit aganis hym instruckit certane men wait ganand place tyme slauchter mogallus knawyng nobyllis cospirit aganis hym maner tuke consultatioun certane iuglouris quhylkis war richt frequent thay dayis fle ye ilis dissimill passage went bed sonar wont bene strikin suddane infirmite sone efter armyt hym halkrig bow arowis fled two seruandis nixt wod left behynd hym residew cursit cumpany ane tyrane doi confidis creature nobyllis war conspirit aganis hym beand aduertist fleig followit hym sa scharply finaly comprehendit slane xxvi yeir regne fra incarnation cxlviii yeris anthonius pius beand emprioure phiacus albus regnand aboue pychtis heid mogallus borne ane staik nyxt towne quhare ane multitude pepyll war gaderit perpetuall schame deuysit pepyl yt body suld cassyn ye houndis reuanus beistis nochtheles nobyllis mouit ye worthy dedis galdus gudschir comandit heid body buryit amang kyngly sepulturis progenitouris schameful vnhappy end maid mogallus degenerat fra virtew antecessouris pof syndry nobyll clerkis vicius kyng conaru hovv vvas degradit auctorite seruadis hingit thair vvickit counsal ca vi era deith dardanus thir day war mony excellent clerkis syndry ti ye warld quintiliane oratoure serapio medcinar philo iow philosophour oratour cayus pleni secundus wrait hystory naturall xxxviii bukis na le treuth eloquence cornelius tacitus writar hystoryis quhom haue followit werke cecilius plenius secundus oratoure suetonius tranquillus ptolomeus maist excellent mathamatik quhilk brocht cosmography ptolomy afore rehersit ane better knawlage mony new additionis l apuleus oratour aulus gellius plutercus cheronius philosophour thay dayis war excellent poetis iuuenale sillius italic mercialis mony othe tyme ye romane princis persewit cristen pepyll gret cruel e brocht gret nowmer ha marterdome nocht knawyng quhat constance reli ioun cristin faith quhilk ay strenthy wit tyranny agmen na thyng sa nickle scharp persecutioun bot retur quhare left historie mogallus mycht weill haue bene noumerit begynnyng empire amang maist nobill princis bot ye end wes nothir worthy kyng yit ane leuand creature deseruit weil ye end gat forthir sonne conarus quhilk succedit eftir litil better toun maneris instrukit h men hid wachyng sla fader vnnaturall cruelte succedit ye crown begynnyng empire dissimilit vice quhilkis wes naturally inclinit al sone realme wes stabillit hym sicker peace waistit al publik rentis enand crown infamit lust gaue braid landis rich maist vile diffamit creaturis becaus thay louit corruppit maneris vice counsall thir wickit schrewis gouernit realme detestyng nobill virtewis men realme set hym induce peple superflew riatus bankettis contrar temperance antecessouris last quhen waistit treasour substace mony schaful wayis couenit nobillis ane counsal ye quhilk schew lang orison honest triumphant cheir hous na litill glore suld geuyn thairto becaus rentis treasour wes nocht sufficient sustene samyn vsit desyrit ane geneall stent tane throw ye realme ilk person eftir faculte sustene hous seruandis accordyng estait riall honour wes answerit nobillis yt thay mycht nocht gyf ane haisty deliuerance sa gret ane mater becaus desirit certane thyngis quhilkis wer neuir desyrit ony othir prince afore cause thay suld degestlie auyse schaw hym thair mynd concernyng morow thir nobillis ye nycht followyng conuenit thair secreit counsall becaus thay fand kyng euill gouernance thay concludit degraid hym auctorite kyngdome morow thay couenit thair kyng cou sall said hym thay na litill wounder ye rentis pertenand ye crown mycht nocht suffice al weill hym hauand realme ony trudill peace othir maist nobill princis progenitouris afore baith weir peace nobill galdus recouerit realme desyrit neuir stent thaym na maner chargis sustenit aganis h ennymes knawyng weil odius pepyl seik ony new exactionis thaym yit gouernance conarus vnlyke nobyll galdus galdus counsall prudent men remouit prouocatioun lustis fra army othir thingis yat micht maik thaym effemynate geuand lauboure defend subditt resist ennymes contrar conarus drownit lust passing life amag maist vyle abhomynabyll creaturis pretendyng ay gouerne realme quhen hieast besynes occurrit e thair vnhappy counsall disherysing nobyllis realme maik vp myscheuous lymmar fynaly efter sa mony importabyll wrangis done hym socht ane thyng richt vncouth odi thaym ane preparatyue othir kyngis successouris tymes cumyng seik new exactionis thaym thair rich guddis micht cum fynaly ha dis bot vnhappy counsalouris mysgidaris ye realme sall nocht onely frustrate thair intentionis bot brocht sic estait thay sall myster lytyll reward ryches fra hym tymes cumyng thay war profoundlie resoluit baith degraid hym kyngdome honouris punys h wickit consalouris deith pepyl vile obscure lynnage may take exempill abuse realmes kyngis kyngis may vnderstand quhat dangeir thaym iniurius tyranni thayr subdittis conarus heirand thir wourdis said dar ye mischant fulis pretend sic thyngis aganis seruandis treason haue deuisit aganis sall turne dammage self ye sall punyst maist cruell maner may deuisit nobillis answerit vnworthy yair kyng sufferit realme distroyit insolence vicious lymmers incotinent rais ane huge noys clamour amang thaym ye mene tyme certane wycht rank men tuke hym myddill bure hym perforce ane quiet chalmer quhare remanit ye residew dayis miserie seruandis yat wer occasioun corrupit lyfe nurisand hym vice wer tane hynggit iebaittis thay deseruit phovv argadus vvas maid gouernou scotland duryng tyme conarus presoun lyfe gouernance ca vii conarus beand degradit yi maner ye nobillis chesit argadus capitane yle gouernour ye realme sa lan conarus wes presoun argadus ye begynnyng auctorite tuke gret laubour ornament commoun weill stanchit thift reif slauchter othir sic exhorbitant crime meruellus craft prudence hauand sic moderatioun semyt nothir slaw yit cruell administratioun iustice throwe quhilk wes traistit ane myrrour virtew nobill princis yit oft occurris gud forton turnyt mynd fra iustice set aside al gud maneris gouernit realme quhen hieast chargis occurrit domistik counsall nurist seditionis intestyne betuix ye gret princis realme cause thaym haue may erandis hym maryit prince fiffis douchter affinite yair drew pychtis freindschip yat mycht e strang amang awin pepill nobillis impacient suffer vicis callit hym ane counsall quhare wes scharply repreuit chosyn gouernour thair auctorite virtew apperyng hym suld make hym nocht onelie follow vicious tyranny conar quhom yai depriuit detestabil ded bot al mary wt vncouth blude thair auyse gidyng realme priuat counsall gret dammage common weil he tynt schamefully gud conquest afore beginnyng auctorite argadus heirand hym reprochit wi e yet furth mony ter desirit nobillis haue hym excusit ya tyme yair beniuolence nocht punys hym accordyng demeritis promittit amend al enormiteis done hym quhat sort thay plesit nobillis mouit humyll wourdis continewit hym still auctorite kest al counsalouris presoun argadus correckit nobillis maner gouernit realme gud iustice na thyng tymes cu myng concernyng publik materis without consultatioun nobillis becaus diuers townis cieteis realme ouir large preuilege administratioun iustice minist mony yair prerogat uis commandit thaym punis na thyng bot small crymes hie offencis replegit gre iustice maid extreme deligence serche theuis reuaris oppressouris speciallie thaym mayd heirschippis argyle ilis othir partis adiacent ay quhare thay wer apprehendit thay wer hyngit ony mercy iebaittis commandit personis ony office auctorite hym abstene fra sic thyngis mycht mak thaym inebriat dronkin cause thaym haue sum preeminence wisdome aboue commonis commandit al scudlaris tauernaris dronkartis othir siclike vile pepill deuisit lust ony necessar sustenance men exilit within ane certane day day beand run commandit thair guddis confiscat quhare euir thay mycht apprehendit finalie commoun pepil sum part beniuolence argadus sum part thir institutionis wer reformit gudde maneris quhill last conarus lang se knes malancoly quhilk tuke incarceration deceissit xiiii yeir regne anthonius aureli beand empriour pof kyng ethodius first hovv pecifyit ilis hovv scottis pichtis brak dovvn vvall adriane faucht aganis ye romani vvith syndry chancis victory ca viii eftir deith conar nobillis generall couention maid ethodi kyng wes nepot mogall gottin sister ethodius eftir coronation rewardit argadus gouernour landis rich gud ministration iustice duryng tyme maid hym generall lieutenand realme yi nobill prince past ilis pecifyit debaitis returnyng albion wes aduertist romani brokin ye wal adrian place thairof he beildit gret strenthis treis stanis deuaitis samyn maid mony heirschippis landis scottis pychtis quhom ane gret nowmer wer slane defence thair awin guddis ye remanent discomfist al sone ethodius hard thir nouellis send ane herald uictoryne desiring redres maid within xv dayis certificatioun gif samyn wer nocht done within ye said tyme suld recouir samyn force battal answerit uictoryne last pray guddis takin romani recompens syndry othir heirschippis maid afore scotis pichtis thay war ane seditious pepyl confiderat damage thair nichtbouris apperit cleirly becaus thay brak first said wall adrian beildit syndry strenthis fornens samyn trubyll romani britonis ony sycht peace afore contrackit ethodius mouit answer send ambassatouris kyng pichtis desyrit hym cum folkis agane ane certane day recouer thair guddis tane romani kyng promittit reddy desyrit romani weil aduertist thir materis prouydit ane huge ordinance battall aganis thair ennymes confiderat pepyl rasit thair armyis day prefixt brak wall adrian mony partis enterit maist cruell heirschippis slauchter landis romani ye nycht followyng romani slippit tentis scottis pichtis come baith mers berwyk draw thaym romane landis confiderat kyngis weil aduertist thairof come gret diligence ye morrow rescours thair landis incontinent baith ye armyis ruschit togidder faucht syndry chance victory rycht wyngis war victorius ylk syde left wyngis discomfist myd batallis faucht ythandly quhyl nycht bereft thaym thair sycht sa aith said battallis seuerit thair awin wyll ony victory morow al wemen yat followit scottis pychtis battal seyng feild desert gaderit spulyeis slane men returnit samyn scotland battall sa sorowful yeir nixt followyng quiet ony motioun weiris phovv victorine vvas depriuit auctoryte calphurnius agricola send place hovv calphurnius reparit vval adrian returnit rome ca ix victoryne seyng army brokyn maner wrait aurelius emprioure schew trubyll fell romani last battall euery circumstance afore rehersit pthe emprioure traistyng trubyll fallyn romani febyll curage victoryne depriuit hym auctoryte send calphurnius agricola quhilk epot iuli agricola afore rehersit place calphurni cumyng britane assemblit ane large power britonis romani york inuade confiderat pepyll first maid sacrifice goddis haue victory ennymes syne rasit camp come beyond wall adrian quhare fand frequent weiris al landis waist ony cornis frutis townis brynt scottis na lugeyng suld remane thair ennymes calphurnius nochtwithstandyng thir direptionis went forthwart army inuadit baith mers pentland irrecouerabyl skaithis slew inhabitantis thairof al partis ony mercy ranson sic thyngis done returnit york remanit thair wynter followyng resyd w army makand prouysion scottis pichtis agane nixt symer mene tyme etteris welche men syndry othir pepyll brytane wer reb llit said rebellyoun mony cieteis townis stude opinioun romani brynt heryit inhabitantis thairof uelly slane calphurni dreidand tyne landis conquest afore sa huge difficulte persewt new rowmis left ye scottis picht maid hym diligence renew wall adrian samyn mycht ane targe tymes cu myng aganis violence scottis pychtis sone efter gat syndry craftismen clenge fowseis repair said wall partis touris bastailyeis rysyng strangest maner mycht deuisit quhen wal reparit partis left ane band weirmen debait ye samyn fra violence ennymes went resydew army welche men thay na le diligence met hym arrayit battal nochtheles thay war fynaly vincust chasit skarsly battall pecifyit quhen haistely followit ane othir rebellyoun ile wycht inhabitantis thairof come proude baner aganis romani war vincust maner afore co fiderat pepyll seand brytonis dantit wyse held thaym thair awin rowmes ony inuasyoun romani dreidand ye samyn chace victory calphurni agricola afore iulius agricola quhilk subdewit sa mony regionis scottis pychtis romane empyre calphurnius heirand thir exploratouris confiderat pepyll war skalit ony molestatioun done pepyll maid hym mei al seditionis gif ony war rysyng amang brytonis quhen pecifyit thaym debaittis returnit command anthonius commodus empriour rome phovv trebellius vvas send britane vvas vincust scottis pichtis rebellio britonis aganis hym message send empriour ca x efter departyng calphurni ane new capitane namit p trebellius send brytane emprioure trebellius gouernit brytane mair beniuolence fauoure ony auctoryte vsit counsall britonis hie besynes gret honour lucius kyng britonis comendyng hym oftymes wrytyngis emprioure baith luffer commoun weil rome ennyme thaym hatit ye empire thairof trebellius come sic fauour lucius kyng britonis thir co medationis beleuit na thing micht succede damage britane began thairfore schaw fenyeit mynd man insaciabyll auarice slew mony riche men britane confisk thair gudis otheris banist ye effect thir cruelteis maid hym sa odius bene oftymes inuadit slane war nocht ythandly supportit said lucius confiderat pepil knawing hatrent britonis aganis trebellius thocht tyme expedient reuenge auld iniuris efter thay gaderit ane army prouysyoun mycht deuysit thay brak wall adriane quhilk reparit afor calphurnius wrocht intollerabyl cruelteis britonis obeit romani trebellius mouit thir displesouris went ane army horsmen futemen aganis ye scottis pichtis first iunyng ye britonis frenche men quhilkis wer ane gret part army left hym throw quhilk esaly vincust army put flycht yocht ye victory succedit scottis pichtis battall yit innowmerabyl slaucht maid thaym al well romani trebellius dyscomfyst maner colleckit resydew army returnit york scottis pichtis become richt insolent efter victory reuenge ye slauchter sa mony yeris maid thaym thay slew al presoneris quhilkis war takin yi last feild come new army pepyl yt dwelt westmureland kendale inuadit yame sic cruelte yt thay war disparit refuge howbeit trebellius gretumly commouit thir offencis durst nocht assaylye ennimes battall na le suspection aganis ye britonis aganis scottis pichtis nochtheles frequent ieoperdyis slew ennymes ay quhare mycht apprehend thaym ony miseration ye samyn tyme rais mekyll trubyll britane ye comonis seing thaym ylk day mair iniurit ye scottis pichtis ony esperance redres chesit caldor ane vailyeant knycht pichtis blude thair capitane thair rebellion mony yeris accustomit thair maner hauand na thing mair hatrent tyranny romani trebellius knawing ye gret dangeir appering trubyll tuke lang consultation quhat industry laubour mycht best resist thairto efter degeist aduisement tuke purpos fecht britonis gif thair power war midli scottis pichtis ye samyn mycht dantit gret slauchter romani britonis becaus thair army colleckit commonis wer astonist cumyng nochtheles impulsion caldorus thair capitane thay iunit thair ennimes gret ferocite spreit followit ane bludy terribyll battall fochtin wt doutsum victory bot last ye britonis war vincust caldor eschapit yi battal wt certane freindis returnit pentland reiosing mynd sa mony romani britonis wer slane industry mony nobillis britane wer th feild aganis roman howbeit thay wer cloithit vnder landwart habyt quhen thay saw romani rageand fury sla sa mony ye comonis thay discouerit yame self romani traistyng becaus thay wer nobillis ye erar saissit tane presoneris quhen trebellius wes aduertist thay dissimulit thair habyt wer caus rebellion gart hing yame presens al pepill iebai cruelte maid trebellius cht odious ye britonis morrow thay tuke al mony romani hangit thaym samyn maner trebelli dreding gret dangeir apperyng al partis emprioure trea britonis iniuris done sco ti pychtis desyrit support send haistely elli ye romani suld doung schamefully britane comodus anthonius empriour dant yi rebellion britonis scottis pychtis send ane vailyeaunt knycht namyt pertenar britane quhilk eftir cumyng dantit ennymes romane empire mair beniuloece ony preis army howbeit ane certane thaym yt wer smal reputatioun wer punyst ye deith eftir yi rasit camp combeyond wall adriane quhare inuadit scottis pichtis heirschippis slauchter bot quhen suld haue cedit forwart gat writyngis commodus emprioure wes slane treason famyliaris sone eftir returnyt rome quhare wes chosin emprioure eftir coronatioun trebellius wes send agane britane phovv argadus lieutenand kyng ethodius vvas slane army discomfist ilis syndry lavvis actis maid ethodius slauchter ca xi quhil sic thingis wer done britane succedit gret trubyll ethodius scotland sindry gret clannis ilys reuenge ye slauchter thair freindis quhilkis wer slane argadus quhen wes gouernour ariuit wt ane gret power argyle maid slauchter heirschippis partis thairof ony miseratioun estait ethodius punys thir attemptatis send argadus lieutenand ane cumpany chosyn men argyle come ane army baith scottis pichtis wall adriane fecht roman britonis gyf thay wald inuaid hym clannis ye ilis knawyng cumyng argadus conuenit suddanlie wi h thair capitane meit hym left two ireland men quhilkis come thaym spulye hid vnder cragg couis land take argadus gyf thay mycht su auatage al sone thir ireland men persauit argadus cumyng thaym thay ruschit al atanys apo hym ane schout argadus seing hym inuadit athir syde turnyt dredour maist fury faucht incredibill manheid deith wes finalie slane ii thousand men army residew put flycht kyng ethodi become rycht displesant clannys ye ilis offence come sone eftir xx thousand men argyle clannis ilis aduertist cumyng pullit vp salis haue fled ye ilis nochtheles thay wer dreuin agane argyle contrarius wyndis kyng ethodi knawyng thaym disparit men nocht abill vincust hie dammage slauchter pepil brak thaym mair wisdome ony violence battall brocht thaym sic necessite thay wer costranit falt vittallis seik peace quhilk wes grantit thaym vnder thir co ditionis ye principall capitane twa hundreth quhom ye kyng wald cheis thair cumpany salbe deliuerit vnderly ye wil hym nobillis ye remanent return hame thair swerdis ilis thir clannys men ilis seyng na refuge tuke peace samyn condition deliuerit sa mony kyng plesit quhilkis wer iustifyit pu deith residew seyng thair capitane thair freindis slane come ane huge nowmer stanis becaus thay wantit thair swerdis kyngis army rammist wod creaturis haue reuengit ye slauchter yair freindis nochtheles ane gret end thaym litill lauboure wes slane ye remanent put flicht ilis dantit maner ye britonis leuand seruitude vnder romani ethodi realme peace ony vncouth domistik weiris mony yeris eftir eftir yt visit boundis thairof chesit sindry prudent men iugis administratioun iustice subdittis suld nocht dull approchyng age sleuth gaue ingyne huntyng wes lernit youth commandit lawis maid afore nobill antecessouris concernyng huting obseruit first comandit yt na haris slane quhen thay ar lyand clubbis arowis dartis ony siclik instrumentis yit tane nettis girnis becaus haris wer oftymes murdrist sic maner ony game commandit al gyf ye haris forrun hundis lang renk na forthir persewit siclike na man sla ane baggit hynd yit thair calffis wes defendit al sla ane hair ony othir ingyne chace hundis na huntyng vsit duryng season wynter ueir season erd ouir couerit snawis deir ar constranit discend fra montanis planis serche thair fude oftymes murdrist ony game thir lawis wer maid ethodius detestit na thyng mair honorabill game huntyng quhilk wes ordanit nobillis gentill men distroyit sic febill slychtis solace attoure quhen yi prince vakit fra hutyng wes geuin honest pleseiris nurist hym crafty menstralis sortis bot last wes treasonably slane vnder nycht ane menstrale ilis quhome gret delite menstrale wes fynalie tane kyngis gard quhen wes accusit quhy slew h natiue price yat wes familiar tendir hym answerit slew king becaus king slew mony freindis afore argyle sen condingly reuengit ye slauchter freindis quhilk wes determyt mony dayis afore vehement affectioun satifyit vailyeant deid desyrit leif na lagar bad thaym vse quhat cruelte thay list offence curage na le reddy sustene deith tha sla kyng attoure thair na kynd deith sa cruell deuysit hym mycht cause hym repent kyngis slauchter sen samyn he codynglie reuengit slauchter deir freindis skarsly wer thir wourdis said said menstrale quhen body wes drawin sindry wyld hors ethodius wes slane xxxiii yeir regne beryit dunstafage amang sepulturis genitouris regne come empire seuerus emprioure p mony nobyll clerkis hovv tuke faith crist vici u kyng satrahell deith ca xii yi tyme fluryst mony nobill clerkis sindry par warld galian ipocrates medcinaris appollonius oratoure quhilk wes martyrit gentylis makyng ane orisone louyng ye glorius virgine mary mony pepill began tyme detest errouris gentilis tuke sicker faith crist luci kyng britonis heirand romani vnder trebellius myraclis religion cristin faith send writyngis elethuri quhilk wes xiiii paip fra sanct peter gyf cristin faith hym pepill sone efter come britane two haly men fugatius damanius quhilkis brocht said lucius pepill sacrament baptyme put doun al vane superstitionis idolitrys yeir britane tuke faith crist wes fra incarnatioun ane hundreth lxxxvii yeris bot wil return history eftir deth ethodius sonnis wer tender age yat thay mycht nocht succeid thairfore satrahell brothir wes maid kyng satrahell wes ane man sle fals ingyne geuin sic cruelte treason slew fenyeit causis mony freindis ethodius defraude ayris crown wes vnmerciful commonis nobillis yat spulyeit thaym baith yair guddis landis mony yame vane causis put deith thus grew ilk day rycht odius baith co monis nobillis sone eftir followit discord dissension domistik weris amang freindis nychtbouris gret dammage common weil thir mony othir damagis apperyng plane exterminioun pepill come throw sleuth imprudence yi vnhappy tyrane durst nocht cum lycht punys trespassouris becaus pepill hym extreme hatrent cursit tyranny quhil last wes slane ane famyliaris within nycht fourt yeir regne pof kyng donald first hovv britonis vver inhibit romani haue ony kyng thair blude hovv thay solistit scottis pichtis assist thair rebe lion ca xiii satrahell slane yi maner donald brothir ethodius first wes maid king ane iust humyl prince rych far discordand fra maneris last tyrane nocht geuyn slychtis falset bot settand mynd mei contentionis truble amang liegis quhen peacifyit realme debaitis began vesy boundis thairof makand residence oftymes honorabil castellis nobillis doyng iustice subdittis ony respect party punyst crymes efferyng ye offence thairof throwe quhilk pepill wes wyld vndantit afore necligence euill princis wes brocht ciuill maneris abyll withstand thair ennymes quhen dangeir occurrit nobil prince ane gard chosyn men reddye chargis baith tyme weir peace tyme lucius kyng britonis deceissit romani eftir deith knawyng kyngis britane wes occasioun sa frequent seditioun tymes bygane inhibit ony thair blude suld regne tymes cumyng throw quhilk gret trubill succedi britane fulgencius quhilk wes discendit ye blude riall britane rycht comouit noblis thairof suld disherist ye crown conuenit mony nobillis thair ane counsall complenyt ye gre tyrannyis done romani plane euersioun thair natyue lawis liberte thair virginis wedowis matronis fulyeit
