insaciabill lust romani thair guddis escheitit new tribute exactionis ilk day desirit beside mony othir infinite oppressionis last nobill blude disherist crown thairfore gyf samin wer nocht haistely reparit na nobill blude bot onlie comonis suld left britane p britonis mouit yir reasonis set ane day meit hym thair best maner inuade romani sone eftir fulgencius send ane herald donald kyng scottis schawyng ye rebellioun britonis aganis romani desyryng support expell thaym albioun ye samyn mycht done yat tyme le truble ony tyme afore empriour wes agit brokin sa mony calamyteis wist nocht quhat wes done toure sa mony pepill wer rebellit aganis hym france almanye eist partis warld na help mycht send fra hym britane p kyng donald reiosyng thir tithyngis glaid haue occasioun battall becaus pepill mycht nocht leif ciuil weris amang thaym self quhen thay haue na externe weris othir pepil promittit cum ane prefixi day wt power inuaid romani pychtis mittit thair support samyn maner pfulgentius knawyng punytioun scottis pychtis maid effec foresaid come ane army britonis wal adriane fornens irelad seis brak doun ane gret part thairof agane cuming scottis pychtis thay na le deligence met britonis al sone albianis mengit thair armyis togiddir thay come forthwart york traisting haue found trebellius othir sindry romane capitanis last quhen thay line lang tyme sege town vnderstude ye principal romani quho thay desyrit maist fled kent thay left ge maid incursionis heir chippis slauchter pepill obeit romani ye commonis astonyst thir cruelteis nocht power resist past confidera kyngis thair plesand maner ressauit thaym wt portis thair town thair armyis wer lugit vtouth town lang ony thyng mycht gottin ai sustentation thay went othir placis ay makand siclike heirschipp afore nocht ceis ng fra thair cruell fury quhill allerable cold stormys wynter constra thaym skaill hame phovv seuerus emprioure come tane reuenge ye oppssio done romani hovv britonis fled otland hovv scottis pichtis tand support britonis vvar scomf st ca xiiii trebellius impacient suffir thir offencis wrait seuerus emprioure britonis nocht onlie wer rebellit bot al he inuadit romane landis sic cruelti heirschippis yat wes necessar othir send ane new army elli cum hym self britane seuerus emprioure glaid haue occasioun battall mycht coques siclik honour subdewyng britonis afore subdewyng baith eist north partis ye warld tuke wayage ane hors litter come finalie gret lauboure dylygence howbeit agit pynit ye gout britane brocht hym baith sonnis anthonius geta fyne mycht draw thaym fra corrupit sensuall plesouris merciall werkis cumyng britane gaderit ye residew romani new army inuaid britonis fulgentius remanent britonis opinion astonyst suddane cummyng emprioure ane huge power send oratour excuse thaym desyrit peace empriour dipeschit thir oratouris plane repuls fulgentius frustrat desyris conuenit nobillis ane counsall perswadyng thaym lang orisoun recouer yair liberte re ore blude royall britane crown reuengeyng ye intollerable outragis sa mony yeris done romani declarit na thyng mycht moue hym take maist dangerus mater hand bot onlie recouer ye liberte britane banis vncouth blude fra ye croun yocht persuadit thaym sumtyme battall sayng romani wer ane army gaderit diuers opinionis myndis mycht yair fore ye soner vincust fra scottis pychtis quhilkis wer maist ennymes romani wer cumyn thair support yit thocht mair proffitable brek ye romani smal incursionis tha ony set battal traistyng gyf goddis wer propiciant britane mycht perpetuallye deliuerit romane seruitude britonis mouit thi wourdis come britane thair wiffis child guddis montanis beyond wall adriane ye mene tyme fulgentius gaderit ane cumpany noblest britonis opinion purpos erar defend thaym self inuaid thair ennymes sone eftir scottis pychtis come hym reddy assailye maner ieoperdeis yair common weill seuerus empriour knawing wayis albianis left na thyng vndone yat mycht pertene prouisioun ordinance quhen al thyngis wer prouidit desyrit left yongest son namyt geta gouerne britonis vnder romane lawis come al ordinace york quhair wes ressauit gret honour triumphe eftir intres went templis maid salutationis goddis syne past castell quhair trebellius wes sindry romane sodiouris tuke lang auisement ye barbar pepill mycht best dantit nocht lang eftir rasit campe come forthwart displayit baner ye britonis quhilkis wer fulgentius opinioun seyng na refuge uk purpos fecht aganis romani othir de maist vailyeantly elli leif victory honour yit quhen thay saw thai ennymes sic multitude pepill sycht thay changit purpos nochtheles thay iunyt maist fury faucht lang tyme vncertane victory quhill last thay wer vincust scottis pychtis put flycht samyn maner fulgentius wes brocht feild freindis esperance better fortoun scottis pychtis eftir discomfitour gaderit residew thair army returnyt hame vnhappye battall wer slane scottis pychtis britonis xxx thousand pof gret cruelteis done seuerus emprioure aganis nobyllis britane vveris aganis scottis pichtis hovv anthonius reparit vvall adriane empriouri deith ca xv scottis pichtis brokin yi calamytye send ireland norway denmerk support freindis resist romani fulgentius tothir syde ceissit hyre pepill ya mycht get money eftir battall empriour seuerus past throw boundis britane slew nobillis thairof quhom mycht apprehend hauand miseratioun onelie commonis thay offence bot followit thair maisteris al sone reparit dammagis done necligence febyll capitanis retournyt york left army thair wynter schelis nixt symer scottis pichtis seand na support come fra ireland set thaim era defend thair awin inuade thair ennymes fulgentius brytonis stude opinioun esperance better fortoun fled scottis pichtis sone efter seuerus emprioure rasit campe come beyonde wall adriane throw quhilk empriour began nocht allanerly fauoure crystyn pepyll bot al inhibit ony persecutioun maid thaym kepit crucifix maist secret partis chalmer pin samyn tyme plotinus mony othir clerkis syngular eruditioun sum gentilis su thaym crystyn pepyll first tyme scottis began leir theologe haly writ clerkis quhilk war send uictor pape thair eruditioun albion pof kyng ethodius secund hovv nobyllis fyndyng hym nabyll gyde realme gouernit samyn thair auctorite gret ca xvii donald deceissit maner ethodius secund name sonne ethodius first maid kig nurist ile man vnder wyse preceptouris thairof howbeit vncertane quhat maneris wald incres quhen put lyberte quhen declarit kyng frely delyuerit preceptouris apperit dull ingyne mair abyll gadder rich insaciabyll auarice gouerne ane realme becaus nobyllis pers uit hym euyll gouernance thay gydit realme thair prudent constitutionis gude iustice followit prudent men put euery schyre baith punis criminall personis kepe pepyll ony extorsionis sic diligence maid yat misdoaris war punist na man punist bot according lawis defendit samyn speke ony criminall personis iugement spake said personis war reput participant thair cryme attoure quhare ony trubyll apperit seditioun samyn haistely sit britonis leuit al tyme gude peace vnder trybute romani durst pretend na rebellyoun aganis thaym seuerus emprioure tuke sic pleggis thaym afore deith thay war constranit leif peace siclike scottis pychtis duryng tyme ethodius nothir tuke iniure romani britonis quhyll last kyng ethodius slane gard xvi yeir regne becaus ouir mekyll geuyn auaricious gadering sa endis heir fift buke thir roniklis heir begynnis sext buke croniklis scotland phovv athirco vvas maid kyng scottis hovv nobyllis conspirit aganis hym cursit tyrannyis hovv slevv hym self disperation ca primo nocht lang efter slauchter ethodius nobillis co uenit publik cou sall maid athirco sonne ethodius afore deceissit kyng yocht youg yit dispesit ye nobill notwithstadyng age apperit begynnyng empire prudent gratius subdittis delytyng doctrine letterit sic knew haly wryt hystory progenitouris weill exercit werslyng othir corporall exercition cumyng ingyne strenth body sa lyberal yat tyistit pepyll fauoure yit grew nocht virtew grew age efter yat roung viii yeris become ylk day mair vnplesand ay ye mair vicious yat procedit yeris like ane monsture degenerat fra al honest exercitionis geuyn vnsaciabyll auarice doyng ylk thyng mair ire dredur tha beniuolence gud counsal thus tint auarice al freindis yat conquest afore liberalite nocht onely iuoluit thir crime bot kynd corruppit vice lust yt micht make hym effeminat tuk sic delyte syngaris sportouris menstralis yat eschamit nocht pa sycht al pepyll playing ane flute nobyllis thouch vnworthy gouernit sic ane monsture desyrit erar schaw hym ane fydlar ane virtuous prince war commouit eik young wykit exempyl war ylk day mair drownit lust dammage thair commoun weill laik iustice seand thair king sa inuoluit euery kynd vyce tuke na solicitude gouernance realme bot gaif occasioun ylk day mair mair aganis hym argyle ane man gret auctorite namyt nathalak quhilk two douchteris excellent beawte athirco aduertist thaym corruppit rutouris ceissit nocht quhyll deflorit thaym baith quhen lust saciat causit mischeuous rebaldis fulye thaym samyn maner nathalak herand yir cruelteis done dochteris seirchit ingyne quhat way micht best reuenge samyn ye mene tyme maid consolatioun douchteris knawing weill thair bodyis mair violat thair myndis morrow conuenit freindis ane counsal complanit heuyly ye defloration dochteris incontinent allia freindis ruschit harnes maid solempne votis punis tyrane demeritis morrow mony al ye nobyllis assistit thair opinio com doustafage quhare vicius king remanit ye time nois ratlyng armit men maid na lytyl effray amang commonis thayr first cumyng nochtheles fra ye caus wes maifest yair asseblance pepyl gaderit fast partis assist thaym army thocht nocht baith tyrane worthy degradit auctorite punist knawlege petitionis said empyre kyng nathala sall haue ane haisty myserabyll end ane maist famyliaris murray nocht content sa general responce prayit hir schaw name specyall suld sla ye kyng scho answerit thow sall sla hym murray began chyde wyche saying thow deuyne nocht bot sayis thow pleis flattery malyce thow sall fals sall refuse na kynd deith attempt sa odius cruelte murray hauand na othir answer richt astonist maid hym return kyng yit afore cumyng kyng changi purpos oft reuoluyng mynd quhat dangeir mycht follow gyf ye answer ye wyche schew kyng oft musand gud yl thairof knawyng weill quhat dageir stude gif ye kyng tuke ony suspitioun hym efter lang musyng fullely resoluit erar sla kyng wiche schew ay leif dangeir ly e last quhe cumyn kyngis secrete chalmer allone kyng began lang circumstance schaw wounderful slychtis operatioun wyche mene tyme king sa trublyt flux wambe costranit haistely pa eys al sone murray saw kyng quiet pullit furth dageir draue ye kyng ye hart suspeckand na thyng le tha sic treason kest body closet syne stall away ane priuate postrome first schew deith kyng conspiratouris end maid nathalak ye xi yeir regne fra incarnatioun iiclii yeris tyme galienus maist febil empriour afore hym tyme xxx tyranni inuadit commoun weill rome gret afflictionis ony resistance contrar pof kyng fyndok hovv dantit ilis vvas slane tvva men thairof ca iii nathalak tyrane slane maner ye nobyllis send murray pentland bryng ye thre sonnis athirco dounstafage ye eldest thaim namyt fyndok ane lusty vailyeant prince maid kyng kepit gud peace nychtbouris romani britonis conquest freindis mair beniuolence tha ony feir mynassyng bot oft fallis amang w lang peace intertenit vncouth pepyll generis ciuill contentionis amang self donald ilis reuenge slauchter nathalak come ane gret power murray ro gret heirschippis slauchter pepyll becaus thay fauorit ye slaa nathalak freind fyndok punis thir attemptatis come haistely ilis faucht donald put hym flycht donald discomfist maner fled see quhare fand ane bait enterit sic multitude folkis scho sank within ane myle land pepil hir perist howbeit men ilis war brokin chance battal thay ceissit nocht fra thair vndantit malyce bot che donald quhilk sonne donald afore perist thayr capitane inuadit ye cuntre mair trubyl afore fyndok punys thir conspiratouris returnit ilis slew ye war apprehendit thair opinioun syne kest strenthis cuntre na refuge sall remane thair returnyng donald afore kyngis cumyng fled ireland efter kyngis departing returnit ilis seand cuntre heri freindis slane kest hym thyng slycht yt mycht nocht force send ane messyngeir bene penitent offence fyndok desyrit grace kyng mouit piere condiscendit thir desyris sa yt said donald come principal mouaris rebellion wappynnis dounstafage vnderly wyll donald nocht content haue peace maner chesit erar vnderly chance fortoun kyngis wyll thairfore co plet treasonabyl purpos hym deuysit send two men subtyle ingyne dounstafage await su ganand tyme sla kyng thir two men fenyeit thaym gentyll men ye ilis ennymes donald thair first cumyng thay gat lytyll credence bot last menis carance kyngis brothir thay war admyttit ye kyngis presence maid sa famyliar thay war deput kyng sit baith priuat publik materis last quhen thay persauit carance set slauchter kyng conques ye crown thay opinnit thair mynd hym na thyng suspendit thair purpos bot large me tyistit thaym mair samyn within schort tyme efter ye kyng went ane huntung besyde doustafage sla ane wolf sat ane mote nocht knawing thir lymmaris war set slauchter last quhen faid brocht ye wolf afore houndis skry arais ylk went gam thus wes kyng left alone ony cumpany except thir two ilis men tha ane thaym began hald ye kyng talk quhyll tothir tratourusly come behynd hym draue hym throw body ane hountyng staffe al sone thir tratour slane ye kyng thay left ye staf stikand throw body huntaris returnyng fra thair game fyndyng ye kyng slane followit sa fast slaaris thay war baith takyn demandit scharp punytioun quhat occasioun thay slew ye kyng thir tratouris spreit lytyll affrayit cofessit pertly ye cryme schawyng thay war instruckit donald ilis carance sla kyng quhen thay discouerit ye treason said thay war baith put maist terribyll deith pkyng fyndok slane x yeir regne quhylk tyme floriane empriour body buryit efter vse cristin prince gret lament pepyl ane ryche sepulture nocht far fra dounstafage phovv carace vvas banist brotheris slauchter donald cund maid kyng deith syndry nobyll clerkis ca iiii carance secund sonne athirco herand treason sa manifestly confessi ye slaaris fyndok fled italy quhair wan gret fame honouris weris dioclesiane aurelius empriouris sall eftir schaw fyndok slane yi maner brothir donald ye secund name thrid sonne athirco wes maid kyng prince wes takand auisement nobillis quhat maner mycht maist esalie reuenge slauchter brothir fyndok quhen suddanlie come tythyngis ye said donald ilis wes cumyn ro inuadyng ye pepil thairof heirschippis cruelteis kyng donald mouit thir attemptatis come haiste ie murray ane certane chosin men commandit generall proclamatioun vnder pa e deith al sensabill men follow ary cumyn wes bot ane nowmer partit army ane gret strenth abide ye cumyng remanent army donald ilis seyng kyng small power tuke purpos ieoperd hym ye chance fortoun tary come sa scharp battall kyng ye kyng mycht nocht vse ordinance bowis speris bot constranyt haistelie fecht wt swe dis followit ane terribill scharp bargane quhil last kyng donald ouirset gret multitude pepyll fechtand aganys hym wes tane wt iim army iii thousand slane kyng donald finalie tuke sic malancoly deceissit thrid day eftir wes tane first yeir regne thir dayis wer mony clerkis singulare eruditioun quintus tortulianus wrait mekyl aganys errouris gentylis pylocratis bischop ephesei quhais tyme wes gret contentioun concernyng ye cerimonys pasche cipriane oratoure quhilk renuncit errouris gentilis become cristin eftir wrait sindry bukis eruditioun cristin pepill phovv mony haly men vvar martyrit faith crist hovv donald ilis thrid name vsurpit crovvn vvas slane craithlint ca v cristin faith sufferit gret persecutioun tyme mony haly men wemen martyrit cipriane sextus laurence hipolitus barbara cecilia agatha mony otheris throw tyrany decius empriour tyme scottis began rycht profound theologie haly writ doctryne certane monkis quhilkis wer callit thay dayis culdey say honoraris god tha al preist ye honorit god war callit culder thir prest general vocis chesit ane bischop haue auctorite iurisdiction aboue thaym wes callit bischop scotland bot return historie eftir deith kyng donald gret truble followit realme donald ilis sa mony nobillis tane last battall held thaym si captiuite nothir thay thair freindis durst attempt ony thyng aganis desiris throw quhilk tuke ye crown nocht onlie habandonit cuntre bot thirllit ye nobillis assistance howbeit thay lay ay wait sla hym quhen tyme place mycht appeir donald knawin yair hatrent aganis hym tuke sic feir lyfe gaif na man credit bot vse tyranni euery man suspitioun dredour thus grew ilk day terribill odius pepill gouernit realme na better yeil gat last dredour procedit sa far durst cum na opin place gard armit hym halbertis axis inhibit ony othir man beir wappynnis saiffyng awin gard finalie culd nocht satifyit mynde quhill slane thaym suspeckit confiscat thair guddis fauour yame assistit hym intendyng ane bludy monstoure conserue ye crown siclike cruelte gat slew al mony othir nobillis vane causis promoue men vile obscure lynnage rich honouris ony sycht virtew reiosit na thyng sa mekill gener frequent seditionis amang subdittis traistyng thair seditioun haue felicite thair concord haue trubill crown wes said cruell tyrane leuch neuir bot quhe hard discord slauchter nobillis al sone hard ye confiscat thair guddis ony sycht wrang reason sayd oftymes amang familiaris na sycht mycht mair plesand hym se men murdir othir attour slauchter nobillis riche men ar rycht necessar ye tranquillite realmes becaus thay ar ennymes baith kyng commoun weil quhen tyrane roung xii yeris maist cruelte aboue pepill ony tityll come enuerlochte purpos pa ilis bot wes slane ye first nycht come yair craith lynt sonne kyng fyndok afore reheirsit xii yeir regne craithlynt eftir slauchter tyrane schew ye nobillis put doun tyrane donald ilys restit thairfore ganand occasioun reuenge gret oppression cruelteis done sa mony yeris vnhappy counsalouris nobillis glaid tyranni slauchter ruschit haistely harnes slew samyn nycht iic principall assistaris opinioun remanent chasit athole quhilkis wer slane sone eftir pepill quhen thay wer aduertist donaldis slauchter pof kyng craithlynt hovv scottis pichtis fell contentioun thair huntyng faucht vvith gret slauchter sydis ca vi donald tyrane slane yi maner crown wes restorit blude athirco pfor craithlynt son findok becaus slew last tyrane sa vailyeantlie wes maid kyng craithlynt glaid felicite gaif thankis subditt detestit lag oriso afore ye cousal ye tyrany donald ilis usurpar crown ony tityll gydyng samyn treason falset reif slauchter nobillis exhortit pepill sen tyrane prudence wes distroyit reiose suffir nane said donaldis blude liue auenture thay nuris sic displesour thaym self thair non aduertence sum tyme dyd king donald fechtand vnwarly ye said donald ye ilis quhair throw ye nobilite scotland oppressit xii yeris sic tyrannyis na man mycht resist samyn thir reasonis desyrit thaym assist hym repare oppressionis done cruelte said donald ilis quhilk thyngis beand done materis mycht succede schort tyme thay desyrit nobillis na le mouit excellet beawte lustynes person wordis swore take part al materis nocht lang efter al ye lynnage donald ilis socht partis slane ony difference thair estait sic thyngis done craithlint chesit wyse men iustice throw al bou di realme syne past ane certane nobyllis montanis grayebene pa tyme huntyng mene tyme come hym ye ambassatouris thelargus king pichtis schawing hym reiosit yt ye tyrane donald ye ilis lane crown restorit natyue blude desyrit thairfore auld band peace renewit weill baith thair realmes thir desyris war plesandly grantit ambassatouris honorably depeschit nocht lang efter certane nobyllis pichtis come hunt kyng granyebene pichtis thair huntyng stentit strang nettis lesuris medois draue hertis apone nettis thair hundis quhe ye beist eschapit thay cloithit thaym wt brachis leuis treis lik stalkaris sine slew deir braid arrowis dartis quhen thay war lyand wery scottis na thyng content game becaus co trar thair lawis gart remoue thair nettis hunt thair maner takand pray swift houdis allanerly pichtis seand thair hou dis le reputatioun ye scottis baith bewte swiftnes lang renk hardyment desyrit ane certane euery kynd houdis geuyn thaym yt samyn micht bred amang thaym self quhen thay gottyn euery kind yairof geuyn thaym thay desyrit thay stale ane certane houndis went ham ye samyn ony aduise scottis amang thir houdis tane said thir pichtis ane quhyte hound plesand mair spedy tha ony othir quho craithlint maist delite maister hutis astonyst throw ye wantyng hound followit sa scharply yt fand ye samyn sa feruent recoueryng thairof yat finaly slane skry arrais efter slauchter maid ye nobillis comonis scotland returne maist fury reuege ye pichtis ye samyn maner gaderit tothir syde na le fury resist throw quhilk followit ane haisty myscheuus battall gret slauchter ilk syde nane thaym knawing ye motiue occasion thairof vnhappy bergane wer slane lx scott gentyl men gret nowmer comonis pichtis mo ane hundreth fame vnhappy battall diuulgat cuntre mouit ye freindis thaym war slane seik vengeance mair hatrent afore thus gaderit thay agane al sydis faucht capitane baner ordour cheuelry neir vter distruction thaym baith alwayis ye scottis war discofist iiim thaym slane iim pichtis slauchter thir two pepyll yt sa lang cofiderat togidder fra tyme fergus first kyng scottis thir dayis ay risyng vnder ane blude amite kyndnes grew maist hatrent aganis otheris ane sponk small occasioun vnkindnes hrow quhilk nane yame apperit ceis fra vter extreminion othir followit sa mony bludy cursionis day nycht na houssis respect age mycht defence refuge contrar thair cruelte slauchter athir syde hovv carance brothir findok returnit italy vvith gret rich albion hovv conquest vvestmureland maid peace betuix scottis pychtis ca vii thelargus kyng pichtis richt agit nere consumit yeris sorowfull contention fallyng betuyx two pepyll sa lang confiderat cumyn suddane pertinacite vndantit sonis send h oratour craithlint schawand hym na le displesit slauchter trubyll fallyng scottis awin pepyl tendit damage baith thair commoun welis attoure na cryme micht impute hym neuir consentit thairto sen ye said trubyll cumyn mair priuat publict auctorite thoucht pepyll sa lang confiderat suld put end thair wer haue peace othir gif thay seuerit ire hatrent aganis othir nocht sal follow bot vter ruyne baith thair realmes ye samyn fall pray romani forthir reddy repair al offence iniuris done pepil scottis desyrit haue peace baith ye pepil micht erar returne concord defence thair realmes tha perseueir battallis ye finall euersion thaym baith scottis war sa impacient ye recent slaucht maid thaym pichtis yt thir oratouris micht skarsly purches licence schaw thair message nochtheles thay gat finaly presence schew yair desyris craithlint maner afore rehersit answerit king craithlint na thing micht cu sa displesand hym suddane trubill fallyng amang thay pepil quhilkis he bene lag confiderat togidder amite blude youcht peace war mair plesand pepill tha battall yit ye recen slauchter sa deip ingrauin thair breistis yat thay refuse gif peace nochtwithstandyng wald gif awin auctorite thre monethis trewis yt nobillis baith thair realmis may foudly resoluit pa repas decerne quhat done trewis tane maner war plesant kyng pichtis beleuyng thairthrow put ane end thir debaittis displesour following ye yit nochtwithstanding thir trewis sindry incursionis war maid athir syde quhill sic thyngis occurrit betwix scottis pichtis carance secund brothir findok quhome schew banist afore slauchter wa gret honouris italy carace efter proscripption ane man armis romane weris howbeit nane knew nobil blude wan sic fame manheit proues na capitane repute mair worthy haif chargis empriour nocht lang efter carance send dioclesiane empriour ane flote schippis defende costis normandy picardy fra iniure saxon franche men othir pirattis quhylkis inuadit samyn frequent iniuris cumyng wald noch ieopard hym aganis ennymes quhil thay war ladyn ful rich guddis fyne fra pray war tane mycht enrichit thair yit becaus nothir delyuerit pray thairof ye empriour capitanis haldyn suspect persewit deith al one carance vnderstude empriour mouie sic hatrent aga pullit vp salis come weirmen rich seis westmureland ane britane nocht far fra la scottis pichtis traistyng haue sum rescours thaym aganis romani sone efter set army land smal difficulte gat pepyl thairof randerit hym sic thingis done send oratouris craithlint nepot schawand youcht banist suspitioun slauchter brothir fyndok inuy wikit personis brocht gret misery trubyl thairthrow yit innocent thairof gouernit hym sa wysly efter syndry chargis geuyn hym empriour send ane flote schippis pecify occiane seis samyn he gret honour rich yit becaus empriour mouit aganis hym inuy detractour cumyng sic army ryches westmureland yt he brocht ye inhabitantis thairof opinion thus ferme esperance gif scottis pichtis wald co cur hym ding romani albion power romani dayly wastit britane sa gret rebellyon maid aganis thaym partis thay mycht send na support britane thus mycht scottis pichtis haue ane ganand tyme dyng romani britane kepe hym thair natyue blude empire thairof swa thay wald remoue hatrent sedition rysyn amang thaym haue peace othir craithlynt thocht kyndnes eme carance nocht refusit hym cumyng britane sa gret pissance reddy support hym dangeris thairfore answerit thir oratouris yt mony yeris gone foryet offence gyf ony maid fader reiosit nocht lytyll present felicite fallyng enie carance wald fulfyl h desyris sa far micht al pointis aganis ye britonis gif micht haue peace pichtis yocht mycht haue nane suld send support ane cumpany chosyn bot h sel behuuit abide hame defence realme aganis said pichtis carance glaid answer stuffit al ye strenthis westmureland come ane cumpany weill accuterit men yt wa tir esa nocht far fra wall adriane quhare met craithlint fell kneis first metyng declaring hym mony euydent reasonis innocent fyndokis slauchchter desyrit kyng haue hym na suspitioun yocht bannist inuy hatrent amang vncouth pepell yit behauit hym self sic maner returnit albion baith honour hym self freindis craithlynt embrassit enie carance maist tenderly prayit hym stand gud freinde suld leif na thing purpose sen gret honour proffet gif fortoun war propiciant mycht succede samyn promittit gif pichtis weris war nocht impediment hym uld nocht faill support hym vter pissance carance reiosyng kyngis beniuolence said sufficient army expell romani brytane transfer ye crown thair lynnage scottis gif scottis pichtis wald assist hym finaly prudent industry carance baith thir two kyng war brocht togidder accumpanyit ane nowmer ylk syd brig thaym mair sycker concord carance began remembir thaym auld affinite betuix thaym comodius contrar violatioun thairof full dammage thaym baith remeberit thaym thair frequent cheuelryis sa lang continewing aganis fury romani britonis defence thair realmis lyberteis sic amite kyndnes iniuris done ony ane thaym war repute equale yame baith thir reasonis necessar thaym othir haif peace othir thair commoun weill elli perseueir battall distruction thaym baith thir siclike wourdis two kyngis war suadit haif peace repair iniuris athir syde sone efter viii newtral sonis gret prudece war chosyn baith thair consentis quhome peace finaly roborat al iniuris plesandly redressit phovv carance support scottis pichtis slevv bassiane capitane britane tuke crovvn thairof deith hovv crovvn britane vvas restorit romani ca viii nocht lang eft qui tus bassianus capitane britane rasit camp inuade ye said carance cummyn york thre gret buschementis scottis pichtis otheris freindis gottin samyn randerit hym ony offence inhabitantis bassianus nochtwithstandyng ye frequent rebellion maid aganis romani partis yit reuenge attemptatis done carance rasit army par samyn within ye nycht betuix two mossis ane strait groud carance nocht x mylis fra hym weil aduertist doyngis come forthwart samyn maner gif hym battall morrow bassianus arrayit folkis exhortit thaym remembir thay war fecht defence equite aganis certane fals conspiratouris specially aganis ye treasonabil murdresar carace maist odius creatour god detestabil offence forthir prayit thaym haue respect ye romane virtew quhilk he ben ay sa gret estimatioun baith afore immortall goddis men thay mycht haue reward victory nocht infinite ryches bot perpetuall louyng thair posterite othir syde carace na le diliget exhortig h army battal sayng yair ennymes gret disauantage fecht thaym becaus ye maist part yame wer britonis hauad na le hatrent aganis romani he wald leif yame quhen thay saw ony dangeir occurryng thairfore victory wes present thair handis gyf thay manheid prudence ferslie ruschit yair ennymes al sone baith armyis blast trumpat iunit britonis left ye romani went thay bene fleand gud array nixt hyll romani seyng thair sydis nakit fleyng britonis wer astonist myndfull yair sing lar weill ony glore victory finalie thay wer sa deieckit thair curage thay wer put flicht quhom followit carance army maist hatrent slew yame ay quhare thay wer bu ony miseratioun carance sa huge slauchter maid chace callit folkis ound umpat standart yi battall er slane quintus bassianus capitane britane hirci procuratour mony othir nobillis commonis thair blude residew britonis quhilkis wer escuapit fra battall wer randerit carance gaif pledgis noblest wer yair realme nocht within xx yeris aboue lx yeris trew subdittis tymes cumyng al sone praye guddis fallyng chance battall wes deuidit amang victori pepill carance past london quhair wes ressauit gret reuerence tuke ye sceptour diademe britane contrar empire romani eftir yat wes maid tributar iulius iiicxlvi yeris carance crownit yi maner held iim scottis pychtis continewally hym maner ane gard remanent scottis pychtis returnit hame richit spulye last battall carance princely reward thair laubouris gaif landis lyand betuix wall adriane yorke namyt westmureland cumber thair perpetuall dominioun throw liberalite come gret hatrent baith romani britonis howbeit wes oftymes assailyeit thaym wt scharp battallis yit wes victori iornays brukit ye crown britane crafty prudence quhil last wes slane vii yeir regne alectus romane capitane alectus eftir slaucht carance set extreme besynes bryng britonis agane romane lawis quhe saw thay mycht na wayis brocht thairto cruell hatrent thay aganis romani maid laubouris haue thair beniuolence finalie applaudit yair opinioun tuk crown britane contrar auctorite romani yit rang na better fortoun dyd carance wes slane samyn maner asclepiadotus thrid yeir regne eftir quhais deith ye crown britane wes restorit wes afore romani pof gret cruelte done dioclesian emprioure aganis cristin pepyll hovv coell vincust romani coquest crovvn britonis hovv vvas alliat vvith constantius empriour natiuite gret constantyne ca ix dioclesiane emprioure yi tyme vassalage constantius maximianus galerius dantit warld sindry chance battall wes first romane emprioure yt wes adorit kingly reuerence afore thay dayis emprioure vsit nocht bot salutationis emprioure causit riche perle precious stanis set schone mair taikin insolece ony ornament afore yat tyme wes na difference betuix empriouris vthir pepil except rob ryal dioclesiane wes sa odious bludy tyrane xviim men wemen wer martyrit hym defence cristyn faith cruelte nocht onlie enragit eist west partis warld bot al britane aboue thir cruelteis infinite nowmer yame wer condampnyt galionis wynnyng querrellis mynis hym also wer brynt innoumerable bukis cristin faith contenand euangellis crist ye actis epistillis appostollis traistyng thairthrow faith crist suld vterlie expire throw quhilk ye cristin faith ouirthrawin wt new scurgis perseuerand cruelte wes neir perist mony haly relligious men feir thir cruelteis fled desertis elraige placis quhair thay wer exonerit truble leiffit ane haly lyfe dispitfull tyrane dioclesiane eftir sindry triumphis maid rome victoryis diuers pepill warld wes trublit punition god mony vncouth infirmiteis slauchter sa mony innocent pepill become furious salonas slew hym self drynk vennome xx yeir regne exampill na man put confidence felicite eternall lyue vane fauour assentatioun pepil quhil sic thingis wer done dioclesian coel discendyng anciant nobill blude britonis wes solistit thaym rebel aganis romani asclepiadotus aduertist heirof met hym ye army romani othir stude opinioun followit ane aufull dangerus battall lang fochtin doutsum victory bot last ye romani wer discomfist asclepiadotus thayr capitane slane coel eftir victory wes maid kyng stabill ye realme hym sicker peace co mandit generall edict romani otheris thair opinioun slane quhare euer thay mycht apprehendit constanti emprioure meit rebellioun come britane mony romane legionis aganis quhome went kyng coel ane army britonis defed realme liberte nochtheles wes vincust army put flycht morrow constanti wes informyt britonis kyng coel wes natiue prince britane discendyng lang progressioun blude ryall thairof thairfore comiseratioun send ane herald hym schawyng gyf wald randerit othir briton kingis wer afore romani suld sufferit remane h auctorite kyng coel wes tyme trubillit gret infirmite cumyn surfet cauld walking weris aganis romani constantius heirand infirmite past mak hym consolatioun eftir maist tender embrasyng said constantius continewit kyng coell auctorite tuke douchter helene ane virgyne maist excellent bewte mariage pthis affinite maid romani britonis beleue ane finall end al thair weris sic thyngis done costanti went vesy romane strenthis britane nocht onlie reparit yame quhare thay wer ruinus bot stuffi thaym new prouisioun men vittallis syne commandit cietezanis euery town quhare come obeysant kyng coell duryng h life becaus wes freint senat pepill rome schort tyme eftir constantius ane sonne gottin new affinit namyt constantyne quhilk singulare manheid prudence succedie eftir faderis deith imperiall wes priour gaif peace catholike kirk dotat mony riche templis landis iowellis hortatioun ye haly paip siluester returne mat iall dedis yat constantius afore tyme britane constantius eftir ye deith dioclesiane h uand britane france spanye peacifyit empire gaderi ane army expell scottis pychtis westmureland cumber quhilkis wer geuyn thaym afore king carance eftir cummyng york wes aduertist yat scottis pychtis wer stronglie gaderit resist hym becaus knew thay micht abyd lag togi der thocht best brek thaym lang tary samyn effecte abaid still sindry romani york comandit ye britonis pa hame reddy return quhen thay wer chargit finalie quhen remauit certane dayis york geuand extreme deligence brek pichtis fra scottis tuke sic malacoly becaus mycht nocht bryng purpos gude fyne fel ane hait feuer ye vii day eft deceissit quhais powder wes gaderit ane goldin veschell mony smelland odouris brocht funerall triumphe rome yi costanti haue schawin wes rycht thankfull cristin pepil nochyeles sindry britonis traistyng hym persew faith crist wc sic cruelie dioclesiane afore come scotlad quhare thay wer plesandly ressauit craithlynt ordanit maik yair residence ye ile man kirkis ereckit thaym catholik maner deuyne seruice yus wer auld rytis cerymonis gentilis quhilk indurit thay dayis abrogat first bischop wes amang thaym ile wes ane britone namit amphibolus quhilk prechit euangellis throw boundis scottis pychtis nocht onlie remouit al vane superstitionis bot laid sickir foundement ye cristin faith craithlynt kyng scottis dotat kirk singular deuotioun mony iowellis precious ornamentis gold siluer maid ane alter copper craftely closit lokkis quhilk wer gaderit ye rentis mali sindry ladis quhilkis wer geuyn king sustentatioun diuyne seruice wes ye first kirk wes dedicat amang w catholik maner first sait bischoppis callit sodoren howbeit ye reason thairof tynt roust yeris quhilk distroyis euery thyng craithlynt passyng tyme maner religious ciuil mater wes ane nobill prince finalie deceissit xxiiii yeir regne ye first yeir empire gret constantyne empriour fra incarnatioun iiicxxii yeris fra beginnyng ye warld vmiiiiclxxxx yeris fra ye beginyng ye realme scottis viclv yeris phovv fyncormak vvas maid kyng scottis octauius kyng britonis hovv hercule romane capitane vvas slane octaui romani vincust hovv ye scottis pichtis come support octauius chasit thraherus france ca x craithlynt deceissy wyse succedit cosyng fyncormak thay wer brethir sonny fyncormake wes crownit first yere gret constantyne quhais tyme rais gret trubil albion ye comonis britane hauand extreme hatrent aganis tyranny cayus hercule capitane britane chesit octauius prince walis thayr kyng cayus herculeus dant yi rebellion rasit camp aganis octauius bot last wes slane army discomfist octaui traistyng na thyng sa gud vse victory maist rigoure come london eftir gottyn strenthis thairof randerit hym slew sindry nobill men britane thair assistance romani syne persewit romany deith quhair euir thay mycht apprehendit constantyne empriour punis rebellion send ane vailyeant capitane namyt traher mony legionis britane quhom octauius wes put flycht ch sit amang scottis traher insolent eftir victory chargit fyncormak send octauius ye inuasour romane prouince boud hym punist rebellio uthirwayis suld repute ennyme ye senat pepil rome wes answerit fyncormak yat resset nocht octauius iniurious romani bot allanerlye auld amyte betuix scottis britonis attoure mycht obscure honour maieste condiscend sa manifest prodition randir man ennymes yat socht refuge hym forthir gyf traherus inuadit hym onelie ye cause suld resist best way mycht bot yit gud wer afore mouit weir degeistely avise quhiddir romani he gottyn mair schame honour mair proffet skaith thair weris aganis scottis al tymes bygane traherus na thyng satifyit answer come al ordinance york quhair wes aduertist fyncormak wes gaderit lxm scottis pichtis britonis support octaui nochtheles went forwart quhill come sycht ennymes fyncormak quhen baith ye armyis wer arrayit sicht send ane herald inquiryng traherus quhat mouit hym occasioun iniuris inuaid cofiderat pepil thay wer ennymes romani traherus maid litill answer thairto bot comandit scottis pychtis pa haistely landis pertenand romani pay ane yeirly tribute yair procuratour ye senat pepill rome thocht expedient ony tary de liuer octauius punyst conspiration othirwayis thay suld haue sone experience quhat foly contempne empire romani fyncormak hauand thir charg dyffyance come forthwart army followit sone ane dangerus battall alwayis romani bene victorius wer nocht ane multitude landwart men hapnyt come rynnand doun ane hyl driuand away yair bestial fra dangeir ennymes apperit romani thay wer cumyn thair bakkis romani wer finalie discomfist battal wer slane xvm albianis xvim romani chace continewit fyncormak octauius romani quhill thay come york quhair ye two kyngis wer plesandly ressauit ye nobillis britane octauius restorit crown thairof pthe nobillis britane fincormak assistance octauius said feild ndis westmureland cumbe clame kindnes thairof perpetually sweir neuir cum ye contrar thairof traherus knawyng na place sicker remane britane eftir victory fled france hovv octauius vvas put fra crovvn britane traherus romane capitane hovv said traherus vvas slane octauius restorit croun fyncormakis deith ca xi roman vincust yi wise ane cou sal wes set york quhilk ye nobillis britane co cludit defed yair realme libertie fra iniure romani suffi na vncouth blude beir auctorite tymes cumyng aboue thaym attoure wes concludit extend marchis britane wal adriane expell scottis westmureland cumber nocht withstandyng aith promyse maid thaim afort quhil sic thig wer done britane octaui come xm britonis scottis pichtis dwellyng westmurland bot last wes discomfist army put flycht mene tyme traherus capitane britane quhilk wes chasit schew afore france returnit two romane legionis xxm wageouris britane quhome octauius wes discomfist destitute support freindis finalie octauius hauand na confidence scottis pychtis violatioun faith come mouth number quhair pullit vp salis went norroway traherus eftir yi victory ilk day incressit sic pissance britonis wer randerit hym nottheles exercit gret crueltes al nobillis comonis britan finalie restorit crown thair romane empire quhen stablit realme maner throw corruppit insolence eft sa hie felicite become maist vicious tyrane euir ony charge afore britane inuadit ye nobillis comonis thairof ithand heirschippis slauchter throw thir tyranny followit sic rebellioun aganis hym al partis wes finalie slane octauius heirand slauchter traherus returnyt fra denmark britane persewit romani sic cruelte yat na kirkis sanctuariis mycht refuge thaym maid distributioun officis auctoriteis freindis nobillis thocht maist expedient keip subditi iustice defend thaym fra iniure romani youcht seyn dyl ar found insolence quhe thay find felicite efter trubyll yit octauius alterit sic maner quhare sumtyme maist fals treasonabyll werkis become maist faithfull nobyll prince sone efter send ambassatouris kyng fyncormak sindry iowell desiring hym haue na respect ye offence maid hym aganis scottis pychtis tymes bygane bot leif amyte freindschip hym britonis tymes cumyng haif sicker kyndnes content westmureland cumber war perpetually annixit empyre scottis pychtis samyn maner carance gaue thaym afore kyng craithlint mony yeris efter octauius gouernit britane gud iustice quhill last sa brokin frequent weris randerit strenthis realme haue peace romani eld content pay auld tribute followit sicker peace mony yeris efter amang scottis pychtis brytonis albioun quhilk tyme fyncormak richt illuster glore cheuelry cyuyll materis lang infirmyte generit catare deceissit xlvii yeir regne fra incarnatioun iiiclviii yeris hovv heresyis arrius vves condampnit hovv ireland tuke fayth crist hovv romak fethelmak angusiane contendit crovvne hovv romak vvas maid kyng slane efter tyranny ca xii tyme cristin faith apperit rise gret dignite nochtheles cursit heretik arrius began poyson vennymus doctrine saying crist nocht verray sonne god coequall coeternall fader bot different fra hym substance efter degeist consultatioun opinionis war condampnit counsall nicia mony othir vane errouris quhilkis wyl rehers tyme haue maid th traslatio mair pleseir lawir tha ony vane curius clerk quhom heresyis begynnis pireland tyme tuke ye faith crist ane woma ye pychtis blude quhylk instruckit quene ireland faith scho instruckit hir prince kyng sa within schort tyme regioun thairof tuke faith mony othir pepyll ye eist west partis warld tuke faith samyn maner bot wyll returne hystory pfyncormak left behynd hym two sonnis eugenius xviii yeris age ethodius nocht ane yeir age thir sonnis fyncormak ye lawis afore rehersit micht nocht immediatly succede crown thairfore ane counsall set argyle theis kyng quhilk day comperit romak fethelmak angusiane co tending crown thay war nepottis craithlint gottyn sindry brethir thre nere equal yeris freindis gudis romak clamit crown maist nobyl cumyn ye blude ryal scottis bot al pichtis thairfore mony nobillis assistyng opinion augusiane clamyt crown consent fethelmak alledgit wes ane man reason experience wisdome tha wes romak wes abillar thairfore ye ministration realme mene tyme romak gaderit ane band armit men sla two cousyngis traisting ye esalie succeid crown thus rais na thing bot ire hatrene amang thre cosingis euery ane thaym cruellie set otheris slauchter lauboryng draw moniast nobillis thair opinioun alwayis maist nowmer nobillis assentit augusiane romak wes ane man mair ferocite wisdome cotrar u iane wes reasonable ha nd nocht sa mony subtel fals romak nobillis seyng thaym abil na wayis b ht concord tuke final purpois deuide realme betuix thaym yit otheris prudet men thocht samyn vnproffitable mycht rais perpetual seditioun dammage thair commoun weill finalie romak impaciet lang tary birnand desyre haue crown gaderit ane army pychtis come arrayit battall aganis augusiane othir cosyng fethelmak augusiane send oratouris kyng pychtis praying hym foster na seditioun amang scottis pychtis solist cosing romak erat concord battall sen mycht haue thyng accordyng reason ony plee kyng pichtis thynkand thir desyris reasonabil tuk purpos returne hame nochttheles euill counsall freindis abaid gaif vnplesand answere vnplesand answer wes nocht onlie occasioun ye nobillis scotland assist augusiane aganis romak bot al haue pichtis extreme hatrent sone eftir angusiane aduertist romak lay wait slauchter gaderit ane army purpos erat end mater swerd ay leif da geir lyfe romak impacient lang tary met hym maner followit ane sorowfull battall nochtheles augusiane wes discomfist baith hym self cosing fethelmak chasit ye ilis findyng na securite thair thay fled ireland augusiane doung albioun sort mony nobillis assistit romak declarit hym kyng yit ye custom tyranny conquest ye realme wekitlie gouernit maner nane familiar hym bot sa mony wer ennymes fyncormak sonnis sic thyngis done maid hym vesy boundis realme doyng iustice maner tyranny romak beand diuulgat throw ye cuntre causit eugenius ethodius sonnis fyncormak fle westmurelad thair finding na securite thay fled ile man followit gret truble scotland proscriptioun slauchter oppressioun nobillis fauorit augusiane ony difference age nobillis impacient suffer sic cruell tyrannyis couenit togidder secret writingis redres al oppressionis wrangis done hym syne gaderit ane army sic diligence tyrane romak knew nocht thair assemblance quhill thay wer cumyng hym ane arrayit battall within x mylis romak astonist thair cummyng fled pentland nochttheles sa ferslye inuadit ane buschement scottis followit hym slane syndry otheris scottis opinion ye thrid yeir regne heid borne ane staik throw al army mony gentyll men pychtis war slane tyme romak sic fauorit gouernance causit hym rage gret cruelte scottis hovv augusiane vvas maid kyng scottis hovv maximus subdevvit britonis syndry victoryis hovv scottis pichtis inuadit othir vvith set battall hovv baith thair kyngis vvar slane scottis discomfist ca xiii romak tyrane slane maner augusiane returnit albion maid kyng quhyll sic thyng war done scotland brytonis grew insolent slauchter traherus romane capitane restorit crowne brytane octauius quhylk far run aige throw quhylk thay recouerit baith thayr munitionis landis lyberteis pconstantius emprioure sonne gret constantyne send ane vaylyeant knycht namyt maximus brytane dant brytonis pthis maximus sone efter cumyng faucht aganis brytonis put thaym flycht pbe vyctory put esperance subdew brytonis thay war afore seruytude poctauius kyng brytonis heirand thir tythyngis tuke sic malancoly deceissit thrid day efter efter deith octauius sonne fled ye ile man quhare remanit ethodius eugenius vnknawin quhat brytonis nocht mekyll astonist discomfitoure gaderit ane new army mair pissance afore nochttheles thay war vincust chasit ye maner maximus efter thir victorijs past throw syndry bou dis britane gat mony pepyll randerit opinioun otheris quhilkis war repugnant war put wraik thair str cassyn quhyll sic thyngis done britane rais gret trubyl scotland nectanus kyng pichtis reuenge slauchter cosyng romak wastit landis scotland syndry incursionis scottis resist violent deceptionis war constranit rise battall aganis pychtis nochtheles pychtis drew ane gret nowmer scottis quhilkis war mouit slauchter romak thair opinioun prouokit residew scottis ylk day battal nochtheles augusiane send ambassatour thaym schawyng hym desyrus peace geuyn weill baith realmes desyrie thaym deuoid iniutis concur togidder amyte thair faderis afore defece thair realmis last quhen augusiane saw desyris repellit yt sleuth suld nocht occasioun insolence ennymes gaderit folk went furthwart gud array efter mony syngulare battallis vailyeant baith ye armyis iunit saucht gret ire hatrent athir syde last pichtis war discomfist mony thair nobillis slane kyng nectanus chasyt quhyll come camelon sone efter cummyng thairto conuenit resydew nobillis ane counsall complanit lang orison baith slauchter cusyng romak ye noblis realme war slane hym desirit ane new army reuenge schameful iniuris done la tly scottis pichtis mair set kyngis foly plesour tha thair comon weill concludit ane new army rasit aganis scottis boundis vnder thair empyre sone efter thay come said army wod calydon augusiane richt prouident doyngis knawyng pich sa awfully gaderit aganis hym assemblit folkis boundis realme erar draw pichtis concord haue battall thaym dred brytonis swasion romani cu support pichtis ye caus send plesand letter ye kyng pychtis praying hym remember anciant amyte kyndnes sa lang contynewing betuix two pepyll put end thair weris geif peace scottis ony battal samyn maner war victorius aboue thaym sen peace necessar baith thair armyis maximus romane capitane wirkand ylk day new attemptatis britane purposit al sone he subdewit britane conques baith ye realmes scottis pichtis efter yt thay haue distroyit othir ciuill weris king pichtis cotempning profitab l counsal hauand na thing le estimatioun peace rasit army aganis augusiane ye tothir syde augusiane arrayit army becaus necessar othir ieoparde hym ye chance fortoun elli geif backis ennymes irrecouerable schame exhortit haue curage set asyd al dredour gif thay ony remembring gret spreit manheid thair eldaris thay may acquite thair deith yocht thay faucht vnfortunat chance battal yt thay de nocht vnreuengit thair ennymes attoure prayit thaym nocht mouit youcht thay fecht aganis pepyll sa lang cofiderat thaym amite blude sen thay gaue na occasioun battal he left na thing vndone mycht haue recounsalit thaym concord quhilk thay suld beleue god luffer peace suld fauour thaym thair iust defence tothir syde king pichtis ceissit nocht solist army battal incontinent ye archearis schot fydis efter thaym followit men licht harnes schot incredibill nowmer stanis ganyeis corsbow slongis incontinent thay iunit speris axis swerdis followit ane terribyll battall fouchtyn lang tyme doutsum victory last angusiane seand victory inclyne pychtis raif coit armoure come amang commonis quhare faucht perseuerant hatrent deith scottis traisting thair kyng erat fled slane gaif bakkis otheris perseuerant mair obstinat mynd faucht quhill thay war slane yocht vyctory succedit pychtis yit vnplesand thaym baith kyngis war slane feild infinite nowmer nobillis commonis slane ylk side residew scottis pichtis quhilk war eschapit feild returnit hame wari thaym first occasioun motyue battall betuix two pepyll sa lang afore confiderit togidder blude amite freindschip phovv fethelmak vvas maid kyng scottis hovv slevv nectane kyng ef pichtis vvas slane efter thair treason mony nobil clerkis ca xiiii augusiane slane maner fethelmak third nepot craithlynt maid king gaderit ye residew scottis togydder lytyll better fortoun two cosyngis afore secund yeir regne rasit army reuenge ye iniuris done pichtis come augus inuadyng ye inhabitantis thairof gret heirschipp cruelteis pychtis rageand hatrent thir extorsionis ruschit thair maist fury harnes ye scottis nocht abasit yairof met thaym ye samyn maner put baith thair wyngis flicht sone efter discomfist ye middillward samyn maner gret murdir maid thaym al partis nectanus kyng pichtis brothir kyng nectanus afore rehersit brocht feild deceissit ye thrid day efter wound ane arrow scottis insolent efter victory wais ang fiffe ithand incursionis pichtis brokyn last discomfitoure set thaym erar stop ye scottis fra taking thair munitionis strenthis licht berganis tha ony set battal al thingis mair prudence thay chesit hergest ane sle fals ingyne thair kyng hergestus knawyng pepyll sa brokyn continewal weris mycht nocht reuenge iniuris scottis kest hym thyng slycht mycht nocht force conducit two men pichtis dissimi fenye thaym scottis thay mycht mair esaly wait ane ganand tyme sla kynge scottis thir pichtis war crafty castyng dartis becaus ye kyng scottis tuke delectatioun ye game yall war maid mair familiar hym nochyeles thay socht ay ane ganad tyme place slauchter kyng fethelmak hapnit pa carrik quhare gret sollicitude day euyn went bed comandit ane harpar syng ane soft sang draw hym heuy mater sleip al sone fallyn sleip two pychtis afore rehersit conuoyit harpar quhare lay slew hym sleipand bed ye thrid yeir regne wache herand granis ane deand man enterit haistely chalmer quhare ye kyng lyand bullerand blude incontinent thay followit slayaris sa scharply yat thay war tane quhen thay confessit ye maner circumstance treasonabyll slauchter thay war punist maist cruelly deith drawin syndry wyld hors slauchter fethelmak hapnit fyft yeir constantius emprioure tyme wa mony clerkis profound euery scyence uictoryne oratoure donatus gramariour preceptour sanct ierome alcinus delphidinis philosophouris mony otheris quhilkis war ouir lixie rehers hovv sanct reule brocht sanct androvvis arme scotland hovv kirk sanct androvvis vvas hergest kyng pichtis louyng thairof ca xv sanct reule haly abbot arriuit tyme albion sact androwis arme reule ane monk borne achaya abbot n town patras quhare mony religious men war obeysant vnder cure ane thaym yt send constantius empriour esy blissit reliquies sanct andro quhen said reule done deuotioun maist reuerence comandit ane heuynly visioun take arme sanct andro iii fyngaris iii tayis fut pa samyn ye far nuke ye warld namit albion reule monist visioun come said reliquies throw seis mediterrane portingale huge pyne trubyl come throw ye spanye franche almane seis arriuit town quhilk callit sanct androwis quhare thay war schip brokin na thyng sauit except ane nowmer haly men quhylkis come said reliquies thir tithingis diuulgat cuntre causit kyng pichtis pepyll cum riche offerandis partis adore reliquies ye haly appostyll sanct andro kyng pichtis pepil war ressault sanct reule fallowis thair religious habitis sangis ympnis othir diuine cerimonyis afferit hergestus fell kneis maist reuerence kist thir blissit reliquies gaif palice ryall richely biggit efter ye vse thay dayis sanct andro sanct reule otheris fallowis biggit ane kirk nocht far fra ye said palice dedicat honour sanct andro men sayis ye samin kirk ye standis yit comon kirk yard abbay callit auld tymes kirk sanct reule bot callit auld kirk sanct andro hergest dotat th kirk cowpis challicis basingis lawaris syndry othir riche iowellis gold siluer remane thair perpetually ye honour deuyne seruyce posterite kyng hergestus succeding efter hym scottis quhen pichtis exilit realme h sanct andro maist reuerence patroun thair realme abbay kirk dotat efter kyng malcolne ye madyn kyng robert brus rentis landis possessionis mair largely abbay gouernance ane nobil iohne hebburne priour thairof ye tyme ye first compiling thir cronikl priour ane wise prelat decorit th kirk mony riche ornametis biggit ane wall square stanis ye kirk wall includis kirk sanct leonard quhare nouicis said abbay vthir scolaris lernis thair gramer logik theology mony othir science naturall morall philosophy he sic continewal exercitio yt mony resolute profound clerkis risis dayly gret virtew throw samyn kirk war first preist callit culdeyis bot ar channonis regular efter institutionis sanct augustyne geuand thair ingyne co tinewall exercitioun letteris professioun thair religioun heirfore gif thow wyl haue respect letteral exercition thow sall fynd thair generall study euery science gyf thow wyll cotemplatiue thow sal fynd thair maist honorabyll seruyce god heuynly delitious sang maist crafty music gif thow wyl haue sicht magnificence curious biggin thow sal fynd nane mair honestee admiration italy france almany biggit curiously nobyll man quhilk deceissit yeir afore cumyng thir cronyklis lycht na le da mage commoun weill spredyng letteris realme amag mony othir honorabyll werkis gretumly louit afore deith maid nepot patrik ane man syngular virtew eruditioun successoure compleit magnificent werkis afore began pthe yeir sanct reule come reliquies sanct andro scotland fra ye incarnatioun iiiclxix hov eugenius vvas maid kyng scottis hovv hergest kyng pichtis vvas confiderat vvith romani distruction scottis hovv maximus capitane britane inuadit scottis vvith gret cruelteis slauchter ca xvi fethelmak slane maner afore rehersit nobillis brocht eugenius ethodius ye sonnis fyncormak ile man quhare thay abaid eschewin fury romak augusiane fethelmak eldest thaym namit eugenius ye first ye name maid kyng maxim capitane britane knawyng ye hatret betuix ye scottis pichtis na le desirus distroy thaym baith agment ye glore romane empyre deuisit sic ane subtyll slicht yt mycht first distroy scottis syne ye pichtis wirk mater mair crafty slichtis send ambassatouris hergest kyng pichtis schawyng hym richt sorrowfull iniuris done hym scottis desyrit thairfor confiderat said kyng pychtis aganis scottis quharethrow mycht happyn pepyl mycht rise sic pissance support romani britonis thay mycht othir thirll scottis maist vile seruytude elli expell thaym gyf thay plesit albyoun conques thair landis rowmes thaym thair posterite kyng hergest plesadly ressauit thir ambassatouris gaue thankis god send hym support sa extreme dangeir aganis cruell ennymes sayd plesit hym weill confiderat romani sa thay wald concurre hym pepyll reuenge iniuris done scottis pmaximus condyscendit thair desyris traisting samyn cum hie felicite romane empyre pnocht lang efter concludit conuention hergestus maximus york ye pychtis britonis romani salbe co fiderat togidder tendir amit scottis haldyn ennymes thaym efter conuentioun maximus send ane herald eugenius king scottis chargeand hym redres skaithis done pichtis delyuer mysdoaris kyng hergest punist plesour uthirwayis pepyll suld reput ennymes senat pepyll rome eugenius answerit neuir offendit romani britonis iniuris thairfore beleuit romani wald nocht sa wrangus inua e hym battall reasonabyll motiue occasioun forthir v derstude romani nocht gottin sic humanite kyndnes pichtis moue ony weir aganis scottis tha present sen thay neuir offendit romani alwayis content baith geif take redres pychtis thay quhilkis inuadis vthir iniuris tymes cumyng punys cryme requirit forthir gif romani aduyse pichtis wald inuade hym ony iust occasion battal mycht na thing le tha comend gud actioun god punisar wrangis best mycht defence realme liberte ye romani weill apperis ar na le set exterminioun pichtis scottis maximus efter answer assemblie ane large army romani britonis franchemen enterit westmureland ceissyng fra na maner cruelteis ye inhabitantis thairof garnist strenthis regioun romane sodiouris sone efter come annadale galloway syndry vthir bound exercing gret cruelteis maner scottis herand sa huge multitude pepyll assemblit aganis thaym war affrayit nochyeles na vthir remeid thay come partis scotland co mand eugenius na le heid tha ardent desyre resyst yair ennymes faucht romani besyde watter cree quhare put flycht army discomfist sa gret slauchter maid brayis reuer yat fyllit full deid bodyis romani followit sa fast chace scottis quhyll last thay enterit ane new bergane ye men argyle thay war cumyn forthwart support eugenius army knawyng na thyng discomfiture quhen thay saw romani follow sic cruelteis scottis thay ruschit terribyl vissage noyis rummysyng said romani maid sic vndem slaucht thaym resydew scottis quhilkis war laitly diffait returnit battall chasit romani agane thair tent inuadyng thaym contynuall slauchter quhyll ye nycht put end thair laubour th chance battall variant ye first day betuix scottis thair ennymes romani nocht knawing counsall scottis howbeit mony thaym war slane stud houor nocht knawyng quhidder thay wald renew battal ye samyn nicht abyde day yit haue thaym reddy aganis chance mycht follow thay stuffit thair tentis maist crafty ordinance eugenius seyng morrow pepyll brokin sic innoumerable slauchter rasi tentis within ye nycht come carrik quhair tuk lang consultatioun mycht arme hym best aganis al chance battal mycht follow maximus ye morow intendyng persew scottis new battall wes aduertist gret seditioun risyng britane speciallie amang thaym yat dwelt within ye romane prouincis thir nouellis causit hym desist fra purpos returne kent eftir garnist ye strenhis galloway men munitionis vittallis thir wer dedis maximus aganis scott ye first yeris hovv maximus returnit gallovvay reuenge iniuris done scottis aganis pichtis hovv eugenius come vvith lm men resist romani pichtis britonis hovv vvas slane brothir tane army discomfist ca xvii maximus yeir followyng wes sa ithandlie occupyir trubill britonis afore rehersit yt mycht nocht returne ye weris scottis nochtheles mony frequent incursionis continewit al said tyme betuix wageouris scottis last quhen scottis assailyeit lag tyme howbeit wes vane recouer ye strenthis galloway thay past throwe menteith striuilyng fyffe sindry othir boundis pychtis inuadyng sic cruelte thay wer left desert maximus apperit rycht heuy thir offencis howbeit na thyng wes plesand hym heir scott pycht inuadyng othir baith thair mischeiffis finalie come galloway wt purpos pa throw remanent boundis scottis wes eugenius nocht far fra romani abidyng cummyng pepill quhom comperit gret cofluence sensabil men wemen nowmer fifty thousand pepil rycht desir fecht criand atanis huge noys othir de elli haue victory thay wer cruelly slane al ti quhare thay mycht apprehedit romani ony mercy ranson nochtwithstading thair gret curage thay wer sumpart astonist herand ye romani cummyng thair landis multitude pissance pepill euir wes sene ony thair boundis afore yit otheris hauand romane tyranny dispite wer rasit maist fury regardyng na thyng thair life defence thair liberte eugenius gret curage dissimulit continace wer affrayit na thig le romani deuidit army thre battallis richt wyng wes geuyn brodir ethodius left wyng doal capitane argyle myddilward wes hym self thir battallis wer arrayit sic craft ye place quhair battall wes set beleuit nocht onlie haue riuer munda deip ony furd bakkis army thay suld fecht refuge bot al haue ye sonne gangand siclik yair bakkis thair ennymes micht nocht hald vp thair eyn reflixioun contrar beymis thair sycht sic thyngis done eugenius went ane hie mote callit army standart said yi maner eldaris began realm continewall laubour brocht samyn honour day forcy campionis commandit thair posterite defend thair realme liberte quhilk maist dulce heuynly treasoure ye erd aganis al inuasouris hauand esperance victory quhen tyme wes fecht aganis yair ennymes na thing tha yair handis obeysant wyse nobill capitanis realme quhais auctorite prudence bene sicker targe baith thair guddis landis liffis aganis preis dangeir ennymes eldaris ar passit afore w wer ay obedient comand thair nobillis yocht thay haue touchtin oftymes sindry chan battall aganis dantouris warld yit thay wer finalie victouris nowe mon fecht maist vailyeant campionis sic manheid curage eldaris faucht afore w ell mon tyne oure realme liberte thirlly maist vile seruitude wyll oure ennymes pnow approchis maximus cruell vnmercyfull ennymy reif baith landis guddis gyf support nocht oure self grace god oure manheid sa ful fals ingyne slychtis confiderat pychtis al weill perditio thaym w inteding yair throw bryng haill empire albioun howbeit samyn wes neuir hard afore vnder romane obeysance pthe pychtis mischant foly passis battall support thair profest ennymes quhilkis ar rycht desyrus reif fra thaym yair kyngdome honouris thay come aganys w quhilkis wer ay thair protectouris sen first thair realme beganne vncertane quhat mischeif thir pychtis bene abusit nocht knawyng irrecouerabill damage yat fal yame euersioun thair common weill liberte youcht thay knaw thay gyf attendance thairto yit sa far pertenis actioun consider ennymes ar fecht aganis w quhome neuir offendit iniuris throw quhilk thair werkis salbe vnchancy mair odious god contrar remember ye ar resist thair inuasioun pur defence ar fecht youre realme liberte ar posteritie thay forcy campionis sumtyme maist gloriously chasit romani thir boundis cumyn sic poynt mon othir vincust suffir extreme miserie seruitude elli victouris stabill oure landis w glore honoure permanent eys beseik yow gud companyeonis vnuincibill manheid faith virthew eldari thair paill goist quhilkis defendit youre realme liberte thir dayis suffir nocht yow thair sonnis rest spul yeit realme liberteis gudis yit taikin catiuis vnderly thair tyrannyis gyf hapnis yow aduers chance quhilkis god defend de sa far yow acquit deith thynk better de honestlie leif schame knawe youre self dotat incredibill manheid virtew heritouris ancyant lynnage al weill nobill faderis wisdome cheualrye thair landis nocht gaderit diuers nationis bot ane pepill vnder ane mynd seruandis eternall god geuis victory iust pepill reward thair virtew fals wrangus pepil schame discomfiture slauchter belt yow thairfore lusty gallandis manheid wisdome haue victory quhilk sall nocht fail succeid gyf ye constant curage haue na thyng bot schamful fleyng dredour inuaid ennymes siclik cruelte thay intend inuaid yow skarsly eugenius rasit spreit army hortatioun quhen maximus apperit sycht army come forth wart deligence wes beleuit come sone eftir sonne risyng ye scottis wer astonyst huge multitude ennymes nochtheles seand na refuge thay de mit assailye extreme ieoperde army sone efir thay arrayit thaym thair bakkis sonne glance beymys thairof suld nocht impedimet thair fechting skarslie wer thay weil arrayit quhe thay ruschit forthwart thair ennymes feirs rynnyng wes impediment maximus deuore nochtheles seand tyme sa schort exhortit army remember ye romane virtew affrayit barbar pepil quhom thay recently discomfist incontinent baith armyis sound trumpat iunit huge nois clamour sidis first contenyng wes cruelly fochtin wes vncertane quhat ty maist dangeir succedit followit sindry chancis fortoun scottis ye faucht richt wyng vnder ethodious wyn na le honour glore set pychtis fornence thaym chasit thaym throw watter dune quhair mony yame ouirset slik glar yairof wer slane proud insolent glore thay bene sicker victory thay stragulit fra yair fallow cassin spulye throw quhilk mony thaym wer slane eftir ane romane legioun yat wes send maximus support said pychtis last wyng quhair doalus faucht scottis met franchemen britonis almanys quhair yai wer slane fechtand perseuerand manheid deith defence thair realm romane army command maximus ruschit myddill warde quhair eugenius faucht nobillis wery neir vincust multitude yair ennymes howbeit mony thaym feirsly repugnat quhil thay mycht failyeit na thyng yat pertenit forcy campionis pthe nobillis faucht eugenius army seing victory inclyne romani desyrit eugenius saif hym flycht better fortoun incotinent thay raif coit armoure par force mak hym vnknawin nochtheles abaid fechtand perseuerand malyce aganis romani wes slane ye thrid yeir regne quhil sic terrible murdir wes maid ye army scott al yair careage wer left keip thair bestiall vittallis hauand na armoure bot swerdis defend thaym seyng sa mony nobill men slane pietu commiseratioun ruschit thair ennimes wer al slane fechtand deith quhill romani wer followyng chace gre ire hatrent yi maner thay fell ane vncouth maner bergane agit febyll personis yat war left hame vnfensabil bodyis rycht desyrus heir quhat chance fallyn thair sonnis come place quhare battall bot quhen thay saw sa pietuous lamentabyl slauchter maid thair sonnis freindis thay ruschit thair ennymes lyke ri creaturis regardyng nothir life reason aige wemen come efter terribyll noyis rummysching wod rageand beistis set romani nochtheles baith aigit men wemen war fynalye slane romani passit nycht followyng sa huge feir dredoure na trinchis walkyng mycht sufficient munitioun thair army hyllis vali lesu resoundit ye nicht maist terribyl spraichis yammeryng pepyll deidthr w nocht hard bot ho rybyll murnyng sobband deand pepyll cryand ane vengeance romani pychtis uhais treasonabyll slychtis huge murdir maid thaym morrow maximus partit spulye feild amang army maid deid bodyis buryit schaw hym nocht degenerat fra romane mercy maid thaym war left lyffe sair woundit curit maist crafty surrigianis pamang quhome ethodius brothir eugenius tane curit reuth maximus woundis phovv scottis gret cruelte pichtis vvar exilit albion hovv ye abbay cokil vvas foudit ca xviii scottis discomfist wyse kyng eugeni found slane quhome maxim gart bury funerall obsequies syne went victorius army throw syndry boundis scotland gat mony ye inhabytantis thairof randerit plesit pychtis desyryng vter exterminioun scottis tuke hie displeseir said scottis war sufferit wise leif albioun maximus maid hym mei thair indignatioun saying pertenit romane maieste haue na le mercy thair subdittis ferocite aboue thair conspiratouris rebellis pit alsua pr pir romani conques pepyll mair beniuolence tyranny na thing micht degraid mair romane glore vse cruelteis thair subdewit pepyll becaus scottis war sufficiently punyst thair rebellyoun thair kyng slane thair army dyscomfist thair strethis tane wald inuaid thaym na forthir punytyoun le thay conspirit new rebellioun pthe kyng pychtis nobyllis na thyng satyfyit answer bot erar mouit mair indignatioun desyrit maximus mony gret perswasionis sla scottis euery part quhare thay micht apprehendit saying thay war thair profest ennymes borne thair vter exterminioun reiosyng onelye murdir romani othirwayis romani thair confiderat freindis mycht haue na sicker felycyte albioun pychtis seyng thaym frustrat thair desyris began conuert thaym mair slycht fynalye corruppit maximus large money quhylk mouis mortall creaturis maist terribyll fellonyis purchest scottis monyst vnder pane deid pa albioun ane prefixt day thair landis rowmes mycht cu pray romani pychtis day byrunne scottis war exilit comandit vnder pane maist cruell punitioun neuir returne albioun pbe proscriptioun sum thaym went ilis otheris ireland orknay france italy norroway denmark pefter proscriptioun men come syndry ladyis scotland arrayit thair dule habit doloure thair husbandis quhilkis war slane last battall desyrit maximus lamentabyll regrait suffer thaym leif catyuis resydew thair miserabyll lyfe within thair natyue land pray thair husbandis fynaly buryit thaym graif bot thai couth purches nocht thair dolorus teris bot plane repuls sa ladyis gentyll wemen war exilit samyn maner men thir doingis war occasioun maximus detest inhumaniteis cruell maneris pychtis pychtis rageand ylk day mair cruelte efter day generall proscription murderit scottis quhare thay micht apprehendit ony piete ransoun miseration thair estatis quhyll sic deligent serchyng maid partis cartandis quene scottis two madynnis ane seruand found sepulture hir husband eugenius neir consumit murnyng teris becaus scho prynce walis douchter scho brocht maximus ony displesoure maximus remembryng ye vnsicker stait man hauand compassioun hir sorrowfull chance met hir honest maner maid hir al consolatioun mycht prayit hir gud confort suld treit hir fy tymes cummyng sone efter cloithit hir honest semely abulyementis gaif hir town carrik syndry rentis possessyois sustene hir ryal estait nochtheles cartandis nocht vnknawand fra quhat hie felicite scho deieckit plesandly ressauit yok seruytude quhen scho returnand said town carrik scho tane gait ane cumpany romani pychtis nocht onelye spulyeit hir hors clethyng money iowellis bot al hir seruandis slane hir madynnis fulyeit maxim aduertist outtrage c issit nocht quhyll mysdoaris war punyst hir guddis restorit syne preseruit hir mony dayis efter fra iniure ennymes pon morrow pychtis come maximus complanyng heualy thair men war slane perswasyoun ane catyue woma ennymy thaim said thay deseruit othir kyndnes romani fechtand ye deith amplyatioun thair empyre aganis pepyl quhylkis thay war confyderat thay dayis desyrit thairfore cartandis suld exylit brytane amang hir freindis p cartandis heirand thir wourdis said scho bot ane miserabyll reature nakit hir husbad freindis wald mair miserabyll gif scho beand deiecki fra hie felici e repute sa vnworthy scho mycht nocht sufferit leif amang hir ennymes bot commandit leif dayly schame amang hir freindis howbeit war mair plesand hir scotland praying vailyeant pepil slane hir husband duryng hir sobir lyfe leyf honoure ony pryncely estait fynaly quhen scho desyrit outhir put haistely deith elli sufferit leif scho desyrit scotland sic commiseratioun ai amang romani mouit hir comploratioun scho licent contrar mynd pychtis remane scotland quhare scho lyst rentis possessionis effering hir estait sic thyngis done preistis monkis religious personis scottis blude war erilit maner scotland throw quhylk mony thaym come ilis byggit abbay colmekill quhare mony deuoit personis remanis yit oure dayis uncertane quhidder samyn mair plentuous haly wemen men quhilkis leiffis deuoitly thair secret housis quhare throw happenit abbay howbeit began soberly deuotioun pepyll princely rewardis maid comoun sepulture mony yeris ef er scottis kyngis yocht ethodius brothi eugenius otheris presoneris scottis war euyll woundit battal yit thay war exilit efter yair curing ye samyn maner sworne nothir pa ireland orknay ilis con ranit thairfore pa norroway p yeir scottis war exilit albion weris romani fra beginning warld v thousand vcxlvii yeris fra incarnatioun god iiiclxxix yeris fra begynnyng scottis albioun viicxii yeris secund yeir iuliane emprioure quhilk namit appostita becaus othir empriouris afore hym war catholik pryncis ane heretike pof syndry maru lli sene albioun hovv sctottis fled ireland ilis returnit scotland vvith gret povver hovv thay vvar disco fist slane ca xix yeir eugenius faucht romani war sene mony vncouth meruellis albioun gret terroure ye pepyll ye nycht apperit mony swerdis wappinnis birnand air bot last thay ran al togidder ane gret bleis euanist sicht watter dune ran full blude brais schane nycht bene full ythand fyris p mony small foulis fell ayre maner ane schoure incontinent come ane huge multitude rauynnis deuorit thaym howbeit deuynouris wod wemen schew thir vncouth wonderfull prodigy sygnyfyit exterminioun scottis yit thay war haldyn derysyoun pepyll inhybit geif faith sic fretis p sic felicite succedyng romani scottis beand exilit albioun gyllo capitane ilis aduertist proscription ethoditis norroway esperance returnyng sic desyre recouer realme yat come ane gret power argyle ye mene tyme folkis wyde skatterit thair incursionis spulyeis hapnit aduenture cum ane army pychtis laid defence ye cuntre quhome thay war finally chasi slane thair schippis galyeonis war brocht ye nixt port resist residew scottis gyf thay happinnit returne ony new army men ilis brokin wyse dowbyll calamite baith slauchter tynsall thair schyppis na pyssance pers w thair ennymes ony forthir battal residew scott eschew ye ire hatrent romani fled ireland pi tuisly coplanit afore kyng pryncis thairof yt thair kyng eugenius slane thair freind sumtyme maist vailyeant marcyall dedis banyst albion tyranny romani britonis pychtis quhais cruelteis war sa odiously schawyn thaym yat na estait aige war sauit bot dreuyn preis battall vncouth realmis leif powerte seruitude thus thair nobyll anciant realme sa lang defendit vailyeant apionis thay dayis brocht vter exterminioun insaciabyll auarice romani geuin pray britonis pichtis reward thair falset reason desirit thairfore luf tendernes nature crafty modir creatouris he ordanit ye paretis haif thair child support thaim aganis thair vnmercifull ennymes scottis sumtyme descendyng thair blude reiosyng realme scotland aboue viic yeris nocht brocht vter confusioun romane weris sen thay ar cumyng thaym thair sycker anker last refuge extreme neid pryncis ireland mouit commiseratioun sorrowfull chance fallyng scottis thair natyue pepyll send x thousand irelad men thaym albion recouer thair realme army come carrik kyle cunynghame ceissit fra na maner cruelte britonis pychtis war found thay boundis herdur stane brothir hergest kyng pychtis afore rehersit beryng sa gret cruelteis done pichtis come haistely ane army inuaid ye scottis nochtheles put flicht army discomfist scottis tuke aduysement quhat wes done sum allegit howbei victory succedit assailye nocht ye chance fortoun ony forthir bot efter plesand victory returne ireland riche spulye n guddis takyn thaym said battal erar kepe thaym ane better fortoun abyde manifest foly romane pissance quhylk sa hye syngulare preemynence baith ryches cheualry na pepyll mycht resist thairto otheris said best follow fortoun recouer remanent landis reft fra thaym sen thair begynnyng succedit sa happy chance thair end suld follow mair prosperi e oft tymes sene ye gret multytude pepyl bene vincust men thairfore esperance bett fortoun best rais thair curage outhir recouir thair natiue realme atanis de last opinioun apprisit scottis ireland men tuke full purpos recouir remanent landis pertenit thaym ony tityll law albion last quhen thay fochtyn maist rageand fury aganis thair ennymes na better fortoun succedit thaim tha succedit afore ye men ilis thaym eschapit vntakyn slane romani princis nobillis ireland richt affrayit thir tithingis couenit ane cou sall haue consultatioun scottis mycht restorit thair realme romani best resistit quhen thay saw na sufficient remeid samyn thay set asyde othir materis concludit send thair oratouris haue peace romani ambassatouris come effect war reprouit marimus quhy thay supportit scottis aganis romani consydering na realmes erd saif ireland war fre romane weris thay dayis yit peace grantit thaym vnder thir conditionis ye princis nobillis ireland sall resset na ennymes romani within thair realme tymis cumyng thay sal make na support thaym mouis ony weris aganis ye romani thair confiderat freindis na theiffis lymma ireland sal cum erandis tymis cummyng albiou peace ratifpit maner followit na trubyll efter albioun ireland pand sa endis heir sext bu e thir croniklis heir begynnis seuynt buke croniklis scotland phovv maximus coquest lyberalite crovvn britane hovv slevv gratiane emprioure vvas slane theodosius ca primo maximus hauand trubyll ennymes dantit partis sicker peace make prudet maneris mair patent schew hym sa beniuolus pepyl na man denyit presence hym dayly fallowschip mony gret nobyllis brytane tretit thaym sa plesandly syndry thaym war drawin fauoure quhen ceissit fra publict materis gaif ingyne tornamentis warslyng othir knich ly exercitioun britonis become sa liberall gaue ane day amang thaym mair tha tribute britane mycht extend ane yeir weirmen knichtis campe war perswadit take part liberalite aganis quhat sum euir ieoperdeis mycht fall maximus knawyng myndis army geuyn sic feruent amyte hym set ane conuentioun york partit landis partenand sumtyme scottis amang pichtis britonis sic thyngis done garnist al strenthis britane men munitionis vittallis syne callit afore hym freindis men army quho knew maist fauorable desiris demandit thaym quhat ingyne wayis mycht maist easely conques crown britane britonis knawyng imperial lynnage liberalite hie manheid craft cheualrie creat hym kyng yocht paulus diaconus writtis wes maid kyng contrar wyll follow auctouris afore rehersi erar vncouth historicianis ualentiniane empriour knawing yt maxim vsurpit ye crown britane send diuers capitanis armyis dant rebellioun last quhen persauit ye said maximus inuincibill battal mony capitanis armyis discomfist slane condiscendit lychtly haue peace said maximus thus wes maximus sufferit empriour reiose crown britane quhilk gouernit xvii yeris efter truble hauand hale empyre albion vnder dominion quhilk hapnyt neuir afore leuand creature pichtis sic familiarite ye strangest thaym wer chosin capitane army maid sodiouris sindry castellis britane quhen come yair ladis clotthit mantil bordorit gold silkin flouris eftir thair gyse thaym desyrit nocht bot ane smal tribute ane memorial yat thay
