wer tributaris hym name romani pychtis britonis deliuerit th al deidly feir scottis maximus na le luf yan vehement affection reiosit scottis yair auld ennymes wer exilit albioun put vter rewyne quhen maximus gouernit crown britane certane yeris gret manheid prudence began insaciable auarice couate haill empyre warld conqueir samyn went france eftir stuff strenthis britane strang munitioun wageouris cumyng france wes tenderlie ressauit certane legionis romani quhilkis wer ennymes graciane emprioure bure hym deidlie hatrent becaus vncouth barbar pepill reuerence romani maximus fauo mene ye romani france gaderit ane army al pissance mycht assemble suddane incursionis slew graciane empriour xxix yeir empyre eftir slauchter maxim went throw almany italie feir onlie fame costran peple pay hym tribute nochttheles wes finalie slane theodosius emprioure al sone romani quhilk wer left frace knew ye slauch er maxim thay tuke continent sonne namy uictour spulyeit hym baith auctorite lyfe paulus diaconus writis lenth life graciane theodosius empriouris phovv octauius vvas maid kyng brytonis hovv mercius victoryne vver send albioun dant britonis hovv pychtis vvar thirllit gret seruitude hovv thair kyng slevv hym self ca ii romane princis beand deuidit maner amang thaym self octauius sonne octauius kyng britane afore rehersyt returnit britane fled schew france eschew tyranny maximus quhen subdewit britane opinion clamyt crown pertene iust heritoure discending blud tyall thairof lang progression promittit gyf thay condiscendit opinion deliuer thaym romane seruitude suffer nane bot yair natiue blud regne aboue thaym tymes cumyng britonis mouit reasonis rycht desirus recouer yair liberte maid hym kyng romani quhilkis kepit strenthis munitionis britane wer repugnant thir doyngis thus apperit gret contentioun britonis set defend octauius ye romani keip britane vnder empyre theodosius empriour rebellion britonis wes occasion empriour send new capitanis mony romane legionis dantye britonis bot quhe fand thay mycht nocht ouirthrawin force armes gaif thaym peace vnder yir conditionis octauius sall remane kyng britane duryng lyfe amyte romani munitionis strenthis britane kepit ye romani administratioun iustice ye theodosius quhome list depute samyn paying siclike tribute ye empriour thay payit afore maximus thus wes britane maid tributar afore romani nocht lang eftir two capitanis wer send mony legionis britane ane namit marcius mak residence londoun othir namyt uictoryne remane york gouernance thir two capitanis followit mony yeris eftir gret affliction ye albianis uictoryne conuenyt ye pichtis ane cousal repruuit yame vsyng thair awin lawis co temptioun romane auctorite thai bene fre pepil nocht astric kit empriouris seruitude eft sindry consultationis maid actis nane pichtis sall regne eftir hergest na ministration iustice maid thair awin lawis bot onlie romani said romani haue aboue thaym tymes cumyng auctorite lyfe deith gyf thay wer found repugnant thir constitutionis punyst deith hergest kyng pychtis thirllit thus vile seruitude latter age wes penitent weris maid afore aganis scottis seyng eftir thair proscriptioun sa intollerable calamyteis apperyng bai h peple present thair posterite becaus couth nocht put remeid yair vehement dolour slew hym self uictoryne knawing vnhappy end hergest comandit na pychtis blude vsurpe crown tymes cumyng ye nane yani beir office auctorite vnder pane deith chargis obseruat quhilkis thay wer thi lli maximus quhen exilit th scottis yus wes ye realme pichtis spulyeit thair natiue lawis subdewit romani maner prouince siclik ye realme britonis ye pichtis hauand chargis uictoryne derisioun wer rycht impaciet suffir ye crown reft fra yair natiue blud maid dur ye son hergest thair kyng uictoryne mouit thair rebellion thocht best dant yame afore thay gaderit ony pissance come haistely pentland gret ordinance pthe pychtis camelon thair new kyng heirand cumyng uictoryne began garnys thair town prouisioun nochtheles soner thay raistit romani beltit thair town strang seige tuke finalie force armes towne wes tane king durstus send rome vnderly iugement romane senatouris principal mouar rebellioun wer scurgit wandis throw ye town camelon pychtis dantit uictoryne maner wer comandit pay yeirlie romane thesaurer ye fourt part frutis growand thair landis feird part thair bestial vnder pane deith hocht ye pychtis sa insolen eftir eiection scottis albion yat gyf thay wer nocht dantit tyme mony hie offencis mycht ryse thaym albion thir importable chargis thirllye thaym maist vyle seruitude send thaym britane othir realmes wy mettellis querrellis mak tyld aboue thir calamyteis thair come thaym ane mair insufferable iniure deuisit finall distruction thair realme within schort tyme eftir thay wer co mandi pa yair wyffis child guddi vnder pane deith beyond watter forth leif behynd yam r berwik pentland galloway striuelyng carrik kyle cunnynghame mekill wod calidon samyn micht perpetually inhabit tymes cummyng britonis toure thay wer comandit big ane heych dike fra abircorne dunbriton deuide thaym fra britonis gyf ony pychtis transcendit dyke punist na le thay offendit aganis ye maieste romani pychtis greuit thir mony othir intollerabill iniuris began lament yair sorowfull chance fallin thaym thair awin offence rasy thair eyn ye heuyn humyly praying ye mercifull god deliuer yame romane tyranny pof ethodius brothir eugenius afore rehersit gouernance denmark successioun hovv rome vvas tane gothis hovv syndry spulyeis thairof fell fergus secund ca iii quhill ye pichtis wir punyst thir mony othir afflictionis ye scottis wer vagabound banist vncouth realmes thair wyffis child sum thaym leuand laubour thair handis otheris beand wageouris men army vnder sindry princis capitanis ye warld ethodius brothir eugenius banist haue schawin wyfe albioun wes plesandly tretit kyng denmark gat certane landis quhair remani wife quhom gat ane sonne namyt erthus thus erthus eftir ye deith fader ethodius maryit ane nobill lady namyt rocha douchter rorik quhilke wes gretest prince danis vnder kyng gat hir ane sonne namyt fergus secund quhilk recouerit realme scotland sall schaw ferg flurisand youth past comand kyng danis ane cumpany chosin vailyeant men alarike kyng gothis quhilk tyme wes passand huge army confound distroy ye empire romani fergus wes rycht glaid woyage bure extreme hatrent aganis ye romani becaus slew eldaris elli banist thaym fra thair natiue realm vncouth regionis fynalie eftir mony battallis fochtyn sindry chancis fortoun betuix romani gothis radagasus principal capitane yi army bead slane infinite nowmer pepill romani siclike brokin wt thair army pissance ane strait seige wes laid rome said alarik kyng gothis romani debaitit town lang tyme sindry ieoperdyis quhil last thay laikit vittallis throw quhilk wes sic hu ger amang thaym thay abhorrit nocht eit ye flesche men othir sindry forbodin metis deploratioun yi calamyte oce sayis sanct ierome astonisis sobbyng cuttis wourdis ye town tane tuke al ye warld vincust hunger yan swerd found lyue within samyn sa far sprang hungry raige constranyt pepill eit abhominable meitis mod r sparit nocht swelly ye frute hir awin bowellis thus wes rome fynalie expugnant gothis ye first day apprile fra begynnyng romulus imiclxiiii yeris fra ye incarnation god iiiicxii yer al sone rome wes tane gothis ceissit fra slauchter pepill fra spulye ng tempillis appostillis peter paule throw quhilk mony pepill fled thairto wer sauit thair guddis liuis rome sumtyme lady warld wes spulyeit thus cruelte gothis spulyeis deuidit ryte armes amang gothis said besyde mony ryche iowellis precious geir fell fergus ye secund ye said spulye ane kist wes geuyn hym full bukis quhilk brocht italy incredibill laubour deligence almany send remane colmekill mony othir cronikillis historyis scotland vncertane quhayis impulsioun procedit said eneas siluius quhilk wes send legat fra eugeni fourt paip kyng iames first tuke purpos pa ilis scotlad se gyf mycht fynd ony werkis titus liuius quhilk wer distroyit tyme cruell weris italy notabill thingis bene distroyit battall oust yeris nochtheles fra said eneas knew passage danger becaus kyng wes slane left purpos samyn maner rycht desirus knaw quhat bukis bene quhais fame wes sa diuulgat partis maid deligence last fyue auld bukis wryttyn romane letteris war brocht w abirdene industry ane bobyll man maister iohne campbell thesaurer kyng yeir god ane thousand v hundreth xxv yeris quhilkis war nocht bot brokyn leiffis thaym braider palme ane mannis hand writtin craftly rude hard parchement bot yai wer sa blynd mycht nocht reid ilk tent wourd quhiddir thir bukis wer ane part thaym wer distroyit said wer italie gyf yai wer brocht said abbay vncouth strange placis vncertane yit testimoniall thaym red ye samyn fynd thay soundit mair eloquence salustius liuius pforthir tyme wes brocht w messengeir ye werkis ueremund archedene sanctandrowis contenand historie realme fra first begynnyng thairof kyng macolme camores tyme quhilkis authouris haue followit maist wyse bischop william elphinstoun end th quhat sumeuir werk bot wyll retourn historie pfergus sonne erthus departit rome alarik thre dayis eftir wes put sakke went hym expugnation sindry othir townis italie nocht lang eftir wes ordanit pa certane schippis sicil ye mene tyme rais sa vnmerciful tempest hym wes dreuin force contrarius wyndis agane italye narrowly eschapit lyfe pat retournyng alarike wes deceissit athalphas maid kyng gothis generall capitane thair army quhome fergus become sa beluffit singular manheid virtew al sone italye wes dantit gothis wes sufferit returne hame mony danys denmark full ryches treasoure gottyn said weris pof syndry clerkis sanctis flurising vvarld first message send pichtis scottis ca iiii mony nobil clerk flurist tyme ye warld claudian poete writtar sum part hystorie apollinaris confou dar heritikis wer emposionit porphirius martyn bischop turuyn france mony resolute haly men amang w wes thai dayis sanct nin ane first bischop galloway quhair biggit ane kirk ye honour sanct martyne eyme ya dayis wes al sact ambrose bischop myllane quhilk brocht sanct augustine faith sacrament baptisme augustine first begynnar chanownis regular quohom ar mony abbayis ereckit warld magnificence syndry pryncis ordour bene xxx papis besyde mony byscoppis nobyll prelatis quhais nowmer may comprehendit imitation ordour rais ye eremitanis quhilkis ar incressit incredibyl nowmer howbeit thay sufferit gret afflictioun gentilis thair thaym day europe aboue two thousand iii hundreth abbayis beside thaym ya ar affrik egipt augustyne nocht onely commendabyll institutioun religious maneris bot al syngulare eruditioun euery kynd science skars xx yeris age quhen red rethorik cartage lernit baith philosophie mathemathik ony preceptoure pefter come myllane quhare prechyng sanct ambrose ressauit cristyn fayth sa proffitabyll thairto vincust put ane c syndry opinionis herisis wrait sa huge nowmer bukis na age man may suffice reid yame deceissit lxxx yeir age thir dayis al basilius first begynnar monkis cirillus byschop ierusalem sanct ierome pape quhilk translatit bybyll ebrew latyne mony othir volomes samyn maner werkis hald sic reuerence pape damasus thay war commandit red amang othir deuyne seru ce bot wyl returne hystory pychtis seing thaym ylk day ir tormentit romane u yrkit importabyl seruytude send thair secret messengeris scottis quhilkis war exilit ye ilis ireland norway desyryng thaym returne albion recouer thair realme myttit thair gret aithis othir restore scottis thair realme landis elli fecht thair support deith aganis romani britonis quhen ferg hard thir desyris pychtis send b aduyse kyng denmark traist seruandis al partis quhare ony scottis war explore thair myndis towart quhe fand thaym ane mynd recouer thair realme reuenge iniuris done thaym romani britonis coducit ane gret nowmer schippis weirmen part ryches wan weris italy part support gudschir roryk cum albioun phovv gratiane king britonis mercius romane capitane vvar slane constantine put mercius place deith secund message send pichtis fergus hovv come albioun vvas aggreit vvith pichtis recouerit realme ca v duryng tyme gratiane brytone consent mercius romane capitane tuke ye crown brytane trubyl sone pecifijt sic contention rais betuix thaym ylk ane thaym slew othir romani rycht sorrowful deith thair capitane chesit constantyne aduyse honori empriour succede mercius place constantyise nocht ane man nobyll blude yit mercyal werkis al sone chosyn capitane went frace ane army delyuer samyn fra iniure gothis swi quhar vincust ane nobyl knycht namyt constantius slane al sone uyctoryne knew slauchter mercius constantyne went london garnist strenthis brytane wi strang munition weirmen set ingyne mony wayis hald brytonis opinioun honorius empriour empyre romani inuadit grete rebellyoun al partis pichtis seyng britonis haldyn gret difficulte opinion romani beleuit fermely gyf scottis war brocht agane albion concurryng thair support recouer thair liberte thir causis yai send thair secund message ferg schawyng sa gret trubyl britane amang romani na tyme mycht cum sa ganand recouer realme sone efter ferg pullit vp salis arriuit murray quhare set army land fame cumyng diuulgat throw albion causit scottis partis conuene hym thair wyffis chyldren ye maner thair ennymes bene chasit vincust thay war remane perpetually thair natiue landis ony forthir trubyll come syndry pychtis gret cupanyis fergus thankyng hym syngulare lufe recouer natyue realme cumyn albion nocht astonist wynter stormes dangeir feis quhen passage bene maist parellus desyrit hym set syde iniuris gif ony war tymes bygane betuix scottis pichtis thay mycht new confiderat efter tennour ye auld peace prayit hym imput na falt thaym ye wekit offencis committit aganis nobyll kyng eugenius progenitour bot imput ye allanerly thair fore eldaris quhylkis uld nothi tyme haue experience dissait romani yi vnderstand quhat vengeance calamyte apperyng thaym weris maid aganis scottis quhen thay beand dissauit plesand wordis romani damage thair commoun weill brocht thaym self intollerabyl seruitude throw quhylk thay war sa cruelly punyst yat euery kynd deith wes preferrit romane dominion answerit fergus wald gladly haue peace amyte pichtis siclyke condicionis thay war afore confiderat progenitouris wald ieoperde hym self thaym battall contrar romani britonis thair auld perpetual ennymes fecht deith thair commoun weill reuenge iniuris done thaym swa said pichtis wald plesandly depart thair wiffis child guddis landis quhilkis war treasonably reft afore fra scottis ye auld iniuris ye said pychtis thocht thaym sufficiently punist iust punitioun god thair offence n thay war nocht onely reft spulyei thair natyue landis bot thirllit maist vyle intollerabyl seruitude pichtis content thir desyris creat ane kyng set ane day meit ferg day affixit scottis pychtis war confiderat togidder efter ye auld band maist souer way yt mycht deuysit sic thingis done fergus ressauit al landis strenthis war reft fra progenitouris afore romane weris sone efter past ane honest cumpany argile quhare crownit fatal chiar merbyll yeir fergus recouerit realme x v yeir efter scottis war expellit albion fra incarnation iiiicxxii yeris fra first begynnyng scottis vii hundreth lv yeris xviii yeir honorius emprioure phovv romani fechtand aganis scottis pichtis vvar seuerit ane schoure hayll syndry vassalage done vailyeant grahame vvall abircorne lynage allya vvith kyng fergus ca vi victoryne comouit scottis war brocht agane yi maner albioun assemblit ane army come york efter cumyng send ane herald pychtis sol ad thaym mony large myssis dissolue ye band maid lait scottis last seyng cum lytyll effect began pichtis fals maynswo ne pepyll wrokyn thair rebellyoun come ane army lm men throw kendell mers pentland gret da mage pepyll thairof set tentis nocht far fra camelon fergus aduertist ye cumyng romani maner baith kyng pichtis war gaderit ane gret army come ouir forth within ye nycht set tent nocht far fra ennymes wt delyuerit mynd assaylye yame brek day romani tothir syde knew weil ordinance scottis pichtis thrid vigill maid thaym reddy battall faucht confiderat kingis besyde watter carron battall rycht cruelly fochtyn sa gret multitude pepyl slane yat said watter ran mony mylis purpoure stremis seis quhill thir armyis war fechtand maner vncertane victory come suddanly ane scharp schoure sa full haill sleit ye nane thaym mycht knaw ane othir throw quhylk yai war constranit seuer mair yrkit saciat otheris slauchter thus war baith armyis sa brokyn mony yeris efter nane thaym micht inuaid othir battal uictoryne morrow seyng army brokyn returnit kent left behynd hym mony sodyouris pentland kepe samyn maner prouynce aganis scottis pichtis confiderat kyngis co mandit residew thair pepyll quhylkis war left lyue returne hame becaus yai fand yame self vnabyll renew battal thay set thair ingyne saif baith thaym self thair landis ane better fortoun sone efter thay conuenit argile se quhat wayis thay micht best resist thair ennymes reuengyng iniuris thaym done lerne thair pepyll art cheualry thay war mony yeris abusit ony exercition thairof efter syndry consultationis scottis seyng picht mair nowmer micht nurist angus fiffe striueling stratherne sufferit thaym remane athole beyond hyllis granyeben quhyll thay mycht sum better fortoun recouer resydew yair landis quhilk war reft fra thaym tyranny ramanis pychtis spred fast athole maid syndry strenthis polecy mene tyme uictorine capitane britane comandit britonis general edict byg ye wal betuix abircorne dunbritane staik ryse thair stragest maner saif thaym fra inuasion scottis pichtis big yi dike war assemblit mony craftismen al partis syndry weirmen fai thaym quhyl ye dyke byggit ye mene tyme quhe thay war biggad maist besaly come ye vailyeat grahame quhais dochter yit kyng fergus slew ane gret nowmer thir weirmen bygging dike ye remanent put flicht incotinent fers incursio brocht ane huge pray men gudis fra ye britonis scottis landis grahame discedit ane anciant hous de mark gottin ane nobyll lady yat samyn cuntre ane ye scottis yat banist ethodius albion efter ye proscription scottis maryit ane virgine ye blude rial denmark quhom gat ane dochter maist excellent bewte quhilk geuyn ferg mariage fergus gat hir iii sonnis afore cumyng albion quhais name war eugeni dongarus constancius quhome salbe history followyng uthir sayis grahame ane bryton quhilk eschewyng romane tyranny fled ng scottis efter banist thaim denmark gret ennyme romani seyng thaym regne sic tyrany auarice aboue thair subdittis always quhat sumeuir hous lynnage discendit treuth ane hie curage spreit baith weir peace strangest ennyme romani britonis grahame discendit surname grahamis pof syndry consultationis maid ye scottis thair defence aganis ye romani britonis hovv victorine conquest crovvn britane hovv vvas punist yai fore ye deith ca vii britonis brokin syndry battallis maner ceissit mony yeris efter fra batall content defend yair win land tyme come infinite nowmer scottis frace spanye almany italy othir ti quhair thay war wageouris king ferg traisting becaus sa huge rebellion wes maid realmes aganis romani recouer thair landis albion fergus reiosing thair cumyng went thaym carrik quhare faucht ye romani gat na le displeseir gat afore throw quhilk costranit leif carrik returne argyle quhare remanit wynter followyng ane conuentioun maid hym nixt symer quhylk syndry noblis perswadit rais new army resyst uyctoryne cumyn galloway erar ieoperd hym extreme dangeir battall dayly leif sic afflictioun potheris sayd best tary nocht fecht romani becaus thay war twyis dyscomfist aduenture gyf thay war dyscomfist thryd tyme thair realme suld pray thair ennymes pbest thairfore ceis fra battall quhyll thair pyssance war conualescit quhylk thay mycht mair abyll resyst pattour sa frequent rebellyoun maid aganis romani partis uyctoryne mycht nocht lang abyde brytane pand thairfore sen empyre romani apperis sa manifestlye declyne pit may happyn uyctoryne constranit fle brytane scottis pichtis may haue ane ganand oportunite recouir thair realme ony gret da geir last counsall apprisit sa concludit scottis pichtis sall inuaid thair ennymes mair scarmussyng plane battall mene tyme honorius emprioure tuke gret suspitioun aganis th uictorine traisting suld vsurp crown britane thus demit mony pepyll empriour suld exone uictoryne al auctorite britane al sone uictorine aduertist thairof tuke crown britane incredibyll fauoure army part britonis assistit bot otheris followit dioneth sonne kyng octauius afore deceissit apperit thus gret seditioun britane nochtheles honori empriour seyng sa gret trubyll rysyng brytane send ane vailyeant knycht namit heraclius dant thayr rebellyoun quhais cummyng maid britonis otheris assistit uictoryne sa astonist yat yat brocht uictoryne bound heraclius mony otheris quhilkis war mouaris thair rebellioun sone efter uictoryne send rome mony otheris opinioun punist ye deith thus britane brocht agane heracli romane empire phovv placidus romane capitane vvas discomfist vvith army scottis pychtis hovv kyng fergus recouerit hi landis conditioun peace romani cyuyl religious industry vveil pepyll ca viii heraclius quhen brocht britane maner romane opinioun command honorius returnit rome went affric dant ye rebellion athal tyranne left behynd hym britane ane man febyl curage namit placidus quhylk throw auaryce found richt vnabyll gouerne ony prouynce fergus knawyng weill febyll curage placidus thocht ye tyme ganand recouer landis reft fra hym afore romane weris sone efter come ane army carrik abydyng cummyng kyng pychtis army al sone scottis pychtis war met togydder thay went throw carrik kyle cunynghame galloway ceissing fra na maner cruelte thaym obeyit empyre romani maner thay come pentland mers berwyk left nothir romani britonis placidus capitane brytane herand thir attemptatis come ane huge army pentland ye scottis pichtis nocht affrayit cuming met hym gret fury followit ane terribyll fair battall first ye horsme romani war discomfist sone efter remanent legionis war opprest ythad schot arrowis yat thay gaif bakkis maner ane sorrowfull slauchter maid flearis placidus narrowlye eschapyng ly e fled york confiderat pepyll insolent efter victory tuke purpos sege york nochthel thair army sa brokyn thay war constranit desist placidus na le astonist mony othir afflyctionis fallyng romani syndry ti ye warld last discomfitoure dred britane suld pa fra romane dominioun gif britonis mouit ony new rebellyoun thairfore began seik peace pichtis scottis peace fynaly tretit vnder thir conditionis al la dis munitionis reft afore fra scottis pychtis romane tyranny salbe restorit thaim agane na incursionis heirschyppis sall maid tymes cumyng scottis pichtis romane landis romani sall stand cotent landis conquest ye britonis sall nocht inuaid ye scottis pichtis ony weris tymis cumyng al sone ye confiderat kyngis ressauit thair landis rowmes maner thay gaif thair exact delygence instruct thair pepyll plesand cyuyll maneris ony thirllage seruytude tha fergus incres scottis danis otheris yat come hym recouer thair realme vnder ane freindschip blude gaif syndry la dis realme amang thaym throw quhilk mony landis realme tynt thair auld name callit efter name new possessouris pand becaus name euery land scotland ar weill knawin scottis wyll schaw na thynge thairof fergus reparit kirkis war failyeit necligence pepyll feft syndry preistis rentis possessionis deuyne seruyce brocht monkis war banyst agane realme treti thaym gret reuerece instruct pepyll faith biggit abbay colmekyll dotat syndry landis rentis possessionis commandit samyn tymes cumyng ye commoun sepulture kyngis succedyng efter hym feft al certane funerall obsequies done yeirly thair saulis ferg geuyn al weill cyuyll religious maneris reparit strenthis lyand bordouris fornentis ye brytonis quhare ordanit agit sodiouris remane perpetually defence thairof ye comoun purs pof deith placidus message send castius capitane britane fergus fergus ansvver hovv romani vvar discomfist castius slane ca ix quhen fergus recouerit realme maner restorit pepyl thair anciant hono ri dignite deceissit honor u emprioure efter quhom succedit theodosius quhilk send ane nobyll man namit ualentiniane italy repare dammagis done cyuyll weris ye mene tyme placidus capitane brytane deceissit scottis pychtis traistyng haue gud occasyon deith placidus inuaid britonis peace dissoluit deith come west mureland cumber vthir regionis war tane fra thaym afore romane weris eissit fra na maner cruelte thaym obeyit romani mony brytonis fled castius maid capitane brytane efter deith placidus castius dredand ye thyng come efter dioneth sonne octauius afore rehersit suld vsurpe crown brytane assistence scottis pychtis marijt fergus syster send fergus chargeand hym ane herald gyf desyrit peace leif auld landis marchis pertenand eldaris inuaid na otheris gif desyrit nocht bot battall maid hym vnderstand samyn ennymes yt dang eldaris albioun thirllit pychtis seruitude charge answerit scottis pychtis thay wald haue na peace romani quhyll westmure cumber war restorit aym munitionis thairof pcastius greuit answer come forthwart army quhen cumyn throw romane prouynces nocht far fra westmureland aduertist yat dioneth cu mand ane gret power wal support scottis pychtis brytonis knawyng ye feirsnes cruelte welcheme war astonist thir tythyng nochtwithstandyng hortation castius thay rasit yair spreit come thrid day efter rycht desyrus battal thair ennymes sycht dioneth confiderat pepyll mengit thair oistis togidder weill arrayit battal quhen suddandly baith armyis iunit faucht lang doutsum victory quhyll last wageouris faucht wyngis lycht armour gaif bakkis followit huge affray amang romani samyn ye mair e kit slauchter castius thair capitane incontinent myd battall fled quhome followit scottis pichtis welchemen lang chace murdir yit becaus thay keipi na ordoure thair chare thay gat mair skaith thay thair ennymes romani discomfist wyse colleckit resydew thair army togidder past walis left behynd thaym al strenthis cuntre ony defence hovv maximiane capitane britane come vvith huge army aganis scottis pichtis fergus orison army hovv baith kyngis scottis pychtis vvar slane thair army discofist romani ca x dioneth efter discomfitour romani tuk ye toun britane inuadit pepyl thairof gret cruelte slauchter obeit romani thus apperit britane bot gif trubyll war mair haistely dantit pa fra dominion romani tyme france ane nobyll man namit etius general capitane thairof auctorite emprioure etius heryng britane nakit support send desyre brytonis ane vailyeant knycht namit maximiane dant trubyll appering welschemen scottis pychtis maximiane come sone efter ane army albion quhom brytonis ressauit gret triumphe prayt god send hym ane gud fortoune aganis ennymes maximiane knawyng mair trubyll apperyng rebellyon dioneth ony vthir danger occurring blude ryal brytane thocht lang tary impediment weris come army maist delygence york sone eft come westmureland confiderat kyngis heryng cumyng come thair armyis ye maner ye mene tyme come thaym dioneth king britane power walis spring ye day quhen al thair power mengit togidder fergus callit thaym sound tru pat standart said wyse wald wise freindis yi battall quhilk ar leid aganis oure maist dangerus ennymes war fo htin sa huge heid curage spreit samyn may honour proffet hie pleseir glaidnes suthly wyll ye ponder mater wysely youre myndys bene sa lang distra kit fra eys sa occupyit ythand exercitioun cheualry suld ereckit gret esperace victory seyng ennymes sicht quhom ye sa oft afore discomfist chasit semi forcy campionis euir beleif ye best haif excellent fortitude aganis quhat sumeuir aduersite may occurre fortitude hie souerane virtew perswadis euery nobyll man impulsioun nature resist aduersite virtew mair renownit resist iniure ennymes tha inuaid thaym ony iniure yt wragusly iniurit he ay gud esperace bett fortoun follow thus incressis strang esperance iust querall growis prudent contrare ya doi wrang iniurius hym self he na esperace gud fortoun follow maxim sumtyme capitane britane treasonabyll slychtis confiderat pichtis na le ye exterminion thaym tha scottis end thairof schew thay slew gudschyr eugenius mony nobyll eldaris put thaym sic affliction thay war mony yeris exilit regioun throw quhylk conquest hayll empyre albion nocht cotent felicite thirl ye pichtis auld cofiderat freindis contrar band me vyle seruitude nochtheles end alliance schew said pichtis quhat da mage cummis confiderat treasonabyll pepyll contemption thair trew freindis bot last ye pichtis penitent importabyll iniuris done w began youcht lait prudent brocht w agane realme sone efter cummyng vincust oure feirs ennymes small difficulte ar thir vineust tyrannes returnit inuaid w aduyse maximiane thair capitane wald restore thaym thair curage quhylk thay tynt afore slauchter thair capitane casti thay charge w war vnder thair dominioun pa cuber westmureland quhilk pertenis w iust tytyl thir reasonis thynk suld repugnant thair chargis bot al persew oure iust action aganis thaym al pissance heir fore awalknit vailyeant campionis tak wappinnis gud curage spreit thynk na gret difficulte occurris vincus thay febyll creaturis quhilk sa cowartly gaue place afore youre armoure pa forthwart ioly copanyeonis haue na le memory honour iniuris done ennymes conques sic glore posterite imitatioun youre dirtew may lerne fecht vailyeantlye thair realme al sone ferg said thir wourdis gaue ane signe sound trumpat iune tothir two kyngis pychtis britonis vsit na le hortatioun thair armyis incontinent baith armyis iunit first counteryng ye romani wer neir discomfist sa huge nowmer arowis ganyeis come thaym ye lyft mycht skarslie sene aboue thair heidis maximiane seyng first bront romani dangeir send ha stelie ane legioun fresche men thair support wes battall renewit cruelly fochtin last wyngis ro ni multitude pepil ouirset thair ennymes fornens thaym confiderat pepill britonis faucht vnder dioneth maid lang debait bot last wageouris ye faucht ye vter skirtis romane wyngis come ye battall quhair thay wer fechtand yair bakkis confiderat peple howbeit thay wer affrayit yi suddane terrour ruschit togidder ane knot stout curage fecht ye deith maist forcy strang capitanis pepill rycht desyrus reuenge thair deith becaus thay saw na othir remeid maid thaym maist violent force rusche throw thair ennymes quhair thay wer slane gret murdir thair ennymes quhill ye romani wer besalye geuyn stop forcy irruptioun nobillis forsaid mony remanent scottis come feirslie throw thair ennymes wer sauit air flicht yit chais followit fa cruelly romani wer sauit quhome thay mycht apprehend bot last ye nycht put end yair laubouris vnhappy battall wer slane fergus kyng scottis xvi yeir regne durst kyng pichtis ye nobilite baith yair realmes dioneth prince walys euil woundit wes brocht see port nocht far fra ye feild quhair gat ane bait fled walis phovv romani vvrocht gret iniuris scottis pichtis hovv maximiane vvas alliat vvith dioneth princ vvalis tuk crovvn britane cotrar auctorite romani ca xi eftir mischeuo battall sic terroure rais throw ye landis scottis pychtis nocht wes traistit bot vte exterminioun baith yair realmes becaus thay na esperance support thair maist forcy campionis beand slane thay thoch na thyng sa gud fle vncouth realmes maximiane think best vse ye present fortoun occurrit ceissit fra na maner cruelte yt mycht euisit galloway annandale mers pentland sic rage fyre swerd yat na estait wes sauit fra fury pepill yat fled kirkis sanctuaryis wer slane ony sycht god town camelon mony othir nobill cietris townis scottis pichtis wer tane cassin ye ground cruelte ceissit quhil last ye scottis pichtis war dreuin schamefully ouir ye wal yt ryn ni fra abircorn dubrito sworn neuir returne beyond samyn ane part romani gaif counsall maximiane sen scottis pychtis wer sa brokin tyme mycht haldyn na pepill faith peace distroy thaym etly elli banis thaym albion utherwayis na thig mycht done efferyng ye comon weill romani maximiane refusit counsall wynt wes approcheyng throw quhilk army behuuit rest thair wynter schelis becaus na vittall wer amang scottis pychtis sus ene army sic vehement cauld thair montanis na craft mycht withstand ye samyn wes weil thair army abyde ye nixt symer attoure becaus welschemen nerrast nychtbouris rebellit aganis hym wes necessar dant thaym first auenture gyf persewit ye scottis pychtis leuand behynd hym sa perrellus ennymes damage proffit mycht cum weris thir causis returnyt victorius army yorke quhair remanit wynter brocht vittallis ti sustene ye samyn spring yeir ra tentis come displayit baner aganys dioneth walis wes haldyn kyng britonis fornentis ireland seis mene tyme maximiane wes aduertist writtingis yat bonifacius slane twa romane capitanis affrik yair army discomfist throw quhilk affrik wes wist fra romane dominioun ye said bonifacius maid king thairof attoure franchemen quhilk wes ye tyme ane pepil almany wes cummyng ouir ryne entrit gallia quhilk wes callit eftir france cruelte tha euir wes hard afore coquest ye landis orliance paris maid ane kyng thair win blude throw quhilk appe landis callit ye tyme gallia suld cum vnder dominioun franchemen maximiane knawyng sa mony rebellionis ti aganis romani thocht best rebel samyn wyse tuke crown britane contrar romane auctorite pecify realme hym al debaitis ya mycht strang aganis romani gyf thay list inuaid hym tuke eldest douchter dioneth namit othilia mariage dioneth gat kyng fergus sister two douchteris ony mayl childrin secud douchter namyt ursula wes maid ane nun fyne ye scho suld haue na succession yi affinite sic tendernes inccessit betuix maximiane dioneth ye said dioneth wes sufferit haif gretest empyre nix maximian britane pof kyng eugenius secud gret vassalage done maximian britane france hovv vrsula hir fallovvi vvar maryit ca xii sic thingis done britane residew scott quhilk wer eschapit feild afore rehersit conuenit argyle maid sonne eugenius secund kyng fra ye incarnation iiiicxxx yeris fra begynnyng realme scotland viiclx ye feird yeir ualentiniane empriour eugenius began administration realme piete tuke bonis fader fra ye place quhair thai wer beryit romani betyit thaym funerall triumphe ye abbay colmekil fergus wes first kyng scottis yt wes beryit colmekill thairfore wes cal lit eftir ye comon sepulture al scottis kyng vnto kyng macolme ca moris dayis quhilk biggit abbay dunfermelyng perswasioun sanct margaret quhare mony scottis kyngis bene beryit sen syne kyng eugenius rycht desirus recou r ye landis reft fra fader romani britonis wrait name pepill fra sexte sextene ilk town yt mycht beir armour wappinnis nochtheles seing thaym quhen aiwer g derit small nowmer pissance susedit purpos quhill ane tyme ganand youcht scottis pychtis wer brokin yi wyse feblit yair pyssance maximiane send thaym peace desirit becaus yi maximiane saw empire romani persewit al ti set besynes haue ane thairof tuke ye crown britane fauour beniuole ce ye pepyl sone efter coronation past bertanye left behynd hym gud fader dioneth ane legion pepyl gouerne britane fynaly dantit ye bertonaris sic importabyl affliction thay wer randerit dominion maximiane tuke scharp segeing syndry townis sic lay ye see costis bertanye sone efter come al army ane strag town bertanye namit redoun quhilk kepit sulpicius ye name ualetiniane empriour quhe maximiane seigit yi town lag tyme micht get na way force arm kest hym inuad ye cuntre mair rubbery tha honest weir ye mene time ye ber taneris gat sic swasion eti capitane fr nc yt thay rebellit aganis maximiane recouerit al thayr strenthis townis bot slew al weirmen quhare thay war ap hendit maximiane mouit thir iniuris returnit al army ye said town redoun efter mony scharp assaltis hym tane euery pepil foud ny miseratio sla e banist ye tuk extreme yre aganis yanie violation yair faith eti seing france ythandly inuadit e ye burgudian send britane bryng ye legion yt left thair maximiane support hym weris britane left nakit support gaif occasion scottis pichtis inuade ye britonis becaus thay aid ye opinion maximiane finaly quhen yi maximiane coquest bertaye slane ye maist al ye pepyl yair yit yt ane pray francheme thair nixt nichtbouris brocht ane gre nowme pepyl britane inhabit ye said cutre su authouris writis thair come ane cm men britane inhabit ye lad bertanye conan conanus ane tender freind dioneth maid king bertanye sa yi land ynt ye auld name ar rica callit bertanye fra thir britonis yat come inhabit ye said land tha conan king bertanye knawig yt euery pepyl failyeis ye age gif thay haue na succession send ambassatouris britane haue weme thair wiff ambassatour yat come yi effect gat consent nobyllis britane yat al dochteris sister anti tenand blude brytonis yat war tha bertanye suld pa yame en haist togidder ursula nun quhilk tane ye abbay quhare scho fest put chip ye remanent hir fallowis yat lynage dioneth suld faill becaus hir othir sister othili quhilk mari maximiane afore deceissit ny chyldrin yocht passage thir wemen vnplesand ye britonis yit come efter gret felicite ursula hir cupany quhen thay suld haue passit bertanye tempestious streme seis thay war dreuyn na lytyl dangeir thair lyuis mouth ryne quhare thay landit becaus thay sic trubyll seis ay tuk purpos pa bertanye land othir authour say thay tuke thair voyage rome perswasion haly nun ursula war tane ye hunis quhoin thay war al slane becaus thay wold consent polution thair bodyis kirk thairfore syngis yeirly dyuyne cerimonyis thair glore louyng phovv confiderat kyngis come vvith gret armyis aganis britonis eugenius orison gret heirschippis maid britonis hovv gallio r uenna vvas send support britonis vassalage ca xiii eugenius knawing brytane continewal weris destitute romane sodiouris couenit durstus kyng pichtis ane counsal quhilk efter lang co sultatio cocludit maik weir aganis britonis sic prouidence na aduertence suld maid thairof quhyl thay war arrait thair realmes sone efter ane day assignit baith thair pepyl conuene xl dayis vitallis vthir necessaris thair best maner day prefixt come gret multitude pepyll boud realme ye wo calidone eugenius seing freindis subditt gaderit yi maner said fallowis nane amag yow vailyeant campionis wyll degestlie consider baith ye materis ten w ennymes bot sall thynk tary vnproffitable w day consideryng hie importable iniuris done thir mony eris w romane tyranny vailyeant nobill fader ye recouetar realme slane aboue infinite calamiteis sufferit w ye se carrik kyle cunnynghame galloway mony othir landis realme fallin pray romani youcht ye battall strikin afore fadir aganis maximiane wes infortunat w wes nochtheles rycht vnplesad sorowful ays forthir calamyteis fallyng battall he nocht beleif feblit curage bot enkendil lit samyn reuenge ye auld iniuris done sa mony yeris aganis w progenitouris romani britonis vnderstand al mekll pissance minist romane weris sa far ar romani brokin yair pissance hatrent fortoun quhilk inted bring yair empire nocht throw quhilk tha nocht onl e odius pepil bot al inuadit cruell weris thair prouincys fallyng praye ennymes partis uandalis he tane fra thaym affrik uisigothis spanye franchemen burgundianys he tane ye maist part gallia namit france hunis he panonia mysia thracia macidon pepyll yt eist ti warld he recouerit thair lyberte elli randerit thaym self ennymes romani rome sutyme lady warld he bene twys tane gothis heryit brint forthir romani ar brocht sic calamyte yt thay haue na landis empyre day saif italy britane quhilk nakit garnison weirmen weris maximiane forthir thair na romane capitane wyll may bring ony support aganis w britane drery nakit al support sa disparit sall erar ane pray obstakyll weris nedis nocht heirfore vailyeant capitanis exhort yow battall sen knychtly curage mair abou failyeis yow syckerly hair ane mair huge pray abydyng yow euir apperyng afore de chance fortoun ony eldaris occasioun moder werkis ar done offeris hir wylfully yow perswading impedimentis tary battall set asyde exhortis yow follow hir aduenture gyf ye tyne hir febyll eurage ye sall nocht wyn hir agane howbeit ye wald mouit pray yow ceis fra honest vassalage ony band yt ye haif maid maximiane thir romani briton he inuadit w mony cruel inuris sen ye said band maid sen ennymes he ceissit inuaid w brekyng said band may ony thyng le inuaid thaym maner belt yow thairfore lusty gallandis manheid tak wappinnis honest interpris follow spreit curage eldaris ye sal nocht aile glore victory army thir word war inflamit battall promittit ieoperd thaym self al maner dangeir yat thay mycht reuenge iniuris done thaym affliction romani quhylk richt patent maid ye remanent wordis eugenius haue mai credit ylk man schillnoyis bad rais thair ansenyeis proceid forthwart pichtis ye samyn maner war inflamit battal exhortation thair kyng continent ye confiderat pepyl inuadit ye britonis fyre swerd partis quhare thay come chasit ye britonis pentland mers berwyk galloway annandale yairefter thay past kendale cumber westmureland york tuke munitionis strenthis cuntre quhe thay spulyeit townis thay slew al ye cietezanis thairof left na britonis lyue except thaym war sauit flycht apperit thus britane cu haistely vnder empire scottis pichtis gif samyn war mair haistely resistit britonis impaciet suffer yir displeseiris send thair oratouris ye empriour ualentiniane promittit thair petuall subiection hym sa yat wald support thaym aganis thair vnmercyfull cruel ennymes ualentiniane ycht desyrus keip britane vnder empyre send ane nobyl capitane namit gallio euenas mony legionis pepyll yair support scott pichtis knawing cummyng new army left th landis brytane quhylk war laitly heryit dystroyit thaym syne returnit hame thay thocht profytabyll ieoperd thaym aganis ye romani knawand frequent battallis afore past thair gret maheid cheualry romani thair cumyng albion followit lang chace scottis ye watter forth mony thaym slew haisty scharmising becaus thir romani micht mak lang tary albion extreme dageir appering frace inuasioun syndry pepyll thay gart repare haistely wal afore rehersit betuix abircorne dubritane gret expensis rasit ye samy faill deuat stanis xii cubitis hicht viii cubitis breid mony strang touris rising sydis thir touris bastailyeis war doung togidder sic thingis wald nocht byrne saif britonis fra thair ennymes hicht thir touris thay set fyre panis aduertis cuntre quhen dangeir occurrit thay come ye defence heirof quhen fyre sene war punist deith phovv ye scottis pichtis kest dovvn ye vval abircorne vvrocht gret cruelteis ye britonis ye message send britonis etius ansvver ca xiiii britane brocht maner romane seruitude gallio reuennas returnit france uhais departyng gaif occasion confiderat kyngis inuaid brytonis mair cruelte afore kyng eugenius assemblit pepyll afore hym sumtyme infla mit thaym huge ire aganis hair ennymes sumtymes prouokit thaym esperance pray ryches gottin thair ennymes kyng pichtis ceissit exhort pepyll maner promittit publik edict geif yt capitanry camelon first past ouir wal abircorn britonis knawyng weill assemblance scottis pichtis come arrayit thair best maner defend wal afore rehersit put ane gret nowmer weirmen bastailyeis touris thairof resyst inuasioun ennymes aganis quhom send vailyeant grahame ane cumpany scottis pichtis armyt corsbowis slonges handbowis al sone grahame doung brytonis fra wal incontynent come masonnis wrychtis mony otheris craftisme syndry instrumentis kest dyke vnto ye groud ane gret ad britonis maid yame withstand ye euersyon wal bot thay obstinate fechtyng war slane otheris knew ye cruell furye confiderat pepyll gaif bakkis confiding na thyng mair thair flycht quhill sic thingis war done ye wal abircorn thair come ane othir cumpany pichtis fiffe peatland dyd mair cruelteis brytonis quhare thay come tha thir scottis pichtis come afore thaym al sone baith thir cumpanyis war assemblit togydder nocht fyre slauchter quhare thay come inhabytantis affrayit thir cruelteis fled thair wiffis barnis guddis beyond watter tyne incontinent gudis betuix tweid tyne general proclamation ye two kyngis war denuncit frely eschetit pray thair army followit mony schamefull abhominable ded persuasion ire hatrent auarice skry terrible noyis arrayis furye weirmen ceissyng fra na maner cruelte throw ye landis betuix ye ireland seis ta sayde almane seis tothir britonis feir thir importable terrouris reparit wall adriane huge lauboure expensis confiderat pepil knawyng becaus wynter wes approcheyng thair army mycht nocht abide togidder ceissit fra seging ye said wal sat doun thair wyffis child landis wer conquest tyme richt battall britonis dreidand ye scottis pichtis cumyng ye ueir inuaid yame afore send thair ambassa ouris etius quhilk wes capitane france said desyrit support aganis confiderat pepill alwayis yi etius send na support ye britonis vncertane quhidder wald send nane becaus fauorit nocht emprioure ualentiniane purposit vsurpe crown france gyf mycht nocht mak support ye said britonis feir scharp battall ennymes aganis hym phovv conan prince vvalis exhortit britonis tak peace vvith scottis pichtis vvas slane hovv ye britonis efter slauchter faucht amang thaym self ca xv wer oratouris britonis returnit repulse etius britane followit syndry consultationis amange thir britonis sum gaif counsall inuaid scottis pychtis al weil see land defed thair liberte quhilk wes laitlie recouerit deith nocht onelie bryng men bot fensabill wemen defence thair realme conuene deligence wal adriane erar ieoperd thaym extreme daungeir suffer sa continual heirschippis slauchter tak peace howbeit wer necessar ony inhonest conditionis mene tyme conan prince walis discending lang progressioun ye natiue kyngis britane said britonis maner necessar pepill wyse faderis gyf thay intend othir mak coques keip yair awin rowmis fra iniure fayis haue respect baith thair pyssance season occurris ye tyme sa lang suthlie wer supportit romani wer sufficient defend realme aganis vnmerciful fayis socht na peace ye treasonable scottis pychtis bo allace oure realme abidis ane othir chance ar attenuat brokin tyranny ye proud maximiane quhilk he bene noysum w tha ony ennymes mycht haif bene quhen auarice socht empyre warld ar sa waistit maye haif na cofidence victorie gyf fecht awin pissance haue na esperance support romani sen ar insufficiet awin power resist ennymes tymes cuyng may plesadly debait sic perrellus auenture yir cruell tyranny ennymes nocht brokin lang laubour distres he nothir dreid god man deith reuengit iniuri done thaym sa mony yeris afore w amang thaym na deference age kynd man wife equale rageand battall ony mercy thair cheualry nocht bot wod fury thay reiose na thing sa mekill murdir agit men barnis siclik febill personnis sic insaciable thrift thay eschame nocht drynk ye blud yair ennymes delitis nocht bot thift slaucht thairfore mon othir haue peace yame elli suffer thair importable cruelteis yan afore yocht peace rycht schamefull w yit better haue pacience ane tyme lois realme liberte schame say thir wourdis na desyre conques honouris bot onlie ye singulare affection yt beir vnto comon weill auyse thairfore quhidder samyn mair frutefull noysum thairto britonis war rycht co mouit conan persuadit yame peace said thay wald haue na amite scottis pychtis ye sindry cruelteis done yame thay knew al sayd thay spak nocht thair comoun weill bot onlie fynd sum occasioun slychtis vsurpe crown britane last quhen nobillis tane lang consultatioun mater oftymes lamentand thair vnhappy chance knawyng estait man sa miserable tendis swiftlie ruyne ony hycht counsall obstinat oportune pepill thay finalie concludit assemble thair ordinance baith men sensable wemen inuaid scottis pichtis co uene ane prefixi day place conanus rycht sorowful thir doingis ischit fra counsall sayng tak eternall god witnes assent nocht furius sentence beleuis na thyng mair anciant noble realme britane cum irrecouerable dammage throw sic fuliche cousal dayis ane certane britonis heirad conanus regrait thair doyngis yi sort said thy auctorite sall nocht pissance stop yi sentence efter thay pullit furth yair swerdis thay draue hym throw body skry arrais haistelie efter slauchter freindis conan socht slayaris yair maist furye throw quhilk peple wes deuidit twa partis mycht nocht pecifyit auctorite ye nobillis quhill ane huge nowmer wer slane athir sydis pof gret vassalage done nobyl grahame vvallis abircorne adrian hovv scottis conquest landis betuix tyne humber epistyll send britonis etius ansvver ca xvi al sone ye fame wes brocht london scottis pychtis maid cruell incursionis ye landis britonis ane huge feir terrour went throw ye ciete quhen britonis wer takand thair consultatioun youht wes vane thay suld dres al materis come vailyeant grahame ane cumpany chosyn men wall abircorne brak doun partis halelie left na thyng thairof standyng remanis nowe thir dayis cause yi wall wes callit eft grahamis dike sic tyngis done grahame went wall adriane fornens ireland seis kest samyn maner slew al ye weirmen wer laid defence thairof ye residew britonis heirand nocht bot murdir rumissyng deand pepill sauyt thaym self flycht ye wall adriane bet doun ye groud maner scot desiring na thyng mair reuenge ye iniuris done afore britonis clamit generall edict na fensabill bot agit febill personis saiffit bot edict wes nocht obseruat far enragit wes ye army cruelte thay past fyre swerd throw boundis betuix tyne humber wrocht ye inhabitantis thairof sic heirschip slauchter thay wer othir chasit cuntre yir yngis schawin nobillis britane london mouit thaym se k new remeid aganis thair ennymes finalie quhen thay lang auysit yi mater wes concludit send two syndry ambassatouris expedition thair materis ane thaim pa ye cofiderat kyng scottis pychtis gif thaym frelie landis liand beyond humber large soumys money swa thay wald condiscend peace desist fra truble thaym tymes cumyng cund ambassat pa etius capitane france deplorand thair calamyteis epistill pto etius thryis consul regrait britonis pquhe forbearis first raderit yame romani yai traistit mony reasonis yt senat pepill rome wes port sicker refuge pepill cuyng vnder thair empire bot yair posterite iresonable slycht maximiane agane comon weill ar sa brokin strenth continewance yair opinioun ar bot ane facill pray ennimes throw quhilk apperis othir romani ar degenerat fra manheid illuster dedis thair eldaris elli thair braid empyre vengeance god begynnis declyne geuyn pray euery pepill nochtheles gif fatale chance tyme weirdis couatis realme dissoluit fra amyte freinschip romani constraning w seruitude othir barbar peple cure nocht quhat pepill haue dominioun w sa eschew tyranny scottis pychtis quhais bludy swerd he wrocht w sic heirschip calamite knawe nocht quhat way miserabill lyuis salbe sauit en guddis lost tynt thay haue nowe bet doun ye wallis strenthis quhilkis suld haue defendit w fra thair cruelteis syne entrit ye r mane prouince al maner cruelteis waistit ladis brint townis castellis bet doun wallis ground slane wyffis childrin agit sonis besyde infinite othir displeseiris quhilkis may nocht writ doloure residew thaym ar chaist dreuin seis becaus may nocht haue passage throw ye samin ar dreuin agane ennymes handis quhait throw na esperance apperis releif bot othir slane peri fletand seis seikand heirfore gyf thow regardis othir ou faithful kyndnes yit glore romane maieste quhilk bene sa mony yeris obeysant suffer nocht w freindis ye senat pepill rome thirllit sic vndantit cruelte ennymes bot send w support haist nocht mair cruelly betrasit romani tha tynt barbar pepyll othir wayis sic thyngis sall ane perpetual memory successouris haue na confidence societe romani etius answerit richt sorrowfull romane empyre persewit sa euery hand mycht skarsly defend france fra inuasioun barbar pepyll thairfore mycht send na support britane nochttheles exhortit thaym maik best defence thay mycht esperance better fortoun quhen romani pecifyit trubyll scottis pychtis suld condignely punist thair attemptatis phovv britonis vvar vincust maid tributar scottis pychtis conditionis peace geuyn said britonis ca xvii mene tyme quhen answere come fra etius ye ambassatouris returnit fra scottis pychtis schew ye petitionis brytonis war na thyng plesand said scottis pychtis thay wald ceis fra ythand slauchter heirschip brytonis quhill othir thair realme conquest elli frely randerit thaym britonis war richt affrayit thir wourdis nochtheles thay enforcit thaim self curage ruschit haistely harnes detes yng thair effeminate sleuth quhilk thay gaif audacite thair ennymes tynt ye victory thair cowartry thay conquest afore thair vyctory manheid scottis pichtis weil aduertist yat ye britonis war repulsit etius thair desiris gaderit thair pepil boundis vnder thair dominion come displayit baneris aganis yair enymes britonis ye samyn maner war aduertist exploratouris yair ennimes war cumand yame sic pissance yat thay mycht resistit bot tha thay bega cur wary thaym gaif thaym counsall fecht aganis sa pyssant ennymes damage yair comon weil yit saif yame fra mair displesour thay send othir ambassatouris ye cofiderat kyngis desyryng peace afore becaus yai culd purches na peace bot gif thay war randerit wiffis childrin gudd throw extreme ire ta syde disperation ye tothir syde yai maid yame ane consent battal inco tinent blast trumpat baith armyis iunit followit ane maist terribyll bergane britonis delyuerit reuenge thair deith de defence yair realm set yair ennymes gret preis mony thaym bure vnto ground ylkane desyring support othir ruschit togidder sa obstinat mynd yt thay semit na thing regard yair deith throw quhilk mony ye scottis pichtis quhilk faucht ye first battal war neir discomfist graham ye ailyeant capitane seand freindis extreme dangeir send ane gret cumpany ilis men fra ye carage thair support incontinent ye scottis pichtis war afore woudit discomfist renewit battal ye britonis ouirset multitude ennymes ruschyng apon thaym sydis disparit victory fled ane mo nocht far fra feild cariage men seyng ye battal discofist left thair cariage slew thair ennymes heir thair quhare thay war tane ouirset ye mossis battall war slane iiiim scottis britonis xvm prince nobillis britane war sa halely slane battall yt residew brytonis mycht mak na defence yair realme thairfore generall consent thay send thair oratouris victorius kyngis humely desyring peace vnder quhat conditioun thay plesit confiderat kyngis na le mouit sorrowfull chance fallyng britonis ye present calamyte fallyng thaym self codiscendit haue peace vnder thir conditionis brytonis tymes cumyng sall ressaue na romane capitane armyis aboue thaym britane sall suffer na omani gallis saxonis yit na ethir pepyll ar ennymes scottis picht pa throw thair la dis thay sall nothir treit peace alliance yit make weir aganis ony pepyll comand confiderat kyngis thay sall fecht quhe thay ar chargit support scottis pychtis aganis pepyl al ye landis lyand beyond humber sal remane petually vnder ye empire scottis pychtis brytonis pa samyn thair wiffis chyldrin gudis ony tary finaly thay sal pay lxm pundis amang thair weirmen yeirly tymes cumyng xxm pundis confiderat kyngis maner tribute securite heirof thay sal geif ane c men oistage wyll confiderat kyngis ilk man na eldar xxx yer na youngar xviii yeris gif ony thir pointis war brokyn ye peace dissoluit ye self peace ratif maner ile albion brocht better quiet afore britane tane fra ye empire romani maner maid tributar scottis pichtis iiii clxxxxvi yeris efter ye iulius cesar maid first tributar romani quhilk ye vii yeir kyng eugenius fra incarnatioun iiiicxxxvi yeiris fra empyre brutus first kyng britane ane mvic iii yeris fra then britonis began declyne baith thair manheid landis honouris knaw weil hystory haue schawin maximus romane capitane britane octauius dioneth kyngis britane al cumyng saxonis albioun quhilk intend schawe richt discrepant fra croniklis brytonis maid galfrede yit thair suld nane haue admiration thairof authouris follow eutropi paulus diacon beda ueremund othir mair recent expert hystoricianis concordis galfrede nouthir narratioun hystorye yit dait yeris think thairfore mair sowndand verite follow mony prouyn attentyk authouris discriptioun oure historye concurring hystorye romani baith narratioun dait yeris follow said galfrede writand ony testimoni othir authouris syngular awin opinioun mony nobyll clerkis sanctis sindry partis vvarld syndry prodigy meruellis sene albion fy akco e ca xviii mony nobyl war thir day anselmus philippus hilarius amang w wer thay day palladius quhylk send celestine pape confound ye heresy pelagius risyn syndry partis albion palladius first byschop bure authorite amang scottis creat ye pape byschoppis afore hym war creat votis allanerlye monkis preist namyt culdeis palladius purgit ye scottis pichtis mony vane superstitionis ritis gentilis vsit thay dayis thairfore callit ye apostyll scottis deceissit ane town mern namit fordoun quhare blissit body restis yit haldin gret veneration amang ye pepyll banis war laitly translatit ane nobyl man willia scheues archebischop sanct andros put ane syluer cais mony solempne cerimonyis fra ye incarnation god ane miiiiclxxxxiiii yeris palladius maid sanct serf bischop send hym orknay instruck rude pepyll thairof ye faith al gaif sacrament baptem teruanus maid hym archebischop pichtis tyme send fra pape celestyne sanct patrik ireland defend ye samyn fra heresy pelagi throw quhilk crystyn faith began incres ireland albion mony meruellis war sene syndry partis albion afore britonis faucht aganis scottis pichtis mone beand opposition quhe maist round apperit suddanly war foure nukit york war mony schouris blude branchis leuis treis war strokyn thonder wederit mony partis albioun pthe merkat gait lodon raif ane huge gaip mony housis besyde sank pepyl preichit thir signis cum dammage ye britonis nochtheles wes mesit ye preistis quhilk comandit na credence geuyn sic fantasyis said fynmakcoule sonne coelus scottis thir day ane man huge statoure xvii cubitis hycht ane gret huntar rycht terrybyll huge quantite pepyll quhome ar mony vulgar fabyllis amang w nocht vnlyke thir fabyllis ar rehersit kyng arthure becaus dedis nocht authorist autentik authouris wyll rehers na thing thairof bot declare remanent geistis kyng eugenius othir nobyllis pand sa endis heir seuynt buke thir cronyklis heir begynnis aucht buke croniklis scotland phovv mony romane prouinces fell pray syndry pepyll hovv syndry realmis began thairthrovv ca primo quhen britane westane maner fra empyre romani maid tributar scottis pychtis uandalis gothis hunnis franche men maid gret slauchter spanye affrik italie almany france throw quhilk apperit manifest declinatioun romane empire sindry realmes ye variant chance fortoun succedis franche men quhais begynnyng vncertane come ouir riuer ryne past throw ane gret part gallia quhilk wes eftir callit france thir franchemen eftir yat thay tane orliance paris thay sat doun besyde reueir sane thay chesit ueremond king maid first foundemet nobil realme france throw quhilk wes comandit landis lyand betuix mouth ryne hillis pirrony deuidyng france fra spanye ta syde fra ye montanis sauoy occ ne seis tothir side suld callit france yi tyme genferik began realme uadalis affrik wes first kyng rang aboue pepill quhais posterite na better chance end beginnyng thair empire yai began tyranny slauchter innocent pepill siclike thay wer inuadit baith extern weris cyuyll battall fynaly brocht ane myserabyll end visigothis astrogothis ane pepyll borne dition romani began regne tyme italy spanye tyme began hunis regne panonia becaus thay grew vnder ane blude auld inhabitantis ye cutre callit gari ye cuntre callit ungaria mony vthir infinite cumpanyis barbar pepyll went throw warld yat tyme persewand romani malyce throw quhilk hapnit yat na man mycht trauall thay dayis extreme dangeir yair lyfe quhen passingeris war inqirit quhat yai war gif thay answerit thay war freindis ye senat pepyl rome demandaris said thay war ennymes yt caus yai war spulyeit yair geir lyuis siclike gif yai answerit thay war ennymes romani demandaris wald allege thaym freindis sa thay war spulyeit slane ye samyn maner sic thyngis maid gallis quhylkis war ye auld inhabitantis france astonist intercommon romani franchemen britonis quhilkis war laitly syttyn bertanye knawyng trubyll ye romane weris sufferit na vncouth blude cum within thaym thay knew nocht quhay freindis fayis phovv conanus exhortit britonis recouer thair liberte message send scottis pichtis britonis hovv noblis commonis britane inuadit othir battall ca ii nobyllis brytane brokyn frequent weris seyng na pepyll trubyl held thaym quiete certane yeris paying iustly thair trybute victorius confiderat kyngis sa past x yeris euir ye britonis began ony rebellioun aganis scottis pichtis mene tyme rais new trubyll kent conanus sonne conan quhilk slane afore schew conuenit syndry nobyllis brytane secrete messinger ane counsal within ane wod said maner ye se wise freindis pepyll sumtyme sa pissant vailyeant deidis cheualry haldyn reuerence pepyl maid tributar scottis pichtis infinite calamiteis dayly wrocht w p quhat may allace caus afflictioun nocht bot awin sleuth quhilk haue failyeit sa far self brokyn gyle maximiane yat maist febyl creaturis he tane yok apon nek may sone cosider far bene degenerit fra curage nobyl eldaris quhilkis sumtyme dang ye scottis albion youcht yi last vnhappy battal strikin w x yeris ago aganis scottis pichtis war constranit huge slauchter oure nobyllis seik peace mair necessar yan honest yit ye tyrane maximiane put pissance coualescit ar rissyn britane mony rank forcy young men reddy al laubour ieoperdes quhais vnbridillit insolence salbe mair noysum w ony cruelte ennymes gif suffer ye samyn dul sleuth haue plente ryches strenth na thing laikis bot curage baith vincus ennymes delyuer w barbar seruitude remeber thairfore vailyeant campionis ye illuster dedis eldaris deuoyd yow sleuth belt yow gud hoip gladnes virtew sic thingis ar ye souerest way bryng materis gud fyne ye may resembyll anciant excellence genitouris sic wyse ye nocht onely enymes bot al othir pepyl may vnderstand ye ar mair geuyn virtew glore battall ony feir deith nobyllis britane thir wourdis war drawin sindry opinionis su thaim furius vult continence desyrit nocht bot battal otheris mair prudent dred gif thay mouit weir yi sort yair sonnis quhilkis lay hoistage suld slane wald nocht consent thairfore battall fynaly quhen thay put day mony altercationis thay seuerit ylk syde ony effect thair purpos nocht lang efter confiderat kyngis wer aduertist thir consultationis maid amang ye britonis bega punis thair plegis syndry afflictionis maid thair ordinance inuade britonis brekaris thair faith promys yit afore thay rasit yair army thay send ambassatouris britonis espy myndis thair nobyllis co monis thir ambassatouris thair cumyng britane schew yame send fra victorius confiderat kyngis exhort britonis perseueir band afore thair faith promis prayit thaym geif na credit thaim yt persuadit yame vane reasonis rebellyon aduenture gif thay sa thay laborit mair thair awin dammage proffit attoure thay brocht certane chargis fra confiderat kyngis said britonis certification gif ye samyn war nocht obeyit thay sall inuadit mair awfull battall afore chargis war brytonis sall hald na publik counsal parliament amang thaym tymes cumyng aduyse ye confiderat kyngis thay sal keip auld conditionis peace poyntis afore contrackit thay sal ressaue agane thair auld plegis delyuer doubyl al mony new plegis ye samyn britonis greuit thir importabyll chargis thocht first extreme cha ce battal erar assailyeit sa schameful conditionis peace obseruit thairfore thay ruschit ane mynd maist cruelte harnes war nocht thair noyis dyn armoure wes haistely mesit ye nobyllis comonis brokyn thair purpos wise maid ane lamentabyl regrait amag thaym self febyll cowarty thair nobillis throw quhilk thair comon weil put gret affliction nocht lang efter followit amag thaym ane mair sorrowfull contention afore comonis im cient suffer vncouth seruitude schit harnes plane rebellyon thocht distroy ye nobyllis britane becaus thay war degenerit fra virtew thair eldaris thirllit thaym ye empyre barbar pepyll pley fynaly discussit swerd comonis rageand maist fury faucht aganis nobyllis mair hatrent ordour cheualry war discomfist incredibyll slauchter cruelte comonis nocht dan bergan sone eft thay ruschit agane tyll harnes faucht aganis thair nobyllis lytyl better fortoun tha afore throw quhilk thair pyssance sa brokyn thay durst remane thair awin housis bot fled thair wyffis chyldrin montanis maid frequent heirschippis noblis last thay war constranit athir sydis haue peace nobillis micht leif industry comonis comonis ye authorite prudence nobyllis thir cyuyll weris hurt ye realme britane na le damage tyranny maximiane afore quhen maid nakit baith weirmen pepyll pof syndry afflictionis plagis quhilkis fell britonis thair iniquite corruppit lyfe deith kyng eugenius ca iii followit thir cyuyl battallis gret mortalyte hungir cotinewit thre yeris togidder amang ye britonis followit incredybyl plente wt mair habudance fouth euir rememberit ony tyme afore throw quhylk rais vncouth lust pomp myscheif amang ye pepyl euery ane thaym geuyn mair tyl riatus surfet glutony yair wambe ony virtew thair eldaris throw quhilk thay become sa vicious sa corruppit life na pepyll gud maneris mycht leif amang thaym nocht onely sanct bede testifijs war ye temporall estait drownit thir vicis bot spretuall estait samyn maner terrybyll pest glutony hurt brytonis mair yair virtew guddis glore army euir dyd ony swerd afore schortly reward glutony thair come thaym sa huge mortalyte quyk skarsly sufficient bury deid youcht thay war maist cruelly punist wyse nothir feir deith psent calamite micht draw thaym fra thair inhansit synne pand thairfore thair vicis quhylkis thay war drownit sa myserably occasyoun thay war efter conquest saxonis tynt baith thair ryall maieste crown sic displesoure thay micht neuir recouer agane yair anciant honouris quhill brytane sic trubyll scottis pichtis wer gud peace geuand thair attendance efter sa lang weris decore thaym self rich faith honest institutionis gaif thankis god yat causit thaym perseueir gud felicite yair ennymes sic displeseir iust punytioun thair demeritis thay micht nothir defend thaym self inuade thair nychtbouris thairfore traistit landis betuix humber franche seis cum haistely vnder thair perpetuall dominioun kyng eugenius hauand na weris ennymes maner brocht realme mair honour tha euer afore deceissit ye xxx yeir regne quhilk fourt yeir leo empriour fra incarnatioun iiiiclxi pof king dongard secund orisone maid conanus britonis hovv thay send ambassatouris androenus king bertanye support aganis scottis pichtis ca iiii eugeni deceissit maner ony ayr body brothir dongard maid kyng dogard wes nocht far dyfferent fra maneris brothir eugenius richt desyrus peace nocht detestyng weir quhen necessar becaus na occasion weris send prudent men syndry partis realme minister iustice reparit failyeit castellis strenthis realme quhare thay war ruinus decayit samyn micht reddy aganis quhat sumeuer cha ce mycht fall knawyng weill al realmes pepyll sa thirllit mutabilite fortoun thay mycht nocht perseueir lang tyme quiet attoure becaus peace engeneris ryches rich engener insolence insolence geuys occasion battall began haue gret felicite succeding empyre suspition traisting na thing mair surelye battall succeding efter sa lang peace thairfore garnyst ye munitionis bordouris maist weirly ordinance na le dylygence weir war instantly appering sic thyngis done dotat ye kirkis palladius otheris colleigis mony riche ladis rentis sustentation deuyne seruyce comandit kirkis sanctuaris realme sicker refuge crimynal personis duryng thair resydence samyn nocht withstandyng quhat sumeuer offence lese maieste committit thaym attoure dotat ye kirkis otheris priuilegis eikit thaym ryall magnificence mair ampyll boundis thay war afore quhill sic thyngis war done scotland ye britonis lamentit thair sorrowfull chance seand thaym self trybutar last pepyll warld sa thirllit seruytude thay nothir durst yit mycht resaue strangearis amang thaym ryche thaym sic chance marchandyce thair eldaris afore aboue thir calamyteis thay war punyst thair wickit synne swerd huger deith efter mony sorrowfull afflictionis thay maid generall processionis al partis thair realme prayit mercyfull god delyuer thaym al trubyl plaigis fallyng yame thair iniquite thay micht recouer thair anciant fame honour fynaly thir britonis war sa penitet thay maid yair solempne votis atanis amend thair lyuis desist fra thair synnis delyueryng thaym fra iniure seruitude ennymes conanus quhylk maid ye oriso afore britonis traisting haue oportunite moue ye nobyllis recouer thair honoure liberte said maner wordis said last counsall mouit myndis wyse brytonis battall contrar dispitfull ennymes nocht bene necessar day mak orison ye micht nocht onely haue doung ennymes al boudis realm al mycht haue baith youre realme extendit ye auld marchis pepyll dwellyng vnder natyue kyngis britane ony iniuris ennymes ye ar brokin swerd hunger pest mony othir calamyteis he gud experiece quhat myscheif vengeace sorrow fallis mortal pepyl corruppit lust nocht hauad god institutionis reuerence pissance tymes bygane mair ampyll strang howbeit youre myndis war nocht geuyn deid schew regard quhat precius treasoure lyberte yit quhat honoure recouer realme bot aduer fortoun ye mair prudent he recouerit curage attempt sic thyngis bene maist expedient comon weill ye desyre anciant honouris lyberte enforcis assa ye co moun weill chance fortoun wyll degeistly ponder mater sall knaw oure ennymes incressyng awfull ylk day mair repugnant weil se yairfore na thing may seme w le ouirpas dayis miserabyll sleuth quhilk ye end nocht bot schame sen reason ar geuyn riatus vicius leuyng quhilk al vengeance sproutes displesour lat w returne god fontane mercy grace pray hym put ane end afflictioun wraith realmes failyeis sa fauour mercy pepyl conualescis quhen thay ar penytent pand sen haue sufferit gret punytyoun iustlye deseruit iniquite lat w haue sicker confydence god pardoun offencis mercy changeand drery life better fortoun tyme sall wyrk thingis weil gyf mei ire god repellis nane seikis hym quhat euir sufferit ony aduersyte forton fechtand iust battall bot gyf cum throw folye thairfore gif worthy callit posterite thay vailyeant campionis quhylkis vincust sa oft scottis pychtis lat w assailye may best recouer landis reuenge cruelteis done sa mony yer w sycker confidence vyctory sen fortoun changit oure curage oure ennymes dullyt lang sleuth maist ar fecht iust battall aganis oure peruerst ennymes orison conanus mouit sa pepyl thay run haistely harnes wer nocht syndry prudent men schew euydent sygnes thay war nocht sic pyssance tyme thay may withstand thair ennymes without thay support othir cuntreis thus cocludit send ambassatouris androene kyng bertanye quhilk bot fourt persoun fra conane first kyng ye blude schaw hym intollerabil iniuris done thaym scottis pychtis desyre support aganis thaym recouer thair landis nocht lang efter conanus guytellyne byschop london wer send ambassatour androene king bertanye support britonis aganis confiderat pepyll pof deith conanus orison maid guytellyne king bertanye hovv constantyne son vvas send vvith ane army britane maid kyng thairof ca v quhen conanus guytellyne war departit maner pa king bertanye conanus corruppit ayre seis fell ane feuer deceissit betuix britane bertanye guytellyne rycht sorrowfull deith arryuit bertanye burijt hym funerall triumphe syne past resydew cumpany kyng androene bertanye said hym maner wer caus cumyng quhat vnknawin maist inuincibyll prynce bene necessar begin orison ane othir maner yt mycht ye samyn haue drawin mair fauoure compassion trubyll bot sen knaw sic thyngis ar rycht patent afore thy sycht wyll declare effect message schort wordis scottis pichtis maist cruell pepyl erd quhen thay knew w nakit weirmen romane soudiouris inuadit w realme sic cruelteis swerd fyre thay put w boundis lyand betuix ye wal abircorne tyne yit nocht saciat thir attemptatis thay brak downe ye wal adryane come sic rageand fury aganis pepyll yat thay semyt subdew brytane thair dominion fynaly thay subdewit samyn without recouir gif yai possedit sufficient nowmer pepyl al weil inhabit land co ques samyn quhen pepyll war brokyn thir mony othir skaithis couth fynd na support romani thay concludit erar ieoperde thaym self maist dageir tha dayly leif sic displeseir sone efter forcy vnabasit ca pionis thay come aganis thair enymes delyuerit mynd othir delyuer thaym sic insufferabyll displesouris atanis de efter syndry chancis battall war fynaly vincust strangest capitanis tane elli slane ennymes efter vyctory mair insolent tha afore desyryng na le deuore blude conques realme wrocht w ylk day mair dispitfull cruelteis quhyll last war sa brokyn oure substance strenth war constranit haue peace thaym mair necessar proffitabyl costranit ye samyn gif ye noblis sonnis realme plege obseruyng al pointis efter tenour ye peace yame contrackit last pepil thirllit ilk day wt new intollerable oppssion war penitet yir coditionis peace succedig apperit euersion thair common weill throw quhilk rais ane odius contention betuix nobillis commonis quhilk nocht endit huge murdir sydis efter slauchter followit gret derth pouerte amang w bot succedit plente ye moder insolence quhilk mair scaithfull w ye hunger afore precedent throw huge plente generit ane terribyll pest greter mortalyte pepyll euir remembrit afore britane yit thir calamyteis trubyll put nocht w sic afflictioun furius cruelte scottis pichtis quhome new extorsionis dayly deuysit w new plegis commandit geuyn new tribute sa surfetly tane guddis ar confiscat bodyis pynit pand schortly fynd na securite lyfe quhare ennymes he dominioun thir greuous intollerabyl displesouris na le sorrowfull inuyncybyll prince w may nocht schawin indignatioun fynaly war sa brokin thairwith war constranit knaw god seyng iust punition war fallyn sa mony calamyteis oure wekit offence thus determit delyuerit mynd sa far may done ingyne man amend offencis haue done baith god man traistyng fra haue pecifyit ire god yt euery thing sall succede desyre thir motiuis maist inuyncibil price haue tane purpos delyuer w seruytude recouer realme honouris yit becaus ar brokyn sa mony yeris pyssance strenth may attempt sic materis cumyn thairfore humly praying haue compassioun sorrowfull chance fallyng w thy progenitou quhilkis ar put sic punytioun may make na defence aganis oure vndantit fais le tha thow support w thir thy vailyeant pepyll quhilk beand gratit sal delyuer w schortly dishonour fallyng w thir syndry yeris awin defalt nane bot thow dar oppone thaym aganis cruelteis scottis pychtis understand heirfore thow sall nocht defend vncouth housis bot onely felicite thy awin realme quhais crown natyue youcht empyre brytonis sumtyme deuydit two realmes britane bertanye remanis nane lyue sa neir blude thow succede thaym baith contempne nocht occasion sa plesandly offerit support mater pertenis na le thy self w thow may regne haue empire baith realmes gud felicite kyng androene answerit na le sorrowful calamyteis fallyng ye britonis hym self nochtheles chance warld sa mortall pepyll ar oftymes deieckit fra hie felicite supreme misery fra supreme misirie exaltit agane maist prosperite nature he subd men sic lawis thair estait nocht mortal sumtyme he experience gud fortoun sumtyme euyll forthir thocht britonis war worthy louit becaus thay na le curage thair aduersite tha fortoun respodent yair desir cummyng britane schew hym sa agit yt mycht nocht sustene ye charge weris nochtheles suld send sonne constantine ane young vailyeant prince power yat mycht prouide britane support thaym aganis scottis pychtis quhen promittit support causit bischop gwytelline pa town redone mak residence quhill army wer reddy pa hym incontinent king androene comandit schippis land cum ane pfixit day ye port sanct maclouius thair patronis marineris thair best auyse al sone thyngis wer dewlie prouidit costantine pullit vp salis finali arriuit britane quhair wes ressauit wt incredible triumphe ioy pepill traistit gret manheid prudence recouer thair realme liberte nocht lang eftir ane counsall wes maid nobillis britane quhilk constantyne wes maid kyng sworn fecht ye comon weil realme deith hovv dongard kyng scottis come vvith gret povver aganis constantyne king britonis orison army hovv vvas slane britonis discomfist ca vi constantyne king britonis sone eftir coronatioun co mandit generall edict sensabil sonis couene ye xl day eftir huber prouidit thair best auyse obey ye comand yair capitane pepill sic ardent desyre recouer thair liberte wes absent prefixit day al inflammit ni sic curage strenth pissance thay semit alluterly distroy scottis al sone kyng dongard wes aduertist rebellioun britonis comandit thair pledgis slane maist deligence assemblit ane army boundis vnder h empire come york quhair spreit na thyng affrayit abaid cumyng britonis pon morrow knawyng spyis ennymes wer within foure mylis rasit tentis come haistelie ennymes sycht quhilkis wer liand nocht far fra montanis humber nixt morrow dongard went ane hie mote said armye followis suld na admiration yow gud copanyeonis youcht britonis haue left ye feildis quhair thay suld haue fouchtin fled ye montanis humber thay bene sa febill ingyne nature yat howbeit thai mak gret bost mannassyng thay wer maist vailyeant aganis thair ennymes yit thair spreit curage sone dekeyis quhen thay se thair ennymes sycht dantit thaym afore ye haue experience facill britonis bene moue new trubill full wyndis vane behechtis ye knaw soft thay ar execute thair interprisis thay come w yi last day schynand armour wappynnis desyring battall thay wer haistelie inuaid w criand frequent vocis quhen sall oure ennymes cum quhare ar thay fled quhare ar thay hyde bot ar dent desyre battall foryet thay ar fled montanis discomfist onlie sycht nochtheles gyf thay retourn gyf yow battal traist nocht bot sicker victorie ye ar fecht aganis fals treasonabil pepil brekaris thair faith band youcht thair pissance sum part ekit yit thair curage na mair ereckit afore beleif ye constantyne quhylk brocht ane vncouth realme maid kyng brytonis may quickin curage spreit thaym ar geuyn onely bordellis sensualiteis surfet nurysyng thair wambe accustomat afore ye iunyng battallis fle beleif ye yt yat may resist yow quhom thay haue found sa oft victorious traist fermely gud companyeonis houndis ar nocht sa dreidfull haris wolffis ye schip visage thaym noc asit thir arrowis dartis anycis othir munitionis se thair army becaus ye samyn may nocht vsit strenth body craft ingyne quhylk nocht amang fayis sen ennymes bene febyl effeminat sonis sic ordinance salbe mair impediment thaym proffit quhen thay fle le haistely cassyn fra thaym nochtheles beseik yow haif na le sicht materis pertenand ennymes self gif ye intend fecht pa nocht fra disciplyne cheualry gyf ye happin follow chace ennymes war yat ye follow array ordoure aduenture gif ye stragill fra fallowis ye fall pray vincust ennymes gret dishonour schame pa forthwart lusty gallandis assailye gif brytonis decide richt battall swerd pa forth wart trew knychtis quhome dekeyit neuir manheid wysdome pyssance pand knaw well ye sal condingly reward nobyll vailyeant men maist rich punis febyll cowartis torment schame skarsly th orison endit quhe britonis war sene descend arrayit battall planis pthan dongard gret curage spre arrayit army commandit na prisoneris spulyeis tane quhyll feild war clerely discomfist maist desyrit na gentyll suffer hym self tane cowartly prisoneir continent baith armyis iunit huge noyis clamoure confiderat pepyl assailyeit thair ennymes sic cruelte yat thay put baith ye
