wyngis flycht bot myddylward maid resistence quhare kyng constantyne faucht maist vailyeantlye prolongit battall kyng dongard ernystly beheld euery part quhare king constantyne faucht fynalye enkendlit hye curage sum notabyll vassalage richt desyrus sla kyng constantyne fury accumpanyit ane nowmer chosyn men ruschit fersly amang thickest preis britonis quhare fecht na le manheid cruelte deith falt support borne ground dynt speris slane becaus wald nocht tane mony scottis astonist suddane slauchter kyng tuke ye flycht otheris affrayit bot mair feirs rasit reuenge slauchter perseuerit contyne wall battall deith pychtis maner faucht gret manheid curage end battall yit vyctory vncertane quhill mydday ye britonis wer discomfist put bak vnhappy battall wer slane britonis xvim scottis pychtis xiiiim kyng dongard wes slane fyft yeir regne ye viii yeir leo emprioure fra incarnation iiiiclxv yeris hovv costantine first thrid brothir eugenius vvas maid kyng scottis vnhappy lyfe tyrany hovv constantyne kyng britonis vvas slane gile pichtis ca vii scottis pichtis wer sa brokin sorrowfull victorie thay micht nocht follow lang chace britonis returnyt hame ye body king dongard buryit funerall triumphe colmekill sone eftir ane conuention wes maid constantyne brodir doungard maid kyng sonnis kyng dongard wer tender age thay mycht nocht immediatlye succeid crown constantyne wes rycht discrepant fra ye maneris virtew brodir wes borne sensual pleseir yan ony gouernance ane realm wes ane rauisar virginis fulyear matronis gret nurisar fauorar detractour wes ay trist sorowfull amang nobillis come bot sendyll thair cumpanyis contrar reiosit schew hym triumphant prince amang fydlaris sangstaris siclyk men vile reputation youcht wes lik costantyne kyng britonis name yit far discordat fra hym maner constatine king britonis na le religio ciuyll gouernance recouerit realme britonis decorit notable maneris bot constantyne kyng scottis wes sa degenerat ignobill thyng semand ane kyng quhen nobillis desyrit hym reuenge slauchter kyng dongard brodir said knew weill eneuch quhat wes done cocerning publik administratioun nedit na ingyne bot awin beir chargis realme finaly gouernance maid folie patent gaue peace britonis small tretie ony consultatioun nobillis remittit nocht onlie tribute britonis bot randerit thaym sindry strenthis bordouris wes sindry thing importable thair comoun weill wer nocht nobillis withstude insolence tyme last quhen mater wes brocht sic poynt nocht apperit bot rebellioun aganis hym al partis dougall galloway ane man gret auctorite schew mony reasonis quhat infinite trubill wer appering cuntre gif wer inuadit domistik ciuill weris yan speciallye sen britonis he laitlie recouerit thair realme rysyng ilk day pissance hauyng ane yong prince richt fers desyrus glore reddy quhen saw occasion inuaid ye scottis pychtis battall atour britonis kepit neuir gud peace thair nychtbouris bot quhen thai dred thaym maist al pychtis wer ane pepill full slychtis inclinand ay quhair thay beleuit victorie follow bot costantyne kyng scottis wes bot ane effeminat glutoun luffit na virtew honeste bot onlye thaym wer geuyn yair sesualite lust wambe thus apperit nothir abill priuat publik administratioun thairfore ye ire seditioun yt wes amang thaym wes first mesit abid ane ganad tyme euery thyng may done wisdome pthe pepill obeyit thir persuasionis dougall howbeit mony yame wer variant thair opinioun rycht comouit realme wes sa mony yeris misgydit wickit tyrane pychtis seyng ye kyng scottis drownit vice maner ony signe virtew apperyng dred britonis suld incres thairthrow fers insolent inuaid thaym reuenge auld iniuris thairfore said pichtis tuke purpos thyng slycht thay mycht nocht e force instruckit certane men quietlie sla constantyne kyng britonis men wer subornat effect come britane wer haldyn natiue pepill thairof last thay come ye king court quhair thay vane assentationis subtell behauyngis gat sic familiarite kyng thay purchest credence sindry maist graue materis last watad thair tyme quhen kyng wes quiet thay come hym sum hie besynes wer done slew hym suspeck na thyng le thair treason kyngis gard herand rumissyng granis ane deand man ruschit haistely ye chalmer quhair thay fand ye kyng slane bullerand blude nochtwithstandyng brym furie thay followit sa fast thir pichtis thay wer baith ta kin cruelly put deid slauchter constantyne kyng britonis happinnit xv yeir constantyne kyng scottis quhilk lityl better fortoun othir constantyne kyng britonis wes slane ane gentil man ilis defowlyng douchter eftir yat gouernit scotland vnworthely xvii yeris pof kyng congallus administration hovv monk consta tiu vvas maid kyng britonis hovv vortigern slauchter said constantius tuke crovvn britane ca viii constantyne king scottis slane yi maner nepote congallus sonne king dongard wes maid king yi congallus wes man hie ingyne al abill weir peace yit ye beginnyng regne schew hym geuin halelye peace maid hym repare thyngis done necligence constantyne eme su gaif hym counsal reuenge ye slauchter fadir dongard nochttheles becaus wes bot ane young prince nocht stabillit empyre supersedit sic hie materis quhill ane tyme ganad occurrit finalie sic iustice throw al ti realme ye wes brocht gud tranquillite peace quhill congall wes geuin werkis iustice wyse uortigern ane man gret slycht autorite amang britonis tuk purpos conques crown bring purpos effect tuke constantius sonne constantyne kyng britonis afore rehersit relygyon quhare profest monk efter fader fand hym vnabyll regne assistence syndry gret princis brytane uortigern maid constantius kyng britane slycht cedit auarice uortigern traistyng becaus monk na experience warld mycht haue gouernance ye realme coques gret rich vnder empyre efter yat enrichit guddis distroy said constantius vsurpe crown britane yit couir slicht war geuyn allutterly common weill maid peace scottis pichtis causit ane hundreth scottis pichtis come london remane ane gard costantius haue body keping last quhen uortigern gaderit gret treasouris vnder empire constanti thocht tyme conuenient tak crown quietly seducit ane certane scottis pichtis gret soumes money sla ye king promyttit gif thay brocht mater effect reward thaym condingly thair laubouris scottis pichtis blyndit auarice geuand ouir haistely credence slew fynaly kyng constantius al sone uortigern knew kyng slane far abydyng end mater ruschit fersly secret chalmer quhare kyng lyand deid baith blude incontynent tuk slay aris kyng slew thaym haistely thay suld nocht schaw perswadit thaym sla kyng incontinent began lament kyngis slauchter na thyng war sa displesand hym kyngis deith deith mony infinit harmys sall haistely follow dammage commoun weill pincontinent uortigern socht resydew scottis pichtis partis town howbeit thay war innocent treason gart haue thaim strang presoun syne maid hym burye kyng pon morow come freindis fauouraris quhylkis war corruppit money stretis quhare mais confluence pepyll complanit treasoun scottis pichtis quhilkis slew king committit thair kepyng maid ye realm sa far yan e ane heid purpos apperit othir deuide britonis amang thaym self elli make al land vnder thair empyre falt ane kyng patent iniure ennymes heirfore gif odius cruelte war nocht condinglye punist mai displesouris sall follow haistely gyf mair may euersion thair co moun weill necessar war thairfore punis remanent scottis pichtis thay war na le criminall principall personis yat tane hym hait blud put deith quhen mouit pepil maist cruelte aganis thir innocent men tuk thaym pryson quhare thay war put thaym deith pthis punytioun maid scottis pichtis causit uortigern haldin amag ygnorant pepyl fader defendoure thair realme pnochtheles couer dissait h desyret thaym haue respect thair commoun weill suffer nocht ambrosius sonne kyng costantyne regne saying yocht richtuous ayre crown brytane yit sa febyll tender age infinite harmys sall follow realme ye empyre non age last quhen thay cocludit ye ambrose sall maid king vortigern demadit yame quho thay wald make kyng incontinent pepyll huge noyis clamour declarit hym king al sone uortigern maid kyng wyse stuffit al ye castellis strenthis london gret munitionis weirmen syne co mandit ane certane familiar freind quhome promouit afore rich honour wait hym nd incontinent set hym sla freindis lynage kyng consta tyne sum thaym vane causis banist otheris cofiscat thair guddis punist thair bodyis ye deith phovv ambrose vter sonnis kyng constantyne fled bertan e hovv gvvytell prince vvalis vvas slane scotti army discomf st ca ix throw feir thir cruelteis ambrose uter sonnes kyng constantyne come walis quhare thay war kepit vnder wyse p ceptouris fled bertanye mene tyme scottis pichtis war aduertist ye schamefull murdir yair freindis maid lo treason kyng uortigern impacient thairfore suffer iniure thay enterit haistely ane army brytonis landis inuadit samyn gret cruelte fyre swerde brytonis opprest thir afflictionis disparit support nocht power resist left thyngis behynd thaym mycht nocht tursit fled within ye cuntre uortigern herand thir cruelteis done pepyl knawyng gret hatrent nobyllis brytonis bure aganis hym persute aganis sonnis constantyne began nature ane tyrane haue ylk dredour becaus durst nocht ieoperde hym self battall send gwytell prynce walis ane army reuenge ye iniuris done scottis pychtis gwytell dreidand rewyne brytane gif scottis pichtis war nocht haistely repressit went forthwart wt army conuoyit samyn landis britane quhare ye scottis pychtis war gaderit array inuadyng cuntre syndry incursyonis incontinent displayit baner set sa haistely thaym thay war put flycht vc thaym tane quhame gart iustefy theuis confiderat kyngis mouit thir iniuris come ane new army maid britonis richt astonist nochtheles gwitel exhortit thaym battal saying scottis pichtis war ane pepyll mair accustumat reiffis slauchter wiffis harnis ony marcial dedis gettis na victory bot febyl myserabyll creatouris brytonis inflamit gret curage thir wordis went forthwart set yair tentis beside ye tent yair enymes followit tha frequent skarmyssing sumtymes syngular battallis betuix vailyeant men last baith armyis impatiet sustene athir iniur ruschit fersly togidder faucht lang tyme vncertane victory quhyl last ye middilward quhare cogallus faucht neir discomfist gallanus kyng pichtis faucht rycht wyng seand cofiderat brothir sic da geir come ane cumpany chosyn men maid ye britonis faucht fornens cogallus richt astonyst scottis youcht thay war neir vincust afore fra thai war supportit maner ruschit new curage thair ennymes fynalye put baith wyngis britonis flycht al sone pychtis saw victory inclyne scottis thay tuke haistely tentis brytonis suld na rescours thaym efter pthus war brytonis slane ony refuge partis quhare thay fled war fynalye randerit scottis pychtis confiderat kyngis gaue spulyeis presoneris conquest tyme frelye amang thair army becaus thay faucht sa vailyeant lye day sic thyngis done confiderat kyngis went forthwart thair victorious army take remanent strenthis bordouris pin battal war slane twenty thousand brytonis gwytell prynce walis mony othir nobyll men britane bot scottis pychtis war skarsly iiii thousand slane phovv vortigern send ambassatour almany fe vvageouris support hovv hengest orsus come britane vvith x thousand saxonis thair cruelteis vassalage done aganis pychtis ca x brytonis efter present discomfitour conuenit quhare vortigern wes london aduise quhat craft ingyne dangerus battal led agan yair cruel ennymes efter lang consultation becaus na sicker way couth deuisit delyuer pepyl fra extreme dangeir appering kyng uortigern nakit counsall hauand sa mony scharp aduersarys baith hame feild tuk purpos depart britane sum vncouth realme nochtheles freindis thocht vnworthy yat suld pa fra hi souerane dignite hauand yit na experiece aduersite ane myrrour derision enymes best thairfore thay allegit assailye vter fyne materis mair honest hym vincust iust defence victorius wrangus action youcht vincust one battall yit na disperatioun suld follow thair rich gold sufficient brytane nocht dant thair ennymes chance battall bot al ding thaym albion quhare mycht thair sa plesand sa comodius sicht yair comon weil se ye cruel saxonis scottis pichtis fechtand distroyand othir liberte allanerly brytane nane othir way mycht cruelte thair ennymes best dantit uortigern apprisit counsall send ambassatouris money almany fe wageouris defend realme aganis ye scottis pichtis amang saxonis two brethir namyt hengist orsus dyscending anciant blude region richt vailyeant dedis armis desyrus na thyng mair glore honouris thir two brethir herand desyris ambassatouris tuke wageis come britane x thousand weil exerrit vailyeant men thir saxonis war mair plesandly ressauit uortigern baith self realme approchyng sa hie dangeir last quhen rewardit thaym money ryches causit comonis remane thair tentis nobillis remane nixt townis quhyll thay war refreschit thair trauell walkyng ye seis belyue two armyis war prouydit ane saxonis ane othir britonis come forthwart sic diligence yt thay war past humber euer scottis pichtis war aduertist ony cumyng saxonis britane scottis pichtis yat dwelt tyme britonis landis war suddanly affrayit cumyng saxonis becaus thay war nocht power resist sa huge army ane certane yame saif fit thaym self flycht remanet fel pray thair ennymes sa oni traistyng al thing ye better succeid gyf thay gat ye first blude slew prisoneris tane thaym tyme ony miseration estait age nocht content murdir maid scottis pichtis betuix humber tyne thay went mers pentland inuadit pepyll thairof gret cruelteis fyre slauchter traisting fra ye pichtis war brocht fynall exterminioun landis pertenand scottis mycht mair esy pray pichtis affrayit thir cruelteis send thair ambassatouris congallus kyng scottis desyring hym cum al power haist resyst thair ennymes quhylkis war nocht gadderit febyl brytonis bot maist cruel saxonis skarsly message maid scottis quhen tythyngis come brytonis saxonis arrayit battal war cumyn pentland puttand pepyl partis quhare thay cum heirschip slauchter kyng pichtis impacient suffir thir iniuris assemblyt pepyll maist diligence met ennymes aduyse scottis hengist gouernour army vnder uortigern arrayit ye samyn sic maner inuadit ye pichtis iii battallis ani pthus war pichtis sa ouirset multitude ennymes yat thai war put flicht day maid ye saxonis mair reiosit tha britonis hengist beheld britonis fechtand day mair febilly tha ony othir pepyll ye caus tuke ferme purpos conques thair realme efter scottis pichtis war doung boundis brytane secund message send pichtis scottis hovv scottis pichtis faucht aganis ye saxonis britonis vvar discomfist ca xi pichtis brokyn maner send thair secund message cogallus desyryng haisty support aganis ye saxonis quhen thir ambassatouris schawin congallus cruelteis done saxonis britonis thay desyrit hym nobillis suffer nocht pichtis thair auld confiderat freindis distroyit thair cruell vnmercifull ennymes aduenture thay brynt sone eftir fla mys quhilk ye pychtis ar presentlie consumyt congallus mouit comiseratioun ye trubil fallyng confiderat freinds pychtis seand truble le wer resistit approching haistelie scottis comandit fensabill men within realme meit hym south part wod calidon xx day eftir twa monethis vittallis vnder pane deith edict gaderit xlm men strang weil armyt deuise come sone eftir ennymes sycht hauand hym confiderat freindis ye pychtis al sone army saw yair ennymes nowmer ordinance euir thay saw afore thay fled sindry partis eschew present dangeir confiderat kyngis send incontinent thair capitanis tak ye flearis quhilkis wer apprehendit put deith iebattis exempill otheris thair fleyng thir punitionis dredour fleyng scottis army wes set asyde al sone hengist saw confiderat kyngis sycht exhortit army fecht saying speciall fauour goddis wes arrayit fornens thaym pepill quhilkis wer sa lang petual ennymes britane quhair throw thay mycht haue sufficient occasion reuenge auld iniuris conques baith thair rich landis thair pleseir na peril wes dred materis behuuit succeid gret felicite becaus yai wer fecht thair gud actioun aganis ane fals wrangus peple famous theiffis reuaris inuasouris vncouth realmes ye victory sa far ony cognosance lang experience battall thair fayis suld nocht fail gif bakkis al sone thay feill preis violence saxonis britonis ye victorie thairfore mon quhair goddis he ordant hengist thir wourdis inflammyt ye myndis saxonis gret rage cruelte aganis thair ennymes britonis ereckit curage exemple saxonis desyrit battall tothir syde confiderat kyngis ceissit nocht mony plesand persuasionis exhort thair folkis battall sone eftir baith ye armyis iunyt quhen suddanlie come thaim frequent schouris arrowis ganyeis schot euery side incotinet thay ruschit togiddir scharp swerdis speris byllis maist hatrent bot yit na party semyt haue victorie quhill last britonis ye faucht ye rycht wyng aganis ye scottis wer put flycht suddanlye come ane huge schoure haill obscurit air sic terrible cloud mirknes bene nycht throw quhilk baith ye armyis wer sa astonyst yat yai knew nocht quhedir wes best fle follow hengist astonist vncouth wounder gaderit folkis sound trumpat standart schoure ceissit quhen scottis pichtis traisting yair ennymes vincust fell chace britonis array maid slauchter spulye thair maist furie hengist seand britonis vincust cofiderat pepill geum spulye slauchter page missing rum togiddir array confiderat kyngis put remeid thir impedimentis curage spreit yair army suld dekay lang tary comandit ilk man wyn al mony scherettis ground mycht beir mak ane gait throw mo assailye thair ennymes sic thyngis done confiderat kyngis rasit thair tentis maid thaym reddy battall aganis nixt morow beleuing yat micht nocht inuaid tentis ennymes extreme dangeir thay come throw mo ane quiet gait ane hill stude aboue yair ennymes sum thaym stude ye face hill yat thay micht cast doun cragis stanis amang oist futmen strenth hyl gaif gret curage folkis assail e sic thyngis thay beleuit mycht array thair ennymes ast seyng saxonis britonis wald nothir ische fra thair tentis yit gyf signe battall iune thay deuisit ane new vncouth slycht astonis yair ennymes ye nycht following thay brocht ane huge multitude face hyll fornentis thair ennymes becaus yi haddir nature dry tak sone fyre yai maid sindry faggottis thairof eftir yat thay put thaym fyre thay slang thaym ouir hill incontinent thir faggottis wer dreuin preis wyndis amang ye tentis ennymes quhilkis gret terrour wer effrayit stra stikkis quhare thay lay tuke fyre brint infinit pepill thair army tha rais ane huge nois clamour sum dredyng ye hid watcheing ennymes ran haistely defend ye trinchis yair tetis otheris maid yame slok ye flamis ay incressyng preis wyndis finalie faggottis fell sa fast heuin blesand togiddir flamis na man wist quha wes done throw rei men beist quhilkis ane gret multitude wes thair tentis throw feir lowe smouk vnder nycht capitanis wes sa trubillit thay concludit erar assailye thair ennymes extreme ieoperdyis battall cowartly brynt ye deith incontinent thay ischit fra yair tentis past arrayit battall planys hengist seyng folk mycht nocht weil haldin within thair tentis gaderit saxonis sound trupat standart abaid cumyng day scottis pychtis traistyng thair ennymes brokin effray left ye strenth quhair thay stude come arrayit planys reddy gyf battall bot quhen thay fand thair ennymes gud array thay supersedit thair purpos quhill cumyng day morow congallus exhortit folkis consider quhat glore honour bene coquest virtew forcy dedis thair eldaris desyrit thaym obscure thair recet sleuth ye fame sa nobill campionis prayit thaym keip honour yat thair eldaris wan think na thyng wes sa schamful gyf backis yair ennymes thirllit yok seruitude na thyng wes sa honest othir haue victorie thair eldaris afore elli fecht glore manheid deith hengist maner ceissit persuade army pa forth war wt hie curage distroy yair ennymes quhilk bead done thay micht reiose residew thair dayis ony dangeir weris skarsly wer yir word said quhe baith ye armyis iunit ye first metyng baith ye saxonis britonis bene discofist wer ane buschemet iiim fresche men come haistely ane wod quhare thay wer hid hengist yair support thir fresche come wt gret noyis clamour ye bakk scottis thus wer confiderat pepill inuadit euery syde thair gret terrour yit ye truble arrais yat euery ane yame wes impedimet othir ye weilding thair wappinnis followit diuers chancis fortoun ye pichtis souerane manheid put ye britonis ye faucht fornent yame flicht seuerit sic furious rage chace aganis yame ye mony britonis wer dreuin eschape thair cruelte ye nixt riuer quhair thay perist otheris tane ye gait war slane bot ye scottis quhilk war inuadit th aithir side saxonis eftir lang seuerance battall wer finalie vincust slane cogallus euyl woundit brocht feilde freindis nixt montanis saxonis eftir victory scottis tuk purpos sew pichtis thay vincust said britonis nochtheles cumyng nicht thay supersedit yair purpos ye morow thir pichtis dreidand inuadit saxonis morow gaderit thair cofferis cartis wanis othir thigis quhilk mycht weil tursit ye tyme put yame fyre yt fume reik thairof mycht obscure ayre quhill thay war past dangeir sic thyngis done ye pichtis returnit hame ye residew scottis quhilkis wer eschapit feild phovv hengist vvas maid protectour britane hovv brocht son occa vvith xm saxonis resist armyis ambrose vter hovv vortigern come ane baket vvith hegist mariit roxena doucht ca xiiii hengist efter syndry chancis victory fallyn last feild began nowmer army fand confiderat pepyl fled iiiim saxonis slane syne returnit ye residew yairof york comandit yame reddy resist yair ennymes gif ony new trubyl apperit incontinent returnit london take consultation uortigern noblis quhat done concerning ye weris scottis pichtis tymes cumyng puortigern ressauit hym gret reuerence honoure proclamit hym protectour realme pepyll power auctorite vse al townis strenthis rich thairof pleseir sine comandit publict playis maid throw ti britane general procession geif louyng god excellent victory fallyng hym aboue ennymes entrete hengist mair pleseir gaif hym pepyll lycence make adoratioun ydolis efter maner gentilis ye mene tyme schawin uortigern ambrose uter ye sonnis kyng constantine war makand gret puruiace bartanye recouer ye crown britane thir tithingis maid uortigern affrayit ane phecy suld slane ambrose nochtheles inquirit hengist quhat ingine power micht best resist army ambrose hengist glad trubyl promyttit tyll resist army ambrose uter gif wald suffer ye saxonis quhilkis dwelt york schire cu see camp fornens france castellis strenthis cuntre deliuerit folkis mycht mair esaly resist ambrose uter quhen thay landit al sone thir petitionis war grantit hengist desyryng na thing mair haue ye britonis vterly distroyit yair realme mycht fall pray hym saxonis instruckit ane man almany bene ane britone cum uortigern dissimilit wordis saying laitly cumyn fra petland quhare saw na thyng bot knychtis schynyng armour trumpattis soundyng gold stremaris reflirand aganis schortly pepyll regioun reddy maist weirly sort cum haistely britonis almane subornat wise said hegist thair ane c young vailyeant men scottis sworne ane mynd distroy na sicht yair lyuis sa thay mycht bring thair purpos effect thay held hym pyllar britonis syndry thir personis wer cumyn ye tyme london execute thair myndis thairfore na place mycht souir hym bot quhe beleuit leist sum thir men sworne effect foresaid sal wair yair lyuis hym yocht eschape ane force abyde chance residew becaus scottis pichtis traistis quhen slane delyuerit trubyll uortigern astonist fenyeit slycht demandit hengist quhat done hengist apperit richt effrayit maner nochtheles syndry saxonis quhilkis war instruckit ye said hengist prayit uortigern gud comfort youcht war inuadit euery syde ennymes suld souir saxonis defend hym al weris ye confiderat pepill quhilkis he prouyn ye chance battall fechtand vnhappely aganis w sal neuir attipt ane thing mair thair damage tha inuaid thy pepyll iniuris prouoke w agane battall gif ambrose uter come beleuit huge pepyll south partis realme siclike confiderat pepyll intendis north partis thairof sal occa ye sonne hengist quhilk ane vailyeant knycht exercit cheualry sen first youth cu ane new band saxonis throw quhilk thow salbe souir fra inuasion may follow thy realme occa sall resist scottis pichtis north orsus ye army cumyng ambrose bertanye hengist sall remane ay thy self keip thy body fra treason britonis gif ony yame fauour ambrose wald pretend ony rebellioun aganis thy auctorite quhilk way thow sall haue mery dayis ony feir ennymes uortigern knawig na othir way apperand dant ennymes partis becaus mony noblis britane haitit maneris maid gret instance hegist send sonne occa cum haistely britane ane band saxonis resist ennymes hengist wirk purpos dissimilit mynd slicht maid hym withstand kyngis desyre saying damage haue baith hym self sonne sa far distant fra ye gouernance landis possessi nochtheles lang instance othir britonis quhilkis war mair set ye kyngis foly pleseir tha ye comon weil condiscendit desyris within dayis efter occa arriuit britane xm saxonis sat northumberland wyffis barnis reddy fecht aganis pepyll lyst inuade thaym hengist knawing cumyng sonne new army saxonis desirit king uortigern cum se wife child frendis quhilkis war reddy al seruice chargis wald command said suld rais army gret curage gif wald ye honoure decore thaym presence uortigern richt glad ye cumyng new band saxonis condiscendit desyris beit mony nobyllis war richt heuy tuke na lytyl suspitioun sa huge nowmer saxonis war cumyn britane aganis yair comon weill fynaly uortigern come ane certane nobillis towquha castel quhare plesandly ressauit feistit maner delytis plesouris micht deuysit hengest set hym prolong banket within nycht yt kyng mycht takin ye wynis incotinent roxena ye douchter hengist scho instruckit went kyng ane coupe ful mychty wyne said drink ye kyng uortigern drank mychtely coupe quhen embrasit hir armis set hir nixt hym self banket efter lang co monyng fel blind raige lust quhilk thing nocht onely occasion efter adultry bot al tine kingdom incontinent throw birnad flame new lust nothir respect law god yit law matrimony afore contrackit lauchfull wife mair delay tuk said roxena wife syne gaif hengist ye landis kent castellis w munitionis pertenyng thairto sone efter saxonis sat samyn yair wiffis childrin put auld inhabitantis thairof sic thingis done uortigern returnit new quene london repudiat lauchfull wyfe phovv vodyne bischop london vvith mony preistis vvar slane tyranny saxonis hovv hengist maid self kyng kent hovv vortigern vvas depriuit vortimer sonne maid king britane ca xv vodyne byschop london ane singular deuotioun life aduyse uortimer went familiarly uortigern schew yat done ane cristin price departing fra lauchfull quene takand ane othir woma wife quhais fader hengist duke saxonis baith ennyme cristin faith set delyuerit mynd conques crown britane said sen sa done suld sone haue experience quhat damage suld follow pepill nocht onely euersion ye cristin faith britane bot al translation nobyll realm britane quhilk brocht hail vnbroki vnder mony nobil pri ci day ane vncouth blud said uortigern haue failyeit nocht prudent quhe brocht saxonis first brytane support aganis ennymes first begynnyng foly bot semit mair imprudent quhe tane immoderat lust doucht roxena knaw weill end empire salbe terribyll bot gif offence mair haistely reparit god yairfore sa far may sall put remeid thairto hengist heirand ye sound lamentabyll regrait come sectet chalmer quhare repreuit hym quhy maid sa heuy cheir tyme mariage persuasioun ane prophane man fenyeit lyfe incontinent slew haly man uodyne mony othir preistis relligious sonis hym tyme attempt ane thing audacite seirchit uortimer ye deith uortimer knawyng euyl mynd aganis hym fled quhare thocht expedient ye mene tyme hengest send secrete writingis sonne occa comandyng hym abstene fra ony forther iniuris scottis pichtis suffer thaym peciably reiose landis beyond tyne prouiding always yt strenthis betuix tyne humber weill garnist vitallis forthir comandit hym seik sum occasion quhare throw micht sla al noblis ye cuntre quhare haue sic respect ye comon weill saxonis ye britane micht cu sumtyme vnder yair empyre occa knawing ye mind fader tuk first york mony othir strenthis munitionis ye cuntre fader deuysit slew mony noblis baron fenyeit causis quhen accusit uortigern quhy dyd sic cruelteis noblis answerit instruckit fader yt thir noblis quhilkis hym war slane wer ennymes ye king becaus saxonis mair reuerence tha britonis yir noblis intendit haue raderit york mony othir gret strenthis munitionis brytane scottis pichtis wer put remeid mair haistely yairto al boudis britane geuyn keping suld haue bene gouernit prudently gif ye samyn bene purgit fra inuasouris thair co mon weill sic doingis suld cu efter baith ye gret proffet ye king honour realme cruelte saxonis ylk day mair incressing aganis ye britonis maid uortigern na lytyl comouit mair yt considerit yame dayly seikand occasion conques realme quhe could find na sicker remeid aganis ye said dangeir began drery contenance deplore mysfortoun sum familiaris gaif hym counsall dant cruelte saxonis quhill mycht pley aduenture britonis brokin yair iniuris war brocht sic calamite yt thay mycht nothir haue sufficient pyssance distroy thair ennymes yit defend thair realme kyng uortigern hauand britonis na le suspition tha saxonis becaus odius yame baith supersedit attempt yi gret mater certane dayis pin mene tyme ye britonis brokin intollerabyll iniuris sustenit mair cruelteis saxonis euer thay sufferit afore ony othir pepyl pand aboue thir skaithis followit othir syndry outtragis mair odius importabyll thaym hengist left kyng uortigern come ye resydew saxonis kent generall edict chargit al britonis pa samyn within ane schort day vnder ye pane deith pthe day byrun slew baith commonis nobyllis ony fauoure mercy ransoun yat ganestude command al wayis saxonis enragit sic inhumane cruelteis yt kirkis sanctuaris kent war suspendit crystyn blude nunnis religious weirmen war tane force thair abbayis constranit mariage pollutioun thair bodyis lordis britane commouit thir sorrowfull iniuris maid ane conuention london quhare thay repreuit uortigern put saxonis secret counsall knawyng thaym bot ane hethyn pepyll leuand efter lawis gentilis nocht brocht brytane beir gouernance realme bot onely sustene weris aganis thair ennymes pattoure thay schew vnprudent sa far enrychit ye saxonis landis rentis auctoryte dystructioun realme legis nocht onely repudiat wyfe bot aganis institutionis crystyn fayth maryit ane woman quhylk ryte gentylis fynalye becaus deseruyt haterent god syndry abhomynabyll cruelteis fallyn realme foly necligece exponyng baith thair pepyll common weil extreme dangeir thay degradit hym auctoryte send hym walis quhare remanit mony yeris efter prysoun thay suld nocht without ane heid yai maid sonne uortime kyng phovv scottis pichtis vvar confiderat vvith kyng vortimer aganis saxonis discomfist occa northu berland hovv hengist occa vvar vincust kent doung britane hovv kyng vortimer vvas slane poison ca xvi uortimer maid king th maner thocht na thing sa honorabyll inuade saxonis ennymes god strang battal ye samyn mair felicite send ambassatouris ye confiderat kyngis quhilkis ye saxonis maist hatrent schaw yt iniuris done thaym saxonis procedit kyng uortigern ony aduyse nobyllis pfor yocht saxonis war enrichit ladis rentis uortigern yit al ye noblis brytane war ennymes thaym knawing yair myndis set vter euersion thair realme lyberte apperis weil yair cruel dedis excercit laitly na le blasphematioun god tha martyrdome crystyn pepyll becaus yir mony othir importabyl cruelteis wer cumyn necligece uortigern assister yair opinion ye noble he degradit auctorite maid vortimer son kig forthir yai schew uortimer he maid gret ordinace battal expel ye saxonis albio desirit yair fore ye cofiderat king set asyde iniuris concur yame resist ye comon trubyl appering al ye pepil albion mittit gif yai wald support ye britonis extreme dangeir geif ye landis beyond hu ber ony pley tymes cumyng thair perpetual empyre consent nobyllis comonis britane congallus kyng scottis heirand thir offeris said thir ambassatouris vnderstude weill quhat dangeir ye realme britane stude treason saxonis ennymes cristyn faith richt sory thairof knawing na thyng bett gif thay war nocht resisti tyme ye catholik faith suld expire britane yocht ye britonis he bene gret ennymes pepyll yit maik labour manifest baith ye comon weil britane heil cristyn faith suld rais army concur thaym aganis saxonis ye deith swa peace war ratifyit sic maner amang thair pepyll debaitis micht ceis landis beyond humber neuer reclamyt tymes cumyng britonis thir ambassatouris beand depeschit siclyke answere pychtis returnit vortimer bad peace ratifyit sone efter amang ye britonis pichtis scottis incontinent thay ruschit al togidder harnes aganis saxonis scottis picht come maist hatrent aganis saxonis dwellyng betuix humber tyne quhen thay war inuadyng thir saxonis maist cruelteis culd deuisit thay persauit occa cummand displayit baner aganis thaym occa seand ennymes appeir sic strenth multitud yt micht weil geif thaim feild wist quhat done nochtheles lang tary suld febyl curage folkis maid ane sygne soud trumpat iune first metyng equalye fochtyn sydis bot last saxonis hauand na pyssance resist sa gret preis ennymes fornens thaim began geif bakkis occa stoppit thair fleing sa far mycht sumtyme mynassyng sutyme respect honouris nochtheles ye feir deith mair pissant amang abasit pepyll ony charge capitane maid thair disco fitour richt patent occa seing nane vthir way saif lyfe fled mouth huber quhare gat ane bait come thamis nowmer personis scottis pychtis vsit vyctory gret cruelte saxonis saiffit nane perseuerit fechtand battal ylkane began exhort othir follow fast ye chace thay mycht reuenge cruelteis sa mony yeris done thir saxonis alwayis gret nowmer saxonis war slane ye battall bot mair nowmer thaym chace mene tyme uortimer rycht desyrus recouer lyberte realme rasit baner croce commandit crystyn pepyll follow thus gaderit ane army lxxx thousand men al weil preistis relygyous men temporall estaitis ye samyn slew xm saxonis gat sa huge victory thaim kent schire mony othir boundis adiacent war recouerit brytonis landis lyand betuix tyne humber restorit scottis pychtis phengist occa come feild resydew thair vincust army fled northumbirland purpos remane yair quhil new power come thaym almany nochtheles thay war doung thay bou dis scottis pichtis chasit mouth humber quhare thay fand schipp returnit certane nobyllis samyn blud saxony kyng uortimer sa mercyful efter yi victory yt brocht lityl cruelte remanent saxonis bot sufferit thaym returne yair awin cuntre otheris quhylkis war bot commonis war sufferit remane kent thair wyffis childrin lauboure land vnder seruytude britonis roxena douchter hegist sufferit becaus scho child remane ye toure london certane keparis wait hir uortimer set hym purge realme al heryseis brocht saxonis repare kirkis laitly bet thaym sindry britonis war constranit cruelte saxonis make sacrifice ydolis mony thaym fell agane herysy pelagius purge sic arrouris war send brytane france twa haly byschoppis germanus lupus desyre kyng uortimer fynaly brytonis war found repugnant gud religioun war othir slane banist realme sa mony wald nocht abiurat reuoik thair arrouris war brint uortimer recouerand ye realm britane bringand samyn sicker faith leuit certane yeris efter richt plesand god subdittis bot last poysonit roxena otheris nobyllis brytane applauding hir opinion hovv britonis efter deith kyng vortimer fel gret disputatioun quhay suld kyng hovv vortigern vvas restorit crovvn britane ca xvii efter deith uortimer ane conuention maid londo quhare nobyllis tuke lang consultation quhiddir uortigern suld tane prysoun restorit auctorite honouris afore gif ye sonnis constantyne suld brocht bertanye succeid ye crown sen thay war maist natyue thairto su alliegit yt uortigern penitent offencis done hym aganis thair comon weill knawis lag exience quhat heuy damage iniuris he fallyn laitly pepyll h necligence vnbridillit lust alliegit sen ane prudet prince vnbrokyn trauell weiris suld restorit crown na thyng mair hatrent tha treason saxonis knew weil realme suld gouernit specially sic extreme dangeir apperit baith franchmen britonis saxonis thairfore maist abyl sustene thair chargis gif war sworne neuir admit ony vncouth blude brytane sustene yair weris inuade saxonis maner violence gif thay returnit albioun sonnis constantine brocht bertanye succeid crown britane thay semyt vnganand thairto thay war young experience cheualry nocht abil sustene sa gret chargis apperit tha agan yair enymes al partis ye frenchman quhilkis laitly coquest realme gallis callit france richt desirus conques realmes war cofiderat ye sonnis costantyne cu britane abiding bot sufficient occasioun inuade samyn siclike iniuris tytyll conques ye saxonis wald throw quhilk ye cummyng kyng constantinis sonnis britane na le suspitious ye cumyng saxonis otheris thocht rycht suspitius restore hym ye crown quhom thay afore degradit yair auctorite mycht happyn thay quhilkis war opinioun suld othir slane returnyng elli exilit ye realme bot yit last opinion reieckit vniuersal voc al noblis saying uortigern ane man peace desyre vengeance set erar amend offencis done aganis weill su dittis reuenge ony iniuris done hym nocht vnknawyng proffitabyl thay noblis war commoun weill quhilkis depriuit hym auctoryte gaif sonne uortimer mair abyl gouernance thairof pefter lang consultatioun uortigern tane pryson restorit gret triumphe crown nocht onely remyttit al offencis atrent quhylkis tuk aganis nobyllis quhen thay degradit hym auctorite bot al resauit thaym gret beniuolence rewardit thaym richely yair gud myndis phovv hengist occa returnit vvith nevv povver saxonis britane slevv mony noblis thairof tuk vortigern prisonere hovv vortigern vvas banist vvalis hengist maid kyng britane ca xviii uortigern efter restitutioun crown brytane garnist strenthis realme gret ordinance aganis quhatsumeuer aduentur mycht fall held strang bandis weirmen hym na le cost tha bene presently fecht enymes behad hym sa prudently baith nobyllis commonis wyst nocht quhat honour pleasour thay mycht hym nocht lang efter renewit p ace confiderat kyngis samyn maner maid afore kyng uortimer sonne quhyll uortigern geuyn sic materis tithyngis come hengist arryuit thames hauand hym sonne occa two brethir incredibyll nowmer saxonis dyd na iniuris offentis inhabytantis cuntre uortigern astonist ye damage appering pepil cumyng yir saxonis comandit nobyllis brytane meit hym haistely yair power kent withstand gist quhylk cumyn sa awfull army purposit othir subdew cuntre empyre elli put samyn irrecouerabyll heirschip quhais inhumane cruelteis beyng nocht haistely repressit na sicker lyfe mycht pepyll pryncis britane hering thir tithingis come haistely uortigern fensabyl pepyll vnder thair boundis hengist knawyng ye myndis britonis mouit extreme hatrent aganis hym thocht nocht expedient tyme ieoparde hym chance battall sen thay war delyuerit fecht defence thair realme lyberte deith mycht nocht haue victory large murdir pepyll thir reasonis set hym ye thyng slycht quhylkis mycht nocht force army send ambassatouris uortigern saying nocht cumyn britane defraud gud sonne uortigern crown britane mai dete precius hym ony othir thyng erd yit set defraud youg infant gottyn roxena h douchter bot erar support thaym baith punis thaym yt slew nobyl prince kyng uortimer poison attoure aduertist afore cumyng almany yt gud sonne uortigern brocht sic infirmite lang incarceratioun mycht nocht leif ane yeir yairfore cu myng kepe young nepote vndefraudit crown britane forthir gif yir materis war plesand ye britonis suld haistely returne agane almany elli remane quhare thay plesit sa yt thay wald suffer army cum kent nocht reiose ye landis thairof bot allanerly recouer ye gudis quhilkis thay left behynd thaym thair departyng forthir desyrit kyng uortigern gif war plesand assigne ane day place interco moun thir hiear materis concernyng perpetuall amyte kyndnes peace betuix saxonis britonis gif thay list set day suld cu yair sa mony thay thocht neidfull armit vnarmit thair pleseir quhen ye nobyllis tane consultation certane dayis quhethir thir desiris hengist suld repulsit nocht thay war deuydit syndry opinionis mony thaym lang experience knew weill falset slichtis beleuit nocht bot treason hyd vnder dissaitfull wordis thairfore thocht samyn refusit otheris dreidand ferocite manheid saxonis thocht thair realme ouirbro yn weiris suffer ony new affliction thairfore concludit meit gyle falset siclyk slychtis hauyng na confidence wordis bot laboure maist craftely caus hym depart britane amyte freindschip spare nothir labour expen bring purpos gud fyne gif wald na way depart wt beniuolence inuaid hym maist cruelly dyng hym thair boundis perforce deuysit effect ane cupany maist forcy vailyeant men haldyn reddy aganis quhatsumeuir adueture mycht fall quhyl thay saw quhat purpos fyne mynd delyuerit ye metyng uortigern hengist intercomoun hie materis deuysit thay thocht honest sa kyng uortigern hengist met fra yair armyis equale cumpanyis sydis wappynnis mony ye noblis condiscedit last opinio traisting fra hengist ressauit guddis left behynd hym kent last departyng yat suld depart britane pleseir yit syndry othir pryncis britane mycht nocht satifyit yair mynd suspeckand ay sum hyd treason vnder thir desyris hegist becaus cumyn britane sa awfull power nochtheles x day efter fynaly set hengist uortigern baith sworn cum allanerly xxx maist noblis baith yair armyis ony swerd dagere thair cumpany intercommoun materis ye effect foresaid place quhare thay couenit far fra salisbery ane hyll callit ambry quhen thay war cumyn ye samyn deuisit hengist ylk saxon ane dagare hyd vnder sleif sla noblis britane quhen thay saw ganand occasion quhen thay war yair maist ernest comonyng hengist maid ane signe ye saxonis thay ony tary slew nobillis britane come conuention except ane namyt heldolus quhilk pullit ane dagger fra ane saxoun samin slew sindry saxonis deliuerit hym self yair hand treasoun kyng uortigerne wes takin brocht schamfully ye army saxonis hengist deliuerit maner al feir ennymes come kent remanet britonis rycht astonist cuming eftir petuous lamentation slauchter yair nobillis maid yame maist hatrent reuenge ye samyn nocht le seand na man able tak yi charge hand thay supersedit yair purpos retournyt hame gret displeseir uortigern traisting dayly de mannassyng saxonis deliuer hym self present dangeir randerit hengist mu tionis strenthis realme huge treasour gold siluer copositioun ranson quhen wes deliuerit bondage way past ye residew britonis thair wyffis childrin walis quhair pepil discendyng ye britonis blude mony yeris eftir succedit remanent landis britane yeid vnder empyre saxonis ye vailyeant dedis hengist schawin almany causit ane multitude pepil cum britane greter noumer afore comonis wiffis childrin inhabit ye land throw quhais cumyng hengist grew sic pissance britonis wer na power copair saxonis britane hengist seand uortigern put fra ye crown banist walis thocht best stable crown hym set ane conuentioun saxonis lodon maid hym self king syne comandit cuntre neuir callit tymes cuyng ye realm britonis bot ye realm saxonis ye realme wes callit hengist land pepill hengistmen bot corruptioun langage realme callit inglad ye pepill inglishmen samyn decreit wes co mandit yt na britonis suld found walis within xx dayis eftir proclamatioun vnder pane deith siclik yt na suld leif ye faith crist ony cerymoneis efter rite crystyn pepyll vnder ye samin pane day byrun gret murdir punicioun maid al yame war repugnant proclamation platis war slane ye alter kirkis brint bede sayis baith ye publict priuate housis war bet ground tyranuy saxonis yit yair ane othir thing mair miserabyl yame al thir calamiteis sa far enragit ye cruelteis saxonis yt na men durst bury ye cristin pepil mony miserabil britonis war takin ye montanis seikand thair fude ransoun fauour mercy slane otheris fled cuntre otheris baid styll britane amang desertis montanis samyn ay feir thair ennymes phovv vortigern demandit prophete marlyne end lyfe marlynis ansvver hovv ambrose vter come vvalis brint vortigern vvith sonne rich ca xix al sone saxonis conquest britane maner thay garnyst strenthis thairof al ti men munition vittallis vsit cursit ritis paganis aberand fra ye cristin faith makand odoratioun ydolis thay wer institute yair first errouris throw quhilkis kirkis sum tyme reuerence amang cristin pepill blude yair cursyt sacrifice wer defowlit thair ennymes suld inuaid thaym vnprouisitlie thay laid ane strag garison armit men en bordouris partis thair realme brocht ilk day new pepil almany expel ye scott pychtis ye landis yt lay betuix hubir tyne uortigern spulyeit croun seing ennymes multiplie baith hame feild siclik saxonis franche men haitit hym na le britonis wes sa disparit corruppit life yat beleuit na support god yit othir mortale creaturis recouer realme thairfore set ingyne haif knawlege thingis cum response phettis vse disparit pepill extreme dangeir refuge incontinet brocht afore hym ane prophet namyt merlyne inquirit hym quhat suld end empyre lyfe merlyne wes gottin fame wes conmixtion ane deuill forme man ane lady britane wes lernit wichecraft rais wekit spretis familiar comonyng yir narrationis knew mony thingis cum al sone vortigern brocht yi merlyne afore hym inquirit quhat suld end wer gyf mycht recouer crown britane finalie quhat suld ye end son hym self gyf ony blude suld regne behynd hym britane gyf mycht haue ony skaith wer ambrose franchemen merlyne answerit pertlie thir petitionis baith vortigern h childrin within schort tyme suld vincust ambrose uter sonnis constantyne suld brynt treasour gudis prophecy merlyne wes weill prouin end empire sone eftir ye said ambrose uter come bertanye walis ane army reuenge slauchter kyng constantius yair brothir quhilk wes slane dissait said uortigern al sone uortigern hard thair cuming assemblit ane gret power hauand na confidence prophecy come arrayit oist aganis ambrose uter left behynd hym son treasour ane castell walis traistyng gyf suld peri mair honest de fechtad battall aganis ennymes ony othir wayis skarslie wer armyis iunit quhen mony yame faucht ye first wyng uortigernis army come ambrose thus succedit victorie ambrose ony straik uortigern seyng army vincust raif h coit armour faucht incredible costance fyne mycht haue deit amang comonis escheuit ye fatall necessite deith quhilk wes schawin hym afore prophecy merlyne nochtheles wes brocht ye feild freindis hope better fortoun ye samyn castell quhair sonne treasoure wes left afore battall ambrose hauand victorie wyse followit uortigern beltit ye castel strag sege howbeit mycht tak haistlie yit yt army suld nocht dangeir throw lang tary brocht mony huge sillis treis nixt wod syne fillit fowsis trinchis ye said castel samyn eftir yi kest birnand faggott gret multitude treis within castell throwe quhilk fyre grew sa bald ye castell wes within brynt wes resoluit powdir accordyng prophecy merlyne pof syndry illusyonis dissaitis euyll spretis ca xx declare quhat phete bene yi merlyne gottin fame wes ye deuill gif sic generatioun possible nature man tenis litill ye purpos quhilk tuke hand nochtheles becaus haue fallin comoning sic detestable couersation deuillis nature man writ su thingis yat happinnit nocht lang afore makyng buke yeir god imiiiiclxxxvi yeris certane marchadis wer passand betuix forth flanderis quhen haistelie come sic ane thud wynd yat sail mast aikillis wer blawin brym throw quhilk schip beleuit nocht bot sicker deith patroun thairof astonist sa huge vncouth tempestis aganis season ye yeir becaus wes sanct barnabyis day quhen seis apperis calme rageand traistit ye samyn erar cumin illusioun deuil ennyme man violence weddir mene tyme ye voce wes hard ane woman ye schip wariand hir self ye instant hou scho wes conuersit ane deuil ymage ane man schew deuill vsit hir yat mane mony yeris afore thairfore besocht ye pepill cast hir seis hir deith remenant pepill schip mycht de sauit comand ye patroun ane preist w hir ye heuy cheir comandyng hir mak confessioun hir abhominable lyfe haue cofidence god quhais mercy synnis ar purgit quhen synnar he repentance teris quhen yi woman wes makand hir confessioun gret repentance preist sycht al ye pepill ane vglie cloud ane crak fyre eik flew schip fell doun ane vennomus stink seis incontinent tempest ceissit ye marchadis arriuit ye port quhair thay desirit ony forthir trubill yi time happinnit sic ane like exempill ane town gariach nocht fourtene mylis fra abirdene ane child gret bewte complenit ye bischop abirdene wes trubillit lang tyme ane deuyll forme woman apperandly fayrest creature euir saw lyfe quhylk come hym quhen durris wyndowis bene closit syne tistit hym voluptuous brasing hir plesoure departit ay brekyng ye day ony noyis yocht assailyeit mony wayis delyuerit hir yit couth fynd na remeid bischop astonist illusion comadit th youg child resort hym su othir placis mair feruet fasting prayer afore quharthrow mycht happin deuyl mycht vincust leif hym tymes cumyng bischop deuysit sa come efter young child delyuerit illusion ye maner nocht lang fra tyme happinnit ane thyng nocht vnlyke ye samyn illusioun land mar schawin w syndry yat saw samyn ane madin nobill blude excellent bewte efter scho refusit mariage mony nobyll men fell abhominabyll conuersation ye deuyl hir freindis seing hir wamb rise commandit hir schaw ye deflorar hir chastite quhome scho answerit yt ane lusty child apperit vsit cu hir nicht sumtyme ye day howbeit scho wist come departit hir freindis richt desyrus knaw maner scho reuelit war aduertist last madyn lay hir chalmer yt deflorar madin cumyn incontinent thay come huge licht torchis candellis bed quhare scho lay fand hir armis ane maist terribyl monstoure mony pepyl ran se ye sicht amang quhome ane preist gud lyfe spreit quhilk seing ye remanent pepyl astonist tuk na feir bot abaid styll redand euangyll sanct iohne namit principio quhen red verbum caro factum est deuyll flew away horribyll cry bure bed rufe hous hym thrid day efter woman delyuerit ane monstour mair terribyll visage euir sene ony pepyll afore meidwiffes brint samyn suld nocht remane dishonour hous becaus thir illusionis deuyllis war sene oure dayis haue collecket thaim buke reidaris may vnderstand sic illusionis deuyllis may forthir tuiching ye propheciis marlyn howbeit mony thaym verifiit dayis wyll leif thaym discussit theologis quhidder thay suld abrogat haue faith wyl stand content obey thair conclusionis writ furth vailyeant deidis nobyl men haue begun returne oure hystory quhare left phovv ambrose vvas confiderat vvith scottis pichtis hovv slevv hengist dang saxonis britane hovv tvvo systeris vvat mariit confiderat kyngis syndry haly men ca xxi efter deith uortigern ylk day come ambrosius mair confluence pepil throw quhilk sa strang ane army tuke purpos recouer realme ye samyn mair plesandly gat scottis pichtis becaus thay extreme hatrent aganis saxonis cofiderat hym mene tyme gret nowmer britonis come hym quhilkis war banist afore hengist amang scottis pichtis ambrose seing ylk day sa gret multitude pepyll cumand hym ane mynd recouer thair realme went ane hie mote quhare micht sene complenit treasonabill deidis uortigern aganis hous constatine damage britonis yair common weill lamentit huge cruelte saxonis done aganis god man throw quhilk enflammit pepyl sic desyre recouir yair lyberte reuenge iniuris done thaym thay ane consent war delyuerit follow baner aganis saxonis cause yair purpos mair stablit thay maid hym king britane fra incarnatioun god iiiiclxxxxviii yeris efter uortigern uortimer son rong xvii yeris britane ambrose maid kyng maner bega put pepyl sic ordour lernit ye weris france come forthwart displayit baner aganis ye saxonis vi day efter met hym loth kyng pychtis conrann lieutenand cogall kyng scottis ane gret army ambrose rycht glaid thair cumyng ressauit yame gret beniuolence promittit quhen micht haue oportunite recopence yair kindnes incontinent ambrose rasit tentis come thre battallis scottis pichtis britonis ane place mahesbel hengist thair ane army saxonis abiding thair cumyng quhill ye tea baith ye armyis war sta dyng thus athir sicht followit frequent preiking skarmussyng syngular battallis athir syde quhil last yai iunit togidder quhe thay fochtyn lang vncertane victory pepyll bertanye frenchemen fechtand aganis myddilward saxonis new ingyne practik battal dyd yame gret trubyll scottis pichtis brokyn bath ye wingis thair ennymes sic maner yat ye standartis britonis pichtis scottis war cumyn throw saxonis met togidder incontinent ye saxonis gaif backis hengist seing na way renew battall mon hors last man yt fled army ambrose seyng feild discomfist followit maist hatrent hengist ran hym throw body ane speir residew saxonis astonist slauchter fled occa sonne nixt montanis efter victory ambrose come victorius army london maid ye saxonis soudiouris quhilkis war left defend ye town sa affrayit quhen thay hard hengist slane army discomfist yt yai oppinnit portis fell kneis petuisly desyring grace ambrose put ane buschement armit men portis na suld depart quhyll tane aduisement quhat done incotinent past castell nobyllis quhilkis war left defend samyn hengist seyng hym cum victory wyse fell kneis afore hym said ye goddis he geuyn ye maist inuyncybyll prince licence punis w thy plesour becaus thy manheid fortoun inuinsibill nochtheles gif lefull yoldin miserabyll creaturis dei ckit extreme rewyne hatrent godd implore mercy grace afore ane victorius campioun quhen lyfe deid handis lawly beseikis ye happy victory fallyng strang battall richtuous prince realme suffir w thy benyng grace returne nakit wappinles scurgit wandis gyf thy pleasoure awin regioun gyf thow wyll condiscend thairto thow sall put memory maist honest victory aganis sa pyssant ennymes bot al thy mercy geuin desolate pepil ambrose mouit yir wordis wrocht na iniuris saxonis bot tuk castel sufferit yame pa hame thair guddis sone efter generall edict al fensabyl men saxonis wer comandit pa almany bot ye remanet baid styl labouraris ye ground cotent pay tribute ambrose ressaue ye cristyn faith efter victory al britonis yat war exilit syndry partis ye warld eschewyng tyranny saxonis returnit britane tha kyng ambrose comandit al kirkis reparit ye preistis religious men restorit yair liberte rowmes throw quhilk ye cristyn faith gret veneration throw ti britane ymageris ydolis put ydolis quhare thay war apphendit brokyn general processyon maid syndry dayis ye pepyl kirkis housis decorit flouris claythis arres tapestreis stretis resounding heuynly noyis melody maist delicius musik ye co solation reiosyng pepyll ambrose schaw beniuolence mair feruent cofiderat pepyll brocht loth king pichtis conrann gouernour scottis within london leuand thair armyis nocht far fra ye samyn feistit thaym certane dayis maner dateis mycht deuisit quhen rewardit thaim rich iowellis afferit commandit thaym assent nobillis honorit amang pepyll defendouris recoueraris realme sic thyngis done new peace maid betuix thaym vnder thir conditionis al landis liand beyond hu ber suld pa perpetual dominion scottis pichtis ony clame britonis tymes cumyng ye saxonis haldyn enymes thaym baith gif ye saxonis returnit ony part albion albianis equale mynd suld cocur togidder resist thaym thir coditionis peace wer better kepit affinite yt followit efter ambrose two sisteris quhilkis ye eldest namit anna maryit loth kyng pichtis youngest namit ada maryit conrann ye fyne yt albanis suld haldyn togidder vnder ane blud amite withstand saxonis ada partit child within two yeris efter scho come scotland deceissit sa ye affinite ceissit betuix ambrose conrann bot anna bure vnto loth kyng pichtis thre sonnis modreid walwane thamete sall efter schaw britonis scottis pichtis stude mony yeris gud amyte concord ony iniure ennymes mene tyme part saxonis quhilk wer sufferit remane vnder tribute tak crystyn fayth maid priuate sacrifice ydolis war brynt quhe knawin samyn tyme cogall kyng scottis vexit lag infirmite deceissit ye xx yeir empire buryit ye abbay co mekill tyme war mony haly syndry partis ye warld remigius byschop remens quhilk gaif ye sacrament bapteme clodouius king france clodouius biggit ane kirk sanct genouefa hallowar paris yai day war amang w colmane medane modane gret precheouris syndry britonis wer martyrit afore tyme albion cruelte saxonis throw quhilk mony yame fled scotland amang quhom patriciane ane singular deuotion quhilk eft bischop ye ile man deceissit ye tyme corannus quhilk salbe nixt history sa endis heir aucht buke thir cronyklis heir begynnis nynt buke croniklis scotland pof kyng conrannus hovv maid lavvis punis extorsionis hovv occa passentius arriuit vvith nevv povver saxonis ingland hovv thay vvar vincust ambrose ca primo congallus burii maner brodir conrannus wes maid kyng sonnis congall war sa tendir age thay mycht nocht succeid ye lawis afore rehersit yair namys wer eugenius conuallus kynuatill wer send nurist vndir wise preceptouris ye ile man conrannus eftir coronatioun na truble suld ryse amang legis ouir lang peace went throwe boundis realme executioun iustice punist mony cryminabill personis accordyng thair demeritis quhen wes passing throw ye cuntre wise wes aduertist sindry comonis wer sa opprest tyranny nobillis yat thay durst nothir coplene yit follow thair ctioun afore iustice thairfore yi nobill prince punis sic extorsionis done pepill comandit certane exploratouris pa throw al boundis realme serche quhair ony sic suspitius personis wer yat baith thair namys crymis writtin kyngis lls gif ony thir personis wer found criminabill eftir quhen thay wer accusit ye kyngis aduocat thay wer punist deith thus wer co monis mony yeris eftir deliuerit oppressioun nobillis maner iustice conterfaitit yit dayis said yat conrannus vsit quhen counsall sat ony part realme outhir psent elli ane wod huntyng nocht far fra yame mak officiaris ye auctorist quhen wes hutis athole far fra montanis granyebene slew ane hart lang chace fand ane huge multitude serpentis wambe ye gret admira io pepil ye hornis ane hart ar ane singular remede agan ye bit serpent chasis al vthir venim beistis quhil sic thyngis war done scotland ambrose kyng britonis fell ane dwynand seiknes namyt ethik feuir quhilk body wes pinit sa remeid medicyne mycht haue na rest wes disparit lyfe occa passentius ye sonnis hengist aduertist infirmite fallyng ambrose beleuit gif wer deceissit recouer ye realme ingland thairfore gaderit ane huge power support princis almany returnyt ingland yi tyme uter prince walis brodi ambrose wes gret doloure malady flure vehement thrist feuer throw quhilk britonis wes desolat apperit ony capitan sustene weris aganis saxonis nochtheles ane conuentioun wes set noblis auise quhat wes maist dagerus eftir lag consultatioun thay wer deuidit sindry opinionis ambrose seyng thair cotrarius vocis sa hie dangeir apperand realme tuke na solicitude infirmiteis bot causit hym self tursit apon ane litter betuix twa gret hors syne past forthwart aganis ye saxonis send ambassatouris solist scottis pychtis cofiderat freindis cum maist deligence samyn effect pbot afore thair cumyng iniuris cruelteis saxonis wer sa importable yat ambrose wes costrenyeit fecht thaym youcht wes maist vneis maledy yit laikit na thyng mycht pertene ane forcy campioun rais spreit army maist curage yair first ionyng britonis wer sumpart put abak gret slauchter maid yame nochtheles ambrose traistyng na thyng mair honest yan de gif yat wer chance amang vailyeat knychtis went ye army exhortyng thaym perseueir ythand battall remembir quhat excellent palme glore wes abidyng thaym gyf thay force armes dang yair ennymes deceissit defence thair realme liberte faith britonis rasit hic spreit curage wourdis ruschit maist furie battall finalie put thair ennymes flycht quhome followit ye britonis lang chace maid gret slauchter ambrose seyng nycht fast approche inhibit chace brocht army soud trumpat standart ye britonis duryng nycht stude arrayit battall morow thay partit spulye thairof rite armes yit quhen thay began nowmer thair army thay fand mair slauchter succedyng thaym saxonis howbeit thay victorie ambrose fyndyng army brokin wyse dred gyf ieoperd thaym ony forthir aganis saxonis na felicite follow thairfore skalit army tuke four monethis trewis saxonis occa aduertist scottis pychtis wald cum support ambrose send brodir passentius bryng ane new army almany sum auctouris sayis quhen passentius wes passad almany contrarius windis wes dreuin irelad quhair wagit ane huge multitude weirmen returnit thaim britane occa nochtwithstandyng yi strag army brocht britane cumyng brodir thocht ye chance battall aganis britonis rycht danger duryng empire ambrose yairfore instruckit ane saxon quhilk perfite language britonis sla ambrose saxon yt wes subornat h slaucht wes ane mok namit coppa fenyeit hym ane medcinare hauand remeid aganis maner infirmiteis last wes brocht kyng quhair lay gowntoun eftir lang comonyng promittit gyf kyng certane drinkis quhilk suld baith recouer heil deliuerit al maladie quhen coppa wes comandit ye kyng mak drynkis vsit first day bot delicious seropis maid soft spycis liquouris plesand mouth throwe quhilk gat credence vse eftir quhat drinkis e list pat last coppa watand tyme poyson ye king gadderit sindry herb inducyng men sleip meddillit ius thairof vennome quhilkis maid ane serop brocht ye samyn ye kyng saying drink sall mak conuales deliuerit al dolorus infirmite ambrose hauand na suspition tuke ye drynk wes comandit coppa tak rest fyne vennom mycht skail throw ye vanis body quhen fand kyng sleip comadit ye chalmer kepit ony noyis ye mene tyme stall away nixt wod quhare fand part saxonis waitand swift hors take hym away quhen ambrose vnhappy sleip skaillit vennom throw ye vanis body gaif ane litill sobe deceissit vii yeir regne body wes buryit abbay stenthend quhilk wes biggit hym afore inmemore ye nobill men yat wer slane treason hengist gret cruelteis done occa britonis hovv scottis pychtis vvar frustrat thair voyage gret meruelli sene albion interpretatioun yame marlyne ca ii ambrose deceissit haue schawin britonis maid sa huge lament deith ye saxonis wer aduertist yairof occa glaid thair dolorus cheir knawing deceis ambrose ye lang infirmite fallyng kyng uter na pissance britane resist aganis hym tuk purpos oppres britonis afore thay wer assemblit ye maist cruell maner mycht deuisit mony britonis abasit cruelte fled walis oth r fled scotland otheris remanit still britane thirlli seruitude plesour saxonis pin mene tyme ye scottis pychtis come strang army britane support ambrose expell saxonis samyn bot quhen thay wer aduertist ambrose deith wist gyf wer slane treasoun saxonis deuision britonis amang thaym self vnknawing quha wes freind fa yai returnyt hame gait thay come pat tyme wer sene mony vncouth meruellis albioun wer interprete merlyne gret terroure pepill ane firy comeit wes sene mony terrible bemes ane crownit dragoun wes sene birnand lift grene treis tuke suddand fyre brynt auld treis wer afore cuttit fra ground flurist bure leuis reueir thamys apperit bludy ane well sprang vp myddis yorke sic haboundance blud stretis wer repleite thairof kent ane child leuch motheris wambe thir meruellis interpretatioun merlyne causit britonis cum battal aganis saxonis merlyne interpreit yi comeit king ambrose crownyt dragoun uter brodir blude signifyit bludy swerd aganis saxonis ye fyre signifyit ye vter exterminion saxonis puter gaue sic credence yir interpretationis merlyne tuke crownyt dragon army bure birnand gold ane feild asure coloure lyft wes callit thairfore uter pendragon pepill hovv vter vvas maid kyng britonis hovv vvas discomfist saxonis chasit vvalis hovv saxonis britonis vvar agreit ca iii nobillis britane tuk sic persuasion merlyne prophecy thay come uter walis maid hym king sine co mandit pepyll reddy ane schort day pa saxonis kyng uter efter britonis war gaderit day prefixit gaif charge battall nathaliod ane vyle obscure lynnage mair familiarite tha virtew nobyllis britane tuke na lytyll indignation ane nocht perregall thaym lynnage pissance preferrit thaym honour dignite said kyng imprudet empire bead stabillit decore ane man small lynnage sa hie chargis thair contemptioun iugi thairfore gif sicker peace trubyl ennymes magnifye men small lynnage honour aboue yame yit becaus thair comoun weill approchyng hie dangeir thay put sylence sic materis counsall prudent men nathaliodus nochtwithstanding indignation yir nobillis aganis hym tuke peirtly ye charge wet forthwart proud baner aganis saxonis occa aduertist exploratouris quhat ye britonis intendit brocht forthwart army diligence followit sone ane battal richt vnplesand britonis gothlois prince cornewal impacient suffer nathal od pferrit hym cu ye feild oist left remanent army britonis reddy ressaue ye iniure ennymes thus war britonis fynaly discomfist occa nochtwithstading th discomfitour brocht army sound trumpat ye standert inhibit ony ferther chace maid britonis traisting gothlois fled onely slycht inuaid ye saxonis quhen saw occasioun gothlois seand ye britonis put flicht yt suld ane pray ennymes fled within ye nycht ye nerrest way mycht cornewal occa ye morrow seyng ye campe desert vnderstude ye britonis war discomfist send ane herald uter chargeing hym pa walis ye britonis vnder pane deith leif ingland quhilk conquest swerd inhibite hym saxonis uter reuoluyng dangerus doutsum renew battall aganis saxonis knawing realme bot ane facil pray inymes gif thay feirsly sewit bega detest ye damage al weris aswerit herald wald leif hatrent aganis ye saxonis haue peace nocht feir thaym bot onely remoue trubyl pepyl mycht leif peace desyrit occa sen na gret occasion wer betuix hym britonis put fyne yairto tyme cumyng forthir wald content ye foure prudent men wer chosyn ylk syde euyn debatis betuix yame ye britonis saxonis micht incres togidder vnder ane perpetuall amite tymes cumyng occa knawing thir offeris procedyng mair febyll curage ony heid tuk peace glaid cheir reiosit sen victory chance battall vncertane yt realme ingland sa esaly conquest efter peace maid maner landis ingland liand fornence ye almane sall pa tymes cumyng vnder empire saxonis residew regioun callit britane remane vnder empire britonis wes afore athir pepill leif vnder ya r awin lawis throw yi peace baith pepill incressit togiddir polecy rich ony iniuris otheris ye saxonis leuand thair hethin lawis ye britonis eftir ye cristin faith yit mony thaym wer intricat pelagius herisyis aberrad fra sicker faith phovv vter slevv prince cornevvall gat arthure vvyfe hovv oth kyng pichtis clamit crovvn britane hovv britonis vvar put thair herisyis hovv terdix come occa vvith nevv povver saxonis hovv saxonis vva vinc st myrakyll ca iiii thys tyme uter king britonis wes degenerat fra virtew maist schamefull lust surfet ydelnes exces plesoure regnand amang britonis wes occasioun nocht onlie adultry bot al slauchter throw quhilk succedit mony terrible weris ye gret affliction pepill schort tyme following uter maid ane riat banket londoun yuyll day quhilk nobillis britane thair wyffis wer present amang quhome wes ane lady gret bewte spous gothlois prince cornewell uter rauist bewte lady send cubicularis riche iowellis solist hir plesour gothlois knawyng uter effeminate desiryng defoule bed fled haistelie hir cornewell quhome uter followit gret power hauand na sycht grauiteis princelie estait finalie lady gat hir ane sonne namit arthure quhilk succedit hym eftir sal schaw sic thingis done uter segit castell quhair gothlois wes slew hym eftir castell wes tane alliegeand fled fra nathaliodus quhen britonis faucht aganis saxonis howbeit mynd wes sla gothlois mycht reiose wyfe frelie tymes cummyng sum men writtis uter wes transformit craft merline gothlois similitude way gat arthur nochtwithstandyng quhat sumeuir way wes treuth uter gat hym ane othir mannis wyfe al sone arthure wes cumyn perfite age uter gaderit nobillis britane ane cousall causit yame sworne euangell suffer nane othir regne britane behynd hym bot arthure sonne quhilk thyng rasit ye pychtis gret hatrent aganis uter loth kyng pychtis wes impacient rycht comouit arthure gottin adultrye suld preferrit childrin gottin lauchfull bed iust heritouris crown britane pnochtheles quhen kyng loth pychtis assailyeit lang brek uter mynd mycht na wayis samyn supersedit purpos quhill saw seasoun expedient mony britonis frequent conuentioun saxonis left rycht faith maid adoratioun ydolis utheris followit errouris pelagius set thaim distroy cristin faith britane throw quhilk thair errouris wer sa gret baptysme wes inhibit mony othir artikill ye faith prelatis britane hauad gret displeseir yt yir errouris wer sprong sa hie amang yair pepill brocht sact germane sanct seueir britane quhilkis finalie haly lyfe continewall precheyng kythit mony mirakillis maid britonis penitent yair errouris return ye trewe faith crist thir haly men also purchest licence occa preche amang saxonis sic thingis done britane arriuit ingland twa nobill men namit tardix kenrik new armyis saxonis al yir saxonis wer plesandlie ressauit occa bot kentik wes ane scharp persew ar cristin men wes slane eftir comonis ingland becaus gart sanct germane ly yair ane euill nycht cumyng thir saxonis ingland wer rycht suspicious kyng uter maid hym beleue occa wes irkit peace seikand new occasioun contrar peace afore contrackit inuaid britonis yair fore send ane herald till occa exhortyng hym keip amyte peace afore contrackit britonis stene fra thyng yat mycht gener occasioun discord betuix two pepill caus thir saxonis laitly cumyn ingland returne almany utherwayis litill tranquillite apperis betuix two pepill tymes cumyng occa thocht uter ouir proud desyre sic thyngis inhibit hym ressaue freindis hym plesit ingland nochtheles answerit wes al weill set keip band betuix ye two pepil uter neuir sen peace wes contrackit iniure britonis thus mycht britonis haue na sufficient causis lament nochtheles vnderstude weil kyng uter wes seikand occasioun moue weir betuix britonis saxonis comandyng hym ressaue na saxonis ingland bot send yame schamfullie agane almany howbeit saxonis come nocht ingland comand britonis yit wer depart thair pleseir wes thairfore eschewit uter nobillis fuliche chargis bring nocht yame self fra sicker eys maist dangerus fall sen thay first socht occasioun battall thay suld haue quhil ane yame wer vterly distroyit uter nobillis britane rycht astonist answere send thair secund ambassatouris occa large soumys gold rich draw mynd fra battall occa resauit gold contemption maid ambassatouris returne hame ony answer ye britonis mouit thir iniuris seyng na bandis peace mycht hald saxonis freindschip maid thair ordinance yair best maner battall beliue ye peace wes geuyn vp sydis loth kyng pychtis knawyng thir weris risyng betuix saxonis britonis offerit wilfullie cum al pepil support occa aganis ye britonis becaus thai intendit defraud sonis ye crown britane quhilk tenit yame iust titil send ambassatouris conrannus king scottis cocur hym samyn effect bot conrann refusit saying wald nothir violat peace maid afor britonis yit support ye ennymes god aganis catholik pepil britonis knawing ye ordinance pichtis saxonis aganis yame complenit thair haly bischopis germane seueir yir bischopis comandit yam assemble yair army commit yame god gif thay sa thay suld faill haue victory thair ennymes britonis howbeit thay na lytyll ir thir saxonis come thir haly bischopis arrayit battall q hen thay wer deuyne ser ce pasche day tithingis come ye saxonis pichtis wer cumand arrayit battall incontinent commad uter ylk past best sanct germane promysit echt first battall preistis saxonis pichtis knawyng yair febyl ordinan e presumit bot victory war thairfore mair perant battal sanct germane bure ye baner exhortit pepyl wt gret noyis pa forth wart first iunyng preistis cryit ane hie voce alleluya incontinent ye reflex ye voce resoun agane ye rochis quhare thay iunit sic preis yt yair ennymes beleuit bot al ye montanis cragg wer tubland yame attanis incontinent thay fled ony mair debait ye nixt riuer quhare mony thaym feirsnes fle pe ist maner battal victory rehersit lenth sact bede becaus come mirakill sanct germane phovv occa nathaliodus inuading othir battall vvar baith slane vvith xvm britonis hovv young occa vves maid kyng ingland ordinance aganis scottis pichtis hovv thay vvar vincust kvng vter slane poysoun ca v britonis proude victory tuke na sicht ye weil yame self hatrent saxonis gaif yame yair auld corruppit vicis sic riatus surfet yai spendit sumtyme twa sumtyme thre dayis interruption thair bankettis throw quhilk thay war degenerat fra vailyeant pepyll maist schamfull drunkettis prelatis othir kirkmen richt sorrowfull thir vicis yair pepyl ceissit co tinewally preche sayng gif yair vicius lyuis war amendit thair realme sall fall pray yair ennymes thir haly bischoppis co iecturit sa followit occa withi schort tyme eft inuadit yame battall slew nathaliodus lieutenan uter xvm briton nochttheles followit sa feirsly ye chare yt slane mony vailyeant capitanis hym britonis war sa brokin battall yt thay ceissit tymes cumyng inuade ye saxonis efter slauchter occa ye saxonis maid occa brothir sonne king ingland becaus loth king pychtis supportit britonis last battal certane prisoneris pichtis takin ye feild schew saxonis maid yair ordinace inuade pichtis yit dredand ye scottis suld cu thair support thay brocht ane nobyl namit colgern ane new power almany mittit gif distroyit ye pichtis geif hym al ye ladis yt pichtis reiosit beyond huber becaus ye said pichtis war cofiderat afore wt yame contrar thair bandis faucht laitly britonis thair cotrar sone efter colgern arriuit northuberland inuading ye cuntre importabyll cruelteis inhabitantis yairof impaciet sustene sa hye iniuris faucht aganis hym gret fury nochtheles yai war discomfist al sone occa knew ye cumyng colgern tuk peace britonis come gret army aganis ye pichtis last cruelte done colgern northuberland mouit ye confiderat kingis cu al pepil vnder yair empire reuenge ye samyn yit quhe yair army cumyn sicht enymes saw sa gret multitude pepil aganis yame yai wer affrayit specially rehers britonis quhilkis come thair support sayng ye saxonis war huge bodiis stature sa pissant battall yt oftymes yai put thair ennymes flicht yair terribil visage thir wordis maid ye army sa astonist ye mony yame fled ony tary war schame costranit yame abide ye morrow ye cofiderat kingis seing yame sa abasit callit ye noblis baith ye armyis said yame maner meruel gud copanionis quhy proud curage bene sa dekeyit yt mony yow yt ar yi pissant army apperis onely sicht enimes affrayit sa degenerat fra maheid yt ye seme disparit ony dangeir appering saxonis ar sic virtew strenth bot othir pepil may dant yam victory ye haue experiece yt ye said saxonis bene oft vincust albion gret triu phe honour thay war vincust king uortimer chasit hym britane yai war vincust also ambrose becaus thay durst meit hym plane battal apperit thay slew treason britonis quhilkis mony ar wagiouris saxonis he bene oft disco fist yow mony yeris maid tributar yow na thing restis thairfore forci capionis mak yow affrayit attour sen action iust aduersaris wragusly inuadig yow may ye beleif ony othir thing bot victory gif ony effrayis yow gret magnitude strenth saxonis thay ar euyl iugeis na pepyl ar erd mair stature stra gar bodyis ar scottis pichtis gif ye le spreit curage saxonis ar may impute nocht bot youre awin sle th bodyis ar na le stature strenth yairis thus suld nane yow accuse nature gif curage nocht corespondent bodyis sen nature he maid yow strang lusty delyuer bodyis reddy sustene labouris nocht remanis bot deuoid al schameful cowardy following manheid virtew eldaris remembring na thing may succede mair youre schame damage myserably vincust bringand self wiffis child landis vnder seruitude ennymes sa far pertenis deuore beleif bot sall ieoperd lyuis defece yow yat ennymes may vnderstand quhidder ye noblis scottis picht ar mouitmair scham dredour defed yair realme extreme dageir thir word ye army inflamit birnad desire fecht mony yir capitan schew yam neuir purpos fle yit ony thig cor ar ye mynd yair price skarsly war thir wordis said quhe baith ye armyis iuni faucht incredibyll hatrent doutsum victory bot last ye co fiderat pepil ouirset multitude ennymes gaif bakkis quhom followit saxonis inuading yame ythand slauchter quhill ye nycht put end thairto morrow ye kyng scottis ye residew army returnit galloway kyng pichtis pentland efter victory occa slew scottis pichtis found betuix tyne tweid garnist strenthis thairof strang munitioun wageour maid colgern prince northumberland defend ye samyn aganis inuasouris efter victory scottis pychtis kyng occa come victorius army agan ye britonis becaus thay supportit ye scottis pichtis contrar yair band schortly dang thaym ingland walis repa strenthis partis ingland sumtime makad scarmussing britonis scottis pichtis caus pepyll vnderstand thay mycht nocht leif exercition weris kyng uter tyme fe l ane feuer desyrit ane seruandis bryng hym ane drink clere watter fra nixt fo tane slokin vehement thrist incontinent ane saxone instruckit effect gaue hym ane drynk enuenomit poyson sone efter deceissit xviii yeir regne fra incarnatioun vcxxi yeris pof romane boece vverkis martyrdome institutionis ordour sanct benedict hovv super levv rentis makis euyll religious men hovv loth kyng pichtis clamit crovvn britane ca vi thir dayis boere romane senatoure rycht expert theology philosophy mathematik syndry othir science wrate excellent werkis trinite siclik logik rethorik geomatry arsmetrik musik astronomy sa foundly werkis ar yit gret admiration pepyll last slane reuena theodorik king ostrogotis mony othir haly men thay wald applaude herisy arrius bot cruelte nocht lang vnpunist iustice god theodorik deceissit sone eft miserably name gothis put memory ye said boece fallowis e kit ye nowmer sanctis yir day sanct benedict quhilk institute ye ordour monkis yocht begun afore basilius orient becaus irkit wt frequet cupany pepil come cassinu quhate traslatit ye tempyll appollo ane abbay ordour dedicat sanct iohne ye baptist sic felicite he succedit ordour yt thairof he bene xxiiii papis iclxxxviii cardinalis othir platis innowmerabil amang w siclik armony riche abbayis ordoure men gret deuotion howbeit yai wald haue bene mair religious deuot gif yai bene wt le magnificence prince ye superflew rentis yir abbayis geuyn magnificence princis inducis religious men mair sleuth sensuall lustis ony feruent deuotion bndict deceissit cassinu fra ye incarnatio vcxviii yeris quhate buryit scolastica sister ye tyme iustyne empriour tyme brigida haly virgine hauad bot xiiii yeris age dedicat hir virginite god confirmit bischop ilis ile man scho bure ane leddern belt aboue ane quhyt kyrtyl ane vale ouir hir schoulderis haldin gret reuerence scotland ireland hir singular halynes quhome ar mony kirkis regioun scho deceissit xviii yeris conrannus buryit ireland ane town namit dune howbeit sum scottis haldis scho lyis abirnethy tyme sanct geberine scottis quhilkis fled frace brethir sisteris eschew cruelte saxonis efter bischop remens quhare kithit syndry myrakyllis tyme institut processioun gang dayis france thre dayis afore ascension day mamercius byschop ueen ressauit scotland conuellan abbot colmekyll conuellanus ane prophete schew mony thyngis cum concernyng ye exterminion pichtis britonis schew al gret
