felicite cum scottis inglismen war conuertit sicker faith schew al gret calamite fal ye nobillis albion bot gif yai haistely amendit thair corruppit lyfe conuellan tyme arthure quhilk kyng britonis efter deith uter quhil sic thingis wer done amang ye scottis loth king pichtis send ambassatouris britonis clamand crowne britane lawis vsit albion quhen ony man marijt ane virgine child suld succeid heritage micht iustly pertene hir becaus marijt anna ye syster ambrose uter quhilkis war deceissit lawful ayris alliegit ye modred wal wan h sonis gottin anna suld succeid iust tytyl crown britane nochtheles ye ambassatouris war depeschit britonis displesand answer gat na thing thair desiris phovv saxonis vvar sindry tymes vincust maid tributaris kyng arthure hovv occa arriuit vvith nevv povver northumberland chasit arthure vvali hovv ye surfet cheir yule vvas euyll institute hovv pychtis britonis vva agre ca vii schort tyme efter king arthure gadderit ane army brytonis faucht aganis saxonis nocht x mylis fra london dantit yame sa huge victory thay war maid tributar thirllit seruitude vnd empire britonis proud victory come london quhare thay remanit syndry monethis makand thair ordinance aganis saxonis dwelland beyond humbir quhilkis war confiderat tyme pichtis iniuris redressit al sydis kyng arthure cumad maner york arrayit army maid ye price bertanye lieutenand fecht aganis pichtis cumyn afore ane gret power samyn support battallis fynaly arrayit maist awful ordinance iunit togidder faucht vncredibill hatrent quhil last baith pichtis saxonis wer discomfist quhome followit britonis inuadyng yame cotinew slauchter quhil yai come york quhair mony thaim wer ressauit arthure hauad sa frequent victorie saxonis layd ane sege aboute york quhen bene thre monethis samyn reddy raderit laik vittallis wes aduertist yat occa quhilk wes chasit afore almany wes returnit northumberland newe power saxonis colleck ye pychtis agane hym mair ardent furie battall afore becaus vnderstude sa gret nowmer fayis reddy inuaid left ye sege forsaid fled army walis leuand behynd hoell duke bertanye ane army withstand ennymes duryng wynter seasoun schort tyme eftir returnit lo nt furie saxonis quhilkis wer cumyn kent otheris regionis thair vsit sic liberalite wyn fauoure pepill sumtyme laikit money necessare vse nixt symer rasit camp come forthwart aganis colgern occa quhilkis wer makad gret heirschippis sindry partis realme finalie dantit thaym sindry victoryis tuke york thrid day eftir returnyng treason ane briton quhilk wes h ldin ane saxon town quhome brocht gret nowmer britonis within ye said town vnder ycht sa quietlie wes tane ye sodiouris yairof cruellie slane remanent pepill wer sauit mercy nixt symer ouirpast e frequent skarmussyng betuix saxonis northumbirland britonis york yi ciete wes rycht populus nixt wynter mony nobillis comonis britane quhilkis wer geuin yair lust sleip riatus bankettis sensualite confidyng thair victorie bygane thair present strenth said ye surfet cheir vsit yit amang inglismen scottis xiii dayis togiddir eftir cristinmes wes institute tyme kyng arthure nochtheles euer yat schamfull glutony first began corruppit sa ye ingyne inglismen scottis dayis cristis natiuite thay arre mair geuin voracite yan virtew thair wambe deuyne seruice throw quhilk solempne feist sum time sic deuotioun reuerence amang oure anciant faderis sa corruppit like vnto feistis gentilis maid honour bachus flora priap quhilkis wer deuisit ye lust plesouris men wemen ony gud religioun nixt symer quhen arthure wes cumyn humbir inuaid saxonis fand army sa effeminat soft thay wer nocht able sustene laubour siclik weirly besines thay wer afore throw quhilk mony yeris eftir thay lytill displeseir yair ennymes na esperance victorye quhil loth kyng pychtis wes confiderat kyng arthure maner arthure suld reiose croun britane duryng lyfe eftir deith sonnis loth sall succeid pichtis concur britonis aganis saxonis tymes cumyng al landis quhilkis ye pichtis micht coques beyond hubir pa vnd yair dominion attoure modred kig lothis son sal mary ye docht gawolane gretest price vnder ye kyng britane ye childrin gottin betuix yame nurist thair gud schyr gawolane yat gawane brothir modred sall remane continewall resydence kyng arthure tretit accordyng estait phovv scottis pychtis vvar confiderat vvith kyng arthure aganis saxonis hovv saxonis vvar vincust albianis doung albion ca viii peace roborat maner afore rehersit kyng arthur desyring banis cristis ennymes albion solistit confiderat kyngis cum ane prefixt day concur hym defence cristin faith quhilk day britonis scottis pychtis conuenit togidder vnder ane mynd purpos kyng occa aduertist heirof rasit cape met albianis maist cruel wise quhen battalles war arrayit athir syde colgern price ye saxonis northumberland come ane sweift geldyng pychtis repreuand thaym thair vnfaithfull mynd considering thay ressauit pepyll frendschip kindnes quhilk war laitly yair deidly ennymes bure armour aganis thair anciat freindis lang afore thaym confiderat yit gyf thay pa forthwart day support britonis thay sal haue sum experience quhidder thair awin falset faith saxonis war maist abyll haue victory pychtis na thing mouit yir wordis displayit thair baner faucht incredibyll hatrent aganis ye saxonis followit ane terribyl bergane scottis faucht richt wing slew childrik cheiftane saxonis fornentis thaym put yat battal flicht colgern quhilk faucht ye left wyng aganis ye pichtis richt desirus conques glore ruschit sa fei sly aganis loth king pichtis yt dang loth frome hors nochtheles loth reskewit pichtis colgern inuadit yame sa cruelly brocht speris ground slane myddyl ward seing baith thair wingis discomfist gaif backis quhome britonis followit lang chace murdir occa euil wou dit fled ye feild amang ye horsme quhe saw na place sicker defece gat ane schip fled almany remanet saxonis brokin slauchter seyng na rescous randerit thaym kyng arthure vnder thir coditionis thay sall ressaue ye faith crist leue tributar vnder hym geif yir co ditiois war acceppit leif yair wappynnis guddis behynd yame depart ye cuntre within ane certane day sa mony saxonis micht get schippis afore ye said day fled almany quhen ye almanis saw yame return sic misery trubyll thay maid thair solempne aithis reuenge schamful eiectioun thaym britane quhe euir thay mycht haue sufficient oportunite part saxonis fenyeit yame take faith abidyng ane better fortoun otheris war slane becaus thay wald nocht renunce thair ydolatrie hovv scottis pichtis come vvith xx thousand men support kyng arthure aganis saxonis hovv saxonis vvar discomfist ca ix quhill saxonis war banist thirl seruitude maner king arthur set hym repare ye kyrkis enormiteis done york saxonis wrocht gret cruelteis ye yeir followyng aduertist yat saxonis inhabit ile wicht otheris kent war assemblit togidder makand grete cruelteis heirschippis ye britonis landis repres thir attemptatis arthure went ane gret power london bring purpos ane better fyne solistit eugenius sonne congallus afore rehersit modred sonne loth cum xx scottis pichtis support arthur knawyng gret dammage come epyll tyme bypast riatus surfet cheir maid hym withstand thair insolence yat na occasion suld appeir effeminat army schort tyme efter tuke ye ymage blissit virgyne mary ansenye went forthwart hope victory modred gud fader gawolane richt desyrus wyn honour went afore army britonis vm horsmen saxonis knawyng arthur within foure mylis thair campe send thair ambassatouris desyring hym pa n forther geif thaym licence pa albion yair guddis iniure britonis al sone arthure condiscendit thir petitiois thay desyrit iii day tre bot denyit arthure tra prouin efter sum hyd treason vnder yair desir noch theles promyttit pa lytill forthir ye day britonis bean aduysit quhat suld done mater beleuand na thing le treason saxonis set modred gawolane becaus thay war certane mylis fra kyng arthuris campe slew ane gret nowmer thairof remanent chasit tentis britonis arthure incontinent callit afore hym ye ambassatouris saxonis said wald nothir heir thair desyris tymes cumyng yit haue peace yame life becaus thay treasonabylly inuadit pepyl vnder co monyng peace skarsly war thir wordis said quhen xl ye nobyllest men amang saxonis come kyng excuse treason recently committit saying done young men aduise thair nobillis arthure presumand na le treason vnder last message tha vnder first commandit thaym remane styll campe ye first messingeris syne rasit army within ye nicht come arrayit thre battallis ye saxonis thay war aduertist cumyng saxonis war gretuly affrayit knawyng nothir quhat done yit quhat answerit thair ambassatouris mene tyme modred gawolane inuadit yame sa properant diligence mony thaym war discomfist thay mycht cu array quhom followi arthure sic rageand fury nane yame war saiffit quhare ya mycht tane throw quhilk nocht hard bot rumissing pepyll partis thairabout campe repleit deid carionis ludis rynnand bludy remes seyis battal wa slane huge nowmer saxonis apperandly thay mycht neuir recouer ye damage thairof yit haue pissance resist britonis tymes cumyng thus wer saxonis thirlit seruitude afore bot ye nobillis wer licent pa almany scottis pichtis abaid certane dayis lo doun returnyt hame richely rewardit kyng arthure displeseir thair weris phovv tonset chancellar scotland vva slane vvrangus administration iustice king conrann deith iustiniane empriour prudent constitutionis fame cheualry syndry captiuite rome ca x sic thingis done britane arthure realme scottis wes gouernit gret felicite iustyce kyng conrannus quhil last damage lang age syndry displesouris followit realme thair ane pure lynnage namit tonset wes maid chancellar king conrannus bot mair set kingis proffet ony iustice geuand mynd hale industry punys men extreme rigoure conques money kyng conra nu ingyne syndry kyngis ar thaym maist fauour reuerence couth maist craftely escheit guddis ye pepyl proffet tonset efter syndry wrangis oppressionis done hym ye kyngis auctoryte callit afore hym certane merchandis fore murray smal vane causis put thaym deith misdoaris syne confiscat thair guddis kingis b huffe nobyllis murray comouit thir oppressyonis done thair freindis marchatis foresaid ruschit haistely harnes slew tonset plane iugement quhare doyng mair iniure iustice pepyll skryrais efter slauchter maid thir men serchit maist diligence thay disparit men fled montanis traistyng na grace remeid bot gyf thay dyd sum gretar cruelte redeme ye first commoun opinioun yit dayis thairfore concludit sla kyng delyuer pepyll extorsioun done hym quharethrow thay mycht conques fauour commonis restorit thair peace schort tyme efter donald capitane athole richt familiar kyng knawyng conspiratioun send secret seruant caus thir lymmaris cum inuerloch quhare ye king resident tyme promyttit thaym support accomplis yair intet fynaly ressauit yame gret humanite inclusit yame thair swerdis wappinnis ane secrete chalmer quhare kyng vsyt solitar syne departit town knawin na thyng thairof kyng last enterit ye chalmer quhare yir lymmaris war waitand slauchter al sone saw thaym fell kneis desyri grace nochtheles yir limmaris ony myseratioun slew hym xxxv yeir regne quhilk xvi yeir empire arthure twenty yeir iustiniane emprioure fra incarnatioun v hundreth xxxv yeris body brocht colmekyll buryit amang anciant sepulturis forebear iustinian ane ye nobyl empriouris afore dayis causit romane lawis constitutionis colleckit togidder sic reason eloquence fame gret admiratioun pepyll iustiniane pecifyit mony landis pertenyng romane empire delyuerit affrik fra uandallis italy fra gothis dalmasia fra tyranny mundus cheualry ane richt vailyeant capitane callit bellisar delyuerit rome fra tyranny theodorik kyng ostrogothis efter yat segit mony yeris bellisar faucht mony strang battallis defence rome aganis totylla king gothis bot last bellisar fell gret infirmite sa rome fynaly tane said kyng gothis wallis bet ground capitol mony othir housis priuat publik maner ci tezanis thairof slane ane p rpetua l memory pe yll lytyl confidence suld felicite rome distroyit maner fra incarnatioun vcl yeris tane first gawlis brint distroyit quhen began first fluris lang efter distroyit alarik king gothis ye maner tane athalph quhilk rang efter larik sone efter tane agane gensiricus king uandalis put na le rewyne cartage afore romani town quhilk bene decorit sa mony vailyeant deidis dantar al pepyl sa oft tane ba bar pepyll schawis weill na thyng sycker bot fragyll mortall warld bot wyll returne history quhare left pof kyng eugenius thrid lavvis conrannus vvyfe hovv scho led vvith hir sonis ingland king arthuris fame cheualry round byll hovv britonis contra thair mi maid costantine prince britane ca xi conrannus slane said eugenius ye sonne congallus maid king mony freindis courann gaif hym cou sall begynnyng empire punis slauchter eme yt otheris mycht tak example tymes cumyng sla ane kyng eugenius na thyng mouit thair counsal onely left slayaris hym vnpunist bot al put thaym secrete counsall thairfore suspeckit faderis slauchter conrannus wyfe suspeck hym ye samyn maner fled hir child regiman aydane ireland quhare scho remanit certane yeris deceissi hir first sonne regima bot aidane remanit kyng ireland weill tretit mony yeris efter kyng eugeni schaw hym plesand ye begynnyng empire sat oftimes iugement cause hym appeir benigne pepyll quhare ony personis war condampnit wranguislye gaif thaym lycence appeill othir iugis supportit indegent pepyll commoun gud quhen thay na guddis follow thair action lawe commandit na man call ane pupyll iugement afore lauchfull age na wedow drawin ane mile fra hir dwellyng place iugemet maid al gret punition theuis ressettouris kepit gud peace pichtis britonis nychtbouris sum auctouris writtis arthure thir dayis dantit scotland iseland orknay demark swethrik spruse yelad gotlad hollad braband flanderis picarde normandy bertanye france maid al ye pepil yairof tributar h empire elikwyse subdewit grece peirse araby egipt affrik spanye finalie vincust lucius romane emprioure singular battall historie sall haue faith thaym ar anctouris thairof knaw ferme lie arthure deceissit tyme iustiniane emprioure quhen ye gothis burgundianis uandalis othir nationis inuadit ye romane empire thairfore apperand sen sa mony sindry pepill maid diuers weiris amang thaym self tyme thay micht gaderit vnder ane mynd fecht aganis arthure attoure thair wes yi tyme maist horrible weris betuix gothis francheme ye historicianis wrait thair weris maid na mentioun arthure nochtheles sen ar set mynnis na mannis honour fame fynd arthure wes glore marcial dedis na le vailyeant ony othir princis britane ikit realme equaly polecy rich writtin arthure tuke gret delectatioun werslyng strang kempis hauand yame sic familiarite yat quhen vsit dyne tak consultatioun weris gart thaym sit hym maner ane round crown ye nane yame suld preferrit tyll otheris digni e quhilkis seit wes callit round tabil youcht vailyeant dedis wer worthy haue memorie yit vulgare fabillis quhilkis ar fenyeit samyn he violat thair fame makis thaym haue le credence britonis insolent lang peace vnder ye empire arthure wer penitent contract maid afore loth king pychtis think nocht profitabill thair weill yat vncouth blud suld regne aboue thaim desyri kyng arthure schaw thaym quhom thocht maist abill succeid arthure bad thaym cheis ane thair general vo yat wer wyse discendyng blude riall britane thay bot delay namit constantyne ye sonne cadorus prince cornewell quhil wes admittit arthure declarit prince britane nocht wes kyng bot iust heritour succeid eftir deith throw quhilk come vse eldest son kyngis wer callit prince realme constantyne declarit prince maner apperit mony euident signes wyse gracious ye pepill conquest ane gud name amang britonis message send pichtis britonis thair ansvvere hovv kyng arthure vvas slane vvith mony nobyllis brytane scottis pychtis hovv guanora vvyfe vvas brocht angus hir sepulture ca amyte fel albianis battal ca xii tyme deceissit loth king pichtis quhom ye landis wes afore namit pentlad wer namit lowthiane eftir deith modrede kyng pychtis send ambassatouris kyng arthur nobillis britane saying wes nocht semyng princis violat yair faith band interuentioun sum leifful cause band maid betuix hym kyng arthure wes nocht vnknawin thaym quhilk he ratifyit nane suld regne behynd arthure britane bot ye sonnis loth anna wyfe ye heritouris discendyng thair successioun becaus ame wes constantyne prince cornewell wes namit thaym succeid ye crown britane co trar thair band faith afore contrackit requirit kyng arthure gyf na aduertence iniust persuasioun pepil quhilk he na respect religion picte bot onelie cause hym distroy baith ye law god man thairfore prayit hym perseueir ye band afore co trackit na punition cum pepil iustice god violation faith promys wes answerit ye nobillis britane yat ye band betuix arthure loth wes maid bot duryng langar leiffar thaym twa sen loth wes deceissit ye band wes dissoluit ye self attoure thay violat nocht yair faith howbeit thay maid costantine ane nobill man blud riall britane yair price becaus na thig semyt kingis mair keip yair realme prouidence wisdome come nocht vnder empire vncouth blude attour suspitius ye britonis suld cu vnder dominion pichtis sen yai bene ay thair auld ennymes answer rehersit pichtis maid yame detest treason britonis penitent yt thay supportit yame subdewyng saxonis nochtheles yai tuke consultation quhat best done fynaly ane cosent concludit inuade britonis bring thair contrar pepyll ye war yair ennymes yit afore thay attempt mater thay thocht ganand assailye ye mynd scottis saxonis fand thaym reddy assist yame peace weir eugenius grantit mair plesandly thair petitionis yat britonis ressaui rebellis realme arthure seand peace geuyn vp betuix hym pychtis garnyst ye strenthis realme syne come aue huge pepyll aganis scottis pichtis traisting howbeit saxonis returnit britane thay suld esaly vincust sen thay war sa oft brokyn discomfist weris nochtheles ane strang army scottis pichtis war assemblit afore cumyng humber place quhare yai ben ay maist fortunat win quhen battallis war arrayit otheris sycht bischoppis prelatis scottis pichtis britonis come mediatouris desyryng thaym remember dangerus war thair commoun weill vnnaturall perseueir battall sen thay war ordanit nature leif togidder within yat ile debait yame fra inuasion othir strange pepyl attoure thair cyuyll battallis contentionis amang thaym self suld occasion saxonis returne albion thay reiose na thyng mair subuersioun albianis modred eugeni mouit deuote wordis thir prelatis condiscendit put ane end thair weris gyf britonis wald stand ye band afore contrackit bischoppis answer went arthure brocht mynd peace bot ye freindis constantyne war nocht onely repugnant thair petitionis bot al gaif vnplesand wordis said becaus confiderat kingis denuncit first weris arthure nocht honour desist thairfra al bot foly thaym persuaid peace quhen army war arrayit otheris sicht bot gif war wirk sum prodition vnder colour peace skarsly war thir wordis said quhen huge noyis clamoure rais sydis sone efter baith ye armyis iunit mair cruelte euir hard ony warld afore place quhare thay iunit ful mo marces sa vnplesand britonis yt thay mycht nocht weilde thair ordinance wappynnis thay desyrit throw quhilk battall prolongit sa huge multitude pepyll slane ryuer humber ran full bludy stremys seyis pquhill armyis war fechtand maist raige maner ane pichtis instruckit nanys cryit schyll voce fle fle arthure slane nobilite britonis pthis cry rasit scottis pychtis mair spreit afore maid britonis sa astonist na auctorite sound trumpat mycht garre thaym tary bot haistely left thair wappynnis fled thair best refuge pin sorrowfull battall slane scottis pichtis twenty thousand modrede kyng pychtis noblis baith thair realmys slane britonis bertona come thair support thritty thousand amang otheris slane kyng arthure walwane bruthir modrede kyng pychtis quhilk faucht day lu le kyng arthure aganis naturall bruthir pon morrow spulye kyng arthuris campe partit amang confyderat pepyll ryte army pguanora quene brytane spouse kyng arthure tane mony ladyis knychtis dependyng hir tyme pthe hors ryches cofferis gottin hir fell pray scottis bot hir self hir ladyis knychtis fell pychtis brocht angus ane castell callit dunbarre quhilk na thyng remanis bot prent wallis quhare thay leiffit remanent dayis thair lyfe pin memorye heirof megyle ane towne angus ten myle fra dunde mony anciant sepulturis gret reuerence pepyll specyally sepulture guanora tytle wryttyn thairapon schawis pall wemen strampis sepulture sall ay barrant ony frute thair wamb syclyke guanora pand quhydder verite nocht latte thaym schawe he experience thairof bot ane thyng knaw pall wemen abhorris strampe sepulture sayd gal fride writare ye history britane modrede arthure faucht nocht humbir bot town gwyntoun come ye f ild lyue guanora displesei enterit religioun quhilkis ar far discrepant fra hystory haue writtin nochtheles follow ueremond turgot otheris mony autentyke authouris quhilkis writis trew deidis nobyll men ony fictioun pattoure quhare euir maist dagerus battal strikin sic displesour come efter ye briton scottis pichtis huge auchter mony yeris efter thay mycht nocht recouer dammage thairof phovv constantine kyng britonis modrede vncouth e uellis sene albion hovv eugeniu gaif syndry landis vvith army nobyll men hi realme hovv con ta tyne kyng britonis vva maid monk ireland eugeni deith ca xiii brytonis efter discomfitour slauchter kyng arthure maid constatyne quhilk declarit prince afor kyng brytane constantyne na succession modrede suld clame ye crown britane slew sonnis modrede presence thair moder quhilk douchter gawolane throw quhilk successioun modrede fa ly thir afflictionis fell albianis fra incarnation vcxlii yeris xxiii yeir ye empire arthure viii yeir regne eugenius mony vncouth meruell war sene afore last battall albioun herbes war sene york full blude ane calf found nocht far fra camelon two heidis ane lam siclik dowbyll nature sonne mydday apperit bludy lift schane two dayis cotinewally ful sternis piottis nicht crawis faucht ye rauynnis maid vncredibyll slaucht euery syde bot wyl returne history kyng eugenius efter returnyng scotland nowmerit residew army rewardit richely ye freindis thaym war slane feild caus thair vailyeat deidis remane lang memory gaif yame landis syndry army yair posterite may vnderstand thay war decorit nobyll kyng yair vailyeant worthy deidis eugenius sic victorius virtuous deidis conquest ane gud name haldyn na lytyll veneration amang pepyll gouernit yame tymes cumyng mair beniuolence tha rigour iurmi ik duke saxonis aduertist intollerabyll slauchter britonis come ane huge nauy pepyll ingland quhare smal labour subdew king constantyne chasit ye remanet britonis walis constantyne fyndyng na securite lyfe walis fled ireland quhare leuit certane yeris wyfe child vnknawin amang indegent pure pepyll almous al sone knawin persuasion monkis schoif held ane abbay samyn cuntre quhare leui ane deuote lyfe slane efter scottis eikit nowmer martir memory heirof mony kirkis amag w dedicat hym pthis iurmirik howbeit nocht institute ye sicker faith sufferit ye euangel crist prechit inglysmen maid ane band peace betuix hym ye scottis pichtis quhilk endurit end lyfe eugenius hauand gud peace residew dayis deceissit xxxiiii yeir regne buriit colmekyl fra incarnation vclxviii yeris ye vi yeir tiberius secund name emprioure pof kyng convvallus lavvis deith ye cumyng sanct colme scotlund sanct mungo ca xiiii eugenius buriit colmekyll brothir maid kyng ane prince rycht catholyke commandit principall castellis townis realme payntit sygne croce pepyll thairthrow mycht haue remembrance quhat cruell pane doloure saluioure sufferit thairon ane syluer crucifix borne ay afore hym quhare past kyst afore montit hors wryttyn goldyn letteris crucifix th glore crystyn pepyll inhibite paynt graif signe croce ony pament kirkis pepyll suld nocht trampe ye samyn neuir sene kirke bot heid discouerit maid mony lawis liberte haly kirke dang ane preist suld want hand slew ane preist suld brint guddis confiscat teindis euery frutis grew ye ground suld geuyn ye kirke war cursit auctorite ye kirke suld banist fra gud cumpany nane reuerence na lawis patent hym na faith geuyn dispositioun dotate kirkis riche iowellis possessionis sustene deuyne seruyce gaif vicaris personis certane croftis landis lyand kirkis caus thaym mair feruent thair residence deuotioun thus ye crystyn faith honorit partis realme fame catholike prince causit sact colme ane syngulare lyfe cum ireland albioun mony relygyous pepyll quhais cumyng gret confluence scottis pichtis ye grete felicite swei ne thay fand preching gaderit syndry monkis quhilkis wa tyme vagabound throw realme put yame syndry abbayis quhilkis war foundit afore conuallus lang efter come lowthiane quhare purgit brudeus kyng pi htis pepyl fra pelagius herisyis tyme sanct mungo haly byschop glasquew quhilk gottin sanct thanew douchter loth kyng pichtis opprest contrar hir wyll eugenius last kyng scottis mungo heirand sanct colme preiche afore brudeus rauist spreit deuyne wourdis followit hym dunkeld quhare conwallus beildit ane riche abbay afore bot magnificece princis maid ane bischopp seit craftely biggit wt square polyst stanis quhe thir two haly men remanit vi monethis dunkeld thay departit hame sanct mungo returnit glasquew sanct colme ireland schew ye princis thairof plesandly tretit amang scottis pichtis quhat feruent desire thay preching bot ane thing thair aboue meruellis sene hym afore conwall kyng scottis nochtwithstanding princely estait rich quhilkis suld induce hym mair pleseir virtew na le religious ony othir prelat kirkman realme prouyn virtew haldyn sic reuerence amang pepyll yt na persone durst iniurius othir yit speik hym ony detraction throw quhilk al vicis pepyl yocht thay war naturally inclinit thairto war dan mair virtew ony rygour yeir followyng sanct colme returnit albion brocht hym son conranus namit aidane quhilk fled afore schew ireland eschew ye wraith eugenius cumyng ilis aduertist conwallus deceissit x yeir regne body cumand gret lament pepyll buri colmekyl thairfore went abbay funerall obsequeis deuote maner pof kyng kynnatyll hovv resignit crovn aidane orison maid sanct colme hovv scottis pichtis faucht amang thaym self vvar agreit sanct colme ca v conwallus deceissit maner ane counsall set argyle fra oure redeption vclxxviii yeris quhilk kinnatyll brothir conwallus afore rehersit maid kyng kynnatyll na man beleuit ressauit colme aidane gret humanite prayit aidane gud curage within schort tyme suld reiose crown scotland haue sic succession suld delyuer ye realme mony displesouris yit vncertane tyme quhat deuyne reuelation prophecy mycht schaw sic thigis within dayis eftir ane imoderat flux catterre fel throte chaftis causit hym resigne gouernance realm aidane sact colme seand hym approche extremis deith exhortit hym haue thing contemption saiffing felicite heuyn quhare haistely pa kinnatyl deuotely obtemperand sanct colme randerit saule god feird moneth regne body buryit colmekyll ane couention maid sone efter argyle quhilk aidane maid kyng sanct colme becaus present conuention put diademe kyng aidanis heid said nobyllis wyse pit nocht neidfull maist nobyll men exh yow ony gret deuotion sen ye sa nyn incressis dayly apperis amang yow yit thynk nocht vnganand exhort yow obeysant youre prynce aidane vnder ane mynd assent brocht solempne auditour industry bot erar prouysyoun god offyce sall gouerne yow equale iustice peace delyuer yow trubyll quhen occurris part salbe thairfore leif togydder vnder hym gud mynd beniuolence stading sa content awin guddis ye couat nane otheris remembryng sindry beneficis geuin yow ineffabill gudnes god quhilk he instruckit yow blissit lawis maid yow deir pepil fortunat yow haif ane prince singular virtew quhais prudence faith salbe sic kir comon weill put profet sic felicite gyf ye obeysat hym na ennymes sall appeir aganis yow contrar quhilk god forbeid gyf ye declyne constitutionis god rebelland ye ministeris iustice gif prince aidane vnmindfull giftis god abusand ye administration realme tha sal nocht faill cu yow sindry plag ciuill contentionis quhilkis sal gyf occasioun ennymes inuaid yow vter exterminio le ye amend demeritis tyme prouide thairfore ye nocht sa insolent eftir hie chance prosperite ye incur ye hatrent god exponand baith singulare comon weill extreme dangeir ye pepil beyng exhortit yir wourdis promittit thair faithfull obedience kyng aidane sic thingis done sanct colme returnit ye ilis aidane went galloway quhare iustice dantit part theuis quhilkis infestit cuntre repres vthir enormiteis done realme set ane conuention nobillis sindry partis thairof quhilk prudence sanct colme wer deuisit sindry thyngis co mon weill throw quhilk gret tranquillite succedit mony dayis ef ir nochtheles chance man oft occurris pepil he prudence mak yame stand lang felicite certane nobillis quhilk mycht nocht lang suffir peace fell ane hie contentioun huntis interuentioun ane caus nocht throw quhilk followit haistly gret slauchter slayaris knawyng yame feirslie socht rigour iustice hauand na refuge eschewe kyngis lawis fled brudeus kyng pychtis al sone kyng aidan wes aduertist yairof send ambassatouris ye kyng pichtis requiryng hym tennour confideratioun deliuer thir men iustice brudeus mouit comiseratioun picte thir banist men refusit desyris frequent message excusit thair iniquite thus maid iniuris otheris occasioun battall aganis hym self pkyng aidane becaus thir rebellis wer nocht deliuerit pleseir send ane cumpany armyt men angus inuaid ye cuntre displesouris yat thai micht scott quhilkis wer send behalf brocht ane huge pray guddis angus slew thaym maid obstakill pychtis vnpacient suffir iniure recompensit ye samyn siclyk heirschippis slauchter ye scottis fury rage insolence ylk day incressyng maid debait finalie decidit ye swerd sone eftir thay gaderit baith ye sydis striuelyng quhair thay faucht togiddir gre murdir youcht ye victorie succedit ye scottis yit wes vnplesand arthurus eldest sonne kyng aidan prince scotland wes slane feild thus tuke ye scottis heuynes dolour slauchter pleseir thair victorie sanct colme rand vnhappy battall come kyng aidane repreuit hym smal occasioun mouit battal confiderat freindis throw quhilk wes cause nocht onlie maist lamentabill slauchter bot al bringyng mony pepill schamefull vter pouerte thairfore declarit gyf ye sam wer nocht hastely reparit blude iustice god suld cruelly punist aidane affray yir wourd prayit sact colme schaw quhat way mycht amend offence hym comittit haly man seyng aidane penitent comiseration went brudeus kyng pychtis schew vnprudentlie yi vnhappy bergane wes begun quhat mischeif wes follow baith ye pepil thay perseuerit battal aganis othir thir wourdis brudeus co di cendit haue peace thus wer ba h kingis content ye sact colme iuge debait euin ci thocht best finalie baith thir kyngis wer aggreit brocht prudence samyn tendernes thay wer afore within schort tyme haly man sanct colme returnit ilis fell ane gret infirmite immoderat flu caterre quhilk followit end lyfe phovv saxonis deuydit ingland seuyn syndry kyngdomes hovv pichtis saxonis vvar confiderat togidder discomfist scottis britonis orisoun maid kyng aydane army hovv said aydane vvas vincust saxoni sonne slane ca xvi quhen ye saxonis doung britonis walis punist thaym ilk day new afflictionis yai deuidit realme inglad seuin sindry kingdomes fyne yt britonis mycht neuir haue place recouer yair ald rowmes maid seuin sindry kingis amang quhom wes ethelfreid kyng northumberland quhilk ane singulare malyce aganis al britonis becaus wes rycht desirus eik empire solistit brudeus kyng pichtis inuaid scottis promittit gyf wald inuaid thaim battall sen ye iniuris done pepill wes nocht redressit support hym power mycht battall wes nocht persuadit ethelfreid ony affection pichtis bot onlie haue thaym brokin scottis mycht ye esalie conques thair realme brudeus refusit ye first tyme rais ony army aganis confiderat nichtbouris nochtheles inoportune sollicitatioun nobillis condiscendit thairto motiue yi battall becaus guddis reft afore fra pepyll scottis war nocht restorit contract proportit kyng aydane meit baith treason pichtis saxonis confiderat malgo kyng britonis maner gif saxonis pychtis inuade brytonis kyng aydane sall cum thair support gif pichtis saxonis come scottis kyng britonis sal support yame yat samyn maner saxonis weil aduertist cofideration draw ye scottis fra thair rowmes mak thaym laik vittallis enterit ye pichtis ye britonis landis kyng aydane sone efter assemblit pissance realme come samyn support britonis saxonis pychtis nochtwithstandyng cummyng maid yame eschew battall lang tary abiding cumyng syndry othir saxonis thair support suddanly apperit sycht cenlyne king west saxonis new garison support thair army scottis britonis howbeit thay war affrayit thair cumyng thocht best sen na help apperit bot thair handis meit new army west saxonis fynaly put thaym flycht slew cutha sonne cenlyne efter victory scottis britonis reiosit sic excellent mirth vsit thay dayis mene tyme north saxonis ye residew yair folkis quhilkis wer laitly discomfist come scottis britonis new battall thus war scottis britonis sa affrayit na noyis word thair army kyng aidane knawyng scilence na sygne audacite bot erar de eckit mynd said maner quhare gud companionis knichtly curage quhare inuincibyl sprei glaidnes euanist afore ye vincust ac ye defate sicht thir febyll ennymes sen ye merciall prowes he put sa vailyeant pepyll afore flicht lat neuir strang army randerit enymes lat neuir fais haue glore cowartry yir haue victory debait return heir fore hartly freindis anciant virtew curage vnderstand ennymes inuadis yow wrang persute motioun treasonavil ethelfred yairfore exerce youre wraith cruelie hym sen first rute al trubyll ye sall haue quhat plesand reward may geif yow gyf ye haue victory quhilk handis thir wourdis war skarsly rehersit quhen saxonis fechtand rycht wyng war put abak incontinent ethelfred come ane chosyn cumpany yair support exhorting thaym tak na affray thair febyll aduersa quhome thay sa oft vincust afore brudeus fechtand ye richt wyng pichtis maist vailyeant capitanis left wyng p scottis gret afflyctioun nochtheles scottis perseuerit ythand battall quhill thay saw ye myddyll ward quhare britonis faucht discomfist thay gaif backis quhome foll wit pychtis saxonis lang chace pin battall war slane brennius thane ye ile man dongarus thrid sonne aydane mony nobyllis commonis sydis kyng ethelfred loist ane eyne brudeus euyll woundit mony nobyllis slane defence phovv saxonis pychti vvar dyscomfist northumberland scottis brytonis deith sanct co sanct dane vengeance come saxonis dingyng sanct austyne syndry haly men ca xvii ethelfred na thyng satifyit yi victory scottis britonis deglaston come nixt symer ye pichtis galloway purpos othir bring ye vte heirschip elli bryng samy vnder thair dominion aidane weill aduertist thair mynd send britonis cum support syne went power mycht get galloway fand cumyng pychtis saxonis besy thair incursionis array incontinent set thaym array battall mony thaym slew remanent put flicht nycht following come ye army britonis mengit baith armyis togidder al sone ye ychtis saxonis wer aduertist hairof thay set thaym strang bus hementis keip entres straitis annandale thus wes na way passage ye army scottis britonis bot onlie pa throw dangerus riuer sink sandis sulloway britonis scottis seand thaym inclusit yus al sidis parkit yame haistelie amang strenthis cuntre thay wer samyn remane syne rasit yair army nycht quhen yair fayis suspec kit na thig le tha yair remouing com ouir sulloway ye maist perat way thay mycht northumbirlad left behynd yame ane huge fyre birnand al nycht yair ennymes suld haue na presumptioun thair departing thair cumyng northumberland thay inuadit pepill thairof maist cruelte fyre swerd saxonis pichtis knawyng thair pepill northu berland opprest violence left galloway huge pyne co thair ennymes sycht morow baith ye armyis ragead ist hatrent aganis othir iunyt togi saxonis sic incredible furye ruschit battall aganis scottis ony sycht deith mony thaim wer doung dynt swerdis ground yit becaus fr ch men come placis quhair thay wer slopit victorie wes l ng vncertane chance fortoun newtrale quhil last aidane othir vailyeant capitanis began rais folkis hope victorie spretit yame sic curage yat thay perseuerand fechting put ye saxonis pichtis flicht maid mair slauchter thaym cha e wes first battall nycht afore battall sanct colme wes abbay colmekill schew ye brethir thairof ye king aidane wes fecht ye morow co mendit hym army thair prayaris na dout bot ye prayer yi haly man wes richt supportable kyng aidane samyn houre victore fell scottis reuelit brethir said abbay gart thaym gyf louyng thairof god eftir yi victorie kyng sound trumpat gaderit folkis standart eftir gret apprisyng thair manheid gaue ye tent part ye spulye gottin feild repare kirkis scotland send ye banaris saxonis pychtis san colme remane abbay colmekill memorie excellent victorie battall wes slane cenlyne king west saxonis culyne qu itelyne principall capitanis schort tyme followyng sanet colme brokin lang infirmite deceissit wes buryit ye said abbay howbeit auctouris schawis hym buryit ane town ireland namit dune quhare haldin gret veneration sepulture ar grauin thir versis psanct colme sanct patrik brigitta pure thir thre dune lyis ane supulture kyng aidane leuyt schort tyme behynd sanct colme deceissit xxvii yeir regne tyme mawricius emprioure fra incarnation vicvi yer th tyme wes institute sanct gregoure ye procession callit latania maior sanct markis day implore mercy god aganis ane terrible pest quhilk rais rome inundatioun tibir gregour send inglad twa haly men namyt austyne millite bring saxonis cristin faith ye saxonis bure sic hatrent aganis britonis inglismen thay wald heir na doctryne precheing yame yairfore wes necessar thir two haly men suld cum ingland instruk saxonis ye cristin faith finalie quhen haly man sact austyne wes precheand ye saxonis myglinton thay wer nocht onlie rebellad precheing bot contemptioun thay sewit fische talis abi ement otheris alliegis thay dang hym skait rumpillis nochtheles derisioun succedit thair gret displesoure god tuke thaym sic vengeance thay thair posterite lang talis mony yeris eftir memorie heirof ye barnis ar yit borne myglintoun he samyn deformite bot ye men hauad experience thairof fleis toun tyme thair birth eschapis yi malediction ye way nochtheles thir haly men perseuerit sic feruent precheing mony saxonis ressauit sacramet baptyme ethelfred kyng northumbirland heirand sa gret noumer saxonis conuerti cristin faith become rycht sorowfull votit hym thair perpetuall ennyme yi tyme wes scotland thre haly men oure natioun baldreid dunstane connall first wes ane excellet doctour deceissit ye basse ane strang castall within see parochinaris auldham tynnyngham prestoun contendit quhilk thaym thre suld haue body decore thair kirk finalie thay wer cotent superseid yair debait quhil nixt morow consultit bischop morow thay fand mirakill god thre thre bodyis na thyng discrepat fra otheris quantite coullour arrayment comand bischop ilk parochin tuke ane yir bodyis thair kirk sa body haly man lyis mirakill thre kirkis secound dunstane wes eme king aidane bot contempnyt warlde wes ane religious man thrid connall wes discipill sanct mungo buryit inchynnane nocht far fra glasqw quhair haldyn gret veneratioun pepill kyng kenneth eugenius fourt hovv kyng britonis vvas doung realme saxonis recouerit samyn hovv ethelfred kyng northumberland vvas slane sindri haly ca xviii ane couention wes maid argyle eftir deith king aidane quhilk kennethkeir son cowallus afore rehersyt wes mayde kyng deceissit ye fourt moneth eftir coronation eftir deith eugenius fourt name sonne aidane wes maid kyng said sanct colme schew afore deith kyng aidane mony othir sonnis elder eugenius yit nane thaym suld reiose crown scotland bot onlie eugeni quhilk wes prouin weill eftir ye residew sonnis wer slane sindry chancis battal eugeni wes sa institute youth doctryne sanct colme wes geuin erar defend awin tha inuaid otheris wes ane iust vertuus prince trew subdittis ryche displesant misdoaris comandit idill pepil iuglaris menstralis bardis scaffaris othir pa realme elli fynd sum craft wyn yair leiffyng punist thift na le cruelte reif slauchter maid regor punition nobillis quhen fand yame oppressouris pure subdittis contrar tretit yame gret reuerence honouris quhen fand thaym virtewis ten yeir regne cingell kyng west saxonis ethelfred kyng northubirland come ane gret army aganis cadwallo kyng hi tonis chasit hym scotland nochtheles abaid schort tyme bot past bartanye quhare gat sic support kyng thairof returnyt walis nocht onlie recouerit realme bot slew gret noumer saxonis yi tyme reidwald kyng eist saxonis ethelbreid kyng south saxonis com gret armyis aganis ethelfreid kyng northumbirland put thaim afore gret affliction taikyng cristin faith thir armyis faucht togidd wintringham quhair ethelfreid wes slane maist part pepill last wourdis wer yir de leuit protectour religioun goddis ennyme cristin pepil thir wourdis randerit vnhappy saule pyne succedit place ane cristyn man namyt edwyne ethelfreid vii sonnis namyt eufreid oswald oslaws oswan offas osmond osyk thir vii brethir detestand treasoun pychtis thay come nocht support thair fadir fled eugenius quhair thay wer plesandlie ressauit tuke cristyn faith thair sister ebba eschewyng pollutioun hir body gat ane bait deuyne mirakill come helpe man heid humbir quhair scho wes professit nun deit ane haly virgyne psic thyngis done kyng eugenius reparit al ye kirkis realme quhilk wer afore distroyit cruelte saxonis stuffi strenthis bordouris strang munitionis vitallis deceissit xv yeir regne fra incarnatioun vicxx yeris buryit colmekyll tyme bonifacius bischop come ane cumpany haly men italy mouth tay psum authouris sayis chosyn pape efter sanct gregoure wylfully renunsit paperie come scottis yocht nocht nowmerit amang legend papis yit fynd hym ane man syngulare lyfe doctrine place quhare landit first scotland ereckit hym ane kirk honour sanct petir ye appostyll efter went ane town namit tullyne thre myle fra dunde quhare rasit ane othir kirk siclike name sanct petir foundit kirk restynneth quhilk ane abbay channownis regular efter went throw syndry partis scotland quhare precheit euangellis pat last come ro quhare perseuerit end lyfe buryit rosmatkyn tyme haly man bischop sanct melok ane gret precheour buryit sanct boniface pand tyme gilliam columbane scottis dyscending nobyll blude thairof thair syngulare haly lyfe war haldyn gret reuerence amang fra chemen pthis ylk tyme pape boniface dedicat temple goddis callit pantheon honoure blissit virgin mary ye moder god sanctis pof vicius tyrane kyng ferquhart hovv slevv hym self haly man fiacre ca xix eugenius deceissit haue schawin thre sonnis ferquhart fyacre doneuald ye eldest ferquhart maid king thir thre sonnis eugenius geuyn yair youth ye haly man sanct conane bischop ile man ferquhart doneuald proffitit na thynge ye said ile traisting letteris vnproffytabyll thair estait thrid bruthir fyacre geuyn contemplation tuk purpos eschew ye cumpany men warldly digniteis make hym vnknawyn pepyll tuke ane pure habit departit scotland france quhare leiffit ane solitar lyfe gat ane croft geuyn hym sanct pharo bischop melden ane chapell ereckit hym quhare leiffit residew dayis said wemen gangis chapell wyl othir blind wod empire ferquhart throw lang peace rais gret deuision amang nobyllis gret dammage realme pthis kyng sa neclygent sowpit maner vice yat gaif na labour mei seditioun amang nobyllis traisting sa lang trubyll slauchter endurit amag nobyllis na rebellyon suld rise aganis hym throw quhilk realme put gret mischeif becaus yi trubyl come throw necligence yi vnhappy tyrane hatit reput maist abhominabyll pepyll throw quhilk come sic infelicite nothir reuerence god sicht comoun weil pand vse tyranni dred men man hym reuerence nobillis hauand gret displesour realme mysgouernit hym maner conuenit amang thaym self reparit iniuris aduyse beleuit nobillis becaus thay saw sa mony enormiteis hym yt suld fall pelagius herespis howbeit othir scottis kyngis afore hym war neuir attetit sic thing thair suspition ye mair vehement accumpani wt britonis ye samyn errouris last aspyit makand derision young child war brocht ye font haue baptisme yat ye pepil maid thair confession preistis ye nobillis mouit detestabyll werkis send ane herald brig hym thair counsal knaw gif sic thingis war deuulgat hym aith becaus thay fand hym rebelland thair chargis thay tuke hym force ye castell quhare put hym pryson incontinent thay tuke consultatioun quhidder suld degradit haldyn perpetual pryson efter lang aduysement concludit continew hym styl prison send ambassatouris france bryng fyacre secound son eugeni scotland ressaue ye crown thairof gif thay micht persuaid hym na reason said effect desyre clotarius king france interpone auctorite caus fyacre send scotland ressaue ye gouernance thairof ambassatouris quhilkis war send effect come finaly quhare fyacre contemplatioun bot yit afore yair cumyng aduertist ane visioun thair desyris besoucht god suffer hym nocht frustrat heuynly plesour solitar contemplation god hard prayer quhen yi ambassatour brocht presece apperit yair sycht sa ful lipper repute thaym maist horribyll creature erd ambassatour seing sic point demandit hym cauldly gif couate return scotland quhare mycht purgit malady natyue fude schew thaym send ye nobyllis scotland prouide hym necessaris samyn fyne fyacre quhilk na mair respect honouris maist abhominabyll pestilece answerit beleue ye knaw haue tane fra cu pany warld ane solitar life howbeit sorrowful malady suffer erar emendatioun lyfe induceing humillyte ony vyce nature sufficience pure sell sobir herbis quhilkis prepare ha dis standis sa content thairwith desyre na warldly dignite thairfore returne hame bid brothir noblis haue sycht god religioun iustice arme yame virtew quhilk may vincust na irruption violence ennymes vnderstand brocht sic estate wyll god ane priuate life maist ganand pfyacre ane syster namyt syra quhilk heirand hir brutheris halynes come hym melden quhom scho professit nun mony othir virginis samyn mynd perseuerit gud relygyoun deuotioun end thair lyfe pthe nobyllis scotland knawyng thir ambassatouris estate fyacre chesit foure men gouernouris ye realme quhill thay war mair profundly resoluid concernyng gouernance yaitof samyn tyme ferquhart vexit malancoly seiknes prisonyn suld nocht remane pyne slew hym self xii yei regne fra ye incarnation vicxxxii yeris pof kyng doneuald deith edvvyne kyng northumberland hovv eufred osrik kyngis northumberland vvar punist thair ny done cristin pepyl hovv king osvvald conuertit saxonis faith crist ca xx ferquhart ye tyrane slane said ane counsall set argyle ye quhilk doneuald thrid sonne eugenius maid kig doneuald following gouernance fader reparit placis quhilkis wer dekeyit afore neclygence ferquhart pat tyme cadwallo kyng brytonis penda kyng south saxonis war considerat togydder slew edwyne kyng northumberland come gret cruelte throw mers berwyk tuke syndry landis fra dominioun pychtis pychtis hauand na power resist thair c uelte send king doneuald support becaus thay ga na support thay war opprest importabyll iniuris kyng doneuald ad deith edwyne send considerat brothir cadwallo kyng brytonis praying hym admyt eufred sonne kyng ethelfred crown northumberland quhen samyn grantit eufred left remanent brethir scotland admittit half crown northumberland othir half geuyn ane fals vnhappy man namyt osrik thir two kyngis northumberland war fynaly confyderat togidder affinite osrikis douchter geuyn eufred mariage ye catholik faith become maist odious tyranni persewaris goddis seruantis fylland cuntre full fals errouris gentilis throw quhylk syndry pichtis fell said errouris quhill last correctioun bischoppis thay war recounsallit faith cadwallo kyng britonis rycht displesit eufred osrik quhylkis war promouit hym empyre northumberland war fallyn sic errouris thay desyrit erar heritikis cristin pepyll send preistis purge thaym thair errouris bot thir preistis returnit euyll doung na thyng sped yair purpos c istin princis albioun heirand contemption send othir messingeris thir two kyngis scharp wrytyng afore bot thir preistis mair contemptioun war slane rage cruelte thir dispitfull tyranni grew sa gret cristin pepyll dwellyng besyde yame war martyrit except sa mony wer sauit flycht pryncis albioun mouyt thir cruelteis tuke purpos punys thaym maist rygoure bryng samyn gud fyne thay maid cadwallo penda generall capitanis thai gaderit ane gret multytude brytonis pychtis saxonis hauand na thyng mair hatrent errouris gentilis osrik eufred knawing u myng sa mony pryncis aganis yame rasit pepyll vnder thair dominion faucht aganis said princis britane nochtheles yair army discomfist thair self tane prisoner within dayis efter thay slew thaym self disperatioun battall nane found sa cruell aganis osrik eufred oswald thair bruthir cause maid kyng northumberland kyng oswald efter coronatioun send kyng dowald desyryng certane precheouris send scotland conuert pepyl faith kyng dowald send request ane na le grauite erudition namit cormane quhen cormane prechit lang tyme amang northumbrianis sa cu ius theology sermon apperit mair vane ostentatioun pryde ony doctryne pepyll fynaly returnit scotland schew prelatis thairof yat northumbrianis war sa dull na doctryne mycht proffit thaym war nocht onely repugnant command bot contempnit ye samyn contrar yair lawis constitutionis prelatis heirand thir wordis tuke syndry consultationis quhat best bring thair pepyl thair arrouris sum men thocht expedient send cormane agane northumbirland mony otheris doctouris spare na lauboure weill crystyn fayth plesour thair freind kyng oswald traisting continewall labour yt ye northumbrianis micht bro faith yocht sic thingis micht nocht haistely done otheris said gif northumbrianis mycht ny way haue bene recouseld ye faith thay wald haue dene brocht cormane erar ony othir becaus richt resolute deame letteris ane profound clerk sen doctrine na thing aualit necessar send ony othir doctouris ye samyn effect aidane haly bischop said maner bring men fra errouris reduce yame sicker faith thynk expedient wise faderis schaw sic thingis ye begynnyng may persuaid yame feruent luf god quhen precheour he maid ye pepyl desyrus heir sermon tane yair beniuolence preche first foundment ye cristin faith ony ostentation arrogance nocht inuoluyng pepyl sic difficil materi may apprehendit yame ye ingyne men nocht drawin haistely fra euyl accustome siclik thay lerne science virtew proces tyme lernis maist facil materis first way traist thair science ye mair imprentit thair breist heirfore gif reuerend byschop cormane obseruit rite ye begynnyng obstenit fra curious questyonis faith dout nocht bot pepil suld haue bene obeydient commademetis thairfore sen na thing sat fyit desyre kyng oswald thynk samyn cumyn na le defalt doctoure pepyll thir causis best yit send ane new pr cheoure northumberland sal first precheing geif thaym mylk efter geif yame mair ferme ude othir wayis thay wyl neuir brocht ye faith bischopp apprisit cousal wt ane mynd send hym self yi charge northumberland refusit ye charge bot come glaid king oswald quhais cumyng sic confluence pepil conuenit constranit preche outwith ye kirkis throw multitude pepyll come prechyng alwayis becaus aidane nocht ye langage saxonis gret impedimet preching nochtheles kyng oswald langage baith scottis saxonis interprete prechyng ye pepyl throw quhilk thay war haldyn baith gret veneration co uertit viim saxonis within dayis cristin faith saxonis tha wer callit inglismen northubrianis chesit aydane yair bischop becaus thay saw ylk day thair deuotion incres gret mer preistis come support aidane thay biggit sindry kirkis northumbirland dedicat yame honoure god virgyne mary throw quhilk said regioun grew na le catholyk ony othir prouince ingland tyme penda king marchis tuke purpos inuade kyng oswald conques realme oswald withstande inuasioun assemblit ane large nowmer pepyll slane army discomfist oswald haly lyfe myrakillis eikit amag ye nowmer sactis slauchter xii yeir empire dowald quhilk leuit nocht lang efter deith xv yeir regne perist lochtay quhare hapnit ane fisching seruantis solace body found creparis buryit colmekyll fra ye incarnation vicxlv yeris pof vnhappy phete machomete fals lavvis sindry haly men kyng ferquhart extorsionis done aganis pepyll miserabyll end ca xxi tyme deceissit ye warijt creature machomete quhilk tyme kyng ferquhart got tyn ane ydolatour vncertane arraby persy moder ane catholyk woman hismaelitis pthis machomete instytute youth baith hethyn crystyn lawis pand becaus thocht nane thaym accordyng plesoure maid ane fals supersticius rite richt warijt mankynd quhen cumyn ni age conquest leuyng thift pikary mariit ane wedow namit cadigane quhome conquest gret rich landis possessionis come syndry cha ci sa gret estimatioun amang ye pepyll araby maid lawis gouern thaym iustice wes instruckit ane cursit monk namit sergius quhom colleckit lawis fra institutionis syndry pepyll ratifyis sacrament baptisme haldis crist borne ane clene virgyne commendis psalmis euangellis say thay war mendit alcorane alcorane maner ane bybyll gaderit hym mony fals institutis lawis phe ratifyis circumcision iowis doi denyis trinite sabellianis doi denyis ye fader coequale sonne ennomianis doi sayis haly spreit ane creature macedonis doi schortly lawis maid sensualite man throw quhilk drew syndry pepil opinion corruppit faith machomete spred asia affrik mekyll europe bega fra ye incarnation vicxxxv yeris tyme war france mony haly men fursius stoilanus uulcanus brethir gottin ye blude rial scotland ireland amang w war tyme connane columbane cromane domiane mony history tuiching sanct colme kyng aidane nct aidane mony othir haly afore rehersit colleckit sact bot wyl return history efter deith kyng dowald brothir sonne ferquhard sonne kyng ferquhard afore rehersit maid king ane man hie ingyne bot efter coronation alterit fra ane liberall humane prince maist insaciabyl bludy tyrane quhe auctoure liberal aboue power gaif guddis support madynnis yair mariage c comiseration euery persone yt deieckit fra gud fortoun powerce conquest gret fauour pepyll iugit thairfore ane nobyll prince al sone clothit publik auctorite become ane oppressour pepyl full auarice like ane bludy fleschour ennyme religion comparit iustly ane insaciabyl pul clamit agane guddis quhilkis gaif afore auctorite h nobillis said thay war bot lent fynaly slew thaym ye war repugnant wayis elli confiscat thair guddis held thaym prysone opprest riche men realme confiscat thair guddis vane causis time war two haly men namit finnane colmane haldin amang scottis gret veneration thir haly men herand cruelte done bludy tyrane come yele iustice persuading hym amend life last finding penitent na wayis thay denuncit hym cursit vnhappy man tuke litill indignatioun thairof assistance vicious lymmaris quhilkis war reddy intertene hym insolence tuke plesoure thris ylk day far wambe surfettis delycius cheir yt micht deuisit make hym inebriat drukin othir vice worthy rehersit mouth sa insaciabill yt na foule ye ayre fische seyis rest schamefull glotony yit na thing maid hym sa odius ye pepill rebellioun aganis censuris haly kirke amag mony othir enormiteis fukeit two douchteris slew wife becaus scho detestit vice pepill seing hym perseuere sic horribill tyranny gaderit deliuerit mynd put hym deith nochtheles thay war inhibit sanct colmane quhilk schew deuine prophecy gif amendit haistely life suld punist ye iustice god weill prouin within ane moneth efter king hu tand ane wolf fellis quhe scho sarit ye houndis scho ruschit king bait hym ye syde fynaly kyng fell ane maist vile schameful maledy vncertane quhidder come bit ye wolf ony othir occasioun ane vennomus humour eit consumyt ye inwart membris h body intollerabill pyne lymmis feit secreit membris vile eroure wer dissoluit wambe throw immoderat voracite wes swolin bene edroppit quhen continewit two yeris infirmite abhominabill creaturis become penitent saying bene obedient counsall colmane nocht bene deuorit horrible malady etin vile wormes iust punition god vncouth importabill doloure schawis nowe mony gret offencis baith aganis god man destitute remeid without mercy ye thir wormes yt ar bred flesch schawis maist horrible vnhappy creature mene tyme ran hym seruandis inquirit gyf desyrit ane preist heir confessioun said bring bischop colmane al sone colmane wes brocht hym affoilyeit first cursyn eftir hard confession suadit gud curage haue hop god quhais mercy wes mair yan ony syn yt mycht god said turne yow ye salve saif kyng ferquhart rasit hope thir wourdis fell kneis askand mercy pictuus teris ressauit blissit body crist sone eftir wes brocht hous quhare lay vile claith nixt mote quhair gaif gaist xviii yeir regne fra incarnatioun viclxiiii yeris samyn yeir sanct aidane bischop northuberland deceissit quhais place succedit fynnane quhilk deceissit sone eftir ye samyn maner eftir deith succedit bischop colmane quhais haly precheing gret multitude saxonis wer brocht cristin faith colmane past throw al ye kirkis amang saxonis precheing wourd god wes translatit cathedrall kirk lyndefern pof kyng maldvvine hovv vvas slane vvife vvife brint gret mortalite rage pest syndry pa ti vvarld hovv ye scottis vvas preseruit fra ye samyn ca xxii ferquhard deceissit yi wyse maldwyne son dowald wes maid king wes ane deuote price tuk peace pichtis saxonis tuke sic deligence administratioun iustice pepil leuit iniuris thus succedit al thyng plesandlie begynnyng empire last rais ane seditioun betuix men leuenax argyle drew mony ye nobillis forttifying thair debait becaus ilis rais argyle galloway rais leuenax mony heirschippis followit sydis kyng maldwyne punis thir extorsionis come ane army aganis principall mouaris thairof ceissit nocht quhill thay extreme rigour iustice wer punyst deith thus trubill wes fulischelie begun wes dantit haistelie maid name maldwine sa feirful nobillis na seditioun followit thair eftir duryng empire nocht lang eftir kyng went colmekil vesy sepulturis eldaris reparit said abbay new biggynnis fra ground dedicat honour god sanct colme tyme rang ane terrible pest gret mortalite pepill sindry partis warld ceissit nocht quhill ye pepil continewall prayar fastyng gud werkis peacyfyit ye wraith god scottis thir dayis knew na maner hait feuer wer preseruit fra samyn teperance thair mouth cruel pestilence rang neuir amang scottis quhill thay left hailsum temperance yair eldaris maid thaym self reddy aue al infirmiteis colman bischop lyndeferne seand ane huge multitude saxonis peri pest returnit ilis quair biggit ane abbay dwelt brethir end lyfe eftir ye departyng colmane ye northumbrianis support pychtis maid eitschippis scottis kyng maldwyne ceissit nocht quhill samyn wer recompensit siclike displesoure baith pychtis saxonis cause incurrit thair extreme hatrent followit perseuerand malyce gret heitschippis slauchter sydis quhil last kyng maldwyne wes slane within nycht wyfe suspitioun adultry xx yeir regne fra incarnation vicxxxiiii yeris yi cruelte wes lag vnpunist ye nixt morow vnhappy woma wes tane wt hir coplicis brynt cruelly deith eugeni ye fift ye message send edfred king northuberland peace takin thairefter hovv king edfred vvas slane eugenius vvith xxm saxonis haly man sanct cuthbert ca xx ii maldwyn slane haue writtin nepote eugeni fift wes maid kyng send ambassatour edfreid kig northuberland desirand peace edfreid heirad ye desiris eugeni fenyeit ane luffar peace howbeit mynd wes geuin na thyng mair tha battal nochyeles gaue trew xii monethis ye fyne yt mycht duryng ye season mak uision al thingis necessar weris ye trewis wes geuin vnder thir coditionis scottis sal repair al enormyteis done saxonis picht redres maid al sydis gif scottis inuadit ye pichtis saxonis tymes cumyng ye peace dissoluit ye saxonis pychtis fre inuaid scottis notwithstading ony cotract peace maldwyne suspeckit dissait saxonis maid gret uisio battal sine garnist al ye str bordouris munition vittallis aganis al dageir yt mycht fall ische tent moneth edfreid send ane buschement saxonis ye scottis landis eftir yt thay slane ane gret nowmer scottis yai returnit gret pray guddis northubirland sone eft ambassatouris wer send eugenius edfred desyring redres quho answerit yt wald iuade ye scottis mair trubil tha afore oni redres eugeni sead ye peace violat wt ye trewis besocht god ye punisar wrag turne ye damage following ye weris yame gaif ye first occasion battal finalie heirand yt ennymes wer cu galloway gaderit ane gret power preuene yair cuing yit afore cuing ye saxonis pichtis wer liand ye seige donskene ye strangest castel galloway yai dayis edfred haisty cuing scott wes costranit leif ye seige met yame ye riuer lewis galloway quhilk ye tyme inudation n wi boldin aboue ye brayis scottis seand yair ennimes sicht maid aith neuir pa ye feild quhil ane yam war lyue without thay victory battallis iunit haistely equale hatret edfred exhortit men remebir yair anciant virtew vincus yair ennymes violent force siclik eugeni ceissit pa folkis exhorting yam schaw yair inuincibil curage yai micht reiose ye palme victory quhill ye saxonis scott war fechtad th maist fury ye pichtis fled ye nixt mote ye fleing pichtis deieckit gretuly ye curage saxonis yai dred ye yir pichtis suld cu yair back nochyeles kig edfred exhortit folkis seueir ythand battal quhe spekand maist specialy rasit vp visour ye mair feruet speche icotinet doug throw ye heid ane ganye quhare face bair fel ye groud ye saxonis seand yair king slane gaif backis quho followit ye scott wt lag chace draue yam ye riuer lewis quhare mony yame perist yame tane battal wer slane xm saxonis edfred yair kig scottis vim yt residew yair army euyll woudit ye saxonis northuberland discofist battal bot al mony al othir saxonis ingland quhilk come yair support brude kig pichtis knawing hym self odi baith scott saxonis seand ilkane yame brokin wt otheris weris come wt ane new army ye northubrian subdewit yam ony recouir war sact cuthbert durhame supportit yame mirakil yi haly schew edfred afore yi battal yt suld fail euersion realm subditt gif inuadit inocet pepil wrang weris ye pichtis ceissit fra iuasion northubrianis quhil last yai fell cotention amag yame self ye spulye fallin yame frequent heirschippis ye said pepil throw quhilk yai war brokin finaly cotent haue ye ladis berwik peceably tymes cumyng inuasion northubrianis king eugenius efter yi victory returnit hame fra then ye saxonis began ilk day decline northuberlad mycht recouer yair honouris mony yer eft eugeni leiffit lang eft yi victory deceissit ye ferd yeir regne fra incarnation viclxxxviii yeris pof gret trubyll done sarazenis cristin pepyl king eugeni ye vi actis vncouth meruellis sene albion ca xxiiii yi tyme arriuit ane huge nowmer sarazenis egipt sicil affrik ye gret damage cristin pepil eft deith eugeni ye v eugeni ye vi son ferquhart maid king sa weill institute youth reuerend bischop namit adanane yt held religion gret reuerece held peace wt ye northubrianis bot yit nathing micht suade hym cofiderat picht bure yame extreme hatret becaus yai faucht treasonably aganis ye scottis afore support saxon kepit yair faith ye northubrianis nochyeles tuk trewis wt yame ane yeir al sone ye trewis war runing send ane herald denucit weir yame ye haly bischoppis sact cuthbert sanct adanane went ambassatouris draw yir two pepil cocord becaus yair labour war frustrat ya went yair prayeris beseking god sed cocord ye ii pepil said yir haly gat grat god quho al empire thocht ar subieckit baith peace weir ye scottis pichtis sal meit aganis othir wt hail power yair realmes sa lag eugeni leiffit yus continewit ye witis betuix scottis pichtis ony gret damage baith thair realmes ye end eugeni life quhilk wes ye x yeir regne fra ye incarnatio viclxxxxviii yeris body wes buryit colmekil mony vncouth meruellis wer sene tyme albion ane flote schippis wes sene maner ordinance riuer hubir suddanlie euanist sicht gret noyis armor wappynnis wes herd ye kirk camelon last boundis scotland wes ane schoure blude sindry landis pychtis ye mylk turnyt blude cheis siclik lu pi blud corne wes bludy eruest yir meruellis quhe yai war diuulgat maid pepyl affrayit ye vicius tyrane amberkeleth deith kyng eugenius vii hovv scottis pichtis vvar recounsalit togidder affinite slauchter eugeni vvyfe vii haly virginis dotat ye kyng pichtis ab rnethy ca xxv efter ye deith eugeni ye vi amberkeleth son elli nepote eugeni ye first maid king king alterit maner fra gat auctorite afore electioun semit defedour ye pure pepyl kirkmen nochtheles fra clothit auctorite apperit ane vicius monstour drownit lust auarice effeminat lyfe garnard kig pichtis seand schameful monstoure vse na thyng semand ane prince tuke occasioun inuade scottis traisting fynd sufficient tyme reuenge iniuris done pichtis maid gret heirschippis slauchter ye scottis landis amberkeleth febyll curage sall nocht moue ennymes hye attemptatis assemblit army resist pichti cht durst skarsly confide noblis vse tyranny quhilkis leuis ay vnder feir dreid yit went forth wart displayit baner come first nycht watter tay efter supper past furth ye glomyng eis two seruandis mene tyme schot throw heid ane arrow quhom vncertane deceissit secound yeir regne burijt colmekyll nobillis lytyl comouit deith yt thair army suld nocht peri falt ane heid maid eugenius vii name kyng eugenius bruthir amberkeleth ane man gret body gud conditionis becaus vnderstude h army brokin lang weris tuk peace nichtbouris pichtis causit redres maid aithir syde mene tyme ye two kyngis war confiderat affinite spontana douchter garnard kyng pichtis geuin mariage king eugenius ye yeir following two brethir athole quhilkis wer conspirit ye kyngis deith slauchter thair fader slew lady gret wt child sted eugeni scho lyand bed quhen happenit away eugeni murmour pepyll lang tyme suspeckit hir deith constranit thairfore schaw ye pietuis maner hir slaucht murdresar last war takin put cruelli deith eugeni gaif hym religius ciuyl mater causit al ye mercial dedis acecessouris put cronykillis rais knichtly curage posterite desire honouris laude causit thir cronikillis keipit petually abbay colmekyll expert hystoricianis sustenit thair comon purs writ dedis scottis bot othir pepill ye chance tyme occurrit eugenius reparit syndry kirkis realme gret reuerence byschoppis prelatis thairof e kit yair patrimony syndry possessionis landis rentis perseuerit gud peace pichtis saxonis deceissit xviii yeir regne fra incarnatioun viicxvi yeris tyme doneuald haly man quhilk leuit ane sobir lyfe ogylny sex mylis fra dunde haldyn amang pichtis gret veneratioun said yt vii douchteris quhilk leuit wt hym gret penance beir breid wattir thay eit neuir bot ani ye day residew thairof occup continewal labour orison eldest douchter mayot maid inhibitation wyld geis eit hir faderis corne thay obeyit hir haly monitionis yairfore wyld geis neuir sene eft ye groud thir haly virginis efter deceis thair fader knawyng na securite leif desertis sum defendouris thair chastite come garnard kyng pichtis desyring sum place quhare thay mycht leif ane solitar lyfe honour god garnard codiscendit yair desyr gaif yam ane hous abernethy certane rentis takin vp ye nixt ladis thair sustentation quhare yai leif fit ane deuote lyfe war burijt ye rute ane ayk quhilk haldin yit gret veneration amang pepil abernethy ye tyme ane ciete pichtis decorit ye first seit bischoppis thair realme bot efter sa distroyit brint weris scottis yt come neuir agane first stait thir virginis war tyme conran wt sanct brigitta ye comonis haldis bot ye tyme eugenius ye vii perseuerit gud peace garnard visyit oftymes yir vginis wt liberalite guddis resignit ye crown mordak quho salbe nyxt history pof king mordak vverki deith iiii sindry pepil albion gret mirakill sanct niniane sanct bede ca xxvi noblis efter ye deith eugeni chesit mordak son amberkeleth kig ane humyll liberal prince tuk gret labouris caus al pepyl yt albion leif togidder amite concord maid peace betuix ye pichtis britonis remanent kyngis ingland tyme sanct bede remembris foure syndry pepil war albion cofiderat togidder peace richt different thair manerris langage institutionis say ye britonis scottis pichtis saxonis quhilkis war callit inglismen becaus ye wordis bede ar corespodent history haue inserit yame heir followis ye nation pichtis confiderat saxonis tyme reiosyng ticipat ye vniuersal kirk peace catholik verite scottis quhilk ihabit britane wer sa cotet wt yair awin boud yt yai wrocht na iniuris slichtis cotrar saxonis suppos ye maist part britonis ane natural hatret agan inglisme sindry sustitionis yit repugnance ye law god yai mycht optene yair purpos desyr yocht ye britonis sut fre yit yai ar thirllit su part inglismen thairfore mony yame baith noblis commonis insolence felicite lang peace ar mair geuyn contemplation bukis religion ony cheualry dedis armis quhat end sall cu thairof sall appere sone oure posterite yir ar ye last wordis ye history writtin sanct bede fra ye incarnation viicxxxi yeris bot wil return history kig mordak reparit mony abbayis kirkis realm quhilkis war distroyit afore ye weris eldaris foundit ye abbay quhittern quhare blissit byschop sact ninian kith daily miraklis tha euir sene ony othir sact albion king mordak deceissit ye xvi yeir regne fra incarnation viicxxxi yer sact bede callis quhit ern pythynnia callis ye bischop yt succedit imediatly eft sanct nimane ta bot yit necessar say gyf ony bischop yair seit quhit ern yai yeid sone ye vse yairof ye ilis obeyit bischop galloway sodoren quhilk principale seit ye ile man vnto ye tyme king malcolme ye iii tyme ye abbay quhittern first institute bot restorit ye bischoppis galloway sact bede deceissit sone eft ye copleting ye history britonis buriit durhame fra ou redeption viicxxxiiii yeris ane cotenion yit betuix italianis albianis cocerning place quhare sanct bede borne ye italianis sayis borne ianis buriit samyn sepulture yair yit gret veneration quhat sumeuir place deceissit gottin treuth maid lang residence quhe grew age northumberland vsit oftymes melros quhilk ane abbay gud religious men scotland deceissit ye tyme king ethfyne quhom sall nixt hystory pof king ethfyne hovv maid foure regentis gouern realme gret cruelteis done donald ilis deith kyng ethfyne ca xxvii mordak buriit colmekyll ane conuention maid noblis ethfyne son eugeni vii maid king ethfyne ane man geuyn iustice peace kepit band maid afore britonis inglismen pichtis mordak eugeni purgit realm al misdoar set labour baith ye defence liegis honoure religion thus grew ye scottis rich honest maneris theuis reiffaris sawaris displesour amag ye noblis comonis put punist iustice fynaly ha din sic reuerence dredour virtew yt na durst mycht say reason ony displesand wordis hym quhil last fel age ye gaif ye administratioun realm iiii regentis decret cou sal quhais name war donald thesaurer argyle collane thane athole mordak thane galloway conraith thane murray yir regent gidit ye realm wt sic iustice gidit afor ye kig ilkane yam labourit sa besal yair freindis yt yai na respect iustice throw quhilk ye noblis othir young men returnit thair ald insolence gret damage polecy comon weill thair realme donald ye ilis ane man strang body ingyne na thyng set virtew held ane cupany vagabud lymmaris hym maid ythad reiffis heirschippis ye cuntre ony punition yocht mordak ane foure regentis chosyn gouern realme yit wald punis yir cruelteis done donald vncertan quhidd iunit hym blude participant hym proffet reiffis comonis brocht uter heirschippis powerte complenit mordak maist lametable wise desyrit restitution thair guddis becaus kyng tyme extreme malady nane put remeid thair displesouris commonis opprest thir sorowis seand na remeid rasit thair handis heuyn complenit thair miserijs amang yame self bot ay mair thay complenit mair cruelte followit donald apperit thus na esperance tranquillite quhill last kyng ethfyne deceissit xxx yeir regne burijt colmekyll yeir god viiclxii yeris pof kyng eugenius viii hovv vvas slane tyranny euyll counsalouris hyngit iebatis ca xxviii efter ye deith ethfyne eugenius ye viii son mordak maid kig ye beginnyng semit ye mair plesand yt ceissit quhill th donald complicis war punist deith presence pepyll thair demeritis yit kyng nocht full sithit iustice bot mair rigoure punist mordak deith becaus alliat ye sayd donald participant hym treason sic thingis done kyng eugeni accusit ye remanet regetis dowald collan coraith becaus thay mycht haue sauit ye pepil fra trubil done yame found necligent thairintyl ye kingis infirmite thay payit gret sowmis ye kingis proffet redemption thair lyuis throw yir punitionis ye realme pecifiit al ti king sic dredour pepyll yt na rebellion apperit rise amang ye comonis tyme pepil beleuit haue got tyn ane gud prince quhen eugenius began regne aboue yame bot oft occurris ye ingyne mair procliue reddy euyl werkis tha gud th eugeni hauad empire vnder lag peace sleuth fel maist schamful vice ragead mair lust semit ony man ane fulyear virginis nobill matronis deliting na thing mair tha bordellis tauernis luffit nane bot yame ye couth bring hi moniest cocubinis nur new lu plesour throw quhilk icressit ylk day mair vice become sa auarici yt regardit nothir ye law god slew sindry trew h realm baith spiritual teporal vane causis coques yair ladis rich sustene ane cupany vicius limaris hym bot cruelte vici dedis war lag vnpunist ye noblis sead yt micht refrenit fra sic enormiteis scha full werkis seand yt nothir ye censouris haly kirk god reuerece cospirit haistely aganis hi slew hym ye tolbuth quhare sewad ane trew ye deith awin geir sine tuk familiaris quhilk assistit vnhappy dedis hingit yam iebatis ye gret plesour ye pepill end maid eugeni ye viii ye thrid yeir regne body ordanit cassin ane closet elli deuorit hundis rauenous beistis nochtheles ye sic thingis suld succeid na le scham atecessor tha posterite bodi licece noblis wes brocht colmekil buriit amang ye sepultur othir kig pof vicius kyng fergus thrid hovv vvas slane vvife hir orison maid counsal hovv scho slevv hir self ca xxix fergus thrid yat name son kyng ethfyne maid king efter deith eugenius viii nocht far discrepant fra maneris eugenius ye viii become ane drunkin glotoun sic effeminar lust necleckit administration realme tuke plesoure nane bot udlaris insaciabyl dru kettis sic vicius detestabyl personis hatit virtius pepyll ane grete nowmer huris followyng hym held thaym sic familiarite hym lichtlijt contempnit awin wyfe brocht hir sic penurite scho constranit serue othir nobyl weme hir suste tation woman impacient suff r sic iniuris come syndry tymes kyng prayit hym amend life gif desyrit haue lang empire schew gif continewit adultre sall nocht eschew deuyne punitioun quhen leist wenit kyng na thyng regardyng hir wordis ceissit nocht ylk day rage mair insolence last quene hir self defraudit det matrimony thocht bettir hir wedow leif dayly co temptioun amang thir concubinis fynaly scho slew kyng sleipand bed thrid yeir regne body brocht morrow counsall hous serche diligent inquisitioun quha durst attempt sa gret cruelte mony kyngis freindis seruy ouris comperit iug ment sorowful chere desyring werkaris th cruelte serchit maist diligence becaus na man suspition quene persew hir husband ony displesoure mony ye kyngis familiaris wer tane scharp questionis demandit syndry punist importabyll tormentis quene heirand thir innocent men punist crime yt scho committit come haistely counsall said wyse pi knaw nocht tender pepyl quhat conscience accusis quhat deuyne vengeance esfrayis syndry thochtis al day nicht bygane mynd body aflocht specially sen hard thir innocent men sa cruelly tormentit gif ira nocht bene mesit sum temperance wrocht self maist schameful displesoure kyngis slauchter deid conscience suadis heil saule schaw verite thir innocet men nocht punist cryme yt comittit understand thairfore yt thir men ye accuse ar innocent deith scho slew kyng fergus cursit hand la nycht impacience ire lust quhilkis ar two maist sorrowful broddis amang weme defraudit lawfull bed vsyng imoderat lust othir weme thus quhen na esperance yit persuasionis apperit recounsall hym desyris sic huge bryme fury rais quhil tyistit cruelte thynkad mair plesand remoue occasion adultry destitute husband leif perpetually defraudit bed iniurit thir spous brekaris assoilye heirfore thir men ye accuse deith punys quhilk ye onlie werker yi murdir salbe na gret laubour yat fellony sal tak punition self skarslie wer thir wourdis said quhen scho presence pepill thay mycht aduert dang hir self ane dager hert fell doun deid afore pepill mony peppil gret wonder hir co stance louit hir conscience becaus scho reuelit ye hyd treason delyuer ye innocent men fra yair deith slew hir self preuene ye schame displesoure yt wes apperand hir otheris thocht nane hir doingis apprisable bot repugnat ye law god nature saying wes nocht leifful ony reueil yair awin yit othir mennis treasoun maist detestable innaturally sla thaym self quhill pepill wes disputatioun body fergus wes comandit nobillis brocht colmkill quhair wes buryit fra incarnatioun viiclxvii yeris body quene becaus scho slew hir self wes inhibit lye cristin beriis pof kyng soluathius hovv dan svndry gret lymmaris realme deith mony haly men ca xxx fergus buriit yi wyse soluathius sonne eugenius ye viii wes maid kig ane noble prince abill tyll haue done mony nobill actis realme gyf weirdis bene propiciant thrid yeir regne tuk ye gout throw vehement cald consauit afore hunting infirmyte fel sare iuncturis lethis body yat mycht nocht chargis pertenand ane gud king cotine wit hym end lyfe becaus kyng wes vexit sic infirmite mony gret trubillis followit realme first trubill rais ban capitane ye ile tyre gaderit ane cumpany lymmaris tuke strenthis ilis callit hym self kyng nocht lang efter come mony lang faddis kyntyre lorne maid heirschippis slauchter al partis quhare come king commouit thir attemptatis send douchquhall capitane athole culane capitane argile certane chosin men ilis yat small impediment put banus cumpany flicht draue thaym lang chace ane strait coif lorne within ane crag aboue ane riuer deip ony furd coif na passage th behunit thir men yt fled coif returne samyn gait thay come banus cumpany dreuin coue aduenture maid hym returne come bot fand gait closit ennymes nocht yeles socht mony way eschew quhen passit day sindry opinionis finding na thing proffitable arrayit ane wache within nycht defence cumpany finalie wes dreuin sic penurite becaus na vittallis sustene hym yt send messengeris desyring licence depart ilis lyfe saif last seand nocht elli bot repuls desyris arrayit folkis come aganis douchquhall culane ye brekyng day wes slane cumpany ane notable exempill tymes cumyng quhat frute followis rebellioun aganis yair prince eft yi victorie douchquhall culane went ye ilis pecifyit cuntre tru yll thay plesit nocht lang efter rais ane newe trubyll galloway gyllequham son donald quhilk iustifyit schew eugenius viii nochtheles trubyll pecifyit smal labour fra heiddismen quhom ye first occasioun rais war punist tyme rais gret seditioun betuix saxonis ingland bry oni walis multitude kyngis syndry lawis lang peace rich generit discord pich war cyuyl debait amang thaym self thus sa gret sedition amang albianis thay micht inuade thair nichtbouris kyng soluathi duryng tyme realme gud tranquillite prudent industry nobyllis boundis thairof weill obeysant empyre wt na le iustice passit proper persoun throw realme deceissit xx yeir regne fra incarnatioun viiiclxxxvii yeris thir day war mony clerkis singulare
