eruditioun lyfe macharius bischop abirdene quhom cathedrall kirk dedicat diuinic archedene congane dunstane abbotis thir mony othir thair disciplis war precheouris lanternis haly kirk sum authouris writis thir haly men war othir kyngis day bot vary na thing fra first purpos following ueremond campbell baith history dai promittit sa endis heir ix buke thir croniklis heir begynnis tent buke croniklis scotland pof kyng achai hovv agreit nobillis contentionis message send princis ireland thair ansvver hovv mony ireland men perist seyis hovv scottis ireland men vvar aggreit ca soluathi beand deceissit wyse achaius son ethfyne maid kig prince ye begynnyng empyre set hym mei discord seditionis amang nobillis traistit na thyng sa plesand felicite realm bryng nobyllis commonis concord trubyll beyng mesit apperit ane othir greter motioun betuix ireland ilis ane cumpany ireland maid certane heirschippis kyntyre incontinet ye pepyll ilis ruschit haistely harnes slew ane gret nowmer thir ireland men pthan achaius preuene trubyl mycht follow last bergane send ambassatouris ye princis ireland schewyng hym aduertist ireland men fra quhome scottis tuke thair beginnyng purposit cum haistely inuade realme gret damage two pepill quhilk he bene sa lang togiddir confiderat vnder ane blud amyte schew wes na sufficient cause battall nychtbouris freindis inuaid othir battall howbeit ilk theif reif othir thairfore gyf ireland men wer mair desirus peace weir glaid keip ye auld band hail scottis wald perseuere kyndnes thaym contrar gif yai desyrit battall erar peace nocht resolute quhat wes best done desyrit thaym degest counsall auise quhat trubill sorow mycht follow thair weris sen peace wes finalie necessar auyse quhiddir wer mair plesad afore weris eftir mair profitable haue peace quhen n displesoure wer precedent quhen baith yair realmes wer brokin athiris iniuris princis ireland nochtwithstandyng yir humyl wourdis answerit thai suld sustene chargis sa vailyeantlie yat na aduersite sall follow thairfore yai wald haue na peace scottis quhill iniuris done thaym kyntyre wer redressit reuengit wt mair skaith thay wer al profundlie auisit quhat proffit dammage mycht follow yair weris prouisioun thyngis necessar aganis quhat sumeuir chance fortoun yat mycht follow youcht yir weris wer litil proffet yit yai war sa accustomit thairwith yt thay wald vse ye samyn thair elderis afore quhen yir ambassatouris wer returnand ye ireland seis scotland ye scottis traisting na thing le yan battall irelad ane flote irelad men arriuit ye ilis ceissit fra na maner cruelteis inhabitantis thairof last quhen thay heryit ye cuntre makand thaym returne hame ladyn infinite guddis sic ane storme rais violence ye heuin yat thaym eschapit vnperist ye seis kyng achai heirand yi calamyte fallyng ireland men iust punitioun god thay inuadit realme within trety peace concludit assailye yam na forthir sic desyris beleuit thaym sa brokin yi forsaid trubil yt thay suld seik peace hym ye kyng co iecturit sa followit ambassatouris ireland come hym inuerlochte cofessand manifest punition fallyng yame iustice god ye wrangis yame done scottis prayit achaius gif peace yame quhilk thay refusit fore gyf thair insolence thir ambassatouris answerit achaius youcht irelad men wer obstinat mycht vnderstand yair proffet quhill thay sufferit affliction refusit oftymes sic thig bene maist proffitable yam yit wald repugnant reason sen sawe thaym yat wer ennymes yat tyme iustice god punyst yair offence exempil al pepil quhat vengeance fall yame yat inuadis yair nychtbouris iust tityll battal heirfore schaw hym seruad crist quhilk comedit peace sa gretumlie ye weil mortal pepill wald set asyde baith recent ald iniuris haue peace yame youcht yai deseruit ye ambassatouris depeschit yi maner returnit hame reiosing ye peace grantit yame ye scottis wer vnglaid yairof hauad experience lag vse quhat dammage pleseir may follow weris vncouth realmes phovv kyng charlis send ambassatouris confiderat vvith scottis pichtis thair orison maid k ng achaius orisoun maid aganis thaym culmane ca ii ye mene tyme charlis mayne kig frace romane empriour set mynd wt vter power distroy ennymes cristin faith eft yt vndstude inglisme victorie britonis brocht sic insolence yt thay trubillit baith ye almane franche seis sutyme exercyng sic cruelteis heirschippis france ye marchandis mycht haue na passage see land dant insolence inglismen yat yai nocht haue power inuaid anche almane seis tymes cummyng kyng charlis decreit h nobillis tuke purpos cofiderat scottis pichtis vnder yi conditionis al oft inglismen uis ne army france ye sco ti pichtis sal inuaid ingland gif inglismen inuaidis scottis pichtis ye franche n ye maner sall inuaid ingland dres mater wer ed ambassatour frace kig achaius quhen yai wer brocht presence ane thaym said yi maner rycht illuster prince wer nocht charlis mayne ye glore protectoure catholik religion aganis sarazenis knawis experience franchemen fauorit thy pepill nocht send w sic thing wil desire yi tyme fame thy gud name wart cristin faith eik thy beneuolence schawin marchandis cuntre quhen thay trauel yi bou dis mouit w ambassatouris kyng charlis cum confidence beleif vnknawin thy hienes qhuat extreme dangeir catholik pepill he stand thir mony yeris italie france spanye cruelte sarazenis ennymes god quhat nowmer pepill bene slane thairwith quhat ladis townis brint brocht vter euersioun quhat nobill cietezanis bene brocht importable seruitude becaus sa gret trubill risis daylie aganis cristin pepill maist catholik prince charlis he votit hym deith defence thairof aganis ennymes god desyring na thing ardetlie yan bring mind ic fyne cristin pepill may deliuerit fra truble sarazenis kirk men restorit thair first institutioun dredis na thing sa mekill empeschit fra hailsu purpos seditioun risyng amang cristin princis diuers pepepill saxonis frisonis normannis inglismen quhilk ar saxonis blude he manifest tyranny conquest realme britane inuadyng ye pepill baith see land vntellable cruelteis dant thair attemptatis abandoun thaym tymes cumyng thay sall nocht inuaid france thy realme sa bludy incursionis thay afore kyng charlis frace deliuerit mynd nobillis desyris confiderat thy pepill vnder sic fallowschip franchemen sall support scottis scottis fra chemen gyf happynnis inglisme inuaid ony thaym thus may iniure inglismen maist auaricius pepill rd best eschewit baith pepill thir reasonis beleue ye maist vailyeant pepill quhom god he defendit sa lang vnbrokin fra riche strang ennymes fauorable thir honorable desyris kig charlis support w al weil aganis inglismen aganis ye ennymes cristin faith comodite heirof sall finalie succeid na le weil tha ouris ambassatouris eftir orison wes ressauit ye kyngis palyce honour magnificence mycht deuisit mene tyme rais ane strang disputatioun amang nobillis quhiddir wes proffitable nocht co moun weill scotland confiderat ambassatouris desyrit france mony noblis wer variant thair opinioun yair fore thir ambassatouris wer send pa thair tyme huntis othir nobillis quhill counsall wer resoluit difficill mater culmane capitane mar said ye cousal yi maner haue na admiration maist nobil price howbeit thy pepill desir cofiderat france beleuand na thyng sa gud sa honest sa plesand thair co moun weill confiderat maist riche pepill yi day europe throw societe alliance ye scottis sall rise gret fame reuerence partis ye warld nochtheles comodite plesour yt cumis apper yi band salbe lityl estimatioun respect heuy irrecouerable da mage ye sal follow thairthrow w eftir ye mischeu end opinioo sall schaw posterite far psent dayis wer aberrand fra yair comon weil making yi bad wt frace quhat othir frute may haue cofiderat france aganis ingland daylie nychtbour quhais freindschip wes maist plesand w bot onlie mak nixt nychtbouris stragest fayis freindis seuerit fra w ye braid seis quhais plesoure man moue battall contrar nixt nychtbouris ieoperd bodyis landis gudis extreme dangeir ye weil yame quhilk ar far seuerit fra support heirfor thik sen ye mater sa hie apperad mair singular damage tha ony co modite suld sa foudly resoluit yt seik na sic colourit honour improffitabil glore yt may uoik nixt nichbouris frequet wer caus w tyne schamefully landis liberteis quhilkis bene sauit sa mony yeris afore nobyl antecessouris quhat may deuisit mair skaithfull fre pepill ieoperd yair realm quhe yai haue peace apon ye chance battal thirle yame wylfully seruitude vncouth pepil gif fracheme brek ye band cofideration within ye fury battal mouit v yair cause sine fiderat wt nichtbouris dayly ennymes leuand ye hail preis batal w sal ye gret damage iniuris sustenit weris agan inglisme tha redressit haue rich strenth recouer yir displesouris francheme efter yt ar brokin yair wer brocht neir vter exterminion attour gyf happin brocht sic calamite yt gudis ar waistit pissance brokin franchemen co fiderat inglismen contrar sal resist inglismen quhome sall accuse violation band betuix w france siclik gif confiderat deuisit france salbe dayly bergan ennymes sendyll haue cosolation freindis sall haue frequent weris ennymes page duplicate page duplicate page duplicate page duplicate page duplicate page duplicate neuir fynd bot throw lang passage dangerus seis na marchadice salbe brocht w frace spanye almany bot tollerance ingl smen yus sal ou marchandis destitut thay sall haue na res port quhen dangeir stormis inuadis yame yus sall thay othir peri fal refuge ye stormy seis elli tyne thair schippis guddis raderit yair ennymes handis thir reasonis apperis nobill prince quhat skaith damage sall follow cofiderat france best yairfore seueir ye auld band pichtis britonis inglismen eldaris afore quhil knew al ye frute mycht cum thaym ony bad france sen vailyeant nobill eldaris mycht neuir fynd ye band france proffi abill thair comon weill think e suld leue ye samyn maner ya na cofideration maid wt new vncouth pepyll le tha wylfully list ieoperd realm lyuis gudis ony respect awi weil ye luf allanerly frace pof ansvver maid last orison biane hovv france scotland vvar perpetually cofiderat hovv ichtis refusit confiderat vvith france article contenand band betuix scotland france ca ii sindry noblis tuke gret indignatioun th wordis culmane thay thocht baith necessare honest thaym haue societe band france ane nobyll man namit aldiane cap tane ye ilis said wyse gyf foure pepyl dwellis albion namit brytonis scott saxonis pychtis icht leue togider vnder ane nd peace miche fickeris leue peace wt inglisme tenour yair faith think counsal geuyn culmane war vnproffitab l yit suld refusit tha micht haue na occasion motiue seik cofideration vncouth pepyl bot sen thair neuir found na pepyl mair falset treason tha scottis pichtis britonis he found saxonis think necessar othir haue cotinewal weir aganis na le falset weir inglismen elli confiderat pepyll yt may support w aganis thair perpetuall inuasion quhidder ac thir doingis faith desait quhen ye britonis brocht saxonis thair realme defend yame fra yair ennymes eft yat thay tretit yame ye maist tender maner yai miche rewardit yame gret honour rich yir treasonabil saxonis turnit yair mynd fra amite feid hatret hew yam self maist ennymes brit quhare thay suld haue bene r protectouris bure armour wappinnis aganis ye said britonis nocht allanerly inuadit yam infinite slauchter bot spulyeit yame thair realme honouris quhat band cofideration he haldin thir saxonis peace pepyl tymes bygane thay ly ay wait tak yair nichtbouris auantage ny respect faith band tyme accu ri quhat misery trubyl fallyn britonis dissait saxonis oftymes he ye saxonis brokin quhen beleuit leist peace betui w pichtis thay ar contending amang yame self mair treason falset th n honest weris thay haue slane sa mony kyngis northumberland yat skarsly may ane found da ressaue yairof oswyn king northuberland within thir yeris slane oswane osw ne o ik mony othir kingis northuberland ye samyn maner war ay fynaly murdrist thair successouris attour inglismen he na e contention al ti quhare ya haf thair dominion tha ya haue northuberland kirkme platis feir yir cruelteis done saxonis quhilk ar callit inglismen he left yair cathedral kirkis abbayis fled vncouth regionis ye caus yt thay inuadit w tyme cumis na reuerence yat thay haue god yair faith bot deuisio amag yame self dout bot al sone thay ar pecifyit ciuil debaitis yai sall inuade w nochtwithstandyng ony band maid yame heirfore dan thir attemptatis inglismen find na thing sa expediet fiderat wt ye pepil yt may chaistefie yame maist esaly he fortoun geuyn baith heft blaid mater w ar cumyn ye oratouris france offering wylfully yt maist proffitabil w lat w hei fore cofiderat yame yat he france spanye mekil almany vnder yair empire may sic comoditeis refusit wise men may ye band france offerit frely deny w ye last pepil ye warld sen thay thair faith god he sa brai empire landis ye warld na thing may sa hailsu ffitabil yairfore w ye bad frace gif ressaue plesadly sal haue sa mony freindis yairthrow yt ye passage marchandis wt al kind marchadeis salbe sicker frequet w ony dageir seis ennymes heirfore nane beleif wil cosidder yi mater degestly bot sa think ye quhilk ane faithful pepil riche potet baith see land mair proffitabil w th ony band inglisme nane sa mischane trow amag yow bot knawis ye inglisme na le set vter ditio scottis tha briton equale desire coques ou realm heirfor gif intend eschew ye hatrent maist feirfull ennymes gif inted honour ye faith crist quhais defence ye franche beris yair armour wappi ni gif haue mair respect verite tha falset gif labour ye fame honour nation gif wyl defend realme bring tranquillite peace finaly gif wyl mak defence liberie liuis quhilkis ar maist dere lat w plesandly fiderat frace seuere yairintyl hau cofidece yt ye said band sal defece w tymes cuing defend realme bot al resist iniure inglisme richt comodius proffitabil albiane yi oriso drew mony ye pepil opinion achai seand nobl plesadly resoluit fiderat frace comandit ye ambassatour ye morow heir h answer incotinent thir ambassatour war brocht within ye king palice feistit maist triumphat cheir ye micht deuisit ya noblis couenit ane cousal ye quhilk cludit send guillia brothir kig achai mony othir noble prudent men mak said band th k ye kyng frace yt desirit bad scottis aboue al othir pepil albion attour cludit sed iiiim furnist al necessaris support king charlis aganis sarazenis incontinent achai callit afore hym yir ambassatouris said maner si thingis ye desyrit charlis ye catholik king ar sa plesand pepyl yat nane al cumpany nocht codiscending desyris traisting gret feli te succeid yame amang pepyll gif thay decorit societe sa nobil ane realme pepyl ya fore decerne w pepyl petually cofiderat ye maist cri tin king charlis pepyl quhais l maist dere w aboue othir creatur yi erd praying god band may succede perpetuall felicite baith pepyll yt said band may ye mair roborat haue ordanit oure guillia iiii men syngulare rudition prudence pa france make said he send iiiim armit kyng charlis quhat plesis aganis ye ennymes faith ambassatouris reiosit yi answer gaif king haius nobillis yne went hung kyng pichtis desyrit confiderat ye samyn maner hym pepyl desyrit afore achaius ye king pichtis thankit kyng charlis beniuolence said ye mater sa hie yt micht discussit egeist aduisement presently sa far reasoun mouit intelligence thocht yair band proffitabil sen thay war sa far seueri fra support yairfore yair band refusit aduenture pepyll cu sic damage throw ye said band ye samyn micht neuir recouerit u returnit ye ambassatour bu expedition yair eradis achaius within ane moneth efter guill wt yir ambassatouris frace togidder iiii clerk maist erudition prudence namit clement iohne rabane fran ye ordinance wei men afore cohersit yai war al plesandly res uit king charlis ordinance leif wagis amag ye army frace sone eft ye scotland war schewin achai writingis desiring ye fracheme scottis cofiderat yame yair posterite articlis follow pthe amite cofideration franchemen scottis maid euir baith pepyl present cum pthe iniure inglismen done ony thir pepill salbe haldin co moun thaym baith pquhen francheme ar inuadit inglisme ye scottis sal send yair army defece frace sa yat yai supportit money vittall frace pquhen scottis ar inuadit inglismen franchemen sal cu apon thair awin expens thair support pgif ony priuate publik person yir confiderat pepil supportis inglismen aganis ony ane yame wt counsal money vittallis remane amag yame ye tyme battal ye doar thairof salbe hal tratour ennyme thaym baith nane yir ii pepil sal tak peace truis wt inglisme auice thir coditionis peace roborat maner foresaid salbe writtin chemet interchagit selis king king remane scotlad frace petual memory yi lyig yame yair posterite yt ye noblis scotlad salbe mair mindful yi pset lyig ye kig scotladis armes quhilk ye tyme ane reid lyon rapand ane feild gold eikit ane double tressour contrar lyllijs including ye lyon partis signify said lyon armyt ye lylly rich france confiderat samyn perpe ually signify yt al ye king scotland sall echt vailyeantly yair realme liberte yair religion innocence perpetually support fra chemen aganis ennymes phovv pape leo ye thrid flore tinis vvas restorit thair honour liberte kig charlis sindry abbayis foundit scottis guilliam hovv vniuersite paris began scottis louyng samyn ca iiii efter yt ye band roborat maner foresaid betuix scotland frace scottis guillia remanit mony othir scottis cotinewal residece wt king charlis al weris conquest maheid prowes sic fame yt callit ye knicht reproche al weris gat sic ryches ladis yt gretuly renownit amag ye princis frace sperit al weris dantit mony sindry pepil saxonis hungarianis normanis efter yai wer rebellad king charlis wald ressaue lawis yi guillia wan excellet honouris ye tyme ye king charlis restorit pape leo ye thrid seit eft yt doung rome iniure romani wan also gret fame quhen said charlis passand throw tuskany restorit ye town florace yair anciat honouris eft yat distroyit gothis brocht ye floretinis agane ye said toun reparit new wallis kirkis institutionis yat ye cietezanis yairof micht leif liberte yir mony othir honorable actis war done tyme italy othir partis warld scott guillia howbeit yai war ay done vnder ye name kyng charlis king charlis remanit lang italy bot left ye charge guillia al materis thocht expedient sic uidence chargis comandit said king charlis yat eikit ye senyory florence wt sindry townis yair dominion ye florentinis yir humaniteis done yame scott guilliam tuk ye reid lylle na thing different fra ye lylle france bot cullour yair armis ane memorial yair town sum tyme distroyit gothis restorit frecheme yai ordanit eik publik playis maid yair town florece quhilk ane lyon crownit mony solempne cerimonijs yai comandit al quik lyonis nurist yeirly yair said town ye comon purs becaus ye samyn ye armis scottis guillia said ye florentinis he ane phecy sa lag lyonis leu florence sa lang ye lyon florence beris yi crown yair ciete sall neuir subdewit vncouth empire yir mony othir cerimonijs war institute guillia afore returning italy france yit quhat su euer way yir playis war institute florence yai ar yit yeirly vse efter samyn rite yai war first deuisit guillia eft ifinite labour tane king charlis weil cristin faith grew age becaus na succession body geuin al day cheualry neuir frute mariage maid crist ayre foundit mony abbayis baith italy almany dotat thaym riche landis rentis hospitalis cristin pepill nuris thaym virtew letterature nane abbott ye said abbayis bot scottis allanerly witnes heirof ar yit mony abbayis almany na thyng changi fra ye institutionis thay war first deuisit kyng charlis schort tyme afore ye guilliam cumyn age held hym ye two scottis clerkis iohne clement gret familiarite yai war send scott guillia said mak ye band frace yir clerkis wer sa syngular rudition science yt yai gat ane place geuyn yame ye king paris wt certane ladis sustene yair estait instruct ye nobil childrin frace sindry science thir come sa frequent coflu nce pepil al partis desyrus haue lette yt chort tyme yair exact diligece erudition young childrin ciete paris maid ane solempnit niuersite resolute al sciece king charlis hauad gret de ectatio letteris began fluris realme industry thir two scottis comandit ye clement suld remane principall regent paris iohne colleig pa pauy e town luberdy spreding letteris ye samyn throw yi smal begynning rais scule paris quhilk he tyme sic f uth rudition yt he na compai erd ar cedit sic nowmer doctouris theology canon law medicine sa gret nowmer philosoph r oratouris yt al pepyl quhare trauellis he experiece yair yair cotinual exercition cotending quha salbe maist resolute euery science yair ye sloure theology yair al maner philosophy eloquence fouth yair ar prouin oratouris ane multitude young childrin weill institute letteris diligence yair pceptouris ye place sa comodius nocht yair quhilk nature he ducit ye weil yi nobil vniuersit yt sa worthy louit euery w ld suld honorit w youcht su part aberden tuk first rud tion yi foresaid vniuersite paris yairfore wyl haif na le reuerece l f tha barn he natiue mod bot wyl return ye remanet geistis achai phovv scottis pichtis vvar confiderat mariage slevv athelstane king ingland put army flich king hung lavvis liberte kirkme deith kyng charlis king achaius sindry nobill clerkis ca v scottis irkit frequent iniuris pichtis ye fyne weris set ane conuention pichtis redres skaithis sa far micht euery side ye quhilk thay war fynaly agreit al debaitis samyn suld perpetually endure hungus kyng pichtis gaif sister fergus ane mariage king achaius quhilk ane sonne hym namit alpine athelstane kyng ingland rycht desyrus eik boundis realme come ane army landis mers berwik pertenad pichtis alliegit samyn tene empire reft afore fra northumbrianis iniure pichtis quhen ceissit fra na maner cruelte heirschyppis said landis returnit gret pray guddis northumberland dant ye rebellion certane inglismen quhilkis war laitly conspirit aganis hym hungus king pichtis impacient suffer thir iniuris send ambassatouris achai desyryng support resist ennymes achai sone eft send xm chosin king hug ye said effect hungus rasit army northumberland inuadit sindry cruelteis returnit gret pray guddis lowthyane king athelstane dant attemptatis come louthiane mair diligence tha beleuit followit hait fute pichtis pin mene tyme ye pichtis set thair tentis besyde ane burne nocht two mylis fra haddyngtoun war aduisand amang thaym self ye spulye laitly gottyn thaym northumbirland suld partit richt armes traistyng na thyng le cumyng inglismen pathelstane weill aduertist counsall pichtis come forthwart arrayit oistis comandit opin proclamation na pichtis saiffit pichtis astonist cry seand sic multitude pepil aganis yame began muse quhat chance fortoun suld thairefter follow nochtheles comand hungus ylk man yeid array traistyng curage pray quhylkis war laitly eft last iornay suld occasioun breke array thair ennymes tuke aduysement al ye day thay micht best eschew dangeir appering yocht armyis euery syde stude maist awfully arrayit otheris sicht yit nane yame durst inuade othir ye day nycht followyng pichtis concludit assailye chance battall othir haue victory elli ani de morow efter thair first sleip thay went yair confession prayaris askit help crist sanct thair patron support yame speciall pepyll aganis yair ennymes kyng hu g beand sleip apperit ye appostil sanct andro bad hym gud co fort hauand gud hope god suld haue ye morow ane glorius victory inglismen said yat ane schinand croce sene ye lift straucht aboue army pichtis onlik ye samyn croce yt appostil deit croce vanist neuir ye lift quhil ye victory succedit pichtis kyng hung awalkynnit sleip fand h army behalding croce gret adm ration incotinent callit yame standart schew visioun yame al circustance afore rehersit incotinent rais ane huge noyis clamour throw al ye army scottis pychtis inglismen war richt affrayit noyis mair affrayit seand ye croce schinand awfull bemis ye lift apperi yame ane euyl signe ye brek ye day kyng hungus arrayit folkis sound trumpat gaif ye sygne iunyng criand schyll voce sanct andro patron help scottis pichtis rasit thir wordis come thair ennymes sic fury thay war finaly vincust gaif backis quhome followit scottis pichtis lang chace maid mair slaucht tha maid afore ye battal prysoneris quhilkis wer tane afore inglismen seand ye scottis pichtis victorius inuadit yair ennymes wt mair cruelteis tha yair maister yt wan ye victory sa far enragit yi slauchter ye skarsly al yi army ingland war left vc men liue kig athelstane ye first iunyng wes schot throw ye body ane spere slane sindry noblis inglad place quhare slane callit yit athelstane furd king hungus efter yi victory sound tru pat callit ye standar stud al ye nicht arrayit quhill ye morow tha partit spulye ye feild rite armis kig athelstane burii funerall triuphe ye nixt kirk sic thyngis done kyng hungus al victori army bair fute ye kirk sanct andro thak god appostyll glorious victory maid solempnit ote yt posterite sall vse na ansenye tymes cumyng quhe tyme battal occurrit bot ye ro e sanct andro custome remanit ye pichtis bot al wt scottis efter ye exterminion pichtis yi victory ye scottis gat riche spulyeis enymes bot al gret rewardis hungus returnit hame gret honouris hungus excellent victory b ildit ye kirk sanct andro maist richely magnificence mair nowmer preist deuyne secuyce gaif mony io llis gold syluer ye ymage crist xii app st llis fyne gold syluer ane ye said kirk perp tual memory victory gaif ye te n maner frutis growand within realm sustene kirkme comandit nane yame sumond iugement ony prophane temporall iuge yit b pu ist deith nochtwithstanding quhat sumeuir cryme yame com thir priuilegis war nocht ng obseruit amang ye pich istpunc war abrogat kyng feredeth quhilk ye feird king pichtis immediatly succeding efter hung attour feredeth tuke rich iowellis geuyn afore kirk proper vse comandit ye kirkmen leif content sic bir frutis thay afore ye empire hungus thus war ye kirkm n fra thair liberteis possessionis geuyn yame afore hungus yair landis geuyn familiaris noblis codiscendit weil yairto traisting thing geuyn ye kirk na le tynt thay war fallyn pray yair ennymes thir excorsionis done aganis kirkmen succedit grete infelicite pichtis caus yat thay war brocht within yeris efter v er exterminion sal sone heir pkyng achaius realme gud peace deceissit ye xxxii yeir regne fra redemption viiicxix yeris buryit colmekyll thir dayis ye nobil historitiane paulus diacon quhilk eikit viii buk romane empriouris ye history eutropi paulus maid ye hymne sact iohne vt queat laxis th tyme isward wrat ye buk callit martyrdome lege sactis amang w war thay day geruadius glaciane modane medane gret doctouris singulare erudition ye tyme king achaius ye romane empire wes deuidit two senyorijs kyng charlis wes empriour west part warld constantine empriour eist quhais auctorite ane conuention nere iiic l bischoppis decerne gif ye ymager sactis suld honorit kirkis finaly generall rit statute yt ye ymageris sactis ye kirk rome vsis sall honorit reuerence al partis ony deuinite war hid yame bot represent figoure god sanctis tyme kyng charlis empriour na le preeminent glore mercial cyuyl dedis c issit aquisgr ny xlvii yei regne france xvii yeir empyre aboue romani fra incarnation viiicxv yeris kyng connal u c deith ca vi eftir deith achai succedit brothir sonne couallus alpyne sonne achai wes tendir age yat micht su ceid crown co uallu wes rycht tenderlie belouit hungus kyng pichtis set laubour hald scottis pychtis amyte concord eftir auld hand thairfore sa lang thir two kyngis leiffit na thyng wes done othir weir peace auise othir throw quhilk aith thair realmes wes gret tranquillite rest duryng thair tyme last kyng hungus worn lang age deceissit eftir quhom succedit ye crown pichtis dorstor lorgus conuallus leiffit nocht lang eftir kyng hungus deceissit ye v yeir eftir wes buryit colmekill kyng dongallus hovv punist certane cospiratouris hovv alpyne prince scotlad clamit croun pichtis nerest heritour thai pichtis ansvver hovv ye scottis co cludit moue vveir ye pichtis denying croun ca vii conuall decei sit maner succedit cousing dongallus sonne soluathius afor reheirsit syndry scottis seand prince inclinyt iustice maid hortation alpyne sonne achaius tak ye crown traisting extorsionis e thaym comonis suld vnpunist ye way becaus wes nocht sa delige thay desyrit thay come hym awful mannassyng swore gyf tuke nocht haistely ye crown thay suld slay hym alpyne astonist lyfe come ane gret nowmer pepill argyle take crown nochtheles dredand gret trubill appeir ye realme rebellioun fled two tendir seruitouris kyng dongall wes sa plesandlie ressauit dongallus promittit gyf pepill wer content exoner hym crown fauour said alpyne desyrit na thyng sa ekill felicite achaius hous alpyne gaif hym thankis said wald ressaue crown sa lang couallus wes lyue schew gaderyng pepyll trubyll apperyng cuntre wes nocht mouit bot treason certane conspiratouris quhilk wald haue slane hym gif nocht assistit thaym tyme thrid day eftir come messengeris fra thir conspiratouris dongallus excusyng thaym putting al treason alpyne nochtheles ye king gaue litil faith thairto maid sic deligence come thir conspiratouris quhen thay beleuit na thyng le cuming punist thaym si rigoure realme wes brocht mony yeris eftir gret tranquillite quhill sic thyngis wer done amang scottis eganus secound sonne hungus kyng pychtis slew bruthir dorstorlorgus mak hym self kyng eganus stable crown pichtis hym couenit nobillis gret liberalite de faderis treasoure guddis amag thaym haue thair fauoure veneuolence syne maryit brenna brotheris wife doucht ye king marchis ye fyne yat brenna suld degradit hir estait rial hir fader comonit slaucht gud sonne egan sic feir lyfe vse tyranni yat come neuir cht ane gard armyt men wald nothir suffir wyfe ten freindis cum presence quhill gard ripit thaym se gyf thay ony wappinis hid su quie place traislyng wes eftir prouin sum quiet personis tand ay wait inuaid hym ye slauchter bruthir coiecturit sa followit wes slane b cuna wyfe slepand bed amang army gard reuenge ye slauchter hir husband alpyne heirand slauchter two ony succession yair bodyis liue ambassatouris ye princis pychtis clamand ye crown pichtis iust nerest king hungus gottin inter fergusiane al othir childrin hungus beand deceissit ony succe ioun quhilk wes cum deuyne puru ance two pepil sa lang inuading othir continewall weris mycht finalie cu e inseuerable comixtioun blude vndir empire ane kyng pichtis knawing l desyris ir ambassatouris ches ane man gret prudence auctor e amang thaym namit fer deth kyng alpyne suld haue na place clame crown al sone yi ambassatouris wer cumyn camelon quhai feredech nobillis wer assemblit ye tyme began propone yair message desyring ye rown pichtis deliuerit alpyne sic gild noyis rais counsall silence wes put thir ambassatouris answer geuin ya feredech ye pichtis wald suffi na prince vncou h blude regne aboue thaym wer accustomat transfer ye crown yair realme fra ane hous ane othir thay thocht expediet wes inhibit ye samyn lawis depriue thair kyng lyfe youcht alpyne wes nepot hungus gottin sistir fergusiane yit sen wes gottin vncouth blude mycht na wayis succeid ye crown lawis yair realme dongallus heirand answer send ye secound message pichtis certification gif tha refusit wald inuaid thaym battal al sone ye pichtis wer aduertist ye cumyng yi secound message thay send certane armit men stop yair cuing inhibit yame pa ony forthir vnd pane deid ambassatouris affrayit thir wourdis denuncit battal ye pichtis name dongall alpyne incontinent thay returnyt ye samyn gait thay come eftir thair returnyng ye nobillis scotland co uenit carrik kyng dongal auise battal suld led aganis ye pichtis yi couention nobillis cocludit ane mynd eopard yair ladis liuis gudd su e alpynis rycht othir haue hym kyng pichtis elli al attanis de incontinet ilk ane yir two pepil maid yair ordinance inuaid othir diuers myndis intentionis pichtis desiring suffer na vncouth blude regne aboue yame ye scottis defraudit yair iust heritage dongall makig gret deligence assembil pepil agan ye picht c e ye watter spey gat ane cobill pa ouir ye famyn bot last force streme wes borne downe watt perist ye vi ir regne fra ye incarnation viiicxxx yeris wes buryit colmekill pof kyng alpyne hovv slevv feredech kig pich hovv b ud ke neth kigis pich vvar baith slane brudus ye e r maid kig hov kig alpine vvas slane ye scottis discofist ca viii dongallus perist maner alpyne son achai wes maid kig al sone wes crownyt set deligence uide al thingis necessar army aganis pichtis feredech king picht ceissi ye samyn maner mak uision ordinance battal traistyng deith dongall sum bett chance follow weris tary tuke purpos ane cupany chosin men pa angus quhare ye remanet army pychtis wes comadit couene yi afore cumyng scottis wer campit ye place quhare couetion wes set began sege castel forfair ye thrid day eftir kyng feredech come ane army weil arrayit restenoth incontinent baith ye armyis iunit ye first iuning ye rych wyng scottis wes neir vincust ye mene time fidenoth thane athol com iiiic fresche yair support yus wes ye battal renewit huge slaucht ony signe fleing howbeit ye chance wes rycht doutsu su tyme ye ansenyeis wer left yam suld haue past afore defence thairof sum tyme saiffit agane ye wageour last kig feredech ye myddil ward pichtis approcheand discofitoure ruschit wt sic farde amang ennymes yat wes excludit fra awin folk quhen saw na way eschew faucht wt seuerand manheid deith wes slane mony othir nobill fechtand ye maner ye deith residew pychtis na thyng astonist slaucht perseuerit continewal battal quhil nycht bereft thaym ye sycht yus wer baith ye armyis brokin costranyt discofist pepil return thair tentis ye pichtis knawing yair kig nobils ye maist thair army slane left ye woundit men behynd yame yair cariage fled hame ye nerest way thay mycht scottis wer sa brokin yt yai fled maner wer nocht wes schawin alpyne yt ye pichtis wer fled left yair cariage behynd yam yir nouellis causit picht abyde array quhil ye nycht wes gone morowe certane spyis wer send furth serche ye wodis montanis fand yair ennymes fled ye scottis reiosyng victorie partit ye spulye fallin thaym ryte armes ye body feredech wes bur solempne cerimonijs forfair scottis eft yi victorie fand thrid part yair army slane wes costranit yairfore inuaid ye picht erar frequent skarmussyng ony plane battall nochtheles thay come sone eftir ang brocht ye samin ane huge pray cornis guddis athole ye remanet put fyre yir othir frequent heirschippis angus wes left waist ye pichtis resist yir iniur chesit brudus son feredech king quhilk febill soft administration wes haldin derision yan honour pepil wes slane ye first yeir regne ane fenyei sedition amang ye pichtis eftir slaucht brudus h brodir keneth wes maid king lityll better chance yan brudus eft ya wes cumyn ang ane army pichtis tuk sic feir eand h ennymes fornentis hym yt h aif cote armour fle fra army ye nixt montanis quhare schamefully slane ane landwart knawing quhat ye remanent pichtis knawing g difficulte meit yair ennymes ane chesit brud ane feirs vailyeant prince yair king yi brudus eft coronation send ambassatouris kig alpine desiring iniuris redressit athir side peace renewit efter ye auld bad ye two pepyl wes answerit e alpine wald haue na peace quhil ye crown pichtis wer geuyn hym iust heritour yairof brud seing yt scottis war set seueir battall aganis hym send oratouris gret sowmes money confiderate edwi e king ingland haue certane wage ingland resist ye scottis ing edwine ressa yi money promittit quhat day brud lyst assigne cu support sindry ye pichtis reiosit answere raisting support inglismen v cu ye scottis otheris thocht lytyll confidence geuyn yame becaus ye said pichtis slew athelstane king ingland mony noblis afore lowthyane ye mene tyme ye scott heri al ang fra ye fute granyebene ye watter tay brud reuenge cruelteis send ane herald kig edwyne desiring army send haistely resist ye scottis answerit kyng edwyne yt sa impeschit ciuil weris amag awin pepil yt micht mak na support hym ye tyme al equestit lowis king frace na iniure scottis support na pepyl yair cotrar nochtheles wald ye said brud suseid h battal quhil ye nixt yeir suld gladly cu support brud okit wyse bega detest ye treason inglisme notwithstanding repuls co mandit al fensabil realme meit hym ye viii day efter followyng vittallis necessar thair sustentation ye fute ye calidon wod ye picht war enrag sic hatrent yat yame wer absent ye day place assignit brud seing yame asseblit sic hatrent come ouir ye brig dukeld ang ye nicht afore ye battal wise cou sal agit knichtis causit al ye cariage men wemen yat come army stand arrayit battall lynnyn claithis aboue yair bodyis siclik wappinis armour yai micht get ye tyme sic thi gi done put ane c horsme gouerne yame ony noyis ye nixt wod comandit yat nane yame cu sicht quhyl ye battallis war iunit king alpine yi tyme ane castell quhilk stude ane mote far fra dunde besyde quhilk ane plane lyand ye north quhare ye army scottis lay ye tyme alpine beheld pichtis ye castell heid quhare cumand forthwart array incotinent arrayit ye scottis exhortit yame lag orison schew yame vailyeand battall fei schame bot luf yair cuntre sum notabyll vassalage rusche feirsly yair ennimes traist fermely ony dredour deith haue victory reward yar labouris n thair quarell iust ye pichtis war sa desyrus battal yat afore ye soud trupat thay iunit faucht sic incredibil fury yt ye richt wing scottis vehemently trublit alpine seand yame abasit come ane cu pany chosin men yair support throw quhilk sindry scottis returnit fra yair fleing set yair ennymes mair cruelte tha afore mene tyme ye cariage weme quhilkis war hid afore ye wod began schaw yame yai war mouand forthwart cu yair backis quhais sicht ye scottis war sa affrayit yat ony forthir debait yai gai backis quhom followit ye pichtis lang chace slew al scottis quhare yai micht apprehendit ony mercy ransoun yi policy slicht cariage weme hyd vnder couert haue schawin mair discomfitour ye scottis feirsnes strenth pichtis ye horsmen pichtis followit sa fast yat yai saiffi na scottis ye micht ouirtakin yi battall tame king alpine brocht handis bound ye nixt village quhare heidit ane hewing iiij yeir regne fra ye incarnation viiicxxxiiii yer ye place quhare king alpine heidit callit yit pasalpine yt say heid alpine efter yi huge victory scottis king brud returnit camelon king alpinis heid put ane staik hyeast part thair wallis ane signe victory phovv kenneth ye secoud vvas maid king scottis ye deith brud kig pichtis hovv donskene vvas maid king hovv ye heid king alpine vvas brocht scotland hovv pichtis vva discomfist ca ix scottis efter yi vnhappy battall fled angus argyle maid kenneth sonne alpine king ye pichtis richt insolent proud efter yi huge victory scottis couenit camelo gaif louing god mony solempne cerimoniis prayer al sone ye suffrage done yai maid yair aithis ye haly euangellis neuir ceis fra battal quhil ye scottis wer alluterly distroyit maid ane statute quhat euir war yat labourit haue peace trewis ye wickit scottis sall heidit sindry ye pichtis thocht yir votis vnplesand said best vse victory mesoure nochtheles sa mony war yi opinioun war chasit gret displesour ye tempil quhare thay couenit ye scottis manassing pichtis war deiecait bot erar inflamit hie curage traisting na lytyl felicite follow yam plane euersion picht weil apperit yair proud insultatio eft yi sperite ye nixt symer ye picht cuand ane army aganis ye scottis fel debait amag yame self ane thig nocht yus yair army deuidit sindri factionis fel iniuri wordis sic slaucht yat ye samyn micht stachit quhil ye nicht seuerit yame yan brud tuk lang cosultation yi discord micht best pecifut nochyeles quhe tane gret labour brig noblis cocord sead yam cousalabil ye comon weil costranit return hame residew army fell sic malancoly within dayis efter deceissit ye pichtis yat thair common weil suld nocht peri falt ane heid chesit donskene brothir king brud afore rehersit yai kyng yi donskene maid concord amang pepil redressit al iniur quhare micht mene tyme certane vailyeant scottis think richt vnworthy ye king alpinis heid sul stand ane staik fen e yame pichtis thay ye lagage come camelon marchandis quhare thay remanit certane dayis al sone thay saw thair yme ya tuk ye heid come away yair cuntre king keneth ressauit faderis heid solempne processio send colmekil buryit ye remanent body syne rewardit thir men yt ieoperd yame sic honest vassalege riche la dis efter yi settand ingyne defence realme put strang diou al strenthis ornentis bordouris pichtis comandit folk dayly exercit cheualry reddy aganis euery trubyl yt mycht occur yit mony noblis war mair set defend thair awin p rsew ye pichtis ye gret fel yame yi last batt l otheris thocht best dissin ane tyme e fra inuasion pichtis quhill ye scottis war con le thair pissance recouerit persew crown pichtis reuenge slauchter kyng alpine er power scottis yi last opinion howbeit ya war small wi er war apprisit kenneth becaus saw sa hye dageir appering realme pecifi sedition amang noblis intertenit yame merualus affection kindnes followi thre yer frequent incursionis ony gret slaucht ye fourt yeir keneth maid ane couention noblis tuk lang consultation micht optene ye crown pichtis reuenge faderis slauchter schew mony reasonis na tyme dul sleuth sen thay war born cheualry ye season expedi rais thair army ye pichtis obtene ye crown thairof quhilk he bene sa mony yer iniustly haldin fra yame yit quhe keneth maid al ye instance mycht persuade noblis battall thay micht suadit na mair purpos tha samyn bene yair vter cofusion ye recent slaucht king alpine othir noblis slane hym afore ye pichtis drew al thair mynd fra battall kenneth seing yt noblis na persuasion war abyll solistit battall deuisit yame ane vncouth slicht neuir hard afore ony mannis age conuenit noblis ane counsall abuyse certane othir h ar materis feistit yame within palice solempne banket quhil far run within ye nicht sone eft thay went yair chalmeris within palice quhe thay war fallyn found sleip ke neth causit sindry men cled wt fische skynnis pa beddis quhare thir lordis lay yan ylk lordis bed past ane yir al ane set hour ylkane yame thair hand ane club muscane ire quhilk kest ane vncouth glance fische scalis ye myrk yair othir ylkane yame ane bugil horn spake sa voce throw ye samyn ye yair voce apperit like ye voce ane ye noblis quhare yai lay yair bedd war richt astonist yi vncouth sicht knawing quhidder ye visionis dremis yai kepit silence yan thir men spak throw ye bugyl horn heuy basse voce nocht semand mortall creaturis schew thaym angellis send comand god noblis scotland caus thaym obey desyris thair prince desyris war sa iust yt pychtis repuls thairof sall cum sic vter rewyne yt na engyne pissace suld resist thairto al sone thay said thir wordis ylkane yame hid thair staffe vnder yair claithis inuoluit thair fische skynn togidder ye fyne yt thay thair lycht micht euan baith atanis nobillis seand vncouth visioun war astonist tuke lytyll rest residew nicht morow efter thair conuentioun ylkane schew othir thair visionis seand ye samyn apperyng vnder ane tyme maner thay concludit na fantasy bot ane heuynly visioun send thaym syngular fauour god aduertis thaym gyf thay war respondent thairto yair sickir felicite yat haistely follow incontinent thay schew kyng thay war monist ye angell obtemper wyl al chargis thairfore ferme constance thay wald perseueir battal aganis pichtis king answerit siclik visioun angellis apperit hym howbeit durst schaw samyn aduenture pepyll suld deme hym glorius wa sa familiar god yt angell suld aduertis hym thing cu nochttheles se thay war admonist samyn maner wald reueill vision apperit haue ane gud fyne noblis condiscendit mynd generall edict comandit al fensable sonis ye realme cu ane certane day place affixit wt vittallis wappin al thing necessare aganis pich yi edict assemblit striuelyng ane army scottis mair multitud pipil tha euir sene afore thai boundis kyng donskene meit battall scottis gaderit ane army baith inglismen pichtis come within ye nicht betuix ye scottis yair awin landis skarsly ye day brokin quhen baith ye armyis inflamit birnand hatrent iunit ony soud trumpat picht gat gret skaith yair haistie vnauisit rinning yair ennimes nochtheles thay gat mair skaith inglismen thay left army pichtis th extreme ieoperde fled ye nixt motanis reird noyis rising fleing inglismen maid ye pichtis affrayit king donskene nochtwithstanding disceyte inglismen exhortit yame return thay answerit thair custome vse geif battall capitane array pichtis apperit offerit yame wylfully slane yair ennymes tenit al ye craft weirfair quhe na esperace victory apperit schaw battal scottis seand ye myd battal nakit ye wing quhare yir inglismen suld haue foch reddy ressaue iniure ennimes ruschit forthwart sic preis yt ye pichtis war costranit geif back tha keneth army followit yame baith wt futmen horsme comadit nane saiffit reuenge ye slaucht king alpine noblis quhilk war slane eft yt thay war yoldin ye chace seuerit quhil ye pichtis war dreuyn ye watter forth quhare mony yame perist ye remanet wer slane yame followit kig doskene efter yt ye battal discofist born away ane swift hors keneth dreidand su hid treason follow slycht thir inglysmen quhilkis war nocht far fra thair army brocht folkis sound trumpat standart stude ya nycht arrayit battal morow partit spulye fe rite armis returnit hame pof message send don ene kenneth ansvver orison maid donskene kenneth ansvver hovv pichtis vvar discofist kyng donskene slan ca x king donskene eftir battall send oratouris keneth desyryng peace kenneth aswerit wald gladly geif peace sa yt crown pichtis quhilk pertenit hym iust title war geuyn hym nochtheles pychtis refusit geif peace yat sort repulse thairof gaif occasion scottis inuade thaym mair cruelte afore nixt yeir kenneth come ane army fyffe angus maid inhabitantis yairof sa astonist yt thay war sworn leif vnder empire lawis sone efter kenneth tuke thair enthis garnist thaym maner syne rasit camp come striuelyng tak ye samyn maner quhen brocht ye pichtis thairof domi ion tythingis come yt scottis quhilkis war left behynd hym fyffe angus war slane treason kenneth incontinent left sege striuelyng returnit fiffe quhare fyre sw rd left na pichtis micht tane lyue exempyll tymes cumyng quhat frute succedis mortall pepyll violation thair faith kyngis quhyl yir siclik inhumane cruelt war done amang scottis pichtis kyng donskene conuenit fensabyll personis realme ony difference ky baner othir reuenge ye cruelt done scottis ani e pichtis iurnay come scon quhare ane riche abbay channonis regular kyng kenneth al army afore yai cuming ye morow quhen baith ye armyis war arrayit othir sicht kyng doskene desyring erar seik peace quhyll lude prosperite seik efter vincust send ane herald kyng keneth desyring licence comon hym afore battallis iunit certane matteris concernyng na le ye weill scottis tha pichtis kenneth refusit nocht comonyng belyue two kyngis accumpanyit ane nowmer noblis come fra thair army ane place deuisit king pichtis said maner cumis inuincible prince kenneth propiciant fauour god yt ye kyng pichtis quhais pissance he ay bene equale scotti humylly cumyn efter sa mony chancis battall desyring peace he bene al oft victorius scottis bene vincust thaym ar cumyn fynaly point yat othir man haue peace vnder quhat codition thow lift elli force w seueir battall baith perditioun w yow yit thair bene syndry thyngis yat suld persuade w put ane end thir weris ony ferthis inuasion baith new auld affinite pepyll sa lang continewyng togidder vnder ane blude amyte antecessouris al frequent cheualry baith oure pepyll sa oft ieoperd extreme dangeir aganis ennymes fynaly ye vter euersion w baith quhilk sall nocht fa gif cotinew battall cum w ennymes seand w brokin thir iniuris sal expel w albion gret dishonour schame yair na occasio battal forye haue ye rich treasour pichtis recompensatioun slauchter kyng alpyne nobillis bot al ye haue treasour rich scottis quhilkis thay tynt afore industry kyng feredech thir reasonis best wer scottis pychtis leiffit content awin landis rowmys oure eldaris afore treit peace chance battall dou sum oftimis fortoun geuis victorie thaym ar maist approchant perell na thyng yairfore sa gud sa sickar peace yt thy handis bot victorie power fortoun quhais instable fauoure haue sufficient documen t yat scho conuertis oftymes hie glore miserable estait ye may se w desolate seikand peace quhilkis within thir yeris vincust al ye army scott quhat beleif fortoun propiciant scottis scho he bene pychtis he scho promittit yow sickir victore quhilk scho neuir ony pepill afore quhat pepil he scho dissauit smyland visage quhen scho semi maist fauourable scho maist dred heirfore vnderstand peace thy gret honoure better afore battall esperance victorie duryng battall auenture gif aduersite followe thy preeminent glore magnitud merciall dedis chance forton sall key irrecouerable damage attoure yt may haue peace na le necessar w yan proffitable thy pepill ar content fyffe angus pa vnder perpetuall dominioun scottis fyne yat may reiose remanent landis realme time cuming thy fauour peace quhilk waye thow may conques interminable honoure ony damage eftir following namit yt posterite maist vailyeat prince euir rang aboue scottis thir wourdis answerit kenneth howbeit fortoun na le vnstable ye stait man vnsicker yocht werkis exercitionis subieck variant chance fortoun may prouin mony exemplis oure eldaris yit thir present besynes fortoun apperis sorowfull pichtis scottis becaus thay ar cum ane wrang action defraude scottis ye crown pychtis pertenand thaym iust title thus he ye scottis iust cause persew yair rycht battal sen yai may optene na othir way attoure baith recent auld affinite sa lang continewing betuix two pepill suld moue ye pichtis gif thay respect thair reuerence faith suffir succeid ye crown thairof sen pertenis iust heritage quhilk way baith pepill may haue pepetuall peace vnder ane kyng lawis ony promis fiffe angus quhilkis ar ladis inhabit pepill forthir wer rycht vnmercy full gyf wald nocht gyf peace pichtis samyn maner pichtis gaif peace afore scottis quhen thay wer brokin weris bot ye mat ane vter point ye pichtis ar sworn solempne atthis neuir gif peace w scottis ye maner sworn neuir gif yit tak peace pichtis quhill ye crown pichtis geuin ye iust heritour yairof gif thow desiris peace exoner ye crown pichtis deliuer handis al ye strenthis yairof generall cosent al ye pichtis may declarit kyng gif thir desyris semi importable pichtis force thaym perseueir battall aganis w quhilkis ar preparit maist wei ly ordinance inuaid yame traisting esperance iust persute haue victorie two kyngis seuering maner ony expedition yair desyris returnit yair tentis incotinet rais ane hidous clamour reird baith armyis desyring ye rycht de swerd chance fortoun list gif kenneth exhortit folkis assailye feirslie thair ennymes seueir feruent battal may discussit ye day quhiddir scottis abandoun ye pichtis pichtis ye scottis ye reward victorie wes ye realme pychtis petual honour dominioun aboue yair ennymes cotrar yair fleyng sal follow ye rewyne yair realme gret murdir schamfull exterminioun baith yame self yair posterite thir wourdis beand said keneth arrayit battall doubill wyngis euery ane thaym put archearis cors owis nixt yame stude ye speris pikkis behynd yame stude swerdis byllis axis ye rycht wig wes maid ane nobil capitane namit bar ye left wyng dongall ye myddill ward wes donald ye kyngis broder behynd yame stude keneth ane gret buschemet horsme reddy support yame al dangeir inco tinet thonderad preis trumpat baith armyis unit rais ane huge reird clamour maid mony ye pichtis affrayit yt thay apperit afore yai assailyeit ye chance battall f e nochtheles donskene exhortit yame assailye thair ennymes gret spreit sutyme reprochit yame yair febilnes sumtyme rasit yair spretis n w curage promitting gret rich ladis reward yair laubour followit sone ane terrible bergane ye weme seing yair husbandis wodit gaif sic horrible spraichis yai wer impediment yan support ye echtaris yan wes ye richt wyng pichtis quhare gretest multitud wemen faucht de eckit put flycht kenneth send ane buschemet fresche men ye bakkis yame wer fecht ye myddilward yus wer ye picht sloppit huge slaucht becaus yai na hope victorie yit power resist yai slag yair wappinis fra yam tuk ye flycht sa huge pepil wer slane ye place quhare thay first iunit sa huge noumer armour wappinnis ye scottis yair chace wer costranit pa ouir innoumerable carionis wappinnis deid pepil throw quhilk sindry scott wer brokin fra array thair fallowis dreuin amang gret buschementis pichtis quhair yai wer cruelly slane kenneth knawing damage sound trupat callit folkis ye standart eftir yt arrayit sindry buschemetis maist ganad men ye chace gaif yame capitanis comandit yame follow thair ennimes gud armour saif nane micht apprehe dit yan kenneth passit ye residew yat day nycht following w ane cu pany chosin men capitanis glaidly obeyit ye empire keneth slew lang chace ye pichtis yt thay micht ouirtak king donskene ane cupany pichtis fled ye watter tay abaid yair sa lang ane bait yt slane al h cupany said pichtis renewit battall ye day vii tymes aganis scottis war ay discomfist phovv svverd cote armour king donskene vvar send colmekyl orison maid king kenneth noblis hovv pichtis vvar slane banist scotland hovv ye du barris tuk thair begynning ca xi efter victory ye scott partit ye spulye yi battal rite armis sed ye swerd cote armour kyng donskene sanct colme remane colmekyll perpetuall signe thair victory ye morow al ye noblis scottis come kenneth reiosand victory desyrit tak rest eft sa gret labour suffer h army return hame bot kenneth thocht ffitabil ceis quhil put ane end h wer incotinent callit al noblis afore hym said yi maner ye deuore ane forcy capion gif intendis vse victory ye weil army eis fra battal quhil haue amite vicust ennymes elli brocht yam sic ruyne yai micht neuir recouer gif ony wald suffer ennyme quh brokin neir vincust rest quhil may recouir strenth iugement suld ane thing richt dam gius hym self ye dageir presently appering ye pichtis brokin weris brocht sic state yai may distroyit yit war ane thig abhominable inuade thaym sic cruelte gif micht ony maner way brig yam sicker amite freindschip cosidering yai ar enragit aganis w displesouris yame done nochtheles yir pichtis ye knaw ar subtel desiris na thing mair vengeance w posterite ye caus yai sall neuir deuoid yair hartis sa lang yai leue yir importable cruelteis done w yus may na amite freindschip drawin tymes cuing betwix w pichtis sic cruelteis ar exercit euery side ye yai ca redressit gif ye haue sicht yair fore singulare weill na thing sa gud seif nothir man wif barne pichtis blude lyue aduenture yat sic posterite rise thaym sone efter sall baith reuenge thair faderis slauthter bryng oure realme greit dangeir yi opinion ye king yocht cruel found sindry reasonis richt proffitable ye weil scott incotinent sic cruelte bludy rage maid pichtis partis ye nane yame left lyue camelon othir strenthis except iim sonis quhilk fled ye inglismen yan kenneth partit ye landis pichtis amag noblis sycht yair meritis prowes namit al ye landis montanis riuaris yi region new name ilk land tuk ye name efter ye possessour ye tyme ye fyne yt auld name yir la dis suld peri memory pichtis bar noble gat singular vassalage prouyn last feild ane strang castel lowthiane namit dubar fra name rais ye hous surname dubaris quhilkis ar gret renoun honour yir dayis hous come ye erl marche continewyng lang gression thair sonnis enois heritouris said hous ar hous mony nobill clerkis doctouris clothit thair notabil virtew prelacijs honouris thir dayis sic thingis done kenneth went mony army sege ye town camelon sindry pichtis fled yair ffis child traisting becaus town wes strenthe haif ane sickir refuge first ane herald past camelon assailye gif pychtis wald randir town becaus thay refusit ane strait sege wes laid thairto quhilk mony monethis eftir cotinewit ye scott war sa irkit sege thay serchit mony ingynis wyn town finalie yai brocht ane gret multitude treis renchis fowsyis yairof mene tyme cie ezanis began laik vittallis send thair oratouris kenneth desyryng thre ayis trewis thay mycht tak sement amang thaym self concernyng ye randeryng ye town kenneth hauand na suspicion dissait consentit yair desiris coman army ceis fra segyng ye duryng thre dayis e tir followyng mene tyme ane certane pychtis ischi ye thrid vigill ane auld port quhilk wes oppinnit mony yeris afor first slew ye wache scottis syne come gret affray kyngis tentis maid ithand slauchter sa lang ye nycht endurit fled incontinent ye town nochtheles scottis followit thaym sic slauchter thay town wer nocht thay wer stoppit ganyeis arowis stanis sch ye touris camelon yi mussing wer slane yan vi scottis nochtheles kenneth maid ane new wache ordour afore becaus ye pichtis violat thair faith hym maid ane solempne aith neuir seuer fra town quhill wallis thairof wer equate ye ground youcht assailyeit tak town sindry ingynis yit na thing yairof come til effect pychtis sa vailyeantly resistit sege continewit styll foure monethis ony interruption throw quhilk sic miserable hunger rais amang cietezanis thairof thay abhorrit eit maist vile abhominable met yocht thay wer sic xtreme rage hunger yit thay slew yame gaif counsall rander town last town beyng ouirset wery ithand persute scott yair fowsyis fillit wod othir sindry stuf wallis kenneth send vic men ye nixt wod mak ledder thir returnit ye ye morow went vnfrayit curage ye wallis finalie entrit sindry partis thairof sindry abuschemetis cietezanis astonist yi suddane irruptioun scottis nocht power resist left ye wallis faucht sa lag ya icht perseuerant hatren ye deith finalie wer slane ony mercy ransoun nobillis commandit cast ye town leif na pychtis lyue within sa myn preistis matronis virginis childrin come afore kenneth pietuous cheir desiring grace bot ye fury scottis wes sa gret thay ony miseration wer al slane eftir yi ye wallis housis castellis kirk wer brint brocht ye ground town sum tyme sa honest remanit nocht haistely bot powder w calsay quhilk sum thing r manis yit thir dayis samyn tyme madyn castell edinburgh wes garnist wt strag soudiouris pichtis nochtheles pychtis within dredand si lik subuersioun thaym wes laitlie camelon left castell desert fled northubirland yus failyeit realme pychtis albioun thair pepill brocht nocht eftir thay roungin samyn imicli yeris yeir thayr exterminioun albioun wes fra incarnation viiicxxxix yeris fra first cumyng scottis albion imiiiicxxi yeris fra begynnyng ye warld vimxxxviii yeris pof vncouth meruellis sene albion hovv chiar marbyll vvas brocht argyle scone lavvis maid kenneth comon vveill scottis deith ca xii samyn yeir apperit twa cometis rycht horribill sycht man ane apperit sonne risyng heruest othir schane ay eftir ye sonne gang ueir oftymes wes sene nycht twa battellis armyt men fechtand togidder birnand speris ayre al sone ane yame wes vincust tothir sone euanist quhen bischop camelon wes doand diuyne seruice pontifical staf tuk neid fyre mycht nocht slokynnit quhil wes resoluit nocht fair day lycht besyde camelon sic noyis reird armyt men wes hard pepill wer astonist durst remane thairabout thir meruellis wer interpret sum tyme gud sum tyme euill pepil ye deuinouris plesit quhen keneth distroyit pichtis conquest thair realme yi maner brocht fatall chiar merbill argyle gowry quhilk chiar said afore wes brocht spanye irelad symon brek ireland fergus first king argyle quhare remanit ay quhill thir dayis becaus last victorie pychtis happinnit nocht far fra scone ordanit ye said chiar remane perpetuallie said abbay scottis kyngis resaue thair diademe samyn ye pychtis banist scotland maner seyng ye inglismen mycht na wayis persuadit ciuill weris amang thaym inuaid scottis went denmark otheris serching gyf thay mycht ony way get support recouer thair realme fled norroway otheris remanit ingland seikand thair leuyng cheualrye frute thair handis kenneth kepit subditis eftir exterminioun pychtis sicker peace duryng lyfe ane nobill prince worthy haue indifficient glore wes geuin na le polyce ciuyl maneris yan cheualrie drew ye confusit lawis scotland ane copendius volumen abrogat al thaym wer vnproffitable maid new lawis mair expedient quhilkis sindry remanis followis ilk schire realme sal ane man law decide doutsu materis quhen thay occur yair sonnis sal lern lawis yair tendir age pthe lawis constitutionis realme salbe kepit onlie thaym gif ony thaym conuickit falset ony othir cryme lese maieste thay sall hyngit ane iebat phe yat conuickit thift salbe hangit makis slauchter sal heidit pane woman conuickit ony capitall cryme salbe drownit buryit quyk phe blasphlemys god sanctis blasphlemys ye kyng capitane sall want toung phe yat makis ane lesyng dammage nychtbour sall ty e sw rd exilit fra gud cumpany pal sonis suspeckit ony cryme sal suffir ye inquest vii wyse xixiiixv sa furth od noumer pall reuaris oppressouris inuasouris othir mennis landis sal heidit pall vagaboundis fulis bardis udlaris siclik idill pepill salbe brint cheik scurgit wi h wandis bot gif thay fynd sum craft wyn thair leuyng pthe wyfe sal nocht punist hir husbandis iniquite bot ye man salbe punist ye cryme fe gyf knew cryme gif scho e nocht wife bot concubyne scho salbe punist samyn pu itioun man deseruis cryme phe reuisis ane virgyne ot gyf scho desire hym mariage salbe heidit phe yat fulyeis ane mannis bed salbe put deith woman le scho eforsit phe deforsis ane wom salbe heidit woman sall na skaith bot declarit innocent pgyf sonne iniurius fader wourd deid membir yat fatlyeit quhiddir fut toung hand salbe cuttit fra hym efti punitioun salbe hingit ane iebat body sall remane vnburyit aboue erd phe yat ane manslayar borndum vnthankful fader sall succeid na heritage piouglaris wichis makaris priuat patronis deuyllis salbe brint deid pna seid salbe sawin quhill purifyit fra noysum granis sufferis land fyld guld siclik vnproffitabyll wedis sall pay first falt ane comoun gud secound falt x oxin thrid tyme salbe faltit landis pgyf thy companyeon freind slane ye feild salbe buryit thy ennyme left sepulture pane beist found gangand wil salbe geuyn awnar serchoure theuis elli preist parochyne quha withhaldis thre dayis salbe accusit thyft phe yt fyndis nichtbouris gei sall inqui e opin proclamation ye awnar thairof othir wayis salbe punist ane theif phe strikis colligit iugement sall tyne action gyf actor par salbe absoluit fra petition pquhe vncouth fechtis amag thaym self gif ane thaym happenis slane vncertane quhat kow maid ye slauchter kow yat homyll sall beir wyte awnar thairof sal recompens ye da mage kow slane nychtboure pane swyne yt etti hir gris salbe deid hir flesche forbodin pane swyne yt eit corne wortis othir mennes landis salbe slane ony redres awnar pal othir beistis yat ittis mennis corne gres salbe poyndit quhil awnar thairof redres skaithis thaym done paltaris kirkis ymagis sanct oratouris chapellis preistis ecclesiastik personis salbe haldin reuerence pfestuall solepne day fasting vigillis othir cerimonyis kirk salbe obseruit siclik kirk he institute yat hurtis ane kirk man word deid salbe punist deith sepulturis salbe haldin reuerence ane croce set yame yt na man stramp thairon pthe place quhare ane slane buryit salbe vii yeris vnteild pthe corp ane deid man salbe buryit effering gudis gyf ane noble man gret actis comoun weill body salbe buryit funeral triumphe yi maner two horsmen sall pa afore hym kirk ane arrayit best claithing berand h armour wappynnis ane quhite hors othir sall pa dolorus weid ane blak hors quhe ye corp enterit kirk ye man ye blak hors sal turn bak ye altar lamentably deplore ye deith maister sal depart samyn gait come yi othir sal offir hors armour wappynnis ye preist bury hym magnificet sepulture custome burying nobyll n abrogat efter pepyl redemption thairof yai payit vpund preist ye kirk yi nobyll king kenneth thir mony othir institutionis gouernit pepyll ye end lyfe gud peace felicite iustice translatit bischoppis se e irnethy kirk sanct eule quh lk namit efter ye kirk sanct andros ye bischop yat succedit efter yi cit e callit gret bischop scotland realme scotland wes nocht deuydit diocises bot ilk bischop gif foud gud life resauit oblatioun quhat sumeuir place come yi custome indurit ye kirk scotlad vnto tyme king malcolme ye thrid quhilk monist sall efter rehers vision institute ye sete murthak callit abirden yi seit sact andros he bene haldin gret reuerence fra first institution thairof thir dayis quhome he bene mony nobyll byschoppis singular crudition lyfe nowmer xxxvi bot wyll return history kenneth eikit bound realme fra almane seyis besyde northumbirland ye ireland seyis beyond ye ilis deceissit fortiuiot flux cater xx yeir regne fra incarnatioun viiiclv yeris body buryit colmekyl amang anciant sepulturis othir kingis pof vic u king donald hovv osbret ella vvith gret novvmer inglismen vvas discomfist hovv xxm scottis vva slane kyng donald tane inglismen britonis message send scottis osbret ansvver ca xiii kenneth ye nobyl prince deceissit wise h brothi fift maid king different fra othir skarsly roung eris quhen abhominabyl lust multitude riatus sur maid pepy effemin geuyn mair sensual ples uris tha ony defence realme na damage war appering ennymes thus temperance auld faderis set aside vi brocht amang pepyll mony f noblis sic war luffa irtew dete ing gret indigna thir schamful neris ye kig pepyll ay risyng mair da mage comon w il went exhortyng hym remembir uhat miserable mischeuous end llowis vile sensuall publik priuat personis bene samyn quhat pest lence dangeris succedis thairthrow quhat crymes schamful men ar dreuyn occasion lustis yairfore prayit hym respect singulare weill remoue suspect personis cupany hym erar ane wyse prince brothir kenneth effe mon oure like sardan apalus quhilk int lyfe empire ssirianis becaus ay accumpanyit wemen ir kyll geuyn lust quhen ye noblis scotland schawin yir siclike wordis thair prince seand na emendation ly e bot hatrent dayly rising agan thay left thair purpos thus pepyll vicius leuyng thair prince degenerat euery vice reason turnit dissait iustice rang iniquite yi mene tyme ye residew pichtis quhilkis fled mang inglismen rand insolence scottis tuk desyre reco r thair realme albion solistit osbret ella two gret prince ingland moue weir aganis ye scottis promitti obey thaym thair posterite gif said prince wald restore thaym thair landis albion osbret ella men hie ingyne prudence knawing quhat detestabyll vicis scottis war effeminat refusit nocht thir desyris pychtis yit yai wald schaw yame ennymes scottis quhill contentionis war pecifyit amang thair nobillis quhen ye samyn war dressit maist prudently thir foresaid capitanis osbret ella come ane army inglysmen britonis pand efter thay set thair tentis mers berwyk thay send ane herald kyng donald chargeand hym restore landis laitly tane fra pychtis othir wayis inglismen britonis suld na le ennymes hym pychtis afore donald astonist message knawyng nocht quhat done began serche quhare mycht best hyde hym eschew fury ennymes yit fynaly hortatioun nobillis suld nocht cowarty expone realme extreme dangeir commandit pepyll vnder dominioun conuene certane day place ordinance necessare resist thair ennymes pkyng donald accumpanyit nobyllis commonis sort gaif osbret ella battall iedburgh pin battall danis war dyscomfist gret slauchter chasit montanis pdonald rycht insolent efter victory beleuing hym self formelye lyueryt truble come mouth tweid victorius army fand thair two schippis ladin winis vittallis othir thingis necessar sustene army inglisme kyng donald tuk finaly yir schippis smal labour partit spulye rich yairof amang weirmen spulye yir schippis mair noysum scottis tha war yair ennimes donald geuyn sic voracite lust wambe corruppit army detestable maneris youg men following maneris kyng donald fillit army full bordellis tauernis huris followit dising carting yame come cotention slauchter thus war ye army maid ane gadering licherus pepyl ony ordour cheualry osbret heirand scottis geuyn sic immoderat plesour lustis come yame ane new army quhen thay beleuit na thing le tha cumyng slew thaym nakit armour full wyne sleip thair beddis skry suddanly vprais throw terrible umyssing deand pepil awalkynnit army miserabyl affray followit sone ane lamentabyl murdir scottis sum contending bot vane euaid yair ennymes otheris slane bebait otheris fled quhare thay micht best pin vnhappy bergane war slane xxm scottis king donald tane full wyne sleip led throw cuntre ane derision al pepil hym tane ye remanet noblis war left vnslane put prison yair tentis spulyeit maid pray inglismen britonis ye fame vnhappy battall maid ye remanent scottis na le dolorus tha yair realm fallin pray thair ennymes sum began wary fortoun otheris traistit al thir mischeuis fallin vengeance yair vnhappy kyng cursit counsal otheris ran throw stret inquiryng yame yt thay met quha tane slane quhat inglismen intendit eft yi victory last heirand ye inglismen war cumyn lowthiane ye britonis galloway ceissing fra na maner cruelte micht deuisit yai war mair affrayit tha euir ony pepyl afore ye spraichis lamentabyl cryis weme heirand ye miserabyll slau hter thair freindis husbandis af ayit cuntre yamering sa huge yt apperit othir reuenge ye iniur ennymes yit defend yair realme throw quhilk al ye boundis scotland fra humbir striuelyng ouir riddin nothir man wyfe page left lyue mycht ouirtakyn inglismen britonis belyue thay maid yame reddy cu fyffe angus ye capitanis ylk region mesit trubyl sa far thay micht amang ye pepyl al sensabyl men yt yai culd gaddir yai stoppit certane dayis cumyng ennymes ouir forth osbret incontinent stuffit certane schippis xm chosin men cum ouir forth ye mene tyme rais sa vehement storme vm thaym perist residew mast ikyll returnit land osbret army greit dangeir mycht nocht tur see come brig striueling conuoy army land gait fyffe ye scottis send thair oratouris osbret desyring peace said tenit vailyeat capionis hauig victory debai inuaid vincust pepill new iniuris yair kig captiue yai noblis beand sa miserablie slane remembring yame scottis war vincust mair thair awin sleuth necligence ony manheid inglismen al fortoun sa vnstabil yat oftymes scho takis fra mortall pepyl victory yat scho geuis thaym le thay vse mair mesure al na glore micht succeid hym howbeit vincust febil pepil quhilk set tak peace vnder quhat condition plesit nochttheles gif wald na wayis condiscend peace ya suld prefer honest deith schamefull lyfe osbret degeistly auisit thir petitionis cotent haue peace scottis vnder yir conditionis yt al landis conquest fra scottis tyme sall remane vnder perpetual dominion inglismen britonis na forthir conques maid scottis remanent land reft fra pichtis sal remane afore vnder ye emp sco ti watter forth sall marche betuix scottis inglismen ye eist partis salbe nam ay f thyne furth ye scottis see ye wat r clide dubartane salbe marche ye wast partis betuix ye sco ti briton yi castel afore th day callit al luch tha namit dubritane yt say castell britonis salbe imput treason gyf ony scottis pa ouir forth foud ony ladis tenand inglismen britonis gif ony scottis dreuyn ye said landis thay sall depart within thre dayis efter without yai haue impediment thay sall ur na thing realme bot vittallis watter thay sall na strenthis fornens britonis inglismen thay sall pay ylk yeir ane pund britonis quhill xx war outrunnyng obseruation thairof sall geif lx yair noblis sonnis reman plage osbret commandit thair oratouris gif peace vnder thir conditionis war thocht heuy cum agane new message pof orison maid calenus hovv scottis tuk peace vvith inglismen britonis hovv kyng donald vvas put prison vicis slevv hym self syndry meruellis sene albioun ca xiiii mony scottis thocht peace sorrowfull vnder yir co ditionis thocht realme sic dangeir peace wes necessare quhat sumeuir sort micht thus thay bene deuidit syndry factionis war nocht ane agit man namit calenus thane angus quhylk vii sonnis slane king donald last battall pecifyit yame maner fynd croniklis ye vailyeant galdus souerane quhais singulare preeminence glore armes landis brigance war callit galloway brocht romani quhilk war antouris pepyll sic extreme calamite thay socht peace vnder quhat co ditionis plesit thay mycht eschew irrecouerabyll dangeir tha appering yair army youcht slane yame ony mercy rasoun ne bot smal outrage dishonour ye residew romane pepyll heirfore gif ye romane army depst wt euil fortoun hauad nobil men singular prudence counsal tha ar amang w submittit thaym haue peace ye wyll thair nnymes becaus thay micht na othir wayis aschew da geir curring think thairfore suld eschame sen ar vincust realme standing extreme dangeir king noblis tane haue peace wt ennimes quhat sumeuir sort may yit micht comon weil quhilk he bene sa vailyeatly debaittit day haue defece ony othir way think suld erar ieopard w extreme dangeir battall seik sa sorrowfull codition peace forthir micht lyuis wylfully offerit deid delyuer realme pepyl fra ye schame trubyll appering suld ye first yt suld wylfully offer hym self sacrifice behalf bot sen ar cumyn sic calamite affliction force haue peace vnder quhat sumeuir coditionis may tyme elli tine realme fechtand fulichely ennymes ye deith best yairfore haue peace saif realm quhilk he bene syndry chancis fortoun sa vailyeantly defendit esperace greter prosperite ye may su tyme reco er landis reft fra yow iniure ennymes gif ye othir wayis ye sall tyne self wiffis childrin realme ony recouer noblis cou sal send ambassatour haue peace britonis inglismen ye maner afore rehersit peace beand ratifyit donald send scotlad rasonit gret sowmes money ye britonis inglismen sat eacia billy sindry braid bou dis scotland britonis gat al ye landis fra striuelyng ireland seis fra watter forth clide cu bir strenthis thairof inglismen gat landis betuix striueling northu berland thus clyde marche betuix scottis britonis ane syde watter forth namit ye scottis se marche betuix yame inglysmen ye tothir syde striuelyng comon marche thre pepyl scottis britonis inglismen castel keping kig osbret quhilk reparit new munitionis nochtwithstanding ye rewyne thairof maid afore scottis quhen thay spul eit ye pichtis yair realm yi osbret cunyeouris within castel quhom ye striueling money tuk begynning inglismen beildit ane brig stane ouir ye watter forth ye middis yairof stude ane ymage ye crucifix vnd ye samyn thir versis ingrauyn fre marche passingeris may ken scottis britoni inglismen pychtis seand thir thre pepyll brocht concord dred suspition yat inglismen britonis quhilk war afore thair freindis suld becum thair ennymes desire yair landis yairfore saif yair lyuis thay f ed thair freindis norroway denmark otheris quhilkis na refuge war slane inglismen end pichtis quhilkis fled ingland efter ye expulsion yame fra yair realm ye tyme king donald quhylk brocht hame yocht vnworthy gret triumphe remouit virtuous nobil men cumpany fell vicis afore youcht importable aduersite el hym ylkane aboue othir yit nane thaym yi gud cousal micht draw hym fra corruppit lyfe quhe tint tane half realme sleuth tothir half dit fait iustice na thing appering mair cleirly tha exterminion realme continewall seditionis dayly rising ye samyn h tane nobillis realme suld tint foly put ward quhare within day efter slew hym self disperation vi yeir regne fra incarnation viiiclx yer mony meruellis wer sene tyme albion thair ane child lowthian vi monethis auld schew moder within schort tyme ennymes sall haue empire dominion lowthiane counsallit hir thairfore fle yairfra xin thair pasture tuke ane vncouth cowting schot ha stely deith fi found deid ye see syde forth lytyll different fra ye ymage man galloway ane huge multitude serpentis fell ye ayre suddandly war resoluit corru tion gret mortali e men beis aymen coniecturit thir meruellis ye empire king donald end mischeif pof king constantine secound lavvis heuy regrait maid euanus ilis folkis hovv ye said euanus vvas punist rebellion ca xv donald tyran slane haue wrytyn costantine secound name sonne kenneth maid king beginnyng regne tuke labour recouer ye landis quhilkis war afore fra scottis sleuth donald nobyllis knawyng thaym brokyn damage weris afore past wald assist hym quhil corruppit maneris quhilkis war brocht amang pepyll insolence king donald war first put thyngis brocht estait thay wa afore tyme kenneth kyng constantyne dres thir materis conuenit nobillis ane counsall one quhar publik auctorite maid thir lawis vnder writin pin first comandit kirkme wait diligently diuine seruice thay sall abstene fra prophane labouris leue con ent patrimony pertenand thair kirkis yai sall preche worde god ye pepyll thay sall leue ye samyn maner thay teche pepyll fyne yt thay may mair esaly serue god thay salbe fre tymes cu myng al chargis pertena ye weris thay sall nothir nu hors houndis thair plese r thay sall beir na wappynnis decide prophane actionis pand gif thir kirkmen failye nocht thair deuore cris pepill thinkis reasonable thay sal pay first falt gret sowmes money secound falt gif yai amend nocht thair life yai salbe degradit thair preisthe pyoung childrin salbe refrenit fr lustis nurist rude meit sall eit bot ani day abstene fra al thingis may mak thaym drunkyn pane chyld ane dyn yt fu dyn drunkyn salbe pu ist ye deith pyoung men salbe swift rynnyng w slyng ith corshow ow casting hald yame fra thingis makis yame thay al sleip burdis hard beddis mak thaym abell suffir distres kyngis weris nane thi thingis wer inhibit agit men bot allanerlie eschew superflew mony coursis wes comandit ye decreit tauerneris drunkattis bordallaris prouocaris pepil intemperat diet lust sall pa cuntre within ane certane day vnder pane deth thir lawis ye pepill wer maid within schort tyme lichorus glutonis temperat men soft bodyis reddy suffir laubouris effeminat creatouris maid wyse manly campionis followit sone eftir gret felicite realme throw wyse prudent administratioun kyng constantyne first trubill rais tyme wes euanus capitane ye ilis pepill he bene ay sa peruerst insolent ingyne sen thair first beginnyng thay may nothir sustene lang peace weir quhen thay ar waistit lang weris thay think na thyng sa displesand thaym battall laubouris haue peace vter deligence eftir lang peace thay flow rich incressis ilk day sa insolet yt thay may nocht suffir equale administration iustice seikis frequent occasion othir haue weir ennymes ell haue weir amag yame self maner euanus ilis irki lang peace gaderit ane c pany siclik limaris hym self castell dunstafage wes keping lang orisoun coplenyt afore thaym continuatioun lang peace vncouth pepill he brocht nobillis seruitude constantyne yair kyng wes ane dum seuere vnmercyfull prince proffitable comonis yan noblis he maid certane lawis execute equale pure riche ony reuerence estait he richit familiaris vane coulour iustice putting nobillis gret punition thus wes na place left gentill men nobillis sustene thair lyfe sic honour yair eldaris afore contrar men vile obscure lynnage ar daylie promouit rich honouris na man micht leif strait lawis bot gif yai pa thair tyme innocence churlis doi quhilk na gentill hart mycht suffir heirfore nobil men sal nocht haldin vnder sic perpetual seruitud churlis sall nocht tymes cuming haue occasioun insolet proud best conspire aganis constantyne othir tak hym elli inuaid hym al ye power thay mycht quhilk beand done thingis micht succeid thay plesit ilis men rycht desirus haue thair renyeis fre thay mycht iniure pepill afore ony punitioun assistit opinioun solistit ye pepill murray ro cathnes rebell aganis thair prince nochtheles treason wes sone discouerit kyng causit hym ane cumpany chosin men cum haistely dunstafage quhare yi euanus hapnit yme tuke hym sindry complicis hingit
