thaym iebaitis becaus sindry gret princis ye cuntre wer participant treasoun thay wer tane samyn maner put strang presonnis quhil ye kyng mycht haue degeist consultation quhat punition wes efferyng thair offence phovv gadan king danis send tvvo brethir hungar hubba vvith gret armyis inuaid scottis hovv said hubba vvas vincust army put flicht ca xvi al sone yi trubil wes peacifyit yi wyse followit ane othir gretar motioun stair he neuir experiece aduersite yan quhen ye samyn leist apperis gadan kyng denmark come ane army first aganis scottis syne aganis inglismen motiue weris wes becaus ye residew p chtis quhilk ed denmark quhen thay wer doung albion ye weris scottis resignit hym al richt yat micht haue yair realme albion ye caus send ii brethir hugar hubba ane flote dani albion finalie arriuit euir brute thair weris come eris scottis eftir thair arriuyng thay inuadit pepill sic cruelteis thay wer con anit saifte thair lyuis seik new habitatioun mene tyme wes thay regionis ane huge noumer haly men quhilk prechi daylie scripture euang llis pepill bot thay wer inuadit sic slauchter cruelte danis yt maist part yame fled adriane bischop scotland ile may eschew ye dangeir appering may ane ile betuix fiffe lowthiane ane abbay monkis bot nothir ye reuerence yi religious place yit ye innocence thir haly men micht saif thaym thay war al slane vncouth punition torment thir haly martyris sanct adriane fallowis ar haldin yit gret venecation inglismen scottis dayly myraclis kithi yame king constantine seand furius cruelte danis ylk day mair incre ing thocht mair expedient assailye chance fortoun quhil pissance haill quhen attenuat frequet displesouris yairfore comandit pepyll mete hym thair best maner agane ane certane day place day byrt n come ane army aganis danis fand yame ampit fiffe liand two mylis syndry deuidit ye watter leuyn watter boldin thair cumyng sic violent schouris yat mycht riddyn efter inundatioun thairof followit sa meruellus serenite gai occasion constantyne inuaid danis battall becaus nane thir two armyis danis micht support othir constantyne come arrayit battall aganis hubba quhilk capitane danis ye southe syde leuyn ye danis sa feruent desire fecht yt thay micht na wayis haldin within yair tentis hubba maid hortation superseid yai fury quhil thay micht haue rescours freindis nochyeles yai war sa fers yt thay come array without aduise hubba thair capitane aboue thair harnes cote armouris bordourit reid sylke schinand meruellus brichtnes stok swerdis quhom na armour micht resist yir danis apperit richt terrible yair huge bodyis nochtwithstanding baith ye armyis iunit faucht incredible fury last danis ouirset multitude pepil war sa inuadit ilk side yt yai micht resist slang haistely yair wappinnis fra yame fled mony yame flead yair tentis war slane otheris war ca fowseis thair deid carionis maid ane gait scottis cum yair tentis su thaym perist riuer otheris craft swomyng wer sauit hubba swame throw ye riuer ony el wes humber rycht reiosit yat brodir hubba eschapit baith dangeir ennymes riuer incotinet armit hym wt gret ire reuege slaucht folk hovv king costantine vvas slane army discomfist danis ca xvii scottis wer sa insolent eftir victorie yat yai tuke lityll sollicitude thocht residew thair battall wes led aganis danis bot na aduersite mycht follow euery thyng wer dantit thair onlie virtew yai thair ennymes contemption spendit two dayis dansyng reuellyng singing ony sycht cheualrye sa far procedit thair foly yt thay kest cauillis quhay suld haue ye maist riche presoneris amag danis na otherwayis victorie bene present yair hand aboue insolence young agit nobillis fell contentioun maist outragius wourdis aganis othir agit men desiryng preferrit reason yair lang experience age young men reason thair manheid youth reddy assailye perellis bot thayr wes na sermone amang thaym yair army suld arrayit yit quhat wayis thair ennymes suld vincust last quhen watter leuyn wes fallin kyng costantyne brocht ouir army fecht ye residew danis ye danis hauad sycht ye gouernance thair battal yan ony spulye arrayit yair army sort ye rycht wyng wes hubba vim danis left wyng wes buernus inglisman quhilk wes banist ingland pollution osbret ye kig ingland wife come battal aganis scottis residew pichtis quhilkis war banist afore albion myddylward hugar ye remanent danis exhorting yam pa battal gud curage schew ile albion wt ye rich frut yairof suld reward thair victory trar gif yai war vincust nocht micht follow bot deid slauchter yame petual schame inflam yame mair fury swore neuir return tent without victory causit yame al sworn ye samyn wyse tothir syde king costantine put ethus brothir ye richt wig ducane thane athole ye left wing xm ilkane thair battallis arrayit hym self ye middilward ye residew scottis sine began mak orisoun army first gaif thakis god yi victory recently fallin pepil exhortit yame fyle schamfull fleing ye glore yt yai conquest afore yair maheid virtew prayit yame haue na feir yair ennymes yai wer bot corpolent bodyis ony virtew micht thairfore sone vincust gif thay war inuadit ye samyn maner thay war afore finaly requirit yame ryn ouir feirsly battal bot erar suffir yair ennymes cu yame beleuit said ennymes rage ire ryn sa fast forthwart yat yai suld wery brokin eui yai come straikis bot comand constantyne wes rycht noysum tyll olkis bald sp eit feirsnes suld haue bene ekit hortatioun yair capitane wes gre mlie menist yi comand constantyne folkis vsis quhen thay ar fecht cum sic faird noys thay rais na le thaim self hie urage astonisis thair ennymes dredour ye danys ud trumpat went forthwart nochttheles yai wer expert cheualrie fra thay saw thair ennymes nocht mei thaym thay sum tyme abaid sum tyme went forthwart esy pais schowtand thair ganyeis dartis tothir syde scottis schot yir danis arowis sloung stanys belyue baith armyis iunyt faucht incredibill fury quhyll last scottis wer put flycht quhom foll wit danis lang slaucht chace vnhappy battall wer slane xm scottis amang mon othir presoneris kyng constantyne wes tane brocht ane coue besyde see quhare wes heidit xiii yeir regne fra incarnatioun viiiclxxiiii yeris place quhair wes slane yit callit ye blak coue ane memorie wickit deid pof king ethus actis hovv osbret king ingland vvith mony othir pepyl vvas slane cruelte danis sindry meruellis sene albion deith ethus ca xviii yi vnhappy battal sic miserabil skaith followit scottis yt bene eth brothir kig costantine happinnit saiffit h fleyng ye name memory scottis bene endit yi day albion ye residew scottis quhilkis eschapit fra vnhappy battall couenit scone maid eth kig mony vncouth strage meruellis war sene yi tyme albion ane multitude fische sene forth tane half yame aboue ye watter na thig different fra figour callit ye pepil bassinatis thir fische he blak skynnis hingand thair bodyis quhilk sumtyme ya couir yair heid yair cragis euyn yair schulderis quhen thir fische fletis seyis yai signify gret infortuniteis mortall pepyll ye lochis riuaris stude frosin fra ye beginning nouember ye end aprille eft quhilk followit ane thow sa co tinual ythand raynis leit snawis yt al ye planis stude ful watt tha followit sa infinite nowmer padokis yt ayre infeckit ye gret damage pepyll ane comite sene fyrie bemis risyng afore none schane moneth aprile pepyll astonist sic vncouth meruellis beleuit gret affliction cum yame danis efter yi victory come louthiane chasit inhabitantis thairof northub rlad fauch yair aganis osbret king ingland support bruern quhilk banist schew afore fynaly yai slew ye said osbret plane battall put folkis flicht efter slauchter yai went bludy swordis throw boundis ingland ceissing fra na maner cruelteis cry yn pepyl throw quhilk mony haly men sufferit matyrdome amang quhom ane haly man sanct edmond king northfolk southfolk quhilk slane yair tyrany ye remanent kigis ingland faucht certane yeris eft syndry chance fortoun aganis danis finaly al ye inglismen yt dwelt fornens ye almane seyis war outhir slane thirllit seruitude danis yit thair cruelteis war lag vnpunist yai war dantit ye vailyeant alarude quhilk succedit eft kig eldrede ye realm northfolk southfolk yi eldrede vincust ye danis frequent battal slew baith hungar hubba restorit ingland ye auld liberte bot wyl return ye remanent geistis king eth said prince sa swift yt mycht tak ane hert ane houd force speid nochtheles quhat sueuir gift nature followit hym apperit richt vnabil gouern ye realm quhen micht haue recouerit sober besynes fif louthiane othir ladis tane fra scottis iniure inglismen britonis tuk na regard thairof hauand mair sicht lust tha ony comon weil ye realm ye samyn suld haue bene reformit ane better chance seruit h vnbridillit lust ony respect ciuil religius maneris yocht rycht agil deliuer body mony othir giftis god nature abusit yame sa yt na thing semit hym gouernace ye noblis knawing corruppit maner noysu ye comon weill abyll gener displeseir amang ye pepyl yt ye realm suld cu mair affliction misgouernance yai maid ane quiet couetion amang yame self take ye king ye fyne yt yair intetion suld diuulgat afore come effect thay come haistely quhen ye huntis ye wod calidon tuk hym force armit men prison quhare deceissit thrid day efter malancoly secound yeir regne fra incarnation viiiclxxvi yeris pof king gregoure lavvis hovv recouerit sindry landis realm discofist herdeut vvith al ye army danis hovv rasyne gret capitane danis vvas slane inglismen ca xix ethus beand yus miserably deceissit prison gregoure sonne cogallus yat tang afore kyng alpine crownit scone bot two monethis age quhen fader perist spay yi gregoure efter coronation knawing weill deuine helpe targe sicker munition king realmes quhilk na kyngdomes may stad ony tyme permanent thairfore yat mycht begyn empire wt mair felicite set ane conuention nobillis forfair agmentation deuine seruice kirkmen mycht mair frely geif thair attendance ordoure thaym gud religion statuit publik parliamet kirkmen salbe perpetually exonorat weris tributis publik exactionis ar put pepyl hym successouris tymes cumyng thay sall drawin afore prophane iugis bot allanerly submittit thair ordinat iugis gaif power bischoppis realm decide afore yame al actiois tenad faith body power baith caus ye pepyl keip yair faith mittit yair nichtbour punis yarne violation yairof gaif al power ye said kirkmen make lawis constitutionis weill cristin faith discus al debaitis cocerning oblationis teindis testamentis obligatiois legasi iterprete ye lawis punis manesworn pepyl blasphlemaris god sanctis cur al pepyl rebellad yair co stitutionis inhibit yame cum quhare deuyne seruice done yt al personis quhilkis war cursi yame suld brouk na heritage hard iugement bot exilit gud cu pany na faith geuyn deposition witnes comandit yt al prince succeding efter hym sall mak thair aith efter yair coronation defend ye honour liberte haly kirk kirkmen sall mak na derogation constitutionis kirk gregoure ane naturall inclination seruice god sa graue sententious lagage yat al wordis dedis apperit thay ben pasit iust balance sa institute youth yat leuit al day ane heuynly life skars fude sleip ony lust couersation wemen gyne na le geuyn polecy administration iustice cheualry ye first iornay yat maid fiffe recouir fra tyranny danis pichtis quhais cumyng pichtis quhilkis war left danis habit ye said land war sa astonist knawing huge hatrent ye scottis b aganis yame yai fled louthiane gregoure fyndand fiff desert maner brocht scottis syndry partis realme inhabit ye samyn efter yi come louthiane brocht ye samyn maner dominion sine went ye mers quhare syndry cupanyis pichtis danis war assemblit geif hym battal nochthelis ye danis sa gret multitude scottis thair sycht fled berwik quhare syndry othir danis wer yai opinion efter yai went northu birland fand syndry danis laitly cumin yair support ye inglisme quhilkis war yat tyme b rwyk hauand na thing mair hatrent empire danis randeri town berwik scottis gregoure resauit ye town gaif lycence inglismen depart remane thair pleseir slew danis quhom fand ony mercy ransoun quhen garnist town necessaris keping thairof come army northumberland e k ye samyn empire scottis mene tyme war two armyis liand northumbirland ye tane danis far fra york yi othir inglismen xx mylis fra campe scottis herdeut prince danis heirand sa mony danis war slane berwik maid aith reuenge thair slauchter sic cruelte na scottis salbe left lyue albion brig purpos effect come displayit baner far fra samyn place quhare scottis war liand yair tentis gregoure seand ennymes arrayit afore hym tuk purpos haue maid ane orisoun army afore iunyng quhen suddaly rais sic noyis clamour amag yame desyre battall yat mair necessar array yame exhort thaym battall nochtheles besocht yame reuenge ye shamfull slauchter kyng constantyne slane treasonably eft yt tane incotinet ye scott uschit forthwart na le maheid tha preis come sa fersly thair lang speris yair ennymes na laseir schote thair dartis efter ye speris come residew scottis lang swerdis illis axis sic ire yat yai nedit na hortation thus war danis vincust chasit nixt montanis scottis followit na le cruelte ye chace tha yai faucht afore ye battall maist violent irruption thay braik trinschis come perforce within ye tentis ennymes quhare ane huge slauchter maid morrow herdeu colleckit ye residew army seand yame slane tha lyue tuk purpos pa rasyne gret maister danis ingland bot skarsly army gane xl mylis quhen sicker tithing come rasyne slane army discomfist inglismen mair derisioun heid borne ane staik throw syndry townis cieteis ingland apperit thir nouellis ye proude empyre danis ast tending rewine herdeut richt astonist knawing quhat done becaus ennimes war liand hym euery syde parkit army ane st ate place purpos remane quhyll war fynaly aduertist quhat ye remanent danis intendit phovv gregoure recouerit syndry la dis realme slevv constantine kyng britonis hovv scottis britonis inglismen vvar confiderat aganis danis ca xx efter victory danis northumbirland come vnder ye dominion king gregoure al ye inhabitatis yairof maid tributar h empire sone efter skalit army come berwik quhare tuk aduisement quhat ingyne micht bring maist felicite realme begynnyng nixt symer rasit campe aganis britonis quhilkis ye tyme gret boundis scotland quhilk iornay succedit hym na le felicite tha othir done afore aganis danis ye britonis attenuat brokin e frequent weris danis delyuerit al dageir apperig gaif ane huge sowme money ye said danis tuk trewis yame xx yeris nochtheles ye danis abaid schort tyme th peace bot inuadit ye britonis mair cruel iniuris tha afore ye britonis seand na band amite faith micht continew ye danis ythand iniuris sed yair ambassatour kig gregoure mitting renunce al ye landis pertenit ye empire scottis sa yt wald support yame aganis ye danis gregoure knawing gif thre pepyll albion scottis britonis inglismen war fiderat vnder ane mynd pissance na vncouth pepyll war dred codiscendit yair desyris yus war scottis inglismen britonis fynaly agreit al debaitis al ladis tane afore fra scottis yair weris raderit plesandly gregoure ye realme scottis dela auld marchis ye peace tretit maner apperit na le terribil ye danis tha plesand ye albianis bot indurit schort tyme ye proude felicite fallin inglisme victory danis slauchter allarud yair capitane gaif occasion britonis brek yi bad laitly maid scottis sone efter costantine king britonis began penitet yi bad maid scottis recouer ye saidis landis empire come ane army annadale yus ye peace desoluit betuix scottis britonis ye britonis sed tyl inglismen support becaus thay war frustrat thairof yai tuk ane huge pray gudis annandale wt purpos pa ye samyn walis kig gregour aduertist yir extorsiois met kig costatine louch mabe quhare cruelly fochtyn al sidis last costantine seand ansenye ereckit sa per curage desiri ruschit wt maist feruent curage defence thairof quhare fechtand mair respect honour tha lyfe slane efter quhais dei followit sa huge slauchter stragest campionis brytonis gaif bakkis war sa brokin affliction yt thay come maist hatrent baith danis scottis na thing luffit inglismen nochtheles thair realme suld nocht faill thay chesit herb rt quhilkis brothir constantine afore slane thair kig send yair oratouris king gregour desiring peace saying violation band betuix thaym scottis insolence consta tine quhilk punist iustly h offence gret damage britonis sen iustly punist offence na occasion apperit dissolue band afore contrackit betuix scottis britonis atto e yai schew yt thair kig herbar ane luffar peace desyris na thing sa mekyll leue amite nichtbouris scottis message answerit king gregoure wyse nothir luffe faith peace yit reuerence band aith he mouit ye britonis seik peace w sen thay ony respect thair faith band come annandale wirkand importabyll iniuris b ony occasion scot bot becaus yai ar sa brokin thair pi sance thay may party tyme w knawand na thing better vter exterminion thair realme gif thay perseueir ony forthir wt weris aganis w yairfor schaw kyng herbart wyll haue na peace hym treasonabyl pepyl quhil str munitionis cumbir westmurland ra derit handis ye said herbert sworn neuir reclame ye saidis landis tymes cumyng lx nobyll men geuyn plege obseruatioun thairof kyng herbart seand hie dammage approcheand realme dreidand gif perseuerit battall ye fynal euersion realme subdittis condiscendit aduise nobillis fulfyll thingis yai war desyrit gregoure al sone plegis war geuyn maner britonis left cumbir westmureland past walis tha gregoure went carlyll quhare assemblit nobyllis ane cou sall said maner patent yneuch quhat felicite cumyn realme propiciant fauour god sen began honour hym trew religion faith sa far he nocht onely restori w ony gret slauchter peryll ladis tane sumtyme fra eldaris iniure danis inglismen britonis bot al punising yair iniquiteis he brocht thair nobyl la dis northumbirland cumbir westmureland iust conques hand haue optenit grace fauour god mair tha beleuit landis recouerit dyuers boundis inglismen brytonis falling pray w rite b ttal haue honest victory triumphe ennymes land glore posterite cotrar fais he tint schamefully landis yat thay wrangusly coquest bot vincust battall chasi doung fra thair rowmes inuadit vncouth domistik weris nocht assailye chance fort ony forthir w auentu yai bring thaym self irrecouerabil da mage schame britonis e fauour god awin man heid sa vincust yat yai wilfullie he exil thaym self na bett chance he succedit danis bot doung yair boudis schamefully condigne slauchter maid thaym iniuris wrocht afore w cumbir westmureland northu birland munitionis thairof maid pray w desyrit heirfore forcy campionis sen youre prouin virtew manheid quhom god standis sa propiciant persuadis yow nocht rest victorie yit stand cotent yi pray beseik yow follow vehementlie thing ya offerit yow prouidence god na villagis rude pepil ar assailyeit sen ennymes apperis na partis maist strenthy wallis townis ar taikin weris danis ar vincust fled kent inglismen sa astonist thay haue left chargis battallis landis resist thair ennymes lat w heirfore pa recent victorie york quhare na greter laubour afore howbeit mair riche pray guddis abidis w aboue yir proffettis gyf al chargis wy lie sall conques infinite glore honour oure posterite thir ar materis wald persuade yow ye fyne ye may reuege ye iniuris done ennym ye indifficient honouris hie felicite may succe yow thir wourdis ilk man maid prouisioun sic thyngis maist accordig weris mene tyme come gregour ambassatouris llarud kyng ingland reiosand yat inuincible curage dantit ennymes sa vailyeantlie reuengit ye slauchter costantine kyng scottis danis support wer dreuin albioun desiryng hym thairfore renew ye auld band peace inglismen scottis beand cofiderat togidder vndir ane mynd may resist b tter inuasion danis gif thay return sumtyme albioun kyng gregour assentit thir petitionis followit kir peace ratifyit vnder mane scottis sal perpetuallie reio al boundis northumbi land ony infestatioun inglismen cuming gif danis moue weir aganis ony ane thir two pepil ye iniure salbe repu comoun thaym baith baith pepill concur equalie defence yairof attour nothi inglismen scottis sall inuaid otheris gyf ony theuis ingland mak thift reif within ye landis scottis peace sall dissoluit thairfore bot baith theif resettoure salbe deliuerit quhair cryme comittit hovv king gregoure come ireland reuenge certane iniuris done gallovvay hovv dantit samyn vvith syndry victoris vvas gouernour thairof mony yeris louyng deith ca xxi peace ratifyit maner forsaid gregoure beleuyng haue put fyne al weris wes constranit new trubill ireland renew samyn ireland men come ane gret flote galloway tuke ane gret pray men gudis ye boudis yairof ye motiue yair weris yai allegit ye men galloway spulyeit two schippis dublyne efter yt samyn wer arriuit yair watteris al sone gregour aduertist yairof followit gret ligence yir ireland men yai herand cumyng war sa affrayit yai sped yame gret deligence yair cuntre incotinent gregour follwit yame ane army ireland maid al prince yairof astonit cumyng schort tyme afore cumyng ye king ireland e e cissit left behynd hym ane young child namit duncane succeid crown throw deith princis ireland war contending amang thaym gouernance realme war deuidit two opinionis brennus prince ye faction cornelius tothir war ye scottis tynnand throw cuntre sa awfull incursion fyre slauchter apperit without thair fury war mair haistely repressit ane gret part ireland suld distroyit mene tyme sidry nobyl irelad labourit mak concord amang foresaid princis yt realme yair dissention suld ieoperd extreme dangeir becaus sic thingis culd nocht dressit thay tuke rewis betuix yame certane monethis resist thir cruelteis thir two pricis foresaid come huge rmy riuer bane set thair tentis two syndry cu panyi nocht far seuerit fra othir ye yll quhare thair tentis lay sa strenthy yat na army micht cum yame industry ingyne man keipand gud array done irelad men ye fyne ye king rego army production lang tyme suld laik vittallis nochtheles yair slichtis war vincust wisdo gregour ye scottis brocht sufficient vittallis breid cheis sustene yam l day vnderstud weil quhare euir yai com yai micht haif fouth watter thair drink gregour seing yt micht weil iuaid ennymes tuk sultation certane dayis quhat done ye mene tyme send iim ye bak mont fut within ye nicht ye fine yt al sone yai saw gregour inuading ye tetis ireland yai suld cast doun crag stanis yair bakis quhilk way ye ireland suld othir suffir itollerabi damage elli stranit geif batal quhe socht lag auisement quha suld tak yi charge hand nane sa abil yairto keneth thane carrik yi keneth come ouir riuer bane within ye nicht bak montane foresaid ane difficile strait gait morow al sone ye ireland maid yam al yair power resist ye inuasion gregour yair fel sa huge cragis stanis n yair bakis vnprouisitly behynd yame yat yai war constranit leif yair tentis fle eft ye im yam war slane ony straik incontinent scottis followit lag chais brocht ane huge nowmer prisoneris kyng gregour ye mene tyme ye tentis brenn war tane hym self foud slane straik ane stane corneli tothir capitane heirand sic displeseir fallyn cumpanion fled al folkis dublyne gregoure seand beginning succeid sic felicite comandit folkis scharp incursionis bring ye bestial gudis yat thay micht get thair sustentation abstene fra fyre slauchter comadit thaym na iniure agit men wiffis barnis bryng rank men quhom thay fand thair gai presoneris mony yir ireland pepill seand ye kyng mercyfull randerit thaym yair munition guddis wer plesandlie ressauit gregoure seand army weil stuffit vittallis na iniure ennymes apperand laid ane strait sege town dongard eftir yt lyne certane day ye sege thairof wes randerit nochtheles tuk bot ane sobir money fra ye cietezanis redeption yair lyuis gudd quhe gregor lyne iii day dogard left ane buschemet keip ye said toun past wt remanent army sege ye toun pont becaus wes randerit hym ony straik co mandit na pray guddis tane fra thaym wes gregour reddy pa sege town dublyne quhen ithingis come hym cornelius tothir capitane wes cumand infinit noumer pepill nocht ten mylis fra army gregour heirand thir nouellis left purpos arrayit folkis nixt planis ye morow apperit thre battallis ireland men sycht ye first wes lycht bodin men arch aris castaris dartis slongis secound wes stout men armit coitis mailye lang swerdis thrid battall wes cornelius nobillis irelad sworne fecht manheid curage deith armit lang swerdis billis axis ledyn mellis gregour seand ordour ennymes aganis comandit ane buschement lang speris sette archearis quhome mony ireland men wer borne dynt thairof ground cornelius seand folkis put abak yi way comandit gret clamour cut speris quhen wes rasyng visare heumot exhort folk eirnistlie fecht wes hurt face ane speir constranit pa feild throw quhilk remanent army gaif bakkis followit slauchter chace wes afore battall continewit still thaym quhill yai wer chasit within ye wallis dublyne ireland men wer sa brokin battall thay mycht assembill na army tymes cumyng aganis scottis morow gregoure beltit town dublyne strang sege town wes sa gret noumer pepill wes constranit seik peace sum thaim alliegit honest wes ische ieoperd thaym extreme chance fortoun subdewit empire scottis otheris seand gret trubill slauchter wes cumand yame last battall dred gyf yair nobillis wer presentlie distroyit se vter euersion yair realm thairfore send bischop cormach ane man singulare prudence kyng gregour desiryng hym haue miseratioun thaym thair town saif thair young prince duncane quhome ye crown ireland iustlie pertenit schew vailyeant campionis suld haue respect weill thair honour proffet al wes na honour mak conques ane young knycht town wes comand ye cuntre thairfore prayit hym auyse quhiddir wes erar office ane kyng defend rycht princis townis se thaym brocht vter euer oun kyng gregoure answerit come nocht ireland conques defraude cosyng duncane ye crown bot onlie reuenge ye ini ri done pepil ye scottis mouit na weir quhil ireland began first thaym yit suld ise ane end micht put al weris saif ye crown hai quhil cosyng duncane wer reddy succeid cietezanis dublyne heirand answer oppinny ye por ressauit gregoure army yan gregour enterit wt gret riumphe towne pepill hit furth al partis ye town meit hym yan come ye religius men processioun amang quhome wes bischop cormach solempnit habit eirand ye croce eftir quhom come ye nobillis ireland fallyng ani yair kneis desiring grace gregour incotinent demontit or gret veneration ki roce yan cormach said haue na litill caus thank god sen he ordanit ye haue auctorite aboue lyuis guddis yt he put sic copassioun mercy yat na cruelteis ar exercit w fyre swerd howbeit ye samyn rite armes mycht esaly done gregoure enterand town yi maner left ane buschement armit men keip ye stretis aganis al aduenturis yat micht fal al sone done deuotion ye kirkis lady sanct patrik went castell quhair remanit al ye nycht ye morow sindry scottis quhilk ulyeit virginnis matronis nycht afore wer tane iustice yi wise price put deith quhilk thing causit hym gret fauour beneuolence pepill eftir yi ane counsall wes se betuix gregour ye noblis ireland quhylk peace wes roborat vnder thir conditionis young duncane kyng ireland salbe geuin keping wyse preceptouris within castell dublyne teche hym letteris king gregour salbe gouernour ireland duryng tendir age sal ressaue al ye strenth proffettis cuntre gide samyn iustice attour na inglismen britonis danis without coduct salbe ressauit ireland elandmen swore glaid cheir fulfyll thir poyntis plesadlie becaus gregour wald nocht vsurp ye crown ireland damage yair natiue prince howbeit mycht haue done ye samyn litill damage hatrent weris peacifyit sort ireland gregour returnit victorius army albion lx pleg ye noblis sonnis ye region quhilkis wer geuin obseruation al articlis afore deuisit eftir yi ye scottis gud peace ony trubil al ye time gregour quhil last yi nobil prince protectour ye kirk hal ar pepil equite na le pyssant polecy religioun iustice mercial glore ded armes fell lag age gret maledy deceissit dudore ane castel gareach ye xviii yeir regne fra ye incarnation viiiclxxxxiii yer wes buryit colmekil king donald ye sex hovv ye realm normanis duchery flade tuk beginning ye gret cheualry danis sindry partis vvarld deith ca xxii ye xt sonne constantyne ye secoun na le heid curage gregour howbeit fortunat ye tyme gregoure wes ane nobill iohne ot singulare rudition theologie wes mony yeris ye sc li athene quhare ffet mek gre k letteris wes brocht eft athenis france lewis romane emprioue quhare maid mony excellet werkis amang quhom translatit ye iherarchy sanct denis latyne ane buke haldin gret veneration amag clerk moralie new cometit ane doctour paris namyt victor iohne scot wes send eft comad charlis ye thrid king romani ambassatour alarud kyng ingland thank hym yat eftir victorie danis ye said alarude maid amyte cofiderat freindis ye scottis quhome wes maid sa tendir yt wes chosin preceptour sonnis quhen techit baith moral natural philosophie theologie ane abbay inglad namit maluisbery spreid letteris amang young men ye cun geuand laubouris chaistifie yair corruppit maneris yir young men quhen wes reidand maist curiouslie slew hym repreuyng thair vice wes ekit ye noumer sanctis schort tyme afore thir materis began realme normannis france yi maner rolland kyng denmark gaderit ane cumpany danis ingland norr way suedrik demark yeid throw sindry partis france ceissyng fra na maner cruelte ye pepill yairof wes implicat freq nt weris italie aganis ye danis ragit sa renyeis gret boundis france apperit vn er yair dominion le thair fury wer ye haistely dantit kyng ch rlis eftir returnyng italie gaderit ane gret army resist yir danis yai na thing effrayit went forwart mei yair awfull maner princis france knawing gre ferocite danis prouin afore partis quhair yai war assailyeit seand thaym frequent victorie sa insolet yat gret slauchter yai mycht vincust perswadit kyng charlis mak peace said rolland yat yair realme suld nocht ieoperdit extreme dangeir throw weris baith italie france last assent ye kyng peace wes roborat ye danys yi sort yng charlis douchter salbe geuin mariage rolland rollad ye danis sall res ue ye cristin faith ye name touchquhare sall haue al yai landis quhilkis wer namit afore new ria hand betuy deip picardy paris bertanye thir ladis wer callit hym norma dy say realme normannis rolland maid kyng normandy yi peace w r bert ressait baptisme commandit ye said charlis pay ane yei ly tribut hym posterite signify yt ye said landis wer conquest force armes bot nlie geuin fra ye crown france mariage yeir ye normanni begin regne normady wes fra ye incarnatioun viiiclxxxvi yeris vailyeat dedis done ni sindry partis warld gret admiration al pepil tyme yai maid weir lotha first king frace sonnis war deuidit sindry ctionis ye danis enterit france inuadit ye cuntre gret heirschippis cruelte beside ye riuer iger yocht king charlis quhilk succedit efter lotharnis come huge armyis aganis yame yit micht mei yair cruelte bot dang yam normandy othir boundis ye marchis frace yai war content thir rowmes yeid italy ouirraid al cicil ca bre naplis gustard yair cap ane yi gustard ye fift man ye rang eft rolland normandy f rolland gat king charlis douchter willia willia succedit richard richard succedit richard secound quhilk ii sonnis robert gustard yi robert gat willia ye bastard normandy quhilk com efter ingland dantit baith danis inglisme syne tuk ye rown yairof quhais blud regnis yit gret felicite ingland samyn tyme bal wyn ane richt nobil ycht maryit iudicha douchter cl tarius king france ya alli began duchery flander quhilk afore ye tyme inhabit mai wild beistis ony pepyll bot wyll return hystory kyng donald seand ennymes appeir na happy blasphlemation w insolence gret men mair tha euir rals ony tyme afore amang eldaris sa far ingyne pepil yat ar foundin tyme hauand sic reuerence god sicht thair awin weil abhortis yir detestabill atthis blasphlemation bot yai war leifful su honeste samyn decore ye doaris thairof ilk day risis new blasphlemation god geif thay soddin roistit hell othir mair abhominabil ait spreit dreid god dare rehers bot alace yai ar cedit sa far na preching na monition reason may reforme ye samyn bot wyll return history king donald yi tyme aduertist gormond king danis cuyng ane army northubirland vncertane quhat purpos howbeit ye fame yt come inuaid inglismen scottis nochtheles send vm fut men iim horsmen support alarude king inglad aganis yir danis lang eft king alarude faucht wt danis abington howbeit g victory samyn gottyn gret slauchter al sidis yus war baith armyis constranit haue peace vnder yir conditionis ye danis sal leif tymes cumyng vnder freindschip inglismen sall sacrament baptisme sal geif plegis othir obseruation al co tenit ye said peace followit gud yeris efter inglismen ye peace ingland scotland ye inuading othir si sla chter yame wa slane within two monethis ylk syde king donald impacient come yame ane army quhil ye principal troubyl w r tane punist yair demeritis ye deith cuntre eand dantit yi maner king donald began haue ye cocord da inglismen suspition mind habitation northumberland hauad hym ane cupany chosin men reddy resis al inuasion ye micht occur finaly deceissit ye efter yt roung xi yeris bu yit colme yl fra ye incarnatio ixciii yer sa endis heir x buke thir cronikles heir begynnis leuynt buke croniklis scotland pof king constantine thrid hovv dani inglisme vvar cofiderat mariage hovv peace vvas dissolait hovv scottis vvar discofist ye king constantine ca primo eft er deith king donald succedit costatine ye iii son king eth geuin mair domestik religious maneris tha che alri tyme edward kig inglad son last king yairof battall aganis ye scottis send ane herald king consta tine chargeand hym restore inglismen northuberland westmureland quhilkis gregour fra yame afore wt certification gif ye war done suld within xl day efter inuad wt battal king costatine said th ld return ha e say kig edward howbeit haue na occasio battal agan w inteding wr g titil reif outland fra w yit sal defend ye sa far god wyl gif w grace ye vt end life praying god turn ye damage yt fal ye wer yam ye gaif ye first occasion yairof followit sone eft frequent incursiois athir side yit feir danis yai durst meit set battal yt ye danis suld haif sufficient oportunite conques baith yair realmes last quhen yai war brokin wt athir iniuris noblis ingland seand sa hie damage appering yair realm suadit king edward couert hatrent danis haue peace scott edward refusing yi cousal send oratour king costatine smal labour purchest peace redres beand maid ylk side schort tyme eft happinnit ye certane pure inglad war tane danis hingit batis theuis ye inglismen kad occasion battal slew certane dauis quhilk war yair crandis londo recopence yir inglismen ye war afore slane followit tha slaucht inglisme danis al placis quhar yai gaif occasion baith pepill cu set battal aganis othir nochytles quhe yai war arrayit otheris sicht fecht yai war seuerit inte tution brocht agane allis vnder thir coditioni beatrice kig salbe grayn mariage danis ye atris male gottin betuix page missing last ye array brokin sydis ilkane fechtand throw reddy fle ye mene tyme two lo thiane men namit dubar maid yam mo ure yai war cuming ye backis danis incontinent ye danis fled nochtheles mony yame perseuer battall quhill thay war slane otheris nocht knawand quhat place thay suld fle fell amang mossis war slane pepel indulphe hauad victory wyse went throw campe ane sobir cumpany na dageir war occurring happinnit cum ane band danis hid vnder couert ane vale quhare slane fechtand deith ye vter distructioun fay buryit colmekyl ix yeir egne fra ye incarnation ixcl viii yeris yi ilk yeir deceissit edmond king englad efter quhom succedit eldrede pof king duffus hovv vvas vvith gret infirmite vvichecraft hovv punist certane conspiratouris vvas slane ca iiii efter deith kyng indulphe ane conuentioun maid scone quhilk duffus sonne malcolme ye first wes king culyne son indulphe maid prince scotland lord cumbir duffus efter coronation went il callit afore hym th thairof maid ai h gyf thay da tit theuis within thair boundis punis thaym na le principall misdearis thanis ilis dreidand seue tie king tuk mony sornaris vaga ndis lymmaris cu tre put yame deith thus war remanent thir pepyll constranit fle ireland elli seik sum craft wyn thair leisting yit syndry nobyllis tuk indignation thair freindis quhilkis war cumyn nobyll blu e suld costanit seik yair leisting vile craftis comonis quhilkis war borne seru tude war preseruit yame honouris dignite thocht thairfore ye kyng vnworthy regne aboue yame murmuration ilis bot syndry partis realme mene tyme king duffus fell ane heuy maledy vnknawin medcinaris yai day onely trublit ylk day new dolour bot resoluit ane continewal sweit micht get na rest sleip attour maledy ye mair admiration aynd proceding fra vitale spreitis schew h blude dew proportioun soft pul nochtwithstandyng grew sa leyne yt body semit haistely euanis medcinaris disparit lyfe knawyng na remeid aganis infirmite began plesand wordis mak hym solation sayng suld reuert spring yeir quhen euery thyng natural influence conualescis kyng disparit finaly heil send al capitanis ye tribis prayit yame haue sic sicht thair honor comoun weill nochtwithstandyng infirmite realme micht gouernit peace iustice capitanis mittit al thingis desirit nochtheles thair rais ylk day continewal slauchter reif partis realme mair trubil may rehersit ye medcinaris inhibit yir displesouris schawin kyng auenture tuk sic malacoly yairthrow mycht haisty deith ye ne tyme rais ane murmour amang comonis kyng wes nocht trubillit natural infirmyte bot onlie deuilry craft wichis quhilkis gret noumer wes fore ane town murray al sone kyng wes informyt heirof send sindry wyse craftye men serche th verite thairof yir men quhilkis wer send yi effect schew thaym send treit concord betuix ye king ye murrayis euin thay entrit ye castell fore schew doneuald capitane thairof ye cause yair cumyng prayit hym serche deligently gif sic thingis ye fame schew wes verite capitane gat finalie experience treasoun ane soudiouris quhilk douchter principall wiche lamen gart hir reueil quhat hous town wichecraft wes vsit tha kyngis seruandis ane cumpany soudiouris enterit samyn hous quhare thir wichis wer fand ane ymage wax maid similitude duffus drepad ane treyne speit afore fyre fand ye wichis infundyng certane liquor ye ymage othir charmes vsit ye effect soudiouris tuke thir wichis incotinent brocht thaym ymage castell quhair thay confessit sa lang walx meltit afore ye fyre king duff wes resoluit perpetual sweit sa lang thay yet said liquor ymage suld neuir sleip fra walx wes meltit away ye kig suld de ye wich wer demadit quha lernyt thaym sic craft quha solistit thaym samyn thay answerit thay craft ye deuyl bot murrayis solistit thaym sla ye kyng ye ingyne ye capitane brak ymagis brint thir wichis said ye samyn nycht yt thir wichis wer tane wyse ye town fore kyng duffus wes deliuerit maledy nocht onlie tuk gud rest ye nycht bot wes restorit heil neuir bene vexit ony infirmyteis ye morow come murray punis certane rebellis ye conspirit aganis maieste maid sic deliget persute thaym ro caithnes othir partis quhair thay fled yt thay wer finalie brocht fore iustifyit amagis quhom wer slane sindry kynnismen freindis doneuald capitane said castell fore howbeit thay con irit mair otheris yair awin persuasioun executioun iustice mouit doneuald sic hatrent ye slauchter freindis determit gyf mycht fynd sufficient oportunite sla kyng nochtheles dissimilie ire ane time wyfe seand hym ilk day melancolius demadit ye cause displeseir last lag franyng wyfe schew quhat schame ye king done hym faithful seruice puttyng freindis maist vile deith yi wife wes ane woman vnmercyfull cruel e hauad na le hatret yan hir husband aganis ye king sindry hir freindis wer iustifyit ye samyn maner throw quhilk hir venom ire wes boldin euery day wt mair indignation knawing quhom scho micht opin ye samyn bot quhen scho vndstude hir husband ye samyn intentioun scho exhortit hym gud cheir mittit fynd ye way iniuris mycht best reuegit sayng king wes oftymes familiarly lugit yame mycht saly punist doneuald wes inflamit thir wourdis aboue hatrent abiding na thing b sufficient oportunite sla ye king becaus ye king wes depart ye morow doneuald set hym deligece bring cursit purpos effect nycht following al sone kyng done deuotion wet h chalmer fel sleip yan wes yi euald sa enragit wt cruelte yt mycht get na eis quhil cursit mynd wes fulfillit inco inent callit ye king cubicularis ane baket f istit yame cotinewallie quhil yai wer ane ye wynis sa sop yt thay wer costranit tak rest hauand na suspitioun yi treason de isit ye king deith doneuald seyn ye cubicula sleip send four seruandis quhilk wer corruppit afore h money ye kingis chalmer finaly slew hym brocht body ony noyis ane postrain tw mylis fra ye place quhair wes slane ane burn buryit ye myddis yairof quhair ye streme vsit pa syne put ane gret stane aboue body yat na thing suld appeir hid ye said place thir tratouris ye slew ye king fled orknay yt ye dee corp suld schaw slayaris haldin amang w yt ye body ane slane man bledis afore ye slaa quhiddir ye trew lat yame testifie yt he experiene thairof doneuald eftir ye slaucht ye kyng cause appeir innocet yairof past residew nycht ye kingis gard schawing ye gret humaniteis done sindry tymes ye king ye morow skry r amang ye familiar sayng ye king wes slane bed bullerand blud ye bodi tane away quhair na wist doneuald heirand ye noyis come ye chalmer ye remanet cubicularis knawin na thing treason becaus saw bed bludy slew ye cubicularis yai bene gilty yairof ran vp doun ye castel like ane furi se gyf micht se ony taikin ye king slaucht last fand postra opin iugit tha ckirl e yt ye cubicularis slane ye kig yai ye keyis ye castel yair kepyng ye noblis richt astonist come haistely seyis terribil deid hauand admiration yt ye bodi wes tane away ya h slaucht nochtheles sindry yame tuk suspitioun yi cruelte wes done doneuald becaus maid deligence serching ye auctoris treason aboue ye oure iust affection sone eft yai returnit hame sex monethis eftir nothir son mone stern wer sene ye heuin bot ye lift ouircouerit petual cloud ye gret trour ye pepil phovv culyne prince scotland punist ye slaucht king duffus sindry vncouth meruellis sene albion ca v culyne prince scotlad lord cubit rycht astonist yi perpetuall dirknes continewyng sa lang ye gret terrour pepill demandit noblis quhat mycht cause yairof quhom wes answerit yai beleuit god wes sa co mouit ye slaucht ye nobill king duffus yat gif ye samyn wer nocht punist haistelie maist terrible vengeance wes follow thair realme incotinet culyne comandit general prayaris asting done throw partis ye realme maid solempne aith neuir ceis quhill punist ye tresonable slaucht duff nocht lang eft come murray cuing maid ye murrayis rycht effrayit doneuald knawyng hym self gilty treason fled mouth tay uhair pullit vp salis pa norroway wt hym ye slayaris kig duffus ye mynd al cursit tyranis natural inclination dreid euery creature schawis yame self criminabil othir vult cotinance he ay sic eir yair life yai gif na man credence bot eschewis al fam cupany cofidis na thing sa mekil mirknes fleyng samyn maner doneuald schew fleing ye hid treason yt na man suspeckit gif abidin ye kigis cuing yus wes brocht sic miserie yat quhair wes repute su tyme familiar ye kig lu fer h comon weil wes haldin maist odius treasonabil cowart ye pepil seing hym fle suspition ye said treason prayt god send vengeance cupany quhilk followit sone eft culyne heirand deting tuke ye castel fore fand doneuald wife thre douchteris eftir lag inquisition scho cofessit al ye maner deith body wes hid ye myddis ane streme wt circustance said ye morow quhen ye pepil wes passad tak vp ye boby duffus tithingis come ye doneuald wt coplicis wes schip brokin tane ye pepill punist offence sone eft comad culyne wes brocht iugement wife iiii seruadis put cruellie deid yair body quarterit hugin sidry townis yi realm exampil al pepil quhat iniqi te sla ane kig ye takaris doneuald coplicis wer onlie rewardit richely bot exemit fra al publik exaction tymes cuming sic thing done ye body kyng duffus wes tane vp brocht wt gret solepnite colmekil quhair wes buryit said youcht kig duff lay vi monethis vnd erd body wes al fresche cullour hide first hour wes hid fra body come aboue ye erd ye wedd chagit maist serenite ane brig ye samin place quhair body wes hid beside quhilk ane abbay cesti ordour namit kyllos dedicat ye virgyne mary mony vncouth meruellis wer sene yi tyme albion hors eit yair awin flesche ane woman wes deliuer hir birth quhilk nothir eyne nose fute ane sparhalk wes strag la ane howlat maist wound nothir son mone sterne apperit sycht vi monethis bot lift ouircouerit perpetual dirknes haue schawin pof king culyne vicius life trubyl fel realme hi euyll ministration ca vi doneuald slane yi maner culyne wes maid king ye ferd yeir king duff fra ye incartion ixclxxii yeris ye pepil beleuit suld haif bene ane nobil prince seand hym begyn sa souerane iustice howbeit litill virtew wes sene eft gouernit ye realm aduise noblis bot geuin rage youth maist insolet corruppit lyfe throw vice gaif occasion pepill grow wildar vnd empire yan euir ya war vnd ony othir price afore finalie ye realme wes brocht sic poynt ye theuis reuaris clik pepil wer onlie vnpunist bot greit estimation sa gret truble rais ilk day ye untre ye gif ye samyn wer haistelie punist ye realme apperit cum vter rewine quhe culine rep ye yir mony othir enormiteis com yrow misgouernace maid litill excuse bot said yong wer lik ditionis agit sonis yairfor youth behuffit haue ane cours quhill wer stabillit proces tyme suld beda ouir gret seuerite bot moderat accordyng season yairof attour antecessouris indulphe duffus wer ouir se eir administration iustice apperit ye end yair empire quhen thay intendit vnd culloure iustice oppres yair noblis conqueir yair landis guddis yai mouit thair noblis rebellion finall distruction yame self better wes yairfore regne fauoure beneuolence aboue noblis regne manassing terrour na othir way mycht nobillis haldin h opinion yocht answer king culyne wes vnproffitable comoun weil yit na man durst oppinly repreue euery man comendit gouernance speciallie yai haiti iust pru et men ye noblis seand ye king familiaris ilk day insolet na thyng done ye vtilite ye realme drew thaym fra ye court otheris bane flatteraris nurisari vennom young sonis set yarne co inew ye king voluptuous life inducyng al thingis yt mycht affeminat mynd maist schameful vice quhil last yi vnhappy prince wes brocht sic miserie yt sicht na thing bot onlie sensual plesouris cherist nane bot maist vicius vile lymmar nocht onlie deflorit sindry vncouth virginis matronis bot al fulyeit awi sisteris douchteris religious wemen also ane cupany vicius herlottis thai na othir thing bot espyit quhair yai micht se ony plesand virginis matronis ye yai mycht aduertis hym yairof finalie thay wer ay brocht hym othir weir peace yi ane thyng followit miserable al sone ye king tane lust pleseir yir virginis causit vnhappy seruitouris deflore yam eft ye maner gif ony coplanit yir odius cruelteis yai gat na othir amendis bot yair leggis army brokin yocht yi effeminat mo stour waistit body ouir frequent cumpany wemen yit tuke pleseir se familiaris conuers yame opinlie sycht wes abusit yi maner thre yeris continually throwe quhilk grew onlie ane defamit creature bot throw misgouernance rais al maner truble displeseir subdittis reuaris sornaris oppressouris rais sic pissance yat na man durst punis yame gif ony man maid hym resist yame coplene wes sone eft slane ell guddis confiscat bigingis brint nocht onlie temporal men bot al spretual wer heryit ye maner yair guddis ornamet tane force throw quhilk ye comonis landwart pepill leiffit mony yeris gret oppression miserie kyng culyne last throw surfet vnbridillit lust fel ane maist vile schamful infirmite nature slidyng ony pleseir sauyng throw maledy body visage grew ilk day attenuat leyne yt past ye residew dayis gret dishonour schame noblis nochtwithstadyng heuynes maid ane couention scone depriue hym auctorite cheis ane new kig al sone culine knew quhat wes diuisit aganis past ane quiet cupany scone ye mene tyme cadard thane meffen met vnhappely ye gait slew becaus deflorit doucht afore end maid ye vicius tyrane culyne accordig h cursi lyfe ye v yeir h regne fra ye icarnation ixclxxvi yer wes buryit colmekill king keneth ye iii gouernace ison maid ye noblis hovv costranit yame bring sindry theuis iustice ca vii culyne slane said keneth bruthir kig duffus wes maid king ye beginning empyre gret laubour bring ye pepil quhilk wes growin wyld necligence culyne virtews leuyng ane thyng daylie practicat amang w first ye noblis syne comonis followis ye maneris king gif ye kig virtews ye pepil imitation inclinis virtew quhen vicius ye pepil ye samyn maner followis vicis king keneth yt suld detest ye schamefull deformiteis otheris quhilkis wer apperad schew pepill ane chaist pirce skairs fude liberal meik al doyng hating al scurrilite banist tauernaris drukart scaffaris vane flecheouris hous nuris concord baith vncouth domistik pepill far haitit al sedition yat punist ye mouaris yairof ye deith sic affection ye comon weil yt na wes sufferit abid h court bot sa mony sufficiet virtew craftis wyn yair leuing yus wer subdittis nothir effeminat lag sleuth yit irkit exercition gud werkis yi prince virtews gouernaunce wes reput maist worthy regne aboue pepil tuk purpos pa throw boundis realme punition theuis cuyng lanerk come sindry subdittis coplanit mony importabil iniuris wrangis done yame sindry limaris ye cuntre al sone thir lymmaris wer aduertist yat ye king wes sit iugemet execution iustice ya fled assistence ye noblis ilis ye king rycht co mouit yt wes stoppit nobillis iustice supersedit displeseir ane tyme ye yeir nixt following maid ane general couetion h noblis scone ye nycht afore conuention hid ane noumer armit men ane quiet chalmer nocht far fra ye place quhare counsal wes set comading yame secreit quhil yai wer warnit execute chargis co mittit yame ye morow noblis wer ordourit yair conuention yair awin placis ay nerest ye king yai wer blud auctorite ye mene tyme yir armit yschit ye chalmer quhair yai wer hid stude ye counsall keneth seand yame astonist said yi man howbeit ye breid yt new gyse iugement aboue auld custome oure eldaris wy e freind succeid displeseir feir thir armyt men yt standis yow yit gif mind quhilk set na thig mair yan ye comon proff realme yow ar ordanit ony damage yow ye nobilite scotlad bot onlie ye ckir targe comon weil beleue wyse freindis yt ony treasonable slychtis he brocht yi ga distruction sen ye ar ye onli esperac realme yairfore vnderstand thir armit men schawis na mannassing bot defence singulare comon proffet yair sindry euil isposit sonis yi realme ay repugnat ye weil yairof geuin thift reif slaucht birnyng siclik importable extorsionis ye pepil ye knaw quhat enormiteis he bene baith ye tyme culyne begynnyng empyre petuall euersion comonis yit ye knaw comonis thayr continewall laubour sustenis w ar richelie cloithit he al kynd costlie meitis yai ar purelie arrayit le skars fude sen haif al ye frute yair labouris think quhen thair guddis ar saif ar saif quhen yai ar heryit put pouer nane w ar eys thay wirk youcht ydill cotine wa bour wynnis w rich ye frute yair laubouris cumys w ocht yame self thairfore quha euis yame reuis w quha nu isi euis yair damage ar ennymes w comon weil yir reaso al sic importable iniuris inno ent pepil suld inhibit onlie suld desyre sic thingis done ye suld desyre yame sume maner gif ye affeckit othir weil yi realm self wi fis child deuysit ye remembir lane k purge yi realme al misdoaris yat ye comonis noblis may nurist tymes cu yng peace tranquillite yit thir misdoaris cotemption auctorite cope iugemet youcht knaw na thyng bett yair couoying away assistence gret men yit sused yi offence quhil oportunite occurrit howbeit mony yow wer sic kerlie informit wer ticipant yait k h conuoyit yame fra iustice attour ye frequent message send betuix yow yir theuis makand lig ce til bring yame iustice he maid ye mat credible noctheles quhat sume ir way ye mat standis haue remouit suspitioun gyf haue ony aganis yow haldis yow yi tyme fauoraris lymmaris bot erar defendour realm praying yow gif ye haif time bigane bene sleuthfull yan neid wes repair errouris ye ye may appeir luffar singulare comon weil first wyll ye bring yir theuis rebellis iustice yai may punist according yair demeritis promit yow ye sall deliuerit gard quhill se yame put deith ye haistelie ye put thir charg execution ye haistelie sal ye deliuerit boundage richelie rewardit laubouris noblis heirand yir wourdis fell kneis praying hym remyt offence done aganis maieste mittit onlie al charg desyrit bot remane quhair plesit quhill yair freidis brocht yir mi oaris rebell iustice sic thing ne ye kig brocht nobillis str ng gard ye castell bertha castell slude ap n ye wait tay wes sa straitlie keippit yai dayis within wach wache yt na man gat ysche entres speciall licence ye kyng al vagabound ydil pepil quhilk wer f nd ye gait wer brocht suspition castel ye noblis mene time wer occupyit reding historyis wes v sic hant dyse carus ar vsit finalie yai maid sic way extreme deligence yair freindis yai c yir maist notable theuis wer brocht ye castell ber ha hing iebaitis yair bodyis inhibit tane doun gif exampill otheris quhat frute followys sic sic thingis done ye noblis wer deliu rit exhortit ye kyng suffer nocht pepill iniurit sic oppressouris tymes cumyng scottis remanit mony yeris eft sicker peace phovv ye danis inuadyng ye scottis vvith gret cruelteis vvar discomfist king keneth hovv ye hayis tuk yair first beginning armes ca viii danys ilk day rageand hatret becaus th muir sufficientlie reuengit frequent murdir maid yair freindis weris scottis arriuit wt ane gret flor albion wer determi wes weil prouin ye end thair weris quhat sumeuir part albion yai arriuit remane thair continewall residece othir force armes subdew ye realme yair empyre elli al atanis de yi flo e danis arriuit ye reid brayis angus quhare standis ye abbay abi brothok dedicat honour sanct thomas canterbery eftir ye ordour sanct benedict part ye danis gaif counsall land yir partis bot erar pa ingland ye scottis yat regioun wer rycht vailyeant frequent battallis oftymes gret damage afore ye danis sen yi landis quhair thay wer new arriuit wer plenteus treis yan cornis wes proffitable ieoperde yame sa smal regionis contrarye landis ingland liand ye south wer riche pepill thairof geuin na thyng le cheualry mycht yairfor esaly subdewit forthir gif thay couat ony riche landis albioun ony extreme dangeir eftir following best wes pa kent otheris said yai wer arriuit albion onlie coq landis reuenge iniuris done scottis quhilkis wer ane bludy p pill mair curius defence othir mennys guddis yair awin wes prouin ye last battal f uchtin northumbirland quhen yai come support inglismen yairfore al sone yai ar cumyn kent yai salbe costranit fecht aganis inglismen bot aganis scottis contrar gif yai abaid scotland yai suld fecht ne lie scott yus wes best inuaid ye scottis first quhen ye scottis wer distroyit pa th n recent victorie ingland commit ye remanet chargi chance fortoun danis wery lang truble seis applaudit yi last opinion landit finalie besyde montros onlie tuk ye toun bot slew al pepil tane brak doun wallis thairof ye groud sone eftir yai come throw ye remanent boudis angus ye firth tay ceissyng fra na maner cruelte yt mycht deuisit ye peple effrayit yir displeseiris com kyng keneth wes striuelyng occupyit ministration iustice beleuyng na thyng le yan sic irruption ennymes inuaid realme eftir schort aduisement yat realme suld patent extorsionis comandit general edict al fensable personis meit hym ane schort day finalie ye day affixit come ane army ye mouth erne ye morow wes schewin ye danys wes cumyn ouir tay liand wt ane strag sege ye castel tha sic insu e able cruelte ya na kynd pepil townis ki ki quhair yai wer maister wer sauit king mouit yir iniuris rasit army maist deligence h ennymes ye nycht f llowing come loncarte quhilkis ane town far fra tay ye ni na thyng affrayit cumyng arrayit yame battal yan keneth arrayit folk ane ganand pl e moue noblis hir curage spreit aganis yair ennymes dischargit yame mali dewiteis aucht hym v yeris cum syne promittit oppin proclamation gif ilk man ye brocht hym ye heid ane dane x ell land perpetually respondent yairto ef ir maid orison god send army gud forto theis erar maheid honour perseueir battall ye deith yan tane fleand schame displeseir scottis rasit yir wourdis esperace victorie arrayit th ym gud ordour malcolm duf pr ce al scotland lord cubir wes arrayit ye rycht wyng ducane thane athole ye left wyng ye myd battall wes kyng kenneth tothir syde ye danis wer arrayit ye fut ye hill far distant fra ye scottis ye armyis ude lag arrayit otheris sycht quhill last ye scott ouir feirs desyrus battall come incredible schoure dartis arowis ganyeis ye danis impacient sustene yi inuasion scott come forwart gret noy incotinent baith ye armyis iuny ony signe faucht sa fei slie ye nane yame mycht sustene preis othir youcht lang bargane followit vncertane victorie yit na thyng wes impedimet scottis yan yair desire haue heidis danis erar yan victory quhe yi knawin danis yai cryit schil voce othir haue victory al atanis de incontinent yai ruschit sic properant fard ye baith ye wingis scottis wer put flycht nochtheles ye myd battall resistit vailyeantlie hail preis ennymes stud army extreme dangeir mony ye scottis fled wer cruelli slane danis day bene ye vter exterminion scottis wir ane land wart man namyt hay two sonnis strang rude bodyis howbeit thay wer maist nobill curage come haistelie support kenneth nobillis eftir thay wer neir vincust yair ennimes hay hauand na wapinnis bot yok ane pleuch seand myddilward quhair kenneth wes fechtand aganis ye danis nakit baith wyngis thocht na thyng sa honorable de vailyeantlie amang sa mony nobill men wes ane strait passage nocht far fra ye battall quhare gret noumer scottis wer slane miserabill e l yng hay traisting na thing sa gud stop fleyng scottis aid strait passage two sonnis slew baith danis scottis quhom fand fleand yok ye mene tyme ane certane scottis quhilkis wer richt forcy vailyeant cryit schill voce gud scottis men return renew battal defence kyng realm auise quhiddir honest ieoperd yow wt gud chance defence prince schamfullie murdrest fleing hay two sonis n mit said yokis ple ch ahaid strait passage con ranit scottis quhilkis wer fleand return battal aganis yair ennymes ye danis astonist yair returnyng trai ing sum new army cuing yair akkis le chase scott maid yame return yair fo yan ye scottis quhilkis war vincust afore war rasit wt new spreit curage ruschit feirsly yair ennymes pu yame flicht gret slacht maid ye battal bot mair ye chace ye scottis gat th day ane glori victory danis seuerant fechting ye noblis scotland ye mid battal ye deith yit maist hono succedit hay sonis helpit win ye fe ld eft yt discomfist ye scottis past ye nicht efter victory wt singing dansing incredibil blithnes ye morow keneth gaif ye maist part al ye spulye yi battal hay sonis ye remanet yairof war deuidit rite armes amang scottis sic thingis done ke neth returnit ye castel bertha comandit yi hay sonnis clothit riche claith follow ye said castel bot hay na thig desiring yairof come wt ii sonis yair auld rusty habit strinklit wt dust sweit battal samyn maner yai faucht reddy quhat chargis micht ye kingis pleseir ye pepil richt desirus se hay sonnis quhilkis yair singular maheid saiffit ye king ye realme stading maist dageir ennimeis come gret multitude co uoyit yam vphalda ye realm ye kingis palice hay accupanit wt huge pepyll yi wise enterit ye king palice b rad ye yok schulderis ye maner faucht aganis ye danis sone eft ane couns l set scone ye quhilk hay sonis war maid nobil dotat yair singular virtew prouin yi feild wt sindry ladis sustene thair estait said yt askit fra ye king certane ladis quhilk knew richt plentuous afore liand betuix tay arole gar al mekil yairof ane falcon flew ane scholichtit ye falco flew ane toun iiii mylis fra dude callit lichtit ane stane quhilk yit callit ye falcon stane sa gat al ye lad betuix tay arole vi milis lenth iiii breid quhilk ladis ar yit inhabit posterite attour nane vailyeant dedis suld peri bot ay remane recent perpetuall memory king kenneth gaif hym thre reid scheildis ane feild syluer beir maner armis place ye yok signify yt promouit fra smal obscure lynnage gret honour rich ladis attour yair rikit armes figour ye yok wt quhilk helpit ye scottis yair maist neid yi hay ar descendit mony nobyll vailyeant men ay defedouris yi realme quhais hous decorit sic auctorite yt constabill scotland phovv king keneth slevv ye prince scotland yat son micht succede ye crovvn ye message send sanct edvvard king keneth keneth orisoun maid noblis ca ix efter thir discofitouris danis followit sindry cotentionis yi realm ye men ilis tuk ane huge pray gudis ro nochyeles yai war al tane slane pepil ye cuntre al sone yi trubyll pecifijt followit ane othir ang mernis greter motio yair ane namit cruthneth quhilk gaderit kyngis li ye landis angus liand betuix south esk north esk ane doucht namit fenel quhilk ane feirs vndantit hir son namit cruthlint yi cruthlint come ye castel delbogyn quhare gud schir insolence fel sic debait ane caus nocht ye ii seruadis war slane hym self narrowly eschaping wt h life e ft com fethircarn quhare met moder schew hir iur laitlie done hym scho na thing mesi ire bot inflamit hym sa ar yt gaderit ane gret cumpany pepil ye mernys returnit within ye nycht said castel onlie slew gudschir bot left nane liue within ye said castel ye morow brocht ane gret pray guddis angus men angus impacient suffer thir heirschippis rais gret cu panyis maid heirschipp slaucht mernis ye samyn maner yng kenneth knawing acill ye ingyne pepill wes rebellion quhen na punitioun wes maid thair eft beleuit gif thir attemptatis er nocht haistelie danti sedi ioun suld rise haistelie damage realme thairfore summond al yame yt wer suspici cruelte baith ye mernis angus copeir scone ye xv day ftir following vnderly ye law vnder panys rebellion becaus yai comperit kyng followi yame sic diligence yai war al tane brocht donsi ane cruthlint ye principall monaris rubil war put deith yi executio iustice brocht kyng keneth knew fauour pepil wt sic affection ye nane yame wald heir suff ony detraction hym followit gret tranquillite quhil last ye xxii yeir regne prince sa lang decorit iustice comittit ne maist schamfull slauchter quhilk appe mair sichty yt life reput afore maist innocent geuyn ye comon weill ye blind immoderat affection yt son occasion yt slew poison malcolm duf prince scotland lord cu bir yt malcolme son ht succede ye crown scotland yit na man beleuit ye sic cruelteis committit hym becaus al othir wayis apperit ane iust prince king kenneth efter deith malcolme prince send sindry kirkis funerall obsequies saule micht refrene fra teris quhen herd name spokyn nochtheles syndry ye noblis suspeckit hym ye princis deid persauyng hym dissimulat dolour exceding ye iust affection mynd yit becaus al thingis ar vncertane pepyll left yair suspition ye mene tyme sact edward quhilkis efter martyrit stepmoder esculda send h ambassatouris keneth schawing hym richt commouit deith malcolme prince scotland nochtheles sen pepyl ar mortal desirit yt two realmes micht seueir athir fredschip efter ye tennour ye auld peace heis ane thir prince cubir yat war wise uri sar peace betuix ye two pepyl ke neth answerit na thing penitent ye band maid betuix inglismen wald ratify apprei ye samyn tymes cumyng ye election ye prince schew yat wald conuent noblis morow cheis said prince prayit thai fore thir ambassatouris return agane ye said morow yt thay micht heir quha war declarit prince scotland lord cumbir keneth callit noblis ane counsall scone said wyse gif ye haue sicht ye weil realme ye tranquillite ye pepyl yairof lang perseuerace tymes cumyng discreit wyse faderis necessar haue allanerly respect administration gouernance realme tymes bygane bot al tymes cumyng specially concernyng institution yo prince ye man consider quhat maneris quhat gouernance auctorite cernis ane prince ingyne maneris al pepil ar mutabyl corespondent season occurris oftymes succeding worst new maneris requiris new lawis thairfore discrepant iustice concerning ye reparation errouris vse ye thing amag w quhilkis institute reason lawis vsit al othir realmes yocht auld ritis war sum tyme plesand oure eldaris yit thay ar found vnproffitabyll ane law maid efter fergus ye first yat becaus sonnis maynus ferlegus war abyl gouerne realme yair tender age yat nerrest thair blud abyll iustice ye tyme suld king quhilk beand deceissit ye son king afore deceissit gif war abil suld succeid ony pley defendit samyn law eschew incouenientis yat na chyldren tendir age sal succeid yocht law found proffitabyl sindry tyme apperis iugement contrarious noysum ye comon weil nurisand extreme hatrent amag nobyl men ferithais secoud king yat rang efter ferg slane ferlegus howbeit said ferleg banist samyn caus endic dayis misery thus succedit doubyl aith ferlegus banist ferithais slane siclik cursit law followit displeseir realme quhe reuther maid king gret murdir baith scottis pichtus euerson thair comon weil quhilk brocht sic calamite efter murdir maist forcy campionis nobillite scottis pichtis war othir banist put seruytude youcht realme restorit auld stait yit followit frequent slauchter ye maist nobyl vailyeant men realme throw quhilk onely realme haldin perpetual trubyl bot maist tender cosingis costranit suspition fecht amang yam self empire oftymes iust heritour crown slane men obscure lynnage brocht gret rich bot mony nobyll men put murdrist forthir throw yi cursit law al vailyeant men war degenerat cowardis humyl men bludy mostouris iust auatici tyranis liberall men gredy reuaris chaist men lichorus vela inuading pepyl maist odious cruelteis amang othir skaithis quhilkis may nocht rehersit displeseir young chyldren quhilkis iust tytyll ye crown war murderit thaym realme gouernance quhen thay desyrit mercy yair faderis armes quhat cruelte quhat detestabyl fellonyis bene hard ony realme comparysoun sic thyngis bene done motioun cuesit constitution thairfore maist prudent faderis prouide aboue thyngis cursit law quhilkis kingis son disherist iust heritage abrogat becaus samyn sa iniurius he nuri amang yow mony vnthankfull displeseiris contrar law god man irrecouerabyl dammage he brocht common weil neir vter euersyoun psuffer heirfore nane othir bot kyngis sonne regne aboue yow tymes cum sa lange he ane lyue efter vse thir landis son ye king may immediatly succede nochtwithstading quhat sumeuir age quhare throw comon weil may appeir gouernit nocht auctorite ane man bot haill pepyl ye fyne yat kyngis son may haldin tymes cumyng mair veneration ye mair luffit deir hym phovv ye auld lavvis vvar abrogat kenneth cocernyng ye election kingis n vv lavvis contrar yame institute vision yat come hym bed deith ca x quhe kenneth endit orison certane familiaris come amang ye noblis desi ing yame cheis malcolme ye son e neth lord cubir yt mycht ye way ye better cu ye crown efter faderis deid quhe ye noblis wer aduising degestly yi er kenneth inquirit yame quhom thay desirit lord cumbir regent ye bordouris betuix inglismen scot ye samyn tyme war ii nobil gret auctorite ye counsal yt ane namit costantine son kig culme yi othir namit g ime neuo king ffus quhilkis war ust heritouris ye crown efter ke neth ye auld lawis nochthelis feir yair liffis thay said wyll mak quho list prince cubir bot al abragat ye auld lawis creat new institutionis forme purpos plesit ye residew ye noblis following vocis thaym declarit malcolme ye son kenneth lord cubir howbeit young vnabyl beir ony auctorite ye morow yir ambassatouris ingland war depeschit ressauit youg malcolme mak obedience king edward ye landis cu ir sic thingis done king keneth aduis noblis abrogat ye auld l wi concernyng ye creation yair king maid new lawis maner followis king beand deceissi eldest son eldest nepot notwithstading quhat sumeuir age youcht war born efter faderis deith sal succede ye crown pthe nepote gottin kingis son salbe preferrit nepot gottin kingis douchter pon samyn maner nepote gottin ye kingis bruthir salbe preferrit ye nepot gottin sister pthe samyn lawis salbe obserui amag al otheris noblis yi realm succession thair heritage pquhen ye king young ane nobil man gret prudence auctorite salbe chosin gouernour ye realme quhil ye king cumyn ye age xiiii yeris quhilk yer beand trun king salbe fre gouerne realme awin auctorite pall othir heritouris sal succede yair faderis heritage efter ye ysche xxi yeris within ye tyme thay salbe gouernit yair curatouris quhil ye yeir run thay sal admittit clame thair heritage pkenneth trai ing realm sta illit hym posterit thir lawis gouernit commonis gret iustice noblis donatioun landis guddis fauour youcht rep richt happy sindry opinio yit maist vnhappy hym self euir dredand mynd yat ye innocent slauchter malcolme duf quhom afore poisonit suld su tyme licht wes sa ful susp tio yt beleuit quhen ny man r undi fallow thay spake euyll hym geuyn nature ylk creature yt quhen gylty ony hor ibyll cryme impulsion coscience iterpret euery thing yt se su terrour self samyn maner yocht keneth realme gud tranquillite ony inuasion ennymes yit gret trubyll mynd last quhen lyand bed hard ane voce apperit su vision say hym maner keneth beleif yt ye cursit slaucht malcolme duffe hid god thow vnhappy tyrane quhilk desire ye crown he slane ane innocent inuading thy nichtbour treasonabill murdir quhilk thow wald haue punist maist rigour gif bene done ony othir person thy self yairfor thow he incurrit sic hatrent god yt baith thow thy son salbe haistely slane sindry thy noblis ar spirit thy deith traisting quhe thow yi son ar slane reiose ye crown yair pleseir ye king sa affrayit voce yt past ye remanent nicht wt gret noy displeseir morow maid confession gud repentance ane haly byschop namit mou ane confessit ye cryme ye samyn maner done moueane heirad hym penitet suadit penance said yocht offece odius god mercyful finaly king keneth cous l yi haly bega sindry werk piete left nocht vndone ye pertenit ane rist price last wet fordoun quhilk ane town mernis quhare palla ius ye blissit appostyll scottis lyis haldin gret veneratio quhen done pylgrymage come ye castell fethircarn lugit fenella lady yairof yi fenellla ane tender cosingnace malcolme duf afore slane keneth al costantine grine quhilkis sum titil ye crown attour scho extreme hatrent aganis keneth ye slaucht hir son cruth ynt quhilk slane afore iustice woma rageant ire aganis keneth causis aforesaid couth rest bot deuisand alwayis scho miche maist esaly sla kyng becaus scho knew mynd kenneth geuyn magnificent bygyng polesy scho brocht hym ane toure ye said castel quhilk thekit copper win maist subtyll muldry sindry flouris ymagerijs ye werk sa curius yt excedit al ye stuf yairof toure apparalit inwth riche tapestreis gold sylk behynd thaym war crosbowis bendit ganyeis reddy schute middes th hous ane ymage bra maid ye similitude kenneth ane goldin apill hand sic ingyne yt al sone ony man maid hym throw yi apill ye hand ye ymage wrying samyn drew ituppis crosbowis vp ani schot hym yt threw ye apill al sone kenneth brocht toure maner foresaid na thing knawing ye treason deuisit subte woma ye duris beand closit nane hym bot yi lady began eft yt visijt sindry meruellis wtin yi toure inquyre quhat yi ymage apyl sygnifiit yi ymage said scho maid similitude ya ye pepyll may vnderstand quhat reuerence affection bei yairto yi goldin apill sa mony precious stanis ord nit geuyn ye signe lufe yairfore ressau maist hartly ben uolence king threw apyll haue tane ye thrawig thairof drew vp e tituppis ye crosbowis incotinet ane yame schot throw ye body fenella seand ye king slane lokit ye dure ra ye yet quhare scho gat hors fled away ye king serua dis abaid lang cuing quhil last yai brak ye dure fand bullerand blud king kenneth slane yi wise ye xxv yeir h regne fra ye incarnatio im yir pof king constantine ye iiii sindry meruellis sene albion hovv co stantine malcolme cotendit crovvn hovv inglisme danis vvar aggreit malcolme lord cubi hovv constantine keneth recountering othir set battalvvar baith slane ca xi keneth slane yi vncouth wondful slicht costa tine son kyng culyne com ane gret power freindis scone tuke crown yi tyme war sene mony meruellis albion stanis ranit baith france albion ane infinit nowmer fische foud deid ye sandis buchquhane pair corruppit pestilentius odour infeckit ye aire ye gret morta te pepill ye mone sene terribyll bludy ye frute cornis throw insufferabil heitis ye symer failyeit al ti ye realme sone eft followit sic derth ye war ye fische sw ne wt mair habundance yei tha thay war wont ye pepil bene uterly perist ye scottis astonist thir othir vncouth plagis dred gret calamiteis cu yame gif yair lyuis war ye mair haistely amen yocht ye nobil precheour mo ane medane blaane mony othir excellent doctouris exhortit dayly pepill penace yair na pching feir terribil plagis nicht caus yame detest yair cursit lyuis bot ylk day offending god mair offence throw quhilk intollerabil affliction ilk day aboue othir come scotland w sene eft malcolme son keneth price cubir heirand ye costantine maid king aganis lawis laitly maid fader gaderit freindis ane cousall aduise quhat way micht best recouer ye crown su yame thocht best feil ye mindis noblis yai procedit ony forthir aduenture quhe beleuit rast delyuer hym al dageir bring hym self gret trubil heuy damage baith priuat comon weill cousal hym inuaid costatine war maid strag auctorite costantine sindry hym ye tyme quhilkis wald leif hym bot brig hym boud ennymes quhe yai saw tyme malcolme following yi last counsal come wt xm louthiane ye tothir syde kyng costantine gaderit ane army sic pissance yt chasit malcolme cubir th malcolme comin maist schamful fusion war keneth bastard br thir come wt ane gret power striueling stoppit ye army costa tine pa ouir forth th rais gret derth huger baith ye armyis king costantine la k vitallis micht follow fortoun bot constranit wt gret indignation skaill army th ye realme deuidit sindry factionis followit sa yt hand incursionis heirschippis slauchter al ti yairof yt micht haue bene sufficient document al pepil geance sorow fallis ciuyll weris landwart pepyll weris war brocht sic pouerte heirschip th ir la w le finaly trubil rais sa fast n othir infinite slach e extorsionis war done al maner cruelte yt micht deuisit ony esperance bett fortoun quhil ye scottis war sic trubil sact edward kig inglad neir vterly opprest wer danis stranit redeme ye liberte pepil wt infinite money becaus yair tyranny ceissit ye way tuke purpos inuaid yam battal solistit malcolme prince cuber cu wt ne army h support cuing army ye danis war sa astonist yt yai codiscendit haue peace yi maner kig edward sal pay ane pund striueling ye danis ye danis sal stand cotent wt ye ladis conquest afore ye tyme fra inglismen sall inuaid na forthir bot stand gud freind tymes cuing debait yam aganis yair ennymes quhil ye danis inglisme war yi appointmet king costatine traisting find sufficient oportunite bring ye boudis scotlad vnd empire becaus ye price cuber implicat sic weris danis come xxm louthiane quhilk stude ye tyme vnd dominion ye said prince lord cubir keneth ye bastard foresaid quhilk left bruthir ye prince cubir resist ye wer kig costantine come haistely ane army crawmond skarsly war baith ye armyis iunit togidder quhe suddanly rais ane vehement wynd ye eist blew ye sand wt sic preis ye face king costantinis army ye nane yam micht hald vp yair heidis aganis yair ennimes sa army finaly discofist eft maist lametabill murdir maid athir side costatine keneth met togidder singular battall war baith slane kig costatine slane th maner ye iii yeir h regne bur colmekyl fra ye incarnation ane mii yer pof king gryme gret trubyll yat fell betuix hym malcolme prince cumbir cotentioun crovvn hovv thay vvar finaly aggreit ca xii grime nepot king duf heirand vnhappely king costatyne keneth war slane crawmond gaderit ye residew k ng costantinis army come scone quhare crownit tenour ye auld lawis al sone gryme tane ye crown maner intertenit ye freindis costantine maist liberalite pleseir micht quest fauour beneuolence pepyll mony sindry wayis fynaly stabyll ye crown hym mair sicker firmance rewardit sindry freindis malcolme landis rich otheris quhilkis war hym repugnant cofiscat yair guddis halding thaym ennymes comoun weill malcolme prince cumbir richt sorowfull ye gryme tane crown wise callit freindis ane counsal aduise mater dissimilit mynd regardit power gryme yit mony freindis persuadit hym cotempne h ennyme sindry ye noblis assistit opinion yairfore cou salit hym contend aganis gryme erar wisdome pissance geuand h labour gif micht draw noblis fra mynd malcolme thair counsall send secret seruandis ye noblis ye war wt grime prayit yam kepe yair faith promes maid fader keneth assist sa hym gud mater yt lawis laitly maid cocerning ye election price abrogat ambitio ye tyrane grime mittit gif yai abaid opinion gouern ye realm sic felicite yt al occasion debaitis suld mesit yair pleseir mony ye noblis yi message left king gryme solistit thair freindis ye effect othe tuk thir seruandis malcolme send yame bound tratour gryme quho put prison malcolme mouit wt yir iniuris come wt ane army agan grime yit becaus aduertist ye grime cumad aganis wt mair nowmer pepil tha comadit vnd pane deith yt na comon ressau wtin h army quhil yai war first brocht psence yi wes done wisdom malcolme yt army suld duertist ye huge ordinace aganis ame nochyeles fame rumat quhilkis incressis ay mair mair fre ue passage maid ye thing maist h army quhilk desirit maist hid forthir schawin ye sic reason army gif yeid forthwart suld fecht na le aganis yame ye war army tha aganis ennymes yi rumo rais marchadis quhilk mair knawlege chaging yair gudis tha ony craft cheualry yir marchand becaus gret nowmer yam yi army nakit armour wappinnis desirit licence pa malcolme becaus thair desire denyit yai fillit al ye army ful mur yng dolour yir wordis dredo marchadis al ye capitanis quhilkis war malcolmis army war affrayit yan malcolme sead capitanis astonist thocht ffitabil ieopard yame vnd sic dredour chace battal yairfore cou sal familiar eschew ye psent dageir sufferit ye marchad pa hame abaid ye watt forth wt certane houshald gent lme stop ennymes cu ouir ye watt quhil sic infinite trubyl scotland fothad bischop yairof ane man prouin virtew clemence sead ye pepil infestit th ciuil wer grime malcolme drawand ye b dy ye realm sindry opinionis went ane cupany platis solempne cession vnd yair habit kig grime quhom ressauit reuerence inquirit quhat eradis mouit hym cu sic gise quho answerit cuin seruand crist ye geuar lord peace make intercession ye tyl haue miseration piete ye gret trubil fallin yi realm sen god he maid ye prince thairof sa mony syndry motiuis debait sproutis yt sal fail bot gif yow uide mair haistely remeid haue ane miserabil rewine ye ciuil weris ar sa frequent yi realm yt yai haue broch samyn sic calamite yt nocht haboudis bot co tinewal reif slauchter baith noblis comonis apperadly ye weir dis war determit bring yi realm nocht allanerly mischeuous sonis limaris ar vnpunist bot autorist yair iniquite nane may remane awin hous bot day slane herijt gudis insicht vnderstad surely sa lag yir odi tentionis regnis betuix malcolme na iustice polecy sal appeir yi realm na traquillite sal follow na end salbe put sic mischeuis quhill thow finaly agreit wt malcolme yit wyl yow
