plesad stand counsal dout bring al materis gud fine yir reasonis nobil prince haue miseration ye gret trubil falling yi pepil quhilkis ar brokin wt mair calamite tha micht mou maist cruel tyranis pietuous teris gif na afflictio yi realm pepil may moue yt reuth yit haue copassion yi self quhilk may haue na sicker quhe yi pepyl ar perist king gryme mouit yir word asuerit yt wald condiscend haue peace sa war degrading honour kig ye auld lawis vsit sa mony hudreth yeris yi realme thair fore wald seuer ye croun bot fecht ye samyn aganis malcolme al ye war opinion ye end life nochyeles gif malcolme wald skaile army stand co tent wt ye ladis cubir wt purpos inuaid hym wt na lager battal wald heir peace othir wayis suld seueir battal aganis hym quhil ye richt war decernit ye swerd fothadus prait ye king ceis ane litil fra al malice quhil sene ye mynd malcolme micht happin yt micht brig al materis gud purpos gif ony yame sicht comon weill eft yi fothad went malcolme striueling quhare lag orison lametit ye gret trubil falling ye pepil sedition yir ii price quhe schawin quhat mi rabil end micht follow yairapo brocht malcolme sic point yt cotent pa cubir sa ye king gryme wald skaile army king grime refusit yi appointment traisting seueir ye empire quhilk socht afore wt sa huge da geir incotinent skailit folkis come forfar aduise freindis quhat done yi mater ye mene tyme fothad ye bischop maid cocord betuix yame yi maner king grime sal reiose ye crown life eft deith ye crown remane wt malcolme ye nerest blude petually ony pley yt foud efter repugnant ye pointis yi peace salbe haldin ennyme ye comon weil attour al ye ladis liand betuix louthiane northubirlad betuix clid westmureland sal cu psently vnd ye dominion malcolme sall stand gud freind king grime al materis gif abaid yi appointmet ony thing piudice yairof sall baith tyne ye ladis geuyn hym yi appointment ye crown fra posterite quhe yir ii prince war sworne straytest forme ye mycht deuisit obserue al pointis yi cotract yai scalit yair cupanyis set yair myndis repare ye trubyll falling pepyll yair deuision followit gud peace mony yeris efter hovv gret novvmer danis vvar slane slicht inglisme ye orison maid king gryme ye noblis hovv vvas slane malcolme prince cumbir ca xiii quhill sic thing war scotlad eldred maid king ingland deceis brothir sanct edward yi eldred sufferit gret oppressionis danis quhilk yair weris intendit sit yair wiffis childre freindis realm finaly yai wrocht sic heirschippis cruelteis al ti quhare yai come yt nothir peace yit yair faith afore trackit virtew sacrament micht caus yame leif peace yus apperit na thing mair sicker tha plane euersion ye realm ingland kig eldred ceis yi cruelte set ane cou sal noblis ye quhilk deuisit secretly sla al ye danis ye war ingland ane day yi subtell slicht cumin finaly hand war ye danis war aduertist yairof eschewit murdir deuisit aganis yame nochyeles mony yame wer slane ye samyn way ye residew danis quhilk war eschapit fra murdir mouit ye slauchter yair freindis garnist al strenthis castellis quhare yai ony bound wtin ingland send sueno king denmark support reuenge ye treason done thaym gyle inglismen quhil sic thingis war done ingland king grime affluece rich lang peace degenerat fra liberalite chais lyfe maist corruppit auaricius lyuing quhe slane sindry noblis scotland oftimes occur co ques yair ladis gudis opprest ye pepil ylk day mair tyrany ye pepil knawing na mortal iuge aboue hym punis cruelte eft lang regrait insufferabil iniuris sustenit yame fel kneis makand inuocatio god ye punisar syn haue piete yair affliction change ye realme su bett gouernance ye noblis hauand gret indignation lyk wise ye trubil fallyng baith yam yair comonis send ane certane g ntyl ambassatouris kig gryme suading hym yair name deuoid hym vnhappy mischeuous limmaris quho ouir gret cofidence apperit ye damage comon weill ane ambassatouris quho ye charge geuyn said yi maner w quhilkis ar ane part thy noblis ouir trew yi crown ar cumyn suad ye gif may ye weil thy self yi realme vnknawin ye richt nobil prince quhat infinite calamite trubil he bene done yir sindry yer thy leg insaciabyl auarice yir vnhappy mischeuous li mari thy seruadis ye schame displeseir heirof may weill excusit bot redoudis ay thy maist dishonor sleuth heirfore sen yi pleseir distribute al officis auctoriteis wtin ye realm yow respod ye crimis iniqui eis done thy secuadis aganis thy leg bditt ye swerd geuin enriche magnify theuis tratouris yit inuaid trew innocent pepill bot punis gilty mischeuous li mar war bett yi pepil deid ye comon voce tha leif sic dayly trubyll yai leif iniure yame yt suld yair defendour heirfore exhort yt remoue al yir vnhappy tyranys thy cousalouris gouern ye realm comon weill wt sic felicite thy eldar he done afore think vnganand sa lang ar lyue gif yow wyl rewlit w yt thy subdittis suld opprest othir tyme weir peace sen haue bene euir reddy defend yt wt bodyis gudis bot ony regard lyuis yairfor schaw thy self ane iust prince cast yt luffit wt yame quho yow desiris yi freindis vnderstand ane iust kig makis cietezanis obeisant ony rebellion debait quhe king gryme answerit wt dissimi fenyeit wordis yir ambassatouris callit yam ane baket purpos haue put yame prison nochtheles yai war aduertist yairof fled wt swift hors bertha quhare ye remanent noblis war asseblit ye tyme king gryme mouit thir wordis bot traisting ilk thing succeid sic felicite afore gaif hym lust insolence ceissyng fra frequent exactionis scurge legis quhil last aduertist yt noblis war rebellit agan incotinent rasit baner come gret nowmer pepil inuaid yame war repugnant yan followit mair trubyll euir sene albion ye castell war cassin doun ye townis brint ye cornis distroyit ye pepyl slane kirkis yair deuotio sic cruelteis trubil causit malcolme prince cubir cu inglad fra ye wer danis scotland cumyng al pepyll specially ye hatit grime come hym releiffit ye cruel tyranijs done thaym said borne weil hym self bot sum part weil freindes cuntre discendit nobyl blude hauand rich manheid support cuntre quhen tyme occurrit delyuer thaym ye odius tyrant gryme quhilk eand done thyng mycht succede hym plesit malcolme mouit thir suasionis come gret nowmer pepyll aganis king gryme al sone gryme aduertist thairof gaderit folkis mycht get tyme fynaly baith armyis set thair tentis fornens othir town auchnabart ye ascension day king grime traislig malcolme mycht esaly vincust yat geuin mair deuotion tha ony cheualry solepnite ye day come forthwart al power brek ye day nochtheles malcolme weil informit purpos efter requestit hym howbeit vane desist fra battall reuerence ye blissi day baith armyis ruschi togidder ye first meting gret slaucht bot last kig grimis army vincust put flycht said yt king grime tane fechtad gret ferocite manheid efter strikin mony bludy woudis heid baith eyen war put quhen leiffit certane dayis wyse mesirie dolour deceissit ye ix yeir regne buryit colmekyl fra ye incarnation imx yeris pof king malcolme ye secoud hovv sueno king norrovvay vvith doubil victory chasit kyng eldred ingland normady opprest inglismen vvith gret cruelteis ca xiiii malcolme efter yi victory callit sindry noblis quhilkis war takin prisoneris yi time psece eft yt tretit yam wt gret humanite schew yame yat iust heretour ye croun scotland faucht aganis weil yairof bot allanerly releif ye pepil ye tyrany gryme ye xv day efter ane uention maid scone quhare al ye nobilite scotlad beand psent malcolme declarit yt wald ressaue ye croun scotland quhil ye lawis maid afore h fad keneth war approbat ye noblis sworn neuir cu ye trar yairof sic thingis beand gratir malcolme crownit ye fatal chiar marbil maid sic cord noblis yt al occasion hatret seditio set aside eft coronatio delt h office cerning ciuil actiois yan ye war maist resoluit ye lawis othir office tening cheualry war geuin maist vailyeat capitan throw quhilk followit bett iustice tha sene mony yer afor quhil ye empire scottis gouernit yi maner sueno kig danis ariuit britane gret nauy reuege ye iniu done afore inglisme yi sueno efter coronation writtin ye history danis wrocht sic punitio cruelte cristin pepyll yt subditt war costranit renuce ye cristin faith returnit yair auld sustit oni nochtheles cruelte lang vnpunist eft iust punition god thris tane prison ennymes thris ransonit infinite money finaly brokin sa frequent incursionis doung realme alanus king norroway al sone sueno banist wyse come scottis desyring support recouer realme scottis hauand compassion calamite brocht hym first sacrament baptisme finaly supportit hym sic maner r storit kyngdome sueno sone efter yt restorit realme come ane army danis norowanis suessis gothis uandalis frisonis ingland chasit kyng eldrede northumbirland eldrede band confid ratioun drew scottis support tuk purpos new curage assailye chance fortoun aganis danis proceding heirfore straucht aganis ennymes set ten far fra york apon ryuer owse ye mene tyme sueno hauand na memory gret humaniteis done hym scottis chargit yame returne hame leif ye opinion inglisme uth rwayis wald inuade yame battal kig eldrede tuk herald quhilk come effect kest hym etteris kyng sueno went haistely forthwart weil arrayit battall incontinent baith armyis iunit sa haistely yt nane yame power schote thair dartis ye battal lag fochtin vncertane victory quhil last inglismen war put flycht king eldrede efter discomfitour fled ouir ye riuer owse ane bait resydew army war othir tane slane eldrede seyng ylk day mair trubyll r syng realme disparit releif fled normandy quhare sa tenderly ressauit r chard k yairof yt marijt douchter emma ga hir two sonnis alarud edward al ane othir sonne namit edmod ane hie curage strenth body yi edmond gottin eldrede first wyfe afore danis inuadit realme callit irneside becaus exercit cheualry rang xvi yeris aboue inglismen sal efter schaw sueno proude thir feliciteis tuk auisement remanent danis ye inglismen mycht maist esaly distroyit micht stabyll realme hym posterite ony impediment inglismen tymes cumy g nobillis ingland aduertist yi extreme hatrent danys aganis yame fell kneis afore sueno exhortig hym haue mercy yame sen thay war ane anciant pepyl sum tyme maist pissant baith see land prayit hym suffir yame remane lyue vnder quhat seruitude pleasit thay desirit na castellis townis rich bot leif thair wiffis chyldren vnder seruitude howbeit sueno nature maist cruel yit vsit victory le indignation inglismen purposit co mandit yame mony yeris eft beir na wappinnis bot vse husbandry othir labouris vnder seruitude danis honoryng hym thair iust prince mene tyme commandit yame bring al thair gold siluer iowellis wappinnis armour agan ane prefixit day rander thair townis castellis munitionis hym yat thay mycht keipit tymes cumyng danis gif ony danis war repugnant yir materis punist deith inglismen war finaly sa brokin ylk trubil ising aboue othir thay fulfyllit thir chargis pointis thus ye croun ingland coquest danis eftir ye first conques maid saxonis fra tyme uortigern vcxxix yeris sueno rang eft gret tiranny aboue inglisme reft fra thaym yair liberte sic maner wald suffer nane yair blude beir auctorite honouris within ingland preistis prelatis nocht onlie wer degradit yair benefice bot cassin presoun danis put yair roumes inglismen opprest sic miserabil calamiteis began lament yair vnhappy chance wareand yame self thay chesit erar haue deit quhen thay mycht leif sic daylie oppressioun tyranny vnmercyfull ennymes yit sueno wes na thig mouit yair lamentable regrait bot thirllit thaym thay lamentit new importable seruitude ingyne tyranni ay sic condition ye thay se thair subdittis liegis deieckit supreme miserie truble ye thair vnmercyfull tyranny ragi thaym new iniure finalie ye inglisme wer brocht gret calamite miserie danis yat ilk hous ingland wes constranit sustene ane dane yt ye samyn mycht ane spy ye kyng aduertis hym quhat wes done said hous quhilk way ye king mycht knaw sone quhare ony rebellio wes aganis hym yi spy wes callit lord dane quhilk tane ane ydyll lymmer seikis leuyng othir mennis laubouris hovv olauus onetus come scotland vvith gret army danis hov kyng malcolme vvas dyscomfist ca xv inglismen opprest maner spulyeit thair croun rich sueno stable h realm thocht expediet tak peace nychtbouris normannis britonis scottis vnder yir conditionis nane tham support inglismen aganis danis aboue yir coditionis send herald ye norma ni chargeand thaym send kyng eldred two sonnis hym ingland ell distroy yame yt na successio yam sal remane life impedimet ayris tymes cuing becaus nane thir coditionis wer obseruit garnist al ye strenthis realme fo nens normandy strang munition vittallis maid prouision inuaid ye scottis ye fyne mycht bryng purpos esaly effect comandit olauus onetus lieutenantis cu haistely scotland ye pepil yt thay mycht get inuaid ye scottis sone eftir yir forsaid capitanis arriuit wt ane gret army ye mouth spayand iadit sic awfull ordinance ye inhabitantis fled thair bestiall wiffis child yair best refuge danis eft yair cumyng brint ye kirkis templis townis murray slew al sonis quhom thay micht apprehend tuk al ye strenthis murray except thre castellis allanerlie yat say elgen fore narne last ye danis laid ane sege castell narne traistit quhen wes tane perforce tothir two castellis randrit ony straik ye mene tyme thir danis wer aduertist yat kyng malcolme wes cumand forthwart al ye army scotland gif yame battall incontinent yai left sege ye castell went na le curage aganis ye scottis victory bene present thair handis sone eftir come ambassatouris malcolme thir danis inquiryng quhy yai inuadit landis ony occasioun skarslie yir ambassatouris done yair message quhen yai wer slane e cruelte danis kyng malcolme mouit cruelte coplenyng ye law pepill br kin slaucht ambassatouris corne nycht gret malacolie ane medow besyde killos gret yi clamour wes ye nycht amang army desyring battal reuenge cruelteis done danis nochtheles fra yai saw ye danis morow noumer pepill better ordour yan yai sene afore thay began decay yair curage tuk solicitude saif thair liuis yan inuaid yair ennymes malcolme seing yame astonist red gif desyrit thaym fecht yt thay suld othir fle elli repugnant charg yairfore yeid ane mote quhare callit nobillis ane cousall detesti yair cowartdris thay beand sa vailyeand hame quhen na danger occurrit ye first sycht yair ennymes astonist quha thig said he mouit yow gude freindis pa sa suddanlie fra office vailyeant campionis deuoidyng anciant fortitude ony experience battal gif ye dreid yir bludy furi pepil ar disparit haue victorie manheid curage yan ar ye nocht worthy sonis tha vailyeant campionis ye vincust yir danis loncarte cheualry kenneth fader fynd gret multitude danis vincust albion ye interminable glore eldar quhat schame displeseir he succedit ni thair weris mouit aganis w sa infinite noumer thaym ar buryit albion may callit iustlie sepulture danis su yame ar slane day othir eldaris bot yir danis yat ar fecht aganis yow ar nocht sic manheid strenth yai yt wer vincust afore loncarte heirfore curage suld nocht decay bot incres ye ye ye ar fecht nocht onlie aganis residew vincust danis bot aganis ye brekaris ye law god man virtew seuerant constance sall schaw sone gif ye fecht eldar afore quhat folie wes danis inuaid w ony occasion iniuris quhy sonye ye maist vailyeat capionis quhy pa ye nocht forthwart gret spreit na place nowe tary auise bot gif ye haue sycht fragill bodyis quhilk sal sone peri wt schame yan singulare comon l noblis mouit thir wourdis yt yai suld nocht appeir cowartis began exhort thair folkis battall incotinent rais sic noys rageand fury yair army yt thay ony sycht pissance thaym self thair ennymes ruschit ordour ye danis olauus onetus seing thaym cum sa furiouslie met yame arrayit battall followit sone ane trible battall fochtin incredibyl manheid gret murdir baith sidis na thing pretermittir micht pertene athir side forcy campionis ye scottis co tending defend thair landis liberteis ye danis saif yair liuis bot last ye scott war put flycht king malcolme euyl woudit h hewmond doug sa fast h heid yt micht na way yairfra hyeles bro ye feild deid hid ane wod quhil su part ualescit sone eft retnit hame phovv castell name vvas tane soudiouris thairof treasonably slane danis hovv ye danis vvar discomfist murthlak ca xvi danis efter victory think ad proffytabyll leif murray quhyll war pecifijt yair dominion gaderit spulyeis feild returnit sege castell narne mair pissance tha afore yi castel stude ye tyme al within see beildit strang touris wallis na le crafty tha curius lauboure ane strait passage maid ingyne man maner ane brig throw quhilk men micht pa ye samyn land ye soudiouris quhilk war left ye said castel heirand kig malcolm wes discofist randerit ye castel ye handis danis vnder condition yai sal leif thair armour wappinnis behind yame depart yair life remanent gudis laif notwithstanding ye danis cotrar yair faith mi hangit treasonably al personis quho yai within ye said castel thus narne ye strangest castel murray tane ye danis sa garnist yair industry yt semit vnwi nabyl ye soudiouris elgyn fore heirand yi treason done danis left castellis desert fled king malcolme ye danis reiosyng thir feliciteis traisting haue sicker dwelling murray send yair wiffis child norroway denmark cum haistely scotland mene tyme yai scurgit sindry ye scott sic war waik fehyl bodyis constranit yame scheir thair corn king malcolme dredand danis new cumyng pepyll mair pissant come begynnyng nixt symer gret multitud pepil mur hlak ane towne mar quhare first foundament kirk abirden nocht far yat tyme fra ye sicht danis quhe suddaly baith ye armyis war astonist sicht othir ye scottis hauand experience ye cruelte done afore danis war affrayit ye danis ye maner yai war seuerit fra yair schipp becaus yai knew ye ground thay dred mair yt hid waching tha ye opin violece yair enymes last baith ye armyis hortatio yair capitanis iunit wt birnad hatrent al sydis first bront thre vailyeant campionis kenneth ilis gryme strathern patrik dubar yat ylk ruschand ou feirsly yair ennymes war slane gaif occasion sindry scottis fle yit ye place quhare yai fled sa strait yat na pepyl mycht fle esaly throw ye samyn yocht malcolme withstud ennymes seuerant maheid yit dreuyn abak bene fleand ye place quhare faucht semit ay mait strait difficil throw syndry fowleis watter fail quhilk maid afore nichtbore weir attoure mony treis war hewin liand thortwart ye land stoppi baith entres passage gait myddis quhilk ane chapel dedicat ye honour sact molok malcolme dreuin maner abak rasit ha dis heuyn said gret god virtew rewardar piete punisar synne thy crist n pepyl defendour natiue rowmes gra tit thy beniuol nce quhilkis ar na mortal help inuadit treasobil iniure danis recurris extreme necessyte praying haue compassion miserable chance remoue mercyful lord yi schameful te rour fra pepil thow modir god ye sicker refuge mortall pepil yair distres thow sanct molok quhom yi chapell dedicat help sall big ane cathedral kirk honour ane memorial yat realme wes saiffit support skarslie wes orison endit malcolme quhen ane part ye noblis said copanyeonis god wil yt return renew battall ennymes ry noyis ye army yir wourdis rais curage ay incressing sayand schaw pertlie visage debait youre land liuis quhilkis ar maist deir euery creature erd incontinent al ye scottis return bene miracle maid incredible slaucht yair ennymes sycht yair liuis bleidad ye mene tyme kig malcolm come wt ane buschement apon one quhilkis wes yan prasand throw ye feild bene sicker victo heid nakit heumond finalie straik onetus fra hors amang futmen quhare wes slane ye residew danis seand yair capitane slane ceissit fra ony thir persecutioun ye scottis yus succedit gret blithnes scottis e treme desolatioun danis yit battall continewit lang hir side quhil last ye danis wer put flycht mony yame slane tane olauus heirand colle g slane fled ane cumpany danis murray kyng malcolme knawing ye maist vailyeant campionis army slane ceissit fra ony forthir persute danis deu dit spulyeis feild amang men syne went angus quhare remanit residew yeir takand cosultation sic materis pertenit comon weil recoueryng murray fra danys phovv camus prince norrovvay cumand vvith ane store dani angus vvas slane army discomfist king malcolme barre hovv surname keithis tuke thair begynnyng ca xvii sueno kyng danis inglismen heirand vnhappely ye danys faucht murthlak yat yi present aduersite suld nocht deiect ye glore danys mak ye name scottis ouir glorius deuisit two nauyis gret noumer danis cum scotland pthe first wes deuisit cum furth thamys ingland othir cum denmark ane vailyeant knycht namit camus admiral baith flotis nixt yeir camus come yi nauy ye mouth forth beside sanct eb quhare wes stoppit mony dayis land last prosper wyndis pullit vp salis arriuit reid bra angus landit men cutre mycht gaderit resist hym camus eftir yat wes ladit yi maner went ye nixt mote reiosit wes landit place quhare danis wrocht afore sindry iniuris cassyn doun ye town montros tra stit thairfore felicite succeid remanent viage sone eftir rasi campe went throw angus ceissing fra na maner cruelte ye micht deuisit kest doun kirkis templis cieteis townis ony miseratioun quhare come sic thingis done went brechin quhare sum tyme wes ane strang castell ane kirk dedicat honour trinite becaus castell micht haistely tane yai enterit baith ye town kirk sic cruelte yt thay left ane stane thairof vncassin downe camus rageand wt yir siclik cruelteis baith aganis god finaly aduertist yt malcolme cu dunde ye power scotland incontinent fled ye see far fra balbrid quhare vsit na le cruelte afore ye pepyll king malcolme desyring delyuer realm fra tyranny danis come wt arrayit oist ye town barre two mylis fra balbrid tuk lytyll rest ye nicht army fecht ye morow defence thair realm liberte morow callit h noblis standert prayit yam consider thay war fecht aganis ane pepyll blyndit auarice seikand thair leuing iust battal bot reif pykery onely ennymes cristin faith bot inuading inocent pepyl ony occasion battall set distroy ye trew faith albion al remembir thay war defendouris thair awne realme ordanit god punis ye cruelte danis yairfore prayit thaym pa forthwart sic manheid curage yat yai may othir de honorably elli haue victory maist vailyeantly ye tothir syde camus exhortit ye danis battal sicker hope victory remembir yai behuiffit outhir de miserably ane vncouth realme elli haue victory immortall honour sone eft malcolme come arrayit battal aganis ye danis ye mair audacite curage yt afore experience yair cruelte ye ingyne nobyll men ar sic faculte mair yai haue experience honest mater mair risis thair curage su notabyll vassalage ye two armyis birnad athir hatrent ruschit finaly togidd wt maist cruelte throw quhilk followit sic slauchter yt ye burn lochte ran bludy stremis ye almane seys yit nane yame semit geif place othir sindry war sene yat day strikin throw ye body fehtand sic cruelte yt yai fell erd sic grip yair ennymes yt yai seuerit quhil yai deceissit baith togidder throw quhilk apperit yai faucht na le ire gud wyll quhil last ye danis war vincust camus chasit ye montanis scottis followit hym wt sic fury yt finaly slane signe heirof ye place quhare slane callit yit camustane principal slaar th camus ane young man namit keith quhilk singulare vassalage prouyn yi feild gat certane landis louthiane callit keith quhais hous decorit gret honoure callit marschell scotland quhom ar discendit mony nobyl vailyeant men ay defendour yi realm sen thair first beginning ane othir cupany danis fleand ye samyn maner war slane abirl non iiii mylis fra brechin quhare ane gret slane ingrauyn wt crafty letteris aduert ye passinger ye anciant illuster dedis done eldaris aganis ye danis ye residew danis quhilk eschapit feild fled yair schippis schew ye gret infelicite harmes al circustance afore rehersit thair companyeonis hovv vc danis vva slane ye thane buchquhane hovv canu e come vvith nevv army danis scotland vvas discofist hovv scottis danis vvar finaly agreit al debaitis ca xviii page missing afald comoun weill ge extreme besynes dayis ye kyng suld regne aboue liegis mair beniuolence fauour tha ony extremite rigour yat baronis mycht luf dreid hym ay rising vnder hym amyte concord kirkmen micht leif vnder thair institution fynely yat euery thing suld done na le ye pleseir god ye comon weil efter hym succedit ane nobill man gawyne dounbar ane gud prelatis euir realm biggit ane brig ouir dee wt gret magnificece quhare neuir brig violence watter mycht stand afore foundit ane yeirly leuing sustene ye wt mony othir notabil dedis quhilk war ouir prolixit schaw th tyme bot wyl return history kyng malcolme efter sa mony cruel battallis led aganis danis gouernit realme mony yeris gud iustice maid ane buke callit regiam maiestatem contenand lawis realm uld gouernit quhat comoditeis al e geuyn feis chancellar secretar constabyll marschell chalmerlane iustice thesaurer register comptrolla othir officis hous malcolme bene fame l uyng nocht behynd ony othir prince euir realme gif sic vir ew bene lat er age first youth manis age nochtheles excellent glore ful eit immoderate auarice oftymes occurris come baith ani eild auarice penitent landis geuyn liberalite nobillis recouer said landis slew banist mony lordis van fenyeit c usis noblis mouit thir iniuris hauand gre indignation king nocht put handis thair bl ot set conques yair landis rowmes fenyeit causis conspirit aganis hym frequent conuentionis effect kyng malcolme heirad thair cospiration saif lyfe fled certane familiaris gla mi quhare slane freind nobillis quhilkis war slane afore hym thir cursit lymmaris efter slauchter fled thair co plices swift hors howbeit thay war vncertane quhare fle ye groud sa ouircouerit wt snaw thay mycht knaw gait fynaly thay come ye loch forfare quhilk sum part frosin ye tyme al sone thay war cumyn myddis thairof thay fel throw ise perist miserably yat maner nocht lang efter thay war drawin loch creparis yair quarteris houng vp sindry townis scotland punition thair cruelte yi end maid kyng malcolme xxxi yeir regne fra incarnation ane mxl yeris buryit colmekyll tyme mony meruellis sene albion yule day erd trimblit ane gret rift maid samyn myddis striueling quhilk sprang sa huge multitude watter bure away nixt wod watter forth see sy r rais forther land euir sene afore ony tyme mydsymer day callit natiuite sanct iohne boptist sa schill frost ye cornis war slane maid gret derth cuntre sa endis ye leuynt buke yir cro iklis heir begynnis twelf buke croniklis scotland kyng duncane hovv surname stevvartis tuk yair first begynnyng hovv makbeth punist sindry enormyteis done king duncani tyme ca primo malcolme slane haue schawin succedit nepot duncane gottyn douchter malcolm two douchteris quhilkis eldest namyt beatrice wes geuyn mariage abbanath crynin quhilk wes thane ilis west partis scotland hir wes gottin duncane quhilk succedit immediatlie eft ye croun ye secound douchter namit doada wes geuin mariage synel thane glamis quhome wes gottin ane feirs vailyeant man namyt makbeth rycht ganand haue gouernit ony realme wer nocht strenth wes geuin oui mekil cruelte yocht ducane makbeth wer sister sonnis yai wer differet fra othir maneris duncane wes sa mercyfull yat apperit nocht abill punys vice pepill contrar makbeth wes geuin al mekill cruelte ducane wes geuin piete yairfore ye peple desyrit yair maner haue bene tempora otheris duncane begynnyng empire gouern realme gud peace iustice wes gouernit counsalouris yat gouernit duryng faderis tyme thus leuit comonis mony yeris ony iniure oppression gret men yit feble mynd ducane quhen wes patent ye pepil wes cause gret seditionis amag noblis bot occasion danis attempt new weris aganis ye scottis cause thir seditionis rais ye thane lochquhabir namit banquho quhilk wes ye beginnar ye noble surname stewartis realme quhome oure kyng psent lang progression discendit quhen banquho gaderit kingis rentis punist sindry lymmaris ye cuntre sic extreme rigour iustice yt pepil rais aganis hym gret power spulyeit hym ye money quhilk gaderit afore ye kyngis vse youcht eschapit lyfe yit wes euil woudit last quhen wes curit woundis come kyng desyring iniuris contemptioun done hym punist kyng du cane dant thir attemptatis send ane officer armes sumond personis wer suspect mater vnderly ye law agane ane certane day thir lymmaris yat cruelte heirand thaym sumond contemption slew ye officer becaus ye kingis power wes cu yame punis yair offence yai maid makdowald yair capitane glaidlie tuk charge battall knawing king soft alliegit abill gouerne ane abbay monkis gyde ony band weirmen yi makdowald gaderit ane cupany mischeuous lymmaris ireland ilis othir regionis yair slew malcolme lieutenand duncane lochquhabir put men flycht kyng duncane astonist slaucht men wes nocht exercit weris yit knew sic thingis mycht dressit couenit noblis ane cousal tak punition thir attemptatis eftir sindry opinionis makbeth repreuit kyng du cane soft gouernance hauand na ingyne punis iniuris one pepill schew gif ye landis lochquhabir wer geuin banquho yai suld leif nane makdowaldis blude lyue promittit sa followit sone eftir cuing lochquhabir pepil heirand ye fame h vassalage durst nocht attempt sic thingis yai afore mony yame lef makedowald come makbeth wayis makdowald wes sa inuadit wes necessar gif battal makbeth nochtheles wes discomfist chasie ane castell lochquhabir makbeth followit hym ye said castel lang sege brocht hym sic miserie yat wes costranit ask grace self wyfe barnis becaus gat nocht bot repuls yairof slew first wyfe barnys yt yai suld remane decisioun ennymes syne slew hym self ye maner makbeth enterit ye castell youcht fand makdowald slane yit schure heid send castel bertha quhair ye king wes gart hyng body ane hi tre ilis men maid yair compositionis gret soumes money otheris thaym wer punist deith ye remanent pepill ye ilis mouit slaucht yair gaif displesad wourdis makbeth callad hym ane bludy monstour ony mercy makbeth incotin maid ordinance pa ilis punis thaym yair vnbridlit language nochtheles solistation thair freindis ceissit tuke recompensatioun thair guddis phovv edmond irnesyde canute deuidit betuix yame realme ingland hovv sueno king norrovvay come scotland vvith ane army vincust king duncane hovv foresaid sueno vvas efter vincust ane vncouth slicht ca ii skarslie wes ye realme scottis deliuerit makbeth al tyranni quhe sueno kyng danis wes arriuit scotland ane army schaw quhat lynnage sueno wes descendit repeit sum part original sueno first king danis yt rang aboue inglismen thre sonnis herald sueno canute first wes maid king ingland secund kyng norway ye thrid king denmark first wes slane eldred efter yt exilit sueno normandy ye thrid yeir eft faderis deith yit eldrede reiosit nocht lang ye croun ingland canute kig danis come ane army inglad reuenge ye slauchter eldest bruther herald slew said eldrede eftir quhais deith sonne edmound irneside come ane army aganis canu purpos baith reuenge ye slauchter fader recouer croun last quhen ye battallis wer arrayit otheris sicht reddy fecht edmond afore army desiring fecht canute singulare battall sayng wes mair honour decern ye rycht betuix yam two yan ony murdir pepil yat wer victori yame two sall succeid ye crou ony debait canute wes giaid condition hauand na le confidence manheid yan othir edmond incotinent yai come fra yair armyis yair bardit coursouris ran scharp groundin speristik ane aganis othir deith last quhen thay fouchtin lang vncertane victory thair steidis ouirset wery canute said edmond quhilk he sickir experience feirs awful dynt se yow may nocht vincust apperis piciant fauour goddis thay yt thow haue ane part kingdome regne region refrene thy swerd cotent yt croun ingland deuidit sa betuix w yow reiose half thairof hauand equale impire life edmod glaid yi codition peace thecht bett succeid half inglad ony mair dangeir od hym self vncertane chance battall traisting sum tyme fy occasioun recouer ye hail empire ingland litill laubour incontinent thay demontit thair oursouris embrasit othir aist tendernes yus wes ye realme ingland deuidit betuix yame yi maner part ingland fornence france wes assignit canute tothir part edmond mene time enna quene ingland dredand concord na thyng profitable hi fled normady hir two sonnis alarude edward quhilk scho bure ye said eldrede bot returne historie quhen sueno kyng norroway saw brothir eik empire denmark half ingland tuke desyre equale brothir al weil rentis marcial glore bring purpos effect come ane army fisse motiue cumyng wes reuenge slauchter eme camus othir danis slane barre crowdane gemere youcht sueno wes cumyn said conques fame honour yit wes na thing coparit brothir canut slew innocent barnis wemen agit personis ony difference thair estait kyng duncan heirand yir importable schameful cruelteis done pepil began ane prudet capitane oftymes dull sleuthfull pepil ar constranyt necessite becum prudent virtuous kyng ducane heirand sueno wes cumyng maner forsaid inuaid realme assemblit ane army pepill vnder empire deuidit thaym thre battallis first battal wes geuin makbeth ye secound banquho abaid hym self ye myddilward remanent nobillis scotland syne met ennymes culros quhare baith ye armyis faucht gret cruelte bot scottis war finaly discomfist yit danis war sa brokin battall yt thay maid lang chace bot stude al nicht arrayit battal morow quhen thay saw ye feild discomfist na ennymes appere thay tit ye ulyeis rite armes inhibit sl nakit men traisting conques ye realm wt fauour beniuolence ye pepyl sic thingis done sueno rasit tent follow ye remanet scott becaus aduertist yt king ducane fled ye castel bertha makbeth gaderyng ane new army resist h incursionis laid ane strait sege ye said castel al sone king duncane saw hym self beltit ylk syde ennymes send ane officer counsal banquho makbeth comanding hym abide inchecuthill quhill send hym othir word mene tyme send ane herald sueno desiring licence hym self noblis yt within ye castel depart yair lyfe guddis saif yi desirit duncane howbeit knew na thing better tha repuls yairof h ennymes micht haue na othir suspition bot ye castel randerit ony mair delay last quhe sueno desirit ye castel ra decit king ducane intertene quhil materis war brocht gud purpos promittit send large prouision vittallis ye castell refresche army yir offer war plesand sueno bot al army thay bene mony day afore ony fresche vittallis gret penurite incontinet scott tuk ye ius mekilwort herijs mengit yair wyne aill breid send ye samyn gret quantite yair ennymes sueno army reio ing yi fouth vi tallis bega waucht yair maner haue experience quha micht ingorge yair wambe maist voracite quhil last ye venoun yir beryis skalit throw partis thair bo yi throw quhilk thay war resoluit ane deidly sleip yan duncane send makbeth comanding hym inuaid ennymes al diligence thay war ane esy point v cust makbeth mair tary com folkis tentis ennymes first slew thair wache ye remanent yame sowpit wt sleip war al murdrest yair beddis sueno brocht nowmer folkis schippis qu pullit vp sal returnit norroway army eschapit nane bot sueno x personis ye marineris mony yer eft na knicht war maid norroway quhill thay war sworne reuenge ye slaucht yair freindis scotland ye remanet schippis quhilkis war left behind ye danis ye scottis firth within thre dayis eft thair departing raschit ilk ane othir violence ane eist wind sank ye firth quhare thay ly yit ye gret dangeir othir schippis yt cumis ye samyn quhen ye see flowis thay ar couerit watter quhen ebbis yai appeir su part aboue ye samyn callit yit ye pepil drulaw sandis ye scott efter yi victory gat ye spulyeis ye feild maid general cessios throw al ti yair realm geuand thakis god ye felicite falling yame quhil ye scottis war yair cessionis yi wise tithingis come ane new flote danis war artiuit king orne ye weirmen cumyng land inuading ye cuntre maist cruelteis dant yir attepta wer send ye kingis auctoryte makbeth banquho quhilkis slew ane gre part yir danis remanet chasit thair schippis thir danis fled thair schippis gaif gret e gold makbeth suffer thair freindis war slane hi ieoperd buryit sanct colmes inche memory heirof mony auld sepulturis yit said inche grauyn armis dan last peace ratifiit betuix scottis danis maner danis sal neuer cu scotland moue ony weir aganis ye scottis thir war ye weris kyng duncane led aganis danis vii yeir regne pof vveirdis geuyn makbeth banquho hovv makbeith vvas maid thane cavvder hovv slevv kyng duncane make hym self king ca iii nocht lang eftir hapnit ane vncouth wounderfull thyng quhilk followit sone ane gret alteration ye realme auenture makbeth banquho wer passand fore quhair kyng duncane hapnit ye tyme met ye gait thre wemen clothit iuelrage vncouth weid thay wer iugit pepill weird sisteris first thaim said makbeth hale thane glamis secound said hale thane cawder thrid said hale kyng scotland yan said banquho quhat wemen ye sa vnmercyfull sa fauorabil companyeon ye gaif hym nocht onlie landis gret rentis bot gret lordschippis kingdomes geuys nocht answerit first thir weird sisteris schaw felicite apperyng hym youcht happyn ane kyng empire sall end vnhappelie nane blude sall eftir hym succeid cotrar yow sall neuir king bot ye sal cum mony kingis quhilkis lag progressioun sall reiose ye croun scotland al sone thir wourdis wer said thay suddanlie euanist sycht prophecy diuinatioun wes haldin mony dayis derision banquho makbeth sum tyme banquho wald call makbeth kyng scottis derisioun samyn maner wald call banquho ye fader mony king yit becaus al thyngis succedit thir wemen deuinit pepill traistit iugit yame weird sisteris lang eft hapnit yt ye thane cawder wes disherist forfaltit la dis certane crymes lese maieste landis wer geuyn kig duncane makbeth hapnit nixt nicht yt banquho makbeth wer sportand g ddir thair sup yan said banquho thow he gottin yt ye first two weird sister hecht restis nocht bot ye croun quhuilk wes hecht ye thrid sist makbeth reuoluyng thingis thay wer said thir weird sisteris began couat ye croun yit cocludit abide quhil saw tyme ganad yairto fermelie beleuyng yt ye thrid weird suld cum ye first two afore mene tyme kyng duncane maid son malcolme prince cubir signify yt suld regne eftir hym quhilk wes gret displeseir makbeth maid plane derogatioun thrid weird promit afore hym thir weird sisteris nochtheles thocht gif duncane wer slane maist rycht croun becaus wes nerest blud yairto tennour ye auld lawis maid eftir ye deith kyng fergus quhen young child wer vnabil gouern ye croun n rrest yair blude sall regne al respons thir weird sisteris put hym beleif yat thrid weird suld cu al wei first two attour wyfe impacient lang tary wemen ar specially quhare thay ar desirus ony purpos gaif hym gret ar ation sew ye thrid weird yat scho micht ane quene calland hym oft tymis febyl cowart nocht desyrus honouris sen durst assailye ye thing wt maheid curage quhilk offerit hym beniuolence fortoun howbeit sindry otheris he assailyeit sic thing afore maist terribyl ieopardyis quhen thay sic sickernes succeid ye end thair laubouris makbeth persuasion wyfe gaderit freindis ane counsall innernes quhare kyng duncane happinnit ye tyme becaus fand sufficient oportunite support banquho otheris freindis slew king duncane vii yeir regne body burijt elgyn efter tane vp brocht colmekyll quhare remanis yit amang ye sepulturis vthir kingis fra redemption ane mxlvi yeris phovv makbeth vsurpit crovvn chasit ye sonnis king duncane cu bir hovv punist sindry lymmaris maid lavvis ye comon vveil ca iiii al sone ducane slane th maner makbeth come ane gret power scone tuk crowne syne chasit malcolme camore donald bane sonnis king duncane cu bir quhare malcolme reman continewally quhill sanct edward son king eldred recouerit realme ingland fra danis ressauit said malcolme maist tendernes bot donald went irelad makbeth efter yair departing stabyl realme hym sicker firmance maid distribution kingis rentis amang noblis way conquest thair fauoure becaus saw na man oppone thaym hym set gouerne realme iustice punis enormeteis fell febyll administration king duncane yit becaus dred gret trubyl follow gif purpos war deuulgat ome effect deuisit ane subtell slicht bring mysdoaris brokin men iustice solistit syndry lieg large money appele ye theuis quhilk opprest yame maist barras aganis ane prefixit day quhen thir theuis war enterit barras quhare yai suld haue fouchtin aganis thair nichtbouris thay wer takin armit men hangit iebatis according iustly thair demeritis remanent mi oaris war dantit sic maner yat mony yeris efter al thift reiffis war dantit pepyll brocht gret tranquillite sic thingis done kyng makbeth visyit al bou dis realme haldyn sicker targe innocent pepyll maist deligent punisar al iniuris done aganis comoun weil gaif labouris caus youg men incres gud maneris kirk men thair deuyne seruyce slew syndry thanis cath e suthirland stranauorne ro becaus gret trubyl rais realm thair sedition brocht galloway gud peace slew ye tyran makgyll quhilk contempnit mony yeris afore kingis auctorite attour maid lawis comoun weil worthy nowmerit amang nobyll kingis gif succedit crown iust tytyll perseuerit iustice end empire becaus syndry lawis apperis ffitabyl haue colleckit thaym werk mak thaym mair patent followis within ordouris sall answere afor ane phane iuge bot salbe remittit h iuge ordinar pthe tent part al frutis growyng ground sall geuyn kirk men god salbe adorit oblationis prayer phe perseueris cotemption aganis kirk standyng curst ane yeir wyll nocht recounsalit thairto sall repute ennyme comoun weill gif perseueir indurat mynd two yeris al guddis salbe confiscat phe yt maid knycht salbe sworne defend wedois comonis pupyllis maid king sal sworne samyn maner pthe eldest douchter sal succeid heritage failyeing eldest son gif ony woman mary lord ground scho sall tyne hir heritage pna man sall posseid landis rentis officis bigingis ony othir auctorite bot allanerly kynges lycence pna office salbe heritage kingis pleseir pna man sall sit prophane temporall actionis without commissioun king pal couention office iustice sal led ye kingis name auctorite phe makis band sworne man ony othir man bot allanerly king salbe punist deith ylk man salbe bound defend king aganis al othir leuad creatur phe yt raisis ye kingis liegis salbe put deith guddis confiscat pepyll ar gaderit samyn maner phe followis ane man kirk market ony othir conuention salbe punist ye deith without leif industry yt followis pane hors fed comonis ony othir vse laubouring ye erd salbe escheat kyng pfulis menstralis bardis al othir sic ydil pepil bot gif thay specially licent kyng salbe compellit seik sum craft wyn thair leuyng gif thay refuse yai salbe drawin lik hors ye pluch harrowis phowbeit ye son put fee ye land lyfe fader licence kyng yit salbe disherist efter gif fader found criminabyl kingis maieste pall wemen yt maryit ony fre baron lord howbeit scho haue na barnis hym sal haue thrid land efter deith remanent salbe reiosit airis pall gret baronis salbe inhibit mary wt othir vnder pane deith specialy gif thair landis rowmes lyis togidder pall armoure wappinnis yat ar borne ony othir effect kingis weris salbe confiscat al othir mouabyll guddis pthe kingis capitane ye byis ony landis within ye boundis quhare capitane sall tyne baith ye land ye money siclik gif mary son douchter ony folkis dwellad within boundis sall tyne office sal leifful son mawchis bruke office thir siclik lawis war vsit king makbeth throw quhilk gouernit realme x yeris gud iustice howbeit samyn co trar naturall inclination geuyn conques fauoure pepyl stabyll realm hym erar ony sycht comoun weill phovv banquho vvas slane makbeth son fleance slane vvalis hovv vvalter son fleance come scotland genology stevvartis ca v schort tyme efter makbeth returnit fra al meiknes innatiue cruelte led wod furyis ye nature tyranis quhilk coquessis landis kingdomes wragus titil ay full heuy thocht dredour traisting ilk siclik cruelte hym afor othir forthir remebring weird geui hi reherlit ba quhois posterite suld reiose ye crown lang progression callit banquho son fleace ane supper purpos sla yame baith howbeit thay suspeckit na thyng le tha treason makbeth quhen ba ket done thocht expedient sla thaym awin hous thairfore eschew al suspectioun cryme yt micht imput hym yairby laid ane band armit men thair gait sla yame baith ar thair returnyng hame thir men war laid wait effect slew banquho nochtheles fleance couert nicht eschapit saiffic apperit syngular fauoure god better fortoun fleace eschaping yi wise seing new waching laid slauchter fled walis quhare plesandly ressauit ye prince hairof maid sa familiar wt ye princis doucht yt maid hir hyld prince walis finding douchter deflorit persewit leance sic hatrent finaly slew hym held douchter maist schameful seruitude becaus scho cosentit hir defloration vnc th blude last scho deleuerit ane son nam walter quhilk within yer became ane vailyeant lusty man greter curage spreit ony man nurist land wart youcht haldin ye prince walis gudschir law estait yit ane hye mynd abyll na thyng mair tha attempt gret chargis last fel contention companyeoun quhilk obiec hym yt gottin lauchful bed efter mony feirs iniurius wourdis athir syde walter sa impacient slew companyeon syne fled scotland seik support freindis cu myng happynnit cupany inglismen yt come scotland wt sanct margaret quhare behauit hym sa plesandly euery sort yt conquest yair beniuolence fauour nocht lang efter send ane gret power ye ilis galloway othir partis scotland punis tyranni lymmaris ye cuntre quhom dantit sic heid prudence yat maid stewart scotland ressaue ye kingis mali rentis al part ye realme walter stewart ane son namit alane stewart quhilk efter passit duke lorane robert bastard son king ingland ye haly land quhare thay mony vailyeant deidis aganis turki fra incarnation crist ane mlxxxxix yeris alane gottyn al xander stewart quhilk oundit abbay paslay quhare mony religious men he bene ordour sanct benedict alexander gottin walter stewart dundonald quhilk faucht vailyeatly support alexander ye thrid largis sall efter schaw walter two sonnis ye first namit alexander quhilk faucht support h fader said feild largis secound son namit robert stewart gat ye landis terbowtoun marijt air crukeistoun fra quho discendit ye erlis leuenax deruly attour alexander stewart ye foundit paslay war gottin sindry othir sonnis iohne iames sindry otheris howbeit thay tuke new surnamis name ye landis quhilkis thay succedit pthis iohne stewart efter deith brothir iames maryit ayre bonkyl ane virgyne gret bewtie gat hir walter stewart quhilk succedit landis bonkyll rafrew rothessay bute stewartoun efter yt fad iohne slane falkirk walter stewart marijt mariory bruce douchter king robert bruce quho gottin robert secound ye name robert secund tuke sobell mure ane virgine incredibyl bewte douchter schir adam mure knycht place wyfe gat hir thre sonnis thre douchteris ye first iohne stewart othirwayais namit robert quhilk succedit immediatly ye crown ye secound robert erle fif menteith duk albany gouernoure scotland xv yeris thrid son namit alexander erle buchquhane lord baudyenot eldest douchter marijt iames son air william erle dowglas secound maryit iohne dunbar brothir george dunbar erle marche maid erle murray gat hir bot ane douchter quhilk maryit dowglas sa dowglas come erldome murray thrid doucht maryit iohne lyoun quhylk maid efter lord glammis attoure robert first king ye stewartes maryit ewfame douchter erle ro gat hir two sonnis walter erle athole dauid erle stratherne thys walter solistit robert duk albany sla dauid stewart duke ro hesay efter ye hame cuming kyng iames first solistit ye king sla al duk robertis linage ye samyn maner ay raistig efter slauchter freindis cu crown finaly solistit nepot robert stewart robert grahame douchter sonne sla king iames first quhilk cryme said walter efter co uickit distroyit sonnis brothir dauid erle buchquhane come na succession thairfore baith thair landis returnit agane crown ony memory thair blude robert stewart duke albany come duk murdo quhilk maryit erle lanox douchter gat hir thre sonnes walter alexander iames duke murdo first two sonnis war slane striueling kyng iames first thrid brothir iames reuege yair slauchter brint dunbertane efter chasit ireland quhare deceissit ony successioun robert thrid name maryit annabyll drommond douchter schir iohne drommond stobhal knicht gat hir dauid iames first deit falkland othir iames ye first maryit iane douchter iohne bewfuerd erle somerset ingland gat hir two sonnis borne ani alexander iames ye first deit infance secoud iames secound vi douchteris quhilk eldest maryit dalphyne france secound duke bertanye thrid lord feir feird lord dalkeith fift erle huntly sext na successioun iames secound maryit margaret douchter duke gylder gat hir thre sonnis two douchteris first sonne iames thrid secound namit alexander duke albany maryit first ye erle orknayis doucht gat hir alexader bischop murray nocht lang efter partit hir went frace quhare maryit counte bolony gat hir iohne stewart duke albany quhylk mony yeris gouernour scotland day thrid sonne iohne stewart erle mar e slane ye canogait ane baith fatt first douchter iames secound maryit lord boyd quhome go tin ane sonne quhylk slane lord mongumry ane douchter gregane quhylk maryit efter erle cassellis efter deith lord boyd douchter iames secound maryit lord hammyltoun e way hous hammyltoun decorit kyngis blude tothir syster maryit lord creichtoun hir come lytyll successioun worthy haue memory piames thrid maryit margaret douchter kyng denmark hir gottin iames ye feird alexander quhilk byschop sanct androis duke albany iohne stewart le marre thay deit baith ony successioun piames feird maryit margaret douchter kyng henry seuyn gat hir iames fift quhilk regnis gret felicite aboue w yeir translatyng thir cronyklis bot wyll returne oure hystory phovv makbeth slevv lordis proffet thair landis guddis hovv biggit castell dunsynnane slevv makduffis vvise barnis orisoun maid malcolme cammore makduf ca vi na thyng succedit happely makbeth efter slauchter banquho ylk man began feir life rst nocht compeir quhare makbeth thus followit ylk day mair displeseir quhen tyrane persauit ylk man hauand hym dreid began dreid ylk man samyn maner yat way grew maist odius subdittis ay slaing noblis ell confiscand yair guddis vane causis last quhen gottin gret proffet slauchter proscription noblis began put handis mair pertly thair blud thocht proffet sa sweit yt come hym slaucht noblis mycht desist thairfra doubil proffet yat way first thay war slane yt dred secoundly gat thair guddis sustene ane gard armit defend hym fra iniure yam yt suspeckit forthir yt micht inuade ye pepyl mair tyrany biggit ane strang castel ye hicht dunsynnane ane hyll gowry x milis fra perth yi castel biggit wt infinit expensis na stuf micht carijt ye samyn gret difficulte yit ceissit fra ye bigging yairof bot causit al thanis ylk schire big ye said castel yair cours last fel makduf thane fif big ye said castel becaus durst ca yi werk auenture ye king put handis hym afore othir noblis ye realme send craftismen al prouision comadit yame sa absence yt ye king micht haue na occasion mouit aganis hym sone efter makbeth come vesy castell becaus fand makduf present werk said yi wyl obey chargis quhill riddin ane mollet brydyl nochtheles sall gar hym draw lik ane auir ane ar fra then mycht neuir se makduf patience othir becaus thocht power ouir gret elli becaus wes schawin prophecy ye foresaid wichis yat mak duf suld inuaid hym disples ir oft occurris quhare ony prince takis suspitioun ane smal offence occasion gret iniuris finalie slane makduf sum slycht wer nocht ane wiche quho gret confidence said put hym feir yat suld neuir slane man yat wes borne wife vincust quhill wod birnane wer cu ye castell dunsynnane makbeth hauand gret co fidence thir wourdis set asyde feir deith traistit fermely yat mycht quhat plesit ony punition eftir following ta phecy beleuit wes vnpossible vincus hym ye tothir vnpossible sla hym bot yir fals illusionis ye deuil brocht hym vter cofusion gart rage ithand slaucht subdittis ony feir lyfe last makduf disparit lyfe tuk purpos pa ingland yt mycht bring malcolme camore scotland resist tyra ny makbeth yit samyn deuisit sa secretly bot makbeth gat knawlage thairof kingis prouerbe sayis he scharp sycht lang eiris yi makbeth euery gret hous scotland part men quhilkis war corruppit h money reueil al thingis said done thair housis throw slycht opprest noblis realme thay mycht fulfyl yair attemptat aganis hym yi tyrane ay ful sollicitude dre dand haue ane terribil end cruelte cumis impulsion coscience quhilk bring euery man yt gylty perpetuall sollicitude ony securite life ye samyn maner makbeth euer feir ennymes treasonabyl murdir tyrany come haistely ane gret power makduff hous ye men yt hous trais ing na euyl oppinnit ye ye incontinent makbeth entrit slew makduffis wyfe hir barnis othir personis yt fand syne co fiscat makduffis guddis put ye horn makduf banist yi maner fled ingland malcolme ca se gif micht find ony way hand reuenge ye slauchter maid sa cruelly h wife barnis quhe comyn malcolme declarit ye gret oppression done hym makbeth ye said tyrane hatit wt al liegis ye innocent slaucht baith noblis comonis sindry othir detestabyl cruelteis worthy rehersit last quhen saw malcolme sich copassion sorowis said lang sall thow suffir murdir thy fader othir freindis vnpunist quhen sall thow saciat ye affliction thy realme quhat damage haue sufferit thy proscription thow ye tyme sa tender age yat thow mycht debait aganis sa bludy monstoure youcht condiscendit sutyme election tyrane oure gret damage yit experience cruelte desyre na thyng mair exonerat thairof ye pepyll murnis accusyng thair wylfull ygnorance consentyng sa hye myscheuis thair awin perdition thair onely esperance traisting deliuerit thair calamite thairfore le tha affliction thy pepil thy awin scription thy maist ples ir dre delyuer thy pepyl tyranny yame dayly sustenit king edward maist humane gracious prince sal fail support ye al pissance thow esitis becaus realm sutyme opprest tyranni finaly delyuerit grace god awin manheid yair cruel handis attour gif thow knawis quhat beniuolece thy pepil he thow may vnderstand su part thir wordis thy pepyl ar murdrist al partis yi bludy fleschoure ta ki heid yairfore thow nedis dout bot thy returnyng scotland salbe richt plesand scottis men thir cruelteis dayly done w suld lamentit effeminat pepyll bot e ar reuengit vailyeant campionis sen thow art nocht sauit fra inuasion thy ennymes bett fortoun bot ordanit deuyne prouydence delyuer thy pepyll afflictionis phovv malcolm camore schevv hym self vnabyl kyng syndry vice hovv come scotland vvas maid kyng thairof makbet deith ca vii doucht malcolme gretu ly commouit e sindry oppression cruelt eis done scottis yit gret prudence dissimulit mind haue better experience makduffis intention say se gif war cumyng samyn effect desyrit gif war cumyn dissait industry makbeth betrais hym put hym ennymes handis thairfore e answerit richt sorowful ye trubyll fallyng cuntre cht haue gret affection thairto yit certane irremediabyll vicis following vnabyll uthir gouern realm releif pepyll ye trubill thay presentlie sustene first immoderat lust abhominabyl fontane vicis quhilk ragi sic vndantit renyeis yat gif wer maid king scottis suld deflore virginis matronis sic maner yat intemperance suld mair importabyll yow bludy tyranny makbeth yi answerit makduf ane euyll falt mony nobyll princis kyngis bene disherist tynt baith thair lyfe kyngdomis samyn nochtheles thair gret plenty weme scotland yairfore wyll thow counsall make thy self kyng sall dres ye mater sa wysely yat thow salbe satifyit thy pleseir thy vice salbe vnknawin said malcolme al maist auaricius man erd wyl seik sa mony occasionis conques landis gudis wyl sla mony noblis scotland fenyeit causis fyne yat may reiose thair realmes landis guddis yairfore schaw yow quhat infinite harmes sal cum yow insaciabyl auarice wyl remembir bir yow ane fabil ane tod ouirset ane byke fleis continewally soukad hir blud quhe ane passinger gatt dema dit hi gif scho wald haue thir fleis skalit fra hir body answerit na becaus thir fleis sat hir wou dis war full hir blud fouth yairof sat lytil displeseir gif thay war skalit vther quhilkis war mair yeuery tume suld licht thair rowmes souk residew hir blude quhilk war vnpro tab l heirfore suffir remane quhare aduenture sic displeseir fall amang yow vnsaciable auarice ye sall eftir chace realme wt schame think yir displeseiris regnand amang yow bot small respect sic terrible outragis quhilk sall appeir sone cumyng answerit makduf ane wer falt ye first auarice rute mischeif ye maist part kyngis ar slane ye cryme nochtheles mak thy self kig counsall thow sall haue rich outh yair gold geir ineuch scotland satifie ye thy pleseir said malcolm ful lesingis dissait reiosis na thing sa mekle trais thaym geuis credit traist sen na thig semi mair ane prince yan constance verite iustice na thing sa vnsemand falset treason lesing yow may cosider vnabil gouern ony prouince cutre sen yow he sa mony rameidis colour ye la vicis pray ye hyde colour vice amang laif yan said makduf yi warst falt yair leue vnhappy miserable scottis quhilk ar scurgit sa mony calamiteis ilk ane aboue othir ye haue ane cur deuyll regnis aboue yow ony tityll distroyis yow bludy tyranny othir yt he ye rycht ye croun repleit ye treasonable maneris vicis inglismen vnworthy kyng awin confession nocht onlie auaricius geuin vnsaciable lust bot fals ane tratour yat may nocht trow ane wourd sayis adew scotlad banist euir ony confort cosolation thir wourdis teris fast halit ouir cheikis last quhen wes makand hym depart malcolme tuk hym sleif said gud confort haue nane thir faltis howbeit refusit onlie haue experience thy mynd makbeth he oftymes sic wayis desyrit slaucht slaw yat wes condiscend thy mynd salbe ye deligent fulfill incontinent thay enbrasit othir tuk auisement howe thay mycht prouide materis thair singulare comon weil sone eft makduf send letter nobillis scotland schawing malcolme wes cofiderat cum haistely scotland prayit yame sen said malcolme wes iust heritour ye croun assist hym may recouer ye samyn ye mene time malcome purchest erle northumbirland cum xm men help hym recouer realme thir tithingis fra thay wer schawin scotland drew ye nobillis two sindry factionis quhilk tane assistit makbeth yi othir malcolme throw quhilk rais aftymes sindry frequent scarmussyng betuix yir partyis ye nobillis quhilkis wer malcolmes opinioun wald nocht ieoperd yame vter chance battall quhil cuyng ingland thair support makbeth seyng finalie ennymes incres ilk day wt pissance fled fi abaid freindis part takaris dunsiane purpos fecht wt h ennymes erar fle ye realme schamfullie ony straik freindis gaif counsall othir tak peace malcolm elli fle haistelie treasour gold ye ilis ye fin yat mycht ee sindry gret princis ye realme money tak part aganis malcolme nochtheles see confidence fretis yt beleuit fermely neuir vincust quhil ye wod birnane war brocht dusynnane nayit slane ony borne ane woma malcolme following ha stely makbeth come ye nycht afore victory wod birnane quhe army refreschit yame ane schort tyme comandit ilk tak ane brache ye wod yt thay micht come ye nixt morow arrayit maner ennymes sicht makbeth seing hym cu gyse vnderstude ye prophecy completit yt wiche schew hym nochtheles arrayit men skarsly ennimes cassin fra yame branch cumand forthwart battal quhen makbeth tuk flicht quhom followit makduf gret hatrent saying tratour thy insaciabyll cruelte sall haue ane end said makbeth thow followis vane nane born ane woman yt may sla said makduf schorne moderis w mbe incontinent slew makb brocht heid malcolme ye end makbeth efter yt roung xvi yeris ye begynnyng empire mony p offitabyl thingis ye comon weil bot sone efter illusion deuyllis degenerat fra honest beginning maist terribyll cruelte slane fra incarnation ane thousand lxi pof deith edmond canut h rald hardy canut kingis ingland hovv crovvn inglad vvas recouerit fra danis godovvine vveriit ye innocent slauchter alarude ca viii wyll schaw empire ingland tane fra danis restorit king edward iust heritour yairof quhen canute edmond tit ye realm ingland betuix yame cord said ye realm gud peace foure yeris nixt following ylkane yame dred ye pissance othir ay desiring haue ye hail empire inglad vnder yair singular dominion ye samyn tyme ane wickit maliuol namit edrik tuk purpos attempt ane hardy vassalage cum fauour beleuit ane yir two princis yi edrik delyuerit yi maner haue thankis co moditeis awaitit quhen king edmod sittad h eis ane straik hym throw ye scheir bowellis throw quhilk yi edmond deceissit edrik efter yi schamefull slauchter went canute said hayl king al ingland canut astonist th salutation began demand mater stude mair diligently quhe fand king edmond slane treason vnhappy man thocht na thing sa gud geif hym reward according treasonabyll labour gart hyng hym ane iebat canut exonerat yi way fra al suspition edmondis deith succedit beniuolence ye pepyll hail empire ingland sone eft ane cousal set ye quhilk ye noblis delyuerit baith king edmond ladis ii sonnis edward edwyn ye hadis canut quhom certane yeris tretit gret humanites bot sone eft changit purpos thocht sla yame baith yt realm micht stabillit posterite lag eft send yame valgari reget swedrik quiet letteris sla yame baith nochyeles yi regent knawing ye innocent nobyl blude yir ii child mouit sic reuth send yame baith salamon king hungary maid canut vnderstad yt al chargis wer done deuisit eft deith canute succedit son herald namit h gret swithnes hair fut quhilk reiosit ye croun inglad twa yeris eftir quhome succedit brother hardy canut maist vicious proud tyrane yt euir rang aboue inglisme wald nocht suffir ye bonis h brothir rest vnd erd bot vnnaturall dispit tuk vp h bonis set heid apon ane hie staik quhair maist confluence pepil wes london kest ye residew body thamis maid ane law euery inglisman sall bek discouer heid quhe met ane dane gif ane inglisman ane dane come baith ye brig atanis inglisman sal tary quhill ye dane past ouir ye brig inglismen richt comouit yir displesad lawis cospirit aganis ye danis al part ingland callit al yair wageouris supper slew yame quhen yai wer ful wynis ane nycht hardy canut heirand al put doun yi slicht inglismen slew hym self disperatioun thus wes ingland deliuerit fra tyranny danis schort tyme eftir ye noblis ingland send ane gret princis yairof namit godowine quhilk maryit afore canutis douchter normady bring two sonnis eldrede ingland resaue ye croun yairof yi godowyne becaus maryit canutis doucht thocht coques ye croun h awin son yairfore cuing normandy deuisit distroy baith ye sonnis eldred poison ye eldest son namit alarude wes slane maner bot edward eschapit mirakil god come sone eftir inglad quhair ressauit ye croun godowyne seing yt attemptatis com purpos durst return ingland feir ye treason yat aganis ye said edward yeles edward wes ane man ony rankoure sa reuthful ye pepil yt wes reput ane myrrour virtew quhen godowyne askit grace hym ye slaucht brothir onlie remittit ye offence bot al maid son herald duk oxfurd yit yi cruelte done godowyne wes lang vnpunist within schort tyme eftir wes standing ye burd afore kyng edward quhen hard ye illis lamet ye deith alarude ye king brothir eit ane pece breid said god gif ye breid wory gif euir wes othir art alarud slauchter incotinent fel doun weryit ye breid ye noblis astonist yi deuyne punition gaif louyng god yt punist yi tyrane co mandit body berijt vnd ye gallous bot wil return historye quhair left pof king malcolme camore actis hovv punist sindry cospiratouris aganis hym deith king edvvard hovv bastard normandy conquest ingland ca ix malcolme camore support edward kyng inglad recouerit realme ye viii yeir regne ye said edward wes crounit scone ye xxv day aprile fra ye incarnation imlxi yeris eftir coronation maid ane generall couention noblis forfair ye quhilk reward al yam yat assistit aganis makbeth land office comadit ye ilk man haif office land namit eft surname maid mony erlis lordis baronis knichtis cu myng mony yame war afore war maid erl fif meteth athol leuenox murray cath ro angus yir war ye first er amang w croniklis beris mony new surname come tyme amang w caud loka gordon seyton laud wawa e meldru schaw leirmouth libertoun strachquhen cargill rattray dundas cokburn mirtoun eis abircr lesly mony thir namis ladis quhilk gaif namis yair possessour ye tyme otheris gat yair surnamis c stewar durward banerma mo othir per namis vailyeant ca p oni war turnit general surnamis kennedy grahame hay wt quhilkis war ouir lix oumer yi samyn cousal kig malcolm maid mony ciuil religi la honor god ffet h realm gaif makduf erle fif air becaus pricipal brigat hym ye realm iii priuileg irst ye erle fif sal croun ye kig ye erle fif sal strik ye attallis quhen ye king pa ennymes ye thrid haue fre regalite mak officeris within hym replege neid heis fra ye kingis lawis regalite ordanit al ye said cousal ye fre baronis sall mak iebattis draw wellis punition criminabyl personis amang mony othir costitutionis abrogat al lawis maid makbe h quhill king malcolme geuyn sic besines tithingis come ye lugtak cumyn ane gret nowmer pepill scone maid hym self kig resist sic fuliche attemptatis send ye kigis auctorite makduf erle fif quhilk fynaly slew ye said lugtak set batal put cupany flicht followit sindry yeris eft gud peace quhill last ane gret noumer theuis come mar louthiane inuading ye cuntre wt cotinual heirschip slauchter nochtheles yai war finaly tane iustifijt patrik dubar ye ilk yan king malcolm na virtew suld vnrewardit maid yi patrik erle marche gaif hym ye landis cokburnis peth yi condition yt tymes cumyng ye erlis marche sal purge mers louthiane theuis memory heirof bur baner ane theuis heid strinklid blud lang efter king malcolme aduertist syndry noblis war cospirit aganis hym deuisit slaucht incontinent ony feir dredour went pertly ye huting quhare slauchter deuisit drew ye principal mouar yair comoning quhil yai war baith seuerit fra al cupany incotinent pullit swerd said tratour thow he deuisit deith best tyme debait thy self slaine gif thow dow yi man yt cospirit aganis knawing h singular maheid fel kneis desirit grace ye king seand hym penitet said remit thy offence sa thow attempt na sic treassonabyl dedis tymes cumyng quhil sic thingis war done scotland edward king ingland becaus na airis body send h ambassatour vngary bring hame ye two sonnis edmond namit edwyn edward bot edwyn mony yeris afore deceissit yi othir edward marijt agatha douchter ye king ungary quho ane son namit edgar ii douchteris margaret cristine sone efter edward come wyfe child inglad h cumyg kig edward wald haue resignit hym ye croun howbeit refusit saig wald inhumane take crown duryng li life heir ane thing admiration al pepyl ane refusis ye croun offerit frely hym beniuolece quhilk al pepyll couatis maist desire regardyng na cruelte yt may fallow fyre swerd succeid ane kingdom yit felicite yir ii princ succedit lag inglad edward ungary sone eft deceissit throw quhilk kig edward h le tuk sic dolour yt sone eft deceissit followit tha gret co tetion ye croun inglad yor ye enit iustly edgar nepot king edward afore deceissit yit ye nobl assistit herald erle oxfurd son godowyne afore rehersit al sone herald maid kig ingland bega gouern ye realm gud iustice ceissing fra al slauchter sindil sene yame ye vsurp croun wrang menes sufferit al edgar moder sisteris pa liberte al boudis quhare ya list howbeit said edgar ichtwis air ye croun yairfore apperit yt fortoun cotemptio beleuyng na thig micht succeid aganis felicite nochtheles agatha hauand suspition trub l efter following kepit hir son edgar secretly hir chalmer quhil last kig herald na besines war hame tuk purpos pa fladeris reuin cotrarius windis normady amang vnfreind godowyn afore slew alarud quhilk nepot willia bastard normady al sone psentit ye said duk said wt dissimilit fals mynd yt send othir kingis vsit ambassatour eradis bot comyn per son treit mariage betuix hym ye said duk normady willia duk normady suspekand na dissait vnder wordis gaif sic credit yt codiscendit geif douchter hym mariage belyue ane day set ye mariage maid al solepnite yt micht deuiset ye gret pleseir al pepyl baith normady inglad within certane dayis eft king herald returnit new wyf ingland hauand hym mony noblis normady affection apperit new wife nochtheles fra cu myn london comandit general edict al ye normanis depart realm within iii dayis vnder pane deith nocht satifyit iniure causit h vnhappy limaris defoule lady eft yt causit yame cut hir er send hir agane ane fischer bait normady willia bastard duk normandy mouit insufferabil iniure arriuit ane army ingland efter cuming brint al schippis yt folkis micht haue na esperance flicht bot outhir vailyeantly yair hadis elli schamfully de finaly faucht herald townis brig spulyeir hym baith life kingdome atanis crounit sone eft westmynster eldred archebischop york xxv day december yeir god ane mlxvi yeris hovv kig malcolm mariit sact margare ressauit al hir freindis scotlad hovv sindry armyis ingland vvar discofist scottis hovv peace vvas maid betuix inglismen scottis ca x edgar seyng ye crown ingland coquest said ye bastard normandy disparit succeid ony way ye crown yairfor eschew al dageir apperig gat ane schip purpos return moder sisteris ungary nochtheles contrar windis arriuit ane part forth callit ye quenes ferry king malcolme quhilk th tyme dufermelyng heirand ye cuming yi schip send familiaris se quhat pepyl yai war laitly arriuit watter inquire yame quhat yai desirit al sone vnderstude thay war inglisme discendit king edward quhilk su tyme hym sa mony pleseiris come ane honourabyll cupany schip quhare thay war edgar ye samin maner array hym moder systeris yair best auise ressauit kig malcolme maist tendernes brocht within palice schort tyme eft king malcolme seand ye excellent bewte wisdome gud maneris margaret eldest syster said edgar po agatha hir moder haue hir mariage agatha knawing weil hir douchter abyl get sa nobil ane price yi wa ld c n iscendit glaidly desiris one efter couention al ye noblis scotland efter octauis pasche quene margaret king malcolme war spousit maist triumphe honour yt micht deuisi willia ye bastard normandy coquerour ingland heirand yi mariage betuix king malcolme quene margaret dred ye sindry factionis suld follow realme assistence edgaris freindis yairfore banist al ye lynnage blude tenit ye said edgar proscription edgaris freindis thair come ane gret nowmer pepyll scotland king malcolme mony yame gat landis fra hym yair honest behauyng amang quhome war lidesay waus rasay louel towris prestoun sandelandis bissart sowlis wardlaw maxwel othir sindry attour thair come gret nowmer pepyll ungary quene margaret creichton fotringha giffart meluil borthwik surname sindry chancis come france scotlan fras sinclare boswel mowtray montgumery capbel boyis betoun tailyefer bothwel mony othir quhilk may schaw li ite tyme yir men yt come inglad edgar brocht mek l siluer gold yame wt mony haly reliquies quhilk war haldin gret reuerence amang w ye mene tyme willia ye coquerour ingland send herald malcolme desiring edgar delyuerit hadis certifying gif refusit suld tak hym force battal king malcolme notwithstading gret minassing kyng willia ye coquerour gaif plane repuls desir said yai war respodet equite king willia yi repuls denucit weir scott ye mene tyme al ye pepil northubirland assistit king malcolm yair erlis sister son sone efter kig willia send ane vailyeat capitane ye blud rial normady namit roger wt ane army northubirlad howbeit abaid schort tyme honour discofist scottis northubrianis king willia litil aff ayit yi discofitour sed ye duk glocester wt ane new army cubir agan quho war send ye erlis marche meteith kepit ye boud scotlad fra al inuasio ye said duk kig willia herad na vassalage done ye said duk sed ane new army wt mair pissance tha afor northubirlad yi last army ane gret noumer baith scott northubrian war vicust slane kig malcolm mouit wt yi iiur rasit ane army al pepyl vnd dominion support ye northu brianis followit na le deligece tha hatrent yi army inglad infinit slauchter put yame flicht kyng willia na thyng brokin thir displeseris send son robert greter power afore northumbirland quhe remanit lang tyme watter tyne durst assailye na thing worthy haue memory maid peace betuix ye two kingis vnder thir conditionis king malcolme sall haue ye part northumbirland quhylk lyis betuix tweid cubir stane mure sal mak homage kingis inglad ye samyn myddis stane mure salbe ane croce king inglandis ymage ta syde kyng scotlandis ye tothir signify ye tane salbe marche ingland othir scottis yi croce callit recroce say croce kingis attoure uoldosius sonne erle nortubirland sal haue kyng williamis cosingnais mariage salbe male f e xx yeris eftir following phovv king malcolme dantit sindry cospiratouris realme gret deuotion liberalite kirk vvith ane complaynt riotus cheir ca xi eftir two kingis wer aggreit maner followit scotland part trubill men galloway ilis rais gret noumer pepil maid gret slauchter heirschippis partis quhare thay come kyng malcolme punys yir attemptat send walt sonne fleance afore rehersit ane band chosyn men galloway finalie walter dantit thir lymmaris sic felicite yt wes maid stewart scotlad callit stewart surname eftir yat yi truble wes dantit yi wise followit ane othir gretar motion murrayis gaderit yair opinioun ye inhabitantis ro caithnes sindry othir pepill thair nocht onlie slew ye kingis seruandis ministeris iustice bot assistance makduncane maid mair heirschippis slaucht wes hard ony tyme afore punis yir cruelteis wer send makduf ane army mar inhabitantis thairof astonist cu myng thocht na thing sa gud stop inuasioun thair money mene tyme happinnit kyng malcolme cum monymusk gat aduertisyng al ye north ti scotland ye ilis wer confiderat thir murrayis aganis ye kyng affrayit yir tithing demandit thesaurar gif ony landis wer yai boundis tenand ye croun fra wes aduertist yt ye barony monymusk tenit yairto vowit sanct andro send hym victory last quhen wes cuyng spay fand ennimes gret power yan mycht resist espyit baner feir enimes trimbla passand tlie forward desyrit incotinet pullit baner fra gaif schir alexader carron quhilk gat mony riche land ye samyn office bot h name wes turnit eft skrymgeour quhilk discedit ane nobil hous seuerand yit gret honour vnd ye samyn surname quhe kig malcolme wes cuing ouir pay quhair ye armyis wer reddy fecht al sidis thay wer seuerit interuetion prelat trewis tane vnd yir coditionis ye comonis sal return hame ye noblis sal submit yame ye king yair liuis lad saif notyeles mony thaym war spulyeit thair guddis haldyn preson end thair lyfe sic thingis done king malcolme persuasion haly quene gaif hym haill virtew began haly werkis sic maner yt excellit othir day feruent deuotion sa obedient haly quene left na thing vndone yt pertenit werkis piete ye deuotion thir two haly leuaris brocht mony pepyll thair imitation clene lyf thay contendit quhilk thaym suld maist feruent luf god agatha hir othir douchter mouit religious maneris example yir two haly leuaris left ye cumpany pepyll went ane priuat solitare lyfe geuand thaym haill thair contemplation said peace maid betuix inglismen scott edgar went william king ingland quhare gat certane landis sustene estait become sa familiar hym yt haldin hym gret felicite ye nd lyfe forthir kyng malcolme ceissit imitation wife gud w ki gaif extreme deligence recouer ye thing tynt afore necligence predecessouris afore tyme wa scotland bot foure bi hoprikis sact andros glasgew alloway murthlak sact andros murthlak stude yat samyn maner thay stand bot galloway glasgew war desert quhil thay war restorit thair auld dignite king malcolme two byschoprikis eikit yame murray cathnes said insolence rais tyme amang eldaris quhen maneris langage superflew cheir inglisme come first amang w yat noblis w nt kyng malcolme lamentit heuely vennomus pe burg fast perdition pepyl prayit hym rem samyn pepyll micht leif sic temperance thair eldaris dyd afore eldaris eit nocht botanis day desyryng na superflew metis quhilkis war socht curiously see land bot allane ly desirit sa mekyll nature requirit yair necessar sustentation hauand thair bodyis hand exercitioun throw quhilk yai grew mair strag greter bodyis ar thir dayis thay war lyke gyandis gret bodyis gret armes leggis cumand lyke feirs lyonis aganis thair ennymes war astonist thairwith thay passit al strenth man thir dayis king malcolme tuk gret laubour expell spro tand pest fra pepyl nochtheles ingyne sa vnhappy mair reddy euyl ony gud werkis howbeit scottis war afore content scarsnes knawyng na intemperat riot surfet yit fra thay traistit ye vennomus bait yairof incressit ylk day sa far na thing micht refrene samyn yit riotus superflew maneris quhilk war brocht realme cumyng inglismen king malcolme ar lytyl comparison sic thingis ar vsit dayis thay dayis nature man sa ouerset superflewiteis pepyll eit bot twyis day bot two bot auaricious taist mannis w mbe sa desyrus na frute growyng vnder heuyn land see may sufficient sa fy hungry appetit glutonis na sa estimet yit comendit yat may swellie maist comparit iustlie nature gredy wolffis bot proffettis litill complane wourdis oust ron sa far may purgit na maner way pepill salbe erar allute lie distroyit yi vice brocht away pof ye deith kig vvilliam bastard normady sidry noble actis done king malcolme deith said malcolme sact margaret sidry meruellis sene albion ca xii quhil sic thingis wer done scotland kig william ye conquerour deceissit xx yeir h regne fra incarnation imlxxxvi yeris left behind iii sonnis robert duke normandy william ye reid face quhilk succedit eft hym ye croun inglad henry bewcleir quhom left gret rich iowellis yi tyme kyng malcolme kest doun auld kirk durame biggit fra ground gret magnificence priour yi abbay wes namit turgot quhilk wes eft maid bischop sanct andros wrait liuis sanct margaret malcolme vulgare langage deceissit sanct andros body wes br ht durame becaus wes prior sumtyme thairof kyng malcolme persuasion turgot biggit ane kirk dunfermelyng quhilk wes ordanit comon sepulturis kyngis scotland tymes cumyng attour quhay list knaw lyfe kyng malcolme camore blissit quene sanct margaret may returne said turgot quhilk schawis ye samyn lenth amang mony werkis quhilk wes litill comendit abrogat wickit lawe maid kyng ewin ye thrid co mandit half ane mark money payit ye lord ye ground redemptioun ye womannis chastite honour callit yit merchetis wemen law wes nocht vnlik thing wes vsit ane town nocht far fra louane quhare gud man redemit vse wife gret soumes money fra lord ground kyng william ye reid face eftir yt ressauit croun ingland inuadit ye kirk intollerable iniuris reft fra ye samin landis rentis quhilk wer geuyn afore kest doun mony abbayis yai wer alliegit impedimet huntyng slew al nobillis yat wer repugnant doyngis banist anselme bischop canterbery wald suffir nane lynnage abyde realme becaus repreuit doyngis finalie herand scottis ane gret part cumbir northumbirland rasit army inuadit yame gret slaucht afore ony weris wer denucit yame last tuk ye castell anwik slew pepil foud king malcolme resist sic thingis beginning come ane army northubirland segit ye castel anwik quhen ye castel lag segeing wes reddy rade ane knycht ingland intendyng ane hardy vassalage come ane swift hors castell armour beirand ye keyis castel speir poynt signify ye castel reddy randerit wache seand hym cum sic maner tuke na suspition bot brocht gret noyis clamour ye king palyeon ye king heirand ye noyis come ye palyeon se cause thairof ye mene tyme yi inglisma held ye keyis king malcolme quhe ye kyng wes lukand maist deligently yairto yi inglisma ran throw ye left e fled haistelie nixt wod yus wes ye kyng slane myddis army said kyng william inglad changit
