surname yi hardy knycht callit pers e quhome discendit ane noble hous vnder surname decorit gret honouris callit erllis nortubirland ye scottis eftir slaucht kyng malcolme skalit fra sege returnit hame buryit kyng malcolme ye abbay tinmouth ingland bot wes tane vp eft alexander son buryit du fermelyng trinite ter eftir deith kyng malcolme followit new displeseir edward prince scotland eldest son king malcolm deceiss throw ane ond gatt ane scarmus nocht far fra anwik wes buryit dunfermelyng quene margaret heirand ye deith hir husband hir son fel malancoly decessit ye thrid day eft king malcolm wes slane ye xxv yeir regne ra redemption imlxxxxvii yer samyn tyme mony vncouth meruellis wer sene albion inundation almane seis mony townis castellis wodis wer drounit baith ingland scotland yeir al ye ladis godowyne spait seis wes couerit sandis yairfore callit godowyne sandis ye pepil beleuit vengeance cumyn hym posterite slaucht alarude ha f schawin sindry castellis townis murray wer cassin doun ye see fludis sic thundir rais yt baith men beistis wer slane gret housis cassin doun louthiane fiffe angus grene treis cornis tuk neid fyre tyme king malcolme ane generall counsal haldyn clairmont quhilk urbane ye secound ye name institute ye houri matynis blissit virgyne mary said dayly hir louing comandit pepyll haue hir speciall remembrance ylk satterday satterday efter gud fryday cristin faith ynt erdly creaturis saif anerly ye samyn tyme li ia quhilk ane gret part asia distroyit ye sa ayenis ye bonis sanct nicholas brocht ye samyn barre pof king donald ye vii hovv sonnis king malcolme fled inglad hovv duncane bastard son king malcolme vsurpit croun vvas slane tyrany hovv edgar recouerit h realm ye deith donald ca xiii malcolme vi sonnis sact margaret edward quhilk slane said etheldred quhilk deit tender age buryit dunfermelyng edmond quhilk renuncet warld leiffit ane haly lyfe ingland tothir iii war namit edgar alexander dauid su authouris sayis edmond put preson slane oncle donald bane donald schew afore fled ilis eschew tyranny makbeth efter deith kyng malcolme brothir returnit scotland support ye king norroway promittit geif ilis scotland perpetual dominion said king sa optenit croun support donald finaly tuk croun small difficulte pepil detesting riotus intemperat maneris brocht amag thaym inglismen assentit sone opinioun traistit becaus wes nurist wt thair auld customis gud maneris recouer seuerite temperance thair auld progenitouris al sone edgar bruthir quene margaret wes aduertist donald bane tane croun scottis brocht quietlie h thre nepotis edgar alexander dauid yair twa sisteris ingland quhen kepit yam certane tyme ane knycht namit organus mouit malice traistyng get reward thairfore accusit hym treason saying nurist sister sonnis douchteris within ingland heritouris crown thairof bot malice wes nocht lang vnpunist said organe wes slane ane freid edgar quhilk assistit said edgar defendit action singular batta l deith quhen donald resauit ye croun scone fand part nobillis nocht afald opinion hauand beneuolence ye childrin kyng malcolme hym ye cause said amang familiaris eft collation nobillis suld haistelie repent thair doyngis le yan thay applyit yame opinionis bot thir wourdis w r depar prentit yair mynd yan beleuit ye mene tyme schir du cane bastard son king malcolme wes send ingland support king willia wt ye reid face put kyng donald fra ye croun king donald aduertist uyng met wt ane army quhen ye battallis wer reddy iune mony ye noblis comonis scotlad com fra donald schir duncane th wes donald stranit flee ye ilis schir du cane come haistely victori army scone tuk crown becaus wes exercit cheualry ony administratioun iustice traistit na thing iust richt bot succedit swerd rycht battal followit infinite trubill deuisionis ye realme donald bane heirand yir diuisionis amang ye lordis solistit makpender erle mernis assist opinion finalie slew kyng duncane slepand bed eftir roung ane yeir ane half becaus duncane wes ane tyrane geuyn cruelte blude menit slaucht thocht euil done eftir slaucht donald wes restorit croun quhilk brukit afore schir ducane ane yeir vi moneth sa ye realme wes cotinewall trubill iii yeris thair tyranny ye nobillis socht mony occasionis finis empire ye mene time rais gret slauchteris heirschippis al partis ye realme nochtwithstanding yi diuision trubill amang lordis yit weris continewit aganis inglismen howbeit na thing followit worthy haif memorie nocht lang eftir magn kig norroway come ane lote schippis al ye ilis scotland garnist strenthis thairof men munition vittallis maid ye samyn lawis institutionis quhilkis ar yit vsit ye ilis scottis hauand gret indignation yt ye ilis scotland suld pa vnd vncouth empire send yair oratouris edgar quhilk wes fourt son malcolme desiring wt gret instance recouer faderis heritage croun scotland edgar sone eftir send ambassatouris h eme donald promittig gif wald exoner hym ye croun plesandlie sen pertenit nocht deliuer hym gret lordschippis louthiane yir ambassatouris cruelte kyng donald wer finalie slane edgar rycht desirus reuenge thir iniuris come scotlad ane gret power support william kyng ingland quhen wes cuyng durame gat ane visioun sleip gif rasit baner sanct cuthbert suld haif victorie morow enterit abbay sanct cuthbert quhair gar deuyne seruice maist reuerence sone eft wes comadit vision displayit sact cuthbertis baner nochtheles kyng donald met hym arrayit oistis eftir lang battall wes chasit ye ilis quhair wes tane finalie brocht edgar put preson quhare sone eftir deceissit edgar eft victory went dunfermelyng holy sepulturis blissit mo r sanct margaret remanent brethir syne maid ane conuention nobillis scone quhare essauit ye croun wes ointit godrik bischop sanct andros yeir god imic ane yeir sact margaret purchest schort tyme afore hir deceis fra paip urbane f er hir al king scotland suld ointit thairfore edgar first king scottis ointit yi priuilege cofermit efter paip iohne secound ye name pof ye vassalage done sindry cristin princis haly land hovv mald eldest douchter king malcolme vvas mariit king ingland ye gest douchter maryit ye erle bolony thair succession deith king edgar ca xiiii two yeir afore ye coronation kyng donald mony nobyll men passit haly land amang quhom robert duk norma dy godofrid duk lorne ye erle blasen ye erle flanderis mony othir princis france becaus thay went inuaid ye sarazenis gaif large feis yair men armis yai gaderit ane army mair pissance nowmer pepil tha euer sene afore yi army went first throw grece costatinople sine com throw ye seys callit hellespont displayit baner litill asia wan ane rang toun namit antioche ye land siria quhare yai war warnit ane vision sact andro ye appostil yt ye speir heid ye sit crist hart hid vnder ye erd ye kirk sact peter finaly efter mony strag townis tane yame yai tuk ierusale heid toun iowry fra redemption imlxxxxix yeris becaus ye haly land recouerit yi maner fra sarazenis ye pepyl maid frequent cessionis throw al partis cristindome geuand louyng almichty god thir happy victoryis fallyng cristin princis efter yi fell ane gret cotention amag yame quha suld king iowry ylkane refusit ye honour knawing worthy sustene sa gret charge last general vocis robert duk normady chosyn king nochtheles becaus aduertist yt brothir king willia ingland ye reid face deceissit ony airis body refusit ye croun iowry traisting mair expedient hym haue ye empire ingland ye duchery norma dy tha kyng iowry yairfore gaif richt yairof ye duk lorane sic thingis done mony yir cristin princis returnit hame robert duk normandy frustrat baith ye croun iowry ingland efter yt refusit reiose ye croun iowry preuenit brothir hary bewcleir ye croun ingland hary bewcleir mariit mald eldest syster king edgar scotlad king edgar secound sister namit mary maryit eustachius erle bolony uce hym ane douchter quhilk heritoure bolony maryit efter steuyn erle marche ingland quhilk succedit immediatly croun thairof nepot kig hary bewclere sal efter schaw yi hary bewcleir gat mald first sister king edgar two sonnis namit richard willia two douchteris namit effem mald bot wyl ruturn hystory pkyng edgar beniuolence schawin hym sanct cuthbert gaif al ye ladis colding hame monkis durame gaif ye town berwik canulph bischop duram becaus canulphus comittit sindry treasonabyl dedis agan king edgar tint aith ye keping berwik depriuat benefice quene mald efter ye scho maryit kig hary bewcleir gaif hir singular virtew following ye lyfe hir blissit moder sanct margaret throw quhilk scho ane myrrour gud leuyng pepyl ingland king edgar na vncouth weris trubyl dayis gouernit realme gud peace haldin mair veneration terrour amang pepyl quhil last deceissit ix yeir regne dude burrit dunfermelyng fra redemption im ix yeris king alexander first hovv king dauid brothir vvas maid erle huntingtoun northumbirland vveris maid betuix hary bevvcleir france dolour deith sonnis deith kyng alexander ca xv efter deith kig edgar succedit ye v son malcolme namit alexander ye feirs becaus datit theuis singular maheid ye beginnyng regne ye murrayis rossis seing hym cotinually exercit sic cotemplatiue materis h fader mod vsit afore maid diuers eiffis extorsionis ye cutre gret slauchter baith men wiffis barnis quhare yai come king alexa der dant yir attemptatis come wt sic diligence thir cospiratouris yt thay war finaly tane punist deith h returnyng hame ane woma fell knee afore hym dolorus array coplening ye baith hir son husband war slane ye maister mernis king alexader mouit wi h yi pietuus coplaynt lichtit doun hors come neuer quhil saw ye erlis son hyngit offece sic thing done tuk purpos returnyng repare ye castell baledgar quhilk foundit afore king edgar gowry quhair gret multitude theuis vsit remane ye wod inuading ye pepyll oftymes slauchter heirschippis ye king gat certane landis fra ye erle gowry annexit yame yi castel yit quhen biging yi castel maist diligence yt theuis tuk sic feir dredand yt ye said castel suld ane aw ad aganis yame yt ya cospirit aganis hym corruppit cubicularis wt money suffer yame ly wait within ane closat yi castel yt thay micht cu nycht sla king quhen sleipand nochtheles sone efter yair cumyng within chalmer king aduertist prouidence god pullit haistely h swerd quhilk hi gand bed heid slew first cubicular becaus page missing decorit ordoure ci un singulare eruditioun h ly lyfe ordoure beg n sanct robert ye yeir fra red ytion imlxxxv bot sanct barnard deceissit ye abbay clairwall wes buryit said abbay sanct melchiad scottisman bot returne history eftir deith alexander ye first brothir dauid c inglad wes rouny scone yeir god imicxx iii yeris gret iustice eft coronation ti real e na weris duryng tyme kyng hary wes sa pi uous sat daylie iugement caus pure comonis haue iustice causit ye actionis noblis decidit othir iug gart ilk iuge redres skaithis yt come ye par h wrang sentence throw quhilk decorit realm mony nobil actis eieckit venomus custome riotus cheir quhilk wes inducit afore inglismen quhen yai com quene margaret ye samyn noysum al gud maneris makand pepil ender effeminat fourt yeir regne yi nobill prince come visie mad castell edinburgh tyme boundis scotlad wer ful woddis lesou medois ye cutre wes geuin store bestiall ony productioun cornys castell wes ane gret forest full hari ndis toddis siclike maner stis wes rude day cumyn callit exaltation croce becaus ye samyn wes ane hie solempne day ye king past cote lation eftir messi wer done maist solempnite reuerence comperit afore hym mony oung insolent baronis scotland rycht desyrus haif sum plesei solace chace hundis said forest tyme wes ye kyng ane man singulare deuoit lyfe namyt alkwine chan n eftir ye rdour sanct augustyne quhilk wes lang tyme confessoure afore kyng dauid ingland tyme wes erle huntingtoun northumbirland religious man dissuadit kyng mony reasonis pa huntis allegit ye day wes solempne reuerence h ly croce suld gif hym day contemplation ony othir exercition nochtheles dissuasionis lityll alit kyng wes finalie uokit oportune solicitatioun baronis past nochtwithstandyng ye solempnite yi day houtis last quhen wes cumyn throw vail lyis gret eist fra said castell quhare lyis cannogait staill past throw wod sic noyis yn achis bugillis yat bestis er rasi fra thair dennys wes ye kyng cumyn fute ye crag noblis seuerit h ir thair fra hym thair game solace quhe suddanlie apperit sycht farest hart yt euir w sene afore leuand creatour ye noyis dyn yi hart ry nad apperit auful braid yndis maid king hors effrayit na remeis mycht hald hym bot yer f ce ouir myre mo away ye kyng nochtheles ye ha followit fast dang baith kyng hors ye ground ye king kest bak handis betuix ye tyndis yi hart haif sa fra ye strak yairof ye haly croce slaid incotinet h hand yt hart fled away wt gre violence euanist ye place quhare springis rude well ye pepyll richt affrayitly returnit hym partis ye wod co fort hym efter trubyll fell kneis deuotly adoryng ye haly croce cumyn su heuinly prouydence weill apperis yair na man schaw quhat mater metal tre sone eft ye king returnit castel ye nicht following admonist ane vision sleip big ane abbay chanonis regular ye place quhare gat ye croce al sone awalkinnit schew vision alkwine cofessour na thing suspendit gud mind bot erar inflamit wt maist feruent deuotion yairto ye king incotinent send traist seruandis france flanderis brocht rycht crafty masonis big abbay syne dedicat ye honour yi haly croce yi croce remanit continewally said abbay tyme king dauid bruce quhilk vnhappely tane durame quhare haldin yit gret veneratio yi abbay laitly gouernace ane gud man den robert bellenden abbot xvi yer delt ylk owlk iiii owis quheit xl syluer amag pure houshaldaris indeget pepyl brocht hame yt gret bellis gret brasyn fount xxiiii capis gold sylk maid ane chalice fyne gold ane eucharist sindry challicis siluer theikkit ye kirk leid biggit ane brig leith ane othir ouir clide mony othir gud werkis quhilkis war ouir prolixt schaw nochtheles sa sindry othir prelatis becaus geuyn lust insolence efter yair maner yt left abbay deit ane chartour monk pof gret liberalite king dauid tovvart ye kirk damage successouris battall allartoun hovv peace vvas maid betuix scottis inglismen ca xvii kyng dauid biggit xv abbay scotland quhais namis ar halyrudhous kelso iedburgh melros newbottel holmcultrane du dranane cabuskeneth kinlois du fermeling holme cuber ii nurijs ane carlele ane othir north berwik foundit ii abbayis beside ye new castel tane sanct benedict ordour ye othir quhit mo ki foudit iiii bischoprik ro brechin dukeld dublane dotat yame gret rentis landis possessionis sindry prudent na thing apprisis gret liberalite king dauid toward ye kirk dotat ye kirk sa richely ye ladis pertenand ye croun yt successour micht sustene yair riall estait eft hym sa weil yai afore ye caus he bene ye deith mony nobyl princis th realm geuand yame su tyme occasion bring gret housis nocht coques ladis sustene ye croun sum tyme inuading ye cutre cotinewal stentis importabyl exactionis ye pepyl su tyme costranis yame disparit pri ce inuaid ingland wt battal takand na sollicitude quhat cu yair life su tyme prentand euyll money aganis ye comon weil al yir mischeui he followit sen syne yi realm becaus croun wes left indegent throw ampliation gret rentis ye kirk howbeit king dauid samyn beleuit best ye pepyl war sa symple thay dayis thay traistit fermely na man mycht haue sa syngulare fauoure god yt gaif maist rich landis ye kirk thairfore ye wise prince king iames ye first quhen com dauidis sepulture dunfermelyng said ane soi sanct crown wald mene kyng dauid left ye kirk ouir riche ye crown ouir pure tuke fra crown maister iohne mair writis cronikles lxm scottis quhilk possedit day ye kirk na le damage comon weil tha perditioun gud religion gyf king dauid consider maneris nurising deuote religion nothir dotat kirkis sic rich yit biggit thaym sic magnificence superflew rentis kirk thay ar vsit ar occasion euyl prelatis rage maist insolent orruppit life bot ane sicker n draw al maner gold syluer th realm howb le damage w ld succeid gif abbayis war prouid yair ordinaris ony dyspensation fra yair habit religious maneris ordinaris thair primat ony exemption primat yair cousal prouincial verite wtin thir lxx yeris na maner benificis bot allanerly bischoprik yeid rome sen syne se quhat infinit gold syluer tane th realm thair continewal promotion thairfore realme salbe brocht sic irrecouerabyll pouerte continewal promotion prelatis within yeris salbe ane facyl pray ennymes may sustene sa gret charge tyme weir done afore eldaris becaus nothir spirituall temporall estait within realme he ony affection comon weil thairof bot ylk man se allanerly awin singular way wyl deplore na mair calamiteis succedyng dayly thair imprudence bot wil return histor quhair left pking dauid translatit ye sait murthlak ab dene quhare mony nobil bischopp he bene sall efter schaw kyng dauid ane sonne namit hary gotin haue schawin mald heritour northumbirland cuber huntingtoun yi hary maryit erle warranis douchter gat hir thre sonnis malcolme william dauid thre douchteris adama margaret mald ye mene tyme king dauid hous gret displeseir wyfe deceissit hir flurisant yeris buryit scone fra redemptio ane micxxxii yeris ye vii yeir ye regne king dauid efter hir deith king dauid passit residew dayis ony cupany wemen quhil sic thingis war done scotland mald douchter hary bewcleir returnit ingland hir husband hary ye fourt ye name empriour deccissit ony air body hir cumyng inglad hir fader king hary maid ane general couention noblis ga yame sweir defend said mald douchter iust heritour ye croun ingland syne maryit hir gawfrid plantaginet erle angeos quho scho bure ane son namit hary quhilk wes efter king ingland callit pepyll son ye emprice yi time robert duk normady deceissit ony succession body quhais deith duchery come hary bewcleir brothir yi hary bewcleir deceissit fra redemption imicxxxiiii yeris yan succedit gret trubil ingland mald emprice tyme deith hir husband gawfrid plantaginet angeos quhilk tyme gret infirmite hauad hir son hary bot ii yeris age mene tyme steuyn erle bolony sister son hary bewcleir gaderit ane gret army cu ingland yt micht coques ye croun yairof first war vndermynd ye cuntre slichtis desirit ye croun geuyn quhil prince hary war lauchful age succeid ye noblis sead petitiois reasonable maid hym kig randerit ye strenthis ye cuntre garnist munition vittallis pleseir schort tyme efter king steuin send ane herald kig dauid scotland chargead hym cu ony tary ingland geif ith fidelite homage landis northubirland huntingtoun cubir itimation gif refusit inuaid wt battal king dauid answerit yt gaif aith afore yir ladis mald wife sen lefull violat aith wald erar stand ye faith yt he mist tha applaud new inuasouris king steuin mouit answer send ye duk glocester ane army northubirland quhilk stude ye tyme vnder ye empire scottis maid incredibyll slauchter heirschippis ti thairof ye scottis mouit yir iniuris ceissit n quhil yai recopensit ye said iniur ingland ye erlis marche menteth angus went ingland ane gret power faucht allirton quhare ye inglismen war discofist mony noblis ingland wt said duk brocht presoneris scotland king steuyn throw discofitour costranit redeme ye said duk h noblis huge money payment thair redeption gaif ouir al richt clame yt successouris micht ony way haue northubirland cubir huntingtoun nochtheles efter ye redemptio noblis become penitent yi discharge foresaid come northubirlad quhare maid gret slauchter heirschipp throw boudis yairof recouer dominion king dauid resist yir iniuris gaderit ane army deliuerit mynd othir expel inglisme al bou dis tenand empire elli al atanis de eft cumyng roxburch come yt bischop york maid peace iiii monethis vnd yir coditionis inglismen sal delyuer northubirland fre hary price scotland becaus thir coditionis war kepit king dauid come ane new army northubirlad left na inglisme lyue kig steuyn reuenge yir iniuris com gret ordinance roxburgh constranit return hame ony inuasion scottis becaus noblis wald assist purpos last peace tretit vnder yir co ditionis northubirland huntingtoun sal remane vnder empire hary prince scotland richt moder cuber remane wt hym richt kyng dauid fader thir landis ye said hary successouris sall mak homage al kingis ingland ye tyme pof deith hary prince scotland orison maid king dauid noblis hovv malcolm first nepot vvas maid prince scotlad vvillia secoud nepot erle northubirland deith king dauid sindry gret clerkis ca xviii peace ratifijt maner king steuyn returnit kent king dauid cubir quhare remanit certane tyme reparyng towne ca lele new walles pthir war dedis kyng steuyn thrid ye regne iiii yeir mald ye emprice come ingland ane army recouer hir heritage left behind hir gawfrid hir husband wt hir young son angeos hir cu myng baith ye erle ch ster glacester mony othir yair freindis went hir opinion becaus ye residew ye noblis assistit king steuyn ye decision yi ple cotinewit lang weris ingland wt sindry chancis fortoun ye mene tyme hary hir sone maryit elynore quhilk heritour ye turing ye erldomes poyteris man throw quhilk supportit come ane gret army ingland nochtheles quhen ye battallis war reddy iune peace maid maner hary sall haue ane part ye landis tenand croun ingland sustene hym life king steuyn efter deith succeid ye h le empire ingland yi elynor maryit afore lewis dalphin frace partit hym becaus scho co unit hym proximite blud scho bure hary ane son namit e hard quhilk efter heritour inglad normady angeos gascunye richt ad heritour duchery turyng poyte man mod sic thi gi done ingland hary son kig dauid scotlad deceissit gret lament pepyll left behynd hym haue said afore thre sonis smal age buryit ye abbay kelso ye yeir fra redemptioun imiclii yeris ye deith yi hary richt displesand king dauid ane prince singular virtew gud maneris eft deith hary ye noblis couenit f th al partis scotland mak solation king dauid ye dolour yt tuk ye deith son yit becaus hary left behynd hym iii sonnis iii douchteris lyue thay thocht ye realm weil garnist king dauid seing noblis richt dolorus heuy ye deith h son callit yame ane ba ket said th maner tender freindis trew faith perseuerand deligece weil richt patent yi day howbeit na experience tyme bigane bene thairof se myndes geuyn na le compassion heuynes ony awin sonis deceissit ye ar cumyn mak consolation dolour haue tane ye deith son becaus may rander yow condigne thankis tyme superseid quhill may mair plesandly ynouch confes thing yt baith body saule dettit yow forthir concernyng ye mater yt ye ar cumyn schawyng humanyte towart ye may haue mynd wordis parentis quhom beleue eikit ye nowmer sactis ye singular deuote life he institute youth worschip god reuerence quhilk doi na thing vane bot euery thig disponis h infinite wisdom su gud fyne quhen cosidder ye wyse deuote comandementis parentis baith aduersite gud chance ar paisit equale balace fader moder brethir sister ar passit fra yi fragil life nix follow sen ar mortale al aduersite suld paciently sufferit w le corruppit lyfe list thirl self eternal deith thik thairfore yt suld erar reiose god gaif ane son h special fauour quhilk he conquest beniuolence al pepyl gud hauyngis tha sorrow deith quhat iniure yow haue posse lang tyme tollerance yit beleif sall nocht lang absentit fra nne trais ing hym yat maist pyssant kyng suddanly brocht hym otheris freindis quhilkis ar preeminance glore yan wer sorowfull vail ye mercyfull god he geuin w sick esperance beleif son passit manent glore quhair intend al cum prayis god may worthy quhen ule n seuir corporall preson pa felicite quhare traist gone eftir yi orison noblis went thair lugeingis hauand gret admiration ye king constant deuotion mynd sone eftir kyng dauid causit malcolme eldest sonne hary afore rehersit declarit prince scotland ye nobillis sworne opinion eftir went north birland maid william secund nepot erle thairof eftir yi went carlele quha maid hary prince ingland nycht take aith ya northumbirland hutingtoun fra empire scottis schort tyme eft king dauid fell ne heuy maledy quhilk pers ueris ye end lyfe quhen fand self went kirk tuke ye realm fra corruppit bot causit seruandis virtews occupationis neuir vicious wourd wes hard mouth na insolence within hous na ri tus banketting surfet collation vsit h cumpany al wourdis werkis seruad wer ay direckit sum gud fyne ony seditioun displeseir sic cherite concord seruadis apperit vnd ane mynd amyte tyme kyng dauid wer mony nobill clerkis richard scottisman channoun sanct uictouris abbay quhare wes eftir buryit peter lumbardy doctour theologie bischop paris siclik wes thay dayis graciane gaderit decretis giddir ane volumen pand sa endis heir twelf buke thir cronikillis heir begynnis xiii buke croniklis scotland pof king malcolme madin gret de th scotlad hovv king hary tuk malcolme vveris aganis france sindry aganis malcolme said hary ca primo dauid buryit yi wise epot malcolme gottin hary sonne uad bot xiii yeir age wes maid kyng yocht wes nocht ganand sustene sa gret charge tendir age yit apperit maneris virtew ane nobill prince wes nurist fra first youth sa clene haly life yat wes namyt malcolme ye madin first yeir empire hary price ingland tuke ye croun throw quhilk kyng steuin tuke sic malancoly deceissit tyme wes ane miserable derth throw boundis scotlad sone eft followit ane violent pest howbeit wes contagius ye gret mortalite baith man best mortalite gaif occasioun somerled attempt ane mater hiear besynes semyt estait becaus saw ta half ye realme slane pest othir hunger come ane huge peple co ques croun slew elli heryit thaym yat repugnant mynd bot attemptatis lang vnpunist erle angus slew iim chasit hym self ireland hary secound name kyng ingland heirand yat kyng malcolme dantit ennymes sort dred suld gif hym occasioun insolent inuaid ingland battall thairfore counsall nobillis h send ane herald kyng malcolme chargeand hym cum london mak homage seruice hym ye landis cumbir northubirland huntyngtoun siclik dauid gudschir afore hary first certification gif suld tak fra hym said landis kyng malcolme obey yi charge howbeit wes vnder condition suld nocht preiudiciall liberte scotland king hary weir yi tyme aganis lewis vi kyng france constrani kyng malcolm pa france yocht kig malcolme ane saif coduct pa repas yit mycht nocht ganestand kyng haryis charge tyme attoure wes meik desirus peace battall youcht knew detestable iniurius pa weirfair aganis cofiderat freind kyng france yit thocht becaus wes constranit mycht haue sufficient mater excuse hym self quhen tyme occurrit obeyit kyng hary pointis voyage kyng hary inuadit france gret iniuris seg town tullus tuk hym kyng malcolme expeditionis weris kyng malcolme suld incurre sic hatrent indignatioun samyn mycht thaym last kyng hary brokyn gret nobillis ingland malcolme scotland kyng malcolme eftir returnyng ambassatouris mak eftir thair ane tyme beleuit thairfore kyng france suld haue litill hatrent aganis hym mater fra vnderstude verite kyng hary satifyit yt gaif occasioun seditioun betuix malcolme nobillis tymes bigane bot renew samyn displeseir causit kyng malcolme return agane york eftir returnyng thairto complaynit noblis kyng malcolme reuelit secretis army franchemen na litill damage slauchter pepill said thairfore samin wes sufficient reason depriue hym landis cumbir huntyngtoun northubirland youcht kyng malcolme mony sufficient reasonis declarit yir ymaginationis vane effect yit kyng hary afore kyng malcolmes returnyng scotland send wourd nobillis yairof kyng malcolme renuncit clame said landis mak hym odious realme liegis al sone wes returnit scotland mony nobillis conspirit aganis hym segit hym castell bertha howbeit knew na thing yir iniuris wrocht aganis hym slycht inglismen nochtheles fra thay knew verite thay skalit fra sege askit hym mercy kyng malcolme mouit thir iniuris seand landis haldin wranguslye fra hym rasit army inuadit ingland sindry displeseiris last eftir sindry chance battall ane couention wes maid carleil peace maid maner northumbirland sall pa vnder empire kynng hary bot cumbir huntingtoun sall remane afore vnder empire malcolme phovv kyng malcolme punist syndry conspiratouris hovv murrayis thair rehellion vvar disherist put murray ca ii trubill beand mesit maner afore rehersyt followyt ane othir howbeit wes le motioun angus thane galloway seand atteptat micht cu effect quhen yai wer quietlie done come ane gret cupany vsurpe ye croun nochtheles army wes discofist gilcrist erle angus hym self chasit quhiterne quhare ane girth dedicat ye honour sact niniant king malcolme wald brek ye girth nochtheles comandit ane gard wait angus sa lang quhill come king malcolm dant insolence suld nocht haue occasioun sic attemptatis intymes cuming cofiscat maist part landis tuke sonne pledge gud reule hym tymes cummyng angus seyng mycht nocht sustene estait quhen landis wer taikin fra hym afore schoif heid halyrudhous deceissit ane channon thairof nocht lang eftir rais ane othir trubil siclik motioun murrayis aduise gildo thair capitane heryit ro bogeall mar gareach buch quhen mernis slew ye kingis seruandis quhilkis wer send inquire ye motiue yair iniuris punys thir attemptatis kyng malcolme send gilcrist erle angus ane army murray nochtheles murrayis put hym flycht kyng malcolme nochtwithstading yi discofitour come displayit baner ouir spay dantit ye murrayis syndry victoryis punition thair offencis comandit nane thaym saiffit except wyffis barnis agit personis exemple othir subdittis moue rebellyon aganis hym tymes cumyng murrayis beand wyse neir distroyit al partis realme kyng comandit new pepyll set thair la dis inhabitation thairof mene tyme somerled thane argyle quhilk banist ha e schawin ireland traisting kig malcolme odius nobyllis comonis cruelte vsit aganis ye murrayis thocht expedi assailye new chace fortoun returnit certane nakit scotland bot attemptatis com mair infelicite afore vincust hingit ane ie comand king malcolme phovv byschop sanct andros persuadit malcolme mariage synd actis done king malcolme deith ca iii malcolme void solicitude charge battall hauand ennymes na part set engyne gouern realm iustice becaus two sister reddy mariage namit margaret adame maryit first duke bertanye othir erle holland sic thingis done set ane counsall scone certane materis concerning ye common weill nobyllis beand assemblit rais vp ane man syngulare prudence namit arnald bischop sanct andros said thir wise ane thyng maist nobyll prince wald say commoun weill praying thairfore thy hyenes geif eiris thairto sal pertene na le thy syngulare honour comon weil lang ago thow tuk purpos pa thy tyme frute maryage sen thow tuke purpos thi tender youth howbeit yele virtew yit gif thow geif eiris quhilkis neuir exhortit yt vane purpos thou wyll change thy mynd vnproffitabyll gouernance thy realme quhat thyng may mair honest mariage quhilk institute mynois kyng crete ligurgus kyng lacedemon solon athene howbeit thay war maist cyuyll prudent men thair constitutionis bot allanerly god maist honest proffitabyll nature gyf wyse prudent begynnar warld found ony othir thyng mair proffytabyll mariage commandit weill man pattoure quhat mair proffytabyll bryngis leuand creaturis ye warld quhat mair naturall coniunctioun male female youcht thow wald allege crist mony othir sanctis leiffit chaist say sic lyfe nocht ordanit publict personis yit euery stait bot allanerly religious men precheouris lawis bot thow art chosyn ane othir office say gouerne thy pepyl iustyce leif succession thy body may proffet commoun weill efter thy deith quhat thyng may mair plesand proffitabyll haue ane lady thy fallow quhilk may gei consolatioun euery doloure aduersite may fall pleseir thy heill mei quhen angir apper cure thy body refresche thy spreit quhen thow art wery dispair nocht bot sum lady may found rycht aggreabyll thy conditionis othir pryuat personis mycht haue solicitude gret cummer espying sic thingis bot thow suld haue na feir thairof fynaly quhat thyng mair dulce plesand kyngis princis tha haue child thair bodyis quhilkis ar maist necessar thaym weir peace peace thair commoun weill may gouernit maist faithfully thaym tyme weir thay may thair lieutennant inuincibyl campionis beir sic chargis thay sall na le terroure thy fayis munitioun thy pepyl thairfore said prudent wyse philosophouris men ar nocht cumyn yi warld allanerly yair awin weill bot sum part weill thair freindis thair child sum part weill thair realme cuntre specyally thay ar maid god nature publict personis heirfore sen na thyng sa commendabyll sa honest yit sa proffitabyll thaym he publik gouernauce leif successioun behynd thaym commoun weill traist fynaly thow sall nocht ane thyng mair displesand god defraude thy realme successioun quhen byschop arnold assailyeit thir mony othir reasonis persuade kyng maryage kyng mair repugnant samyn afore institute sa youth dedicat virginite crist nochtheles god prouidit realme suld nocht want ayris gouerne samyn iustice nocht lang efter kyng malcolme fell ane heuy malady noy thairof constranit tak peace nichtbouris mene tyme foundit abbay sanct reule callit sact andros quhilk biggit se gret magnificence bot dotat small rentis sufficient ynouch sustene diuyne seruyce thairfore channonis said abbay leuit maist feruent deuotioun seruyce god becaus thay na prouocatioun lustis superflew rentis nocht geuyn auarice pleseir bot onely thair contemplatioun phe foundit al abbay cowpa efter ordoure cistius dotat ye honour ye blissit virgyne mary mony landis possessionis pat tyme thomas cantorbury ane man syngulare lyfe deuotioun exilit ingland kyng malcolme fynaly vexit lang infirmite deceissit iedburgh xii yeir regne ane come schane fourtene dayis togydder afore deith lang terrybyll bemis body buryit dunfermelyng fra incarnatioun ane thousand ane hundred lxv yeris pof kyng vvyllyam actis hovv scottis suste mair displeseir theuis externe vveris hovv kyng vvyllyam vvas tane anvvik ca iiii malcolme buryit maner dunfermelyng wyllya brothir callit syngulare iustice lyoun maid kyng efter coronatioun thocht na thyng sa honest recouer landis reft afore fra brothir king malcolme send ambassat uris kyng hary desyryng northumbirland restorit hym becaus pertenit hym kyndly herytage king hary answerit suld haif al thyngis pertenand hym reason sa wald eldaris afore cum london make homage landis cumber huntyngtoun kyng wylliam sone efter come london quhen maid obedience said landis desyrit northumbirland restorit hym king hary sit thir desyris saying land quhilkis war annerit crown mycht nocht seuerit thairfra ony priuat auctorite nochtwithsta ding promittit conuene nobyllis ane counsall fulfyll desyris gif thay war found reasonabyll quhen tyme occurrit mair expedient mene tyme kyng hary went ane army normandy causit kyng wyllyam mony othir nobyllis scotland pa hym sayd iornay kyng wyllyam wald refuse yir chargis tyme aduenture samyn war occasion repell desyris last quhen taryit lang tyme army na esperance recouer landis desyrit lycence returne hame quhilk beand gret difficulte grantit kyng wyllyam nobyllis come throw ingland ye maist haiste way mycht scotland set ingyne punys cruelteis done theuis tratouris realme act estimatioun maist proffytabyll thyng mycht haue done gyf ony wyse men wyll consydder baith dammage commoditeis realme thay sall fynd skaith damage done theuis ar mair displesand skaithful w ony weiris ingland oftimes fynd innocent pepyll passingeris murdryst theuis sobir geir thair vaiage yit thir displeseiris ar bot small respect othir crueltris iniuris done thir theuis quhen thay ar gaderit thay birn cuntre slay commonis quhilkis may nocht resist thaym mony othir cruelteis mair insufferabyll w ony vncouth weiris howbeit samyn nocht done sa opinly attour slauchter heirschippis maid vncouth weris ar nocht sa miserabyll vnworthy rehersit thir cruelteis done strang theuis tratouris euery chance battall sum consyderatioun concernyng estait pepyll bot thir bludy fleschouris theuis makis heirschippis slauchter ony mercy quhare thay cum thairfore prudence nobil prince dantyng sic strang lyminaris mair commendit haue slane mony thowsandis vncouth ennymes psic thyngis done kyng wyllia send ambassatouris kyng hary desyryng northumberland afore restorit hym certifying gyf samyn war nocht done fauour suld takin force battall kyng hary seand othir leif northubirland elli fecht se battall aganis scottis auise noblis restorit kyng wyllyam sa mekyll northumbirland inhabit afore malcolme gudschir king wyllyam thocht nocht samyn refusit howbeit wald nocht rycht ye hail landis yit kyng hary yer efter penitent yi contract recouer said landis persuadit residew northumbrianis quhilkis stude vnder empire prouoke scottis frequent heirschippis battall yat mycht haue sum occasioun inuaid scottis recouer landis huntyngtoun cumbir northumberland empire al sone yir iniuris heirschippis war maid scottis wardan scottis bordour desirit restitution becaus na thing done according iustice wardanis rasit gret cumpanyis maid heirschippis slauchter athir side yit becaus king hary th tyme france corne thay wa content sydis defend thair awin ony forthir inuasion othir quhill nixt yeir nixt symer kyng wyllyam come ane army cumbir rycht wyng geuyn gilcrist quhilk singulare manheid virtew prouyn oftymes tyme kyng malcolme maryit syster ye left geuyn ane cous g yngis namyt rowland myddyl ward king willia quh ye scottis war arraying maner kyng hary send ane herald kyng wyllyam desiring hym ska l army ony inuasioun redres expensis maid e wer king wyllyam answerit rasit nocht h army desire money yit gaif first occasioun battal bot ay cotent haue leiffit awin forthir nocht sa inhumane desyrus blude bot wald gladly skaill army sa landis quhilkis pertenit hym iust herytage war restorit last quhen kyng wyllyam waistit cubir come anwyk northumbirland quhare abaid mony dayis haue battall ingland mene tyme inglismen lay sa clois togydder ony noyis ordyn yat na scottisme knew quhare thay war kyng wyllyam irkit lang residence anwik seand na ennimes appere maid hym afore returning scotland sum notabyll vassalage send al army heir thair maist awful weirly incursionis throw cuntre left none bot ane nowmer pepyl hym self thair returnyng incontinent ane buschement inglismen come hym ansenyeis scotland war nocht suspeckit inglismen quhyll kyng circulit thaym syde fynaly tane away ony scottisman wy saif onely ane cumpany quhilkis war left said hym tyme pkyng wyllyam tane wyse anwyk xiii day iuly x yeir regne fra incarnatioun e thousand ane hundred lxxiiii yeris lang eftir brocht king hary prisonere norma nochtwithstandyng trubyl fel king willyam becaus na slauchter maid takyng weris continewit styl betuix ingland scotland quhill last peace maid vnder thir conditionis captiuite king wylliam northumbirland sall remane vnder dominion inglismen cumber huntingtoun sal remane afore vnder empire scottis phovv sanct thomas cant bury vvas martyrit hovv king vvillia vvas redemit hovv gilbert defendit liberte scotlad aganis ye paipir ligat sindry meruellis hovv abbayis abi brothok hadingtoun vvas foundit ca v tyme thomas bischop cantorbury quhilk ani afore obstinat mynd defence liberte haly kirk recunsaled king hary requeist sindry gret princis bot recou saling succedit gret damage within schort time eft king hary richt impacient sustene ye hatrent within breist quhilk consauit aganis sact thomas send familiaris houshald men namit wyllyam bretoun hew mo well willyam trace reginald fittis finaly slew haly bischop me within kirk cantorbury hie alter sanct benedict apon sext day follow ng ye natiuite crist yeir nixt following king hary returning ireland efter put gret affliction rebellion aganis empire arriuit normandy com ye cathedral kirk ro ne quhare solempne aith p rgit hym slauchter sanct thomas yit within dayis become sa penitent lynnyng sepulture sanct thomas salt teris askit thrid eskit ye nowmer sactis yeir apperit ane meruellous sterne standing styl baith day nycht mony othir sternis samyn quhen ye vnhappy chance kyng wyllya diuulgat throw realme brothir dauid erle lewcester lycence king hary come scotland gouerne realme quhil brothir war redemit al sone stabyllit realme gud iustice send richard bischop sanct andros mony othir noblis normady king hary maid kyng wyllyamis r nsoun vnder maner king wyllyam sal pay ane hundreth thousand poundis striueling redemption tane half payit argent cotent sickir payment othir half sal geif cumber huntingtoun northumbirland vnder ane reuersioun ay quhil residew ransoun war payit ye kyng ingland attoure kyng wyllyam sall moue na weir aganis ingland retention thir landis fra empire mair securite yi premissis foure ye strange castellis within scotland yt say berwik edinburgh roxburgh salbe delyuerit inglisme ni hadis sic thing done followit new trubyll scotland g l r galloway ane cruell ane vnhappy man tuk purpos conque croun slauchter heirschippis kirkis ingland al sone refourmit yame come scotland summond ye bischoppis thairof northamptoun eft thair conuentioun began persuade thaym lang orisoun obey ye archebischop york saying al othir realmes ane bischoppe heir thair complayntis yt yai mycht eschew gret expensis laubouris deuoluyng thair causis rome becaus na metropolitane kirk wes scotland quhair thay mycht conuene thair consultatioun best wes obey archebischop york way thay mycht eschew surfet expensis hauand decision yair actionis esy proces thair superior answerit gilbert ane young man gret eruditioun quhilk wes send king suffir na thyng done preiudiciall cardinall realme said maner scotland sen first tuke ye faith crist wes neuir subdewit na othir bischop bot allanerlie cristis vicar thairfore wes ane thing rycht vnreasonabil th cardinal desyre ye scottis subdewit inglismen consideryng ilk ane thaym he weir petually othir howbeit apperit honest treit co cord peace amang thaym gif occasioun battall attoure na thing wes done bischoppis scotland worthy depriue thaym thayr liberte gif ony wrang wer done scotland thay mycht decidit sufficiently within realme ciuill prudent men gif ony gret chargis occurrit thay decidit kyng thir siclik reasonis desyrit haly fader paip thirl nocht ye realme sotland ony iurisdiction empire ennymes cosidering neuir offendit sait becaus gilbert defendit weill liberte scotland wes maid bischop caithnes haly lyfe wes eikit ye noumer sanctis sindry meruellis wer sene yeir albioun mydsymerday callit natiuite sanct iohne aptist wes sic vehement schour hail slew mony small bestial pepill wer housis yi mene tyme wer strikin erd violence samyn september son obscurit lycht noun twa houri ony eclipse interposition cluddis yorkschire wes sa gret thundir vncouth flammys mony abbayis kirkis wer brynt samyn lang eftir tyme wes biggit abbay abirbrothok ordour sanct benidict dedicat sact thomas canterbery dotat king willia maist richely fra redemptioun imiclxxviii yeris samyn tyme ye abbay haddingtoun wes foundit adama quene kyng williamis moder quhilk deceissit sone eftir wes dotat phovv pape alexander send kyng vvilliam ane rose full balme hovv gilcrist vve dish rist ye slauchter vvife gret cruelteis done turki cristin pepill hovv king vvilliam dantit ye theuis tuke gilcrist fauoure ca vi schort tyme eftir kig willia send ambassatouris mak obedience paip alexander ye thrid ye paip sone eftir send king willia ane gold n rose full balme sindry new priuilegis cocernyng ye liberte haly kirk ye samyn tyme gilcrist slew wyfe suspitioun yat aganis adultry king willia mouit yi contemptioun banist hym scotland kest doun hous ground gilcrist ane brothir namyt bredus quhilk afore trubil gat ye landis ogiluy quhome ogiluyis tuke yair begynnyng yi tyme kyng hary gart rander castel edinburgh b request bischop durame kyng william william eftir deith first wyfe maryit emengarda doucht ye erle bewmont quhilk wes gottyn kyng williamis bastard normand sister mariage peace wes roborat betuix scotland ingland sic maner nane yame mycht resset othir rebellis within thair realmes thus wes gilcrist quhilk wes banist ore ingland wyffis slauchter constranit returne scotland quhare two sonny lang tyme ane miserable lyfe vnknawin thair pure habites ony pepill amang ye woddis co cuntre pat tyme soldane inuadit haly land heuy weris recouerit ierusalem mony othir townis quhilkis wer tyme vnder dominioun cristin men far enragit cruelte soldane culd nocht sac blude cristin pepill hym wer slane xxxm futmen im twa hundreth horsmen sic wer bischoppis prelatis maisteris hospitalis ye ame thir miserabill calamiteis quhen yai wer diuulgat maid pepill lament sorowfull murnyng attoure incredible noum nobill men wer haldyn captiuite quhilkis send yair freindis al cristin princis support thair redemptioun schew miserie displeseiris thay sufferit thair townis segit thair self brocht captiuite quhais infinite sorowis wer sa importable thay mouit euery pepill miseration teris kyng hary mouit thir insufferabill cruelteis done cristin pepill promittit cum haistly ane army thair support bot purpos wes impeschit sindry trublis quhilk followit realme sonne hary quhilk wes crounyt hym afore conspirit assistence sindry princis realme put hym fra croun thus wes co stranit ceis fra hailsum purpos yi tyme kyng willia come ro punist makulyene makbenne mony othir wekit lymmaris ilis sic thingis done kyng william come abirbrothok coman craft sme ceis expensis micht ryse maist magnificence honour god returnyng castell bertha saw auenture gilcrist two sonnis castand scherattis thair meit nocht knawing quhat thay wer thay wer disgisit nochtheles gret meruell sa plesand young men thay apperit wer occupyit sic vile laubour incotinent gilcrist beld heid fel kneis afore hym said gif ony mercy tynt men ye maist reuthful prince quhen thay ar punist condignely thair offence beseik luf crist sinfull pepil quhen sparit nocht sched precious blude thair redemption haue piete reuth thir miserable sonnis quhilkis he sufferit gret displescir ony cryme e thaym comittit last quhen kyng william inquiri hym quhat wes wes brocht sic miserie teris fell sa fast fra ene ythand sychis mycht nocht schaw lang tyme quhat last said gylcrist maist vnhappy sorowfull creature erd quhilk alace put handis thy blude thairfore disherist landis exilit ingland thir two sonnis becaus mycht nocht suffer schamefull iniuris done inglismen obieckand dayly gret felicite sum tyme derisioun al lawis maid laitly aganis outlawis aithir realmes constranit cum heir sonnis quhare leif rutis herbis symer castis scherettis thou seys sustene liffis wynter heirfore gif ony reuth piete thy gyf thy indignatioun mesit lang tyme byrun haue mercy sorowfull lyfe remyt w oure offence desyre nocht restorit oure heritage honour bot allanerly thy fauoure grace gyf thow wyll condiscend heirto thow sall onely conques gret honoure fame exemple piete bot ane renownit prynce amang pepyl wyn gret merite afore god schawyng thy self followar cryst geuar mercy peace pthe kyng mouit thir wourdis remembryng gret manheid quhylk sa oft prouyn afore syndry ieoperdyis honour commoun weill scotland seyng hym deieckit fra gret honoure supreme myserie nocht onely remyttit offence bot pe uisly embrasit hym army commandit hym gu comfort syne gaif hym hors money follow hym forfair quhare restorit hym two sonnis thair landis except sa mekyll war geuyn afore kyng wyllyam abbay abirbrothok efter gylcryst perseuerit gud faith obeysance kyng becaus eldest sonne deceissit ony airis othir sonne vnabyll mary gaif mekyll herytage abirbrothok efter deith sonne na le deuotioun gaif resydew landis said abbay thairfore gylcryst two sonnis ar buryit said abbay sanct katherynis alter thair superscription schawis youcht kyng wyllyam geuyn wyse byggyng said abbay yit left na thyng vndone micht pertene ane gud prynce gouernit realme iustyce geuand engyne reward gud men virtewis personis punys lymmaris phe maid syndry lawis punys theuys oppressouris cuntre quhylkis war ouir prolixt put buke phovv kyng vvyllyam recouerit landis hovv rychard kyng ingland philip king france vvent vvith gret armyis iovvry thair vassalage trubyll hovv erle dauid returnit haly land foundit lundoris ca vii quhyll sic thyngis war done scotland kyng hary emprice sonne deceissit ingland quhome succedit sonne richard hary h first son wes deceissit pkyng richard eftir coronatioun full curage spreit gaderit ane strang army pa haly land maid peace nychtbouris na trubill suld follow realme absence afore iornay rande berwik roxburgh striuelyng kyng william sa mekil northumbirland wes tane fra hym afore last battall wik gaif ouir landis cumbir huntyngtoun vndir thir coditionis munitionis strenthis thairof sall remane vndir capitanis remanent landis thairof inhabit scottis attoure haue beneuolence scottis dischargit ye sidew kyng williamis ranson except xm poundis quhilkis tuke allanerly support weris quhen kyng william resa al landis castellis yi maner maid brothir dauid rle huntyngtoun send vm men support kyng richard weris kyng richard left brothir iohne gouernour inglad returnyng maid sister sonne arthure duk normandy heritour ye croun ingland failyeing succession brothir nocht lang eftir kyng richard come mony nobil men dukis erlis baronis massilia ane port prouance quhare pullit vp salis ane hundreth l schippis pa ierusalem fra redemptioun ane thousand ane hundreth lxxxxi yeris ye samyn maner phillip kyng france come port ianis mony nobill men spirituall temporall arriuit achon ane strang town iowry quhilk wes tyme vnder empire sarazenis beltit samyn strait sege quhill kyng phillip wes lyand thus sege achon king richard arriuyt ile cipre tuke purpos went ony purge ye samyn cristis ennymes sone eftir displayit baner come bludye swerd throw said ile finalie tuke kyng cipre douchter presoneris quhen deliuerit ile cristin pepil pullit vp salis meit kyng phillip achon aduenture met ane flot sarazenis ye gait quhilkis wer cumyng support said toun eftir lang terrible bergane sank ane large part sarazenis vnder seis ye remanent put flycht syne went forthwart kyng phillip sege continewit lang tyme yi toun throw ye gret defence ye sarazenis maid samyn howbeit vter wallis wer brokin sindry partis force rammis othir instrumentis cheualry last kyng phillip fell sic infirmite wes constranit returne france nochttheles kyng richard determit nocht depart fra sege achon quhill samyn wer expugnat mene tyme hapnit ane scot namyt oliuer said toun wes banist afore scotland fled ye sarazenis lang conuersatioun thaym thair perfite langage nane yame knawing quhat wes oliuer wes yan sodiour ane toure toun quhare na trinschis wallis wer beyond ye samyn happinnit auenture se amang ye wache erle dauid huntington ane h kinnisme namit iohne durward quhome wes lag tyme afore acquentit incontinent cryit hym name desyryng vnder assurance commoun hym efter certane comonyng olyuer set ane houre geif entres erle dauid al army toun sa erle dauid wald restore hym land heritage scotland houre set erle dauid come ane gret power toure afore rehersit quhare gat enteres army incontinent gret noyis clamoure come throw town ye gret slauchter pepyll foundyn kyng richard seand morow scottis standart wallis enterit town within schort tyme efter brocht ane gret castell quhilk stude nocht far fra town rewyne attoure rane mony othir gret townis strenthis iowry quhylk war takyn afore fra cristin men cruelte sarazenis war nocht ane wyckit contentioun rais betuix inglismen franche men desyre honouris last quhen kyng rychard dystroyit town achon returnand italy ane suddane te pest seuerit nauy throw quhilk destitute freindis fynaly treasoun certane euyll cristin men brocht hary empryoure schip erle dauid tyl regeand tempest sa brokin yat mony thaym quhilkis war hir perist narrowly eschapit lyfe efter tane inhabitantis land brocht alexandria quhare haldyn lang tyme preson quhyll last cost marchandis uenice brocht constantinople nocht lang efter brocht uenis quhare redemit merchandis ingland brocht flanderis thair pullit vp salis returne scotland quhen lytyll departit fra land dreuyn vnmercyfull tempest nocht far fra norroway scheitland incredybyll dangeir finaly quhen maid ane voit byg ane kirk honoure virgyne mary gif war fortunat eschape dangeir seis arryuit tay besyde dunde far fra sanct nicholas chapell ony rudder taikyll gaif thankis god blyssyt virgyne delyueryng hym fra sic extreme peryll place quhare arriuit callit allectum bot efter cummyng changit name callid dunde quhilk sig ifyis langage gift god king wyllyam heirand returnyng brothir quhome beleuit mony yeris afore deceissit come maist diligence dunde embrasit hym syne gaif thankis god blyssyt vyrgyne mary delyuerit brothir fra sa mony dangeris efter th gart maik generall processionis throw realme geif thankis god happy returnyng brothir sic thingis done ane conuentioun maid dunde quhylk licence geuyn erle dauid byg ane abbay quhat place plesit scotland dotat landis rentis pleseir kyng wyllyam gaif mony priuilegis dunde quhilkis induris thir dayis dauid nocht refusyng ye beneuolence brothir byggit ane abbay callit lundoris efter ordour sanct benedict ane thing thair richt meruellus na man hurt abbay eddaris thir eddaris lyis myddis ane vale circulit wod rynnand watter throw quhilk thay burgeon mair plentuous nowmer tha euir sene ony othir ti howbeit na gett skaith yair haue sene oung barnis play amang thaym damage hurt following phovv kyng richard returni ingland hovv kyng vvyllyam punist gret ymmaris realme na iuite prince alexander coronatioun kyng iohne hovv paip send ane suerd kyng vvillia ca viii kyng richard schort tyme efter redemit sa huge money mekyl al syluer goldyn vessel inglad cunyeit redemptioun thus fynaly delyuerit essauit ingland gret triumphe kyng wyllyam heirand returnyng king richard inglad come brothir erle da id london gaif hym two thousand mark striuelyng waistit money payment ransoun weris thir humaniteis followit gret amite tendernes betuix two kingis ye mene tyme kyng wyllyam f gret infirmite within ingland becaus pepyll beleuit deith rais gret trubyll partis scotland sindry lymmaris tra ing iustice expire deith inuadit pepyll heirschippis slauchter al partis pnocht lang efter kyng wyllyam conualescit infirmite returnit scotland sic deligence mony yir limmaris war tane punist effering thair demeritis principal mouar namit herald brocht kyng fyrst ene put syne geldit hyngit efter apon ane gallous attoure freindis war geldit samyn maner na succession suld follow thaym tymes cummyng yeir following mair derth tha euir sene afore boll beir mycht scarsly coft v cronis pand nixt yeir quhilk fra incarnation ane thousand ane hundred nynte nyne mair abundance plente euir hard afore yeir kyng wyllyamis wyfe namit armaga da delyuerit prince alexander samyn yeir kyng richard ingland deceissit quho iohne brothir succedit iii yeir following alexander maid prince scotland samyn yeir send ane legat fra paip kyng william presentit hym ane swerd wt hiltis scheith gold set mony precious stanis legat al presentit ane bonat tyre maid maner diademe purpoure hew signify defendar faith tyme mony indultis priuilegis war gratit paip ye libe te haly kirk scotlad comandit king wyllya ye saterday salbe haldyn halyday fra xii houri furth none quhilk sall schawin pepyll sound bell na prophane laubouris exercit fra tyme furth quhil monunday pepyll perseu ir allanerly diuyne seru ce gret punitioun ordanit thaym war found rebelland thairto hovv kyng vvyllyam kyng iohne vvar confiderat togydder mariage kyng vvyllyamis haly life liberalite kirk hovv toun perth tuk beginnyng ca ix efter kyng willyam returnit lo make homage landis northumbirland cumbir huntingtoun al sone maid homage king iohne desirit hym pa hym france aganis kyng philip becaus refusit band eldaris maid afore france king iohne clamit agane landis foresaid tuk ane gret nowmer guddis samyn maner po nd ye proffet bygane nochtheles nobyllis ingland knawing rycht dyffycyll haue weir baith france scotland atanis causit saidis guddis redressit yeir followyng sa vehement frost scotland na pluch micht put land afore myddis marche attoure aill sa frosyn sald pound wechtis efter quhilk followit ane huge snaw gret mortalite bestyall al ane continewall trymblyng erd quaik followit fra epiphany day februar efter wynter kyng iohne endit weris france haue occasioun battall aganis ye scottis began byg ane castel fornens berwyk kyng wyllyam aduertist heirof send ambassatouris kyng iohne desiring hym se k na occasioun battall b g na strenthis fornens hym becaus gat nocht bot repuls h desiris come ane gret power kest ye said castel king iohne reuenge thir iniuris rasit ane army cum scotland kyng wyllyam preuene trauell come bordouris yit quhe baith armyis war reddy fecht thay war seuerit interuention prudent men finaly baith ye armyis skalit two kyngis come york quhare peace amite roborat betuix thaym vnder thir conditionis king wyllyamis two douchteris namit isobell margaret sal mary two sonnis king iohne namit hary rychard fyne gif ane deit tothir sall succeid crowne ingland quhilkis king wyllyam sal geif sufficient drowry attour castel yat cassyn laitly kyng william sal remane ye samyn maner neuir edifiit tymes cumyng plege towquhare obseruatioun al thir premiss nyne nobyll men scotland salbe delyuerit king iohne conuentioun king wyllyam resignit landis northumbirland cumbir huntingtoun handis king iohne sonne prince alexander micht sesit thairintyll siclik consuetude obseruar iosing thir landis scotland yat thay suld haldyn kyng ingland homage maid hym successouris scottis kingis iosit brukit yame tyme efter yt thir two kingis wa thair counsal york brocht thaym ane child gret bewte ritour sindry landis ingland bot trublit meruellus infirmite ane ene consumit flux euyll humouris hand pynit away na power toung yit ta syde pthe medcynaris seing hym haue sic contrarius infirmiteis nocht knawing ye caus thairof iugit hym incurabyll nochtheles kyng wyllyam maid ane croce hym restorit hym incontinent heill syndry beleuit th done myracle god virtew nobyl man sall nocht hyd vnknawin pepyl nocht lang fter kyng wyllya returnit scotland dotat kirkis newbottell melros dunfermelyng sindry landis fou dit ane new bischoprik callit argyle landis sufficient sustene samyn sic thingis done king wyllyam went castell bertha within schort dayis efter atter tay almond rais sa terrybyll inundatioun preis brak ye wallis bertha drownit mony pepyl wes yocht king wyllyam narowly eschapit h wife barnis freindis yit young son na iohne perist nurice personis dependit hym tyme thus rais na le dolour lamentation th pepyll quhen thair townes ar ane ennymes preis rage watteris apperis mair terribyll dangerus han ony fyre fyre increissis small begynning schawis sa sone self inuadis pepyl mair n thair guddis tha thair bodyis sone slokin quhare men ar deligent contrar wit delygence man may resist inundatioun watteris enteris duris windowis sic violence na remeid aganis bot gyf ane man fynd haistely schyppis baittis quhen sic thyngis nocht gottin yocht pepyll pa hicht hous yit thay ar nocht saiffit way ye watter gangis aboue thair heidis pu ti thaym miserabyll deith th ar sindry houssis quhilk stude land nocht bot seyis king william seand castell bertha distroyit inundatioun watter wise foundit towne quhilk callit eftir perth ane man name quhilk gaif ground quhare town biggit king william caus samyn rise honour ryches gaif sindry preuilegis thairto bot town callit sact iohnestoun fou dit fra redemption ane miic x yeris phovv kyng iohne subdevvit ireland vvalis hovv kyng vvyllyam punist sindry conspiratouris hovv inglad ireland vvar maid tributaris ye paip kyng vvyllyamis deith hovv syndry ordouris freris began ca x yeir followyng kyng iohne ingland subdewit ye maist part ireland empire ni yeir subdewit walis samyn tyme rais caithnes gret trubyll gothred son makculyem quhais rebellyon schawin afore maid gret heirschippis ro syndry othir boudis thairabout cumpany incressit ylk day mair assistence syndry lymmaris lochquhaber ilis punis thir attemptatis king william send erlis fyf atholl buchquhane vim men thay set battall vincust said gothred brocht hym presoner ye kig quhom gart heid wt mony quhilk war brocht ye samyn maner tyme rais ane gret dissensioun betuix kyng iohne ingland paip innocent thrid efter followis king iohne tuk generall exaction tent peny al landis frutis pertenand kirk punist thaym war repugnant thairto maist cruelte becaus certane abbayis bischoprikis within realme war nocht obeysant tuk possession thair landis nocht onely reft fra thaym thair gold syluer iowellis bot banist religious thairof paip innocent traistad sic cruelteis nocht semand cristin princis yat othir princis suld nocht inuaid kirk siclik auarice persuadit kyng iohne mony wayis desist fra thir extorsionis redres iniuris done hym ye kirk becaus couth na way diuert mynd fra samyn denuncit hym cursit depriuit hym sa far micht al honour dignite makand inuocatioun cristin prince cum thair armyis aganis hym defence liberte haly kirk kyng iohne seand hym na pyssance resyst sa mony armyis deuysit aganis hym partis fenyeit hym penitent haue absolutioun offence committit aganis kirk gaif ouir realmes ingland ireland paip innocent pay yeirly quhyll vii yeris war gone x thousand markis striuelyng paip successouris realmes ingland ireland quhilk pensioun yeirly payit oure dayis psic thingis done kyng iohne realme wes assoylyeit fra censuris led aganis thaym pschort tyme efter kyng wyllyam brokyn lang age deceissit striueling xlix yeir regne fra redemptioun ane thousand two hudred xiiii yer burijt aberbrothak hye alter yeir afore deith two cometis apperit moneth marche richt terribyll sicht pepyll ane schane ay afore sonne risyng othir afore fallyng nixt yeir ane calf sene northumberland heid crag like awin nature remenant lyke nature ane hors nixt winter sene two mones lift seuerit fra othir hornit naturally mone vsis hir incressing wainding tyme king wyllyam war mony nobyll clerkis dominicus spanyeart channoun saint augustinis ordoure quhilk sone efter left samyn began ordour freris callit predicatouris tyme sanct francis quhilk bega ordouris freir minouris callit gray freris quhom mony abbay ar rychely byggit partis warld tyme ioachim abbot calaber quhilk wrait comentaris bukis apocalipsis ylk tyme rodulphe archebyschop culane quhilk brocht bodyis thre kyngis pers constantinople efter culane quhare thay remane gret veneratioun pepyll samyn tyme peter comestor wrait hystory ecclesiastik amang w war thay dayis syndry haly men udward byschop brechin eustachius abbot arbroth quhilkis war excellent precheouris kyng wyllyam foundit abbay balmernocht bot dotat emengard wyfe th tyme war institute monkis trinite callit redemptioun captiuis two yame war send scotland paip innocent quhome king wyllyam gaif h palyce ryall aberdene big yair abbay purpos geif thaym syndry othir thyngis gyf leuit pof king alexander secound actis hovv king iohne ingland inuadit kirk vvith gret exactionis hovv paip kirkmen vvar corruppit money assist opinioun hovv kyng alexander renevvit band france deith kyng iohne ca xi kyng wyllyam deceissit wyse son alexander secound crownit scone efter coronation went ahirbrothok quha e remanit xiiii dayis doyng funerall obsequies kyng wyllyam fader comandit na playis bankett vsit ane yeir cum pepyl micht lament ye deith fader publik doloure kingis seruandis war clothit dule weid yeir followyng first conuentioun yat maid edinburgh quhare ratifyit thingis done fader efter assignit certane landis moder sustene hir ryal estait assignit certane iugis remane townis realm decision dout sum materis execution iustice tyme rais gret discention betuix kyng iohne ingland nobyllis sa full auarice birnand desire conques guddis wald admit na heritoure thair landis quhill thair enteres iust valour thair heritage ane yeir tuk yerely pensionis fra abbottis byschoppis contrar liberte haly kirk quhe ony prelate deceissit tuk rentis place quhil successoure enterit prelatis ingland richt impacient suffer sic exactionis solistit syndry gret prince rise aganis king finaly dressit yair purpos sic menes yt baith ye king france scotland promittit cum ingland thair support king iohne heirand sic rebellyoun maid aganis hym eschew present dangeir maid aggreance prelatis promittit gret aith repare al iniur done hym howbeit na thing thairof followit effect sa blindit auarice yat returnit euyl maneris send ambassatour gawlo ane cardinall rome complaning violence subdittis aganis hym quhilkis yair menis he persuadit kingis france scotland inuade hym sic maner may nocht gouerne realm liberte pape innocent bebecaus ane yeirly pension king iohne mair comouit complaynt promittit debait hym maist fauoure thay day war thair maist auaritious pepyll court rome thairfore euery thyng grantit mycht bryng ony importance thaym sicht reason conscience amang al sic inordinat personis nane mair vicious couatus gwalo pretermittit na thing vnsped kig iohne quhare mycht fynd ony co modite efter followyng wyll mak ane digressioun se far ye prelatis kirkmen auld tymes war aboue prelatis dayis virtewis syngular lyfe quhilkis prelatis present beris nocht bot name na thyng following thair life thay auld faderis war geuyn imitatatioun crist pouerte piete humilite iustice drawyng pepyll thair feruent cherite continewal precheing seruyce god equale affectioun pure ryche nocht arraying thaym gold syluer precious abulyeme ti nocht vsing court accu panyit weirmen bordellis nocht contending exceid lust insolence prince doyng na thing dissait bot leuand pure conscience verite bot prelatis kirkmen oure dayis ar rutit vicis ar sene ony othir pepyl sic enorm teis he rog e perpetually kirk sen rich apprisit ha dyn maist honoure amang kirk men kyng iohne nochtwithstandyng promes obligatioun maid afore gret aith quhen aduertist gwalois writing promitting defend hym materis began inuade nobyllis spretuall temporall mair exactionis afore regarding na thing bot onely conqueir guddis rich nobillis rycht impacient sustene thir extorsionis solistit lewis dalphine france alexander kyng scotland cu gret armyis thair support kyng iohne hauand lytyll confidence subdittis fled ane strenth throw quhilk lewis come ony obstakyll london quhare reslauit plesandly pepyll efter send king iohne desiring hym abstene fra exactionis nocht iniure h pepyll tymes cumyng sic extorsionis sic thingis makis prince baith odious thair subdittis othir pepyll attoure said lewis desirit kyng iohne redres skaithis quhilkis subdittis he sufferit tyrany kepe faith thaym afore promittit gyf thocht sic thingis obseruat send sonne othir nerest freindis remane pl ge obseruation thairof kyng iohne hauand confidence na thyng mair money gwalo cardinall afore rehersit wald heir na conditioun peace said suld nocht ceis quhill attemptatis done h pepil war codignely punist lew incontinent rasit army sindry inglismen opinion inuaid kig iohne nochtheles consultit superseid passage becaus samyn mycht succeid mair publik damage cuntre tha punitioun hym motiue thair trubyl king alexader heirand sic trubyll ingland come ane army london ony dammage done pepyl quhais cumyng al trubyl ceissit al sone thir two princis alexander lewis comonit betuix thaym syndry materis pertenyng thair realmes thay went kyng phylyp france leuand behynd thaym xm men assist lordis inglad aganis kyng iohne sone efter kynge philip king alexander met togydder bolonie quhare band renewit betuix scotland france pointis efter auld maner sic thyngis done kyng alexander lewis returnit ingland efter quhais cumyng kyng iohne tuk sic malancoly deceissit generall counsal haldin rome paip innocent hovv kyngis scotland ingland inuading aithir realmes vvith gret heirschippis slauchter hovv thay vvar agreit ca xi efter deith kyng iohne son hary crounit quhil sic thingis war done ingland ane generall counsall rome quhilk iiiic xii bischoppis viiic abbotis counsall paip innocent cursit thaym war ennymes kyng iohne ingland specyall cursit lewis dalphyn france alexander kyng scotland otheris thair opinioun alliegeand yame inuasouris liberte rome becaus inglad tributar paip schort tyme following gwalo auaritious cardynal afore rehersit come ingland cursit yame inuadit king iohne life interditit placis quhare yai com lewis seand maist part ingland assist king hary gwalo bocht ane absolutioun infinite money syne returnit france attoure auaritious cardinal curst interditit syndry gret prince ingland quhil thay war constranit yair absolutionis infinite money na sicht honest vnhonest actionis bot allanerly proffet nocht lang efter king hary come ane army scotland inuading cuntre gret slauchter heirschyppis quhare thay come pal sone aduertist kyng alexander gaderit power scotland geif hym battal fled gret deligence ingland nochtheles king alexader followit hym kest mony castellis stre northumbirland ye groud efter carlele garnist folkis returnit gret triumph honouris scotland kyng hary hei yat king alexader skailit army returnit ane new power scotland tuke baith town castell berwik syne brint heriit see camp haddyngtoun sais nane yat found ye gait except wiffis barnis preistis returnit army ingland mene tyme auaritious prelat gwalo traisting fynd sufficient oportunite conques gret money scotland put amyn vnder proces interdictioun persewit king alexander becaus inuadit ingland maist terribyll cursingis thir cursing infla mit ye scottis sic hatrent aganis inglismen ye apperit ceis vter exterminion baith thair realmes nochtheles interuention prelatis peace fynaly maid betuix two realmes vnder thir coditionis kyng alexander sall rander inglismen ye town carlele kyng hary sall rander town berwyk scottis hail dominon cumbir remane kyng alexander half northumbirland recroce kyng alexander assoilyeit censuris led aganis hym gwalo two kyngis beand aggreit wyse al debaitis king alexa der assoilyeit realme delyuerit fra interdiction incotinent gwalo sall depart tume hand summond ye prelatis scotland anwik hauand na actionis aganis thaym bot onely trubyl yame quhil thay haue debursit large soumes money profet sindry thaym exonerat truble gaif hym large money otheris refusit desyris tuk indignatioun sperituall materis wer sa opinly sauld money inco tinet gwalo sumond yame rome beleuyng yai suld tak sic feir lag iurnay trauell thairof yai suld codiscend purpos nochttheles thay wer litill affrayit thair bot went finalie ye paip complanyt insufferable iniuris done ingland scotland gwalo thus wes gwalo finalie dischargit auctorite condampnit gret soumes money paip thir prelatis yat wer sumond hym rome wer assolyeit fra petitioun tyme dauid erle hutyngtoun deceissit wes buryit ane abbay ingland namit seuicia phovv king hary king alexander vver alliar mariage translation sanct thomas caterbery sindry legatis send scotland paip conques money ca xiii hary kyng inglad eftir cumyng erfite age wes desirus peace yan weir ane couention wes maid betuix kyng alexander york ye quhilk two kyngis wer alliat togiddir maner iane sister kyng hary wes maryit kyng alexander ye two sisteris king alexander wer maryit two gret prince ingland alliance wes maid fra redemption imiicxx yeris yeir wes ye translatioun sanct thomas canterbury done ye kyng nobillis spirituall temporall al solempnite reuerence yt mycht deuisit nixt yeir ane legat wes send ye paip scotland purches money furnis ane new army pa ye turki quhe gottin na litill money effect scotlad spendit h lust insolence said returnyng paip wes reft fra hym brigandis schort tyme eftir cumyng rome ane othir legat wes send samyn effect scotland kyng alexander aduertist afore cumyng conuenyt noblis ane cousal ye quhilk ane bischop said followis howbeit sindry thingis presentlie occurris quhilkis effrayis schawe sic materis bene preiudiciall ye comoun weil yit maist nobil prince quhen cosidir thi humanite faith costance geuin na thing mair defence weil thy liegis nocht ceis action co mon liberte schaw ye suth tyranny intollerable quhilk exercit kingis princis discending lynial succession yair kindly heritage mekill mair ye tyranny insufferable quhen exercit w men vile obscure lynage heirfore gif sindry manifest wrangis done w thir mony yeris bigane cu ye paiyis mind yai wer sufferit sum maner bot sen lymmaris vile obscure lignage quhilkis ar promouit neficis thair horrible vice he nocht onlie interditit realm ony comission bot he spendit yair corruppit vice money thay gaderit cuntre ye papis autorite rasyng armyis aganis turki think thair cursit auarice suld haue na forthir place amag trew pepill specially amang w becaus thay haue oure simplicite meiknes cotemptioun yeris afore passait ye complanit ye iniuris done gwalo quhen held realm interditit mony al prelatis vnder cursing becaus thay wald answere hym money sustene lust attour gwalo wes periolus fontane al iniquite vice yat howbeit wes send reit concord betuix inglismen scottis yit auarice gaif sic occasioun battall baith realmes wer nocht yair hatrent wes haistely mesit inuadit othir thair vter distructioun sen thir terrible dedis ar patent quha nedis thaym remembrit displeseir attoure eftir wer exonerat gwalo come place ane new legat na better lyfe bot erar wors quhen got large money fra w redemptioun presoneris rasyng new armyis aganis ye turki spendit insolence fenyeit yat wes eft brigandis heirfore haue experience sa mony heuy damagis done w yir two legatis afore rehersit salbe reput mischant fulis admit thrid beleuit new legat salbe bett conditionis fallowis wes afore gif ony man list demand quhat done yi mater say nothir legat yit na othir legat tymes cumyng suld ressauit within realme becaus samyn heryit waistit money thair c ntinewall exactionis gif ony yow he superflew money ye may dispone erar pure folk sic corrupit vse vicio egatis finalie thir wourdis wer sa apprisit counsall legat wes nocht admittit cum ye realme phovv kyng alexander punist synd conspiratouris realme ye first cumyng blak gray frei scotland ca xiiii peace robora maner forsaid followit ane ciuill battal scotland motioun gilespy ro com gret army aganis kingis auctorite eftir slane mony kyng liegis brint ye toun ennernes punis yir attemptatis wes send iohne cumyn erle buchquhane ane cumpany chosyn men finalie slew sayd gil spy baith sonnis brocht thair heidis kyng trubill beand dantit said followit ane othir men caithnes brint adam yair bischop eftir yat cursit thaym non paymet yair teyndis kyng alexandir heirand si terrible cruelte done nobil prelat ceissit nocht quhill iiiic principall doaris yairof wer hingit attour yt na successioun sal cum wickit seid gart geld yair sonnis place quhare thay wer geldit callit yit staney hyll attoure becaus erle caithnes maid na support bischop adam yit tuke punitioun thir lymmaris comittit cruelte wes forfaltit landis king alexander punitioun wes grerumly louit ye paip sic thingis done kyng alexander went abirdene dotat mony priuilegis howbeit samyn wes dotat afore sindry comoditeis othir kyngis bullis quhilk war grantit sindry p ipis concernyng liberteis kirkis scotland wer geuyn kepyng net gilbe archeden murray quhilk sucedit immediatly ye sait caithnes eftir slauchter bischop adam ye thrid yeir eftir erle caithnes come kyng alexander quhen wes sittand modir ye epyphany day yuyll desirit grace kyng alexander wes pieteous reuthfull yat restorit hym honouris landis possessionis ane sobir compositioun money nochttheles offence wes vnpunist man wes sone eftir punist gret iustice god wes slane awin seruandis slepand bed hous quhare wes slane brint na man suld haue suspitioun slauchter bot wer cumyn suddane aueture perist ye samin maner bischop adam quhais deith wes participant yi tyme sindry blak freris wer send scotland sanct dominik said quhen kyng alexander went france renew band scotland kyng philip prayit sanct dominik send part freiris scotland instruct scottis thairfore thir freiris wer plesandly ressauit kirkis ereckit thair contemplatioun youcht thir men quhilkis wer send sact dominik leiffit thay wer institute hym singulare lyfe yit oftymes hapnis thyngis fra gud begynn g fallis wers maneris thair successouris declinit fra gud religion maist insolence lust continewit vicious lyfe iiic yeris quhil last thay wer reformyt oure dayis freir iohne adamison ane man singulare rudition lyfe quhilk wes professit theologie w abirdene samyn maner wer send scotland freir minouris sanct francis ordour mony thaym maner wer sindry yeris eftir deith sanct france nocht sa religious wes nochttheles thay ar men best lyfe specially amang w scotland phovv kyng alexander punist sindry conspiratouris agreit kyng hary ingland nobillis nevv mariage natiuite sonne alexander hovv mony nobilli scotland vver slane iovvry capi xv lang peace perseuerit eftir scotland quhyll last alane lord galloway constable scotland deceissit becaus deuidit al landis afore deith amang h thre douchteris bastard sonne gaderit ane army xm men beleuyng recouir lordschip galloway last quhen inuadit cuntre gret trubill wes slane vm men opinioun ye erle merche walter stewart ye residew h oist discomfist eldest douchter alane galloway wes maryit roger quincy quhilk wes maid constable scotland brukit continewally succession quhill tyme kyng robert secound quhais tyme roger quincinis successioun wes disherist forfaltit certane crymes comittit aganis kingis maieste eftir forfalt constabillary wes geuyn hayis arroll sic thingis done scotland kyng alexander wes aduertist gret deuisioun rysing betuix kyng hary ingland nobillis thairfore mei samyn went london iane quene isobell sister quhen agreit kyng hary nobillis debaitis maryit isobell sister erle northfolk mene tyme iane quene deceissit ony successioun quhilk thyng causit kyng alexander return gret lament scotland nixt yeir quhilk wes fra oure redemptioun ane thousand twa h ndreth xxxix yeris kyng alexander becaus na successioun body maryit roxburgh ye douch ingeliame erle gow ane incredible bewte namyt quhom ga ane sonne alexander quhilk succedit lie eftir hym croun yeir kyng hary dantit slew principall mouaris aganis hym duryng wes ane knych lie turnament hadingtoun quhare kyng lexander nobillis wer assemblit ye tyme mony vail aunt men souerane vassalage wan gret honouris nochtheles end al thair ples ir succedit ang sorow patrik cuming athole wes slane within nycht iohne bissart ye place quhare wes slane brynt na man suld haue suspition sla cht r bot wer cumyn onlie suddane auenture fyre cryme bissa wer banist scotland votit haly land thair fecht aganis turki neuir returne scotland tyme somerleid thane argyle son somerleid afore rehersit rasit gret truble al part quhare come quhil last w brocht erle merche ane cord hals afore ye king gat remissioun way offence tyme wer mony seditious personis ye court ingland trai tyng gret comoditeis fall thaym weris youcht samyn wer contrarius thair comoun weill yit thay traistit oppression done ye pepyll vnpunist weri lawis iustice he na place tyme battal thir men hop thair perticular comoditeis inflambit kyng hary cotrac faith inuaid scottis battall began bygane castell fornens berwik howbeit cassyn afore king william condition peace neuir edifyit tymes cumyng ye bigging castell bene sufficient occasion weir betuix inglis scottis war ye noblis ingland inhibit samyn contrar yair band promes thus al occasion battall ceissit nixt yeir followyng come ambassatouris fra lewis kyng france schawyng hym reddy pa iowry yairfore desyrit support scotland h iornay king alexader tenor confideration france send patrik erle marche dauid lindesay glenesk walter stewart dundonald ane nowmer chosyn men support kyng lewis ye said iornay thir scott war slane pest swerd egipt nane yame returnit fra ye tyme furth king alexander le ffit lag deccissit ane ile argyle efter gret infirmite ye xxxv yeir regne viii day iuly fra oure redemp ion ane miicxlix body buryit melros ye tyme king alexander war mony nobyll clerkis hugo cardinall ye ordour freir predicatouris quhilkis maid comentaris ye bybyll siclik wes thir dayis
