sact gilbert bischop caithnes said haly bischop sanct dutho thir day preceptour sact gilbert otheris sayis lang yeris afore tyme nochtheles quhat sumeuir tyme treuth ane man syngular haly life rich acceptabyll god man body lyis ro haldin gret veneration pepyll phovv reliques sanct margaret vvar translatit hovv king alexander vvas haldin captiuite vvith cumyngi mariage vvith king hary thrid bigging sact mungois kirk ca xvi alexander secound buryit wise son alexander ye thrid hauad bot ix yeris age maid kyng tyme coronatioun stude afore hym ane hieland man salust hym kyng scottis eloquet meter langage schawing al ye kingis quhilkis linialy discendit gathelus first begynnar scottis plesandly rewardit labouris king alexander ye secoud yeir regne conuenit prelatis baronis realme tuke vp bonis grandame sanct margaret put yame ane precious fe tour syluer xxi day iuly quhen hir blissit reliquies war brocht forthwart maist veneration thay baid styll sepulture malcolme hir husband wald na way seuerit fra ye samyn pepyll war astonist vncouth miracle knawing ye caus yairof quhil last ane agit mouit ye haly spreit exhortit yame heir hym said sanct margaret he hir husband na le reuerence quhe deid tha quhe lyue yairfore scho wyl pa ye place quhare ye deuise hir blissi bonis rest quhil ye bonis hir husband translatit hir ye samyn maner quhen samyn done scho brocht esaly ye samyn place quhare scho lyis yi day gret veneratioun pepyll baith buryit ane place king alexander bot ix yeris age quhen crownit ye noblis dredand yt cotemption h auctorite gret trubyl suld rise send ambassatouris ingland renew peace desire king haryis douchter hym mariage yeir baith kingis couenit mony nobyl speritual temporal baith ye realmes york quhare king alexander maryit margaret doucht kig hary thrid maist solempnite reuerence micht deuysit sact steuins day youle within day efter king alexander returnit scotland ye tender age king alexander ye realme scotlad gouernit gret felicite noblis efter h cumyng perfite age maid hym puni sindry extorsionis done certane noblis sumond ye erlis menteith athole buchquhane lord strabogy quhilkis war cuming put yame horne becaus yai coperit h iustice yir lordis mouit wt yi displeseir set yame reuege ye samin finaly tuk ye king kinrossy ane gret power men brocht hym striueling quhare yai held hym lang time captiuite ward throw quhilk ylk day tai mair trubyl ye realme sene afore becaus ye king haldyn captiuite quhilk suld haue done thaym iustice hous cumyngis war thir dayis full rich landes manrent fo thir thre cellis lord foresaid thair xxx knychtis landie euen ane surname bot oft occurris realme men gret dominioun rentis ar sa suspiti kyng ye occasion thair rewyne within dayis efter kyng alexander tane maner walter erle menteith cheif cumyngis poisonit wyfe throw quhilk ye remanent cumyngis war sa astonist thay put kyng liberte tuk remission crime micht imput thaym woman slew hir husband erle menteith hir new uffer iohne russell fled ingland quhare scho deit miserye tyme paip urbane name institute ye feist orpus cristi ylk thurisday fter trinite sonday carmili e reris come tyme scotland ereckit ane chapell oure lady ou wallis perth thair kirk said yt ane monke melros admonist samyn tyme ane vision sleip fa ane part haly croce nocht far fra peblis louthiane within ane cace nocht far fra ye samyn thay fand ane pig craftely grauyn quhilk found certane bonis wound silk bot n knawin quhais bonis yai war al sone ye cace opnit quhare ye haly croce inclusit mony myraclis apperit kyng alexander mouit deuotioun thairof biggit ane abbay honour ye haly croce quhilk ar monkis efter ordour trinite lang efter ane conuentioun betuix ye two kyngis ingland scotland wark accumpanyit yair noblis baith thair realmes thair sa gud redres maid ylk syde baith realmes war g ttar tranquillite uir sene ony kyngis tyme afore tyme kirk glasgew completit perfectioun standis day biggit gret magnificence maist part liberalite william bischop thairof quhilk leuit nocht lang efter completyng samyn pof gret derth albion hovv acho kyng norrovvay inuadit scotland vvith gret cruelteis orison maid hym ambassatouris kyng alexander ca xvii yeir god ane miiclxiii ane gret derth albion heruist sa wak ye yeir afore cornis ye mais part war corruppit maid ane miserabyll derth throw boundis albion acho kyng norroway denmark heirand scotland trublit maner beleuit find sufficient occasion subdew dominioun arriuit ane flot schyppis ilis lammas day callit aduincula petri ilis war continewally hal vnder empire danis fra king edgaris tyme thir day eft king acho come arrane bute quhen king acho subdewit yame empire esperance mair felicite arriuit albion tuk ye castel aire lang sege began waist al ye boundis liand yair king alexader astonist yir nouellis young tender age sufficient resyst cruelte danis efter sa frequent victoryis fallyng thaym thocht na thing sa gud brek h ennimes lang tary fyne mycht prolong battall send ambassatouris king acho quhilkis principall said hym maner war nocht king nobillis anciant consuetude obseruit sen thair first begynnyng eikis redres iniuris done thaym afore thay inuaid thair ennymes battall thow suld nocht se oratouris send bot erar ane army cumand thy contrar maist awfull weirly ordinance get neuir sa huge spulye yit sa triumphant victoryis ennimes quhen thay inuaid w maist wrangis wyll heir na reason redres thynk na thing sa gud eschew battall tak restitutioun guddis quhilkis ar tane fra w iniure battall pquhow may thair ony gretar wodnes fury tha thyng swerd fyre may tretit plesand wordis nochtheles quhen oure honorabyll iust desiris ar refusit ennymes quhen fynd thaym mair desirus weir peace ryse haistely maist hatrent reuenge thair contemptioun heirfore ar send fra souerane inquire quhat occasioun thow he inuaid realme subdittis violatioun peace quhilk he bene obseruat betuix hym danis thir hundred yeris bygane cumand nocht onely reif fra hym bute arrane othir la dis quhilkis he iosit peace bot al ceissing fra na maner cruelte yat may deuysit pepyl quhat offence quhat cruelteis he pepyl done aganis inuaid realm sic awful ordinance slaing wiffis childrin febyll personis without ony mercy rasoun howbeit maist cruell tyranni he miseratioun sic personis quhat furius ire he mouit birne ye kirkis god sanctis ye gret murder pepyll quhy puttis thow al placis quhare thow cumis heirschippis rewin attour gyf thow dredis god quhilk gouernis al thing yt se prouidence gif thow dredis sanctis vengeance cu punytion god yit thow suld dreid two maist pissant kingis albion alliat togidder maist tender blud quhilkis sal cu sic pissance yt thow may resist heirfore sen thow may depart honoure best ye redres al skaithis tyme auenture thow brocht sic extreme disperation thy army discofist yt thow sall vterly distroyit fynd nocht repuls yocht thow wald implore mercy thir wourdis war said ambassatouris put su terrour hardy kyng acho nochtheles answerit yame th maner ye beleif wise ambassatouris astonis w fers awfull wourdis traisting w sa full dredour yt wyl desist fra purpos onely minassyng ye ar void al reason prudence gyf ye sa ymagyn quhare ye aggrege iniuris reiffyng certane ilis fra dominioun vnderstand ye ar na lauchfull iugeis geif decision ony iniur richtis pertening w liegis forthir gif ye desire ye caus quhy haif inuadit arrane bute say thir ilis arrane bute bot al ilis albion pertenis w pepyl auld heritage ar cumyn tak mekyll proffet landis presently ye haue tane thaym tymes bygane thairfore schaw youre kyng feir nocht minassyng na othir violence may aganis w nochtwithstandyng gyf mair desirus peace tha battall couatis eschew diceptioun birnyng townes ye slauchter pepyl gif desyrit se ye vter exterminion realm afore ene comand hym send w xm markis striueling frutis landis tane vp hym eldaris tymes bygane dischargeand hym thairof tymes cumyng said ilis may pa vnder perpetual dominioun gif refuse charge force hym abide chance battall aganis w quhilkis ar prepari maist weirly ordinance inuade realme pepyll hovv king alexander come vvith army aganis king acho maid tvvo kyngis thair armyis hovv king acho vvas sco st largis ca xviii alexander comouit answer seing na waye eschewe battall thocht thing na sa gud assailye ye chance fortoun gaderit xlm meit enaimes quhilk wer deuidit thre batall ye first ing wes ane vailyeat kny ht alexander stewart nepot ye alexander yat dotat ye abbay paslay hym n argyle leuenax athole galloway left wyng wes patrik dunbar hauand hym men louthiane fiffe berwik striueling ye myddil wa wes king alexander remanent pepill scotland support ye wyngis quhen dangeir occu rit yir ba tallis wer arrayit sic maner euery clan ane capitane assignit thayn thair awin langage exhort thaym wyn land honour yair manheid kyng alexander seyng ennymes sycht causit me done army said yame yi maner haif maid beluffit freindis orisoun god quhais prouidence wisdome euery thing gouernit erd send victory thaym quhilk he maist rycht iustest caus battall wald exhort yow haue sic faith confidence ennymy theuis aris ye may inuincible curage distroy ennimes beleif weil ye ar nocht fecht agan yaim ye inuadis landis iust clame bot aganis thaym raistis penurite vittallis regnad amang yow fynd sufficient oportunite conques landis thir lymmaris reiosis sa mekill thift reif thay ar nocht content onlie landis reft fra w thir mony yeris bigane bot ar cumin new tyrany dwel maist inward ladis remembir heirfore nocht onlie heuy importable iniuris yame done bot al necessar fecht aganis thaym defence wyffis barnis liberteis landis hauand na securite lyfe bot handis restis schortlie na othir thing bot othir vincus ennimes manheid elli leif miserabillie vnd yair seruitude suffir youre wiffis douchteris fuly yair lust remembir ye ar nocht fecht onlie natiue cunire bot liuis thaym ar maist deir tendir freindis considir ye nocht onlie bot al scotlad seis yow fecht yi day notis baith heid cowarty belt yow yairfo vailyeant campionis ye manheid curage yt mater iust mouit onlie pure defece cosidir ennymes inuadis yow onlie pray spulye gudis salbe thairfore sone vincust quhen thay se yow geuin perseuerant constance debait samyn first pray yow refresche youre bodyis meit syne cloith ye samyn armour ye may ye grace god haue victory skarslie wer thir wourdis sayd quhen kyng acho began exhort army maner followis wer nocht manheid prouin lang tyme wyse freindis sicker victory hadis bene vane ieoperde body day yow haif assailyeit sic thingis yat bene vncertane thaym yat ar certane bene lesum gyf ye febill astonist pepill haue leuit ane hard sobir lyfe hame miserie gret laubour haue ieoperd yow battall aganis strang ennymes nochtheles sen ye deliuerit purpos ar votit follow gud fortoun ye may se occasion sufficiet oportunite schawis quhat virtew r ward sall follow ilk man laubouris ye se ye desirit maist ennymes full rich guddis quhilkis ar gottin na thing sa mekill preis dint swerd nocht onlie gif ye happin haue glore victory sall fall yow ryche treasour army bot hai l realme scotland sal fall reward laubouris uincus thairfore ennymes euery thing scotland salbe offerit yow maist magnificence fra ennimes vincust euery ane yow salbe rewardit landis youre pleseir ye salbe al riche tymes cuyng ennymes ar yi tyme thir sen gret chargis may nocht done extreme ieoperdie beseik yow aduise esalye yi battal sal led agan ennymes derth ap eris amang thaym he maid thaym febill ony othir pepill thus ar thay destitute corporall strenth thay sall gyf bakkis w thay cum ony straikis thay ar bot ane schaddow pepill may yairfore slane like miserabill beistis becaus thay ar noumer pepil ye thair spulye salbe yow riche contrar gyf discofiture fallis yow quhilk god forbeit na thing sal fallow bot deith heirschip quhare ye cum youcht beleif na thing le sic aduersiteis beseik yow gif ony sic misaduenture fallis reuenge youre deith ye nocht slane like beistis quhilkis ar offerit sacrifice ar circulit ye se ilk side wi h ennymes schippis seuerit sa far fra w may ha f na refuge thairby thus restis na succouris w gif discomfist attour quhat folly quhat extreme miserie ony creature leif wappinnis quhilkis may defend h life haue confidence onlie swiftnes feit sen ye haue sa gud experience quhat commoditeis may fal manheid quhat mischeif sorow may fall cowartry suffir nocht handis dul sleuth yt ye may propic fortoun haue sikir victory quhilk handis quhairthrow incredible rich felicite may thair eftir succeid skarsly wer thir wourdis endit quhen baith armyis began array othir ye mene tyme acho come ordinance middilward quhare kyng alexander wes arrayit time traisting gif ye samyn wer brokin ye remanent battallis sone vincust battall wes fochtyn gret cruelte athir side specialie quhair two kyngis faucht thay ruschit ay yai partis quhair yai saw thair pepil waikest exhortyng yame schaw thair manheid curage kyng acho incontinent maid hym ane band forcy campionis rusche throw ye samyn battal quhair kig alexander faucht nochttheles wes stoutlie resistit kyng alexander sa gret noumer pepill hym stuffit battall fresche men al partis quhair failyeit quhill last baith wyngis danis wer put lycht incontinent alexander stewart paslay come bus hement fresche men myd ilward quhair kig alexander wes fechtad aganis kyng acho lag bergane vncertane victory ye danis seand alexander cum new recet victory yame bakkis quhome followit ye ottis gret cruelte throw unynghame maid ithand slau h e thaym uhill nych ut end thair laubour orow king acho fled ane noumer castell air quhilk wes tan aitlie hym mene tyme gat tithingis lot quhilk contenit l schippis wes erist vnmercyfull tempest nane thaym sauit except foure oure marineris quhilkis eschapi eftir tinsal thair schippis war slane inhabitantis cuntre kyng acho brokin yi maner gat yir iiii schippis fled orknay yi battall wer slane xxiiiim danis scottis vm yi battall wes fourthin la gi ye thrid day august fra redeption imiiclxiii yeris king acho cuming orknay send ane new army norroway denmark inuaid ye scott aganis nixt symer nochtheles becaus deceissit ye yeir nixt following army ska ye weris ceissit pof natiuite alexader ye ferd ye message send magnus king norrovvay king alexader ye thrid ansvver hovv said alexander recouerit ilis scotlad fra danis ca xix followit gret blythnes scotland eftir deith kyng acho samyn day yt deceissit orknay say ye xxi day ianuar wes borne alexand prince scotland gottin margaret sister kyng hary thus wes dowbill ioy glaidnes al partis scotland ye ennyme deid ane new prince borne eftir deith kig acho succedit son magnus ane rycht catholik prince magn send chacellar ye yeir following kyng alexander perth offerit gif ouir rycht clame yt said magn king norroway arrane bute sa yt ye remanent ilis mycht peaceabilly iosit hym tymes cumyng answerd king alexader yt ye ilis pertenit auld heritage hym genitouris kingis scotland mycht haue na amite freindschip wt danis quhil ye said ilis war restorit hym ye nixt yeir yi chancellar norroway mony thir nobyl returnit fra kyng magn scotland letteris vnder gret le renucit gaif ouir rycht clame yt micht haue ye ilis scotland king alexand sal pay ye said king norroway ye said renunciation iiiim markis striuelyng togidder ane yei ly pension ane cm ye mair rob atioun perseuerand amite kyndnes betuix scottis danis tymes cumyng magaret king alexande doucht hauand bot ane yeir age salbe geuin mariage hannigo ye son kyng magnus quhe scho cumyn perfite age place quare mai occision slauchter wes danis salbe maid ane hospitall pure folkis samyn tyme kyng hary son edward weir aganis symon morfort otheris sindry noblis inglad requeistit kyng alexander scotland support aganis yame kyng alexander send sone eftir alexander cumyn vm chosin ingland supportit kyng hary sic maner ye maist part ennymes war distroyit ye remanent constranit seik mercy yi trubil bead datit said followit ane othir roger mortymer howbeit sone pecifyit said roger tane mony otheris factioun castel rowlard put deith tyme ye waithman robert hode fallow litil iohne quho ar mony fabillis mery sportis soug amang vulgar pepyll pof ansvver maid papis legat king alexander natiuite robert bruce vailyeant conquerour deith king alexanderis vvife hir barnis ca xx ye yeir followyng wes ane legat send fra pai clement ye feird gader money scotland rasyng allegit armyis aganis turki legat ressauit ye realme bot co mandit schaw message bordouris desyrit ane breif ye said paip haue iiii mark striue ng ilk proche kirk lxxx mark striuelig ilk bischoprik abbacy yat scotland caus hym ye mair plesandly answerit desiris send certane statut maid hym vayage richt proffitabyl ye gouernance scottis yir petitionis answerit king alexander yat necessar send sa gret sowmes money desirit nochtheles suld send gyf war necessar certane armit prouidit expensis pa ye papis army aganis ye turki h othir pointis answerit ye scotlad wald ressaue na statutis bot yame yat war comandit ye paip generall counsall ay mo preceptis ar geuyn ye mo transgressouris ar foudin ye yeir fra ye incarnation imiiclxxi yer thomas erle carrik past mony nobil men ye haly land al votit vnder ane mynd fecht aganis crist ennymes deith yame returnit yai war al slane pest insufferable ti ye cuntre yi erle carrik left na heritour succeid efter hym heritage fai ane douchter namit martha xv yeris yi lady hir solace hapnit pa ye huntis quhare scho auenture met ane nobyl man robert bruce son air robert bruce lord annandale scotland cleueland ingland yi lady finaly sa inamorit yi scho hint hors ye renyeis forcely led hym hir carrik quhare scho lang tary consultation freindis tuk hym hir husband lord al sone king alexand aduertist heirof tuk hir castell turnebery eschetit al hir landis gudis handis scho maryit consent nochtheles ye king within dayis efter sic copassion hir yt tuk ane esy copositio page missing wyfe dansing wt al glaidnes ya mycht deuisit apperit yair sicht ane ymage ane deid man nakit flesche lyre bair bonis throw quhilk ye king remanet pepil sa astonist yt yai left yair sport affray ye time king alexander wer mony nobil clerk thomas de aquino man singular lyfe erudition theologie bonauenture ye ordour freir minoris michell scot rycht excellet quhilk singulare erudi ion wes na le tretit edward king ingland yan alexand ing scottis sa endis heir ye yir cronikillis heir begynnis xiiii buke croniklis scotland phovv scotland vvas gydit vi gouernouris hovv mariage betuix ye mad norrovvay king edvvard ingland failyeit hovv bruce balliol contendit croun hovv decision thairof vvas comittie king edvvard hovv maid balliol king ca primo alexander ye thrid quhilk deceissyt miserabilly wes schawin left na ai testamenter yit gottin body succeid ye croun saif onlie ye madin norroway said yus wes ye realme gret tr bil wes ony king vi yeris ix monethis followit mony terribill cruelteis al ti ye realme sic sonis wer datit afore feir iustice began ouirhail peple sindry oppressionis yit ye realme w gouernit al ye said tyme vi regentis quhais namis wer willia fraseir bischop sanct androis duncane erle fif iohn cumyn erle buchquhan yir war regentis ye north robert bischop glasgew schir iohn cumyn iames stewart scotland war regentis ye south ye mene tyme edward kig ingland callit lag schank tuk purpos coques ye realm scotland destitute ony heid becaus knew ye madin norroway iust heritour ye croun scotland send ambassatour scotland desiring yi madin nort way geuin hym mariage ye lord eft lag cosultation assentit desir vnd yir coditionis yt ye realm scotland suld fre peace quiete ony subiection seruitude tyme afore ye tyme kig alexand gif na succession followit betuix hi yi madin norroway ye croun return ye nerrest air king alexand last deceissit ony clame king edward successouris time cumyng incotinet ii nobyll knicht schir michel scot schir michel wemis war direckit ambassatour brig yi madin norroway effect oresaid nochtheles afore yair cumyng madin deceissit thus returnit yir ambassatouris ony expeditio yair erad hir deith failyeit al amite kindnes betuix inglisme scottis followit gret trubil scotlad freind kig alexader cotending ye croun ye gret damage violation baith ye law god specially betuix iohn balliol robert bruce yi robert nepot yat robert bruce yt marijt isabel younge doucht erle dauid hutingtoun quho gat ane son namit robert quhilk maryit ye heritour carrik haue schawin fad yi robert yt clames croun iohn ballioll gottin margaret eldest douchter ye said erle dauid hutington allane lord galloway quhilk maryit ye said margaret hir ii douchter quhilk ye eldest namit doruidilla maryit schir iohne balliol fader yi iohn ballioll yat clamit ye croun becaus cuyn eldest doucht erle dauid ye reason nerrest aire king willia nane othir sa neir approche blud hym lyue ye tothir side robert bruce howbeit discedit ye yougest doucht erle dauid cumyn ye first mail h fad first born clamit ye croun ye reason pertene hym yi debait clame sa fauori assistence sindry gret prince realme yt micht na way decidit howbeit oftymis brocht afore yir gouernouris regentis foresaid becaus thay dred gif yai declarit ye tane yame king ye tothir suld vsurpe crown force thay remittit decision ye richt yairof kig edward ingland wt power constrane ye said tiis stad sentec king edward plesandly ressauit ye ambassatour quhilkis war send yi effect mittit cu berwik agane ane certan day last quhe cuin ye place day assignit began explore ye richt yir ii tiis afore rehersit quhe considerit yam lenth maid answer sayng micht decide sa difficil mat quhil sindry wise prudent assessour cocurrand wt hym yairfore desirit haue xii scottis maist knawlege eruditioun yt scotland mittit tak xii ye maist resolut wise clerk inglad sit apon decision ye mat ye fine yt difficulteis dowtis salbe sa cruelly socht furth yt ye iust verite micht allanerly triumphe quhe wryttyn reasonis iuris baith ye etis returnit londo bot dayly ccurris ye ingine mortal pepyl ar sa fragyl nane beris comissioun office quhare ony ffet risis yt may yairwith quhil yair hadis weil oynttit ye samyn maner king edward couth keip hadis clene ye comission geuin apon ye decision yi debait eft returning lo brocht certane resolute men frace decide yi mater comandit yame vareant dowble yair delyuerance ye fyne yat quhen yai war found vareant ane mynd decision yi pley micht ye erar mak quhom list yame two king ye maist part yir law iugi wt robert bruce cumyn ye first male iohn balliol ye secound otheris quhilkis war subornat king edward declarit ioh ballioll haue maist richt cumyn ye eldest sist king edward beleuing sufficiet time coques ye realm scottis becaus deuidit syndry votis returnit berwik quhare gaderit ye xxiiii men maist eruditioun deuisit afore geif finall sentence mater quhen cumyn baith ye tiis as sour ane quiet chalmer quhare deuisit sit mater causit ye samyn kepit wt maist deligence ony ysching entres concludit make hym kyng wald sworn hald ye croun hym superioure thairof becaus knew robert bruc singulare manheid wysdome aboue ye balliol thocht best assailye hym first gif war repugnant desiris geif ye crown ye balliol last quhen king edward proponit yi mater maner afore rehersit robert bruce yi robert hauad na respect singulare proffet honour co pair comon weill liberte scotland answerit yt wald ra di natiue cuntre sen bene fr dayis seruitude inglisme king edward assailyeit ye mynd iohne balliol quhilk sa blind sire ye crown yt curit sa yt e micht ose samyn quhethir liberte seruitude finaly quhen ye balliol geuyn faith ing edward mak hym homa e gat ye sentence geuyn hym said erle glocester ane gret prudence auctorire ingland seand ye balliol maid kig robert bruce sa vnreasonably said maner remembir king edward quhat done yt day geuand iust sentence mater yocht ye samyn e hid salbe richt manifest quhen ye gret iuge ye ripis ye conscience retis euery mannis mynd sall caus ye answer ye horribyl iugement thow he geuyn sentence ane king tha salbe iugemet geuin ye schort tyme efter iohn balliol went wt gret triuphe scone crownit sanct androis day fra incarnation imiiclxxxxii yeris phovv balliol come gret trubyl making homage king edvvard allia vvith king phillip france hovv king edvvard vvan bervvik treason slevv scottis samyn ca ii kyng balliol sact day yule nixt yeir come new castell maid homage king edward ye realme scotland cotrarye mynd noblis geuand hym self realme quhilk fre day seruitude inglisme howbeit smal felicite succedit ye samyn wtin schort tyme efter king edward chargit hym tenour band homage cu al ye power micht mak weir ye king frace cotinent king iohn become penitet ye makyng ye said homage sed ambassatouris london renounce ye said homage allegit becaus maid auise ye iii estat scotland vane ye self keipit king edward answerit ye ambassatouris kyng balliol sen wyl cu w sal cu dant ye scott mair esaly send ambassatouris ye king france quho co fiderat lang peace stabill yi peace mair firmance ye king franc doucht geuyn mariage edward son howb purposit quhe scott war vtly distroyit inuaid france afore notwt standing ony mariage band hym trackit ye mene tyme king edward recoseld robert bruce sic familiarite yt mittit mak kig scottis esperace yairof gaif hi ye keping syndry gret castellis scotlad quhilk war ye tyme inglismenis hand kig balliol dredad yir slicht inglisme extreme dageir cu h realm sed willia bischop sact andros wt schir iohn sowlis schir ingerame umfra rance renew ye band wt phillip ye iiii kyng thairof quhilk wes finaly done vnd yir new oitio ni ye doucht charl erle uallance angeos brothir kyng philip france salbe maryit edward balliollis son sal haif landis quhilkis balliol possedit france namit dampart harecure horny quhilk kyng iohne sall ressaue lxm crounis towquhair wes balliol aduertist kyng edward wes cumand gret ordinance sege berwik thairfore conuenit nobillis ane counsal yair auise send mony al baronis gentilmen fife louthiane defence thairof inglismen come nocht onlie strang army land bot al come ane gret nauy sege said town see ye scottis quhilkis wer send ye ballioll defence ye toun tuk xviii thair schippis remanent chasit fra ye sege king edward prouokit brokin displeseir come wt doubill army yan afore tak ye said toun becaus couth nocht get force gret defence yat ye scottis maid thocht assailye samyn maist treasonable slycht maid hym rais army fra sege said toun syne went ane othir part returnit fenyeit ensen eis baneris scotland hauad sanct androis croce aboue thair harnes ye scottis maner send certane lymmaris scotland afore ye toun saying iohn balliol wes cumand army defence thairof comanding yame haif ye port op n agane cuing ye fuliche peple ye toun reiosing ye cuing ye kyng yai beleuit opinnit ye portis come furth toun partis traistyng onlie deliuerit feir ennymes bot al pissance meit thaym plane battall gif ennymes wald assailye yame ony forthir yit quhen yai saw yame neir ye portis yai knew weill yair langage habit yai wer inglismen inco tinent maid yame deligence rescoues toun ye mene tyme inglismen ran swift hors betuix yame ye toun incontinent kyng edward enteri army slew nocht onlie sodiouris weirmen bot barnis wemen agit sonis ony th mercy ranson left na creature scottis blude lyue within ye toun yi toun wes tane gud friday ye xxix day marche fra redemptioun imiiclxxxxv yeris edward maist furious tyrane mycht yow rage wt sic cruelte ye peple ony exception age quhair na occasioun wes precedent iniuris quhare ye pepil wes subdewit force armis yir cruel tigris ruschit throw al ye toun sauit nane kick mercat quhair yai mycht apprehendit lametable slauhter wes throw al ye partis ye toun ane mil mycht haif gane two day ithadlie stremis blude yi toun wer slane viim wt maist part nobillis gentilmen fiffe louthiane hovv king balliol vvas discofist du bar tint al strenthis scotland hovv gaif ouir croun king edvvard fled france ca iii kyng balliol heirad ye miserabil slauchter pepyll berwik gaderit ane army wt gret hatrent reuenge ye samyn faucht king edward dubar quhare discofist mony al army tane slane efter yi discofitour ye erlis marche menteith wt lxx knichtis fled ye castel dubar war seigit sa lang quhill thay war constranit laik vittallis randerit king edward thair lyuis sais nochtheles yai war al slane yi cruel tyrane kyng edward ony respect fayth promes said yame ye followit ye opinion balliol yt robert bruce solistit al freindes ye beginyng ye battall leif ye balliol ye way ye caus disco fitour bot thir wordis war fals said ye freindis balliol allanerly malyce ye fine yat bruce suld cu hatret ye scottis robert ruce fter yi victory past king edward desirit hym fulfil ye maid afore vnd gret nochtheles gat bot ane answer king edward desire king scotland tha bruce answer yow yt haif na othir besines bot conques realmes king me robert bruce persa ng sic dissait treason vnd r wordis king edward returnit richt sorrowfull landis ingland hauand gret indignation mynd yt obeyit ye king ingland forthir tha reason requi concludit deliuerit mynd quhen tyme occurrit reuenge done king edward ist cruel maner efter victory king edward tuk baith castel edinburgh striuelyng chasit ye balliol ye castel ar thair iohne cumyng lord strabogy come kyng edward sworn lege man sone efter yi iohne comyng brocht balliol wt son edward mo ro quhair ye said iohn balliol void al kingly abulyemetis come ane quhit wand hand king edward feir lyfe resignit richt titill yt mich haue ye croun scotland burdoun king edwardis hadis maid hym chartour thairof maner iiii yeir regne efter kyng edward couen al ye noblis scotland berwik quhare yai war sworn leill trew subdittis hym tymes cumyng mair secur e constranit yame randir ye strenthis munitionis scotland baith see land hadis sic thingis done send iohne balliol son edward london quhare yai war keipit strag ward lang tyme quhill last sufferit iohne balliol return scotland leuand son plege yt suld attempt na rebellion aganis hym iohne balliol eft returnyng seing hym self nothir cherist comonis nobyllis scotland fled normandy faderis heritage quhare lag age wes maid blind efter quhais deith son edward succedit heritage frace inuadit scotlad gret trubyll sall efter schaw phovv king edvvart come vvith ane army aganis france hovv erle buchquha e maid gret hei schippis ingland vvilliam vvallace vassalage aganis inglismen ca iiii kynge edward nocht remouyng battal mynd supersedit france garnist strenthis scotland resist rebellyon scottis sine went ane army frace leuand behynd hym hew cressyngham regent scotland returning beleuit lytyll iniuris attemptit scottis gret afflictioun done yame weris afore rehersit bot tyrany sic natur yt may neuir haue sufficient munition sicker targe nochtwithstandyng quhat sumeuir garneson laid defence thairof euery pepyl yt opprest tyranny wyll labour exoner thaym yairof quhen euir yai may fynd ony sufficient oportunite ye lord scotland sone efter ye departing king edward renuncit al band promis maid hym conuenit togidder al ane mynd striuelyng recouer yair realme liberte th cou sall wer chosyn xii nobyll men gouernour scotland ylk wtin yair awin boudis yt yai micht ye mair esaly resist ye tyrany kig edward amang quho iohne cumyng erle buchquhan principall ane man singulare prudence baith weir peace yi erle buchquhan come ane army northubirland quhare ceissit fra na maner cruelte yt micht deuisit waistit al ye landis yairof fyre swerd last segit carlele bot sa strangly defendit micht tane tyme ane young namit wyllya wallace son schir andro wallace cragy knicht stature corporall strenth aboue al othir man sene dayis sic prudece craft cheuelry ye nane found perregal hym wallace fra first youth sewit inglismen extreme hatrent sindry ieoperdis mony vailyeant actis support scottis sic incredible strenth cuyng fite age yt vincust oftymes iii iiii inglisme atanis singulare battall quhen ye fame illuster vassalage blawin throw realme mony nobyll men exoner yame fra seruitude inglisme assistit h opinion throw quhilk sa strang yt mycht na way circuuenit treasoun inglismen finaly behad hym sa manly al ieoperdis yt chosyn general vocis quhe maist truble apperit gouernour scotland place iohne balioll delyuer ye samyn fra seruitude tyrany inglismen tyme mony al ye abbasijs prelatijs scotland wa inglismenis handis nochtheles willia wallace comission william fraser bischop sant andros eieckit put yame furth al ti scotland left nothir temporal spiritual religius yair blud scotland sone efter ressauit ye army iohne cumyng erle buchquhan afore constranit scottis obey hym othir force fauour syne come wt prowd baner throw syndry partis scotland inuading inglismen otheris yair opinion efter sindry gret ieodis wa ye castell forfare dude brechin montros slew al ye soudiouris fundin thaym wallace prowd yir feliciteis tuk dunoter efter yt ye principal capitanis yairof war furth slew personis found syne garnist stragest maner efter went aberdene quhilk left wast cu yng becaus castel garnist sic prouision yt mycht takyn gret murdir pepyll left samyn returnit angus king edward heirand thir doingis france send hew cressinghame ane army inuade wallace al sone wallace aduertist comyng army left sege cowpar went brig stryuelyng stop ye ouircumyng hew cressinghame fynaly slew hym syngulare manheid put army flicht efter victory returnit ye sege cow quhilk raderit hym sone efter returning mony scottis send thair ambassatouris wallace efter victory promitting support hym money vittallis gif wald ressaue yame fauouris sindry othir castellis war r derit hym quhilk war garnist hym al prouision efter scalit army come striueling ane certane maist te der freindis becaus saw ane miserabil derth rising al partis scotland ye gret mortalite ye pepyl thairof gaif besines releif ye pepyl sustene yame ye frutis ingland incontinent comandit al scott reddy agane ane prefixt day pa thair auld ennymes mene tyme maid sic punition yame quhilkis repugnant clamation ye remanent pepyl feir yairof h purpos sone eft wallace wt iii battallis arrayit maist awful ordinace brint herijt al northumbirland new castel forcy cheuelry become sic errou fayis yt returnit riche spulye gret triuphis scotland ony battall pof kyng edvvardis message send vvallace v allace ansvver gret prudence cheuelry hovv scottis vvar discomfist falkirk hovv kyng frace purchest peace scottis ca v edward lag schakis heirand ye gret heirschippis slauchter done pepil returnit heuy displeseir ingland send ambassatouris wallace saying bene ingland wallace durst haue done sic cruelteis pepyl thir wordis answerit wallace tuk bot tyme ingland quhen king edward kyng edward tuke scotland quhen fand ye samyn destitute ane heid makand hym conques realme efter noblis chosin hym amiable freindly copositour geif decisioun apon iuris richtis two partis contending ye crown attour mak syngulare maheid prudence mair knawin inglismen king edward may vnderstand besines geuyn perpetuall defence scotlad obstinat mynd baith delyuer said realme seruitude reuenge cruelteis done inglismen tymes bygane comadit ane herald pa king edward aduertis hym yt suld hald pasche ingland gif god fortunit hym lyue dispite king edward al pepil yat wyll beir armoure name last quhen king edward wallace war baith cumyn place assignit day battall set sydis howbeit inglismen wa dowble mair nowmer tha scottis yit wallace per e curage na thing effrayit yair multitude com first feild quhen armyis war reddy ione ye inglismen left thair palyonis maid yame f e mene tyme ye scottis prowde efter mony victoryis seand yair ennymes geif bakkis micht scarsly refrenit fra chace wallace quhilk knew na thing better ye dissait inglismen ran wt swift hors afore scottis exhortyng yame ryn wylfully thair awin perdition deuisit aganis yame slicht ennymes becaus hasty fleyng ing smen nocht bet cullourit fra e yairfore sufficiet yame haue victory bot ony strakis ye scottis beand dantit thus thair wyld fury prudence worthy camploun wer saiffit thair honour liuis returnit scotland infinite spulye rich forthir pepill supportit wallace ay yat grew manheid pissance aganis inglismen samyn maner yai began inuy hym quhen wes cumin vailyeant dedis maist felicite honour specially gret lordis princis realme hauand gret indignattoun ane man small lynage suld rise virtew sa gret estimation reuerence aboue yame throw quhilk rais gret seditioun scotland specially cumyngis robert bruce quhilk inuyit hym maist pkyng edward knawing new sedition send ambassatouris principall men quhilkis inui wallace maist quhen gottyn yame bound opinion come ane army scotland wallace knawing na thing treason deuisit aganis hym rasit army met hym falkirk eftir cumyng rais ane odio debait betuix ye stewart cumyn wallace quhilk thaim thre suld haue wangard ye first two thocht heuy yat man sobir lynage small beginning suld preferrit thaym dignite honouris cheualry ye thrid thocht charge wes geuin hym thre esta ti scotland yat cause wald gif na place yame ye mene tyme ye inglisme come awfully aganis thaym yai wer constranit cum forthwart aganis thair ennymes breistis boldyn yair awin ya yair disples ir kyng edward thair seditioun come deligence battall quhen battallis wer reddy iune ye cumyngis fled feild fol yair opinion robert bruce wes tyme army ingland myt yairfor mak na support scottis yai wer miserablie slane sydis youcht ye scottis wer murdrist maner yic wallace left na thing vndone mycht pertene deuore ane vailyeant campioun exhorting folkis sumtyme nocht effrayir yame quhilkis war afore disco fist onlie feir yair visage su tyme ruscheand throw ennymes yair gret slaucht instruck folkis quhat wes done bot last scottis faucht day hym ouirset multitud inglismen ye cumpanyis robert bruce cumand thair bakkis wer slane wallace seand hym circulit partis ruschit feirslye throw ennymes deliuerit hym hym self maner mene tyme ane strang capitane inglad namyt freir brtangis followit wallace wt gret ferocite bot wallace na thyng astonist cuming met hym nochtwithstanding ye discomfitour scott sic manheid curage yat slew yi capitane face al army ingland residew inglismen feir yairof ceissit fra ony thare chace scottis yi vnhappy battal wes slane ioh stewart bute al folkis quhilkis wer left wallace extreme dangeir efter micht haue delyuerit yame yairof makduf slane battal schir iohne grahame quhais deith icht displesant wallace mony othir nobyl vailyeant men war slane maner quhilkis war ouir prolixt schaw said robert bruce efter cumyn ye backis scottis said wallace maner po wallace quhat presumptuous foly knawyng thy self desert left nobillis commonis scotland fecht sic vane audacite aganis pissance riche kyng ingland seis thow nocht thy self ynnand vter confusioun consideris thow irrecouerabyl da mage approcheing thy displeseir answerit wallace robert thy febyll cowartry sleuth mouis assailye mony patellus ieoperdyis defence thy rycht delyuering realme scotland fra tyranny inglisme thir wourdis war sa deip inp entit brucis hart determit abide na langat opinion ingland treuth sendill ar ye scottis vincust inglismen without sum diuisioun amang thaym self youcht scottis tyme stude sic array thay war inuincibyl culd nocht afore yit robert bruce come ane buschement inglismen thair bakkis quhilk thay war miserably discomfist slane battall strykyn magdalen day fra redemp oun ane miiclxxxxviii ri thairfore inglismen held ay efter ane happy day fecht aganis scottis forthir youcht robert bruce quhilk wes efter king scottis baith battall dunbar battall falkirk ye opinion ingland aganis scottis na crime mycht imput hym thairfore first becaus na refuge scotland ballioll persewit hym deid becaus contendand hym crown secoundly held lordschip cleueland king ingland ane inglisma born howbeit nerest air proximite blud crowne scotland reasoun thairof behuuit make hym seruice al kyng edward promittit retreit sentence gaif ballioll make said robert kyng attoure sanct paule fynd ane gret scurge crystyn pepyll persewit thaym maist cruell ennymyte fra come thair opinioun gretest pyllar faith samyn maner wheit robert bruce persewit scottis gret cruelte postponyng hym fra iust heritage croun yit fra maid kyng best prince euir rang aboue scottis youcht fand scotland gret miserie neir conquest tyranny inglismen yit recouerit syngulare manheid left fre ony clame gud tranquillyte wallace efter yi discomfitoure come perth becaus couth nocht suffir inuy nobyllis rysyng ylk day aganis hym exonerat hym auctorite dischargit hym gouernance realme samyn tyme philip fourt name kyng france hauand gret miseratioun calamyte fallyn confiderat freindis scotland actioun allanerlye france send ambassatouris edward prince ingland quhilk contrackit mariage douchter purchest peace scottis fra ye feist sanctis witsonday nixt following phovv inglismen vver discomfist roslyng hovv kyng edvvard conquest gret roumes scotland hovv fo bessis tuke thair first begynnyng ca vi scottis brokin cotinewal weris send thair ambassatouris paip boniface coplene gret afflictio done thaym king edward quhilk set perdition thair liberte coques yair realme desirit ye paip sen mair empire aboue inglismen ony othir realme interpone auctorite constrane king edward desyst fra inuasioun scottis scottis war content al pleyis concernyng liberte croun scotland war decidit halynes sen samyn may na othirwayis decidit insufferabil damage fallyng ye pepyl blind desyre nobyllis contending ye crowne paip efter tane ripe deliberation mater decernit ye scottis haue iust action battal defence thair liberteis aganis king edward sone efter scottis chesit iohne cumyn gouernoure thair realme al sone king edward aduertist yair rebellyon send ane army throw boundis scotland come perth inuadyng cuntre gret trubyll mony nobyllis becaus thay micht nocht suffer iniuris war randerit otheris quhilkis mair sycht thair liberte seruitude fled ye woddis chesit symon fraseir college thair weris iohne cumyn syne gaderit ane power viii thousand chosyn men reuenge iniuris done inglismen fynaly slew euery ane thaym ouir takyn remanent chasit cuntre kyng edward commouit vassalage send ane vailyeant capitane namit rodulphe confrey scotland xxx thousand men rodulphe efter cumyng scotland tuke lytyl respect scottis bot allanerly war cumyn take scotland pleseir thairfore purposit pa throw boundis scotland thre armyis thre sindry partis ylk army hauand x thousand men nowmer co mandit thaym meit togydder roslyng efter thay cumyn throw cuntre thre syndry partis al sone iohne cumyn symon fraseir war aduertist yairof thay rasit thair folkis traisting na thyng sa gud assailye chance battal ane thir thre armyis thay traistit gyf happinnit thaym haue victory ane thir thre armyis ye remanent two mair able vincust incontinent thay exhortit thair folkis fecht defence thair wyffis lyberteis guddis scottis rasit thir wourdis esperance victory faucht sic inuincible curage thay put first battal inglismen flicht skarsly thay gaderit spulye thairof quhen ye secound battall come yame mair cruelte first nochtheles throw curage thair recent victory thay ionit incredibyll manheid skarsly secound battall vincust quhen thrid battal come thaym fresche power yocht scottis war woundit slane gret nowmer yit hortatioun thair capitane thay ruschit pertely new spreit curage thair ennimes efter lang bergane thay put yair ennimes flycht yame bene sauit war nocht scottis war ouirset lang fechting victory succedit scottis sanc mathewis day fra redemption imiiic twa yeris dout gif euir ony victorie wes conquest afore thir dayis manheid honoure xxx thousand inglismen lang prouision set bat vincust dyscomfist skars viii thousand scottis thairfore ilk man beleuit victory nocht cuming singulare fauour grace god yit ye scottis kepit bot schort tyme yi victorie king edward knawin yi discomfitour rosling rasit army inuaid ye scottis baith see land ye scottis seand ordinance pissance thay mycht resist fled thair strenthis throw quhilk king edwardis army went ony obstakill throw scotland fra north south partis yairof na man foud resist yame except wallace sa mony assistit hym quhilkis leiffit montanis woddis eschew fury inglismen kyng edward heirand ye wallace lurkit dennis lay wait abidyng sum tyme inuaid inglismen desirit sindry message sworne inglisman haue thairfore gret erldomes lordschippis within ingland wallace refusit saying h liberte wes small rentis scotland possession gret landis ingland vnder seruitude castel striueling wes kepit yir dayis b ane vailyeant knycht schir william olifer quhen bene continewally segit thre monethis la vitallis raderit ye hous king edward vnder thir conditionis personis ar ye said castel sal haue fre pasport depart yair baggis guddis thair pleseir nochtheles kyng edward ane fals tyrane brak aith promes behalf eftir castell wes randerit tuke schir william olifer send hym presoner londoun quhair remanyt mony yeris eftir captiuite mony othir castellis wer tane kyng edward maner sodiouris thairof slane ony mercy ranson ye castell urquhard wes takin nane left lyue except ane woman gret child quhome surname boyis forbes discendit woman yat wes sauit maner wes wife alexander boyis lord said castell howbeit wes vnknawin tyme scho wes pure array eftir taiking castell scho fled ireland quhare scho bure hir son alexander alexander quhen scotlad wes recouerit inglismennis hadis come king robert bruce desirit restorit h faderis heritage quhilk wes occupyit tyme othir possessoris kyng robert wery quhat wes done yi er thocht nocht semand ane prince suld tak landis fra nobill men quhilkis wer geuin thaym reward yair manheid al wes iust spulye ye man kindely heritage quhilk fader freindis guddis tynt defence realme yus wes ane mydway deuisit quhilk certane landis mar litil le proffet yan landis urquhard wer geuyn said alexander boyis nochy le man wes callit boyis wes callit forbes slew ane beit singulare manheid quhome surname forbessis discendit pof sindry gret cruelteis done king edvvard aganis scottis hovv ye bruce cumyn var confiderat hovv th cumyn vvas slane ca vii scotland beand subdewit maner kyng edward gart distroy auld lawis constitutionis scotland traisling thairthrow caus scottis inglismen incres togidder blude amite faith phe brint cronikles scotland maner bukis al weill deuyne seruyce othir materis fyne memorye scottis suld peri gret punitioun maid thaym quhilkis war repugnant thir chargis phe gart scottis wryte bukis efter vse sarum constranit thaym say efter vse attoure banist scottis quhilkis ony syngulare eruditioun put thaym oxfurd dreidand nobillis scotland thair eruditioun suld incres virtew sum tyme delyuer thair realme seruitude pattoure tyrane sic bane arrogance dystroyit antiquiteis scotland efter passit throw syndry boundis thairof commandit round tempyl beside camelon cassin quhilk biggit haue schawin honoure claudius empriour goddes uictory nocht suffering inuy sa mekyll antiquiteis oure eldaris remane memorye yit inhabitantis saiffit samyn fra vter euersioun put romane ansenye superstitionis ye wallis thairof ingrauit armis king arthoure commandit callit arthouris hoif p yng edward afore returning ingland na memorie suld remane scotland thair bukis beand vniuersaly brint send chiar marbyll scotland london put westmynster quhare remanis yit syne callit lordis scotland ane conuention ar sanct androis tuk new band thaym leill trew subdittis hym ony rebellioun tymes cumyng lordis scotland war bound hym day except wallace quhom na landis rich mycht brek fra defence lyberte scotland pkyng edward hald scottis opinioun left behynd hym ane vailyeant knycht odomer wallance gouernoure scotland syne returnit gret triumphe london pin mene tyme robert bruce iohne cumyn conuenit togydder first cumyn said bruce thow seis howe kyng edward slais oure pepyll ony occasyoun occupyis oure kyngrik reasoun gud curage thairfore take thy armour wappynnis suffer haue thy landis sall make ye king gyf thow wyll nocht suffer kyng thow sall nocht onely haue landis heritage bot thou sall ay nixt honoure dignite pthus bruce cumyn confiderat togidder endentouris subscriuit athir handis interchangit thair selis sic thingis done bruce returnit ingland pthis rebellyoun robert bruce procedit becaus haldyn ay kyng edward suspition richt crown scottis thairfore durst remane lang scotland king edward slane hym afore gif micht haue gottin hym brethir togidder efter confideration ye cumyn tho ht power auctorite wald lityl effect scotland gif bruce war king thairfore send ane secret seruand king edward schew ye writingis la ly maid betuir hym robert bruce desiring kyng edward gif intendit iose scotland trubyll put ye bruce haistely deith kig edward gaif litil faith yir writyngis first sicht beleuit yt thay come inuy cumyn quhilk dred ye yat suld lytyll pyssance sc tland robert bruce gat ony auc orite last king edward schew yir bruce demandit ony cognossance writ bruce denyit e let ri gret constance sch wing samyn proceding onely inuy cumyn yairfore desirit letteris ane icht failyeing yat preuit ye letteris fals fenyeit suld tyne al landis within ingland king edward gaif lytyll faith thi let e ye wyll god yt bruce suld sauit recouer ye realme scotland seruitude tyranny inglisme ye erle glomer sone efter departyng robert bruce fra kingis presence send hym striuelyng penyis ii scharp sputris throw quhilk bruce co iecturit yt na thing proffitable hym bot spur h hors becaus season wynter erd ouircouerit awis gart ane smyth scho hors bakw rtis nane suld follow hym fut steppis departit londo two traist seruandis deligence yt micht come vii day efter lochmaben quhare brothir edward quhilk gret meruel haiste cummyng incotinent schew come gret trubyll ye cumyn narrowly eschapit life ye mene tyme thay went forthwart thay met ane futman way becaus eschewit gait thay tuke hym fand new wrytyngis hym direckit fra cumin kyng edward quhilk schew gif ye bruce wer nocht slane na thing bot conspiration truble sall follow al partis scotland aganis kig edward al sone bruce red thir writingis inquirit diligentlie quhair cumin wes seruand suspeekand na euill schew yt wes ye freiris dunfreis ye bruce incontinent slew yi man bering yir writingis come haistly queir dufreis quhair fand ye cumyn eftir yt accusit hym schawin awin enventur straik hym ane swerd wambe syne fled haistely ye kirk met iames lindesay roger kirkpatrik tender freindis said thaym trow cumyn slane quhome yai answerit he thow atteptit sa gret ane mater left vncertane incotinent yai went ye cumyn inquirit gif ony deidis woudis gyf trowit recouir gif ony gud surrigiane becaus sayd mycht recouir yai straik hym iii iiii othir straikis mair cruelly sone eftir gaif gaist yeir god imiii v eris hovv vvallace vves r sit schir iohne mentei h king robert brucia coronatioun gret miserie hovv coquest scotland hovv ye douglas tuk yair beginning ca viii th tyme wallace wes tane treasonably schir iohn nteith glasgew deliuerit kyng edward kig edward promittit general edict syndry landis wt gret sowmes money yame ye wald delyuer said wallace h ha dis finaly th wallace brocht london quhare cruelly martyrit tyrany kig edward h quarter sed sindry gret tounis scotland houg vp schame end maid ye nobil wallace maist forcy campion yat dayis yocht othir scottis randerit baith yame self yair cuntre seruitude inglismen wald neuir subdewit bot ay iosing auld liberte scotland nochtheles sic inuy he ay bene yit scotland na nobyll man may leif bot outhir ane treason othir finaly distroyit writtin yat ane haly heremite ingland reuist spreit heuinly contemplation saw wallace fleand inestimabyl glore vnto ye heuyn faucht defece cutre ye deith robert bruce efter ye slauchter ye cumyng send paip absolution attempt ane thing mair audacite aganis kyng edward quhilk micht better resyst tyranny tymes cumyng come freindis scone quhare crownit xxvii day marche yit quhen gaderit al ye pepyl yt micht inuaid king edward bot ane small nowmer maist part scotland aganis hym king edward aduertist rebellion maid aganis hym king robert send ane army scotland odomer wallance lieutennent faucht kyng robert meffene ye xix day iuny quhare ye said king robert put flycht youcht army slane tyme yit pepil yeid fra hym traisting ane euyl signe begin sic discomfitour odomer wallance efter yi victory banist ye wiffis yame ye sisti kig robert throw quhilk mony noble wemen ladyis war costranit pa ye desertis woddis eschew ye cruelte inglismen king robert discomfist wise come athole quhare faucht aganis ye cumyngis inglisme put flicht ye samyn maner afore men slane yit thir frequent discomfitouris sa desolate freindis yt went solita personis cumpany amang ye montanis woddis su enand miserable life ru herbis yi mischace ii maist faithfull seruandis hym ye erle leuenax gylbert hay yocht tyme b fers persecution ennimes yai went fra hi presence yit yai baid ay opinion last al fr indis feir yair liuis skalit fled heir thair thair best refuge quene fled sact dutho tane willia cuming erle ro deliuerit ye king ingland quhare scho abaid cotinewally ye battal baunochtburn brothir nigell thomas alexander war tane su yame heidit carlele sum berwik finaly thay yat fled fra hym war othir slane within ye yeir elli haldin presoneris ingland th king robert brocht sic misery yt sumtyme nakit hungery meit drink saif watter ruris herbis youcht knew weil ye slauchter brothir al othir afflictionis done perdition hym freindis yi sic excellent fortitude al aduersite yat na thing mycht brek inuincible curage sa accustomit euery truble weiris youthe curit nocht sleip ye cald erd drink watter steid aill wyne attoure ane thyng yat apperis haue cumyn myracle grace god howbeit freindis war neir vterly distroyit ceissit neuir haue ferme esperance sumtyme recouer h realme lyberte pepyl last quhen bene vagabound wylsum sindry partis eschew ye treason yame quhilkis war waitand put hym deith come ane freind ilis quhare gat sic support men wappinnis yt tuk new curage assailye ennymes ye samyn way tuke castell carrik slew inglismen quhilkis wer fu din syne delt spulye thairof gret liberalite amang rmen freindis quhilkis war lurkand vnder couert herirand doingis bega return hym al partis sone efter thair assistence wan ye castel innernes slew al ye sodiouris thairof siclik felicite wa mony str ch ye north becaus na pyssance keip thaym kest thaym al part quhare yeid last quhe cumand glennesk gat aduertising yt iohne cumyng syndry inglismen scottis war gaderit aganis hym becaus groud strenthy tuk purpos abide yame battall nochtheles iohne cumyng yir inglisme scottis quhilkis war gaderit geif hym battal seing hym na thing affrayit thair cumyng send ambassa haue trewis eschew present dangeir quhill th war gaderit mair strangly aganis hym yit quhen thir desiris war grantit thay followit hym new power thair maist cruel maner king robert bure hym sa vailyeantly yt oftymes singulare virtew put yame flycht maid ay slauch ter yame howbeit samyn wes bot smal occurris oftymes frequent scarmussing ieoperdis ye fame thir honourable actis drew hym sic fauoure syndry gret baronis scotland assistit hym amang quhome iames dowglas ane man gret spreit manheid quhilk tendir familiar cousing wyllyam lambertoun bischop sanct andros iames dowglas support kyng robert power tuk bischoppis gold hors sindry othir vailyeant youg men opinion went kyng robert byschop lambertoun knawin na thyng thairof howbeit assistit weil yair bot durst opinly auenture gif ony infeliciteis followit efter micht haue cumyn h displeseir iames dowglas te derly ressauit kyng robert co tinewit seruice baith weir peace end lyfe iames discendit ye illuster surname dowglas quhilkis war euir sicker targe weirwal scotland aganis inglismen wan mony la dis yair syngular maheid vassalage said ye bru buke psa mony gud ye douglas h bene ane surname vvas neuir scotland sene pfor thay decorit yi realme mony noble actis glore marciall dedis grew gret estimation nochtheles thair hicht gret pissance baith manrent landis sa suspect kingis quhilk succedit efter yame caus thair declination sen surname wes put doun scotlad done vailyeant dedis ingland bot returne oure h orie deith tyrane kyng edw langschankis hovv edvvard camauer son vvas maid kyng ingland hovv kyng robert gat sindry victory ennymes rth scotland ca ix edward ingland dredand scottis thir feliciteis ryse ilk day ore insolece come ane aufull ordinance euir afore scotlad purpos subdew alluterlie ony recouir cumyng ye bordo ri fell ane heuy maledy deceissit suddanlie ony confessioun sacrament haly kirk treuth ane knycht ingland namyt schir william banistar ye houre kyng edwardis deith fell ane extasy saw odius tyran cruellie eurgi murdir sa mony innocent pepill finalie saw hym c nuoyi infinite noumer deuillis hell al sone knycht sene visioun fell ane heuy maledy culd neuir rest quhill wes brocht ane opin place al ye pepil schaw visioun quhen schaw n samyn pepill circumstance afore reheirsit conualescit perfeuerit gud lyfe pennance deith yi apperis trew becaus bludy tyrane ragit vnnatural cruelte cristi pepil aboue ye rigour armes quhen wes last extreme comandit l young childrin quhilkis wer takin ye castell kildru eftir wes inglism n slane ony compassioun thair tendir eris innocence eftir deith nobillis ingland uk n edward ou carnauer maid hym kyng edward following ye futsteppis fader sumond lordis scotland dunfreis quhare mony thaym wer sworne make homage faith hym yair superiour kyng otheris rebellit aganis hym traisting ye deith kyng edward gret dissentioun trubill follow inglad sonne wes young tuke na counsal lordis bot allanerlie peter ganarstoun quhilk wes haitit baith inglismen scottis kyng edward sone eftir returnit ingland send ambassatouris france desiryng support weris ye mene tyme iohne cumin erle buchquhan gaderit ane army inglisme scottis aganis kyng robert yocht kig robert wes gret infirmi com ane hors litter ye camp aganis h ennymes cumyn othir scottis inglismen gret noumer ab id ane strenth traisting e yair onlie multitude put kyng robert flycht bot last cumyn wes discomfist mony army slane elli ta e victory wes gottin enuertour x mylis fra abirdene wes sa plesand kyng robert yt gat heil yairthrow yeir donald ye ilis come ane gret power aganis kyng robert wes discomfist edward bruce ye watter deir kyng robert eftir sindry chance battall succeding hym gret felicite come ane army argyle nocht onlie subdewit cuntre opinioun bot tuke alexander lord argyle one strang castel thairof banis al freindis ingland quhair sone efter deceissit ye yeir king edward come ane army rafrew returnit ingland wt werk worthy haue memory yeir throw continewall weris rais sic derth scotland nothir vittallis bestial micht gottin ony partis thairof throw quhilk derth sa g et pepyll eit hors othir syndry forbodyn flesche sustene lyuis condition trevvis ane dvvard bruce capitane hovv kig edvvard come c thousand men reskevv ye victory falling erl ra ale ca x kyng robert ye yeir followyng quhylk fra incarnatioun ane miiicxi yeris chasit inglismen partis sco land syne enterit two sindry ymes ingland efter put mony landi pepyl thairof heirschippis slauchter returni scotland innowmerabil iches spulye pray besti throw quhilk inglad put na le affliction trubyll cotland yeir afore reher king edward yeir following ye viii day ianuar king robert wan ye town perth strang hand slew pepyll found kest ye wallis yairof ground ye sam yeir castellis dunfreis aire l nark mony thir strenthis castellis scotland war randerit hym cassyn ye ground castell roxburgh takin schir iames douglas fastronis euyn fra redemptioun ane miiicxiii yeris ye samyn yeir thomas randale erle murray wan castel edinburgh yeir edward bruce segit castell striueling youcht assailyeit al ingyne practik yat micht tak ony hous yit labour vane castell onely strang wallis bot richt strenthy nature ye crag standing ane hye mote quhare na passage bot ane castell ane vailyeant knicht schir phillip mowbray scottisman howbeit followit ye tyme opinioun inglismen hauand sufficient vittallis defend lang tyme edward richt sorowfull mind nocht knawing quhidder suld leif sege continew styll importable expensis thoucht richt degrading honoure se ane sa gret charge apo desist cowartly thairfra last tuke purpos assailye mynd said capitane said gif wald randir hous pleseir suld al familiar king robert afore king edward fynaly becaus capitane refusit andir hous sort assailyeit hym ane new burde howbeit ye samyn succedit mai felicite prudence gif capitane gat na releif king edward within ye yeir nixt following sall randit said castell scottis conditioun peace maid edward bruce gret foly ylk prudent man mycht beleif ryche pissant kyng ingland wald cum support mater hauand lang day prouidit thairwith attour aganis cheuelry geif sa lang trewis quhyll thair ennymes micht sufficiently armit inuaid thaym battall howbeit thir conditionis trewis ane edward bruce wer found rycht vnplesand kyng robert yit wald nocht repugnant yairto auenture sum seditioun truble mycht follow thairefter ix hym brothir yit vnderstude battall wes led alwayis aganis kyng ingland mene tyme kyng edward send kyngis princis wer alliat hym haue support aganis ye scottis promitting eftir victory deuide scotland amang thaym thairfore nocht onlie peple stude vnder empire bot sindry othir infinite pepill come hym thair auenturis specially thay bot small insycht hame traisting purches conques victorie landis rich sufficient sustene thair estait tymes cumyng esperance thairof thay brocht thaym yair wiffis childrin guddis quhilkis thay mycht turs baith fute hors ye landis quhare kyng edward gat support battall wer thir followis holland yeland brabane flanderis picardy bollony gascunye normandye mony othir regionis quhilkis wer tyme othir co fiderat inglad elli vnder thair dominioun thaym mony scottis men quhilkis felicite succedyng inglismen tuke part yi tyme king edward contrar thair natiue prince ye noumer come tyme scotland king edward extendit ane hundreth fifty thowsand fute men al mony hors men wes infinite noumer scudlaris car age men yair wiffis child madinnis seruandis thay wer sicker sit doun perpetually scotland throw quhilk nowmer wes sa gret na ordour craft cheualry mycht obseruat amang thaym men wiffis childrin wer mixt togidder throw quhilk rais ane huge rei clamour partis quhare yai come throw diuersite toungis kyng edward incredible noumer pepil richt proud insolent tuke litill sollicitude thocht battall quhen wes approcheand neir ye merchis scotland tuke auisement nobillis quhat cruell schame full torment micht best punis kig robert nobillis presuming vane arrogance put thaym pyne thay bene sicker handis attoure brocht hym ane carmelite monk discriue conques victory scotland nocht onlie kyng bot euery man cumpany vsit maist detraction scottis tothir side kyng robert thing gret prudence industry xxxm men feirs weil exercit cheualry come pertlie aganis ennymes set doun h tent wt gud array ane plane aboue banochburn uncertane quhethir yi gret confidence folkis gif caus ayis haue na cotemption beleuit followit eftir quhen inglismen began wonder durst cu wt sa small power aganis yair huge ordinance wes said ane agit wyse capitane ingland get na victory day strang bergane gret murdir pepill knew weill ye gret wisdome manheid kyng robert forcy campionis sa lang exercit cheualry forthir strenth h manheid wt crafty slycht maid deip fowse place quhare battall wes set dang sta ki scharp pointis rysing vp couerit scherrettis sic ingyne fu men mych pa thairon ony dangeir bot quhen ony preis hors men come abone ye said fowseis ye lofting suld brek incontinent horsmen suld othir reuin staikis elli inclusit ony passage sic thingis done abaid still ye said place abidyng gret curage cumyng inglismen quhen baith armyis wer approcheing othir within ane myle kyng edward send viiic horsmen ane gait castell striue adue ti capitane al sone kyng robert proceding forthwart thomas randale v laif cuntre fra thair quhilk met thir inglismen inc dible manheid throw quhilki wes touch cruelly victorie lag tyme ye face aith army ye mene tyme schir iames douglas dred yat erle thomas speciall tender freind suld set multitude inglisme incontinent fell kneis kyng robert desiring licence support freind becaus kyng wald nocht condiscend purpos sa haistely desyrit ruschit ye army ony licence ane cupany chosin men ye effect foresaid last quhen wes cumyng neir ye place quhare erle faucht saw ye victorie inclinand hym gret murdir inglismen stude still suld nocht cumyng eif fra tender freind ye glore victorie quhilk conquest sic felicite manheid victorie wes sa plesand army scottis yat euery man wes spretit new curage beleuyng wt sicker esperance felicite hastely approcheing phovv tvvo kyngis exhortit ya armyi battall hovv inglismen vve discomfist banochburn king edvvard chasit douglas dubar gret rich fell scottis yi victorie hovv toun handvvarp flemingis tuk thair begining ca xi inglismen wa litil astonist discofitour howbeit thay saw scottis vassalage maheid noumer pepill fyne scottis sall ht insolent throw said victorie yat set battal fecht wt yame ye morow kyng robert maid folkis youcht thay wer noumer reddy battall samyn maner casting hym mony wayis bring ennymes fowleis afore deuisit first comandit army mak thair confessionis reddy morow ressaue ye blissit sacrament eftir messe throw quhilk thay mycht haue better esperance victory tothir side inglismen hie curage beleuit nocht bot huge pray landis guddis fal yame smal laubour ane day nycht afore battall kyng robert wes rycht wery hauand gret solicitude weil army mycht take na rest bot rolland ieoperdeis chance fortoun mynd sum tymes went deuoit co templatioun makand orisoun god sact phillane quhais arme beleuit set siluer wes closit ane cais within palyeon traisting better fortoun follow samyn mene tyme ye cais hakkit suddanlie ony motion werk mortall creaturis preist astonist wounder went alter quhare cais lay quhen fand arme cais crijt heir ane gret mirakle incotinent confessit brocht tume cais feild dredand yt rillik suld tynt feild quhair sa gret ieoperdeis apperit kyng reiosing mirakill past remanent nycht prayaris gud esperance victorie morow gaderit al army messe ressaue body god mak thaym haue curage aganis thair ennymes army wes ane deuoit man namit maritius abbot inchechaffray quhilk said messe ane hi mote ministerit eucharist kyng nobillis causit preistis mak ministratioun thairof residew army eftir kyng robert callit ye pepill standart said maner beleif maist forcy campionis nane amag yow nocht knawing necessar w fecht day aganis oure ennymes ye se ane army gaderit aganis yow nocht onlie inglismen bot sindry othir nationis liand yame cumyng aganis w thair wiffis childrin nocht onlie dwel boundis bot al banis w ye samyn tedis manure ladis frequet housis tempillis finalie bring w sic vter rewyne yat fame memorie sall peri albion oure ennymes he tane lang consultatioun howbeit wes folie quhat cruel horrible torment thay sall pyne w euir vincust cum yair hadis knawing inuincible curage manheid sa lang exercit cheualry quhilk rycht patent lang experience nochyeles gif ye wil knaw quhat vailyeant men bene thir inuading yow sic vane mynassing maist forcy inuincible campionis thay ar refuse realmes ony practik experience cheualry continewally sen yair first yeris drownit lustis amang effeminat huris becaus thir febill cowart bodyis he waisti thair patrimony landis gudis vile corruppit vsis thay intend ding yow fra natiue landis heritage roumes noctheles ye sall haue sone experience yat salbe na mair difficulte slay thaym yan scheip forther suppois thay wer dotat maist vertew ye suld ther affrayit yit fule hardy sa fa haue ane iustar qu rrell defend yan yai haue sew sa far suld beleif yat god salbe mair fauorable w yan yame god he schawin w fauour myrakle sanct phillane quhilk cumyn beleif eiris yairfore pray yow gud cofort ye ar set yone confusit multitude peple traist weill quhare god concurrant na multitude ennimes may auail noumer pepil cumis aganis yow pray rich sall cum proffet tothir side kyng edward prayit folkis remember gif thay faucht vailyeant lie ane hour two yai suld haue infynite rich ye realme scotland reward thair laubour quhilk desyrit nocht bot superiorite attour prayit yam remember quhat irrecouerable schame suld follow sen thay wer departit thair cuntreis returne hame pro fet victorie last quhen yai wer pas forthwart battal yai mycht skarslie e seuerit fra embrasing yair wiffis childrin nocht yel hortation yair capitanis yai come gud array archea stude arrayit amang ye hors n abou wyng ye battall euir myddis yame traisting yair ocht pissance sustene ordi ance kyng robert sall haue na esperance thaym lei ya hors cum fu e abbot forsaid tuke quhilk crucifi wes afore ane bane scottis f l comending yam god ye scottis fal b leuit thaym oldin bu saw yame ryse yai began b first ionyng quhilk wer skirttes ye v ingis ye scottis quhil bruce come yair spe brak litil ane battal hors xxx come atrani haue scottis quhen yai forthwar maist al ani ye fowseis miserably slane scottis throw ennymes wer men wemen aboue thair doun ye hil fornece yair ennimes maist auful terribill noyis ye inglisme fech tha maist fury agan ye scottis vncertane victory seing yi new ordinace cuming ye hyll yair face sore affrayit beau thay micht skarsly sustene ye violent preis scottis tha present thay beleuit vtly distroyit gif ya seuerit ony forthir battal gaif backis quhom followit ye scottis insaciabyll yre maid slaucht al ti quhare thay come specially quhare king edward fled schir iames douglas iiiic chosin na thig irkit wt tinewall slaucht ennymes followit kig edward lang chace dubar quhare wes ressauit pat ik u bar erle marche xv erlis put ingland ane fischar bait exaple ye vnsicker ait glore princ yocht yi edward wes yi day morow rycht proud mony duk erlis baronis vnd empire vnlik sutyme ye gret king xerris yit costranit euyn sai life ane pure fischar ba fleand see inglad battall war slane lm inglisme ye duk glocister wt iic knichtis amang otheris wes slane schir gelis argenty lyis sanct cuthbertis kirk beside edinburgh ye deith schir gelis sa displesant king robert ye familiar e yt hym ingland yt reiosit na thing ye psent victory w yairfore heuely repreuit noblis becaus apperit dolorus efter sa gret felicite falling h pepil scottis war slane scarsly iiiim ii knichtis schir willia pont schir walt ro ye spulye wes sa gret gold siluer othir iowell gott n ye said felo yt al ye scott richit ye samyn notwithstanding thair gret pouerte falling thyam afore tinewal weris yai gat yi tyme lytyl le money rich ranson inglis presoneris tane yame tha spulye ye feild kig robertis wyfe quhilk haldyn viii yeris afore ingland wes inter changeit ane duk ingland ye goldin silkin claithis quhilkis kyng edwardis palyonis war maid war distribut amag ye abbays scotland vestametis frontallis yair altaris quhilkis mony yit remanis day attour ye freir carmelite quhilk wes brocht haue writtin king edward put victory versis wes tane yi feild comandit king robert sithement h rasoun write saw yi carmelite f eir maid yir ousty versis quhilk beginnis th de platu c metru cu carmine nudo said ye nicht afore yi battal ii men vncouth habit come abbot glassinbery inglad ane abbay hospitalite desirit luging ye abbot ressauit yame plesandly quhe demadit yame quhat yai war quhare thay war passand yai schew yt yai war seruad god send help ye scottis banochburn ye mo ow yt abbot fand yam away cuir ye yeti wer opnit yair beddis sta ding ye array yai war left beleuit thairfore yt yai war angellis send uision god defende ye scottis yair iust materis aganis ye tyrany inglismen ye samin day yt yi battal strikin ane knicht wt schinad armour schew ye pepil aberdene ye scot gottin ane glorious victory inglisme son eft went ouir pe land firth haldin ye pepil sanct maunis prince sutyme orknay ye caus kig robert dotat ye kirk orknay vli str ueling ye customes aberdene furnis breid wyne walx ye said kirk king robert eft yi glori victory rewardit mony nobil realme ladis gudis thair prouin maheid virtew ye said battal robert fleming faithful seruice gat ye ladis cumernald quho ar discend ane noble hous seuerand yit gret honoure thir day said ye ii knichtis braban come request kig edward yi battal last quhen thay hard maist iniurius wordis detraction spokin inglismen ye nicht afore ye battal aganis king robert yai prayit god send hym victory yit wordis yai come sic hatrent inglismen yt thay eschapi narrowly yair lyfe proclamationis maid wald brig yair heidis suld haue ic mark riueling h reward king robert rad quha trubil thay come sake rewardit yame ith riche spulye ye said battal quhilk thay returnit braban biggit toun hadwarp ingrauit ye armes yt bruce maist curiously al ti ye said toun ane memorial ye beneuolence yt yir ii knych kig robert liberalite yi glori victory succedit scottis ye natiuite sact iohne baptist fra redemptioun imiiic xiiii yeris phovv croun scotland vvas tail yeit kig robert airis hovv edvvard brothir vvas maid king ireland slane inglismen hovv kig robert sufferit gret distres irelad ca xii banochburn dicofist th maner king robert set ane parliament aire quhilk consent thre estatis gat croun scotland railye hym ye aris le gottin body page duplicate page duplicate faily ing yairof ye croun cu edward bruce bruthir failyeing ye air ale yame baith ye croun cu mariory douchter ye air gotti hir body quhatsueuir attour gif kig robert h bruthir ha nit deceis ye airis mariory war fite age comandit thomas randal erle murray syster son king robert sall gouernour scotland quhil ye air said war cumin fection yi mariory gottin king robert ye erle marri sister first wife maryit efter ye auise ye noblis walter gret stewart scotland king robert sone eft maryit elizabeth oucht ye erle hullester uho gat ane son namit dauid douchter margaret mald first maryit ye erle bure hym ane son namit ye secoud mald deceissit ance king robert efter ye mariory first douchter went throw al ye boundis lme confermit yair auld uilegis bot dota sindry townis ba onyis realme new prerogatiuis specially ye townis perth dund aberdene apperis yit charteris ye yeir following quhilkis fra redemption imiiic xv ye princis ireland opprest lang tyra ny inglisme traisting becaus sa huge victory gotin scott recouer yair liberte send yair ambassatouris kig robert desiring hym send bruthir edward ressaue ye croun irelad edward refusing yair desiris went ane nowmer ireland quhare assistece ye pepil yairof wan ane gret town namit ulcony slew ye inglsmen yt fand prince ireland efter yt thay chosin edward bruce king send ambassatouris ye paip desiring hym ratify ye thing ya haue done yair comon weill thay wald leif na langer vnder seruitude inglismen yir ambassatouris purchest mony terribyl monitionis ye paip aganis inglisme caus yame depart ireland yit yai wald obey thairto bot thirlit ye pepil yairof ylk day wt mair tyranny king robert heirand quhat dangeir brothir bec yn new armyis inglisme ylk day contrar left schir iames douglas gouernour scotland went ane army support bruthir ireland quhare sustenit sic miserabil distres yt ane gret army deit hunger ye residew constranit eit hors quhe within ane dayis iornay h bruthir kig edward haue supportit hym sufficiently ye residew h army ye said edward abiding cumyng faucht vnprudently wt inglisme vncertane quhethir knew ye cumyng king robert brothir gyf throw birnand desire battall dred yt bruthir suld reif hym ye glore victory last seand curage men fail yt suld tine ye honour nation faucht na le maheid tha seuerand costance ye deith slane fra ye incarnation imiiicxviii yeris phovv king edvvard vvas discomfist schir iames douglas gret vassalage done vvilliam sinclar bischop dunkeld aganis inglismen hovv bervvik vvas recouerit ca xiii edward king ingland heirad ye passage kyng robert ireland thocht tyme expedient conques scotland come ane greter power euir afore nochtheles schir iames douglas gouernoure gaif hym battal bordouris put hym army flycht howbeit victory succedit infinite slauchter athir syde battall schir iames douglas slew thre ye maist vailyeant campionis ingland awin handis kyng edward disparit ye souerane heid wisdome schir iames douglas conques ony honour scotland land tuk purpos assailye se send ane flote schippis forth quhilk brint heryit land euery syde thaym duncane erle fyf heirand yir cruelteis done inglismen come wt vc bodyn men resist yair inuasioun nochtheles fra saw yame mair power tha micht resist fled abak mene tyme met hym willia sinclare bischop dukeld lx weil armit men finaly brocht agane ye pla e quhare inglisme war rynnand wt awful incursionis throw ye cutre ye first iunyng vc inglisme war slane ye remanent chasit yair baitis finaly yai entrit sa gret nowmer yt ye bait sank doun wt yame yai micht cu yair schippis bischop sinclare th honest vassalage wes ay callit eft king robert bischop ye yeir robert stewart son walter stewart mariory bruce borne quhilk succedit efter ye deith king dauid bruce ye croun yeir quhilk fra redeption imiiicxviii yeris erle thomas ra dal enterit ye north ti inglad returnit gret pray men gudis ony trubyl army recouerit berwik industry ane inglisma namit spalden quho ye said town recouerit efter yt bene inglismenis handis xx yeris posterite bruk yit certane landis angus ye samyn caus yeir following king edward segit berwik bot sa vailyeantly defedit yt returnit hame wt smal honour tyme mariory bruce king robertis doucht deceissit sone efter lang peace takin betuix inglismen scottis pof blak parliament hovv king edvvard coplanit paip iniuris scottis orison maid papis legat king robert ansvver ca xiiii kyng robert ha realme ony trubyl ennymes held ane parliament perth desirit lordis schaw yair halding charteris yair landis lord efter lang auisement pullit yair swerdis ani said thay na othir euidentis chartouris schaw yair landis king robert richt affrayit sicht howheit tuke gret indignation hatrent mynd dissimilit ye samyn ane time said yai schaw yame nobil men sen thay wan deba tit yair land ye swerd nochtheles gret hatrent aganis yame mynd determit reuenge yair proude cotemption quhe euir fand sufficient oportunite sindry ye noblis aduertist yat ye king mouit gret hatren aganis yame thocht best attempt ane thing mair cruel aganis hym afore h purpos come effect maid ane bad amag yame self put hym auenture sum compasit sli htis kyng edwardis handis yi treason nocht lang hid king robert nochtheles verite thairof suld mair patent king robert gart certane quiet person ly ye gait ripe al passingeris wart bordouris se gyf thay micht find ony letteris thaym quhairthrow mycht ye mair surely aduertist yair treason said ane palmer send thir lordis haue passit king inglad yair band samyn inclusit withi ane staf nochyeles tane finaly brocht ye band letter cotenand ye hail treason deuisit aganis king robert al sone kig robert visit ye letter send yir noblis cu hym wt al deligence ane gret mater war occur ant quhilk micht dressit yair cosultation efter yair cuming demandit yame gif ya kend yair writtis selis becaus yat deny thay war send castell remane ward quhil forthir auisit sic thingis done went berwik coman ane masar arrest schir willia soulis capitane yairof iusti e becaus masar feir gret man astonist pullit mais fra hym said capitane tratour arrest thus schir willia tane brocht perth nocht lang efter ane co uention lordis perth call blak perliament fra ye incarnation ane miiicxx yeris ye first king robert accusit sister sonne dauid abirnethy knew treason howbeit assistit yairto bot wald reuele tyme king wald fane yt bene saiffit nochtheles sa rigor laif micht esaly done becaus na man laubourit hym heidit gret lament pepyll haldin ye floure cheuelry fochty mony yeris afore gret honoure victory aganis turki morow remanent conspiratouris war heidit ye samyn maner ony rcy yi tyme king edward send wryttyng ye paip complening iniuris done scottis saying sa cruelly inuadit thaym mycht nocht pa army aganis
