turki eldaris afore yit cum realme support inuade ony othir pepyll thairfore desirit papis halynes gif h desirit peace amang cristin princis wyld fury scottis rageand maist cruelte agan hym thir siclik wourdis mouit paip gret hatrent aganis scottis howbeit haill occasioun al weris betuix ingland scotland sone efter ane legat send paip king robert complenyng iniuris trubyl done pepyll aganis inglismen saying ye cristin faith micht neuir sickir sa lang crystyn princis war contynewall debait amang thaym self weill apperit gret turk cruell vnmercyful ennyme cristin pepyll conquest laitly gret boundis cristindome eikand dayly empire new conques legat efter thir wordis remouit quhil king tane auisement nobillis quhat answerit mater haill nobilite scotland beand present conuentioun lang degeist deliberation concludit mair dispite inuaid inglisme new army said wourdis legat war nocht worthy haue answer ylk mycht cleirly vnderstand paip w nocht sa myschant bot knew weill ye motiue thir w ri sen yair caus bene oft deuoluit afor inglismen continewaly set conques thair realm howbeit thay na iust tytyll clame thairto crown scotland he ben iosit scot sic liberte ye lxxxxvi kingis lang progression he linaly succedit thay dayis ay ane blude ony interruption quhill laitly inglismen quhen thay saw ye succession king alexander failye maid thaym conques crown scotland caus thay wald first dant ye inuasion inglismen efter thay wald correckit papis mynd legat depeschit th maner returnit hame ony expedition desiris phovv kyng edvvard efter gret crueltei done army scotland vvas discomfist kyng robert byland hovv hamyltonis tuk thair begynnyng king edvvardis deith ca xv schort time followig king robert enterit ane army ingland waistit al landis thairof wt fyre swerd quhi come croce stane mure king edward mouit yir iniuris come scotland ane hudreth thousand armit fute hors king robert aduertist cuming gart bring al cornis bestial within strenthis quhare thay micht gottyn support army ingland last inglismen come edinburgh bot ya war constranit within xv dayis depart penurite vittallis yit within dayis efter thay returnit scotland c ssit fra na maner cruelte pepil thairof thay spulyeit abbay melros slew sindry agit monkis thay spulyeit ye eucarist ye ai siluer quhairit hang kest ane trein kist co parit iustly barnis lucifer quhilkis intendit spulye god awin hous attoure thay brint driburgh mony othir religio abbayis place king robert reuenge yir iniuris come sone efter ingland waist landis townis yairof quhil come vnto york faucht king edward byland put army flycht gret slauchter baith inglismen normandis quhilk mony war takin ransonit gret sowmes money battall strokyn fra redemptio imiiicxxiii yeris nocht lang efter king robert send ane ambassatoure renew band betuix france scotland e ki yir conditionis said band gif succession failyeit ony thir two kingis vncertane quha suld yair aire clame richt crown decidit noblis baith ye realmes thay sall onely exclude tyranis gif ony yame wald vsurpe crown bot defend ye iust heritour thairof band ratifyit comunion blissit sacrament interuention ye papis auctorite tyme ane inglisman nobil bl de namit hantoun eschew ye hatrent kig edward fled king robert scotland yi hatoun eft ye battal banochburn ye king inglandis hous london ane syngulare fauour king robert oftymes aua sing gret manheid virtew quhill last iohne spensar rich familiar tender seruitour king edward howbeit vile obscure linage tuk sic displescir auasing king edward ennyme ya pullit haistely swerd hatoun howbeit lityl wers hantoun impatiet suffer th outrage man hye spreit curage ceissit nocht fra contynewall wait quhyl last slew spe sar becaus consultit freindis eschew ye kingis hatrent fled gret deligence scotland tenderly king robert gat landes cadyow quhais posterite perse eris yit amang w spred gret nowmer pepyl callit hamyltoni sum part changit fra ye name yair first begynnar quhill sic thyngis war done scotland king edward ouernit ye realme ingland baith peace counsal hew spensar ane man smal lynnage quhilk montit hye honoure n sic maner kyng gouernit onely hym held noblis na estimation oblis impacient suffer ane lynnage aboue thaym quene hir son prince ingland tuke kyng edward fo ce armes toward slew yi spensar mony othir kyngis treasonable cousallour schort ty e fter kyng edward slane miserably pr son ia ellouris quhilkis kepit pres un quhare put hym hais ely deith auyse sonne pressit ane heuy burd wambe becaus deit sa haistely thay desirit punition yai put ane hait yrne throw ane horne fundement brint ye inwart partis body thairwith quhil deid yt pepyl micht vnderstand deit na outwart woundis bot allanerly naturale infirmite efter quhais deith h son edward windsour succedit crownit ye xxvi day ianuary fra ye incarnation ane thousand iiicxxvi ye phovv iohne ballio transfertit al rycht crovvne scotland king robert hovv crovvn vvas nevv tailye dauid bruce hovv schir iames dovvglas erle thomas randaill gret vassal age scotland ca xvi robert recouerer otlad efter mony illuster dedis publik weill liberte scotland howbeit richt yneuch crown thairof knawing balliol vnabyll iose crown becaus exonera hym self thairof p tyng realme ennymes handis yit airis ballioll suld haue na iust clame crown efter deith send schir iames dowglas frace solist iohne ballioll transfer icht king robert airis geif balliol baith money landis scotland richt said balliol cumyng schir iames fallyn blynd lang age said ay vnabyl haue gouernit realme scotland na e sa abyll king robert h cousing quhilk sa vailyeantly defendit fra maist cruell ennymes pincontinent balliol callit freind afore hym transferrit richt clame yt micht haue ye croun scotland ye said king robert airis quhatsumeuir desyryng na thing sa mekyl hym air regne perpetuall felicite kyng robert heirand ye returnyng schir iames dowglas gud expedition eris conuenit noblis ane counsall cambusk neth maid new ta ye son dauid yi maner gif son dauid dece airis body h nepot robert stewart gottin iory bruce h doucht sal succeid ye croun al ye noblis wer sworne defed th new tailye ye mene time kyng edward send ambassatouris scotland desiryng peace howbeit wes vnder dissait nochtstandyng peace cotrackit inuadit scotland continewal weris nocht lang efter kyng robert fel gret infirmite gaif ouir gouernance realme erle thomas randall schir iames douglas thay war ii ye maist nobill knychtis warld thir two chiftanis enterit northumberland xxvm men aganis quhome come kyng edward icm men nochtheles thir two campionis gouernit thair army sic manheid wisdome thay waistit ye cuntre quhare yai come returnit ony damage scotland kyng edward resist thir incursionis come ane cm men scotland wrocht gret cruelteis quhare thay come yat fyne scottis suld come defence thair landis guddis last quhen thay lyue thre dayis ye watter tyne mycht cum ouir wes rysin aboue brayis tythingis come yat al northumberlad wes brint heryit scottis ye forray passand sa fast throw cuntre ony residence yt na man wist quhare find yame mene tyme wer send exploratouris swift hors se quhair scottis wer fand thaym within thre mylis ye tentis inglismen arrayit ane hill reddy fecht edward rasit tentis incontinent come fornens scottis moro baith ye armyis wer arrayit vtheris sycht scottis beand small noumer regard inglismen stude arrayit ane gret strenth hill last quhen inglismen stand day durst nocht brek thair array thay returnit thair palyonis send ane herald scottis desiring yame gif yat durst fecht cum planis quhare thay mycht haue battal bene na prudence capitanis garnis thair army maist ordour munition mycht deuisit quhen ye armyis stad thre nychtis athir sycht durst nocht inuaid othir thay returnit thair tentis eftir ye baith ye armyis standin lang tyme arrayit othir sycht maner schir iames douglas tuke purpos assailye ane mater gret vassalage incontinent chesit iic rycht vailyeant deliuer men swift geldingis slippit quietly wache inglismen quhilk wer tyme sleip except ane certane quhilkis wer awalkenit dyn hors feit thus come douglas ony noyis king edwardis palyoun wer nocht army ingland rais hastelie hym slane kyng cuttit ii towis tent returnit army scottis ony damage hym folkis ye inglismen eftir effray wer vigilant time cuming thay bene alluterlie discomfist gif army scottis inuadit thaym said nycht scottis traisting yi vassalage sufficient tyme returnit hame ony displeseir al sone inglismen wer aduertist scottis wer departit thay come haistely ye place quhare thair tentis lay esperance sum ryche spulye fad xm pair hieland schone skatterit throw boundis quhair ye army scotland lay quhilkis wer left behynd cariage impediment thair ganging ye inglismen beleuit sic thingis left thair derisioun returnit hame ony proffet honoure sallyng thaym yi vayage yeir walter stewart deceissit quhais son robert wes eftir king scotland yeir following quene elizabeth moder prince dauid bruce deceissit wes buryit dufermling fra redemptioun imiiicxxviii yeris myn yeir kyng robert wan ye ca el noram sone eftir segit castell anwik quhare mony nobill men scotland wer slane pand end eir ng edwarde send ambassa ouris scotland treit peace renuncit rycht clame yat mycht haue ye realme co land declarit al fre wes tyme kyng alexander ye thir condi ionis mbirland salbe marchis otland ye ist partis cumber marchis ye west bordour thairof attoure ye said renun ation maid kyng edward skaithis done scottis glismen kyng robert sal pay said kyng edward xxxm markis striueling peace sall remane sickernes king edward maryit sister iane dauid bruce prince scotland berwik ye xvii day iuli presence mony nobillis baith scotland ingland deith louyng kyng robert bruce testament legacy hovv schir iames douglas vv chosin pa vvith hart haly land ca xvii kyng robert leiffit nocht lang eftir mariage deceissit cardros lipre quhilk fel hym letter end age vii day iunii ye xxiiii yeir regne fra redemptioun imiiicxxix yeris ane ye maist vailyeant princis wes ony part warld dayis hauand experiece baith gud euil fortoun realme beand ty e brethir slane except h brothir edward perseuerit sic manheid inuincible spreit yat recouerit realme liberte quhen mony gret baronis scotland wer aganis attoure wes na le honoure apprising amang ennymes yan amang freind king edward happinnit comoun ane solepnit banker sindry vailyeant princis concernyng ye glore armes cheualry quhen noblis wer disputand sindry purpos yairof thay fel ane question quhilkis wer ye thre maist vailyeant forcy campionis leiffand yair dayis eftir lang contentioun thay proponit yi questioun discussit ane herald wes king armes kyng armes wes rycht stupefact residew heraldis nocht allanerlie king bot mony nobillis wer beleuit thair singulare manheid noumerit amang yi thre howbeit happinnit far fra thair purpos herald knew nocht onlie nobillis ingland bot othir nobillis vailyeant princis warld quhare trauellit hauand al thair dedis recent memory first maist vailyeant campioun said herald wes hary ye emprioure subdewit thre kyngis thre realmes debaittit imperiall dignite gud felicite end lyfe pthe secound schir gelis argenty becaus victorious thre sindry battallis aganis sarazenis slew thre thair principall capitanis awin handis pthe thrid gif war nocht displesant prince schaw verite robert bruce kyng scotland incontinent rais ane huge noyis clamour ye pepyll thair present becaus herald sa per ely schew verite ony feir presence prince said herald beseik thy hienes gif haue nocht failyeit take declaratioun na displeseir gyf necessar ony vincust le dishonour vincust hym maist vailyeant hym maist cowart attoure schaw yow far auance gret manheid king robert quhilk ye may euyl suffer nowmerit thir two first campionis howbeit gyf verite war schawin mycht prefer hym weill two maist vaylyeant campionis afore rehersit ye gret actis vailyeant dedis done hary empriour war nocht done awin manheid prudence bot erar counsall nobillis contrar robert exilit realme recouerit manheid contrar gret pyssance thy nobyll fader mony gret baronis scotland fynaly stabyllit sic tranquillite apperit mair terribyll ennymes ingland otheris inuasouris euir ennymes war afore subdittis attoure nane lyue wyll reproche honoure wyll deny thir premissis bot wyll preif samyn handis singulare battall honoure adiugit hym victorious attoure sic incredybyll manheid strenth yat nane h realme durst moue ony rebellioun agan hym king robert schort tyme afore deith gaderit nobyllis ane counsall commendit thaym gouernance sonne dauid tyme bot seuyn yeris age gaif counsall afore deith yame syndry hi materis concernyng gouernance scotland first counsallit thaym neuir make ane lord ilis pepyll thairof ar ay flowand thair myndis sone brocht rebellyoun aganis kyng fra thay fall thairintyll extreme lauboure dant thaym ye gret straitnes land secoundly neuir set battall inglismen ieoperd realme apon chance ane battall bot resist inglismen erar frequent armussyng ony set battall fyne gyf scottis discomfist thay may haue sum pyssance resist thair ennymes thridly inhibit scottis take ony lang peace inglismen ingyne man growis dull febyll lang sleuth laik vse experience thay may nocht sustene gret chargis battall specially quhen thay ar effeminate lang peace sen ye inglismen kepi neuir peace scottis quhen thay se ony auantage thoucht best neuir haue peace inglismen aboue thre four yeris quhen lest occasion battall appe e inglismen maist vigilant auenture thair ennymes cum thaym ony aduertysyng becaus maid solempne vote pa ane army defence crystyn faith aganis turki preuenit untimus deith left hart crist chesit trew knycht schir iames dowglas pa haly graif howbeit presence bene maist necessar defence realme caus dowglas bure ye bluddy hart thair armis pand heir endis fourtene buke thir croniklis heir begynnis xv buke croniklis scotland phovv schir iames douglas past vvith kyng roberti ha haly graif coronatioun kyng dauid bruce hovv erle thomas randale vvas maid gouernoure deith ca primo quhen schir iames dowglas chosyn maist worthy scotland pa kyng robertis hart haly land put ane cais gold arromitike precious vnyementis tuke hym schi wyllyam synclare schi robert logan mony othir nobyl men haly graif quhare buryit said hart maist reuerence solempnite culd deuisit sic thyngis done went othir cristin princis quhilkis war gaderit gret armyis fra syndry partis crystyndome weir aganis turki syngular vassalage dantit nocht onely ennymes crist bot frequen victoryis wan gret honoure crystyn pepyll pat last quhen completit chargis commandit souerane na le honoure magnificence pulli vp salis haue returnit scotland mene tyme contrarius wyndis dryuyn ane angyll spanye quhare fand kyng aragon reddy fecht aganis sarazenis quhilkis war cumyn gret nauyis inuade realme dowglas make manheid syngulare virtew patent partis quhare come went kyng aragon faucht support sindry ieoperdyis gret felicite quhill last hauand ouir gret confidence fortoun quhilkis bryngis mony nobyl men deith become necligent held nocht weir men hym accustomat afore mene tyme ane buschement turki quhilkis warly afore wait come hym wt displayit baner yocht nowmer schrinkit nocht bot faucht obstinatly perseuerant manheid deith slane ye xxvi day august fra redemption ane thousand thre hundreth xxx yeris pthis ye end nobyll dowglas maist vailyeant knycht dayis quhylk bene rycht necessar defence commoun weil scotland gyf bene fortunat returne lvii sindry tymes victorious inglismen xiii tymes turki wryttyn lenth scoticronicon bot wyl returne history pefter deith kyng robert sonne dauid hauand bot viii yeris age crownit scone ye xxiiii day nouember fra incarnatioun e thousand thre hundreth xxxi yeris becaus vnabyll gouerne ye realme tender age erle thomas randale maid gouernoure erle thomas seyng pepyll brokyn lang weris thoucht maist expedient quhill thay war sum partis enrichit thair gudis haue peace ingland belyue ambassatouris war dereckit hym ingland purchest peace thre yeris mene tyme erle thomas gaue ingyne gouerne realme equite peace fyne pepyll mycht leif ony feir ennymes theuis inuade thaym thair landis guddis commandit sadyllis brydyllis othir instrumentis pertenand vse husbandry sal ly thair furth baith day nycht gyf ony thaym war stollyn tane away schiref schire sall caus samyn othir restorit aw aris llis pay awin put fynaly sic extreme punitioun maid theuis baith thift ykry war dantit partis realme brocht mair tranquillite euir ony kingis tyme afore mony insolent wild men war dantit seuerite iustice pattoure virtew suld autorist realme commandit na vagabound ydill pepyll ressauit ony town without thay su craft debait thair leuyng way purgit realme mony ydill lymmaris said sic seuerite iustice tyme ane ca le becaus mycht nocht steill othir mennis guddis stall awin pleuch yrnis mycht haue valour thair recompensit hym schiref nochtheles sic extreme dilygence maid serchyng pleuch yrnes schiref thay war fynaly found hym self caus hyngit eftir erle thomas seand difficyl bring thaym fra stouth he bene hantit thairwith held ay hym ane gard bodin men throw quhilk punist rebellyoun lymmaris partis realm personis competit iustice war punist mercy otheris war found rebelland thairto war othir slane tane efter gard hapnit nocht lang efter halydon quhare thre score men war gaderit togydder inuading pepyll reiffis iniuris becaus thay contempnit offyciaris efter thay war summond compere iustice thay war tane gard hynggit iebatis throw iustyce na rebellyoun sene realme mony yeris efter sic tranquillite nocht allanerly theuis lymmaris war dantit bot realme incressit ryches ye gret terrour thair fais kyng edward seyng gret felicite succedyng scottis dredad thaym reuenge auld iniuris singulare maheid prowes erle thomas thocht na thyng sa gud attempt thing slicht micht nocht b force eft deith erle thomas ye realme scotlad myt patent h iniur king dauid young mony nobillis mouit gret hatren aganis hous slauchter thair faderis ye blak parliament thairfore tuk cosultation quhat ingyne slycht mycht best distroy erle thomas last uk purpos sla hym vennome becaus dangerus attempt mater ane scottisma eling treason sum auenture thocht necessar haue man gret spreit quhilk couth ssimill saying ane thyng mouth quhilk thocht neuir hart quhen serchi ang fand nane sa abyll bring purpos effect ane monk oftymes men ordoure he respect schame iustice bot clokis thair wickit lyffis vnder fenyei schaddow ane co le pschortly iustruckit yi monk bene ane medcin hauand speciall remeidis aganis grauell infirmite erle thomas heuely torm ntit king edward comandit monk vse vennomus potionis amang othir seropis promittit gif erle thomas slane industry reward hym maist richely monk instruckit wyse cumyng scotland fenyeit hym haue knawlege mony nobillis baith ingland france nocht onely curit thaym syndry grauellis bot crafty potionis brak confermit stanis he curit mony dyuers pepyll thair infirmyteis forthir informit erle thomas ane maist vailyeant princis warld heuely pinit said maledy nochtheles gyf said erle wald vse counsall suld delyuerit within schort tyme maledy pthis monk ane othir lymmar instruckit hym maner colleig quhylk schew partis quhare went companyeoun past men practik science monk fynaly sa comendit brocht erle thomas inquirit hym gyf culd cure maledy releif hym insufferahyll dishonoure monk tuke hym gladly hand instruckit commandit erle obserue ane diet sone eft gaif hym soft seropis quhen admittit mair familiarite gaif hym ane vennomus potioun howbeit vennome nocht haiste deid bot erar consume ane man lang proces monk efter erle thomas drunkin ennome fynd occasioun get away said ane syngulare medcine ingland quhilk neuir vsit bot quhen othir medcyne ailyeit pthus fand occasioun depart ingland promittit returne scotlad al deligence pnocht lang eftir yi monk returnit kyng edward said sen haue done thy chargis thow deuysit best rais thy army haist thow may otland trubyl deith conques realme thow list mene tyme erle thomas certane dolouris ylk day mair incressing h wambe becaus herd tell ye kig edward cumad ane army aganis hym na returnyng ye monk set day tuke ane vehement suspitioun treason fand sone efter medcinaris yat ye vennome sa sunkin bowellis yat nocht remedable howbeit mycht nocht ryde gang meit king edward gart turs hym ane cheriot motiue kyng edward rais weir tyme allegit falt redres ye bordouris king edward aduertist erle thomas cu mand arrayit battal meit hym send ane herald scotland treit peace howbeit send erar espy materis stude ony othir purpos erle thomas heirand cumyng herald arrayit hym best abulyement sat ane chiar dissimuland gret infirmite na thyng lit hym belyue herald brocht presence schew message last quhen herald desyrit certane thyngis nocht respondent reason erle thomas answerit sall schaw sone quhat rycht inglismen he sic wickit iniust petitionis quhen depeschit herald answer gaif precious abulyementis arrayit tyme herald sone efter herald returnit kyng edward said saw neuir ane mair lusty vailyeant prince said erle thomas king edward herand erle thomas gud heill scalit army beleuyng monk nocht done sic chargis promittit gart brin accordyng weill demeritis mene tyme erle thomas returnit hame deceissit mussilburgh buryit dunfermeling fra incarnation ane miiicxxxi yeris phovv erlis marche mar vvas maid gouernouris scotland hovv edvvard ballioll come scotland coques croun batrall duppline ca ii erle thomas deceissit yi maner ane counsall set noblis quhilk generall votis thre estatis patrik erle marche dauid erle mar war chosyn gouernouris first gouerne realme south syde forth tothir gouerne north side sic thyngis done rais gret trubyll scotland edward ballioll afore rehersit maner followyng tha r ane wykit limare namit twyname lorison quhilk oftymes dila adultry haldin officiall glasgew mony yeris vnder censuris kirk last tuk officiall passand town ayre held hym captiuite quhil payit two hundreth pound striuelyng bot oppressyoun nocht vnpunist scharply persewit schir iames douglas afore passage haly land fled ingland quhare met dauid cumyn erle atholl mony othir scottis quhilkis war banist afore kyng robert thair assystance kyng ingland thir lymmaris confiderat togydder vnder ane band abayd lang tyme ingland pand fra thay war aduertyst deith erle thomas randale schir iames douglas thay went france edward ballioll persuadit hym mony reasonis cum scotland recouer faderis heritage crown ballioll persuadit thair wordis howbeit na sicht afore ye crown scotland come ingland seik support kig edward knew inglismen ay ennymes scottis mittit king edward gif al mater succedit felicite hald realme scotland hym superiour thairof king edward glaid condition nochtwithstanding ye peace afore contrackit mariage syster maid afore kyng dauid scotland send vim men weill prouydit schippis pa hym scotland traisting efter cumyng fynd mony othir freindis yat wald assist hym schew afore mony scottis war ingland balliol quhilkis informit hym gif arriuit scotland mony lordis yairof wald assist opinion balliol persuadit thir reasonis arriuit kingorne quhare brocht folkis land sone efter slew alexander seytoun put folk flicht balliol proude victory come wt folk perth erlis mar marche aduertist cumyng rasit two gret armyis come aganis hym yai bene fecht agan weirmen bot allanerly thay wer punis certane theuis lymmaris ingland last thay concludit couene baith togidder strathern thay mycht inuade thair ennymes ani ballioll howbeit knew ennymes cumand mair power tha mycht resist na thing affrayit ye mater sa far procedit na feir deith fleing mycht auale nochtheles beleuit gif army faucht perseuerant constance haue victory su chace fortoun alwayis set tentis dupline nocht far fra water erne samyn nycht ye erle mar come wt gret multitude pepyl parkit yame ye sicht balliollis army bot erle marche lay othirardour scottis seand thair ennymes sa nowmer held thaym cotemption pretermittit yair wache passing nycht syngyng dansyng reuelling drinking thir doingis succedit mair vnhappely thay war done sa manifest contemption face thair ennymes contrar ye inglismen richt circumspect vigilant sic spyis yt euery thing done said army scottis manifest thaym balliol reiosing vane insolent foly amang scottis commandit army reddy inuade thair fais nycht followyng come ony noyis ye watter erne fand ye furd thairof ane lang staik quhilk affixit myddis yairof andro murray tullibard treason led army ouir watter erne come sa quietly erle marri tentis yat slew hym sleipand bed incontinent huge clamour come apon ye remanent army scottis slew yame burit sleip ony defence followit sa cruell slauchter nocht hard bot rummissing granis deand pepyll nocht bene edward balliol gart ylk man army bynd ane quhit clout arme na man mycht haue knawin myrknes nycht quha freindis fayis inglismen war inflamit sic ire thay couth nocht saciar blud murdir scottis sauit nane mycht ouirtaikin mony ye nobillis wer slane ye noumer iiim gret noumer comonis ane certane thaym quhilkis eschapit fra battall returnit agane reuenge murdir thair freindis wer slane ye principal noblis quhilkis wer slane feild wer erle mar robert bruce erle carrik alexander fraseir knycht william hay constable kyn sa halelie yat wer nocht wyfe wes deliuerit ane son surname bene al vterlie distroyit robert keith merscheall mony surname dauid lindsay glenesk alexand seiton george dubar robert strathaquhen thomas haliburtoun iohne skrymgeour knychtis mony otheris quhilkis wer ouir prolixt schaw erle fiffe wes tane battall wes strikin ye thrid day august fra redeptioun imiiicxxxii yeris phovv edvvart ballioll vvas crounit scone hovv king dauid fled frace hovv perth vvas recouerit ballioll vincust douglas hovv king edvvard segit bervvik ca iii duplyne discofist said balioll went perth tuke small difficulte said sindry inglismen auld hatrent aganis scottis went eftir thair victory duplyne se gif ony scottis wer liand feild abill recouer gif yai gud surrurgianis yai mycht chace residew thair lyfe nochtheles seyng miserable slauchter wes maid thaym ye nycht afore thay fell gret comploratioun saying thay beleuit nocht sa infinite noumer scottis slane erle marche h rand scottis discomfist sa miserablie duplyne come wt foure gret cumpanyis sege ye toun perth last quhen lyue certane tyme sege yairof fowseis brand fild toun reddy randerit handis skalit fra sege howbeit mycht haif toun battall baith pleseir ballioll incontinent becaus peple come fast opinioun come bischop du keld erle fiffe one wes crounit xxiiii day september yeir afore rehersit discomfitoure yi last battal rais gret trubil scotland ye king dauid hauad bot ix yeris age counsall freindis fled france wt h quene iane sister kig edward wes tenderlie ressauit phillip vi kyng france yat name quhare remanit ix yeris nixt yeir robert keyth alexand lindesay othir sindry nobillis reuenge slauchter thair faderis duplyne wan toun perth fourt moneth eftir thair sege erle fiffe androw murray tullibard wer tane wt otheris thair complicis quhilkis kepit said toun name ballioll erle wes send ward kildrumy bot andro murray treason afore comittit wes hedit toun eftir yt tane maner wes geuin keiping iohne lindesay winnyng toun sic manheid virtew put scottis esperance better fortoun yairfore iohne randale erle murray son erle thomas afore rehersit archebald douglas lord galloway brothir iames douglas slane laitlie spanye come ane gret cumpany aganis ballioll balliol weil aduertist yairof met yam annandale quhair wes cruellie fochtin bot last ballioll wes discomfist hym self chasit ane hors bridil roxburgh yi battall wer slane schir henry ballioll schir iohne mowbray walter cumyn richard kirklie alexander bruce erle carrik lord galloway wer taikin presoneris saiffir ye erle murray thay wer nocht lang afore ye opinioun ballioll eftir victorie andro murray ane man gret pissace rentis wes maid gouernor colleig ye erle marche thir twa gouernouris knawyng kyng edward cum aganis yame power ingland send schir alexander seitoun mony othir gentil men keip berwik sic thingis done andro murray come wt ane army sege roxburgh faucht sa vailyeantly yat put balliol flycht nochtheles followit feirslie wes tane brocht presonere within castell tyme willia douglas liddisdale callit singulare manheid ye flour cheualry faucht vnhappely aganis inglisme annandale quhare wes tane presonere folkis discomfist william wes son gud schir iames douglas afore rehersit baith thir nobill men wer redemit gret soumes money eftir yai bene haldin othir half yeir ingland realme standing thus ieoperdy pepill wer deuidit two partis tane half assistit ballioll tothir kyng dauid kyng edward ingland seing sa gret truble scotland thocht tyme sufficient coques croun vnderstud na thig sa difficill bot may done othir al sum part gif oft assailyeit nochtwithstanding band peace mariage sister iane kyng dauid scotland afore contrackit gaderit ane army baith ingland normandy angeos flanderis wagit money come scotland speciallie quhare maist rebellioun wes aganis ye balliol schew wes cumyn support ballioll nochtheles gif thingis succedit desirit wald na mair haue kepit faith promes ballioll otheris scottis seing thaym neir ouirset al sidis ennymes send iohne randale erle murray france kyng dauid get sum support fra kyng phillip france debait realme tyme kyng edward segit berwik baith see land nochtheles scottis debaitit al vailyeantlie assailyeit nocht allanerlie ischit sindry tymes inglisme bot slew sindry yair wachis sum tymes brint thair schippis gret manheid mene tyme william seitoun son schir alexander afore rehersit followit sa feirslie ane scarmusche aganis inglismen yat wes takin bastard brothir ane man singulare manheid inuading ouir feirslie inglis schippis vnder nycht fell see quhare perist sege continewit foure monethis continewallie town maid gret penurite vittallis pat last schir alexander seitoun send sonne kyng edward promittyng gif wald ceis sege rander toun hym within vi dayis gif na support come hym within said tyme sickir obseruation promys left sonne air pledge pof orison maid alexander seitonis vvife hovv son vvas slane tyranny kyng edvvard ca iiii sic thingis done berwik nobillis scotland yair conuention maid archebald douglas gouernour androw murrayis place douglas rais sege berwik come ane army inglad kyng edward aduertist thairof send ane herald schir alexander seiton certifying gif toun wer nocht randerit haist baith sonnis suld haistelie hingit afore eyne alexand answerd yat ye dayis wer nocht run trewis desyrit kyng othir keip faith elli deliuer pledgis mycht auantage king edward hauad na sycht faith band gart rais haistelie ane gallous afore toun haue baith sonnis alexander thairto ane yame wes taikin presonere othir deliuerit maner pledge haif schawin alexander seing sonis led maner ye gallous wes mouit gret comiseration thinkad wes ane thing rycht detestable odious sonnis suld sa innocetlie slane considering mycht saif thaym gif wer obeysant ye pleseir ye tyrane sa comiseration sonnis yat ane part faith promittit kyng realme tothir syde wes oft drawin sindry purpos mycht skarslie refreine hym self fra randeryng toun yit vncertane bot compassioun sonnis natural affection bene obeysant desyre kyng edward wer nocht wiffe moder sonnis ane wyse woman aboue spreit man exhortit oftymes erar suffer immolatioun murdir sonnis yan comit sa manifest treason aganis prince deir husband said scho behald degeistly quhat thow doi gif thow fulfyll desire tyrane violat lufe thow he thy cutre gif thow brek faith promittit thy souerayne ony feir deith appering thy sonnis thow sall fayll na le schame thy self freind tha dammage thy cuntre youcht sonnis de excellent fortitude defence thair cuntre sall succede na le thair louyng fame thy gret honoure weill considder first abhominable thow salbe perpetually thy natioun gif thow commit sa manifest treasoun betrais town yon tyrane mynassis oure sonnis deith intending bryng w opin schame gif fulfyl mynd sall neuir quhil warld induris recouir oure honour lat neuir thairfore town committit faith credit schamefully tynt oure dyssait traist nocht yon tyrane wyl obserue promis ony better efter town randerit hym afore haue trewis hym syndry dayis yit ryn yit kepi na faith w forthir gif yon fals manesworn king wyl nocht kepe sic thingis w he promittit bot failye he done tymes bygane quhat mischeif sorow sall cum w gyf fulfyll desire oure town salbe put sak oure housis brint oure tempillis spulyeit gudis escheittit oure virginis matronis fuilyeit innocent pepill toun slane mercy ransoun lyfe sonnis deir w sal redeme yame vengeance murdir sa mony pepill ar yai weill sauir fra thair deith quhen haue ransonit thaym sa manifest treason quhat pleseir hone e sall iose ye residew lyfe quhen filit sa schameful cowartry apper thairfore mair honoure w follow constance ferme purpos sic nobyll pepil bene rememberit haly writ saif lyuis oure sonnis sic irrecouerabyll dishonoure nocht danyell cassyn afore ye lyonis cruel tyranni becaus wald nocht offend god nocht thre barnis cassin ane birnand becaus thay wald nocht adorne fals ydolis nocht seuyn nnis machobee thair mo er put gret torment quhen thay constantly refusit eit swine flesch quhilk inhibit thaym thair lawis considder reuolue deir husband thy mynd quhat constance plesant vult sonnis contempnis tormentis tyrane wald god mycht de siclyke defence cuntre thay certane gif mycht deith delyuer toun sonnis may thow suld se pa ony feir murnyng bot gret spreit curage deith thair slauchter na deith bot ane changing yair fragyll lyffis eternale glore thynk pyne sollicitude trauel sufferit thaym ten monethis berand thaym wambe weill warit haue gud frut lauboure se affection mynd sa oft desyryng thaym nobyll men brocht gud fyne thynk nocht sonnis tynt bot erar remane intermynabyll honoure ar yit abyll recouer thaym new chyldren bot may neuir recouir honoure quhen lost quhen happy nobyll woman exhortit hir husband thir siclyke wourdis scho broucht hym sorowfull heuy vnto hir chalmer ya commiseratioun sonnis suld commit na thyng outhir aganis honoure weil toun yit euir flowand mynde impulsioun lufe sonnis ane part faith cuntre othir part mene time baith sonnis war put deith gallous deing maist honour defence thair cuntre hovv scottis vvar discomfist halidon hyll bervvik vvas randerit inglismen vvith mony othir strenthis munitionis scotland cap v archebald dowglas gouernoure scotland heirand schamefull cruelte done king edward come thrid day efter army fra northumbirland reuenge displeseir thairof set tentis nocht far fra king edwardis army sindry prudent men war dowglas army quhilkis per suadit hym mony reasonis abstene fra battall kyng edward ane army full pepyl dayly exercit cheuelry richt insolent eftir thair frequent victoryis gret munitionis weirlie instrumentis cotrar scottis wer brokin weris afore past thair agit wise capitanis sindry discomfitouris slane ye peple present army young ony experience armes thairfore alliegit na thing sa gud desist quhill thay sum practik experience armes answerit ye gouernour folkis howbeit yai wer noumer ennimes laikit na curage wer mouit extreme hatrent aganis inglismen cruelte laitlie comittit aganis sonnis schir alexander seitoun wes thairfore profitable abide lag tary yair ire sall peri forthir na exercition mycht eik thair strenthis sa mekill ire rageand thair breistis ye douglas left hailsum counsal comandit army refresche yame self meit sleip reddy fecht aganis yair ennymes morow brek ye day arrayit folkis yair best maner wangard wes geuin hew lord ro hauand hym keneth erle suthirland simon iohne fraseir iohn murray lieutenand ye erle murray quhilk wes yan trublit gret infirmite secound battall wes geuin alexander lindesay alexand gordon reginall grahame robert kenneth thrid battal wes ye douglas gouernour hauand hym iames iohne allane sonnis walter gret stewart scotland tothir side inglismen na thing affrayit ordinance come pertlie displayit baneris becaus thay knew ground quhair feild wes set lang residence sege forsaid thay fenyeit thaym fle thair first iunyng ane hyll sum part stay throw straitnes thairof wes rycht contrarius thaym assailyeit rycht commodius thaym stude defence thairof al sone inglismen wer cumyn hill yai stintit thair fleing sound trumpat went haistelie thair array incontinent thay set scottis quhilk wer skatterit ye vail following feirsly ye mony yame wer miserabillie slane residew wer sa astonist ye yame faucht saif onlie thay mair respect thair honoure thair lyuis victorie apperig yocht thay slew gret noumer inglisme yit yai wer put flicht finaly mair slauchter wes maid ye chace afore ye battall ane wyng inglismen lay afore stopit yair passage thus wer thay miserablie slane ilk syde na presoneris wer tane except ane noumer quhilkis wer sauir onlie becaus thair ennymes wer irkit slaucht lamentable battal wer slane mony nobillis gentilmen scotland eschapit afore fra battal duplyne yai wer estimit ye noumer xiiiim thir ar ye principal men yt wer slane archebald dowglas gouernoure iohne stewart iames stewart alane stewart sonnis walter stewart erle ro ye erle suthirland ye erle carrik sa mony wer tane wer heidit morow comand kyng edward except ane sonis quhilk wer hid inglismen proffet thair ransoun amang quhome wes schir william douglas liddisdale tane th mischeuous vnhappy battall wes strikin magdalenis day fra redemptioun ane thousand iii hundrth xxxiii yeris efter discomfitour alexander seytoun patrik dunbar capitanis berwik disparit support gaif ouir town king edward thair lyuis guddis condition peace sauit quhe thay geuyn thair fidelite king edward commandit patrik dunbar big castel du bar apon awin expensis becaus kest afore quhen disparit releif comandit kepe tymes cumyng vnder name kyng edward efter sorofull victory scottis returnit ingland left behynd hym mony gret noblis ingland edward ballioll gouerne scotland thair deuise pthe ballioll went throw boundis scotland garnist stren thairof inglismen except v castellis allanerly quhylkis war scottis mennis handis say castel dunbriton quhylk kepit malcolme flemyng cummerland castell lochleuyn alane uepount castell kildrumy cristyne bruce castell urquhart robert lauder ye peil low doun iohne thomeson thir castellis stude opynyoun king dauid contention betuix alexander movvbray hary bevvmont hovv inglismen perist sege lochleuvn ca vi samyn tyme phillip kyng france send ambassatouris paip desyring hym interpone auctorite constant ye inglismen desist fra thair cruell inuasioun maid scottis inglismen held papis ambassatouris sic contemption thay wald nocht suffer thaym cum thair presence throw quhilk thay wer constranit depart ony expeditioun thair materis sone efter ane conuentioun maid edward ballioll perth quhare nobyllis scotland ratifyit hym king promyttit thair aithis neuir rebell aganis hym tymes cumyng mene tyme rais ane scharp contentioun betuix hary bewmont alexander mowbray certane land buchquha hary bewmont clamit thir landis pertene maryit said alexanderis douchter quhylk heritoure allegit said landis ye tothir side alexander mowbray clamit thir landis reasoun succession aire brothir efter lang contentioun said alexander mowbray gat landis adiugit hym sentence ballioll dauid cumyn e le atholl richard talbot allieging sentence wrangusly geuyn aganis hary bewmont maid ane conspiratioun aganis ballioll stuffit castell dongard buchquhane mony othir housis scotland aganis auctorite ballioll seyng gret trubyll apperyng hym way retretit sentence gaif alexander mowbray new sentence adiugit landis pertene said hary bewmont becaus maryit herytoure thairof parteis clamit thir landis war sa gret iust verite thair debait couth neuir decidit sicht iustice thus ye ballioll constranit haue ay ta party ennyme quhen tothir become freind nocht lang efter ballioll come ramfrew ressauit pepyll strenthis thairof opinioun brocht hym keyis castellis rothesay dunnone schir allane lyle sereif bute yus grew balliol dayly mair pissance cofluence pepil enrichit thaym landis gudis assistit robert stewart heirand balliol set ylk day slauchter come bute castell dunbritane quhare plesandly ressauit malcolme flemyng keipar thairof mene tyme ballyoll rasit ane army take strenthis scotland becaus thay war occasioun battall aganis hym pin nixt yeir laid ane sege castell lochleuyn quhen considerit castell mycht nocht tane lang sege left schir iohne stryuelyng ly sege thairof ane gret power quhyll castell war pand thair besines mair esaly thay maid thair bastailyeis trinscheis fale deuat kirkyard sanct sarfe besyde kinrosse castell kepit alane uepount iames lamby cietezanis sanct andros pat last quhen thir inglismen assailyeit lang tyme get castell efter mony gret assaltis syndry ingynis howbeit thay war vane thay deuysit ane subtell slycht take castell ony straik pfirst thay inclusit watter ran loch ane hye dyke biggir sa strait fale deuat treis wat er leuyn suld haue na passage bot inclusit perforce quhyll war rysyn aboue castell pepyll perist caus dam boldyn mair haistely thay brocht burnis fra syndry partis said loch schir iohne stryuelyng capitane sege seand al thingis beleuit done dew maner na thyng mycht auale bot proces tyme wyn hous went dunfermelyng deuotion becaus sanct margretis day ye haly quene scotland left behynd hym sa mony thocht sufficient kepe sege alane uepount capitane foresaid knawyng ye gret dangeir apperyng hym send iiii men castel within ye nicht ane bait speris wappynnis breke ye dyke foresaid quhen thay laubourit nycht borand dike fore said thay tuke purpos becaus yai lauboure semit vane returne castell ony expeditioun nochtheles ane thaym exhortit ye laif continew furth ane houre se quhat fyne mycht cum thair lauboure al sone thay persauit ane hole maid throw dyke thay returnit castell incontinent streme followit sa fast quhare watter gat passage brake bastailyeis nocht onely drownit pepyll lay vnder ye dam bot brocht thaym hors cariage al yair prouision ye see alane uepount quhen watter fallin ye auld mesoure yschit castell slew ane part thaym war eschapit tyme remanent put flycht piohne striuelyng herand sic calamyte fallyng folkis returnit sege maid ane vow neuir depart thairfra quhyll war taikyn euery person found slane last quhen lyin lang sege thairof seing castell nocht abyl takin constranit leif sege gret slauchter folkis sege lochleuin lenttyn fra redemptioun im iiicxxxv yeris phovv robert stevvart iohne randall recouerit syndry strenthis scotland hovv dauid cumyn vvas brocht gret trubyll rebellioun aganis scottis hovv vvas tane fauoure ca vii kyng edward yeir following come scotland fifty thowsand men send lxx schippis see quhilkis mony war brokin betuix inchekeith ye northland becaus saw na rebellyoun aganis hym returnit ingland ye ballioll left dauid cumyn erle athole gouernoure take remanent strenthis scotland hald pepyll opinioun erle dauid insolence yi new auctoryte tuke possessioun landis murray buchquhan quhilkis pertenit robert stewart nocht onely gat inhabitantis thairof sworne opinioun bot confiscat guddis yame war found contrarius thairto robert stewart incontinent assemblit freindis auise dongall campbell lochquhow tuke castell dunnone slew personi found comonis bute arrane glaid happy beginning gaderit ye nowmer iiii hundreth men fortyfy said robert mene tyme schir alane lyle sereif bute come thaym ane cumpany armyt men followit ane scharp battall quhyll last sereif slane folkis discomfist syndry folkis war brocht presoneris robert stewart thir siclike feliciteis mouit syndry scottis leif ye opinioun ingland come robert stewart lag efter ye erle murray returnit fra kig dauid france arriuit dunbritane quhare plesandly ressauit robert stewart ane nobyll man na le manheid wisdome fader erle thomas afore rehersit sone efter robert stewart erle murray come gret power cliddisdale rafrew kyle cunyngham aire brocht ye samyn ro murray king dauidis opinioun erle murray heirand gret iniuris done erle dauid athole went aberdene erle dauid seing pepyll gaderit ilk day new power recouer yair leberte fled montanis desertis quhare brocht gret misere constranit lang tyme sustene lyfe rutis herbis last quhen saw na way eschew come lamentabyll weid petuusly desyring grace nobillis scotland ressauit hym thair fauour ane man nobyll blude gret manrent landis gart hym sweir trew kyng dauid afore kyng edward tyme schir wyllyam douglas liddisdale andro murray war redemit gret ranson efter yt thay war haldin thre yeris presoneris ingland thair cumyng edinburgh ane conuentioun lordis erle murray robert stewart generall electioun war chosyn gouernouris pmony scottis tyme left opinoun inglismen laurence prestoun iohne heryng iohne halyburtoun knychtis mony otheris quhilkis baid efter perpetually ye faith kyng dauid nocht lang efter ane conuentioun maid gouernouris darse auyse syndry gret materis concernyng commoun weill nochtheles dauid cumyn erle athole come sa strang power yt thay durst attempt na thing aganis inglismen hovv king edvvard come scotland vvith gr armyis baith see land hovv duke gilder vvas discomfist hovv erle dauid cumyn vvas slane ca viii kyng edward herad rebellion scottis wise come fifty thousand men perth brocht ic lxxx schippis forth pthir schippis sone efter ye cumyng forth brint heryit see costis ylk syde spulyeit abbay sanct colme bot thair sacralege nocht lang vnpunist quhen thay war returnand ingland thair nauy violent wedder brocht gret trubyll sum thaym perist otheris brokin craggis residew thair nauy knawyng thay incurrit ye hatrent god sanct colme thair sacralege returnit said abbay maid gret offerandis recompence thair offence returnit hame disples ir pat tyme duke gilder come gret power throw ingland support king edward discomfist burrow mure besyde edinburgh chasit ca el thairof quhilk tyme inglismennis handis last constranit lang sege cum wyll guddis tynt life onely sauit erle murray randerit hym curtesly guddis sufferit hym depart efter sworn neuir assist inglismen amang spulyeis yi battal found ane woman meruellus stature quhylk preuit gret vassalage battall slew mony vailyeant men hir awin handis forthir becaus th duk gilder freind philip king france conuoyit erle murray ye bordouris mene tyme ane buschement inglisme scottis lay wait randerit hym kyng edwardis handis erle athole beleuing new felicite fall inglismen taking erle murray come perth gaif faith ballioll maid gouernoure scotland sone efter kyng edward returnit ingland tuke balliol hym beleuit al sone conquest scotland ballioll suld rebell aganis hym samyn maner iohne ballyol fader afore erle dauid richt insolent efter auctorite began exerce new tyranny scottis war repugnant kyng edward sum thaym spulyeit yair landis guddis otheris put deith nobyllis hauand gret indignation erle athole suld exerce sic tyranny thair pepil siderig saiffit ye yeir afore thair comiseratioun come gret power aganis hym dauid cumyn herand lordis gaderit thus aganis hym left sege kyldrummy quhare tyme gaif thaym battall last quhen victory inclinand erle dauid multitude pepyl yat assistit hym iohn crag capitane kildrummy come castel thre hundreth fresche men quhais cumyng victory succedit scottis erle dauid disparit lyfe suld nocht cum quik ennimes hadis ruschit ane cumpany tender freindis amang gret pres ennymes quhare slane alexander gordoun battal war slane walter bryde robert cumyn mony athir gentyl commonis schir thomas cumyn tane presonere heidit morow robert menyeis eschapit fleing castell camore becaus gret nowmer pepyll enterit hym ony prouision vittallis castel mycht nocht defendit bot randerit morow efter ye pepyl thairof war sworn king dauidis opinioun phovv andro murray vvas maid gouernoure scotland hovv king edvvard returnit vvith nevv army scotland hovv inglismen vvar discomfist pamore ca ix dauid erle athole slane wyse ane conuention maid nobyllis andro murray maid gouernoure place erle murray quhilk tane vnhappely said inglismen andro efter lyue lang tyme ye sege cowpar aduertist ye cumynis maid gret trubyl north partis scotland thairfore thocht mair necessar support ye cuntre sege ony castellis cumynis knawyng cumyng met hym set battall bot thay war vincust battall slane robert cumyn wyllyam cumyn thomas calder vailyeant knychtis howbeit thay war ennimes kyng dauid ye tyme victory gottin said andro murray brocht al north scotland vnder gud obeisance kig dauid inglismen abaid efter victory scotland except sa mony war within castell dongard last sayd castell tane na man left leuand except hary bewmont capitane quhylk sworn depart ingland ony returning sic thingis done gouernour laid ane sege castel lochindoris quhare elre dauid cumynis wife ye tyme th woman knawing hir hous mony dayis afore abyll segit send kyng edward desirit rescours kyng edward dredand tyne al strenthis scotland gif war nocht haistely rescoursit come xlm men said castell loch indors efter stuffi new prouision come bludy swerd throw murray returnyng mar brint town aberdene nauy quhilk arriuit forth began maner thir afore spulye abbay sanct colme samyn maner yair sacr lege nocht lang vnpunist ne schyppis ladyn sanct colmes guddis sank ony tempest see ground king edward returnyng perth becaus cassyn afore commandit reparit new wallis bastailyeis expensis thir vi abbayis abirbrothok coupar lundoris balmerinoch dunfermelyng sanct andros maid hary bewmot capitane ye castel sact andros quhilk returnit hym ingland contrar faith maid afore sege dongard attoure maid hary farrar capitane castel lucre wyllyam montegew capitane sriueling wyllyam feltoun capitane roxburgh thomas urthred capitane perth quhill sic thyngis war done scotland kyng edward come hym brothir heltane quhilk exercit gret cruelte scottis nochtwithsta ding thair perseuerance opinioun kyng edward brothir sum thaym slew otheris brint thair kirkis tempillis last king edward tuke sic displeseir aganis heltane brothir becaus brint ye kirk sact bute ane thousand personis yt dang hym throw body ane swerd afore alter sanct iohne said haly place sal na mair refuge othir housis god he bene afore fra thy tyranny quhen thow distroyit sa mony innocent pepyll sicht rycht wrang sic thyngis done kyng edward returnit ingland left behind hym ballioll ane gret power perth tyme hary bewmont slew scottis quhome mycht apprehend specially thaym war slauchter cousin dauid cumin pal sone andro murray aduertist king edwardis departing come fra ye mont ni quhare lay afore eschewing fury inglismen last assistence sindry nobyl men tuk ye castel kincleuyn kest ground sone efter come mernes quhare wan ye castel kylnesse kest samyn maner passand forthwart wise brint du notir tothir syde inglismen maid na le slauchter heirschippis partis quhare thay come throw quhilk mernis angus stryuelyng gowry continewall reiffis murdir weris done thaym war left waist last andro resist inglismen gaderit pepyll murray mar buchquhan faucht panmore angus quhare victorius huge slauchter maid ennymes battall war slane hary montford quhilk send laitly kig edward support ballyoll iiiim nobyllis gen yll men ingland throw quhais deith rais gret dolour syndry partis ingland seand thair pissance gretly brokyn ynsall sa mony noblis efter victory ro murray pai throw fyf angus kest dowir castell lucre othir castellis fyf except allanerly castell cowpar phovv vvyllya talbot richard montegevv yvar vincust scottis deith andro murray sindry vassalagis done vvillyam douglas gret derth albion ca x kyng edward heirand ye victory falling yi maner enny me send ane vailyeant knicht namit willia talbot scotland two armyis support ballioll aganis quhom come willia keith laurence preston robert gordoun gret power scottis put thir inglismen flicht ye principall capitane willia talbot tane presonere payit two hundreth mark striueling ranson schir william montegew erle sarisbery come new ordinance sege ye castel dunbar lay xxii owlkis sege thairof nochtheles sa vailyeatly debarttit ye contes marche callit blak anna constrant depart fra sege yeir following ane miserabil derth boudis scotland gret mortalite pepyl ye land lay wast ony store cornis cotinewall weris afore past ye sodiouris war ye castell cowpar laik vittallis left castell desert fled kingorn quhare yai hyrit ane schip haue pa ingland nochtheles ane euyll mariner thay come ane sand bed perist ye nixt flude tyme mony strenthis lowthiane inhabit inglismen town edinburgh stuffit mony sodiouris baith inglis scottis amang quhom ane scot gret spreit namit robert pendergest becaus fauorit scottismen ye marscheall callit thomas knatoun strake hym violently ane club quhyll blude sprang heid robert mouit iniure lay ylk day wait quhill last slew mar heall come wyllyam douglas ye nerrest way persuadyng hym pa delygence edinburgh quhare suld fynd ennymes geuyn nocht bot lust insolence wyllya douglas come incontinent said town slew iiiic inglismen thair beddis buryit wyne sleip thus war inglismen constranit mair vigilant tymes cumyng lang efter andro murray gouernoure scotland deceissit gret dammage common weil thairof bury rosmarky fra redemptionane hundreth xxxviii yeris tyme rais ane scharp weir betuix kyngis ingland france gret weill scotland apperandly scotland sa waik tyme gyf kyng ingland continewit weris suld haue cumyn ony esperance releif vter ruyne efter deith andro murray gouernour robert stewart tuke hym al charge ye realme ye returnyng king dauid france tyme wyllyam dowglas mony ieoperdice gret lauboure recouerit teuidal inglysmennis handis thairfore iosit ye said landis heritage conquest maheid prowes kyng edward mouit thir displeseiris send ane vailyeant knycht namit schir thomas barclay ane gret power scotland aganis quhom come wyllyam douglas robert stewart gouernoure faucht hym blakburn quhare scottis war discomfist thaym eschapit vntane slane nocht lang efter wyllya douglas faucht inglismen cragingis hauand hym bot xl men cupany vincust schir iohne striuelyng vc men ye opinion ingland yeir following wan ye castell harmytage slew personis found nixt yeir william douglas faucht aganis schir laurence abirnethy principall capitane ballioll gret buschementis men athir syde fyue tymes dyscomfist nochtheles renewit ay battall last tuk said laurence presonere brocht hym dubritane thir vassalagis william douglas gretumly estemit direckit ambassatoure france king dauid certane hie materis concerning realme mene tyme robert stewart come gret power sege ye toun perth lay sege yairof ten owlkis last quhen wes disparit tak said toun reddy depart thairfra william dowglas come france fra kyng dauid arriuit gret munitioun tay sone eftir cu myng toun wes randerit gouernour fra redemption ane miiicxli yeris yeir wes sic derth scotland ingland pepill wes constranit eit hors hundis othir siclik forbodin flesche phovv ye ballioll fled ingland gret vassalage done robert stevvart vvilliam douglas hovv king dauid returnit scotland hovv vvilliam douglas vves banist ca xi perth ressauit yi wyse garnist strang munitionis ye gouernour wet army striuelyng tuke viii day eftir sege wes laid yairto vnder thir conditionis thomas fulky capitane thairof mycht pa wyfe barnis guddis ony impeschemet inglad edward balliol seing thir feliciteis fallyng scottis fled ingland mene tyme ye castell edinburgh wes subtell menis william douglas william bullok walter fraseir walter touris iohne sandelandis knychtis maner following dowglas ane seruand namit tour quhilk come schip command douglas forth fenyeing ane marcheand sindry wynis sell ane deuisit slycht brocht twa punsionis wyne schip morow drew ane certan gallonis wyne past thairwith castell edinburgh desirit stewart cum furth taist wynis stewart fand wynis delicious said thow sall w ane hie pleseir gyf thow prouide w certane veschellis wyne wyne he bene rycht skant w yir mony yeris attoure mak hym sicker wyne gaif money hand touris prayit hym bring wyne airly morow castell suld reddy ressaue yi tour come afore ye lycht ye twa punsionis sone eft cuyng ye yett wer oppinit ye portaris ressaue ye wyne last quhe ye cart cumyn wtin ye yettis yi touris pullit ane wege incontinent cart fel doun punsionis myddis yet stoppit samyn clois douglas quhilk w nocht far fra slycht come haistely bodin men yettis eftir slane ye portaris enterit said castell left na man lyue thus wes realme returnit inglismennis handis nobill men nochtwithstanding absence yair king france apperis thairfore yat nobil men ar al necessar kyngis ony landis rich ennymes beand dantit maner ballioll wes eieckit al freindis costranit returne inglad secund day iunij yeir afore rehersit king dauid wyfe iane sindry gret nobillis franche scottis come happely throw ye seis arriuit innerberuy conuoyit gret triumphe perth cumyng alexander ramsay dalhouse ane maist vailyeant men wes dayis gaderit ane strang power enterit inglad first laid ane buschement folkis vnder couert ane vail yat yai mycht tak thair ennymes auantage quhen thay saw ganand occasion sic thingis done wet forthwart residew folkis ye mene tyme bordorar sindry garnisonis cuntre come aufull e aganis hym sone eft maid hym craft cheualry flee quhill last ennymes followit ye place quhare buschementis wer lyand vnder wait incontinent buschemetis rais inuadit yame u ilk side finalie discofist yam gret slauchter amang sindry othir presoneris quhilkis wer tane tyme e le salisbery capitane roxburgh wer tane e erle wes interchangit ye erle murray quhilk wes haldin mony yeris afore presonere ingland alexander ramsay seand capitane roxburgh mony sodiouris thairof tane iurnay come haistely ledder roxburgh enterit perforce ouir wallis king dauid vassalage gaif baith ye capitanry roxburgh screifschip teuidale said alexander caus come gret hatrent william douglas wes finalie tane hym kirk hawik wes haldin captiuite castell hermetage quhyll deceissit pkyng dauid rycht comouit yat yi nobill man alexander wes put doun maner thocht gyf sic attemptatis wer vnpunist thay mycht occasioun conspire aganis hym sum hi ar materis gart serche yi william douglas punist deith nochtheles said william drew hym fra kyngis presence abaid montanis othir desertis scotland quhill robert stewart othir nobillis finaly recounsalit hym kyngis fauoure gat hym restorit baith honour landis teuydale afore phovv king dauid revvardit airi thaym vvar slane duplyne halidon hyll hovv inuadit ingland syndry tymes vvith gret iniuris ca xii scotland beand pecifiit maner inglismen eieckit partis thairof king dauid set ane counsall perth commandit al thaym yat ony honest vassalage defence realme thair faderis slane battall dupline halydon geuyn hym byl mycht considder thair honest ieoperd reward yame effering thair meritis last quhen thay war conuenit beand perticularly aduertist euery dedis done thaym self yair faderis rewardit thaym richely gold seluer iowellis thay mycht haue al mekyll pleseit tyme present thay sorow tyme bygane nane couth schaw ony freindis kynnismen slane ony vailyeant deid awin handis bot rewardit gudly recompence amang syndry othir war rewardit tyme hew boece grand schir maister hector boece compilar thir croniklis gat recompence fader slauchter duplyne heritoure lady barony balbrid geuyn hym mariage quhilk barony yit possedit airis said hew quhen kyng dauid rewardit noblis realme yi wyse thocht na thyng sa gud reuenge ye iniuris done sa mony yeris afore inglismen yit sindry prudent men gaif counsall delay weris quhill pepill wer conualescit baith thair bodyis guddis thay wer waistit lang weris afore enduring attour ye season wes yan manure yair landis thay mycht releif pepill gret derth quhilk yai presentlie sustenit thir wordis answerit kyng dauid wald assailye ye chance fortoun bring pepil gret rich spulye inglismen reuenge iniuris done thaym sa mony yeris afore sone eftir fensabill men wer comandit reddy agane ane certane day nocht lang eftir maid erle murray lieutenand army enterit northumbirlad quhare remanit ane moneth inuading ye cuntre fyre swerd syne returnit scotland gret rich sone eftir returnyng rasit ane new power scotland enterit agane ingland ye inglismen seing yame self nocht pissance resist army gaderit yair guddis strenthis mene tyme v knychtis scotland namit stewart eglintoun cragy boyd fullartoun persewing inglismen ouir feirslie wer taikin redemit eftir gret ranson kyng dauid seing hym self ilk day waisting tyme na apperance battall returnit scotland lang eft went agane inglad wes trublit vehemet wei haill yt mycht skarslie debait hym self army vnperist storme wedder tothir syde ye inglismen wer gaderit aganis hym ouirset tempest samyn maner king dauid purpos suld nocht vane kest doun sindry strang housis ye bordouris ingland returnit scotland ony othir trubyll army hovv kyng dauid request france inuadit ingland vvith gret displeseiris hovv vves taikin durame hovv inglismen coquest gret boundis scotland ca xiii kyng phillip frace wes cruelly inuadit duryng tyme king edward ingland send oratouris scotland desiring king dauid inuaid ingland battall fyne yat king edward resist ye iniure scottis suld leif ye sege caleis mene tyme come ambassatouris fra king edward scotland treit peace kyng dauid promittit rander baith berwik ballioll scottis mennis handis wes thay alliegit gret occasioun iniuris lag continewing betuix inglis scottis lordis answer yir materis went thair counsall bot yai wer deuidit sindry opinionis ilk man eftir fantasie su rage youth auld hatrent aganis inglismen wer desirus battall otheris irkit lang weris desirit peace thocht thir offeris ingland nocht contempnyt sen mony comoditeis mycht follow thairthrow alwayis wes demit gyf sic honest offeris wer contempnit truble proffet suld follow apperit perpetuall amyte kyndnes sall continew betuix inglismen scottis gif wer tane away mouar thair weris answerit kyng dauid otheris wer opinioun france memorie infinite pleseiris done w kyng phillip mouis w schaw sum kyndnes hym nocht onlie ressauit w quhen maist dangeir occurrit bot defendit w fra ennymes quhen wer exilit realme forthir band afore contrackit betuix kyng robert oure fader france mouis w assist opinion france thairfore gyf nobill men hauand sycht thaym he auancit common weill liberte thing wes gud reuenge auld iniuris e ennymes thus wes con haue battall ingland solicitatioun kyng dauid desirit su honest vassalage mycht thairthrow comparit glore eldaris ambassatouris ingland wer depeschit wyse ony expeditioun thair desiris ambassatouris frace fullelie satifyit sone eftir opin proclamatioun fensabill men within realme wer comandit meit ye kyng ane certane day place mene tyme erle ro come mony folkis perth maid mowster kyng nycht following slew lord ilis vii kynnismen slepand thair beddis returnit incontinet ro king dauid nochtwithstandyng gret displeseir tuke said slauchter rycht desirus haue punist supersedit punitioun thairof quhill tyme occurrit ganand cuing ye bordouris maid mony knychtis steir thaym knychtlie vassalage maid willia douglas erle william wes son archebald douglas slane afore h lidon hyll sic thingis done kyng dauid distroyit maist part northumbirland fyre swerd said king dauid wes monist visioun sleip abstene fra landis pertenand sanct cuthbart othirwayis h weris suld haif ane miserable end al sone wes awalkinnit thocht sic visiois bot fantaseis comandit army nochtwithstanding sic visioun spare na ladis townis quhair thay come last thay come durame quhare sanct cuthbart patron spulyeit baith abbay placis yairabout kyng edward impacient suffir thir iniuris send erle northumbirland france gret power erle afore cumyng send ane herald kyng dauid desiring return scotland put end weris otherwayis suld haif ba tall thrid day eftir king dauid tuke litil respect yi message bot comadi folkis reddy resist thair ennymes morow deuidit army thre battallis ye first wyng wes robert stewart prince scotland patrik erle marche secund wyng wes iohne erle murray william erle douglas ye myd battall wes king dauid ye remanent nobillis scotland erle douglas becaus wes wardane bordouris departit fra scottis espye army ingland vnwarlie quhair thair army lay ye vc folk wer slane hym self narowly eschaping life last quh baith ye armyis wer otheris sicht dauid grahame come fyue hundreth bodin men ye skyrtis inglis archearis haue brokin thaym nochtheles wes inuadit arrowis mony folkis war slane hym self narowly eschaping scottis nochtwithstandyng baith thir discomfitouris ruschit feirsly thair ennymes faucht lang tyme gret manheid deith last robert stewart erle marche seyng thair folkis defaik curage efter thay fochtyn lang tyme doutsum victory fled feild fleing erle marche robert stewart ane gret displeseir army scottis battall faucht aganis thaym come sa awfully battall quhare king dauid faucht fynaly vincust put flycht kyng dauid left ane small cu pany feild howbeit left na thing vndone mycht pertene deuore ane forcy campioun sum tyme persuadyng folkis returne new battall su tyme ruschit ane buschement vailyeant quhare saw maist confluence preis inglismen purpos haue put thaym abak resydew folkis mycht haue ane new curage returne battall nochthelis thair abaid nane hym ot sa mony mair respect thair honoure l e fechtand perseuerand manhe deith youcht king dauid destitute ony h lp yit ceissit nocht perseuere obstinat battall quhyll ouirset multitude pepyll two speris hyngand body youcht mycht nothir fle yit breke said speris yit wald nocht suffer hym tane thynkand na thing sa odious remane life efter sa gret slauchter maid nobillis ceissit nocht prouoke ennymes maist dispitfull wourdis sla hym inglismen seing mycht nocht eschape set thair besynes take hym iohne copland desyrit hym yoldyn baith swerd wappinuis war dong handis nochtheles tuke copland sic violent dynt chaftis dang two forthir teith na better chance left wyng quhare erlis murray dowglas faucht battall vincust erle murray slane erle dowglas tane sorowfull battall war slane erle murray erle stratherne constabyll marcheall chalmerlane chancellar scotland gret nowmer mony othir nobyllis commonis kyng tane v erllis say dowglas fife suthirland wygtoun menteith ane arrowheid schot king dauidis leg sic violence couth nocht gotty furth ingyne man yit quhen visit sanct mona wond opni heid fell besyde othir gret ryches tynt feild haly roce halyrudhous tyn king dauid traisting vertew yairof inuincibyll battall nochtheles spulyeit al othir iowellis found hym tyme yi battall strikin durame xvii day october fra redemption imiiicxlvi yeris inglismen efter victory tuke ye castell roxburgh hermetage ony resistente subdewit annandale galloway mers teuidale twedale e trik forrest maid marchis cokburnis peth sowtray hege phovv vvyllyam douglas recouerit syndry landis inglismennis handis inuadit ingland vvith gret displeseris hovv kyng edvvard vvrocht gret trubyll scotland ca xiiii balliol come ni yeir ingland erle northumbirland heryit lowthyane cliddisdale brocht spulye thairof galloway quhare abaid lang efter scot efter sorrowfull battall durame maid robert stewart gouernoure tyme schir wyllyam dowglas son gud schir iames dowglas yt slane spaye returnit france support freindis chasit inglisme douglasdale teuidale twydale ertrik forrest twedale iohne copland capitane roxburgh gaderit ane army inglismen nochtheles discomfist chasit roxburgh nixt yeir quhilk fra incarnation ane thousand iii hundreth xlix sa gret pest partis scotland tha ye thrid part ye pepyl deceissit pest rais sa terribyll inflation ye ilk man yat tuk ceissit within two dayis efter sa contagius yat fader wa vise sonne sonne ye fa er nixt yeir iohne lew ane nobyll knycht schir dauid berclay aberdene within nycht procuration schir william douglas liddisdale quhilk tyme haldyn ingland erle dowglas schir dauid berclay slew afore iohne dowglas bruthir said schir wyllyam fader schir iames dowglas dalkeith yeir following said schir wyllyam dowglas liddisdale slane huntis ettrik forrest cousyn god sonne william erle douglas ye slauchter alexander ramsay othir auld enuy meteis thus ye hous douglas mony yer deuidit amang yam self persewing othir gret vnkindnes slauchter nixt yeir quhilk fra redemption ane thousand iii hundreth lv efter pasche come scotland ane nobyl knicht eugenius de garanteris lx weil accuterit men delyuerit gouernour othir lordis scotland support france thair weris ingland xlm crownis sonne sone efter ye king ingland send ane army scotland brint baith mers louthyane te ydale erlis marche dowglas impacient suffir displeseir rasit ane army inuade ingland nochtheles fra thay war aduertist inglad gaderit thay abaid bordouris send schir willia ramsay ryn ane foray throw ye cuntre last quhen returnand hame gret pray men guddis ye inglismen brak hym followit yth nd chace quhyl thay war cumyn army scottis pincontinent scottis set thaym gret noyis clamour put thaym fynaly flycht inglysm n war tane schir thomas gray son iohne darras tane siclyk mony othir inglismen pthe franchemen coft sindry inglis presoneris tyme slew thaym reuenge ye slauchter yair faderis quhilkis war slane afore inglismen france erlis marche dowglas efter victory come haistely ledderis wallis berwyk wan toun howbeit nocht gret slauchter inglismen war slane alexander ogil capitane berwik thomas persey bruthir erle northu birland edward gra scottis war slane thomas uaus andro scot balwery iohne gordoun william sinclare thomas prestoun alexander mowbra knychtis quhen scottis ye town berwik maner thay war aduertist yt king edward cumand thaym new ordinance becaus thay na prouision resist army thay brint town kest maist part wallis thairof nochtheles king edward efter cumyng reparit new wallis went roxburgh thair met hym ye ballioll transferrit rycht clame ye croun scotland said king edwardis handis requestit hym perseueir perpetuall hatrent aganis scottis nocht lang efter king edward come hadingtoun ye gret dammage pepyll lyand thair ane part nauy spulyeit kirk lady callit quhit kirk returnit spulye thairof thair schippis bot thair sacralege lang vnpunist suddanly rais ane north wynd raschit thair schippis sa violently see bankis sandis thaym eschapit saif sa mony swame land kyng edward contemptioun god becaus nauy trubyllit maner persewit abbayis religius placis quhare come gret cruel e treuth ane inglysman spulyeit ornamentis yt ymage lady ye quhyte kirk incontinent ye crucifix fel doun heid dang harnis battall poyteris hovv king dauid vvas redemit hovv punist baronis thair fleing fra hym durame ca xv sone efter returnyng kyng edward ingland william douglas nidisdale recouerit ye landis galloway ladis dryisdale war recouerit ki kpatrik maner xx day september yeir battall poyteris france maner following edward prince walis son kyng edward windisore come ane army france inuadit cuntre sa cruelly syndry boundis thairof apperit gif war nocht haistely resistit cu vnder empire mene tyme william erle dowglas kynnismen freindis nowmer iiim men went france te derly ressauit king iohn first king yat name lang efter kyng iohne rasit ane army come potteris edward prince walis son king edward windisore efter ye cumyng king iohn began rais army fenyeit hym subtel slicht war astonist depart towart ingland tha franchemen scottismen suld breke thair array feirs following army pat first skarmushe schir iohne claremon merschal frace slane prince edward glaid beginnyng seand folk rasit new curage thocht na thing sa gud follow fortoun come haistely poiteris quhare king iohne campit tyme notht lang efter baith armyis iunit faucht gret manheid quhill last dalphyne france fled gret buschementis throw quhilk king iohn left desolat feild youngest sonne phillip quhilk namit efter phillip hardy becaus swerd found drawin hadis thus king iohne tane brocht presonere ingland ye rle douglas rescorsit h freindis feild bot archebald dowglas son schir iames douglas yt slane spanye tane bot redemit small ransoun quhen brocht afore inglismen cote armoure gilt harnes ye maner faucht schir wyllyam ramsay colluthy tuk hym ye chaftis neif said tratoure thow art ye deith thy maister erle dowglas thow clothit armour yat suld haue debatit hym incontinent causit hym draw butis held hym sic vile laubour redemit smal ransoun said yt king edward full vane arrogace sat crownit septour diademe betuix two captiue kyngis scotland france feist yule sic thingis mycht rehersit glore takand na respect vnsickir stait man na sic aduersite micht fall hym king dauid within certane yer efter wes brocht ye erle north hamptoun berwyk quhare mony lordis scotland conuenit make ransoun becaus thay culd aggre thairapon brocht agane london ye nixt michaelmes redemit icm mark striueling efter yt lyin xi yeir presonere ingland yt money suld payit mair surely trewis war tane xiiii yeris mony lordis baronis scotland war laid plege lo payment ye said ransoun king dauid obelist eftir returnyng scotland cast castellis mortoun dalswyntoun dunfreis durisdere becaus thay war noysum inglismen efter returnyng scotland set ane parliamet maid gret punitioun thaym fled fra durame first brake tailye maid cousyn robert stewart ye croun scotland ane gret occasion discomfitoure durame fleing thairfore transferrit said tailye iohne suthirland quhilk wes gottin iane youngest sister causi lordis sworn kepe ye said tailye erle suthirland traisting son iohne succede crown delt maist part landis amang freindis quhilkis war hayis sinclaris ogilbyis gordonis nochtheles ye said erle frustrat baith landis crown scotland son iohn geuyn amag ye remanent plegis king dauid ransoun deceissit london efter deith erle suthirlandis son robert stewart recounsalit king dauid maid heritour croun vnder ye tailye afore mony othir gret baronis war punist ye wife thair fleing durame ye kirk scotland gaif x penny yai frutis kig dauid help ye pament ranson yi time realme france wes gret displeseir kyng iohne wes haldin captiuite quhill last left baith sonnis pledge hym come paris quhair pieteuslie regratit captiuite said wes ane gret los hym nocht sic nobil men dayis roland gawyne laubour redemptioun wes king charlis tyme afore hym incotinet stude vp ane nobil man gret manheid wisdome ennyme ye kyngis sleuth said mycht fynd sic ane prince charlis suld fynd rolland gawyne othir duche peri ynew thir wordis wer deparprentit kyng iohnis mynd ony man beleuit becaus h febilnes sleuth wes opinlie reprochit nocht lang eftir returnit ingland visie sonnis deceissit londoun pof gret trubyl fell scotland king dauidis secund mariage deith syndry gret clerkis mer elli sene albion ca xvi nocht lag eftir kyng dauid callit lordis baronis ane counsall tyme captiuite london romittit transfer ye croun scotland kyng edwardis sonne gyf lordis scotland wald consent thairto lordis quhen mater wes proponit afore thaym answerit thay wald neuir cosent yairto sa lang ony thaym mycht beir wappinnis armour kyng dauid wes rycht ioy yi answer wes nocht oblist laubour forthir mater lordis wald consent nixt yeir quhilk wes fra redemption ane miiiclvii lady iane spous kyng dauid past pilgramage sact thomas canterbery ingland deceissit ony childrin hir body kyng dauid eftir hir deith mariit ane lusty woman namit margaret logy douchter schir iohne logy within thre monethis eftir repentit wes sorowful yt degradit blud ryal sic obscure lynnage yat anist hir otheris gaue hym counsall thairto realme last lady past ane certane hir freindis auinion quhare ye paip held seit ye tyme wes fauorit scho gat finalie ane sentence aganis king dauid annere hir lawchful lady wyffe thus suld ye realme haue cumyn vnder interdiction gret truble wer nocht scho deceissit ye way returnand hame kig dauid eftir mony othir poleseis reparit ye strenthis realme biggit ane toure ye castel edinburgh quhilk wes eft callit dauid toure finalie quhen brocht realme gret traquillite tuk purpos pa ierusalem vesy sepulture crist quhen prouidit al thingis necessar yairto fell ane hait feuour deceissit castell edinburgh ye xxxix yeir regne xlvii yeir age wes beryit halyrudhous fra redemption ane miiiclxx yeris sindry meruellis wer sene yeir albion rauinuis kayis piott clekit yair birdis wynter contrar nature thair kynd ye yowis wer barrant ony lamys myse ratonis abundit sic plente yai mycht nocht distroyit sa gret spate watter wes partis scotland mony housis cieteis wer distroyit yi tyme wer mony nobill clerkis iohne dun ye ordour sact francis ane man gret knawlege theologie richard myddiltoun willia ockam mony otheris pand sa endis heir xv buke thir croniklis heir begynnis xvi buke croniklis scotland hovv robert stevvart vvas maid king scottis sonnis douchteris hovv realme vvas tailyeit thaym ca primo kyng dauid buryit maner afore rehersit ye noblis couenit lithquo cheis ane successour croun quhilk day mony ye noblis bea opinioun robert stewart come william erle douglas ane gret power clamyt ye croun richt edward ballioll ye cumyn saying wes surrogat baith yair rychtis wes yairfore iust heritour ye croun apperit ye said erle william wald vsurpe croun force gif wer nocht geuyn hym beneuolence nochtheles wes frustrat purpos george erle marche iohne dunbar erle murray sindry othir gentill men quhilkis beleuit haue fauorit action lady day lentern callit ye annunciatioun said robert stewart wes crowni gret solempnite ye lvii yeir age yat ye amyte kyndnes sal stand betuix ye said nobill prince subdeit erle douglas fore said wes accordit yat eufame eldest douchter kig robert salbe geuin iamis ye erle douglas son mariage way come ye stewart ye croun quhais succession regnis yit gret felicite viii person fra robert quhen kyng robert ressauit ye croun wyfe eufame douchter erle ro quhome two sonnis walter dauid afore maryit ye said erle rossis douchter elizabeth mure place wif hir thre sonnis iohne robert alexander diuers douchteris quhilkis ane wes maryit iohne dunbar erle murray ane othir wes maryit iohn lion lord glamis erldome murray continewit dunbarris allanerlie duryng lyfe erle iohne son quhom successioun failyeit except ane douchter quhilk wes heritour said erledome wes maryit eftir douglas yi way ye douglas come erledome murray kyng robert eftir coronatioun maid sindry erlis lordis knychtis baronis iames lindesay glennesk wes maid erle crawfurd thrid yeir king robert deceissit eufame quene king robert incontinent maryit elizabeth mure lemmen afore rehersit affection hi barnis thay mycht lawchful reabillit virtew matrimony subsequent nocht lang eftir auyse parliamet maid iohn eldest son gottyn elizabeth mure erle carrik hir secund son robert erle menteith fiffe ye thrid son alexander erle buchquhan lord badyenocht eldest son walter gottin eufame wyfe maid erle athole lord brechin secund son dauid erle strathern yi walter slaar iames first pretendit ay gret richt ye croun lang efter ane parliament set perth thair ye croun scotland tailyeit king robert sonnis maner iohne son gottin elizabeth mure lemman reason first gottin son legitimat matrimony subsequent sall succede immediatly croun failyeing succession male croun sall cum robert secund son failyeing hym alexander falt succession croun cum walter quhilk gottyn eufame first wife failyeyng succession male hym ye croun cum dauid erle strathern airis quhatsumeuir noblis war sworne thair straitest maner obserue keip new tailye thair best maner phovv erle marche brint roxburgh hovv inglismen vvar syndry tymes discomfist scottis ca ii borderar ingland quhilkis leu allanerly yair wer spulye inuy fortoun lang peace scotland war brocht extreme pouerte thairfore fynd occasion weir thay slew certane freindis georg erle marche fair roxburgh perle george impatient suffer slauchter send ane herald hary erle northumbirland wardane ye bordour ingland desirand slayaris men randerit ye iniuris done thaym redressit last quhen send oftymes ye said wardane effect foresaid fyndand nocht bot answer full derisioun supersedit displeseir quhill mair sufficient oportunite occurrit yeir following syndry marchandis ingland couenit roxburgh mene tyme ye said erle george gaderit ane gret power brothir erle murray tuk said town put sak inglismen sone efter come ane army scotland brint certane landis pertenand schir iohne
