gordoun thay lay marche erle marchis landis saiffit nothir wife barne quhare thay come regardyng nocht quhat misery thay sufferit swa thay micht noy thair ennymes schir iohn gordoun richt desirus reuenge iniure come ingland ane gret power brocht ane pray men guddis ony obstakyll aganis quhome come iohne lylburn ane army gordoun na thing affrayit met hym gret manheid curage throw quhilk followit ane scharp battal fochtin lang tyme vncertane victory scottis war fyue tymes vincust yat day al oft victorius last inglismen war cleirly discomfist lilburn thair capitane brocht presoner scotland hary perse erle northumbirland come viim dun reuenge yir displeseiris ye nicht following ye ladwart hirdis fillit syndry dry leddryn polkis full small stanis band yam togidder maner clogboggis thair hors syne chasit yame ye campe quhare thir inglismen lay incontinent gret hors yt wes amang ye army ingland war sa effrayit noyis thir clogboggis na renyeis mycht hald yame bot ran skatterit throw cu tre feir trubyll ye inglismen stud nicht arrayit battall ay waytand quhen thair ennymes suld inuaid thaym morow thay returnit hame falt hors thair feit efter yt thair hors war far skatterit fra thaym fallyn pray cuntre pin mene tyme thomas musgraue capitane berwik come support erle northumbirland bot vincust brocht presonere iohne gordoun scotland nocht onely war scottis victorius eist partis scotland bot ye west bordouris maner quhare schir iohne iohnestoun ye ylk faucht inglismen syndry skarmussing ay victori gret pest scotland hovv inglismen vvas discomfist sulvvay message send charlis france hovv surname lyouns tuke thair beginnyng ca iii yi tyme paip gregour ye xi send ane legat fra auinioun king robert inhibit hym intromit ony guddis pertenand kirk efter prelatis deith yeir abbay sact andros brint necligence ane plumbar quhilk left ane h hait irnis ane craw nest quhare rasit sa huge fyre yt micht slokin quhill kirk brint xxii day october fra redemptioun imiiiclxviii borne dauid stewart quhilk efter duk rothesay sanct andros day nixt following toun berwik tane schir iohne gordoun within ye nicht bot nocht lang kepit doung ou samyn way entrit efter th willia erle douglas come xxm men faire pynnire within ingland spulyeit ye marchandis thair guddis returnit incredibyll pray scotland scottis beleuyng haue cumyn gret proffet thir guddis come irrecouerabyll dissolatioun thir guddis come sa greuous pest scotland ye thrid part pepyll deceissit thrid tyme yat pest come scotland fra incarnatioun god imiiiclxx yeris inglismen recouer thir heirschippis maid erle douglas pynnire come scotlad ouir sulway inuadit cuntre fire slauchter maist cruel maner ye mene tyme scottis gaderit nowmer vc men stude ane strait glen quhil inglismen war cumyn yame wt sa huge noyis clamour set yame yt yai gaif backis iiiic yame war slane mony al ye laif perist sulway king charlis ye vi heirand ye fame yir illuster dedis send h ambassatouris king robert scotland exhortad hym follow oun inuade ennymes continewal battal mittit ane yeirly pensioun money hym h successouris kingis scotland gif costranit ye army ingland pa france yir ambassatouris renewit ye band frace scottis sone efter war depeschit tha send walt wardlaw cardinal bischop glasgew mony othir nobyll men renew ye band france nixt yeir iohne lioun chancellar scotland wes slane vnhappely iames lindesay erle crawfurd said yt iohne lioun wes ane lusty man dotat mony giftis nature fortoun excellent bewte gud maneris sa plesand euery creature yt wes maid secretar said erle eftir ye maid sa familiar kyng robert yat gat douchter elizabeth mariage mony riche landis callit glamis quhom ar discendit surname lionis memorie heirof yai beir lioun thair armes lillyis tressoure samyn maner king beris exceppad allanerlie yat yai beir thair lionis ane blak feild iohne lioun eftir mariage grew ilk day maist tendernes king robert throw quhilk ye erle crawfurd tuke sic displeseir slew hym forfair kyng robert comouit contemptioun banist erle crawfurd sindry yeris scotland quhill last wes recounsalit intercessioun ye erllis douglas marche ye king fauour ye yeir following quhilk wes fra redemptioun imiiiclxxvi deceissit prince edward ingland yat tuke king iohne poyters nixt yeir deceissit kyng edward wyndesore fader left behynd hym iiii sonnis lyue say duk clarence duk longcastel duk york ye erle cambrige yeir wes ye coronatioun kyng richart son prince edward afore deceissit pof gret cruelteis done inglismen aganis scottis hovv king france send gret support scottis ca iiii fourt yeir eftir quhilk wes fra redemptioun ane miiiclxxxi iohne gant duk log castel come mony noble men treit peace betuix two realmes ingland scotland last quhen tane iii yeris peace scottis wes returnand hame gat aduertising comonis ingland wer risin gret power aganis new kyng richard slane bischop canterbery mony othir nobillis gentillis ingland incontinent returnit ye bordouris wes couoyit william erle douglas archebald douglas lord galloway halirudhous beside edinburgh quhare remanit quhill last iakstro wes quarterit otheris opinioun punist al sone trewis wer outrun archebald douglas lord galloway rycht impacient sustene ye iniuris daylie done galloway annandale inglismen lochmaben come ane gret power support ye erlis douglas marche quhen thay lyin sege said hous ix dayis thay faucht aganis ane buschemet inglismen yt come carleil reskew ye said hous put thaym lang bergane flycht throw quhilk yai gat baith victorie thair ennymes ye hous randerit thaym ane day al sone ye hous wes tane wes cassin doun ye ground king richard heirand lochmaben tane yi maner send ye baron gray stok gret munition vittallis fornis ye castel roxburgh last quhen wes cumyn withi ane myle ye said castell wes tane ye erle marche brocht dunbar ordinance king richart heirand yir syndry iniuris done scottis send eme duk longcastell gret armyis scotland baith see land eftir yat dantit ba th mers louthian come edinburgh curtesse gat yair ye tyme exile returnit ingland ony ferder inuasioun nochtheles nauy abaid still forth heryit brint yt see coistis ilk side yair returnyng thay brint abbay sanct colme bot kirk wes sauyt miracle said ane inglisma put fyre thryis kirk yeid ay ye inglisman ran wod nauy inglismen nocht saciat yir cruelteis come fiffe spulyeit mony tounis yairof last thomas nicholas erskinis alexander lindesay william cunynghame kilmauris set aponne thaym fiffe slew sa gret noumer thaym thaym returnit thair schippis yeir erle douglas put ye inglismen teuidale recouerit ye strenthis yairof quhilkis wer haldin vnder ye dominion inglismen fra ye feild durame thay dayis wes last vassalage done ye said erle william ane maist vailyeant men wes dayis deceissit sone eftir ye hait feuour ye castell douglas lyis melros eftir deith succedit sonne iames erledome douglas ane rycht feirs vailyeant knycht moneth septeber nixt following recouerit toun berwik inglismennis handis come sic ane army ingland yat brint heryit ye boundis yairof ye new castell nocht lang eftir wes commandit kyng robert return perth excusation ceissing gyf counsall concernyng sindry gret materis iohne ueam admyral france erle ualentines come moneth maii scotland iic xl weir schippis twa thousand vc armit men mony thaym baronis gentilmen iiiic thaym wer hakbutteris iic cro bowaris pickis halbertis sic like munition weir thair vittallis fornest wagis payit ane yeir aboue gret ordinance thay brocht iiiic curacis quhyt harnis iiiic halflang swordis lm crounis son geuin quhare king robert thocht expediet amang nobillis nocht lang eft auyse ye baronis scotland king robert rasit ane army fifty thowsand men maid robert h son quhilk wes erle fiffe lieutenand said army maid erlis douglas marche capitanis vnder hym army come ingland kest doun castellis werk furd cornwell nochtheles weddir wes bittir thay wer constranit returne scotland yair returning yai set doun yair tentis roxburgh sege castell thairof admyrall france desyrit gif castell wer munitioun folkis kepit tymes cuing ye kyng francis name becaus ye scottis refusit wyn ye hous ye sort ye army skalit ye hal omes nixt following admirall departit france ye residew folk phovv king richard inuadit scotland vvith gret cruelteis gret vassalage done vvyllyam douglas ca v efter ye departyng fra chemen scottis come ane army inglad remanit two monethis syne returnit gret pray men guddis scotland king richard efter returnyng france reuenge thir iniuris done scottis come gret ordinance throw mers louthiane putting baith ladis townis kirkis quhare come vt euersion brint melros driburgh newbotil slew al ye religi yairof al brit edinburgh ye kirk sact geil bot ye abbay sauit ye duk logcastel lugit afore sic thigis done kig richard returnit ingland ony damage done hym scottis ye nixt yeir quhilk fra redemption imiiiclxxxvii deceissit byschop walter warldlaw glasgew cardinall lang efter returning king richard ingland ye duk albany come wt ane army xxxm men ingland army iames erle douglas archebald douglas lord galloway army come sa warly throw watter sulway yat thay come cokirmouth ingland abaid thair thre day inuading cuntre gret cruelteis returnit gret pray guddis scotland amang syndry spulyeis gottin iornay found ane charter certane landis geuyn ye king ingland vnder thir wordis king athelstane geuis paulane oddam roddam al gud al fair euir thay myne war yairto witnes mald wyfe quhilk charter nocht vnlike ane charter geuin king wyllyam maner followis heir wyllyam kyng thrid yeir ring geuis ye normand huntere thow art baith leif dere hop hoptoun boundis vp vnder erd hell aboue erd heuyn fra fra myne ye thyne al fre kingrik myne verify yt yi saith bite ye quhit walx wt tuith meg mald mariory eldest son ane bow ane braid arrow quhen cum hunt apon yarrow thir charteris apperis mair faith geuin wordis kingis princis othir pepyll thay dayis ar geuyn ingyne man sekis sa many slichtis new inuentionis na wordis found sufficient strenth sic donationis charteris geuyn oure day last iornay aganis inglismen wyllyam son archebald douglas lord galloway wan gret fame honour aboue mony othir vailyeant dedis brint ye suberbyllis carlele hauand bot two seruandis cumpany maid sa meruellus slauchter sodiouris thairof kest sindry thaym ouir brig otheris slew quhilkis kepit said brig efter quhen said town segit followit sa feirsly sodiouris quhilkis ischit furth finaly tane presonere foure inglismen wappinnis doung fra hym last quhen brocht within town fellit two thaym neif ye remanent two chasit throw quhilk rescoursit hym self fra ennymes king robert th maist honorabil vassalage gaif ye said willia doucht gelis mariage quhilk excellit othir wemen bewte said ye king frace sa inamorit yi virgine yt comandit ane paintour cu scotland paint hir visage ye quik nochtheles afore ye cuyng paintour scho maryit ye said willia yi wyllya gat hir ane douchter quhylk marijt eft ye erle orknay phovv robert stevvart vvyllya douglas gret vassalage ireland hovv iames erle douglas vincust hary perse syngular battall hovv egit nevv castell ca vi yeir following quhilk fra redemption imiiiclxxxviii robert erle fiffe archebald lord galloway entrit ane proude army ingland tyme come syndry ireland men gret buschementtis galloway tuke gret prayis samyn robert stewart douglas son archebald galloway tyll reuenge thair went ane army segit ane strang town carlingfurd cietezanis na pyssance resist trewis certane sowmes mene tyme yai ane cupany viiic men ane othir town namit nochtheles said wyllya faucht sic yat thay vincust yair ennimes efter thay spulyeit carlingfurd thay brint powder syne uk xv schippis quhilkis war lyand raid chargit thaym guddis toun thair returnyng hame thay spulyeit ile man nocht lang efter thair returnyng scotland king rychard send ane army scotland army enterit ye mers kest mony gret touris strenthis thairof kyng robert conuenit nobyllis aberdene quhilk concludit rais power ye realme al deligence reuenge thir iniuris done inglismen lang efter ii armyis war rasit first geuin gouernance robert stewart erle fiffe hauand hym ye erle menteith archebald douglas lord galloway alexand lindesay walcop ye nowmer xvm pa cu bir tothir army geuyn iames erle douglas george erle marche hauand thaym iames lindesay erle crawfurd iohn dunbar erle murray hay constabyll scotland siclyk nowmer afore inuade northumberland thir armyis wrocht sic cruelteis yat nocht hard bot spraichis rumissing deand pepyll partis quhare thay come maist terribyll flambis bryngand gret townis bigingis vter rewyne last baith yir armyis met togidder new castell efter yat thay past wt swerd fyre throw al boundis northumbirland cumber mene tyme erle douglas chesit xm vailyeant men sege ye new castel quhilk sta dis apon ye watter tyne began serche deligetly quhat maner mycht maist esaly inuade said town quhilk full pepyll maist part chosyn men northumberland york war ye said town schir hary perse secound son ye erle northubirland callit ythand priking hary haitspure hary confiding syngulare manheid lang vse armes come furth new castell desyryng fecht erle douglas syngular batttall douglas na thing refusynge desyris glaidly condiscendit fecht quhat sort plesit fynaly thir two feits campionis montit thair ba dit coursouris ran aufully togidder square ground speris deith dowglas wyse circumspect doingis nocht onely sauit hym self fra displeseir ennymes bot strenth singulare heid dang perse ye sadyl inglismen quhilk stude afore portis abiding chance fortoun suddanly rescoursit perse brocht hym yair town thus succedit na le honour dowglas dishonoure perse sic thingis done dowglas callit capitanis hym schaw thaym quhat part toun micht maist esaly takyn incontinent army come pertly ledderis wallis fillit ye fowseis gret multitude hay treis nochtheles town sa vailyeantly defendit co stranit depart fra ye sege gret slauchter folkis sone efter tuke viage returne scotland phovv inglismen vvar discomfist ottirburn erle doug slane perse brocht presoner scotland hovv hepburnis tuke thair begynning ca vii erle iames dowglas cumyn town ottirburn riddisdale haue returnit scotland quhen suddanly come hym ane bord rar ane swift gelding schew inglismen war cumand hym arrayit battallis th war scottis gr uly effrayit nochtheles ye douglas exhortit thaym remember thair frequent victoryis quhilkis yai vincust sa oft afore thair ennymes prayit thaym feir nocht multitude thair f na difficulte vincus thaim quhilkis he bene sa oftymes afore thaym discomfist attour thair ennymes war na yat tyme thay war afore banokburn quhare xxxm discomfist iiicm fynaly desirit yam haue gud sicht yair manheid vassalage prouyn sa gret felicite yeris afore past yat thay may conques sum new recent victory quhilk suld mair apprisit ony auld glore othir victoryis past afore becaus knew al folkis cumpany exercit yame mekyll dayis exhortit euery ane yame hym self schaw thair heid virtew sum notabyll vassalage thair ennymes ye tothir syde ha haitspur capitane inglisme exhortit h folk fe ht defence yair cuntre thair pare ti child wiffis dids schew thay war sic pissance thay mycht distro th ennimes yair pleseir becaus victory sicker thair handis thair ennymes perturbat best pa forthwart sic curage thair ennymes may vincust yair first iunyng incotinent sound trumpat baith ye armyis iunit maist fury faucht lang vncertane victory quhil last yai war seuerit fra othir cumyng nycht nochtheles thay abaid risyng ye mone echt agane new battall al sone thai fore mone risyn thay iunit agane mair hatrent afore quhen fore bro scottis war slane inglismen began put ye scottis abak dout thay ansenyeis douglas put h army flicht war patrik hepburn son freindis come mair haistely support scottis quhome battallis war renewit quhyll ye armyis war fechtand sic cruelte douglas come ane heuy mace mair wecht quantite ony man micht weild thay dayis tuschit amang gret preis ennimes quhare maid sic terribil slauchter thay war finaly put flicht chace continewit gret slauchter inglisme quhil brek ye day battal hary perse brothir rodulphe war takin keith marcheall scotland inglismen war slane vc al noblis mony war takin amang quhom war two perseis robert ogil thomas halbart iohne lilburn willya wauchlute robert hekon iohne colwell pa rik louell knichtis mony othir noblis sic multitude yat akaris war smal nowmer compare gret nowmer presone victory succedit scott slaucht mony nobyl quhen feild cleirly disco fi erllis crawfurd marche murray entrit douglas pall quhare returnit ef er victory fand hym neir deid thryis strikin throw body ane deidis wound heid quhilk geuin hym inglismen efter hewmond boud weil heid quhe thay saw hym sic dolorus array yai fel doun teris murnyng douglas wt sic curage mycht said thaym thir wordis hartly freindis auoid lament dolour breistis reiose ye present victory quhilk grantit yow special fauoure god haue ieoperd lyuis day ye honour yat succedit w yairfore turn ter dolour ympnis orisonis saule foryet gud ded done yow howbeit yi mischace fallin gif ye desire recopence indeficiet kindnes sa oft sustenit weill eis beseik yow pray reuthful maist pissant god haue merci saule beseik yow cheris virtew manheid defence realme liberte hald self sic petuall concord yt ye may dayly incres honour amite ye terrour fayis skarsly war thir wordis said quhe ouirset dolour randerit saule god wes quhill leuit ane maist vailyeant campionis yt euir decorit realme maist honoure eft quhais deith sic sorrowful cheir followit army yt nothir ye present victory spulyeis gret rich falling thaym chance fortoun mycht contene thair ene fra contynewal teris nocht lang efter cu yng robert stewart erle fife dolour howbeit sum part ceissit renewit youcht victory succedit scottis gret murdir inglismen yit nane army bot wald haue bene co tent haue changit lyfe dowglas erle dowglas brocht eft deith melros buryit beside fader erle wyllyam becaus erle iames na airis gottin body archebald lord galloway succedit said erldome said tyme king dauid bruce ane inglisman tane presoner namit hepburn haldyn mony yeris scotland none payment rasoun last quhen ye erle marche dangeir lyfe rage ane insolent vndatit hors yi hepburn come pertly brydyl quhen na othir durst refrene hors yus sauit ye erlis lyfe gat certane ladis louthiane quhais posterite growin sic pissace landis surname yt sindry noble knichtis quhilkis ar oure dayis ar discendit ye samyn blud mony noble erllis bothwell na le honour nobilite landis tha ony othir erllis baronis ar realm yat surname he bene mony noble prelatis syngular eruditioun yit occurris dayis battall otterburne strikin sanct oswaldis day ye v day august yeir god ane miiiclxxxviii yeris phovv robert erle fyf vvas maid gouernour scotland hovv alexander bastard son king robert vvas punist tyranny kyng robertis deith ca viii nixt yeir ane liamet haldin perth quhilk kyng robert schew afore noblis brokin age mycht nocht deuore gouernance realme yair fore consent thre estatis maid robert secund son gouernour scotland eldest son iohn erle carrik gat sic ane strake leg schir iames douglas hors dalkeith mycht nocht trauell throw realme king rychard efter battall otterburn send marcheal ingland wardane fornens scotland hary perse bruthir haldyn presoneris scotland erle first cumyng prouit bordouraris inglad misauenture fallyng yame ottirburne said gret schame thaym vincust scottis thay beand ay foure ane last maid gret aith quhare euir fand ony scottis suld geif thaym battall howbeit wa thay gret nowmer nochtheles oft occurris sic vane oste tation succedis sendyll grauite honoure end erle nocht lang efter quhen robert gouernour scottis cumyn northumbirland ane smal army tuk flicht quhen herald demandit hym quhy vnmyndfull vote answerit commandit maister ieoperd sa mony lusty vailyeant men war army sicker auantage robert gouernour efter waistit maist part northumbirland returnit gret pray men guddis scotland yeir trewis tane thre yer betuix france ingland scottis gif thay plesit war comprisit within ye said trewis sone efter come ambassatouris king robert direckit fra kyng richard ingland se gif wald stand peace afore contrackit quhom answerit wald gladly stand thairto quhill thir gret materis war dressit scotland alexander stewart erle buchquhan thrid son king robert brint cathedrall kirk murray lantern ornament ye north scotland thay day kyng robert impacient sustene sa gret oppression cruelte done sonne alexander tuk hym efter yat brocht presence put hym strang preson quhare remanit end lyfe ye realme beand maner brocht gud tranquillite king robert lang age brocht gret infirmite deceissit castel dundonald xix day apryle fra redemptioun ane thousand iii hundreth lxxxx yeris efter rong xix yeris pof kyng robert ye thrid ye deith vvillia douglas lord niddisdale hovv clanis clankais glenquhattanis faucht perth ca ix efter ye deith king robert ye secund sonne iohn erle carrik crownit scone lady day august callit ye assumptioun lordis thocht iohn ane vnchancy name ane king king iohne france wes tane vnhappely poyteris afore rehersit yairfore thay callit hym robert efter h fader th tyme willia douglas niddisdale chosyn ye lordis sprus admirall pa iic xl schippis aganis turki sa far wyllyam estemit afore ye said lordis inuijt gretu ly lord clifford inglisman th irfore ye said clifford appelit singulare battall nochtheles afore cumyng day clifford sa affrayit lay wait gret buschementis finaly slew said douglas ye brig danskin deith ceissit gret vassalage micht haue bene done aganis turki nocht lang efter coronation robert thrid tithingis come yat duncane stewart son alexander ye kingis bruthir afore rehersit cumyn angus gret buschementis men slew walter ogiluy sonnis freindis defence cuntre bot attemptatis war nocht lang vnpunist tane erle crawfurd complicis punist thair conspiration tyme mekyl north scotland heuely trublit two clannis irsmen namit clankayis glenquhattanis inuading cuntre thair wetis ythand slauchter reif last appointit betuix heidis men thir two clannis auyse erlis murray crawfurd xxx rincipall men ta clan sal cum othir xxx tothir clan arrayit thair best auise sall conuene afore king perth decision al pleis fecht scharp swerdis deith ony harnes clan quhare ye victory succedit haue perpetuall empire aboue ye tothir baith thir clannis glaid condition come north inche beside perth iugis se scaffaldis discus ye verite ane thir clannis wantit ane man perfurnis furth ye nowmer wagit ane carll money debait thair actioun howbeit man pertenit na thyng thaym blud kindnes thir two clannis stude arrayit gret hatrent aganis othir sound trumpet ruschit togidder takand na respect thair woundis sa thay micht distroy thai ennymes faucht maner lang vncertane victory quhen ane fel ane othir put rowme last ye clankayis war al slane except ane swam throw watter tay glenquhattannis left xi personis lyue bot ya war sa hurt thay mycht nocht hald thair swerdis thair handis debait fra ye incarnation ane miiiclxxxxvi yeris phovv king robert maid son duke rothesay bruthir duke albany gret vassalage done ye erl cravvfurd ca x thrid yeir efter ane parliament haldyn perth quhai king robert thrid efter mony constitutionis common weil maid dauid eldest son hauand xviii yeris age duk rothesay robert brothir quhilk wes gouernour erle menteith fiffe duk albany thir wer first dukis wer scotland duryng peace betuix inglismen scottis frequent cumpanyis wer inglismen scotland siclik scottis inglad throw quhilk oftymes mony honorabil tornamentis wer betuix scottis inglis defence thair honouris glore armes amang quho wes litil apprisit ye honorabill victorie gottin dauid erle crawfurd brig londoun aganis lord wellis maner lord wellis wes sed ambassatour scotland concerning certane hie materis betuix ye two kyngis inglis scottis quhen wes ane solempne banket quhare scottis men inglis wer comonyng dedis armes lord wellis said lat wourdis haue na place gyf ye knaw nocht ye cheuelry vailyeant dedis inglismen assailye day place quhen ye list ye sall sone haue experience yan said dauid erle crawfurd wil assailye incontinent cosent athir parteis day place wes assignit lord wellis chesit brig londoun place erle dauid chesit sanct georgis day reason wes sum tyme ane vailyeat knycht yus detit lord wellis towart london afore day erle dauid come xxx personis weil acoutterit london al sone day battall wes cumyn baith ye partyis wer couoyit ye brig sone eftir soud trupat ye two partyis ran haistelie togidd yair vardit cursou square groundin speris ye deith erle dauid nochtwithstanding violent dynt speris brokin hewmont visage sat stranglie yt pepill mouit vane suspitioun cryit erle dauid contrar ye lawis army wes bound sadil erle dauid herad murmour demontit hors ony support ascendit agane sadyll incontinent yai ruschit togidder new speris ye secound tyme birnad ire conques honoure bot thrid rynk lord wellis wes doung ye sadyll sic violence yat fell ye ground gret displeseir inglisme erle dauid seing hym fall demontit haistelye fra hors tenderly embrasit yat ye pepill mycht vnderstad faucht na hatrent bot allanerlie ye glore victorie signe humanite vesyit hym ilk day quhill recouerit heill mony othir contentionis wes tyme betuix inglismen scottis ilk man contending decore awin nation maist louing lang eftir erle dauid maid ane solempne banket quhair mony noblis ingland wer present ye tyme nocht ceissing thair custome loyf maist yame self last quhen ye herald ingland blasonit erle dauid ane vailyeant nobil knycht ane inglisman mouit inuy said meruel yocht scottis nobill vailyeant yai wer gottin nobil eldaris quhen yair faderis wer banist yair realme neir conquest yan said erle dauid meruell youcht inglisme febill degenerat yai wer gottin cukis freiris ingland quhen gret nobillis yairof gat w scotland sic humaniteis kyndnes continewing betuix inglis scottis erle dauid returnit scotland mony nobillis ingland becaus vincust lord wellis apon sact georgis day foudit vii preistis sing lady kirk dunde ye honour sanct george phovv schir robert morlo vvas vincust hevv trail hovv hary duke longcastell conquest croun ingland depriuit king richard ca xi nocht lang eftir schir robert morlo inglisman come scotland eddy f cht aganis ony man wald assailye hym singulare battall vincust archebald edmonstoun hew wallace bot last wes vincust hew traill berwik deceissit displeseir sindry othir tornamentis wer ye samyn yeir betuix inglismen scottis variant chance fortoun ye samyn yeir kig richard ingland maryit isabell doucht charlis vi name king france becaus scho bot xi yeris age mycht nocht sustene ye det mariage kig richard went auise noblis dant ye rebellion ireland purpos remane ye samyn quhil wif war cumyn fection sone eft h derparting ireland erllis derby northubirland mony othir noblis ingland cospirit put fra ye croun kyng richard herand spiration maid aganis hym come ireland walis send writtingis freindis cum haistely hym yt mycht recouer realme punis ye rebellion noblis ye principal lordis quhilkis cospirit aganis hi send thair writtingis desiring reconsalit hi promittit gif wald remit yair offece resaue maist honour bot neuir rebell aganis hym tymes cuyng kyng richard giffand yame credit maner come walis h returnyng london wes tane lordis nochtwithstanding yair promes put captiuite quhill renuncit rycht croun ingland wes adiugit perpetual preson eftir lang truble gat furth preson vnder habit ane woman come galloway quhare maid seruice ane scot namit makdonald last wes knawin brocht king robert thrid quhom wes tretit gret reuerence king richard knawing hym self deieckit fra rial estait gaif hail co templation quhill last deceissit striueling wes buryit blak freris thairof eftir expulsioun hary ye fourt yat name son iohne gant duk longcastell wes crounyt westmonister ye xiii day october ye yeir god imiiiclxxxxix nocht lang eftir isabel king richardis wife hauad bot xii yeris age returnit paris efter ye scho redemit hir fader gret ransoun said ane remit come king hary eft coronation monest hym auctorite god restore ye iust heritour croun pronosticat gif war rebel land thairto gret vengeance calamite suld fall hous king hary dredand yt heremitis wordis suld moue ye pepyll conspiration aganis hi gart put heremit hastely deith yi heremit schew sa followit gret slaucht trubyl succedit cotinewally betuix ye air king richard ye hous logcastel quhill last hary ye vii ye name marijt ye douchter edward ye iiii iust heritour ye croun ingland baith thir housis war recousali othir ony cotetion following phovv mariage betuix duk rothesay erle marchis douchter vvas dissoluit trubyll come thairthrovv ca xii ye nixt yeir quhilk wes imiiiic fra saluatioun kyng robert wed son ye duk rothesay ye erle marchis douchter archebald erle douglas hauand indignation yat ye erle marche suld preferrit hym maryit doucht meriory ye said duke auise robert duk albany erle marche afore ye mariage wes completit went ye kyng inquire gif wald stand first contract becaus gat na plesand answer maid ane vow reuenge contemption done hym al displeseir mycht sone eftir went ingland left house dunbar weil stuffit keiping sister son robert maitland archebald erle douglas eftir departyng come dunbar desirit samyn randerit hym scharp writtingis kyngis yi robert maitland wes sa astonist ye kingis writtingis yt randerit ye hous ye douglas george erle marche knawing ye hous tane fra hym ye douglas brocht freindis ingland determit maist ennymy scotland inuaid displeseir king robert dreidand trubl returne rebellion send ane herald desiring hym writtingis returne scotland haif al iniuris reparit pleseir becaus ye said george refusit return scotland quhill done sum hie displeseir ye erle douglas king robert send writting king hary ingland desiryng hym gif wald intertene peace scott put george dunbar boundis inglad suffir na rebellis scotlad haif resset realme kyng hary denyit yir honest petitionis kig robert yus wes ye peace dissoluit betuix scottis inglis sone eftir hary haitspur said erle marche tuke gret pray guddis scotland nocheles afore thair returnyng berwik archebald erle douglas recouerit ye samyn come edinburgh quhare sone eft deceissit hait feuir archebald wes ane nobil man singulare heid virtew hauand preistis religious men gret reuerence foundit ye colleige bothwell nunreis lynclowden quhilk wes eftir changit ane colleige preistis becaus nunnis thairof wer euill lyfe eftir deith archebald erle douglas secound son archebald wes maid erle douglas eldest son william deceissit yeir afore hovv king hary come scotlad vvith gret army deith ye duk rothesay hovv scottis ar discofist nesbet ye erle marche ca xiii sschort tyme eftir kyng hary come scotland ane army howbeit smal iniuris pepil yairof desyrit nocht bot baner ereckit yair wallis alwayis wes ane plesand ennyme gret humaniteis ye pepil al placis scotland quhair wes lugit finalie schew ye lordis scotland yt come thair realme cousall noblis ony hatrent yat bure scottis sone eftir returnit ony ferther iniure ingland nixt yeir quhilk wes fra redemption imiiiic deceissit walter trail bischop sanct audrois samyn yeir deceissit quene annabell dromond quhais deith succedit gret displeseir hir son dauid duk rothesay buryng hir lyfe wes haldin virtews honest occupatioun eftir hir deith began rage maner insolence fulyeit virginis matronis nunnis vnbridillit lust last kyng robert informit young insolent maneris send letteris brothir duke albany intertene said son ye duk rothesay leir hym honest ciuill maneris duk albany glaid yir writingis tuk duk rothesay betuix dude sanct androis brocht hym falkland inclusit ye tour yair ony meit drink said ane woman hauand comiseratioun duk l meill fall doun throw ye loftis ye toure quhilkis lyfe wes certane ayis auit yi woma fra wes knawin wes put deith ye maner ane othir woman gaif hym mylk hir paup throw ane lang reid wes slane gret cruelte fra wes knawin yan wes duke destitute mortall supplie brocht finalie sa miserable hungry appetite yat nocht allanerlie filth toure quhare wes bot awin fingaris gret marterdome body wes beryit lu doris kythit miraklis mony yer eftir quhil last kyng iames first began punis h slayaris fra ye tyme furth ye miraclis ceissit ye samyn tyme george erle marche reuenge ye cotemptioun done erle douglas come ye erle northubirland scotlad ane gret pray men guddis ye samyn reuenge yir attemptatis ye erle douglas come ane army northumbirland waistit ye cuntre gret displeseiris al sone wes returnit patrik hepburn went ingland litill le damage douglas army afore youcht wes counsalit freindis depart hame becaus inglismen wer cuand hym multitude peple yan mycht resist yit refusit finalie faucht sic manheid aganis inglismen yat apperit haif ye victorie incontinent george dunbar eldest son erle marche come ane hundreth speris put folkis flycht battall wes slane patrik hepburn ye halis mony gentyll men hous sindry wer takin iohne william cokburne robert lawder ye ba iohne thomas haliburtoun yi battall wes strikin nesbet ye mers ye xxii day iuni fra redemptioun imiiiic wa yeris phovv ye scottis vvar discofist ho mildoun hovv hary haitspur thomas perse brothir vvas slane schrevvisbery ye erle douglas tane ca xiiii nisbet discomfist wyse followit ane othir discomfitour displesand archebald erle douglas maich kyng robert rycht desyrus reuenge yir iniuris done inglismen come xm men ye new castell brint heryit ye cuntre al partis quhare come army wes mordok eldest son duk robert erle fiffe thomas erle murray george erle angus w mony othir noblis scotland last quhen yai wer returnand hame infinite pray rich guddis met thaym hary haitspure george erle marche trublit yame sa di arrowis yt yai war put flicht nochtheles hortation ada gordoun schir iohn swintoun yai renewit battal faucht lytyll mair felicite tha afore yai war al slane tane vnhappy battall war slane schir iohn swintoun adam gordon iohn leuinstoun calledar alexand ramsay dalhousy sindry othir gentylmen nobillis scotlad archebald erle douglas mordo stewart eldest son duke robert george erle angus robert erskin alloway ye lord saltoun iames douglas maister dalkeith ii brethir iohn willia mony al ye baronis fife louthiane war tane hary haitspur proude yi victory come victorius army throw louthiane mers purpos subdew ye samyn ye empire inglad pissance ye erle marche come teuidale segit ye castel cokclauis bot sa vailyeantly defendit iohn greinlay yt costranit depart yairfra efter yt said iohn greinlay geuyn plegis gif gat na rescours within ii monethis rand ye hous yi battal homildon strikin ye rude day heruist fra ye incarnaton imiiiiciii yeris efter ye deting inglismen iohn gled stanis went duk robert gouernor schawing ye castel codicionat raderit without gat support agane ye terme affixit mony ye noblis quhen yai couenit yi effect thocht better tyne ye castell cok lauis tha ieoperd ye pepyl defence yairof yai war brokin ye wer afore rehersit yus ye castel bene left desert war gouernour declarit pa propir son ye rescours yairof howbeit ane ye noblis wald follow hym ye mene time rais sic displeseir betuix king hary ingland hary haitspur yt necessar sed ony support rescours ye said castell hary haitspur fenyeand pa aganis ye scottis rasit ane army support ye duk york ye erle stanefurd hauad hym cupany ye erle douglas quhilk tane afore homildoun mony freindis support aganis king hary vnd yi codition gif ye king ingland discofist put fra ye croun ye said erle douglas suld ranson fre haue berwik raderit reward assistence king hary knawing yair rebellion come arrayit battall schrewisbery quhare ye perse asseblit ye tyme quhen ye battallis war reddy iune yai war seuerit interuention george erle marche efter ye king hary sworn exoner hym ye croun ingland gif sic thingis war acceptable noblis erar sa gret effusion blud suld maid defalt perse geuand ferme credit yir word sufferit army skaill yair logynnis ye nicht yt yai micht ye better furnist vittallis al sone yai war skailit ye king set yam wt arrayit battallis slew said hary perse thomas perse brothir mony othir noblis heidismen yair factioun ye erle douglas quhilk assistit ye said hary perse dition afore rehersit faucht yt day incredible maheid slew iii array ye kingis coit armour ingland quhe saw ye fourt cu ye samyn array meruellit quhat way sa mony kingis war cuyn aganis hym last quhen ye feild dyscomfist takyn nane cumpany saiffit bot hym self knawin ane maist vailyeant knychtis albion yi erle namit archebald tyne wan neuir feild yt howbeit faucht ay gret maheid tint ane ene battal homildon yi feild tynt ane stanis last quhen brocht ye supper ye quenis tabyll ingland efter ye mony lordis ingland war menand yair heuy woudis gottin yi last battal said yai sit full styl yt he ane reuyn breik yocht ye victory succedit kig hary yit gret slauchter best capitanis bot mair nowmer war slane cotrapart hary perse erle northubirland knawing baith sonnis slane yi last battal schrew ery traistit na felicite abyde ingland come scotland h nepot ressauit hary wardlaw bischop sanct androis phovv iames secund son king robert vvas tane inglisma ye tenour ye letteris send vvith hym ca xv king robert aduertist yt son ye duk rothesay deceissit gret martyrdome ye tour falkland throw h deith grew ilk day gret sorow malacoly last send h brothir robert duk albany accusit ye treasonble slauchter ye duk rothesay h son duk robert mony vane reasonis schew hym innocet ye duk rothesay slauchter mittit gif ye king wald pa edinburgh deliuer ye limaris boud quhilk war occasion h sonis deith ye king richt desirus reuenge sonnis deith come bute ane cheriot edinburgh ye mene tyme duk robert deliuerit ha dis certane limaris punist ye slauchter ye said duk howbeit yai neuir saw hym yair dayis yoch yi limaris war accusit punist ye deith yit ye duk haldin ay suspition ye kig semit vsurpe ye croun quhe al kingis sonis war slane yairfore kig robert besocht god send vengeace ye said robertis posterite al quhilkis war occasion son ye duk rothesayis deith king robert eft h returnyng bute send secud son iames prince scotlad wal wardlaw bischop sanct androis ye son hary haitspur quhilk nepot ye erle northubirlad equale age ye said iames ye bischop sanct androis knawyng duk robert set vter besynes coques ye croun send secreit writing ye kig schew richt difficil dangerus kepe son scotlad cosidering ye gouernour al ye realm vnd obesance th co cludit ye kig send son othir frace ingland quhare mycht eschew al treason deuisit aganis hym sone efter ane schip prouidit necessaris tender supplicationis direckit baith king france ingland ressaue hym vnder thair arge protectioun beneuolence gyf happinni hym ariue within ony thair realmes hary lord sinclare ye secud erle orknay chosyn yi besines pullit vp salis ye ba hauad ye said iames ye youg perse mony othir noblis gentilme scotland cupany yi iames richt wery vncouth aire corruption seys desirit refresche hym land takin al cumpany maner otheris writis takin flamburgh held apon seys inglismen quhilkis war aduertist treason certane scottis passage france treuth takyn ix yeir age xxxday marche fra redemption ane miiiiciiii yeris haldin captiuite inglismen xviii yeris efter taking psentit yir supplicatiois quhilkis war direckit fra fader kig robert king hary quhais renour efter followis robert king scottis hary king ingland greting thy gret magnificence humilite iustice ar richt patent w gouernance thy last army scotland howbeit sic thingis bene vncertane w afore youcht thow semit ennyme maist auful incursionis realm yit fad mair huaniteis pleseit damage thy cumyng subdittis specially yame ye ressauit thy nobyl fader ye duk longcastel ye tyme exile scotlad may ceis yairfore quhil ar life bot ay luif loif yt maist nobyl worthy prince iois yi realme yocht realmes nationis cotend amang yame self coques glore landis yit na occasion amang w inuade athir realmes liegis iniuris bot erar contend amang self quhay sall persew othir maist humanite kindnes w wyll mei occasion battal quhare ony occurris thy pleseir forthir becaus haue na le sollicitude preseruing child fra certane deidly ennymes sum tyme thy nobyl fader ar stranit seke support vncouth princis howbeit ye inuasion ennymes sa gret smal fence occurris aganis yame without thay preseruit amite nobyll men warld sa full peruersit malyce na cruelte offence may deuysit erd bot ye samyn may wrocht motion gold syluer heirfore becaus knaw thy hienes ful mony nobyl virtewis sic pissance rich yt na prince day may copair yairto desyre yi humanyte support th time traist vnknawin yi maieste eldest son dauid slane miserabylly preson brothir ye duk albany quhome chesit gouernoure quhen war fallyn decrepit age subdittis realme besekand thy hienes thairfore sa fauorable berar iames secund allanerly sonne may haue targe leif vnder thy faith iustyce sum memory oure posterite knawand vnstabyl conditioun mannis lyfe sa suddan alterit flurisand suddanly falling vter consumption forthir beleif weill quhen kyngis princis he na othir beild bot yair awin folkis thair empire caduke fragyll mynd commoun pepyll ar euir flowand mair inconstant wynd yit quhen princis ar roborat amite othir vncouth kyngis thair br thir nychtbouris na aduersite may occurre eiect thaym fra thair dignite riall forthir gif thy hyenes think nocht expedient god forbeid obtemper thir desyris pyit request ane thyng quhilk ratifijt oure last trewis conditioun peace supplicatioun maid ony two kyngis ingland scotland sall stand maner saifcondict berar thus desyre obseruat oure allanerly sonne gratious god conserue maist nobyll prynce pof ye gret lamentation maid king robert thrid takyng son deith ca xvi quhen thir letteris war red kyng hary callit lordis ane counsall auyse quhat done mater sum yame irkit lang weris mouit commiseration aduersite fallyng king robert said best obtemper desir son cu beneuolence seke refuge aganis ennymes otheris war far discrepant fra ye purpos sayng iames wes takin tyme weir fader king robert inuadyng inglismen co tinewal weris bot ressetting yair ennymes realme alliegit ye syndry scott come support hary haitspure othir conspiratouris ye last battal schrewisbery thus concludit kepe said iames lauchfull presoner yit beneuolence kig hary war chosin sa wise expert preceptouris instruk hym virtew science yt na le resolute euery sciece bene perpetually occupyit bot ane weil lernit fecht swerd iust turnay worsyll syng dance ane expert medicinar richt crafty playing baith lute harp sindry othir instrumentis musik expert gramer oratry poetry maid sa flowand sententious versis yat apperit weil ane naturall borne poete al ane cunnyng theolog lernit science ye tyme captiuite ha dyn ye said tyme gret admiration pepyl singuler virtew th succedit captiuite h gret proffet honoure kyng robert herand son tane yi maner inglismen maid ane heuy lamentation said maryit othir anciant kingis progenitouris scotlad afore nobyl princis kingis honest nationis bene lichtlit contempnit liegis eldest son slane ye tothir chasit ye cuatre falt freindis tane ennymes yi may exampyl al king efter succeding neui degrade thair maieste blud riall lawar blud tha thaym self ye way yai salbe lichtlit cotempnit yair awin subdittis na estimation amang vncouth princis king robert tuk sic malancoly ye taking son inglisme yi maner yat deceissit sone efter ye xvi yeir regne fra ye incarnation imiiiicvi yer buryit paslay quene annabell afore rehersit king robert ane gret stature richt lyberall gratious werkis howbeit meyeit ane straik ane hors haue schawin richt feruent deuotion sa mercyful ye pepyl yt wald suffer na iniur done aganis yame punitioun gyf mycht haue past throw cuntre impediment feit ye realme suld haue bene gouernit wt na le felicite dayis tha ony othir princis tyme afore duk robert eft deith wes chosin new election gouernour gi ye realme efter ye kingis deith better iustice afore ye mene tyme ye castel iedburgh wes tane men teuydale ca n ye ground archebald erl douglas herand kyng robert deceissit maid ane way redemption returnit scotland lang efter ane cousal set restore george erle march honour laudis efter lang disputation concludit yat suld want ane part landis namit annerdale lochmaben ye said ladis pa vnder perpetuall dominion ye douglas thir co ditionis erle marche restorit landis peace phovv vniuersite sanct andros tuk begynnyng hovv gret virtevv police vvas brocht scotland king iames first hovv gret skaith fallis realm promotion vicius prelatis ca xvii tyme rais gret trubil scotland donald ilis willyam erle ro sonne hew ro quhilk slane afore halidoun hyll two douchteris quhilk eldest geuyn mariage walter lesly wt ye erledome ro gat hir ane son namit alexander ane douchter quhilk efter maryit donald ilis alexander succedit erledome ro efter ye deith fader walter marijt ane douchter namyt eufamia quhylk heritour ye erledome ro duke albany persuadit effem quhen scho young ony experience resing ye said erledome handis vnder condition gi scho deceissit without airis hir body said erledome sall cum secound son iohn erle buchquhan gif ye said iohne deceissit airis male gottin body brothir robert sal succeid failyeing airis male ye maner erledome ro sal cum croun thir thingis done gret slicht effem deceissit industry beleuit duke robert yat erledome suld cum son way iohne duke robertis secound son quhilk erle buchquhan afore maid erle ro left bot ane douchter behynd hym quhilk maryit wyllyam seytoun knicht thir causis ye seytonis clamit ye lordschip buchquhan donald ilis herand wiffis ant deceissit come duke robert desiring ye landis ro geuyn hym nerrest lauchfull heritour yairto nochthels gat bot repuls thairfore come power ye ilis subdewit ro opinion nocht cotent thir bou dis come throw murray bogheual syndry othir boundis lyand thair syne come garioch birne abirdene punis thir attemptatis come alexander stewart erle marre faucht aganis ye said donald harlaw quhair gret slauchter maid sydis battall ixc hyeland men war slane makclane makinthos principal capitanis vnder donald ilis erle marri syde war slane alexander ogiluy seref ang iames skrimgeour constabyl dunde alexander irrewyn dru robert mald panmure thomas murray wyllyam abirnethy saltoun alexander straitoun lourestoun robert dauidstoun prouest abirdene knichtis mony othir yi battall strikin sanct iames euyn ye yeir god imiiiicxi yeris donald efter discomfitoure fled gret deligence ilis nochtheles duke robert sewit said donald scharply yat come wyl efter yt sworn neuir inuade ye realme mair trubyll nocht lang efter yi battal patrik dunbar secound sonne ye erle marche wan fast castell tuke thomas haldane capitane thairof presoner tyme ye brig roxburgh brokin wyllya douglas drumlanerik toun roxburgh brint ylk yeir began ye vniuersite sanct andros mony excellent noble clerkis war brocht syndry cuntreis preceptouris followit gret confluence young pepyl al partis scotland desire letteris throw gret exercition virtew quhilk began spreid fast cuntr pecially cumyng hame kyng iames first scotland noble prince sa ful yt held al men science gret uerence geuand perpetual caus pepyll incres craftis virtew bring self honour glore thair yt c etezanis suld plesand honest craftis thair ydill rude maneris quhilkis war afore accusto first returnyng scotl thocht na thyng sa gud expart clerkis realmes decore h weill brocht scotland doctouris theology viii cou decreis mony othir expert men al science promouit thaym syndry prelacyis attour nane tyme yat ony syngular virtew cunyng bot sufficiently promouit sum leuyng e hym na man promouit bischoprikis dayis war syngular erudition science gret felicite succedit scottis dayis ye prouerbe sayis happy ar ye pepyll yt he ane philosophoure thair kyng bot allace far oure tyme different fra yai dayis beleue nane he sic eloquence fouth langage yt may sufficiently deplore ye gret displesouris yat fallis w laik letteris virtew princis thay dayis quhen maist graue personis maist erudition virtew war socht al partis cumpany ye princis nuris thaym virtew princely maneris ar chosyn nane effect bot thay ar maist ygnorat mischeuous lymmaris hauad nane othir ingyne bot nuris princis vice insolence trow quhilk na le infelicite he fallen ye princis ye realme ye pepyl thairof nane rasit dignite office honour benifice bot maist vnhappy auaritious pepyll void virtew gud maneris sa gret ennymes men letteris yat thay may suffer yame rise proffit dignite honouris appetadly yai wald na virtew suld spreid cuntre bot pepyll ay thair ignorance abusit auenture gif ye pepil war brocht perfite knawlege yat thay suld othir constrane thir prelatis amend thair lyuis elli spulye thaym pray gudis ya swelly thair corruppit vsis la thaym amend sic faltis he charge yairof howbeit na thing mouis w bot comiseratioun piete detest thair vicis phovv erllis buchquhan vvigtoun vvent vvith gret armyis support france deith duke robert ca xviii ylk tyme iohne drummond slew treasonabilly patrik graham erle strathern nocht withstandyng assurance tane betuix thaym nobyllis maid sic diligence drummond fynaly takin punist said cryme nocht lang efter rais gret weris betuix charlis vi kyng france hary ye v king ingland kyng charlis held syndry landis frace fra king hary howbeit thay pertenit hym iust heritage last king hary lang sege wan town hunflew syne proude baner come throw picardy waistit boundis thairof quhill come blainge quhen returnyng ingland come hym syndry princis gaif hym battall nochtheles yai war al slane thair army discomfist mene tyme kyng hary aduertist gret rebellioun maid aganis hym walis throw quhilk constranit nocht withstanding yi victory return ingland efter cumyng met hym prince walis mony gret princis inglad opinion gaif hym battall put kyng hary flicht kyng hary withstanding discomfitour come agane new army walis brocht thaym last irrecouerabyll subiection quhil sic thingis war done ingland wyllya halyburtoun wan ye castel werk slew al sonis found howbeit succedit sone efter gret infelicite syndry inglismen knew secretis ye place clam vp throw ane scheild brak wall sic maner yai maid ane quiet passage thair fallowis th castel tane inglismen scottis foudin slane tyme ane gret sisme kirk thre papis creat atanis repair thir arrouris followit cousall constantine quhilk thir thre papis war eieckit ye fourt creat said counsall ye yeir fra redemption imiiiicxix thrid day september deceissit robert duke albany quhilk gouernour scotland xv yeris efter deith king robert ye thrid ane vailyeant noble prince dayis king charlis tyme send scotland erle uandoun chancellar france geit support scottis aganis ingland promittit gret wagis landis officis tyl scottis wald cum defence realme sone efter iohn stewart erle buchquhan secund son duk robert archebald douglas erle wigtoun past france viim armit war tenderly ressauit king charlis ordinance scottis cumand said france maid king hary ingland richt comouit thairfore caus said ordinance depart france gart ye nois rumour pa throw boundis realme cum haistely ane army scottis feir thir nouellis scottis lay al nixt symer bordouris ab dand cumyng army ye mene tyme kyng hary past normandy opprest ye inhabitantis thairof gret iniuris subdewit town roan empire last quhen cumyn maist triumphe victory abyll haue gottin haill dominioun france vincust ane lady gaif besynes fra cheuelry lust amouris way king hary put end weris tuke katrine douchter charlis vi name kyng france mariage vnder thir conditionis gif king charlis deceissit afore kig hary said king hary sall succeid crown france gif hary deceissit first leuad behynd hym ane sonne gottin said king charlis douchter son sall succeid crown france efter ye deith king charlis quhilk coditioun king charlis son spulyeit richt yt ye croun france king charlis regne allanerly life peace schort tyme indurit thairfore said erllis buchquhan wigtoun thair ordinance war ye mair plesandly tretit ye king dalphine france gat toun casteltoun castell thairof remane tyll quhill thay schawin sum honest vassalage hovv duke clarence vvas slane vvith mony othir lordis inglad bauge deith king hary kyng charlis ca xix war ye erllis buchquhan wigtoun aduertist yat thomas duk clarence cumyng xm men sege ye toun castell bauge othir syndry landis orleance quhilk pertenit dalphyne france erle buchquhan knawing ye subtell slichtes inglismen send cousyn schir iohne stewart dernely knycht spy thair army bot sone efter chasit scottis schew duke cumand al ordinance arrayit battall thaym scottis incontinent went harnes met ye duk clarence ane plane beside said toun quhare baith ye armyis ruschit togidder maist fury ye first unyng thomas duke clarence hurt face ane speir knycht swintoun efter slane erle buchquhan resydew inglismen astonist slauchter duke clarence othir gret princis yair land gaif bakkis scottis eissit fra cotinewal chace inglisme quhil far run within ye nicht battall war slane ye duke clarence ye erle reiddisdale lord ro lord gray mony othir gret baronis ye nowmer xvic yame war takin erle huntingtoun ye erle somerside brothir quhilkis war brethir kig iames ye firstis wyfe battal strikin pasche euin fra redeptioun imiiiicxxi yeris dalphyne france glaid victory gaif syndry ladis ye erle buchquhan maid hym costable france king hary mouit gret ire slaucht brothir ye duk clarence come ane new army france hym iames prince scotland traisting draw ye scottis france auctorite dalphyne france rais ylk day mair pissance honour vassalage syndry chosyn campionis scotland king hary schort tyme efter send said prince cum counsall quhare auising noblis quhat ingyne slichtis mycht best inuade ennymes pking hary ye cumyng said iames began schaw quhat displesei bene done hym scottis baith ingland france efter yat schawin mony humaniteis done hym fader king robert desirit ye said iames pa scottis france comand yame name returne scotland king hary mittit gif said iames brocht yi mater gud effect remit h ransoun bot send hym scotland gret rich honour yir wordis answerit iames sa far thow noble prince he schawin wyll schaw ony humanyteis towart sall laubour sa far ye pleseir effering yairto nochtheles mater quhilk thow desiris labour meruel nocht lityll yat thow cosideris nocht haue na power aboue ye scottis sa lang ane priuat man haldin captiuite nochtheles wer put liberte scottis maid lawchfull subdittis wald glaidlie laubour materis thy pleseir al sone said thir wordis departit fra ye counsall yan said kyng hary maist happy peple sall thay yat happinnis get yon nobil man yair prince mony ieoperdeis frequent skarmussing wer maid yi yeir betuix ye dalphyne france inglismen ye inglismen tyme normandy gasconye vnder thair empire bure sic hatrent aganis ye scottis yat yai slew yame quhare yai wer tane maist schamefull deid howbeit thay vsit sic cruelteis othir pepill quhen kyng hary distroyit sindry boundis bryane gret heirschippis slaucht inuadit ye landis kirk sanct fyacre vengeance god wes strikin sic infirmite na ingyne man mycht cure hym last quhen demandit ye medicinar quhat maledy yi bene falling hym sa haistely thay said wes ye maledy sanct fiacre quhilk wes sumtyme ane scot discendit nobill blude thairof yan said kyng hary se nocht bot scottis born perditioun w quhilkis ar aye sa gret ennymes w leiffand deid hame feild thay persew w na le hatrent quhen thay ar eikit amang noumer sanctis quhen yai wer present life kyng hary seing h infirmite incres ilk day causit hym brocht cornwel quhare miserabilly deceissit wes brocht ane cape leid ingland buryit amang ye sepulturis othir kyngis pat tyme charlis ye vi kyng france deceissit eftir quhom succedit charlis ye vii yat name quhais deith ye gret feruour weris began cule betuix inglismen scottis cause erlis buchquhan wigtoun returnit scotlad sone eftir thair returnyng yai come ane army berwik lay lang sege thairof ony werkis worthy haue memory thairfore iurnay wes callit dirtin raid hovv ambassatouris vvar send ingland redemptioun iames first hovv franchemen scottis vvar discomfist vvernoll gret vassalage done madin france ca xx eftir deith duk robert son mordo stewart erle fiffe menteith wes maid gouernour iosit said office foure yeris howbeit wes rycht vnganand thairto nocht sic wisdome manheid fader duke robert afore hym wes ane soft prince ony fortitude aduersite temporance prosperite su tyme apperit febill yat na consolatioun mycht rais hym esperance bett fortoun sum tyme wes ouir seuere cruell executioun iustice ye mater requirit necligent chastifying sonnis walter alexander yai finalie conspirit aganis vncertane quhidder ye cedit softnes mynd far yat couth nocht punys ye iniquiteis sonnis feruent luf affection yame gif thair faltis wer gret yai deseruit punition tha micht vse yame thay wer delatit sindry oppressionis pepil yi walter incurrit extreme indignation fader ane falcon quhilk slew cotemptioun fader becaus fader wald gif hym said falcon pleseir slew halk apon h faderis hand duk mordo mouit yi gret cotemptioun said walter sen thow thy brothir rewlit soft empire sall bring hym hame sal chaistifie yow baith sone eftir couenit noblis ane counsall desirit thaym send ambassatouris ingland redemptioun iames first name mycht return scotland ressaue ye gouernance yair oftymes gret feliciteis cumis contentioun vnhappy parteis inuadyng othir athir iniuris happinnit tyme yi haisty debait rising betuix duk mordo sonnis wer nocht thair contentioun iames first neuir cumyn scotland quhilk bene rycht damageus realme bot returne historie erle buchquhan costable france beleuit litill proffet pleseir fall ye hame cumyng iames first becaus fader duk robert held hym lang realme thairfore solistit gudfader archebald erle dowglas pa wt hym france sone eftir ye said erlis past xm chosyn men france wer ressauit gret honour charlis ye vii king france eftir kyng put thair folkis ordinance maid erle douglas duk turyne wes ane nobill man howbeit wes vailyeant yan fortunat ye mene tyme duk bedfurd lieutenand ye kig inglad come gret army france eftir yat wyn mony townis villagis france segit ane toun namit lyuer brocht sic necessite ye capitane thairof gaif plegis rander inglisme gif gat na rescours within schort tyme kyng charllis knawand ye castell forsaid sic dangeir send duk lanson erlis buchquhan dowglas residew army rescours said hous afore yair cuin thay wer aduertist inglismen gottin ye hous randerit yame tane ane othir toun normandy namit warnol incotinent thay went harnes arrayit thame plane nocht far fra ye toun quhen ye armyis wer reddy iune duk lanson richt inuyful yat scottis suld ryse ony landis honouris within france come away xxm men erlis douglas buchquhan nochtwithstanding treason ruschit forthwart pert curage thair ennymes faucht gret manheid deith nochtheles baith armyis scotland france wer finaly discomfist put flycht yi vnhappy battall wer slane iohne erle buchquhan constable france archebald erle douglas duke turyne lieutenand france archebald douglas son erle wigtoun mony scottis cumpany thair bodyis wer buryit gret lament pepill kirk sanct graciane within toun turyne francheme wer slane erle uentodore sereif narbone mony othir wag ouris comonis ye noumer vim thaym wer taikin ye marcheall france mony othir noblis eft discomfiture succedit gret calamite displeseir franchemen al boundis yair realme partis thairof vntakin vnsegit inglismen thus franchemen bene brocht vter rewyne wer nocht iane madin france cloithit baith mannis array hardiment ereckit kyng charlis fra extreme desolatioun esperance better fortoun yi madin come loryne frace send nocht speciall fauour god quhais hardimet happy victoryis kyng charlis recouerit realme eieckit inglismen boundis yairof bot last scho wes taikin luffingburgh ye burgu dianis sald inglismen quhuilkis brocht hir sone eft roan quhare yai accusit hir socery incantationis saying scho aganis thair lawis inst utionis bure armour mannis claithis vnder figour ane woman finalie tyranny inglismen wes sa gret thay wald heir nane hir reasonis excuse bot brint hir cruelly deith hir industry vassalage yai tynt ye dominion france scho confessit schortlie afore hir deith sa lang scho keippit hir virginite scho wes victori euery battall ony experiece euill fortoun fra scho wes corruppit scho wes maid sone pray hir ennymes tyme robert patillok come scotland ane army kyng charlis ye seuint recouerit sindry boudis frace ut inglismennis handis wes callit thairfore inhabitantis thairof pittit oy gasconye pand sa endis heir xvi buk thir croniklis heir begynnis xvii buk croniklis scotland phovv iames ye first vvas redemit coronation actis ca primo eftir deith archebald erle douglas duke turyne haue schawin warnoll succedit son archebalde thrid name erle douglas erle douglas william hay constable scotland hary bischop aberdene wer send ambassatouris ingland redemptioun iames ye first drest mater sic point yat sal return realme pay ransoun ane cm markis striuelyng quhilk soum ta half sa remittit hir payment tothir half sindry lordis sonnis scotland geuin plege kyng hary vi thir lordis sonnis returnit hame bot deceissit afore thay wer redemyt yi iames h singulare virtew mony freindis ingland amang quhilkis wer speciall maist tende hym iohne bewfurd erle somersyde brothir ye cardinal ingland thir two nobill men mony gret princis ingland conuoyit hym bourdouris scotlad maryit ye said erlis douchter gat fra hym besyde mony goldin siluer veschell sindry riche precious hyngaris quhilkis war ye history hercules maist curiusly wrocht thus entrit prince iames scotland come sonday lentern edinburgh quhare ressauit lordis scotland spirituall temporall maist honour gret confluence pepyl come hym partis scotland richt desirus se hi mony yame neuir sene hym afore elli leist prent visage yair memory howbeit yai war weil informit syngulare virtew mony yeris afore al sone solempnite pasche done come perth sone efter went scone quhare crownit lady iane duke mordo hary byschop sanct androis xxi day may fra redeption imiiiicxxiiii mony nobyl men come ingland iames first gat landis fra amang quh ane namit andro gray quhilk rewardit syndry ladis hym rais ye surname grayis scotlad quhais posterite seueris yit amang w cled gret land honouris baith gowry angus sic thingis done ye kyng returnit edinburgh sumond yame io ony auctorite duryng ye tyme duk robert duk mordo gouernouris first conuenit hym chancellar thesaurer ye clerk register ye comptrollar otheris yat bure ony chargis concerning kingis tentis last quhe lang compt found ye maist part landis rentis pertenyng ye crown waistit emis duke robert duke mordo gouernouris amang thair freind na thing left sustene crown except customes burrowis na thing content estate howbeit schew gud vult tyme al sone auisit al euidentis rollis pertenand crown set ane parlyament edinburgh auyse thre estatis ordanit ane general tax rasit throw ye realme xii p nyis pound al landis scotland spirituall temporal iiii pennyis ilk kow ox hors ye space two yeris cum payment ranson taxt rasit first yeir bot secound rais sic murmur amang pure comonis yat remittit residew tuke neuir taxt scotland efter ye quhyll douchter maryit dalphine frace amang mony othir thingis done yi parliamet ye pepyll complanit syndry oppressionis done yame duke mordois sonnis otheris gret men realme kyng incontinent gart arrest walter stewart son duke mordo malcolme flemyng cumernald thomas boid kylmarnok walter send ward ba bot mal olme thomas war send ward dalkeith nochtheles ye king tuk ane easy compositioun yame money efter parteis war thit parliament king iames gaif h aith fidelite deba liberteis haly kirk end lyfe remanent baronis efter hym gaif thair aithis maner lang efter ane vthir counsall set perth quhilk kyng gart arrest duk mordo alexander son archebald thrid name erle douglas brothir wyllyam erle angus george erle marche adam hepburn halis mony othir gret baronis scotland put yame syndry castellis strenth remane ward quhil war auisit incontinent tuk castellis f lkland doun menteith duk mordo send carlaurok duches put temptalloun phovv duk murdo tvvo sonnis vvar iustif ie kyng iames hovv erle ca hnes vvas slane inuerlochty erle mar vincust ca ii beltane day yeir nixt followyng callit inuentioun haly croce iames stewart thrid son duke mordo mouit gret ire fader brethir war haldin captiuite come wt ane gret power dunbritane brint efter slane iohn stewart dudonald xxxii men kyng richt comouit thir attemptatis followit yi iames sa fersly chasit ireland quhare deceissit v day efter war brocht ye king v complecis ye said iames yai war hyngit quarterit stryueling king cotinewit parliament xviii day may striuelyng thair hym self sittand septoure swerd crown iugement walter stewart son aire duk mordo conuickit heidit afore ye castel morow duk mordo secund son alexander duncane stewart erle lanax war conuickit forfaltit crymis lese maieste heidit afore castell maner forefaltoure duk mordo sonnis erledomes fiffe menteith lanax come ye kingis handis remanent lordis gret baronis quhilkis war ward tyme kingis pleseir war richt affrayit herad ye scharp execution iustice maid duke mordo sonnis nochtheles thay war put liberte ane yeir efter recounsalit kingis fauoure nixt yeir quhilk fra redemption ane miiiicxxvii king tuk alexander lord ilis erle ro innernes morow war tane sindry wickit lymmaris oppressouris cuntre hyngit iebattis thrid day efter lord ilis accusit afore ye king intertenyng theuis bringing yame kingis iustice quhare thay mycht apprehendit becaus lord ilis promittit amend sic thingis tymes cumyng put liberte throw quhilk followit gret trubyll within dayis efter brint town innernes lay ithandly segeand ye castell thairof quhyll finaly aduertist king cumand hym gret power tha fled ye ii last lord ye ilis seand sa mony pepyl lyand ilk day wait bring hym kingis iustice come dissagisit pure array fell kneis afore king halyrudhous pasche day quhare sittand h orison desirit grace saik ye rais ye day fra deith ye king requeist ye quene saiffit lyfe comandit hym remane quhil ye seruice war done yan ye king began muse gif restorityis alexand land honour ony forthir punition suld occasion conspi e aganis hym tymes cumyng thairfore ye said alexander send schir willia douglas erle angus kingis sister son remane castell temptalloun yt na trubyll suld rise freindis eufame moder doucht walt su tyme erle ro wardit sact colmes inche scho ane gret solister hym attept sic besines aganis ye king nocht lang efter donald ballocht brothir said lord alexander ilis come ane gret power men lochquhaber erles mar cathnes saif ye cuntre fra trubyl come yair folkis faucht ye said donald inuerlochty quhare ye erle cathnes slane erle mar disco fist th returnit donald victory gret pray guddis ilis king incotinent punis thir attemptatis come ane army dounstafage purposyng haue passit ye ilis thair met hym heidismen clannis airof excusyng thair offence saying thay war costranit aganis yair wyll pa ye said donald displeseir cuntre thir clannis war finaly tane fauour ye king sworn persew ye said donald ye deith lang efter donald fled ireland quhare slane heid brocht striueling king pof gret iustice done kyng iames first al partis scotland natiuite iames secund syndry actis done said noble prince iames first ca iii trubyll dantit maner foresaid king iames past throw al boundis realme punist mony strang lymmaris oppressouris pepyl deith na remissioun geuyn afore gouernour admittit afore iustice thay war expirit de th attoure king thocht nocht pl sand god proffitable co mon weil sa mony slauchteris reiffis oppressionis done afore cuntre falt iustice wa vnpunist said first two yeris regne iiim pepyll wa slane iustice syndry auld crymes offecis comittit aganis ye pepyll yeris afore yocht th punition apperit sufficiet yneuch pepyll realme yit ane lymmer namit ang duffe strathern come ane cupany theuis tuk ane gret pray gudis murray cathnes inco tinent followit hym ang murray gret power othir angus duffe na thing affrayit cumyng met hym ye maner strachnauern followit ane scharp battal f chtin sic cruelte ylk syde yat xii personis war left onely lyue kyng iames herand yi slauchter said na le sorowfull slauchter men cathnes murray howbeit nane left lyue mycht punist offence thairof yi tyme ane othir gret lymmer namit makdonald ro quhilk grew spulyeis heirschippis ye pepyl gret rich yi lymmer schod ane pure wed hors schone becaus scho said scho suld gang king reuele wekit oppressiois pal sone scho helit hir woudis scho past ye king schew gret cruelteis done lymmer king maid sone efter sic deligence yat tuk makdonald xii h complecis punist yame maist schamefull deith ye thrid yeir efter quhilk fra redemption imiiiicxxx ye xvi day october iane ye quene delyuer two sonnis ani alexander iames first deceissit infance nixt iames secund quhilk succedit immediatly efter fader ye croun mony gret baronis lordis war present yair baptyme thair war knicht maid amang quhom first willyam son archebald erle douglas quhilk succedit eft ye erldome douglas ye nixt yeir efter king arrestit archebald erle douglas duke turyne held hym lang captiuite ward last supplication quene othir gret prelatis realme ye kyng remittit offencis put baith hym alexader erle ro liberte al sone ye realme brocht gud tranquillite maner ya passingeris micht trauel trubyll partis thairof maid officiaris iugis pa throw partis realme yat iustice micht haue place al weil hie ye law partis causit prouestis bailyeis ylk town vse veschel iust mesuris concernyng ye interchange vittallis wyne aill othir war markit mark bailyeis prouest war brokin occupiaris yair codampnit gret sowmes money last quhen reparit ye streth realme siclike munitionis afferit veseit vniuersite sanct androis oftimes present thair generall disputationis tuk sic pleseir thair intyl dotat vniuersite syndry preuilegis gaif thaym power cheis maist perfit personis mycht put thaym gret prelacyis scotland thay vakit thus war men ay promouit benifices effering thair eruditioun knawlege yairfore maner virtew spred fast tyme aboue al othir commoditeis seruyce god incressit gret reuerence honour maist crafty musik yit occurris dayis nixt yeir quhilk fra saluation im iiiicxxxi hary vi king ingland come paris crownit nostre dame kirk hauad bot xii yeris age yit yeris efter put baith fra empire ingland france come fugitiue kyng iames thrid quhome plesandly ressauit yit ane notabyl example ye vnstabyl vnsickir chance fortoun sen sum tyme kyng two maist pissant kigdomes put fra yame baith constranit seke refuge vncouth pepyll phovv bischop sanct androi lang precheing dissuadit riottus custome bankettis ca iiii nocht lang efter wes ane parlyament perth amang mony othir act done th parlyament remoue ye surfet expensis maid riottus cheir bankettis quhilkis war brocht scotland inglismen hame cumyng king iames na le dammage manis bodyis wasting yair guddis rais vp hary wardlaw bischop sanct androis said maner suppos mony nobyl werk maist wyse prince ar brocht realme thy cumyng iustice religion polesy mony othir gud lawis proffet common weill na thing pretermittit left vndone mycht proffet auance thy realme honest maneris vsit afore amang w thy wysdome confirmit al new bonteis appering amang w ar cu myn thy industry hir ye mair cure laudour ye thow he tane bring sic honest stitutio amang w think thay suld ye mair deligently kepit yair ane lurkand pest fast burgeand sic irremediable venome ye gif yt samyn haistely remedyit thir commoditeis brocht thy cuyng yi realme salbe lytyll effect noblis yt sittis heir thy psence he desirit tyl schaw mater yair name desire thy hyen schaw thy wisdome al weill mater othir thingis ye done syndry nobyll men sic war thy freindis ingland ar cumin cuntre vnworthy haue thy fauour howbeit yai haue brocht yame maneris inglismen qu lkis ar richt damageus thy pepyll youcht thair maneris schamfully yair awin cuntre becaus yair pepil accustomit yair think ane gret syn cut thy pepyll sic vennomus maneris mene thir superflew costlye coursis metis yt thay persuade eit drink mair sufficient nuttsing nature wyll thow considder temperance vsit amang oure auld faderis thow sall fynd na thing sa contrarius thairto new glotony brocht amang w yit wait quhid der sorrowfull pest myn amang w mair awin defalt defalt inglismen considder haue geuyn place yairto sone yit quhatsumeuir way vnhappy custome cum amang w contempnit mony vicis followis thair apon sic ar intemperance lust sleuth reif waisting gudis gif teperace nurisar al virtew inte perance moder tyl al vice fo lust intemperance ar sa knit togidder thay may na wayis seuerit fra othir yt seruand wambe man obey al thingis yt desiris followis lust wambe defloration virginis adultre incest thir mischeu vennome young followis onely superflewite drink fra ane man geuin ani plesei wambe becumis ydill ony thocht thingis cu ay ye mair yat ye ingyne man geuyn thairto mair feirsly rynnis tyl euery kynd vice yocht ane haue waistit patrimony sic superflew meitis drinkis yit vennome yt swelleis fenyeit pleseir thairof sal neuir seuir fra hi quhil deid thir siclik wordis bischop hary dissuadit king pepyl fra al superflew coursis immoderat bankettis nochtheles intemperance risyn sa insatiabil voracite na foule ye air fische ye see ar sufficient satify ye hungry appetite gl tonis quhill yair wambe sa boldin thay may draw thair aynd mony othir siclik skaith dayly fallyng yame se experience sege roxburgh hovv ye king brocht mony craftismen realme hovv paule cravv vva brint ye charturaris perth foundit ca v ye yeir ye xvii day iuny ane terribil eclipse son iii houri efter none ye day mirknit half ane houre togidder bene nycht thairfore callit ye blak houre ye nixt lama efter king past ane army sege castell marchmond yt say roxburgh scottis war nowmerit army iicm men futmen caragemen last quhen kyng lyue ye sege foresaid xv dayis waistit al munittoun powder returnit hame ony mair felicite succeding h army sone efter returnyng army deceissit robert cardin bischop du keld efter quhome succedit bischop iames kennedy kyngis syster son gottyn countes ang within ii yeir efter traslatit sait sanct androis kyng iames agment comon weill caus liegis incres mair virtew brocht mony nobyll craftismen france flanderis othir partis scottis war exercit continewall weris fra tyme kyng alexander thrid thay dayis thus war craftisme slane weris nocht lang efter tane sanct androis ane man beum namit paule craw precheand new vane superstitionis pepyl specially aganis sacrament alter ueneration sanctis confession maid preistis last brocht afore theologis al opinionis condampnit becaus perseuerit obstinatly end pley condampnit brint confessit afore deith send beum preiche scottis ye herisyis hus wiccleif king commendit mekyl punition gaif abbacy melros iohne fogo principall couikar paule kyng iames quhen realme brocht gret tranquillite peace maner past oftymes amang subdittis specially marchandis fyne na thyng suld vnknawin hym realme last quhen considderit maneris thair banketting r preuit thaym becaus thay suff ri men pay thai houssis efter yat thay war callyt thair dy naris supparis pat tyme foundit abbay charturaris monkis beside perth gret magnificence kyng iames nixt yeir come ambassatouris scotland fra kyng hary desyryng band france dissoluir betuix scottis franchemen promittyng gyf counsall scotland wald assent yairto geif ouir berwik landis lyand betuix tweid recroce northumberland kyng knawyng nocht bot dissait thair promittis depeschit yame ony mair comonyng thay materis phovv erle marche vvas forc faltit syndry vassalagis done erle mar gret industry vvisdome ca vi yeir fra incarnation thousand iiii hundred xxxiii yeris king tuke george dunbar son erle marche rebellit aganis king robert thrid fader wardit hym castell edinburgh pand sone efter send wylliam erle angus wyllyam creichtoun chancellar adam hepburn halis scharp wryttyngis ye capitanis keparis yairof delyuer ye said castel ony tary yair handis yus ye castel ra drit ony mair tary ye king inco tinent set ane parliamet perth thair george erle marche forefaltit ye treasonabyl rebellion george fad aganis king robert thrid way failyeit ye nobyl anciant hous ye erldome marche quhilk flurisit sa mony yeris gret defence munition realme small offence brocht nocht kyng mouit sum miseration within schort tyme efter gaif ye erldome buchquhan said george ane yeirlye pension iiiic markis payit hym said erledome marche pension brukit said george patrik sonne quhyl cumyng kyng iames ye secound perfite age ye yeir deceissit alexader stewart erle mar alexander ane bastart son alexander erle buchquhan afore rehersit quhilk son king robert secound ane man syngular virtew tender yeris se e eodium quhen tane phil yp duke burgundie grit glore wan said iornay maryit lady namit iane coutes holland nochtheles put fra hir vncert ne quhethir come ye said countes becaus scho ane othir husband becaus inhabitantis desirit nocht myngit vncouth lude within schort tyme efter returnit scotland send seruandis holland desyring ye proffet land becaus gat nocht bot repuls thairof held con inewall weris hollandaris quhill thay war constranit pleis hym proffettis bygane tuke peace scot ane hundreth yeris erle r ane richt industrius ciuill man brocht ungary scotland syndry gret hors spreid cuntre thair genus io thus cuntre within yeris efter fillit ful gret hors howbeit afore tyme nocht bot small naggis realme wise erle wisdome maid lieute ad al ye north scotland buryit dankeld efter deith al landis rich conques war confiscat ye kingis handis becaus gottin vnlauchfull bed phovv denmark scotland vvar aggret al deb ti hovv kig iames douchter margaret vvas maryit dalphine france hovv perse vvas discofist douglas piperden ca vii lang afore tyme ane herald send king denmark scotland desiring ye yeirly tribute aucht hym mony yeris bygane ilis accordyng promes maid king alexander thrid sone efter send king schir wyllyam creichtoun denmark quhare dressit mater sa plesandly nocht followit efter bot gud peace amite betuix two realmes danis scottis tyme send ambassatouris charlis vii renew band betuix scotland france roborat ye samyn mair permanent felicite margaret eldest douchter ye said king iames wes geuyn mariage lowis daulphine france gret prouysion maid schippis mony ye grettest noblis scotland send couoy hir france ane c xl ladyis matronis virginis amang quhom v sister ye said margaret ferther quhen yi prouision maid schippis reddy ye wyndis come ane herald inglad desirand kyng nocht send douchter france schew gyf war repugnant thairto douchter suld tane hir cumpany inglismen lyand see abiding hir cumyng kyng iames nochtwithstanding bost mynassing inglismen comandit marineris pull vp salis mair deligence ye mene tyme inglismen yat lay wait taking ye said margaret hir cumpany aueture come apon ane flote spanyeartis quhare gret slauchter othir side ye mene tyme quhe thay war fechtand maist feirsly scottis nauy come throw seys ony sycht ennymes landit turyne quhare thay war ressauit gret triumphe king charlis mariage maid solempnitly betuix son lowis dalphin said margaret quhyl sic thingis war done france scotland hary perse northumbirland come iiiim men scotland vncertane quhidder come awin kyngis auctorite wyllyam douglas erle angus resist inuasion come ane cupany chosyn men amang quhom war ada hepburn halis alexand ramsay dalhoussy alexander elphinstoun yat ylk met ye said hary perse piperdene quhare fochtin cruelly gret slauchter al sydis bot last scottis war victorius battall war slane scottis alexander elphinstoun ye ylk iic gentylmen comonis scotland ye said aduersar war slane hary cliddisdale iohn ogil richard perse wt xvc inglisme quhilk xl war knycht yame war tane iiic brocht scotland pof slauchter kyng iames first punition yat vvas maid yairfore syndry meruellis sene albion ca viii gret myscheif sorow followit scotland efter discomfitour inglismen piperden hid wachsing walter stewart erle athole quhilk pretendit ay ane richt crown reason yat gottyn king robert ye secund first wyfe erle schew afore ye genology stewardis
