principal mouar robert duk albany sla dauid steward duk rothesay efter hame cumyng iames first solistit said kyng slay duk mordo othir duk robertis lynnage traisting quhe thir nobyll men war put fynd sum hyd way slay kyng barnis mycht thairefter succede crown becaus duke robertis sonnis war deceissit sum thaym slane battal uernoll otheris iustifyit kyng iames perswadit robert stewart nepot robert grahame cousyn slay kyng robert afore kyngis horne syndry gret offensis done hym aganis kingis auctorite na thing mair hatrent kyng thir vnhappy tratouris lyand said wait espy ganand tyme fulfyll thair cursit purpos come sone efter ye blak freris perth quhare ye kyng lugit ye tyme licence portaris thay enterit ye kingis hall purposyng haue remanit thair quhyll cumyng ane othir familiar seruand kyng haue gottyn entres kingis secret chalmar way participant thaym said treasoun yit afore ye cumyng yi man ane seruant namit walter straroun opnit dure went furth ressaue wyne kyngis collation al sone saw thaym aufully arrayit dure cryit treason maid hym strenth return agane nochtheles sone slane yit slayng hym maid sic tary laif yat ane young madyn namit katherine douglas quhilk efter maryit alexander louell bolunny slekit dure becaus ye bar away yat suld haue closit ure scho schot hir arme place quhare bar suld haue passit scho bot young hir bonis thairfore hir arme sone rokin schonder ye dure doung force incontinent thay nte efter yat thay slane miliar seruandis yat maid debait tyme thay slew king ny cruell woundis hurt ene defence principall man yt maid debait yi tyme patrik dunbar brothir george quhill erle marche le deid chalmer defence prince wes myn sta u e braid schulderit smal wais membris sa weil proporcionat yt na thing failyeit hym yat mycht geuyn nature ane maist virtuous princis yt euir afore dayis richt iust life scharp punisar vice slane ye xxi day februar xliiii yeir aige xiii yeir regne fra redemption ane miiiicxxxvi yeris body buryit abbay charteraris quhilk fundit schort tyme afore deith nobillis rycht sorowfull h slauchter maid gret deligence sercheing thir forenamit tratouris quhill last thay war apprehendit brocht edinburgh quhair thay war punist maner pthe erle athole quhylk pryncypall mouar treason first spulyeit claithis saif onely ane lynnyn curche hyd priuat memberis incontinent maid ane instrument tre lyke drawer ane wel efter thay festenit ane cart thay band erle apon point said drawer yeid ye said cart throw ye toun sum tyme rasand tratour ya pepyl micht se hym hie ye aire leit hym fall doun ane swak apon gait syne brocht hym ane place quhare maist confluence pepyll crownit hym hait yrne ane weche said suld crownit kyng afore deith thir illusionis causit hym leif ay vnder vane esperance conques crown morow yi erle harlit complicis throw streitis town ye thrid day wambe opnit bowellis tane furth cassyn flichtrand fyre afore ene efter al torment hert tane body cassyn ye fyre heid schorne fra h body body quarterit nepot robert stewart punist ye maner robert grahame principall slayar king harlit throw town ane cart hand slew king bound thairto hait yrne schot throw al partis h body specially quhare ya beleuit na haisly deid following efter gret punition tane hym demandit durst sa bald sla kyng answerit bot foly demad quhat ane dar durst said leip hell howbeit heuyn hell war chois wayis condingly punist maner ye tyme scotland eneas siluius ambassatour eugenius ye iiii pape ye name ane mony letteris send ye said pape trete peace betuix inglismen scott yi eneas wes eft syngular virtew maid pape rome nochyeles quhe eradis maist besaly scotland come yi inuy fortoun yt prince slane fra saw hym deid said ye scottis war worthy ioys ony kingdomes honouris bot gif thay condigly punist ye kingis slaucht co mendit yame gretuly quhen saw sa scharp punition maid slauchter tyme kyng iames ye first war sindry meruellis sene albion ane sow hir lytter wt dog heidis ane calfe sene ane hors heid ane comet apperit lang afore kingis deith bemes sa vehement frost ye winter afore ye wyne ail sauld pound wechtis meltit agane fyre ane swerd sene fleand air na le terroure admiration pepyl sa endis heir xvii buke thir croniklis pthe epistil direckit ye traslatoure kyngis grace erasmus roterodamus buke namit institutioun cristin kyngis schawis maist nobyl prince na thing mair admiration werkis kingis quhilkis ar sa patent sicht pepyll euery man he thaym mouth thair comendation repreif thus may na thyng sa fruteful dant ye comoun errouris pepyll honest vixtewis life kingis ye lyfe kingis drawis yair subdittis imitation yair werkis worthy vnworthy cumis lycht impulsion fortoun na thing sufferis hyd forthir euery history yat men redis apperis euidently maneris ye pepyl quhilkis ar vsit kyng sen na thing yt pepyl followis mair imitation kepi mair recent memory tha werkis nobil men reason thair besines suld mair respondent virtew tha ony othir estatis amang mony knichtly exercitionis vsit nobyl princis fynd nane mair proffitable yame tha frequent reding thir othir historyis yame may found mony hailsome documentis attoure frute history sa necessare yt ye dedis forcy campionis suddandly euanissis contrar effect thairof causis thay thingis quhilkis ar mony yer gone appere al recent memory thay war bot recently done thairfore said moral poete horace eildis awin cuntre following sic thing bene done afore laik experience bot ane barne thir reasonis yt he bene humyl seruitour senyour first inface he traslatit ye history scotland sen ye first begynnyng thairof vulgar langage yat h ene may knaw ye vailyeant nobyl dedis done progenitouris haue cognasance realme he bene gouernit thir xviiic yeris bygane quhilk neuir subdewit vncouth empire bot ye natiue princis yairof howbeit ye he sustenit gret truble weris romani inglisme danis wt sindry chacis fortoun heir may hienes vndstand realme suld gouernit iustice quhat son ar maist abil beir auctorite office yair intil seand mony eldar degenerat fra virtew efter yt thay war accumpanyi young insolent pepyll vane fleschouris quhilkis na regard weil honoure thair prince bot onely thair awne comoditeis dout bot ye maner ar mony personis dependyng hienes vennomit auarice youre grace assa ye na thing sa damagius honoure princely estate bot salbe weill commendit thaym gif thay f nd wyl pleseir set yairto nochtheles youre hienes cumyn ow sic perfection ye vnderstand weill quhay bene presently sari quha best suffaris ommoun weil sen mai ste manheid wisdome he region brocht rest gud peace traquil e howbeit samyn couth nocht done gret baronis ender aige apperis thairfore nobyll worthy deidis pro dis mai naturall inclinatioun actiue cu age ony gudly pe suasioun assisteris yocht hienes dotat gif nature he bene sene afore ony othir prince traist ferme gif sic preemin nt giftis nature vnwa ly abusit na werkis sall follow worthy haue memory pthairfore souera dare baldly afferme na othir besines sall mair fruitfull hienes tha frequent reding thir siclik historyis sic thingis sall nocht onely moue yow imitation virtew bot sall infound na le experience wisdome tha ye war trauellit throw warld agit lang pr e yeris seand sa mony exemplis virtewis vi ius leuing sic illuster dedis armis gif eldaris possedit prudence equaualent thair innatiue manheid na pepyl reason mycht haue bene preferrit thaym marciall glore mair lenth apperis edyng history heir sall youre grace vnderstand inuiolatly faith crist he bene obseruit youre progenitouris neuir abarrand fra sicker religion piete heir sal bra differece knawin betuix kingis tyranis seneca sayis tragideis ar nocht kingis bene clothit purpour diademe bot onely thay sekis na singulare proffet dammage thair comoun weill sa vigilant ye life yair subdittis mair deir precius thaym yair awin lyfe ane tyrane sekis ryches ane king sekis honoure conquest virtew ane tyrane gouernis realme slauchter dredoure falset ane king gidis h realme prudence integrite fauour ane tyrane suspeckis thaym tha he rich gret dominioun auctorite gret rentis ane king haldis sic men maist helply frei dis ane tyrane luffis nane bot vane fleschou vicius wickit lymma quhais counsall rage slauchter tyranny ane king luffis men wisdome grauite science knawing weill gret materis may weill dressit thair prudence tr uth ye kyngis tyranni he mony handis mony ene mony mo membr ane tyrane settis hym dr ane kig u fit ane tyrane reiosis make pepyll pu e ane king mak yame riche ane tyrane drawis h pepyl syndry factionis discord hatrent ane king mak peace tranquillite concord knawing na thing dammagious di ision amang subditis ane tyrane confoundis diuine humane lawis ane kyng obseruis thaym reiosis equite iustice thir properteis salbe patent reding ye lyuis gud euyl kingis ye history pcedent yus may hienes haue gret comodite pleseir foresaid storie quhat thing may mair plesand tha se yi present volume ane cleir myrroure variance tyme bygane syndry chacis fortoun bludy fechtyng terribyll berganis sa mony yeris continewit defence realme liberte quhilk fallyn hienes gret felicite howbeit ye samyn he oftymes bene ransonit wt maist nobyll blude youre antecessouris quhat wyl nocht reiose heir ye knichtly affaris thay forcy campionis king robert bruce wyllyam wallace first innatiue desyre recouer realme brocht sic calamite yat mony dayis durst nocht appeir sicht pepyl bot amang desertis leuad rutis herbes esperance better fortoun bot last singulare manheid come sic preeminent glore yt reput maist vailyeant nobyl prince yat wes efter empire yi othir small begynnyng feirs curage corporall strenth put inglismen scotland bot al befeir h aufull visage put edward king ingland flicht held bordouris fornence scotland waist siclik mony othir vailyeant princis he bene realme caratak gald keneth gregour fergus mony otheris precedent history youcht sum progenitouris war degenerat fra virtew followis lytyll admiration romane empriouris mony war vicious nero caligula helyogabal domicius co mod uttellius mony otheris youcht thair vicius dedis bene abhominabyll thair posterite yit ye deploration thair calamite sall moue redaris imitatioun virtew neuir hard bot ane man vicious life he ane vicious ending nocht onely kyngis princis bene deieck fra thair imperial estait quhen thay war aberrant fra virtuous discipline bot mony nobyll baronis maner quhen thay proude insolence war repugnat thair superiour traist yairfore souerayne hienes wil put na le eloquence tha grauite memory haue fame deseruis presently yi life beseikand glorius mercyfull lord geif yow grace perseueir sic felicite yt youre subdittis may haue sufficient motiue desyre hienes lang lyue pthe quhilk mot grant gratius god amen pfinis epistole heir endis hystory croniklis scotland cosmography dyscription thairof compill noble clerk maister hector boece channon aberdene translatit laitly vulgar commoun langage maister iohne bellenden archedene murray imprentit edinburgh thomas dauidson
